Isarailanↄ kína Sulemanu tãnagbagbakinↄ bò yã Sidↄ̃denↄ tãna Asatorɛnɛ kũ Mↄabunↄ tãna Kɛmↄsio kũ Amↄninↄ tãna Mↄlɛkio Yurusalɛmu ifãboki kpa zaa Kùkpɛ sĩ̀sĩgɛrɛɛi gɛ̀nↄmidↄki kpa, akũ Yosia tãnagbagbaki pìnↄ gbã̀a lɛ̀.
À a gbɛ̀pɛtɛnↄ wìwi à a lípɛtɛnↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃, akũ à bisãsiri gɛ̀wanↄ fã̀kↄ̃a gu pìnↄla.
Bee tãnagbagbaki kũ Nɛbati nɛ́ Yeroboamu bò Bɛtɛli kũ a sa'okio à Isarailanↄ dào durunnakɛnan pìi, Yosia gbagbaki pì kũ a sa'okio gbòro. À gbagbaki pìi gbɛ̀nↄ wìwi à a tí bò à tɛ́ nà Asɛra lípɛtɛa dↄ.
Kũ à wɛ́ zù, à miranↄ è sĩ̀sĩia gwe, akũ à gɛ̀wanↄ bↄ̀tɛn à kpàta sa'oki pìia à a gbã̀a lɛ̀, lán Dikiri gĩnakɛ à ò nà Luda gbɛ̃ gãi.
Akũ kína pì: Dí miran ò sèedaa kɛ̀a zã̀ diree? Akũ wɛ̃tɛpidenↄ pì: Luda gbɛ̃ kũ à bò Yudanↄ bùsummɛ. Àkũ mɛ́ à gĩnakɛ à yã kũ n kɛ̀ Bɛtɛli sa'oki díkĩnanɛɛ pìi ò.
Akũ kína pì: À a tó gwe. Gbɛ̃ke sún a wá sɛ́ à sↄ̃sↄ̃oro. Akũ ò a wánↄ tò gwe kũ annabi kũ à bò Samaria wáo.
Tãnagbagbaki kpɛ́ kũ Isarailanↄ kínanↄ bò Samaria bùsu wɛ̃tɛnↄ gũn ò Dikiri pↄ fɛ̃̀onɛnↄn Yosia wìwi pínki lákũ à kɛ̀ Bɛtɛli pↄ́nɛ nà.
Akũ à gbagbaki pìnↄ sa'orinↄ kùtu kpàkpa sa'oki kũ òdi sa oanↄa ń pínki à bisãsiri gɛ̀wanↄ kpàtaa, akũ à ɛ̀ra à tà Yurusalɛmu.
Kína pì gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínkinɛ: À Vĩnla dikpɛ kɛ Dikiri á Ludanɛ lákũ à kú Dikiri bàka kunna kũoo takada dí gũn nà.
Zaa gↄrↄ kũ yãgↄ̃gↄ̃rinↄ dò Isarailanↄnɛ arɛ kũ gↄrↄ kũ Isarailanↄ kínanↄ kũ Yudanↄ kínanↄ tɛn kí bleo pínki, òdi Vĩnla dikpɛ pì kɛ à kà lɛro.
Kína Yosia kíblena wɛ̃̀ baro plansaride gũnn ò Vĩnla dikpɛ pìi kɛ̀ Yurusalɛmu.
Abire gbɛra à gɛ̀sisirinↄ kũ wedekũnnadenↄ mìi dɛ̀ kũ kpɛ́ gũn tãnanↄ kũ ↄn tãnanↄ kũ tɛ̃̀ pↄ́ kũ ò è Yurusalɛmu kũ Yudanↄ bùsuuonↄ pínki, de à zĩ kɛ dokayã kũ ò kú takada kũ sa'oriki Ilikia bòa Dikiri ↄnn pìnↄa.
Kína kũ ò kú a ãnↄ kũ kína kũ ò kú a gbɛranↄ tɛ́, ń gbɛ̃ke dí arɛ dↄ Dikiria kũ nɛ̀sɛ mɛ̀n doo kũ a pↄyeinaao pínki lákũ a bàro. À Musa doka kũna pínki a gbãna lɛ́n.
Bee kũ abireo Dikiri pↄfɛ̃na Yudanↄi kũ pɛ̃tɛ̃ pãsĩo yã vãni kũ Manase kɛ̀ yãi dí kpátɛro.
Dikiri pì: Mani pɛ́ Yudanↄa mà ń gomala lákũ ma pɛ Isarailanↄa ma ń gómala nà. Mani gí Yurusalɛmu kũ ma sɛ̀i kũ kpɛ́ kũ ma pì ma tↄ́ nigↄ̃ kúaao.
Yosia yã kparanↄn kú Yudanↄ kínanↄ gĩayãkɛnanↄ takadan kũ yã kũ à kɛ̀nↄ pínki.
Kína Yosia gↄrↄa kũ Misila kína Firi'auna Nɛko tɛn gɛ́ Asiria kína le Yuflati, akũ Yosia gɛ̀ɛ zĩ̀ ká kãao Mɛgido. Kũ ò kↄ̃ lè, akũ Nɛko a dɛ̀.
A ìbanↄ a gɛ̀ɛ sɛ̀ ò dà sↄ̃go gũn ò sùo Yurusalɛmu ò vĩ̀. Akũ Yudanↄ a nɛ́ Yoaza kà kína ũ a gɛ̃nɛ ũ.
Yoaza wɛ̃̀ baro awɛɛ'aakↄ̃de gũnn à kí blè, akũ à kú kín Yurusalɛmu mↄ aakↄ̃. A da tↄ́n Amutali, Ilimia nɛ́, Libina gbɛ̃mɛ.
À yã kũ Dikiri yeiro kɛ̀ lákũ a dizinↄ kɛ̀ nà.
Akũ Firi'auna Nɛko mↄ̀ↄ kàa Ribla, Amata bùsun, de àsungↄ̃ de kína ũ Yurusalɛmuro yãi, akũ à pì Yudanↄ fĩna boarɛ andurufu tↄn aakↄ̃ kũ a kusuo kũ wuraao kiloo baraakuri awɛɛsↄↄro.
Akũ à Yosia nɛ́ Ɛliakimu dìtɛ kína ũ a de gɛ̃nɛ ũ, akũ à a tↄ́ lìtɛnɛ Yoyakimu. Akũ à Yoaza sɛ̀ à tà kãao Misila, gwen à gàn.
Yoyakimu andurufu kũ wura kũ Firi'auna Nɛko gbɛ̀kaawa sì a bùsudenↄa baadi gbãna lɛ́n, akũ à kpàa.
Yoyakimu wɛ̃̀ baraasↄↄrode gũnn à kí blè, akũ à kú kín Yurusalɛmu wɛ̃̀ kuri awɛɛdo. A da tↄ́n Zebida, Pedaya nɛ́, Ruma gbɛ̃mɛ.
À yã kũ Dikiri yeiro kɛ̀ lákũ a dizinↄ kɛ̀ nà.
Yoyakimu kíblegↄrↄan Babilↄnu kína Nɛbukanɛza sù à lɛ̀tɛ Yudanↄ bùsuua, akũ Yoyakimu gↄ̃̀ a zↄ̀bleri ũ ari wɛ̃̀ aakↄ̃. Abire gbɛra Yoyakimu nɛ̀sɛɛ lìtɛ, akũ à bò a kpɛ.
Dikiri Babilↄnia gbãnamↄnnɛrinↄ gbàrɛa kũ Sirianↄ kũ Mↄabunↄ kũ Amↄninↄo. À ń gbárɛ ò Yudanↄ bùsu kakatɛ lákũ à ò a zↄ̀bleri annabinↄ gãi nà.
Yã pì Yudanↄ lè kũ Dikiri mɛ́ à ò yãi, de à pɛ́ḿma à ń goala durunna kũ Manase kɛ̀nↄ yãi kũ yã kũ à kɛ̀nↄ pínki
kũ taarisaride kũ à ń dɛdɛnↄ yão. Manase tò Yurusalɛmu pà kũ taarisaride kũ à ń dɛdɛnↄ aruo. Abire yãi Dikiri dí we à sùru kɛ̀ kãaoro.
Yoyakimu yã kparanↄn kú Yudanↄ kínanↄ gĩayãkɛnanↄ takadan kũ yã kũ à kɛ̀nↄ pínki.
Kũ à gà, akũ a nɛ́ Yoyakini a gɛ̃nɛ blè.
Misila kína dí ɛra à bò a bùsun doro, zaakũ Babilↄnu kína bùsu kũ à de Misila pↄ́ ũ yã sìa pínki sɛna zaa Misila bùsu lɛ́zɛki swai ari Yuflatii.
Yoyakini wɛ̃̀ baro plansaride gũnn à kí blè, akũ à kú kín Yurusalɛmu mↄ aakↄ̃. A da tↄ́n Nɛusuta, Ɛlɛnatã nɛ́, Yurusalɛmu gbɛ̃mɛ.
À yã kũ Dikiri yeiro kɛ̀ lákũ a de kɛ̀ nà.
Gↄrↄ birean Babilↄnu kína Nɛbukanɛza zĩ̀karinↄ sù Yurusalɛmu ò a kaguraa kɛ̀.
Akũ Nɛbukanɛza sù gwe gↄrↄ kũ a zĩ̀karii pìnↄn likai.
Akũ Yudanↄ kína Yoyakini bò à gɛ̀ɛ à a zĩda kpàa, àpii kũ a dao kũ a ìbanↄ kũ a sakpanↄ kũ a kpàasinↄ. Babilↄnu kína Yoyakini kũ̀ a kíblena wɛ̃̀ sↄraakↄ̃de gũn.
Akũ à Dikiri ↄn aruzɛkɛnↄ kàkara à bòo gwe kũ kínabɛ aruzɛkɛnↄ pínki. À wura pↄ́ kũ Isarailanↄ kína Sulemanu kɛ̀ Dikiri kpɛ́ pↄ́ ũnↄ zↄ̃̀zↄ̃kↄ̃rɛ pínki lákũ Dikiri gĩnakɛ à ò nà.
À Yurusalɛmu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ kũ zĩ̀karinↄ kũ̀kũ à tà kũńwo zĩ̀zↄnↄ ũ ń pínki. Ò kà gbɛ̃nↄn dúbu kuri. À tà kũ lí'arinↄ kũ sianↄ dↄ. Gbɛ̃ke dí gↄ̃ro, séde talakanↄ baasiro.
Lɛn à Yoyakini kũ̀ Yurusalɛmu lɛ kũ a dao kũ a nↄnↄ kũ a kpàasinↄ kũ bùsu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ à tà kũńwo Babilↄnu zĩ̀zↄnↄ ũ.
À tà Babilↄnu kũ gↄ̃ gbãnanↄ gbɛ̃nↄn dúbu suppla kũ ↄzĩkɛrinↄ kũ sianↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa sↄↄro. Ń pínki zĩ̀kari gbãnanↄmɛ.
À Yoyakini disɛ̃ Matania dìtɛ kína ũ a gɛ̃nɛ ũ, akũ à a tↄ́ lìtɛnɛ Zedekia.
Zedekia wɛ̃̀ baro awɛɛdode gũnn à kí blè, akũ à kú kín Yurusalɛmu wɛ̃̀ kuri awɛɛdo. A da tↄ́n Amutali, Ilimia nɛ́, Libina gbɛ̃mɛ.
À yã kũ Dikiri yeiro kɛ̀ lákũ Yoyakimu kɛ̀ nà.
Dikiri pↄfɛ̃ mɛ́ à tò yã pì Yurusalɛmu kũ Yudanↄ bùsuuoo lè pínki ari à gɛ̀ɛ pɛ́ḿma à ń goala. Akũ Zedekia bò Babilↄnu kína kpɛ.
Zedekia kíblena wɛ̃̀ kɛ̃ndode gũn, a mↄ kuri gↄrↄ kuriden Babilↄnu kína Nɛbukanɛza sù lɛ́tɛ Yurusalɛmua, àpii kũ a zĩ̀karinↄ ń pínki. Ò bùraa pɛ̀tɛ a bĩni sarɛ, akũ ò gbà leinↄ dↄ̀ ò lìkai.
Ò wɛ̃tɛ pì kaguraa kɛ̀ lɛ ari kína Zedekia kíblena wɛ̃̀ kuri awɛɛdode gũn.
A mↄ siikↄ̃ gↄrↄ kɛ̃ndoden nà gbãna kpà wɛ̃tɛ pìn, gbɛ̃ke pↄ́ble vĩ doro.
Kũ ò bĩni fↄ̃̀, bee kũ Babilↄnianↄn likana wɛ̃tɛ pìii, akũ Yuda zĩ̀karinↄ bàa sì ń pínki, ò bↄ̀tɛ kũ kínabɛ karaao ò bↄ̀tɛ wɛ̃tɛ gɛ̃kia gwãani, akũ ò pɛ̀tɛ Yoda sɛ̃̀n.
Akũ Babilↄnia zĩ̀karinↄ pɛ̀tɛ kína pìii ò a lè sɛ̃̀n Yɛriko kpa. Kũ Zedekia zĩ̀karinↄ lɛ̀kↄ̃a ò a tòn,
akũ ò a kũ̀ ò tà kãao Babilↄnu kínanɛ zaa Ribla, akũ ò yã dàala.
Ò a nɛ́nↄ dɛ̀dɛ a wára, akũ ò a wɛ́ bòbo ò mↄ̀gotɛ̃ kpàtii kpànɛ ò tà kãao Babilↄnu.
Babilↄnu kína kíblena wɛ̃̀ baro donsaride gũn, a mↄ sↄↄro gↄrↄ supplade zĩ a ìba Nɛbuzaradã sù Yurusalɛmu. Àkũmɛ Nɛbukanɛza dogarinↄ gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ ũ.
À tɛ́ nà Dikiri ↄnnwa kũ kínabɛo kũ Yurusalɛmu kpɛ́nↄ pínki. Kpɛ́ kũ à de kpɛ́ zↄ̃kↄ̃ ũ pínki, à tɛ́ nàa.
Akũ à tò Babilↄnia zĩ̀karinↄ ń pínki Yurusalɛmu bĩni gbòro.
À gbɛ̃ kũ ò gↄ̃̀ wɛ̃tɛ pìi gũnnↄ kàkara à tà kũńwo Babilↄnu kũ gbɛ̃ kũ ò gɛ̀ɛ ò nà Babilↄnu kínaanↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kparanↄ.
Talakanↄn à tòn de ògↄ̃ geepi búnↄ kũ búgbɛnↄ sɛ̃̀ wa.
Babilↄnianↄ Dikiri ↄnn mↄ̀gotɛ̃ gbánↄ kũ tadibↄnↄ kũ íkaki zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄo wìwi ò tào Babilↄnu.
Ò túbukabↄnↄ kũ a sɛ́tɛbↄnↄ kũ fitiladɛbↄnↄ kũ gↄ̃mbↄnↄ kũ mↄ̀gotɛ̃ pↄ́ pãnde kũ òdi Dikiri zĩ kɛonↄ kàkara ò tào dↄ.
Akũ dogarinↄ gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄ pì takasonↄ kũ arusibↄnↄ kũ pↄ́ kũ ò pì kũ wuraao ke kũ andurufuuonↄ sɛ̀tɛ pínki.
Mↄ̀gba mɛ̀n pla kũ íkaki pìio kũ tadibↄ kũ Sulemanu pì Dikiri ↄn pↄ́ ũnↄ, òdi fↄ̃ ò a mↄ̀gotɛ̃ yↄ̃̀ kilooaro, a tìkisii kɛ̀ zↄ̃kↄ̃.
Mↄ̀gba pìnↄ lei kà gã̀sãkuru baro plansari, akũsↄ̃ a fùra kũ ò kú musunↄ lei kà gã̀sãkuru sↄↄro. Mↄ̀kakↄ̃ana tãna kũ ↄzĩ kũ ò kɛ̀ lán bísi nɛ́ bànↄn likana fùraa pìnↄi pínki. Mↄ̀gba mɛ̀n pla pìnↄn lɛɛlɛmɛ.
Dogari gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄ pì sa'oriki Seraya kũ̀ kũ a plade Zɛfanayao kũ zɛ́dãkpãri gbɛ̃nↄn aakↄ̃nↄ.
À gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ kũ à de zĩ̀kari don'arɛde ũ kũ̀ wɛ̃tɛ gũn kũ kína ìba gbɛ̃nↄn sↄↄro kũ à bòḿma wɛ̃tɛ gũnnↄ dↄ kũ zĩ̀kari gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ takadakɛ̃ri kũ àdi gbɛ̃nↄ tↄ́ da sozanwo kũ a gbɛ̃nↄ gbɛ̃nↄn baaakↄ̃ kũ ò bòḿma wɛ̃tɛ gũnnↄ.
Nɛbuzaradã ń kákara à tà kũńwo Babilↄnu kínanɛ zaa Ribla,
akũ Babilↄnu kína ń dɛdɛ Ribla gwe Amata bùsun. Lɛn ò Yudanↄ kàkara ń bùsun ò tà kũńwo lɛ.
Babilↄnu kína Nɛbukanɛza Aikamu nɛ́ Gedalia, Safana daikore dìtɛ gbɛ̃ kũ ò gↄ̃̀ Yudanↄ bùsunnↄ gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ ũ.
Kũ zĩ̀kari don'arɛdenↄ kũ ń gbɛ̃nↄ mà Babilↄnu kína Gedalia dìtɛ gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ ũ, akũ ò sù a kĩnaa Mizipa. Nɛtania nɛ́ Sumaila kú ń tɛ́ kũ Karea nɛ́ Yoananao kũ Tanumɛ nɛ́ Seraya, Nɛtofa gbɛ̃o kũ Maaka gbɛ̃ nɛ́ Yazaniao kũ ń gbɛ̃nↄ.
Akũ Gedalia la dàńnɛ kũ ń gbɛ̃ pìnↄ à pì: Àsun vĩna kɛ Babilↄnia gbãnadenↄnɛro. À vutɛ ó bùsun la à zↄ̀ ble Babilↄnu kínanɛ, ánigↄ̃ aafia.
Ama a mↄ supplade gũnn Nɛtania nɛ́ Sumaila, Ɛlisama daikore kũ à de kínɛ ũ sù kũ gbɛ̃nↄn kurinↄ à Gedalia dɛ̀ kũ Yuda kũ ò kú kãao Mizipanↄ kũ Babilↄnia kũ ò kú kãao gwenↄ.
Akũ Yudanↄ fùtɛ, nɛ́ fíti gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ ń pínki kũ zĩ̀kari don'arɛde pìnↄ, ò bàa sì ò tà Misila, kũ òtɛn vĩna kɛ Babilↄnianↄnɛ yãi.
Yudanↄ kína Yoyakini tana Babilↄnu wɛ̃̀ baraakuri awɛɛsupplade, a mↄ kuri awɛɛpla gↄrↄ baraasↄↄro awɛɛpladen Babilↄnu kína Ɛvili Mɛrodaki a bò kpɛ́siran a kíblena wɛ̃̀ káaku gũn.
À yã mana ònɛ, akũ à vutɛki kpàa kũ à de a kína dake kũ ò kú kãao Babilↄnunↄ pↄ́la.
Akũ Yoyakini a kpɛ́sira uta bò à kàtɛ, àdigↄ̃ pↄ́ ble kũ kínao lɛɛlɛ ari a wɛ̃̀ndi lɛ́n.
Lákũ gu dìgↄ̃ dↄ nà kína dìgↄ̃ pↄ́ble kũ à yei kpáa ari à gɛ̀ɛ à gà.
Adɑmuwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Sɛtin tundo. Mɑ Sɛti u mɑɑ Enɔsi mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Enɔsi u Kenɑni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Kenɑni u Mɑhɑlɑlɛɛli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɑhɑlɑlɛɛli u mɑɑ Yerɛdi mɑrɑ.
Yerɛdiwɑ u Enɔku Mɑrɑ. Mɑ Enɔku u Mɛtuselɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɛtuselɑ u Lemɛki mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Lemɛki u mɑɑ Nɔwɛ mɑrɑ. Nɔwɛ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Sɛmu kɑ Kɑmu kɑ Yɑfɛtin tundo.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑfɛtin bibu, berɑ Gomɛɛ, kɑ Mɑgɔgu, kɑ Mɑdɑi, kɑ Yɑfɑni, kɑ Tubɑli, kɑ Mɛsɛki, kɑ sere mɑɑ Tirɑsi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gomɛɛn bibu, berɑ Asikenɑsi, kɑ Rifɑti, kɑ Togɑɑmɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑfɑnin bibu, berɑ Elisɑ, kɑ Tɑɑsisɑ, kɑ Kitimu, kɑ sere Dodɑnimu.
Kɑmun bibɑ, Kusi, kɑ Misirɑimu, kɑ Puti, kɑ sere Kɑnɑni.
Kusin bibɑ mɑɑ, Sɑbɑ, kɑ Hɑfilɑ, kɑ Sɑbutɑ, kɑ Rɑemɑ, kɑ sere Sɑbutekɑ. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Rɑemɑn bibu, berɑ Sebɑ kɑ Dedɑni.
Kusi u mɑɑ bii mɑrɑ wi bɑ sokumɔ Nimurodu. Wiyɑ u gbiɑ u kuɑ wɔrugɔ dɑmgii hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ.
Misirɑimuwɑ u Ludibɑ mɑrɑ kɑ Anɑnibɑ, kɑ Lehɑbubɑ, kɑ Nɑfitubɑ,
kɑ Pɑturusigibu, kɑ Kɑsulugibu, mìn di Filisitibɑn bweserɑ yɑrimɑ, kɑ sere Kɑfitorigibu.
Kɑnɑniwɑ u Sidoni kɑ Hɛti mɑrɑ. Sidoni wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ win bii gbiikoo.
Kɑnɑni win bibu gɑbɑ bɑ kuɑ Yebusibɑ, kɑ Amɔrebɑ, kɑ Girigɑsibɑ,
kɑ Hefibɑ, kɑ Aɑkibɑ, kɑ Sinibɑ,
kɑ mɑɑ Aɑfɑdibɑ, kɑ Semɑrigibu, kɑ Hɑmɑtibɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sɛmun bibun bweseru, berɑ Elɑmu, kɑ Asuri, kɑ Aɑpɑsɑdi, kɑ Ludi, kɑ Arɑmu, kɑ Usi, kɑ Uli, kɑ Getɛɛ, kɑ sere Mɛsɛki.
Aɑpɑsɑdiwɑ u Selɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Selɑ u mɑɑ Heberu mɑrɑ.
Bii tɔn durɔbu yiruwɑ Heberu u mɑrɑ. Gbiikoon yĩsirɑ Pelɛgi. Yĩsi ten tubusiɑnɑ, bɑ bɔnu kuɑ, yèn sɔ̃ win wɑɑti sɔɔrɑ duniɑgibɑ tem bɔnu kuɑ. Win wɔnɔn yĩsirɑ mɑɑ Yokutɑni.
Yokutɑniwɑ u Alimɔdɑdi mɑrɑ, kɑ Selɛfu, kɑ Hɑsɑmɑfɛti, kɑ Yerɑɑ,
kɑ Hɑdorɑmu, kɑ Usɑli, kɑ Dikilɑ,
kɑ Ebɑli kɑ Abimɑɛli, kɑ Sebɑ, kɑ Ofiri, kɑ Hɑfilɑ, kɑ Yobɑbu.
Beni kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yokutɑnin bibu.
Sɛmuwɑ u Aɑpɑsɑdi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Aɑpɑsɑdi u mɑɑ Selɑ mɑrɑ.
Selɑwɑ u Heberu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Heberu u Pelɛgi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Pelɛgi u mɑɑ Rehu mɑrɑ.
Rehuwɑ u Serugu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Serugu u Nɑkori mɑrɑ. Mɑ Nɑkori u mɑɑ Terɑ mɑrɑ.
Terɑwɑ u Aburɑmu mɑrɑ wi bɑ mɑɑ sokumɔ Aburɑhɑmu.
Aburɑhɑmun bibɑ, Isɑki kɑ Isimɛɛli.
Ben bibun bweseru wee. Isimɛɛlin bii gbiikoowɑ Nɛbɑyɔtu. Win wɔnɔbɑ Kedɑɑ, kɑ Adibɛli, kɑ Mibusɑmu,
kɑ Mikimɑ, kɑ Dumɑ, kɑ Mɑsɑ, kɑ Hɑdɑdi, kɑ Temɑ,
kɑ Yeturi, kɑ Nɑfisi, kɑ sere Kɛdimɑ. Beniwɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isimɛɛlin bibu.
Aburɑhɑmun kurɔ wi bɑ mɔ̀ Keturɑ, win bibɑ Simurɑni, kɑ Yokusɑni, kɑ Mɛdɑni, kɑ Mɑdiɑni, kɑ Yisibɑku, kɑ sere Suɑ. Yokusɑnin bibɑ mɑɑ Sebɑ kɑ Dedɑni.
Mɑdiɑnin bibɑ Efɑ, kɑ Efɛɛ, kɑ Enɔku, kɑ Abidɑ, kɑ Ɛlidɑ. Beni kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Keturɑn bibu kɑ win nikurɔminu.
Aburɑhɑmuwɑ u Isɑki mɑrɑ. Isɑkin bibɑ Esɑu kɑ Isireli.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Esɑun bibu, berɑ Elifɑsi, kɑ Rewɛli, kɑ Yeusi, kɑ Yɑlɑmu, kɑ sere Kore.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Elifɑsin bibu, berɑ Temɑni, kɑ Omɑɑ, kɑ Sefi, kɑ Gɑtɑmu, kɑ Kenɑsi, kɑ Tinnɑ, kɑ sere Amɑlɛki.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Rewɛlin bibu, berɑ Nɑhɑti, kɑ Serɑki, kɑ Sɑmɑ, kɑ sere Misɑ.
Seirin bibɑ Lotɑni, kɑ Sobɑli, kɑ Sibeoni, kɑ Anɑ, kɑ Disoni, kɑ Esɛɛ, kɑ sere Disɑni.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lotɑnin bibu, berɑ Hori, kɑ Homɑmu. Lotɑnin sesuwɑ Tinnɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sobɑlin bibu, berɑ Aliɑni, kɑ Mɑnɑhɑti, kɑ Ebɑli, kɑ Sefi, kɑ sere Onɑmu. Sibeonin bibɑ mɑɑ Ayɑ kɑ Anɑ.
Anɑn biiwɑ Disoni. Disonin bibɑ mɑɑ Hɑmurɑni, kɑ Ɛsibɑni, kɑ Yitirɑni, kɑ sere Kerɑni.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Esɛɛn bibu, berɑ Bilɑni, kɑ Sɑfɑni, kɑ Yɑkɑni. Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Disɑnin bibu, berɑ Usi kɑ Arɑni.
Sinɑm be bɑ bɑndu di Edɔmuɔ, Isirelibɑ bu sere mɑɑ bɑndu swĩi ben temɔ, berɑ Belɑ, Beorin bii. Win wuun yĩsirɑ Dinɑbɑ.
Ye Belɑ u gu, mɑ Yobɑbu, Serɑkin bii, Botisirɑgii u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ.
Ye Yobɑbu u gu, mɑ Husɑmu, Temɑnigii u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ.
Ye Husɑmu u gu, mɑ Hɑdɑdi, Bedɑdin bii u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ. Wiyɑ u Mɑdiɑnibɑ go Mɔɑbun bɑru kpɑɑnɔ. Win wuuwɑ Afiti.
Ye Hɑdɑdi u gu, mɑ Sɑmulɑ, Mɑsirekɑgii u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ.
Ye Sɑmulɑ u gu, mɑ Sɔɔlu, Rehobɔtugii u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ. Rehobɔtu ye, yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ dɑɑ bɑkɑrun berɑ giɑ.
Ye Sɔɔlu u gu, mɑ Bɑɑli Hɑnɑni, Akɑborin bii, u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ.
Ye Bɑɑli Hɑnɑni u gu, mɑ Hɑdɑri, Pɑigii, u gɔnɑ kɔsire kuɑ. Win kurɔn yĩsirɑ Mɛhetɑbɛli, Mɑtiredin bii, Mɛsɑɑbun debubu.
Hɑdɑrin gɔɔn biru, Edɔmubɑ bɑ bɑndu bɔnu kuɑwɑ bwese kɛrɑ kɑ bwese kɛrɑ. Be bɑ kuɑ wirugibu bwese kɛri yi sɔɔ, berɑ Tinnɑ, kɑ Alifɑ, kɑ Yetɛti,
kɑ Oholibɑmɑ, kɑ Elɑ, kɑ Pinɔni,
kɑ Kenɑsi, kɑ Temɑni, kɑ Mibisɑɑ,
kɑ Mɑdiɛli, kɑ Irɑmu. Be bɑ kuɑ ben bwese kɛrin wirugibu Edɔmuɔ, berɑ mi.
Yɑkɔbu wi bɑ mɑɑ sokumɔ Isireli, win bibun yĩsɑ wee. Rubɛni, kɑ Simɛɔ, kɑ Lefi, kɑ Yudɑ, kɑ Isɑkɑri, kɑ Sɑbuloni,
kɑ Dɑnu, kɑ Yosɛfu, kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ, kɑ Nɛfitɑli, kɑ Gɑdi, kɑ Asɛɛ.
Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yudɑn bibu, berɑ Eri kɑ Onɑni, kɑ Selɑ. Ben mɛrowɑ Suɑ, Kɑnɑnigii. Eri, Yudɑn bii gbiikoo wi, u kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ, mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ u gu.
Tɑmɑɑ Yudɑn biigii kurɔwɑ u nùn Perɛsi kɑ Serɑki mɑruɑ. Mɑ Yudɑn bibu kpuro bɑ kuɑ tɔmbu nɔɔbu.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Perɛsin bibu, berɑ Hɛsironi, kɑ Hɑmulu.
Serɑkin bibɑ mɑɑ Simiri, kɑ Etɑni, kɑ Hemɑni, kɑ Kɑlikoli, kɑ sere Dɑrɑ. Be kpuro bɑ kuɑwɑ mi tɔmbu nɔɔbu.
Kɑɑmiwɑ u Akɑni mɑrɑ. Akɑni wiyɑ u Isirelibɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kpɛ̃ɛ kɔ̃sɑ ye u kuɑn sɔ̃. U yɑ̃nu suɑ ni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ bu kpeerɑsiɑ mɑm mɑm.
Etɑnin biiwɑ Asɑriɑ.
Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Hɛsironin bibu, berɑ Yerɑmɛɛli, kɑ Rɑmu, kɑ Kɑlɛbu, wi bɑ mɑɑ sokumɔ Kelubɑi.
Rɑmuwɑ u Aminɑdɑbu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Aminɑdɑbu u mɑɑ Nɑsoni mɑrɑ, wi u kuɑ Yudɑbɑn wirugii.
Nɑsoni wiyɑ u Sɑlumɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑlumɑ u mɑɑ Boɑsi mɑrɑ.
Boɑsiwɑ u Yobɛdi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yobɛdi u mɑɑ Isɑi mɑrɑ.
Eliɑbuwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Isɑin bii gbiikoo. Mɑ Abinɑdɑbu u sɑ̃ɑ yiruse. Mɑ Sɑmɑ u sɑ̃ɑ itɑse.
Mɑ Nɛtɑnɛɛli u sɑ̃ɑ nnɛse. Mɑ Rɑdɑi u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔbuse.
Mɑ Osɛmu u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔbɑ tiɑse. Mɑ Dɑfidi u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔbɑ yiruse.
Ben sesubɑ Seruyɑ kɑ Abigɑli. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Seruyɑn bibu, berɑ Abisɑi kɑ Yoɑbu kɑ Asɑɛli. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mi, be itɑ.
Amɑsɑn mɛrowɑ Abigɑli. Win tundowɑ mɑɑ Yetɛɛ, Isimɛɛli.
Kɑlɛbu, Hɛsironin bii u tɔn durɔbu itɑ mɑrɑ kɑ win kurɔ Asubɑ. Berɑ Yesɛɛ kɑ Sobɑbu kɑ Aɑdoni. U mɑɑ kɑ Yeriɔtu mɑrɑ.
Ye Asubɑ u gu, mɑ Kɑlɛbu u Efɑrɑtɑ suɑ kurɔ. Mɑ Efɑrɑtɑ wi, u nùn Huri mɑruɑ.
Huri wiyɑ u Uri mɑrɑ. Mɑ Uri u mɑɑ Bɛsɑlɛli mɑrɑ.
Yen biru, ye Hɛsironi u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɑtɑ, yerɑ u Mɑkiri, Gɑlɑdin tundon bii suɑ kurɔ. Mɑ u nùn Segubu mɑruɑ.
Segubu wiyɑ u Yɑiri mɑrɑ. Yɑiri wi, u wusu wɑwɑ yɛndɑ itɑ Gɑlɑdin temɔ.
Adɑmɑ Gesuribɑ kɑ Sirigibu bɑ Yɑirin wuu si wɔri bɑ mwɑ kɑ Kenɑtin wusu kɑ sin bɑru kpɑɑnu kpuro. Su sɑ̃ɑwɑ wusu wɑtɑ. Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuu si sɔɔ kpuro, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Mɑkiri Gɑlɑdin tundon debuminu.
Hɛsironi, Abiɑn durɔn gɔɔn biru, Kɑlɛbu u mɑɑ kɑ Efɑrɑtɑ mɛnnɑ mɑ u nùn bii tɔn durɔ mɑruɑ wi bɑ sokumɔ Asuri. Asuri wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Tekoɑgibun sikɑdo.
Yerɑmɛɛli, Hɛsironin bii gbiikoon bibɑ, Rɑmu, kɑ Bunɑ, kɑ Orɛni, kɑ Osɛmu, kɑ Akiyɑ. Rɑmuwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben gbiikoo.
Yerɑmɛɛli wi, u mɑɑ kurɔ goo suɑ wi bɑ sokumɔ Atɑrɑ, Onɑmun mɛro.
Rɑmu, Yerɑmɛɛlin bii gbiikoon bibɑ Mɑɑsi, kɑ Yɑmini, kɑ Ekɛɛ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Onɑmun bibu, berɑ Sɑmɑi, kɑ Yɑdɑ. Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sɑmɑin bibu, berɑ Nɑdɑbu kɑ Abisuri.
Abisurin kurɔn yĩsirɑ Abihɑili. Wiyɑ u nùn Akubɑni kɑ Mɔlidi mɑruɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Nɑdɑbun bibu, berɑ Selɛdi kɑ Apɑimu. Selɛdi wi, u ǹ bii mɑrɑ u kɑ gu.
Apɑimuwɑ u Yisei mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yisei u Sesɑni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sesɑni u mɑɑ Alɑi mɑrɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑdɑ, Sɑmɑin wɔnɔn bibu, berɑ Yetɛɛ kɑ Yonɑtɑm. Yetɛɛ wi, u ǹ bii mɑrɑ u kɑ gu.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yonɑtɑm bibu, berɑ Pelɛti kɑ Sɑsɑ. Beni kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yerɑmɛɛlin bibun bweseru.
Sesɑni u ǹ bii tɔn durɔbu mɑrɑ. Bii tɔn kurɔbu tɔnɑwɑ u mɑrɑ. Sesɑni wi, u Egibitigii goo mɔ yoo, wi bɑ rɑ soku Yɑrɑ.
Mɑ Sesɑni u win bii tɔn kurɔ suɑ u Yɑrɑ win yoo Egibitigii wi wɛ̃ u suɑ kurɔ. Mɑ u nùn Atɑi mɑruɑ.
Atɑiwɑ u Nɑtɑni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Nɑtɑni u mɑɑ Sɑbɑdi mɑrɑ.
Sɑbɑdiwɑ u Efilɑli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Efilɑli u Obɛdi mɑrɑ.
Obɛdiwɑ u Yehu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yehu u mɑɑ Asɑriɑ mɑrɑ.
Asɑriɑwɑ u Hɑlɛsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Hɑlɛsi u mɑɑ Elɑsɑ mɑrɑ.
Elɑsɑwɑ u Sisimɑi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sisimɑi u mɑɑ Sɑlumu mɑrɑ.
Sɑlumuwɑ u Yekɑmiɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yekɑmiɑ u Elisɑmɑ mɑrɑ.
Kɑlɛbu, Yerɑmɛɛlin mɔɔn bii gbiikoowɑ Mɛsɑ, wi u sɑ̃ɑ Sifun tundo kɑ Mɑresɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ Heboronin tundo.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Heboronin bibu, berɑ Kore, kɑ Tɑpuɑ kɑ Rekɛmu, kɑ Semɑ.
Semɑwɑ u Rɑkɑmu, Yɔɔkɑmun tundo mɑrɑ. Rekɛmuwɑ u mɑɑ Sɑmmɑi mɑrɑ.
Sɑmmɑiwɑ u Mɑoni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɑoni u Bɛti Suri mɑrɑ.
Efɑ, Kɑlɛbun kurɔ goo, wiyɑ u Hɑrɑni, kɑ Mɔsɑ, kɑ Gɑsɛsi mɑrɑ. Hɑrɑni wi, u mɑɑ bii mɑrɑ mɑ u nùn yĩsiru kɑ̃ Gɑsɛsi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑdɑin bibu, berɑ Regɛmu kɑ Yotɑmu, kɑ Gesɑni, kɑ Pelɛti, kɑ Efɑ, kɑ Sɑɑfu.
Mɑɑkɑ, Kɑlɛbun kurɔ goowɑ u Sebɛɛ kɑ Tirɑnɑ mɑrɑ.
Yen biru u mɑɑ Sɑɑfu, Mɑdimɑnɑn tundo mɑrɑ, kɑ Sefɑ, Mɑkibenɑ kɑ Gibeɑn tundo. Kɑlɛbu u bii tɔn kurɔ mɑrɑ. Wiyɑ bɑ mɔ̀ Akusɑ.
Win kurɔ Efɑrɑtɑn bii gbiikoowɑ Huri. Bibu itɑwɑ Huri u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Sobɑli wi u sɑ̃ɑ Kiriɑti Yɑrimun kɑbɑ wuko,
kɑ Sɑlumɑ, Bɛtelehɛmun kɑbɑ wuko, kɑ Hɑrɛfu, Bɛti Gedɛɛn kɑbɑ wuko.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sobɑli, Kiriɑti Yɑrimun kɑbɑ wukon bweseru, berɑ Hɑroegibu, kɑ Mɛnuhɔtugibun sukum,
kɑ bwese kɛri yi yi wɑ̃ɑ Kiriɑti Yɑrimuɔ. Yiyɑ Yetɛɛbɑ, kɑ Putibɑ, kɑ Sumɑtibɑ, kɑ Misirɑibɑ. Bwese kɛri yin min diyɑ Soreɑgibu kɑ Ɛsitɑoligibu bɑ yɑrɑ.
Sɑlumɑn min diyɑ Bɛtelehɛmugibu bɑ yɑrɑ kɑ Nɛtofɑgibu, kɑ Atɑrɔtu Bɛti Yoɑbugibu, kɑ Mɑnɑhɑtigibun sukum, kɑ Soreɑgibu,
kɑ be bɑ rɑ tirenu yore bɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yɑbɛsiɔ. Berɑ Tireɑtigibu kɑ Simɛɑtigibu kɑ Sukɑtigibu. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Kenibɑ be bɑ yɑrɑ Hɑmɑtin bweserun di wi u sɑ̃ɑ Rekɑbun bweserun sikɑdo.
Bii be Dɑfidi u mɑrɑ Heboroniɔ ben yĩsɑ wee. Amɔɔ, Akinɔɑmu Yisirɛɛligiin biiwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ gbiikoo. Mɑ Dɑniɛli, Abigɑli, Kɑɑmɛligiin bii u sɑ̃ɑ yiruse.
Mɑ Abusɑlɔmu, Mɑɑkɑn bii u sɑ̃ɑ itɑse. Mɑɑkɑ wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Tɑlimɑi, Gesurin sinɑ bokon bii. Mɑ Adoniyɑ, Hɑgitin bii u sɑ̃ɑ nnɛse.
Mɑ Sefɑtiɑ, Abitɑlin bii u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔbuse. Mɑ Yitireɑmu, Egilɑn bii u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔbɑ tiɑse. Egilɑ wi, u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Dɑfidin kurɔbun turo.
Be nɔɔbɑ tiɑ yerɑ bɑ nùn mɑruɑ Heboroniɔ. Dɑfidi u bɑndu diwɑ Heboroni mi wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru kɑ suru nɔɔbɑ tiɑ. Yen biruwɑ u mɑɑ bɑndu di Yerusɑlɛmuɔ wɔ̃ɔ tɛnɑ kɑ itɑ.
Bii be u mɑɑ mɑrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, berɑ Simɛɑ, kɑ Sobɑbu, kɑ Nɑtɑni kɑ Sɑlomɔɔ. Bibu nnɛ ye, yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Bɑti Sebɑ, Amiɛlin biin bibu.
Dɑfidi u mɑɑ bibu gɑbu mɑrɑ. Berɑ Yibɑɑ, kɑ Elisuɑ, kɑ Elifelɛti,
kɑ Nɔgɑ, kɑ Nɛfɛgi, kɑ Yɑfiɑ, kɑ Elisɑmɑ,
kɑ Eliɑdɑ, kɑ Elifelɛti. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mi be nɔɔbɑ nnɛ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Dɑfidin bibu berɑ mi, win kurɔbu gɑbun bibu bɑɑsi. Ben sesuwɑ Tɑmɑɑ.
Sɑlomɔɔwɑ u Roboɑmu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Roboɑmu u Abiyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Abiɑ u Asɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Asɑ u Yosɑfɑti mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Yosɑfɑti u Yorɑmu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yorɑmu u Akɑsiɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Akɑsiɑ u Yoɑsi mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Yoɑsi u Amɑsiɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amɑsiɑ u Asɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Asɑriɑ u Yotɑmu mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Yotɑmu u Akɑsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Akɑsi u Esekiɑsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Esekiɑsi u Mɑnɑse mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Mɑnɑse u Amɔɔ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amɔɔ u Yosiɑsi mɑrɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yosiɑsin bibu, be wee. Yohɑnɑniwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ gbiikoo. Mɑ Yoyɑkimu u sɑ̃ɑ yiruse. Mɑ Sedesiɑsi u sɑ̃ɑ itɑse. Mɑ Sɑlumu u sɑ̃ɑ nnɛse.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yoyɑkimun bibu, berɑ Yekoniɑ kɑ Sedesiɑsi.
Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yekoniɑn bibu, berɑ Asiri wi u Seɑlitiɛli mɑrɑ,
kɑ Mɑɑkirɑmu, kɑ Pedɑyɑ, kɑ Senɑsɑɑ, kɑ Yekɑmiɑ, kɑ Hosɑmɑ, kɑ Nɛdɑbiɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Pedɑyɑn bibu, berɑ Sorobɑbɛli kɑ Simɛi. Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sorobɑbɛlin bibu, berɑ Mɛsulɑmu kɑ Hɑnɑniɑ. Selomitiwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben sesu.
Pedɑyɑ wi, u mɑɑ bibu nɔɔbu gɑbu mɑrɑ. Berɑ Hɑsubɑ, kɑ Ohɛli, kɑ Berekiɑ, kɑ Hɑsɑdiɑ, kɑ Yusɑbu Hesɛdi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Hɑnɑniɑn bibun bweseru, berɑ Pelɑtiɑ, kɑ Esɑi, kɑ Refɑyɑn bibu, kɑ Anɑnin bibu, kɑ Abudiɑsin bibu, kɑ Sekɑniɑn bibu.
Bibu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ Sekɑniɑ u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Semɑyɑ, kɑ Hɑtusi, kɑ Yigeɑli, kɑ Bɑriɑki, kɑ Nɛɑriɑ, kɑ Sɑfɑti.
Bibu itɑwɑ Nɛɑriɑ u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Elionɑi, kɑ Esekiɑsi, kɑ Asirikɑmu.
Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Elionɑin bibu, berɑ Hodɑfiɑ, kɑ Eliɑsibu, kɑ Pelɑyɑ, kɑ Akubu, kɑ Yokɑnɑni, kɑ Delɑyɑ, kɑ Anɑni. Bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mi be nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yudɑn bibu, berɑ Perɛsi, kɑ Hɛsironi, kɑ Kɑɑmi, kɑ Huri, kɑ Sobɑli.
Reɑyɑ, Sobɑlin biiwɑ u Yɑsɑti mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yɑsɑti u Akumɑi kɑ Lɑhɑdi mɑrɑ. Berɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Soreɑn bweserun tɔ̃kɑ.
Huri, Efɑrɑtɑn bii gbiikoo, Bɛtelehɛmun kɑbɑ wuko, u bibu mɑrɑ. Berɑ Etɑmu, kɑ Yisirɛɛli, kɑ Yisimɑ, kɑ Yidibɑsi, kɑ ben sesu Hɛsɛlɛponi, kɑ Penuɛli, Gedorin kɑbɑ wuko, kɑ Esɛɛ, Husɑn kɑbɑ wuko.
<range>
Kurɔbu yiruwɑ Asuri, Tekoɑn kɑbɑ wuko u mɔ. Berɑ Heleɑ kɑ Nɑɑrɑ.
Be Nɑɑrɑ u nùn mɑruɑ, berɑ Akusɑmu, kɑ Hefɛɛ, kɑ Temɛni, kɑ Akɑsitɑri.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Heleɑn bibu, berɑ Serɛti, kɑ Sokɑɑ, kɑ Ɛtinɑni.
Kɔsiwɑ u Anubu kɑ Sobebɑ mɑrɑ. Hosi win min diyɑ Akɑɑkɛli, Hɑrumun biin bwese tɔ̃kɑ yɑ yɑrɑ.
Yɑbɛsi u bɛɛrɛ mɔ n kere win wɔnɔbu. Win mɛro u nùn yĩsi te kɑ̃wɑ yèn sɔ̃ u wɑhɑlɑ kuɑ win mɑrubu sɔɔ.
Yɑbɛsi wi, u kɑnɑru kuɑ u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, ɑ de wunɛn domɑru tɑ n mɑn wɑ̃ɑsi. A nɛn tem kpɑ̃ɑru sosio. A wunɛn nɔmu dɛmiɔ ɑ mɑn kɔ̃su. Kpɑ ɑ de nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kɑ wɑhɑlɑ yu kɑ mɑn tondɑ. Mɑ Gusunɔ u nùn kuɑ ye u bikiɑ.
Kelubu, Sukɑn mɔɔwɑ u Mɛkiri, Ɛsitonin tundo mɑrɑ.
Ɛsitoniwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Rɑfɑ kɑ Pɑseɑki kɑ Tekinɑn yɛnugibun sikɑdo. Tekinɑ wiyɑ u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Nɑkɑsi swĩi. Ben bibun bweserɑ tɑ sinɑ Rekɑɔ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Kenɑsin bibu, berɑ Otiniɛli kɑ Serɑyɑ. Otiniɛlin biiwɑ mɑɑ Hɑtɑti.
Mɛnɔtɑiwɑ u Ofɑrɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Serɑyɑ u mɑɑ Yoɑbu mɑrɑ. Yoɑbu wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ sɔm kowobun sikɑdo be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑɔ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Nɔmɑn sɔm kowobun wɔwɑ.
Kɑlɛbu, Yɛfunɛn biiwɑ u Iru kɑ Elɑ kɑ Nɑɑmu mɑrɑ. Elɑwɑ u mɑɑ Kenɑsi mɑrɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yehɑlɛɛlin bibu, berɑ Sifu, kɑ Sifɑ, kɑ Tiriɑ, kɑ Asɑrɛli.
Ɛsidɑrɑsin bibɑ Yetɛɛ, kɑ Mɛrɛdi, kɑ Efɛɛ, kɑ Yɑloni. Mɛrɛdi u Bitiyɑ Egibiti sunɔn bii wɔndiɑ suɑ kurɔ, mɑ u nùn Mɑriɑmu kɑ Sɑmɑi kɑ Yisibɑ mɑruɑ. Yisibɑ wiyɑ u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Ɛsitemɔɑ swĩi. Mɑ Mɛrɛdi wi, u mɑɑ kurɔ Yudɑ goo suɑ. Wiyɑ u Yerɛdi mɑrɑ, kɑ Hebɛɛ, kɑ Yekutiɛli. Yerɛdiwɑ u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Gedori swĩi, mɑ Hebɛɛ u mɑɑ Soko swĩi, mɑ Yekutiɛli u mɑɑ Sɑnɔɑ swĩi.
<range>
Hodiyɑwɑ u Nɑkɑmun sesu suɑ kurɔ. Win bibun bweserɑ Gɑɑmibɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Keilɑɔ kɑ sere Mɑɑkɑgibu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Ɛsitemɔɑɔ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Simɔɔn bibu, berɑ Amɔɔ, kɑ Rinɑ, kɑ Bɛni Hɑnɑni, kɑ Tiloni. Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yisein bibun bweseru, berɑ Sokɛti kɑ win bii.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Selɑ, Yudɑn biin bweseru, berɑ Eri, wi u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Lekɑ swĩi, kɑ Lɑdɑ, wi u mɑɑ Mɑresɑ swĩi, kɑ sere mɑɑ bwese te tɑ rɑ bekɑ wesi kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii Bɛti Asibeɑɔ,
kɑ Yokimu kɑ tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Kosebɑɔ kɑ Yoɑsi kɑ Sɑrɑfu be bɑ Mɔɑbubɑ suɑ kurɔbu, bɑ sere nɑ bɑ sinɑ Lesɛmuɔ. Yeni yɑ koorɑwɑ yee yellun di.
Ben bibun bweserɑ tɑ rɑ wekenu mɔm. Bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑnɔ kɑ kpɑrɑ yenɔ bɑ n sinɑ boko sɔmburu kuɑmmɛ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Simɛɔn bibun bweseru, berɑ Nɛmuɛli, kɑ Yɑmini, kɑ Yɑribu, kɑ Serɑki, kɑ Sɔɔlu.
Ye Sɔɔlu u seewɑ, yerɑ u Sɑlumu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑlumu u mɑɑ seewɑ u Mibusɑmu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mibusɑmu u mɑɑ Misɑmɑ mɑrɑ.
Ye Misɑmɑ u seewɑ, yerɑ u Hɑmuɛli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Hɑmuɛli u mɑɑ seewɑ u Sɑkuri mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑkuri u mɑɑ Simɛi mɑrɑ.
Bii tɔn durɔbu wɔkurɑ nɔɔbu kɑ tiɑ Simɛi u mɑrɑ kɑ sere bii tɔn kurɔbu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ. Ben bweseru tɑ ǹ mɑrɑ n dɑbi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ tɑ ǹ kuure too nge Yudɑn bweseru.
Wuu sì sɔɔ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sere n kɑ girɑri Dɑfidin bɑndun wɑɑti sɔɔ, si kɑ sin bɑru kpɑɑnu, siyɑ Beri Sebɑ, kɑ Mɔlɑdɑ, kɑ Hɑsɑɑ Suɑli, kɑ Bilɑ, kɑ Ɛtisɛmu, kɑ Tolɑdi, kɑ Bɛtuɛli, kɑ Hɔɔmɑ, kɑ Sikilɑgi, kɑ Bɛti Mɑɑkɑbɔti, kɑ Hɑsɑɑ Susimu, kɑ Bɛti Bire, kɑ Sɑɑrɑimu,
<range>
<range>
<range>
kɑ mɑɑ wusu nɔɔbu yeni, Etɑmu, kɑ Aini, kɑ Rimɔɔ, kɑ Tokɛni, kɑ Asɑni,
kɑ sere mɑɑ wuu si su kɑ bu sikerenɛ kɑ sin bɑru kpɑɑnu n kɑ girɑri sere Bɑlɑtiɔ. Ye bɑ yoruɑ ben wɑ̃ɑ yenu kɑ ben bwese tɔ̃kɑn sɔ̃, yerɑ mi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Simɛɔn bwese kɛrɑn wirugibu, berɑ Mɛsobɑbu, kɑ Yɑmulɛki, kɑ Yosɑ, Amɑsiɑn bii,
kɑ Yoɛli kɑ Yehu, Yosibiɑn bii, Serɑyɑn debubu, Asiɛlin sikɑdobu,
kɑ Elionɑi, kɑ Yɑɑkobɑ, kɑ Yesosɑyɑ, kɑ Asɑyɑ, kɑ Adiɛli, kɑ Yesimiɛli, kɑ Bɛnɑyɑ,
kɑ Sisɑ, Sifein bii, Alonin debubu, Yedɑyɑ kɑ Simuri kɑ Semɑyɑn sikɑdobu.
Beniwɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu ben bwese kɛri sɔɔ. Mɑ ben bweserɑ mɑrurɑ bɑ dɑbiɑ.
Mɑ bɑ dɑ Gedorin berɑ giɑ n kɑ dɑ wɔwɑn sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ bu kɑ yɑkɑsu kɑsu ben yɑɑ sɑbenun sɔ̃.
Bɑ yɑkɑ geesu wɑ mi. Ben tem mɛ, mu kpɑ̃. Mɑ mu wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Domi be bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi yellu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Kɑmun bweseru.
Esekiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon wɑɑti sɔɔrɑ tɔn be, bɑ nɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ Mɑonibɑ kpeerɑsiɑ mɑm mɑm. Mɑ bɑ ben kunu wɔri bɑ kɔsukɑ. Mɑ bɑ sinɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ. Domi yɑkɑsu wɑ̃ɑ mi, ben yɑ̃ɑnun sɔ̃.
Simɛɔn bwese kɛrɑn tɔmbu gɑbu bɑ dɑ Seirin guurɔ. Ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu (500). Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben wirugibu, berɑ Pelɑtiɑ, kɑ Nɛɑriɑ, kɑ Refɑyɑ, kɑ Usiɛli, Yisein bii.
Mɑ bɑ Amɑlɛki be bɑ tie mi go. Mɑ bɑ sinɑ mi, sere kɑ gisɔn gisɔ.
Rubɛni u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelin bii gbiikoo. N deemɑ Rubɛni wi, u kɑ win tundon kurɔ kpunɑ. Mɑ bɑ win yerumɑru mwɑ bɑ win wɔnɔ Yosɛfun bibu wɛ̃. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ǹ win bwese kɛrɑn tɔmbun yĩsɑ tireru doke yerumɑrun swɑɑ sɔɔ.
Isirelin bii be sɔɔ, Yudɑwɑ u dɑm bo. Win bwese kɛrɑn diyɑ kpɑro u yɑrɑ. Adɑmɑ Yosɛfun bibɑ bɑ yerumɑru wɛ̃.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Rubɛni, Isirelin bii gbiikoon bibu, berɑ Enɔku, kɑ Pɑɑlu, kɑ Hɛsironi, kɑ Kɑɑmi.
Yoɛliwɑ u Semɑyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Semɑyɑ u seewɑ u Gɔgu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Gɔgu u mɑɑ seewɑ u Simɛi mɑrɑ.
Ye Simɛi u seewɑ, mɑ u Misee mɑrɑ, mɑ Misee u seewɑ u Reɑyɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Reɑyɑ u seewɑ u Bɑɑli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Bɑɑli u seewɑ u Beerɑ mɑrɑ. Wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Rubɛnibɑn wirugii. Wiyɑ Tigilɑti Pilesɛɛ, Asirin sinɑ boko u yoru mwɑ.
Beerɑn tɔmbun yĩsɑ wee nge mɛ bɑ kɑ bu tireru doke yɛnu kɑ yɛnu, bwese kɛrɑ kɑ bwese kɛrɑ, kɑ nge mɛ bɑ kɑ kerɑnɛ. Yeyɛliwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben gbiikoo. Mɑ Sɑkɑri u swĩi,
kɑ Belɑ, Asɑsin bii, Semɑn debubu, Yoɛlin sikɑdobu. Belɑn temɑ Aroɛɛn di, n kɑ dɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Nɛboɔ, sere kɑ Bɑɑli Mɛɔniɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, win tem mu wɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑɑ Efɑrɑtin dɑɑrun di sere n kɑ dɑ gbɑburun duu yerɔ. Domi ben yɑɑ sɑbenu nu dɑbiɑ Gɑlɑdin tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Sɔɔlu, sinɑ bokon wɑɑti sɔɔ, bɑ kɑ Hɑgɑrenibɑ tɑbu kuɑ bɑ kɑmiɑ. Mɑ bɑ sinɑ ben wɑ̃ɑ yenɔ Gɑlɑdin sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun berɑ giɑ kpuro.
Gɑdin bwese kɛrɑn tɔmbu bɑ sinɑ Rubɛnibɑn deedeeru sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, Bɑsɑnin temɔ sere n kɑ girɑri Sɑlikɑɔ sɔɔ yɑri yeru giɑ.
Yoɛlin bwese kɛrɑ yɑ kpɑ̃ɑru bo. Mɑ Sɑfɑmugiɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ yiruse. Mɑ Yɑnɑigiɑ kɑ Sɑfɑtigiɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑsɑniɔ.
Bwese kɛri nɔɔbɑ yiru gɛɛ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Yiyɑ Mikɑɛlin bwese kɛrɑ, kɑ Mɛsulɑmugiɑ, kɑ Sebɑgiɑ, kɑ Yorɑigiɑ, kɑ Yɑkɑnigiɑ, kɑ Siɑgiɑ, kɑ sere Ebɛɛgiɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Abihɑilin bibun bweseru, berɑ Huri, kɑ Yɑroɑsi, kɑ Gɑlɑdi, kɑ Mikɑɛli, kɑ Yɛsisɑi, kɑ Yɑdo, kɑ sere Busi.
Aki, Abudiɛlin bii, Gunin debubuwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben wirugii.
Gɑdin bwese kɛrin tɔn be, bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Gɑlɑdiɔ kɑ Bɑsɑniɔ kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenɔ sɑɑ Sɑronin di n kɑ dɑ yen nɔɔ burɑ yenɔ.
Bɑ ben bwese kɛri yi kpuro tireru dokewɑ nge mɛ yi kɑ swĩinɛ, Yotɑmu Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko kɑ Yeroboɑmu Isirelibɑn sinɑ bokon wɑɑti sɔɔ.
Rubɛnin bwese kɛrɑ kɑ Gɑdigiɑ kɑ sere Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn bɔnu bɑ tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu mɔ be bɑ koo kpĩ bu tɛrɛru kɑ tɑkobi nɛnɛ kpɑ bu tɛndu to. Bɑ mɑɑ tɑbu tobu yɛ̃ gem gem. Ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ weeru kɑ nnɛ kɑ tɔmbu nɑtɑ kɑ wunɔbu kɑ wɑtɑ (44.760). Bɑ mɑɑ sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ tɑbu to.
Mɑ bɑ Hɑgɑrenibɑ kɑ Yeturigibu, kɑ Nɑfisigibu, kɑ Nɔdɑbugibu tɑbu wɔri.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ tɑɑ bi mɔ̀, bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ somiru kɑnɑ domi bɑ ben nɑɑnɛ doke wi sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ Hɑgɑrenigii be, kɑ be bɑ bu somiru nɑ kɑmiɑ.
Mɑ bɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu mwɛɛrɑ. Niyɑ yooyoosu nɔrɔbun subɑ weerɑɑkuru (50.000) kɑ yɑ̃ɑ ninu nɔrɔbun subɑ goobu kɑ weerɑɑkuru (250.000) kɑ kɛtɛkunu nɔrɔbun subɑ yiru (2.000) kɑ sere tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ wunɔbu (100.000).
Tɔn be bɑ go tɑɑ bi sɔɔ, bɑ dɑbi. Domi Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u derɑ n koorɑ mɛ. Mɑ bɑ sinɑ tem mi sere n kɑ turɑ sɑɑ ye bɑ bu yoru mwɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ.
Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn sukum mu nɑ mu sinɑwɑ tem mɛ mu wɑ̃ɑ Bɑsɑniɔ, n kɑ dɑ Bɑɑli Hɛɛmɔɔwɔ kɑ Seniriɔ, sere kɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Hɛɛmɔɔ. Tɔn be, bɑ dɑbi.
Ben wirugibun yĩsɑ wee. Efɛɛ, kɑ Yisei, kɑ Eliɛli, kɑ Asiriɛli, kɑ Yeremi, kɑ Hodɑfiɑ, kɑ Yɑdiɛli. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn durɔ wɔrugɔbɑ, mɑ bɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɑ Gusunɔ ben bɑɑbɑbɑn Yinni torɑri. Bɑ bwese tukunun bũnu sɑ̃wɑ ni u rɑɑ kɑm koosiɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u derɑ Asirin sinɑm beni, Pulu kɑ Tigilɑti Pilesɛɛ bɑ Rubɛnibɑ, kɑ Gɑdibɑ, kɑ Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn sukum yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Sɑlɑsiɔ, kɑ Sɑboriɔ, kɑ Hɑrɑɔ, kɑ sere Gosɑnin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔ. Miyɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ gisɔ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lefin bibu, berɑ Gɛɛsɔni, kɑ Kehɑti, kɑ Mɛrɑri. Lefiwɑ u Gɛɛsɔni kɑ Kehɑti kɑ Mɛrɑri mɑrɑ.
Ye Kehɑti u seewɑ, mɑ u Amurɑmu kɑ Yisehɑri kɑ Heboroni kɑ Usiɛli mɑrɑ. Ye Gɛɛsɔni u seewɑ, mɑ u Libini kɑ Simɛi mɑrɑ.
Ye Amurɑmu u seewɑ, mɑ u Aroni kɑ Mɔwisi kɑ Mɑriɑmu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Aroni u mɑɑ seewɑ u Nɑdɑbu kɑ Abihu kɑ Eleɑsɑɑ kɑ Itɑmɑɑ mɑrɑ. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Kehɑtin bibu, berɑ Amurɑmu, kɑ Yisehɑri, kɑ Heboroni, kɑ Usiɛli.
Ye Eleɑsɑɑ u seewɑ, mɑ u Finɛɛsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Finɛɛsi u seewɑ u Abisuɑ mɑrɑ. Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Mɛrɑrin bibu, berɑ Mɑkili kɑ Musi. Beni kpurowɑ bɑ kuɑ wirugibu Lefin bwese kɛri sɔɔ.
Ye Abisuɑ u seewɑ mɑ u Buki mɑrɑ. Mɑ Buki u seewɑ u Usi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Gɛɛsɔni u seewɑ u Libini mɑrɑ. Mɑ Libini u seewɑ u Yɑsɑti mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yɑsɑti u seewɑ u Simmɑ mɑrɑ.
Ye Usi u seewɑ, mɑ u Serɑyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Serɑyɑ u seewɑ u Mɛrɑyɔtu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Simmɑ u seewɑ u Yoɑsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yoɑsi u seewɑ u Ido mɑrɑ. Mɑ Ido u seewɑ u Serɑki mɑrɑ. Mɑ Serɑki u seewɑ u Yɑtɑrɑi mɑrɑ.
Ye Mɛrɑyɔtu u seewɑ, mɑ u Amɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amɑriɑ u seewɑ u Akitubu mɑrɑ. Kehɑtibɑ sɔɔ, Kehɑti u seewɑ u Aminɑdɑbu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Aminɑdɑbu u seewɑ u Kore mɑrɑ. Mɑ Kore u seewɑ u Asiri mɑrɑ.
Ye Akitubu u seewɑ, mɑ u Sɑdɔku mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑdɔku u seewɑ u Akimɑsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Asiri u seewɑ u Ɛlikɑnɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ u seewɑ u Abiɑsɑfu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Abiɑsɑfu u seewɑ u Asiri mɑrɑ.
Ye Akimɑsi u seewɑ, mɑ u Asɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Asɑriɑ u seewɑ u Yokɑnɑni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Asiri u seewɑ u Tɑhɑti mɑrɑ. Mɑ Tɑhɑti u seewɑ u Uriɛli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Uriɛli u seewɑ u Osiɑsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Osiɑsi u seewɑ u Sɔɔlu mɑrɑ.
Ye Yokɑnɑni u seewɑ, mɑ u Asɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Asɑriɑ wiyɑ u rɑ yɑ̃kunu ko Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ te Sɑlomɔɔ u bɑnɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Ɛlikɑnɑn bibu gɑbu, berɑ Amɑsɑi kɑ Akimɔti.
Ye Asɑriɑ wi, u seewɑ, mɑ u Amɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amɑriɑ u seewɑ u Akitubu mɑrɑ. Ahimɔtin bweseru sɔɔ, Akimɔti u seewɑ u Ɛlikɑnɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ u seewɑ u Sofɑi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sofɑi u seewɑ u Nɑhɑti mɑrɑ.
Ye Akitubu u seewɑ mɑ u Sɑdɔku mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑdɔku u seewɑ u Sɑlumu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Nɑhɑti u seewɑ u Eliɑbu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Eliɑbu u seewɑ u Yeroɑmu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yeroɑmu u seewɑ u Ɛlikɑnɑ goo mɑrɑ.
Ye Sɑlumu u seewɑ, mɑ u Hilikiyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Hilikiyɑ u seewɑ u Asɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Sɑmuɛlin bibɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yoɛli kɑ Abiyɑ.
Ye Asɑriɑ u seewɑ mɑ u Serɑyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Serɑyɑ u seewɑ u Yosɑdɑki mɑrɑ. Mɛrɑrin bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ, Mɛrɑri u seewɑ u Mɑkili mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɑkili u seewɑ u Libini mɑrɑ. Mɑ Libini u seewɑ u Simɛi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Simɛi u seewɑ u Usɑ mɑrɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu yoru mwɛɛrɑ u kɑ doonɑ, kɑ Yosɑdɑki wi sɑnnɑ mi. Mɑ Usɑ u seewɑ u Simɛɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Simɛɑ u seewɑ u Hɑgiyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Hɑgiyɑ u seewɑ u Asɑyɑ mɑrɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑn kpɑkororu yii yeru wɑɑwɑ, sɑnɑm mɛyɑ Dɑfidi u Lefi ben gɑbu kuɑ wom kowobun wirugibu Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Berɑ bɑ rɑ wom kowobu kpɑre Yinni Gusunɔn kuu bekurugirun wuswɑɑɔ sere Sɑlomɔɔ u rɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru bɑnɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Bɑ ben sɔmburu kuɑwɑ dee dee nge mɛ bɑ bu ten woodɑ wɛ̃.
Be bɑ kuɑ wom kowobun wirugibu kɑ ben bibun bweseru wee. Kehɑtin bweseru sɔɔ, Hemɑniwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ wom kowobun wirugii. Win sikɑdobɑrɑ Yoɛli kɑ Sɑmuɛli,
kɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ, kɑ Yeroɑmu, kɑ Eliɛli, kɑ Toɑ,
kɑ Sufu, kɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ, kɑ Mɑhɑti, kɑ Amɑsɑi,
kɑ mɑɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ goo, kɑ Yoɛli goo kɑ Asɑriɑ, kɑ Sofoni,
kɑ Tɑhɑti, kɑ Asiri, kɑ Abiɑsɑfu, kɑ Kore,
kɑ Yisehɑri, kɑ Kehɑti, kɑ Lefi, kɑ Isireli.
Asɑfu u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wom kowobun wirugii turo. Wiyɑ u rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ Hemɑnin nɔm geuɔ u n nùn somimɔ. Win sikɑdobɑrɑ Berekiɑ, kɑ Simɛɑ,
kɑ Mikɑɛli, kɑ Bɑɑseyɑ, kɑ Mɑɑkiyɑ,
kɑ Etini, kɑ Serɑki, kɑ Adɑyɑ,
kɑ Etɑni, kɑ Simmɑ, kɑ Simɛi,
kɑ Yɑsɑti, kɑ Gɛɛsɔni, kɑ Lefi.
Mɛrɑrin bweseru sɔɔ, be bɑ rɑ womusu ko, bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ Hemɑnin nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Ben wirugiiwɑ Etɑni. Etɑni win sikɑdobɑrɑ Kisi, kɑ Abudi, kɑ Mɑluku,
kɑ Hɑsɑbiɑ, kɑ Amɑsiɑ, kɑ Hilikiyɑ,
kɑ Amusi, kɑ Sɑni, kɑ Semɛɛ,
kɑ Mɑkili, kɑ Musi, kɑ Mɛrɑri, kɑ Lefi.
Ben mɛro bisi be bɑ tie, berɑ bɑ rɑ sɔmɑ ko ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kpuro.
Aroni kɑ win bibun bweserɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko yɑ̃ku yeru wɔllɔ kpɑ bu mɑɑ turɑre dɔ̃ɔ doke mi. Berɑ bɑ rɑ sɔmɑ kpuro ko dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem sɔɔ kpɑ bu torɑrun yɑ̃kunu ko Isirelibɑn sɔ̃ nge mɛ Mɔwisi, Gusunɔn sɔm kowo u bu yiire.
Aronin bweserun tɔ̃kɑ wee. Aroni u seewɑ u Eleɑsɑɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Eleɑsɑɑ u seewɑ u Finɛɛsi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Finɛɛsi u seewɑ u Abisuɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Abisuɑ u seewɑ u Buki mɑrɑ. Mɑ Buki u seewɑ u Usi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Usi u seewɑ u Serɑyɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Serɑyɑ u seewɑ u Mɛrɑyɔtu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɛrɑyɔtu u seewɑ u Amɑriɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amɑriɑ u seewɑ u Akitubu mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Akitubu u seewɑ u Sɑdɔku mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑdɔku u seewɑ u Akimɑsi mɑrɑ.
Ye bɑ tɛtɛ tobɑ, be bɑ gbiɑ bɑ tem wɛ̃ berɑ Kehɑtin bwese kɛrɑgibu, Aronin bweseru sɔɔ. Ben wɑ̃ɑ yenu kɑ ben kpɑrɑ yenu kɑ ben tem nɔɔ burɑ yenu wee.
Niyɑ Heboroni ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yudɑn temɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu ni nu kɑ ye sikerenɛ.
Adɑmɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, Kɑlɛbu, Yɛfunɛn biiwɑ bɑ mi wɛ̃.
Wuu si bɑ Aronin bibun bweseru wɛ̃, siyɑ Heboroni mi bɑ ko n dɑ kpikiru de, kɑ Libinɑ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Yɑtiri, kɑ Ɛsitemɔɑ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Hilɛni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Debiri kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Asɑni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Bɛti Semɛsi kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn tem wuu sini, Gibeɑ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Alemɛti kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Anɑtɔtu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu. Wuu si kpuro su kuɑwɑ mi wɔkurɑ itɑ nge mɛ bwese kɛri yi, yi geeru nɛ.
Ye bɑ mɑɑ tɛtɛ tobɑ, Kehɑtin bibun bwese te tɑ tie, tɑ wusu wɔkuru wɑ Efɑrɑimun bwese kɛrɑn tem sɔɔ kɑ Dɑnun bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ, kɑ Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn sukumgim sɔɔ.
Gɛɛsɔnin bibun bweseru tɑ wusu wɑwɑ wɔkurɑ itɑ nge mɛ ben bwese kɛrin geerɑ nɛ. Wuu si, su wɑ̃ɑwɑ Isɑkɑrin bwese kɛrɑn tem sɔɔ kɑ Asɛɛn bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ, kɑ Nɛfitɑlin bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ kɑ Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ Bɑsɑniɔ.
Ye bɑ mɑɑ wure bɑ tɛtɛ tobɑ, wusu wɔkurɑ yiruwɑ Mɛrɑrin bibun bweserɑ wɑ Rubɛnin bwese kɛrɑn tem sɔɔ, kɑ Gɑdigiɑn tem sɔɔ, kɑ Sɑbulonigiɑn tem sɔɔ nge mɛ ben bwese kɛrin geerɑ nɛ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑɑ Lefibɑ wusu gɑsu wɛ̃ kɑ sin kpɑrɑ yenu.
Bɑ wuu si gɔsɑwɑ kɑ tɛtɛ Yudɑn bwese kɛrɑn temɔ, kɑ Simɛɔn bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ, kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn bwese kɛrɑgim sɔɔ.
Kehɑtin bibun bwese te tɑ mɑɑ tie, tɑ wusu wɑwɑ Efɑrɑimun bwese kɛrɑn tem sɔɔ.
Wuu si bɑ bu wɛ̃, siyɑ Sikɛmu ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Efɑrɑimun guurɔ, kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu. Miyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ kpikiru de. Kɑ Gesɛɛ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Yokumɛɑmu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Bɛti Horoni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Ayɑloni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere mɑɑ Gɑti Rimɔɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn sukum mu mɑɑ wɑ, siyɑ Anɛɛ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Bileɑmu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu. Siyɑ bɑ Kehɑtin bwese kɛrɑgii be bɑ tie wɛ̃.
Bɑ mɑɑ Gɛɛsɔnin bwese kɛrɑn tɔmbu wusu wɛ̃. Wuu si bɑ wɑ Mɑnɑsen bwese kɛrɑn sukum min di, siyɑ Golɑni ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑsɑniɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Asitɑrɔtu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si bɑ wɑ Isɑkɑrin bwese kɛrɑn min di, siyɑ Kedɛsi kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Dɑbɑrɑti kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Rɑmɔti kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere Anɛmu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si bɑ wɑ Asɛɛn bwese kɛrɑn min di, siyɑ Mɑsikɑli kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Abudoni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Hukɔku kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere Rehɔbu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si bɑ wɑ Nɛfitɑlin bwese kɛrɑn min di, siyɑ Kedɛsi ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Gɑlilen temɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Hɑmɔɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere Kiriɑtɑimu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Bɑ Lefi be bɑ tie Mɛrɑrin bweseru sɔɔ wusu wɛ̃. Wuu si bɑ wɑ Sɑbulonin bwese kɛrɑn min di, siyɑ Rimɔnɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Tɑbori kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si bɑ wɑ Rubɛnin bwese kɛrɑn min di Yuudɛnin guru giɔ, Yerikon deedeeru sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, siyɑ Beseri ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem sɑɑrɑɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Yɑsɑ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Kedemɔti kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere Mɛfɑti kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.
Wuu si bɑ mɑɑ wɑ Gɑdin bwese kɛrɑn min di, siyɑ Rɑmɔti, Gɑlɑdin temɔ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ Mɑhɑnɑimu kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu,
kɑ Hɛsiboni kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu, kɑ sere Yɑsɛɛ kɑ yen kpɑrɑ yenu.















Bibu nnɛwɑ Isɑkɑri u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Tolɑ, kɑ Puɑ, kɑ Yɑsubu, kɑ Simuroni.
Tolɑn bibɑ Usi, kɑ Refɑyɑ, kɑ Yeriɛli kɑ Yɑmɑi, kɑ Yibisɑmu, kɑ sere Sɑmuɛli. Berɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu ben yɛnusɔ, Tolɑn bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔrugɔbɑ ben wɑɑti ye sɔɔ. Dɑfidin wɑɑti sɔɔ, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ yiru kɑ tɔmbu nɑtɑ (22.600).
Usin biiwɑ Yisirɑyɑ. Yisirɑyɑ kɑ win bibu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ be wirugibu nɔɔbu. Win bii berɑ Mikɑɛli, kɑ Abudiɑsi, kɑ Yoɛli, kɑ Yisiyɑ.
Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ be sɑnnu, tɔn kurɔbu kɑ bibu bɑ dɑbi sere bɑ koo kpĩ bu tɔn durɔbu nɔrɔbun subɑ tɛnɑ kɑ nɔɔbɑ tiɑ (36.000) wɑ be sɔɔ be bɑ koo kpĩ bu tɑbu ko.
Isɑkɑrin bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ, be bɑ tireru doke, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ wɛnɛ kɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru (87.000). Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔrugɔbɑ.
Bibu itɑwɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Belɑ, kɑ Bekɛɛ, kɑ Yediɛli.
Bibu nɔɔbuwɑ Belɑ u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Ɛsiboni, kɑ Usi, kɑ Usiɛli, kɑ Yerimɔti, kɑ mɑɑ Iri. Ben bɑɑwure u sɑ̃ɑwɑ win bwese kɛrɑn wirugii. Be kpuro mɑɑ wɔrugɔbɑrɑ. Bɑ bu tireru doke mɑ ben geerɑ kuɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ yiru kɑ tɔmbu tɛnɑ kɑ nnɛ (22.034).
Bekɛɛn bibɑ Semirɑ, kɑ Yoɑsi, kɑ Ɛliesɛɛ, kɑ Elionɑi, kɑ Omiri, kɑ Yeremɔti, kɑ Abiyɑ, kɑ Anɑtɔtu, kɑ Alɑmɛti. Beni kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Bekɛɛn bibu.
Mɑ bɑ bu tireru doke nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ bwese kɛrɑ ye sɔɔ. Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɛnu yɛ̃ro wɔrugɔbɑ. Mɑ ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔnu nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndu kɑ goobu (20.200).
Yediɛlin biiwɑ Bilihɑni. Bilihɑnin bibɑ mɑɑ Yeusi, kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ, kɑ Ehudu, kɑ Kenɑɑnɑ, kɑ Setɑni, kɑ Tɑɑsisi, kɑ sere Akisɑsɑɑ.
Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yediɛlin bibun bweseru. Be kpuro mɑɑ wɔrugɔbɑrɑ. Mɑ ben bɑɑwure u sɑ̃ɑ wirugii win bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ. Ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ wɔkurɑ nɔɔbu kɑ yiru, kɑ tɔmbu goobu (17.200) be bɑ koo kpĩ bu tɑbu ko.
Supimu kɑ Hupimu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Irin bibu. Mɑ Husimu u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Akɛɛn bii.
Nɛfitɑlin bibɑ Yɑsiɛli, kɑ Guni, kɑ Yesɛɛ, kɑ sere Sɑlumu. Beni kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Bilihɑn nikurɔminu.
Bii be Mɑnɑse u kɑ win kurɔ Sirigii mɑrɑ, berɑ Asiriɛli kɑ Mɑkiri wi u sɑ̃ɑ Gɑlɑdin tundo.
Mɑkiri wiyɑ u Hupimu kɑ Supimu kurɔbu suɑ. Win sesun yĩsirɑ Mɑɑkɑ. Win bii yirusen yĩsirɑ Selofɑdi. Bii tɔn kurɔbɑ Selofɑdi wi, u mɑrɑ.
Mɑɑkɑ, Mɑkirin kurɔ u bii tɔn durɔ mɑrɑ mɑ bɑ nùn yĩsiru kɑ̃ Perɛsi. U mɑɑ wure u bii tɔn durɔ mɑrɑ mɑ bɑ nùn yĩsiru kɑ̃ Serɛsi. Serɛsi wiyɑ u Ulɑmu kɑ Rekɛmu mɑrɑ.
Ulɑmun biiwɑ Bedɑni. Beniwɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gɑlɑdi, Mɑkirin bii, Mɑnɑsen debubun bibun bweseru.
Hɑmɔlekɛti, Gɑlɑdin sesuwɑ u Isodu kɑ Abiesɛɛ kɑ Mɑlɑ mɑrɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Semidɑn bibu, berɑ Akiyɑni kɑ Sikɛmu kɑ Likisi kɑ sere Aniɑmu.
Efɑrɑimun bibun bweseru wee. Efɑrɑimu u Sutelɑki mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sutelɑki u Berɛdi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Berɛdi u Tɑhɑti mɑrɑ. Mɑ Tɑhɑti u Eleɑdɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Eleɑdɑ u Tɑhɑti mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Tɑhɑti u Sɑbɑdi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɑbɑdi u Sutelɑki mɑrɑ. Efɑrɑimu u mɑɑ bibu yiru mɑrɑ, Sutelɑki bɑɑsi, beyɑ Esɛɛ kɑ Eleɑdi. Berɑ bɑ Gɑtigibu wɔri bu kɑ sibun yɑɑ sɑbenu mwɑ. Adɑmɑ Gɑtigii be, sibɑ bu go.
Mɑ Efɑrɑimu u gɔɔ wooru sinɑ n kɑ tɛ. Mɑ win mɛro bisibu bɑ nɑ bɑ nùn nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ.
Yen biruwɑ u kɑ win kurɔ mɛnnɑ, mɑ u gurɑ suɑ u bii tɔn durɔ mɑrɑ. Mɑ bɑ nùn yĩsiru kɑ̃ Beriɑ yèn sɔ̃ u nuku sɑnkirɑnu wɑ win yɛnuɔ.
U mɑɑ bii tɔn kurɔ mɑrɑ wi bɑ mɔ̀ Serɑki. Wiyɑ u Bɛti Horoni bɑnɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑɔ, kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ gunguru wɔllɔ, kɑ mɑɑ Usɛni Seerɑ.
Mɑ Beriɑ wi, u seewɑ u Refɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Refɑ u seewɑ u Resɛfu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Resɛfu u seewɑ u Telɑki mɑrɑ. Mɑ Telɑki u seewɑ u Tɑkɑni mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Tɑkɑni u seewɑ u Lɑdɑni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Lɑdɑni u seewɑ u Amihudu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Amihudu u seewɑ u Elisɑmɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Elisɑmɑ u seewɑ u Nuni mɑrɑ. Mɑ Nuni u seewɑ u Yosue mɑrɑ.
Tem mɛ bɑ wɑ bɑ sinɑ mɛyɑ Betɛli kɑ yen wuu si su kɑ ye sikerenɛ. Siyɑ Nɑɑrɑni ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ kɑ Gesɛɛ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, kɑ Sikɛmu kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, n kɑ girɑri Gɑsɑɔ kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnɔ.
Tem mɛ Mɑnɑsen bibun bweserɑ wɑ, mɛyɑ Bɛti Seɑni kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, kɑ Tɑɑnɑki kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, kɑ Mɛgido kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu, kɑ sere Dori kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu. Wuu si sɔɔrɑ Yosɛfu, Isirelin biin bibun bweserɑ sinɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asɛɛn bibu, berɑ Yiminɑ kɑ Yisifɑ kɑ Yisifi kɑ Beriɑ kɑ sere ben sesu Serɑki.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Beriɑn bibu, berɑ Hebɛɛ kɑ Mɑɑkiɛli. Mɑɑkiɛli wiyɑ u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Biisɑfiti swĩi.
Hebɛɛwɑ u Yɑfilɛti mɑrɑ kɑ Somɛɛ kɑ Hotɑmu kɑ sere ben sesu Suɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑfilɛtin bibu, berɑ Pɑsɑki kɑ Bimɑli kɑ sere Asifɑti. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑfilɛtin bibu, berɑ mi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sɑmɛɛn bibu, berɑ Aki kɑ Rogɑ kɑ Hubɑ kɑ sere Arɑmu.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ win wɔnɔ Helɛmun bibu, berɑ Sofɑki kɑ Yiminɑ kɑ Selɛsi kɑ sere Amɑli.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sofɑkin bibu, berɑ Suɑ kɑ Hɑɑnɛfɛɛ kɑ Suɑli kɑ Beri kɑ Yimurɑ,
kɑ Beseri kɑ Hɔdu kɑ Sɑmmɑ kɑ Silisɑ kɑ Yitirɑni kɑ sere Beerɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yetɛɛn bibu, berɑ Yɛfunɛ kɑ Pisipɑ kɑ sere Arɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Ulɑn bibu, berɑ Arɑ kɑ Hɑniɛli kɑ sere Risiɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asɛɛn bibun bweseru, berɑ mi. Ben bɑɑwure u sɑ̃ɑwɑ wirugii win berɑɔ. Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔrugɔbɑ. Be bɑ tireru doke, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu kɑ tiɑ (26.000) be, be bɑ koo kpĩ bu tɑbu ko.
Bibu nɔɔbuwɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ u mɑrɑ. Wee nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ, Belɑ kɑ Asibɛli
kɑ Arɑ kɑ Nɔkɑ kɑ sere Rɑfɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Belɑn bibu, berɑ Adɑri kɑ Gerɑ kɑ Abihudu
kɑ Abisuɑ kɑ Nɑɑmɑ kɑ Akoɑsi
kɑ Gerɑ kɑ Sefufɑni kɑ sere Hurɑmu.
Ehudun bii be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu Gebɑgibun suunu sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ kɑ bu dɑ Mɑnɑhɑtiɔ,
berɑ Nɑmɑni kɑ Akiyɑ kɑ sere Gerɑ. Gerɑ wi u kɑ bu dɑ mi, wiyɑ u Usɑ kɑ Ahihudu mɑrɑ.
Sɑɑrɑimu u win kurɔbu yiru beni girɑ. Berɑ Husimu kɑ Bɑɑrɑ. Yen biruwɑ u bibu gɑbu mɑrɑ Mɔɑbubɑn temɔ.
Bii be u kɑ win kurɔ Hodɛsi mɑrɑ, berɑ Yobɑbu kɑ Sibiyɑ kɑ Mɛsɑ kɑ Mɑlikɑmu,
kɑ Yeusi kɑ Sokiɑ kɑ sere Mirimɑ. Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɛnu yɛ̃robu.
Be u kɑ win kurɔ Husimu mɑrɑ, berɑ Abitubu kɑ Ɛlipɑli.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Ɛlipɑlin bibu, berɑ Ebɛɛ kɑ Miseɑmu kɑ sere Semɛɛ wi u wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Onɔɔ bɑnɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ Lodu kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu.
Beriɑ kɑ Semɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu Ayɑlonigibun suunu sɔɔ, berɑ bɑ Gɑtigibu girɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Beriɑn bibu, berɑ Akiyo kɑ Sɑsɑki kɑ Yeremɔti kɑ Sebɑdiɑ kɑ Arɑdi kɑ Edɛɛ kɑ Mikɑɛli kɑ Yisifɑ kɑ sere Yoɑsi.
<range>
<range>
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Ɛlipɑlin bibu, berɑ Sebɑdiɑ kɑ Mɛsulɑmu kɑ Hisiki kɑ Hebɛɛ kɑ Yisimɛrɑi kɑ Yisiliɑ kɑ sere Yobɑbu.
<range>
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Simɛin bibu, berɑ Yɑkimu kɑ Sikiri kɑ Sɑbidi kɑ Ɛlienɑi, kɑ Silitɑi kɑ Eliɛli kɑ Adɑyɑ kɑ Berɑyɑ kɑ Simurɑti.
<range>
<range>
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Sɑsɑkin bibu, berɑ Yisipɑni kɑ Ebɛɛ kɑ Eliɛli kɑ Abudoni kɑ Sikiri kɑ Hɑnɑnu kɑ Hɑnɑniɑ kɑ Elɑmu kɑ Antotiɑ kɑ Yifideyɑ kɑ sere Penuɛli.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yerohɑmun bibu, berɑ Sɑnserɑi kɑ Sehɑriɑ kɑ Atɑliɑ kɑ Yɑɑresiɑ kɑ Eliyɑ kɑ sere Sikiri.
<range>
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ, berɑ mi. Bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Wi u Gɑbɑoni swĩi, u wɑ̃ɑ Gɑbɑoni mi. Win kurɔn yĩsirɑ Mɑɑkɑ.
Win bii gbiikoowɑ Abudoni. Be bɑ mɑɑ tie, berɑ Suri kɑ Kisi kɑ Bɑɑli kɑ Nɑdɑbu,
kɑ Gedori kɑ Akiyo kɑ Sekɛɛ,
kɑ sere Mikoloti, Simɛɑn tundo. Ben tii bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, ben mɛro bisibun bɔkuɔ.
Nɛriwɑ u Kisi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Kisi u Sɔɔlu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɔɔlu u Yonɑtɑm mɑrɑ kɑ Mɑɑkisuɑ kɑ Abinɑdɑbu kɑ sere Ɛsibɑɑli.
Yonɑtɑmwɑ u Mɛribu Bɑɑli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɛribu Bɑɑli u mɑɑ Misee mɑrɑ.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Miseen bibu, berɑ Pitoni kɑ Mɛlɛki kɑ Tɑreɑ kɑ sere Akɑsi.
Akɑsiwɑ u Yehoyɑdɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yehoyɑdɑ u Alemɛti mɑrɑ kɑ Asimɑfɛti kɑ sere Simiri. Simiriwɑ u Mɔsɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ Mɔsɑ u Binɛɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Binɛɑ u Rɑfɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Rɑfɑ u Eleɑsɑɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Eleɑsɑɑ u Asɛli mɑrɑ.
Bibu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ Asɛli u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Asirikɑmu kɑ Bokuru kɑ Isimɛɛli kɑ Seɑriɑ kɑ Abudiɑsi kɑ sere Hɑnɑnu. Beni kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asɛlin bibu.
Asɛli wi, u wɔnɔ mɔ wi bɑ sokumɔ Esɛki. Bibu itɑwɑ Esɛki wi, u mɑrɑ. Berɑ Ulɑmu kɑ Yeusi kɑ Elifelɛti.
Ulɑmun bibu bɑ kuɑwɑ wɔrugɔbɑ kɑ tɛn towobu. Ben bibu kɑ ben debuminu dɑbi. Bɑ turɑ nge tɔmbu wunɑɑ weeru kɑ wɔkuru (150). Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn bibun bweseru.
Bɑ Isirelibɑ kpuron yĩsɑ yoruɑ ben gɑri gɑrin tireru sɔɔ nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ, bwese kɛrɑ kɑ bwese kɛrɑ. N deemɑ bɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro yoru mwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Be bɑ gbiɑ bɑ sinɑ ben tem wusu sɔɔ, berɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Lefibɑ kɑ sere Nɛtinibɑ.
Be bɑ nɑ bɑ sinɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, berɑ Yudɑn bweseru kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn bweseru kɑ Efɑrɑimugiru kɑ Mɑnɑsegiru.
Kɑ sere Utɑi wi u wɑ̃ɑ Yudɑn bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ. U sɑ̃ɑwɑ Amihudun bii. Amihudu wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Omirin bii, Imirin debubu, Bɑnin sikɑdobu, Perɛsin bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ.
Silonigibun bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔrɑ Asɑyɑ u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ win bibu. Asɑyɑ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ win bii gbiikoo.
Serɑkin bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔrɑ Yewɛli kɑ wigibu bɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɑtɑ kɑ wɛnɛ kɑ wɔkuru (690).
Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ, berɑ Sɑlu, Mɛsulɑmun bii, Hodɑfiɑn debubu, Asenuɑn sikɑdobu,
kɑ Yibinɛɑ, Yorɑmun bii, kɑ Elɑ, Usin bii, Mikirin debubu kɑ Mɛsulɑmu, Sefɑtiɑn bii, Rewɛlin debubu, Yibiniɑn sikɑdobu, kɑ sere ben tɔmbu gɑbu.
Tɔn be kpurowɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu ben yɛnusɔ nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ. Ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛnɛ kɑ wunɔbu kɑ weerɑɑkuru kɑ nɔɔbɑ tiɑ (956).
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu, berɑ Yedɑyɑ kɑ Yoyɑribu kɑ Yɑkini,
kɑ Asɑriɑ. Win sikɑdobɑrɑ Hilikiyɑ kɑ Mɛsulɑmu kɑ Sɑdɔku kɑ Mɛrɑyɔtu kɑ sere Akitubu wi u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun wirugii.
Adɑyɑ u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowo. Win sikɑdobɑrɑ Yerohɑmu kɑ Pɑsuri kɑ Mɑɑkiyɑ kɑ Mɑsɑi kɑ Adiɛli kɑ Yɑsisiɑ kɑ Mɛsulɑmu kɑ Mɛsilemiti kɑ Imɛri.
Be kɑ begii be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wirugibu ben yɛnusɔ, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɔrɔbu kɑ nɑtɑ kɑ wunɔbu kɑ wɑtɑ (1.760). Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔrugɔbɑ. Berɑ bɑ rɑ sɔmburu ko Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Semɑyɑ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Lefi. Win sikɑdobɑ wee, nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ. Berɑ Hɑsubu kɑ Asirikɑmu kɑ sere Hɑsɑbiɑ, Mɛrɑrin bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ.
Be bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lefibɑ, berɑ Bɑkibɑkɑɑ kɑ Herɛsi kɑ Gɑlɑli kɑ Mɑtɑniɑ. Mɑtɑniɑ win sikɑdobɑrɑ Misee kɑ Sikiri kɑ Asɑfu.
Abudiɑsin tii u sɑ̃ɑ wɑ Lefi. Win sikɑdobɑrɑ Semɑyɑ kɑ Gɑlɑli kɑ Yedutum. Berekiɑ, Asɑn bii, Ɛlikɑnɑn debubu wi u wɑ̃ɑ Nɛtofɑgibun temɔ, u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Lefi.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ kɔ̃sobu, berɑ Sɑlumu kɑ Akubu kɑ Tɑlumɔɔ, kɑ Ahimɑni kɑ begibu. Sɑlumuwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben wirugii.
Wiyɑ u rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ sinɑ bokon kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ sere kɑ gisɔ. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ kɔ̃sobu Lefin bweseru sɔɔ, berɑ mi.
Sɑlumu, Koren bii, Abiɑsɑfun debubu, Koren sikɑdobu kɑ wigii be bɑ tie, berɑ bɑ rɑ Yinni Gusunɔn kuu bekurugirun kɔnnɔ kɔ̃su. Ben sikɑdobɑrɑ bɑ rɑ rɑɑ sɔmbu te ko.
Finɛɛsi, Eleɑsɑɑn biiwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben wirugii. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi.
Sɑkɑri, Mɛselemiɑn biiwɑ u rɑ kuu bekurugii ten kɔnnɔ kɔ̃su.
Be kpuron geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mi goobu kɑ wɔkurɑ yiru (212). Berɑ bɑ rɑ kɔnnɔsu kɔ̃su. Ben yĩsɑ bɑ mɑɑ doke tireru sɔɔ kɑ ben wusu. Dɑfidi kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Sɑmuɛliwɑ bɑ bu sɔmbu te nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Be kɑ ben bibun bweserɑ bɑ rɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔ si kɔ̃su.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔ si kɔ̃su mi, bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ berɑ kɑ berɑ, sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerɔ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yerɔ, kɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geuɔ kɑ yen nɔm dwɑrɔ.
Begibu gɑbu bɑ rɑ nɛ ben mi sɑɑ ben wusun di bu kɑ bu sinɑ mi ɑlusumɑ tiɑ.
Kɔnnɔ kɔ̃sobun wirugibu nnɛ be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Lefibɑ. Bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ ben sɔmburu sɔɔ bɑɑdommɑ. Berɑ bɑ rɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun dii sɔsu kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten ɑrumɑni kɔ̃su.
Bɑ rɑ kpunɛwɑ bu kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sikerenɑ. Yɑm mù n sɑ̃rɑ, kpɑ bu ten kɔnnɔsu wukiɑ.
Kɔnnɔ kɔ̃so ben gɑbɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃kurun dendi yɑ̃nu kɔ̃su. Bɑ rɑ nu gɑriwɑ bɑ̀ n nu yɑrɑmɔ. Kpɑ bu mɑɑ nu gɑri bɑ̀ n nu duusiɑmɔ.
Ben gɑbɑ bɑ rɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃ɑ ni nu tie kɔ̃su kɑ sere mɑɑ som kɑ tɑm kɑ gum kɑ turɑre ye bɑ rɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke kɑ mɑɑ turɑre nubu durorugiɑ.
Yɑ̃ku kowobɑ bɑ rɑ turɑre nubu durorugiɑ ye ko.
Lefi ben turo, Mɑtitiɑ, Sɑlumun bii gbiikoo, Koren bweseru sɔɔ, wiyɑ u rɑ kirɑnu wɔ̃.
Wigibu gɑbu Kehɑtin bweseru sɔɔ, berɑ bɑ rɑ tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru bɑɑteren pɛ̃ɛ ko, ye bɑ rɑ Yinni Gusunɔ yiiye.
Berɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lefibɑn yɛnu yɛ̃robu. Berɑ bɑ rɑ mɑɑ wom kowobu kpɑre. Bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun dinu gɑnu sɔɔ. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ sɔmɑ gɑɑ ko, yèn sɔ̃ bɑ rɑ n sɔmburu mɔ̀ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ kɑ wɔ̃kuru.
Berɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lefibɑn yɛnu yɛ̃robu nge mɛ bɑ kɑ swĩinɛ. Be, bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Yeyɛli wi u Gɑbɑoni swĩi, u wɑ̃ɑwɑ Gɑbɑoniɔ. Win kurɔn yĩsirɑ Mɑɑkɑ.
Win bii gbiikoowɑ Abudoni. Be bɑ mɑɑ tie, berɑ Suri kɑ Kisi kɑ Bɑɑli kɑ Nɛri kɑ Nɑdɑbu,
kɑ Gedori kɑ Akiyo kɑ Sɑkɑri kɑ sere Mikoloti.
Mikoloti wiyɑ u Simɛɑmu mɑrɑ. Be kpuro bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ begibun bɔkuɔ.
Nɛriwɑ u Kisi mɑrɑ. Mɑ Kisi u Sɔɔlu mɑrɑ. Mɑ Sɔɔlu u Yonɑtɑm mɑrɑ kɑ Mɑɑkisuɑ kɑ Abinɑdɑbu kɑ sere Ɛsibɑɑli.
Yonɑtɑmwɑ u Mɛribu Bɑɑli mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɛribu Bɑɑli u mɑɑ Misee mɑrɑ.
Miseen bibɑ Pitoni kɑ Mɛlɛki kɑ sere Tɑreɑ.
Akɑsiwɑ u Yɑrɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Yɑrɑ u Alemɛti mɑrɑ kɑ Asimɑfɛti kɑ sere Simiri. Simiriwɑ u Mɔsɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Mɔsɑ u mɑɑ Binɛɑ mɑrɑ.
Binɛɑwɑ u Refɑyɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Refɑyɑ u Eleɑsɑɑ mɑrɑ. Mɑ Eleɑsɑɑ u Asɛli mɑrɑ.
Bibu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ Asɛli u mɑrɑ. Ben yĩsɑ wee, Asirikɑmu kɑ Bokuru kɑ Isimɛɛli kɑ Seɑriɑ kɑ Abudiɑsi kɑ sere Hɑnɑnu. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asɛlin bibu, berɑ mi.
Filisitibɑ bɑ Isirelibɑ tɑbu wɔri. Mɑ Isirelibɑn tɑbu kowobu bɑ duki suɑ. Filisiti be, bɑ bu nɑɑ girɑ bɑ go go Giliboɑn guurɔ.
Bɑ mɑɑ Sɔɔlun tii kɑ win bibu itɑ Yonɑtɑm kɑ Abinɑdɑbu kɑ Mɑɑkisuɑ nɑɑmwɛ. Mɑ bɑ bii be go.
Sɑnnɔ ge, gɑ Sɔɔlu swĩɛ. Tɛn towobu bɑ nùn sɛ̃ɛnu twee bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ gem gem.
Yerɑ u win tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ sɔɔwo sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, u win tɑkobi womɔ u nùn ye sɔku kpɑ bɑngo sɑrirugii be, bu ku rɑɑ nùn sɔku bu yɑɑ kɑsiki. Adɑmɑ durɔ wi, u yinɑ u ko mɛ, domi bɛrum nùn mwɑ gem gem. Mɑ Sɔɔlu u tɑkobi ye mwɑ u kɑ tii sɔkɑ u kibɑrisi u tɑɑre.
Ye win tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ sɔɔwo wi, u wɑ mɑ u gu, yerɑ u mɑɑ win tɑkobi suɑ u tii sɔkɑ nge mɛ Sɔɔlu u kuɑ. Mɑ bɑ gu yɑm tem mi.
Nge mɛyɑ Sɔɔlu u kɑ gu kɑ win bibu itɑ be, kɑ win tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ sɔɔwo kɑ sere mɑɑ win tɑbu kowobu kpuro sɑnnu.
Ye Isireli be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yisirɛɛlin wɔwɑɔ bɑ nuɑ mɑ ben tɑbu kowobɑ duki suɑ, Sɔɔlu kɑ win bii tɔn durɔbu bɑ mɑɑ gu, yerɑ bɑ ben wusu deri bɑ duki suɑ. Mɑ Filisitibɑ bɑ nɑ bɑ sinɑ wuu si sɔɔ.
Ye n kuɑ sisiru Filisitibɑ bɑ nɑ bɑ goo nin yɑ̃nu potirimɔ. Yerɑ bɑ Sɔɔlu kɑ win bibu itɑn gonu wɑ Giliboɑn guurɔ.
Mɑ bɑ Sɔɔlun wiru burɑ bɑ win tɑbu yɑ̃nu kpuro potirɑ. Yerɑ bɑ sɔmɔbu gɔrɑ bu yen lɑbɑɑri kpɑrɑ ben bũu diɑɔ kɑ ben tɔmbun mi, ben tem sɔɔ kpuro.
Yerɑ bɑ win tɑbu yɑ̃nu suɑ bɑ doke ben bũu dirɔ. Mɑ bɑ win wiru suɑ bɑ bwɛ̃ ben bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Dɑgonin dirɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Yɑbɛsi ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Gɑlɑdin temɔ, yen tɔmbu bɑ nuɑ ye Filisitibɑ bɑ Sɔɔlu kuɑ,
yerɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɑbu durɔ wɔrugɔbɑ bɑ seewɑ bɑ Sɔɔlu kɑ win bibun goo ni suɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Yɑbɛsiɔ. Mɑ bɑ ben kukunu sikuɑ dɑ̃ru gɑrun nuurɔ Yɑbɛsi mi. Mɑ bɑ nɔɔ bɔkuɑ sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Sɔɔlu u guwɑ yèn sɔ̃ u Yinni Gusunɔ tɔnu kɑm kom kuɑ, u ǹ win woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ. U bikiɑru dɑwɑ be bɑ rɑ gɔribu sokun mi.
U ǹ Yinni Gusunɔ bikie. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ u gu. Mɑ u win bɑndu suɑ u Isɑin bii, Dɑfidi wɛ̃.
Isirelibɑ kpuro bɑ mɛnnɑ bɑ nɑ Dɑfidin mi Heboroniɔ. Mɑ bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, bɛsɛ kɑ wunɛ, sɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɛm tem.
Bɑɑ yellun di, sɑɑ ye Sɔɔlu u sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn sunɔ, wunɑ ɑ rɑ sun mɛnnɛ ɑ sun kpɑrɑ ɑ kɑ tɑbu dɑ, kpɑ ɑ kɑ mɑɑ sun wurɑmɑ. Gusunɔ wunɛn Yinni u mɑɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wunɑ kɑɑ ko bɛsɛn wirugii kpɑ ɑ bɛsɛ win tɔmbu kpɑrɑ.
Yerɑ Isirelibɑn guro gurobu kpuro bɑ nɑ Dɑfidi sinɑ bokon mi Heboroniɔ. Mɑ u kɑ bu ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ Heboroni mi. Yerɑ bɑ nùn gum tɑ̃re wirɔ, bɑ nùn kuɑ be, Isirelibɑn sunɔ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ sɑɑ Sɑmuɛlin nɔɔn di.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru, Dɑfidi kɑ Isirelibɑ kpuro bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri. Yerusɑlɛmu yerɑ bɑ mɑɑ sokumɔ Yebusi. Miyɑ Yebusibɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yerɑ bɑ Dɑfidi sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ bɛɛ, n ǹ koorɔ u duumɑ wuu ge sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ Dɑfidi u bu wɔri u ben wuu gbɑ̃rɑruguu ge mwɑ. N deemɑ gerɑ bɑ mɑɑ sokumɔ Siɔni. Yen biru bɑ gu sokɑ Dɑfidin wuu.
N deemɑ Dɑfidi u rɑɑ win tɑbu kowobu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wi u gbiɑ u Yebusibɑ wɔri u kɑmiɑ, yɛ̃rowɑ u koo ko tɑbu kowobun wirugii. Mɑ Yoɑbu, Seruyɑn bii u gbiɑ u bu wɔri u kɑmiɑ. Mɑ u kuɑ wirugii.
Dɑfidi u dɑ u sinɑ wuu gbɑ̃rɑruguu gen mi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ gu sokɑ Dɑfidin wuu.
Mɑ u bɑni kuɑ u kɑ gu sikerenɑ. U bɑnɑwɑ sɑɑ Milon di u kɑ sikerenɑ. Mɑ Yoɑbu u mɑɑ gen mi n tie sɔnwɑ.
Mɑ Dɑfidin dɑm mu sosimɔ. Domi Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi.
Wee be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Dɑfidin tɑbu kowobun wirugibu. Be kɑ Isirelibɑ kpurowɑ bɑ nùn kuɑ sinɑ boko nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ win tɔmbun sɔ̃. Bɑ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɑwɑ mɑm mɑm win bɑndun wɑɑti ye kpuro sɔɔ.
Yɑsobeɑmu, Hɑkumɔnin bii u sɑ̃ɑ tɑbu kowobun wirugii ben turo. Wiyɑ u tɔmbu goobɑ wunɔbu (300) go kɑ yɑɑsɑ nɔn teerun tɑbu sɔɔ.
Yen biru Eleɑsɑɑ, Dodon bii, Akosigii, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu kowobu itɑ yen turo.
U wɑ̃ɑ kɑ Dɑfidi Pɑsi Dɑmimuɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ Filisitibɑ bɑ mɛnnɑ bu kɑ bu tɑbu wɔri. Mɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ duki Filisitibɑn wuswɑɑn di. N deemɑ gberu gɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, tè sɔɔ bɑ ɔɔsu duurɑ.
Yerɑ Eleɑsɑɑ kɑ win tɔmbu bɑ yɔ̃rɑ gbee ten suunu sɔɔ bɑ kɑ tu yinɑ. Mɑ bɑ kɑ Filisitibɑ tɑbu kuɑ bɑ bu go. Yinni Gusunɔ u bu nɑsɑrɑ bɑkɑ wɛ̃ dɔmɑ te.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Dɑfidin tɑbu sinɑmbu tɛnɑ ye sɔɔ, ben itɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ nùn deemɑ Adulɑmun kpee wɔruɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ Filisitibɑn tɑbu kowobun wuuru gɑru tɑ nɑ tɑ ten sɑnsɑni girɑ Refɑbɑn wɔwɑɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Dɑfidi u wɑ̃ɑ kpee wɔru ge sɔɔ, mɑ Filisitibɑn sɑnsɑni yɑ mɑɑ gire Bɛtelehɛmuɔ.
Mɑ Dɑfidi u Bɛtelehɛmun bɛkɛ kuɑ u nɛɛ, wɑrɑ u koo kɑ mɑn Bɛtelehɛmun gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔn dɔkɔn nim nɑɑwɑ n nɔ.
Yerɑ win tɑbu durɔbu itɑ be, bɑ dɑ bɑ Filisitibɑn sɑnsɑni ye wɔri kɑ dɑm bɑ Dɑfidi nim mɛ tɑkɑmɑ bɑ kɑ nɑ. Adɑmɑ u ǹ mu nɔrɑ. U kɑ mu yɑ̃kuru kuɑwɑ, u Yinni Gusunɔ yɑriɑ.
U nɛɛ, Gusunɔ u mɑn gbɑrɑ bu nɛɛ, nɛnɑ nɑ nim mɛ nɔrɑ. Domi mɛn sɔ̃nɑ tɔn beni bɑ ben wɑ̃ɑru kɑri bɔrie. Nim mɛ, mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge ben yɛm mɛ mu koo rɑɑ yɑri. Yen sɔ̃nɑ u yinɑ u mu nɔ. Yenibɑ kpurowɑ Dɑfidin tɑbu kowobu itɑ be, bɑ kuɑ.
Abisɑi, Yoɑbun wɔnɔwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ tɑbu sinɑmbu tɛnɑ yen wirugii. Tɔmbu goobɑ wunɔbuwɑ (300) u go kɑ win yɑɑsɑ. Mɑ u yĩsiru yɑrɑ wigibun suunu sɔɔ.
Bɑ nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ too. Adɑmɑ u ǹ tɑbu durɔbu itɑ be turɑ.
Bɛnɑyɑ, Kɑbisɛɛligii, Yehoyɑdɑn bii, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔ wɔrugɔ. Mɑ u yĩsiru yɑrɑ nɑsɑrɑ dɑbi te u wɑn sɔ̃. Wiyɑ u Mɔɑbubɑn tɔmbu yiru gɑbu go, be bɑ sɛ̃ nge gbee sinɑnsu. Wiyɑ u mɑɑ duɑ dɔkɔ kpiriru sɔɔ u gbee sunɔ kɑ̃ɑsi mi, u go purɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Mɑ u Egibitin tɑbu durɔ dɑmgii goo go. Win gunum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu. Mɑ u yɑɑsɑ nɛni. Yen buru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge weson dɛkɑ ye u rɑ beku yɑsɑ tɛ̃ke. Sɑɑ yè sɔɔ u nùn wɔrim dɔɔ, bokurɑ u nɛni. Ye u turɑ mi, mɑ u durɔ win yɑɑsɑ ye u nɛni mi wɔrɑ u kɑ nùn sɔkɑ u go.
Yenibɑ kpurowɑ Bɛnɑyɑ Yehoyɑdɑn bii u kuɑ. Mɑ u yĩsiru yɑrɑ tɑbu kowobu tɛnɑ ye sɔɔ.
U bɛɛrɛ bɑkɑ wɑ Dɑfidin tɑbu durɔbu tɛnɑ ye sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ yɑ ǹ tɑbu durɔ gbiikobu itɑ begiɑ turɑ. Mɑ Dɑfidi u nùn kuɑ win tiin kɔ̃sobun wirugii.
Dɑfidin tɑbu kowo ben gɑbun yĩsɑ wee, Asɑɛli, Yoɑbun wɔnɔ, kɑ Ɛlikɑnɑni, Dodon bii, Bɛtelehɛmugii,
kɑ Sɑmɔti, Hɑrorigii, kɑ Helɛsi, Pɑlonigii,
kɑ Irɑ, Ikɛsin bii, Tekoɑgii, kɑ Abiesɛɛ, Anɑtɔtugii,
kɑ Sibekɑi, Husɑgii, kɑ Ilɑi, Akoɑsigii,
kɑ Mɑhɑrɑi, Nɛtofɑgii, kɑ Helɛdi, Bɑɑnɑn bii, wi u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Nɛtofɑgii,
kɑ Itɑi, Ribɑin bii, Gibeɑgii, ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ, kɑ Bɛnɑyɑ, Pirɑtonigii,
kɑ Hurɑi, Nɑsɑle Gɑɑsigii, kɑ Abiɛli, Arɑbɑgii,
kɑ Asimɑfɛti, Bɑsɑrumugii, kɑ Eliɑbɑ, Sɑɑbonigii,
kɑ Bɛnɛ Hɑsɛmu, Gisonigii, kɑ Yonɑtɑm, Sɑgen bii, Hɑrɑrigii,
kɑ Akiɑmu, Sɑkɑɑn bii, Hɑrɑrigii, kɑ Elifɑli, Urun bii,
kɑ Hefɛɛ, Mɛkerɑgii, kɑ Akiyɑ, Pɑlonigii,
kɑ Hɛsiro, Kɑɑmɛligii, kɑ Nɑɑrɑi, Ɛsibɑin bii,
kɑ Yoɛli, Nɑtɑnin mɔɔ, kɑ Mibisɑɑ, Hɑgirin bii,
kɑ Selɛki, Amɔnigii, kɑ Nɑkɑrɑi, Berɔtugii wi u rɑ Yoɑbu, Seruyɑn biin tɑbu yɑ̃nu sɔbe,
kɑ Irɑ, kɑ Gɑrɛbu be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yetɛɛbɑ,
kɑ Uri, Hɛti, kɑ Sɑbɑdi, Alɑigii,
kɑ Adinɑ, Sisɑn bii, Rubɛnin bwese kɛrɑn wirugii turo, wi u tɑbu kowobu tɛnɑ mɔ,
kɑ Hɑnɑni, Mɑɑkɑn bii, kɑ Yosɑfɑti, Mitinigii,
kɑ Osiɑsi, Asitɑrɔtugii, kɑ Sɑmɑ, kɑ Yeyɛli be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Hotɑmun bibu, Aroɛɛgibu,
kɑ Yediɛli, Simurin bii, kɑ win wɔnɔ Yokɑ, Tisigii,
kɑ Eliɛli, Mɑkɑfimugii, kɑ Yeribɑi, kɑ Yosɑfiɑ, Elinɑmun bibu, kɑ Yitimɑ, Mɔɑbu,
kɑ Eliɛli, kɑ Obɛdi, kɑ Yɑsiɛli, Sobɑgii.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Dɑfidi u kpikiru suɑ u dɑ Sikilɑgiɔ u kɑ Sɔɔlu Kisin bii tondɑ, yerɑ gɑbɑ seewɑ bɑ dɑ win mi. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔ wɔrugɔbɑ be bɑ sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ nùn tɑbu somi.
Mɑ bɑ tɛnnu kɑ kpurɑntɛɛnu nɛni. Bɑ mɑɑ ye kpuron tobu yɛ̃wɑ nɔm geu kɑ nɔm dwɑru. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛbɑ, Sɔɔlun bwese kɛrɑ sɔɔ,
berɑ tɑbu sunɔ Akiesɛɛ kɑ Yoɑsi be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Semɑ, Gibeɑgiin bibu, kɑ Yesiɛli, kɑ Pelɛti be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asimɑfɛtin bibu, kɑ Berɑkɑ kɑ Yehu be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Anɑtɔtugibu,

kɑ Yisimɑyɑ, Gɑbɑonigii, wi u sɑ̃ɑ tɑbu sinɑmbu tɛnɑ yen wirugii turo,
kɑ Yeremi kɑ Yɑsiɛli, kɑ Yokɑnɑni kɑ Yosɑbɑdi, Gederɑgii,
kɑ Elusɑi kɑ Yerimɔti kɑ Beɑliɑ kɑ Semɑriɑ kɑ Sefɑtiɑ, Hɑrɔfugii,
kɑ Ɛlikɑnɑ kɑ Yisiyɑ kɑ Asɑrɛli, kɑ Yoesɛɛ kɑ Yɑsobeɑmu, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Koren bwese kɛrɑgibu,
kɑ Yoelɑ kɑ Sebɑdiɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yerohɑmun bibu, Gedorigibu.
Gɑdibɑ sɔɔ, tɑbu durɔ wɔrugɔbɑ bɑ nɑ Dɑfidin mi kpee wɔru gen mi, gbɑburɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ be bɑ tɑbu tobu yɛ̃. Mɑ bɑ tɛrɛnu kɑ yɑɑsi nɛni. Bɑ dɑm mɔwɑ nge gbee sinɑnsu. Mɑ bɑ sɑ̃u nge nɛm ni nu wɑ̃ɑ guunu wɔllɔ.
Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔnu wɔkurɑ tiɑ. Berɑ tɑbu sunɔ Esɛɛ kɑ Abudiɑsi kɑ Eliɑbu kɑ Misimɑnɑ kɑ Yeremi kɑ Atɑi kɑ Eliɛli kɑ Yokɑnɑni kɑ Ɛlisɑbɑdi kɑ Yeremi kɑ Mɑkibɑnɑi.
