Yeyɛli kɑ Asɑsiɑ kɑ Nɑkɑti kɑ Asɑɛli kɑ Yerimɔti kɑ Yosɑbɑdi kɑ Eliɛli kɑ Yisimɑkiɑ kɑ Mɑkɑti kɑ Bɛnɑyɑ be kpurowɑ Konɑniɑ kɑ win mɛro bisi Simɛi bɑ kpɑre nge mɛ sinɑ boko Esekiɑsi kɑ yɑ̃ku kowo Asɑriɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun wirugii bɑ woodɑ wɛ̃.
Kore wi u sɑ̃ɑ Lefi Yiminɑn bii, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn kɔ̃so. Wiyɑ bɑ kɛ̃ɛ ni nɔmu sɔndiɑ nì bɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑɑwɑ kɑ nuku tiɑ kɑ sere ni bɑ rɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃. Beyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ kɛ̃ɛ ni bɔnu ko.
Yɑ̃ku kowobun wusu sɔɔ, Edɛni kɑ Miyɑmini kɑ Yosue kɑ Semɑyɑ kɑ Amɑriɑ kɑ Sekɑniɑwɑ bɑ gɔsɑ bu Kore wi somi bɑ n dɑ kɑ kɛ̃ɛ ni begibu bɔnu kue dee dee bibu kɑ bukurobu kpuro nge mɛ bɑ kɑ bu bɔnu sɑ̃ɑ wuu wuukɑ.
Beyɑ tɔn durɔ bii be bɑ gɑrɑ sɑɑ wɔ̃ɔ itɑn di n kɑ dɑ be bɑ kere mɛ, kɑ be bɑ gesi dumɔ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere bu kɑ ben sɔmɑ ko wuu wuukɑ,
kɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be bɑ gɑrɑ yɛnu kɑ yɛnu kɑ Lefibɑ be bɑ gɑrɑ sɑɑ be bɑ wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu mɔn di nge mɛ ben sɔmburɑ sɑ̃ɑ wuu wuukɑ,
kɑ sere mɑɑ tɔn be bɑ tie kpuro kɑ ben debuminu kɑ ben kurɔbu kɑ bii tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu, domi bɑ tii wɛ̃wɑ mɑm mɑm Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔmburu sɔɔ.
Aronin bibun bweseru te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑru kpɑɑnɔ wuu mɑrosun bɔkuɔ, bɑ tɔmbu gɔsɑ wuu bɑɑgere sɔɔ be bɑ ko n dɑ bu dĩɑnu bɔnu kue ben suunu sɔɔ, kɑ sere Lefi be bɑ gɑrɑ gɑrɑn suunu sɔɔ.
Wee ye Esekiɑsi u kuɑ Yudɑ kpuro sɔɔ. U sĩɑwɑ dee dee gem sɔɔ Gusunɔ win Yinnin wuswɑɑɔ.
Sɔmɑ ye u kuɑ bu kɑ sɑ̃ɑru ko Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ sere win woodɑn mɛm nɔɔbu, u ye kpuro kuɑwɑ kɑ gɔ̃ru tiɑ. Mɑ u koorɑ.
Esekiɑsi u sĩɑ dee dee Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ. Yenibɑn biruwɑ Sɑnkeribu, Asirin sinɑ boko u nɑ Yudɑɔ, mɑ u derɑ bɑ wuu gbɑ̃rɑrugisu tɑrusi. U nɛɛ, u koo su wɔriwɑ kɑ dɑm.
Ye Esekiɑsi u wɑ Sɑnkeribu u nɑ u kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu tɑrusi, yerɑ u wirugibu kɑ tɑbu kowo dɑmgibu sokɑ,
bu wesiɑnɑ bu kɑ bwii yi kɛnɛ yi yi wɑ̃ɑ wuun biruɔ.
Tɔn dɑbirɑ tɑ nùn somi bɑ kɑ bwii yi kɔruɑ kɑ nim torɑ ye yɑ kokumɔ berɑ yen suunu sɔɔ. Domi Esekiɑsi u nɛɛ, u ǹ kĩ Asirigibu bɑ̀ n tunumɑ bu nim deemɑ n kpɑ̃.
Mɑ u win bɑndun dɑm tɑ̃sisiɑ. U Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑrun mi n wɔrumɑ seeyɑ kɑ mɑɑ wuun kɔ̃su yenu. Mɑ u gbɑ̃rɑru gɑru bɑnɑ wuun biruɔ u kɑ sikerenɑ. Mɑ u kɑrì ye sɔnwɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Milo Dɑfidin wuuɔ. U tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ dɑbi dɑbinu kɑsu kɑ mɑɑ tɛrɛnu.
U tɑbu sinɑmbu kuɑ mɑ u bu mɛnnɑ wuun gbɑ̃rɑrun kɔnnɔwɔ. Mɑ u bu kirɔ kuɑ u nɛɛ,
bu tii dɑm kɛ̃ɛyɔ kpɑ bu wɔrugɔru sɔ̃ɔsi. Bu ku bɛrum ko bu diiri Asirin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɔn dɑbi ten wuswɑɑɔ. Domi be bɑ kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ bɑ dɑbi n kere be bɑ kɑ nùn wɑ̃ɑ.
Tɔmbɑ bɑ kɑ nùn wɑ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ be, Gusunɔ ben Yinniwɑ u koo bu somi. Wiyɑ u koo bu dɑm wɛ̃ tɑbu sɔɔ. Mɑ tɔn be, bɑ Esekiɑsi Yudɑn sinɑ bokon gɑri yi nɑɑnɛ kuɑ.
Yenibɑn biru, Sɑnkeribu, Asirin sinɑ boko u win sɔm kowobu gɔrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u wɑ̃ɑ Lɑkisiɔ kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kpuro. U sɔm kowo be gɔrɑwɑ Esekiɑsi kɑ Yudɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kpuron mi,
bu nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ wi, Sɑnkeribu, Asirin sinɑ boko u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, mɑ sɔɔrɑ bɑ ben nɑɑnɛ doke bɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu.
Bu ku de Esekiɑsi u bu nɔni wɔ̃ke kpɑ u de bu gbi gɔ̃ɔru kɑ nim nɔrun sɔ̃ ye u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni u koo bu wɔrɑ wi, Asirin sinɑ bokon nɔmɑn di.
Bɑ ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ wi, Esekiɑsiwɑ u gungunu kɔsukɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yɑ̃ku yee te? Mɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, yɑ̃ku yee teeru tɔnɑn miyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ de bu yiirɑ bu Yinni Gusunɔ sɑ̃ kpɑ bu nùn turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ.
Adɑmɑ be, bɑ ǹ yɑɑye ye wi, Sɑnkeribu kɑ win bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ bwesenu kpuro kuɑ? Nin bũnu nu kpĩɑ nu bu yɑrɑ sɑɑ win nɔmɑn di?
Bwese ni win bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ kɑm koosiɑ sɔɔ, nin niren bũnɑ nu kpĩɑ nu bu yɑkiɑ win nɔmɑn di ben tii bu kɑ sere nɛɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni u koo bu yɑkiɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, bu ku de Esekiɑsi u bu nɔni wɔ̃ke kpɑ u n bu gɑ̀rì seeyɑmɔ mɛsum. Bu ku nùn nɑɑnɛ ko. Domi bweseru gɑrun bũnu kun kpĩɑ nu tu wɔre win nɔmɑn di, ǹ kun mɛ win bɑɑbɑbɑn nɔmɑn di. Kɑɑ sere gere Yudɑbɑn bũnu?
Nge mɛyɑ Sɑnkeribun sɔmɔ be, bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ kɑ win sɔm kowo Esekiɑsi wɔmmɔ.
Sɑnkeribu u tireru yoruɑ u kɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wɔmɛ. U nɛɛ, nge mɛ bwese ni nu tien bũnu nu ǹ kpĩɑ nu nin tɔmbu wɔre win nɔmɑn di, nge mɛyɑ Gusunɔ, Esekiɑsin Yinni u ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ u bu wɔrɑ win nɔmɑn di.
Mɑ Sɑnkeribun sɔmɔ be, bɑ gbɑ̃rɑmɔ kɑ dɑm kɑ Yudɑn bɑrum bu kɑ tɔmbu nɑndɑsiɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑ̃rɑ ten sɔɔwɔ kpɑ bu wɑ bu wuu ge mwɑ.
Bɑ Gusunɔ Yerusɑlɛmugibun Yinnin gɑri mɔ̀ nge bwese ni nu tien bũu ni bɑ kɑ tii sekɑ.
Yerɑ Esekiɑsi kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Esɑi, Amɔtin bii bɑ kɑnɑru wɔri gɑri yin sɔ̃ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɔɔgiru sue wɔllɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔrɑdo goo gɔrɑ u Asirigibun sɑnsɑni wɔri u ben tɑbu durɔ wɔrugɔbɑ kɑ ben tɑbu sinɑmbu kɑ ben wirugibu go. Yerɑ Asirin sinɑ boko u gɔsirɑ u wurɑ win temɔ kɑ sekuru. Mɑ u dɑ win bũu dirɔ. Miyɑ win tiin bibu bɑ nɑ bɑ nùn kɑ̃ɑsi bɑ go kɑ tɑkobi.
Nge mɛyɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Esekiɑsi kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu fɑɑbɑ kuɑ sɑɑ Sɑnkeribun nɔmɑn di kɑ sere be bɑ tie kpuron nɔmɑn di. Mɑ u bu kɔ̃su be bɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛn sɔ̃.
Tɔn dɑbirɑ tɑ rɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ kɛ̃nu nɑɑwɛ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kpɑ tu mɑɑ kɑ Esekiɑsin tii kɛ̃ɛ gobiginu nɑɑwɑ. Sɑɑ yen dɔmɑ ten di, u yĩsiru yɑrɑwɑ bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Esekiɑsi u bɑrɑ sere u gɔɔ turuku kuɑ. Mɑ u Yinni Gusunɔ kɑnɑ. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn wisɑ, mɑ u nùn sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiginu kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ Esekiɑsi kun kue nge u durom wɑ Yinni Gusunɔn min di. Mɑ u tii suɑ. Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u bu mɔru seesi wi kɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu.
Ye u wɑ mɛ, yerɑ wi kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ tii kɑwɑ. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru yɑ doonɑ ben min di Esekiɑsin wɑɑti ye sɔɔ.
Esekiɑsi u dukiɑ bɑkɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ bɑkɑ wɑ. U sii geesu kɑ wurɑ kɑ kpee gobiginu kɑ turɑrebɑ kɑsu kɑ tɛrɛnu kɑ gɑ̃ɑ bwese bwesekɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃.
U ɑlikɑmɑn birɑnu kuɑ, mɑ u tɑm kpɑm kɑ gum beru yenu kuɑ mɑ u yɑɑ sɑbenu bɑɑniren gɔ̃ru kuɑ kɑ sere nin dii yenu.
Mɑ u tii wusu bɑniɑ. U yɑɑ sɑbenu wɑ dɑbi dɑbinu, kɛtɛbɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ bonu. Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn dukiɑ bɑkɑ wɛ̃.
Wiyɑ u mɑɑ Gihonin yɛru gèn nɔɔ gɑ wɑ̃ɑ gungurun berɑ giɑ kɔruɑ, mɑ u nɔɔ kpɔɔ yɑbɑ Dɑfidin wuun sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ. Ye Esekiɑsi u gɔ̃ru doke u ko kpuro, yɑ nùn koorɑwɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u sɔmɔbu mɔrisiɑ u kɑ wɑ sɔm mɑɑmɑɑki ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɔ̀ Isireliɔ, yerɑ Gusunɔ u Esekiɑsi deri u kɑ wɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ win gɔ̃ruɔ.
Ye Esekiɑsi u kuɑn sukum kɑ nge mɛ u Gusunɔ sɑ̃wɑ kɑ nɑɑnɛ, ye kpuron gɑri yi yoruɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Esɑi, Amɔtin biin kɑ̃sinun tireru sɔɔ kɑ mɑɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbun fɑɑgin tireru sɔɔ.
Esekiɑsi u kpunɑ u gu. Mɑ bɑ nùn sikuɑ Dɑfidin bibun bweserun siku yerɔ berɑ gee n gunum bo. Yerusɑlɛmugibu kɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ nùn gɔɔ swĩiyɑ. Yen biru, win bii Mɑnɑse u bɑndu kɔsire kuɑ.
Mɑnɑse u mɔwɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yiru sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di Yudɑɔ. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ weerɑɑkuru kɑ nɔɔbu bɑn te sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ. Bwese ni Yinni Gusunɔ u girɑ Isirelibɑn wuswɑɑn di nin kom kɔ̃sum mɛyɑ u swĩi.
U wure u gungunu seeyɑ ni win tundo Esekiɑsi u kɔsukɑ. Mɑ u bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑlin yɑ̃ku yenu kuɑ kɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑten bwɑ̃ɑrokunu ni win tundo u rɑɑ kɔsukɑ. Mɑ u kperi kɑ sɔ̃ɔ kɑ surun sɑ̃ɑru wɔri.
U bũu turɑnu bɑnɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ tèn mi Yinni Gusunɔ u win yĩsiru doke sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
U mɑɑ suru kɑ sɔ̃ɔ kɑ kperin yɑ̃ku yenu kuɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑri yiru ye sɔɔ.
U derɑ bɑ kɑ win bii tɔn durɔbu yɑ̃kuru kuɑ Hinɔmun wɔwɑɔ. U rɑ kɑ wɛɛ kɑ guru winu sɔroru ko kpɑ u dobo dobobɑ ko. U gɔri sokobu yii be bɑ rɑ nùn siɑn gɑri sɔ̃. Mɑ u kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ u dɔɔ ye yɑ Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru seeyɑ.
U win bũun bwɑ̃ɑroku kuɑ u yi Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. N deemɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u rɑɑ Dɑfidi kɑ win bii Sɑlomɔɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, sɑ̃ɑ yee teni kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yeniwɑ nɑ gɔsɑ Isirelibɑn suunu sɔɔ yɑ n kɑ nɛn yĩsiru sɔɔwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ Isirelibɑ yɑrɑmɔ sɑɑ ben tem di mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃ bɑ̀ n gesi nɛn woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ ye nɑ Mɔwisi wɛ̃ u yoruɑ.
Adɑmɑ Mɑnɑse u derɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ tondɑ, mɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ n kere bwese ni Yinni Gusunɔn tii u girɑ be Isirelibɑn wuswɑɑn di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Mɑnɑse kɑ win tɔmbu gɑri kuɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ nùn swɑɑ dɑki.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Asirin sinɑ bokon tɑbu sinɑmbu gɔrɑ bɑ Mɑnɑse mwɑ bɑ yɔni doke, mɑ bɑ nùn bɔkuɑ kɑ sii gɑndun yɔni bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u wɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ, yerɑ u tii kɑwɑ Gusunɔ win bɑɑbɑbɑn Yinnin wuswɑɑɔ. Mɑ u nùn kɑnɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ u win kɑnɑru mwɑ, u kɑ nùn wurɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ win bɑndu sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Mɑnɑse u giɑ mɑ Gusunɔwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni.
Yenibɑn biru, u gɑnɑ bɑnɑ Yerusɑlɛmun tɔɔwɔ Gihonin sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ wɔwɑɔ. Gɑnɑ ye, yɑ dɑwɑ sere kɔnnɔwɔ ge bɑ mɔ̀ Swɛ̃ɛ. Mɑ yɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔɔ berɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Ofɛli sikerenɑ. U derɑ gɑnɑ ye, yɑ guniɑ too. Mɑ u tɑbu sinɑmbu doke Yudɑn wuu si su gbɑ̃rɑnu mɔ kpuro sɔɔ.
Mɑ u tɔn tukobun bũnun bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kɑ win tiiguu ge, ni u rɑɑ doke Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kpuro wunɑ kɑ sere bũu yɑ̃ku yee ni u bɑnɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun guurɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Mɑ u nu kɑsi kuɑ wuun biruɔ.
Yerɑ u Yinni Gusunɔn yɑ̃ku yeru wesiɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Mɑ u siɑrɑbun yɑ̃kunu kuɑ. U Yudɑbɑ woodɑ wɛ̃ bu Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi turo sɑ̃.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, tɔmbɑ yɑ̃kunu mɔ̀ gungunɔ, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinniwɑ bɑ nu kuɑmmɛ.
Ye Mɑnɑse u kuɑn sukum kɑ kɑnɑ te u kuɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi win sɔmɔbu bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ, ye kpuro yɑ yoruɑ Isirelibɑn sinɑmbun fɑɑgin tireru sɔɔ.
Win kɑnɑru kɑ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn wurɑri kɑ win torɑnu kɑ gunguu ni u kuɑ kɑ mɛm nɔɔbu sɑri te u kuɑ kɑ sere bwɑ̃ɑroku ni u sekɑ mɑ u nu girɑ u sɑ̃wɑ u sere tii kɑwɑ, ye kpuron gɑri yi yoruɑ Hosɑin tireru sɔɔ.
Yen biruwɑ Mɑnɑse u kpunɑ u gu. Mɑ bɑ nùn sikuɑ win tiin dirɔ. Mɑ win bii Amɔɔ u bɑndu kɔsire kuɑ.
Wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ yiruwɑ Amɔɔ u mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ yiru bɑn te sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ nge win tundo Mɑnɑse. U bwɑ̃ɑroku ni Mɑnɑse u kuɑ kpuro yɑ̃kuru kuɑ u sɑ̃wɑ.
U ǹ tii kɑwe Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ nge mɛ win tundo u tii kɑwɑ. Adɑmɑ u win torɑnu sosimɔwɑ u dɔɔ.
Win sɔm kowobu bɑ nùn seesi mɑ bɑ nùn go win dirɔ.
Adɑmɑ be bɑ nùn seesi bɑ go mi, tɔmbɑ mɑɑ ben tii so bɑ go. Mɑ bɑ win bii Yosiɑsi kɔsire kuɑ bɑndu sɔɔ.
Wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑwɑ Yosiɑsi u mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ tɛnɑ kɑ tiɑ bɑndu sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Geɑ u kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ. Win sikɑdo Dɑfidin yirɑ sɔɔrɑ u sĩɑ mɑm mɑm. U ǹ yen gɑm gɛre.
Win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑse sɔɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ u sɑ̃ɑ ɑluwɑɑsi, u Gusunɔ win sikɑdo Dɑfidin Yinni kɑsum wɔri. Win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yiruse sɔɔ, u Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ Yudɑ dɛɛrɑsiɑbu toruɑ. U gunguu nìn mi bɑ rɑ bũnu sɑ̃ kɔsukɑ kɑ nin bwɑ̃ɑroku bwese bwesekɑ.
Bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑlin yɑ̃ku yenu kɔsukɑ win wuswɑɑɔ. Mɑ u bwɑ̃ɑroku ni bɑ kuɑ sɔ̃ɔn sɔ̃ kɑ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu kɔsukɑ. U derɑ bɑ nu munkɑwɑ mɑ bɑ nin kɛ̃ki gurɑ bɑ wisi be bɑ nu sɑ̃ɑmɔn sikɑn wɔllɔ.
Mɑ u bũu yɑ̃ku kowobun kukunu sikiɑ u dɔ̃ɔ doke ben yɑ̃ku yenɔ. Nge mɛyɑ u kɑ Yudɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu dɛɛrɑsiɑ.
Mɑnɑsen wusu sɔɔ kɑ Efɑrɑimugisɔ kɑ Simɛɔgisɔ kɑ Nɛfitɑligisɔ si su kuɑ bɑnsu, u bũu yɑ̃ku yenu kɔsukɑwɑ
mɑ u bwɑ̃ɑrokunu sururɑ mɑ bɑ nu kɔsukɑ muku muku nu kuɑ tuɑ. Mɛyɑ u mɑɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku ni bɑ kuɑ sɔ̃ɔn sɔ̃ kɔsukɑ Isirelibɑn tem kpuro sɔɔ. Mɑ u gɔsirɑ u wurɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Yosiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu yiru sɑrise sɔɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ u tem mɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yee te dɛɛrɑsiɑ u kpɑ, yerɑ u Sɑfɑni, Asɑliɑn bii gɔrɑ kɑ Mɑɑseyɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ wuun guro guro kɑ Yoɑsi, Yoɑkɑsin bii wi u sɑ̃ɑ tire bero bu kɑ Gusunɔ win Yinnin sɑ̃ɑ yeru sɔmɛ.
Tɔn be kpuro bɑ dɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero Hilikiyɑn mi. Mɑ bɑ nùn gobi wɛ̃ yi Lefibɑ bɑ rɑɑ mwɛɛrɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔ̃ sɑɑ Mɑnɑsen tem di kɑ Efɑrɑimun tem di kɑ Yudɑbɑn min di kɑ Isirelibɑ kpuron min di kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn tem di kɑ sere Yerusɑlɛmugibun min di.
Be bɑ sɔmbu te kpɑre berɑ bɑ gobi yi nɔmu sɔndiɑ mɑ bɑ yi sɔm kowobu wɛ̃ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sɔmmɔ.
Berɑ dɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃kobu kɑ bɑnɔbu. Gobi yiyɑ bɑ koo kɑ kpee bɑkɑnu dwe kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ koo kɑ diɑ kpɛ ye Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbɑ sɑnkɑ.
Tɔn be, bɑ sɔmburu kuɑwɑ kɑ nɑɑnɛ. Yɑsɑti kɑ Abudiɑsi be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Lefibɑ, Mɛrɑrin bweseru sɔɔ kɑ Sɑkɑri kɑ Mɛsulɑmu, Kehɑtin bweseru sɔɔ, berɑ bɑ bu kpɑre.
Lefi be bɑ womusu kɑ dweebu yɛ̃, berɑ bɑ rɑ mɑɑ be bɑ rɑ sɔmunu sue nɔni doke kɑ sere mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten sɔm bwese bwesekɑn kowobu. Mɑ Lefibɑ gɑbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tire yorobu kɑ sɔmɑn guro gurobu. Gɑbɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔn kɔ̃sobu.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ dɑ bu kɑ gobi yi suɑ yi bɑ wɛ̃ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔ̃, yerɑ yɑ̃ku kowo Hilikiyɑ u woodɑn tireru wɑ tè Yinni Gusunɔ u rɑɑ Mɔwisi wɛ̃.
Yerɑ Hilikiyɑ u Sɑfɑni, tire yoro sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ woodɑn tireru wɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Mɑ Hilikiyɑ u tu suɑmɑ u Sɑfɑni wɛ̃.
Mɑ Sɑfɑni u tire te suɑ u kɑ sinɑ boko dɑɑwɑ. Mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wunɛn sɔm kowobu bɑ kuɑ kpuro ye ɑ bu yiire.
Bɑ tɔn be ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten sɔmburu nɔmu sɔndiɑ kɑ tɔn be bɑ sɔmɑ mɔ̀ mi, gobi yi wɛ̃.
Yen biru, yɑ̃ku kowo Hilikiyɑ u mɑɑ mɑn tireru gɑru wɛ̃. Mɑ Sɑfɑni u tu gɑrɑ sinɑ bokon wuswɑɑɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ sinɑ boko u woodɑ yen gɑri nuɑ, yerɑ u win yɑ̃nu nɛnuɑ u kɑrɑnɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko u Hilikiyɑ kɑ Akikɑmu, Sɑfɑnin bii kɑ Abudoni, Miseen bii kɑ tire yoro Sɑfɑni kɑ Asɑyɑ win sɔm kowo sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
i doo i bikiɑru ko Yinni Gusunɔn mi Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑ be bɑ tien sɔ̃ tire te sɑ wɑ minin gɑrin sɔ̃. Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ sun mɔru mɔ̀ yɑ kpɑ̃ yèn sɔ̃ bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ ǹ win gɑri mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bɑ ǹ kue nge mɛ yɑ yoruɑ woodɑn tire te sɔɔ.
Hilikiyɑ kɑ tɔn be sinɑ boko u gɔsɑ mi, bɑ dɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ tɔn kurɔ Huludɑn mi. Huludɑ wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Sɑlumun kurɔ, Tokehɑtin bii, Hɑsirɑ wi u rɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃nu kɔ̃sun debubu. Huludɑ wi, u wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔɔ beri kpɑɑɔ. Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ ye bɑ kĩ,
yerɑ u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, i durɔ wi u bɛɛ gɔrimɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ i nɛɛ,
u koo de kɔ̃sɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri yi tem mɛn tɔmbu deemɑ yi yi yoruɑ tireru sɔɔ tè i gɑrɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon wuswɑɑɔ.
Domi bɑ nùn biru kisi bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑmmɛ. Mɑ bɑ win mɔru seeyɑ kɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku ni bɑ tii kuɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Yen sɔ̃, u ko n kɑ tem mɛn tɔmbu mɔru sɑ̃ɑwɑ, yɑ ǹ suremɔ.
Adɑmɑ i ko i Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko wi u bɛɛ gɔrimɑ i kɑ bikiɑru ko Yinni Gusunɔn mi sɔ̃ i nɛɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u nɛɛ, u win kɑnɑru mwɑ. Domi ye u win woodɑn gɑri yi nuɑ, yi win gɔ̃ru tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃, mɑ u tii kɑwɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ, mɑ u win yɑberu nɛnuɑ u kɑrɑnɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃, mɑ u swĩ wi, Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ.
<range>
Tɛ̃, Gusunɔ wi, u koo de u gbi bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ kpɑ bu nùn sike win sikirɔ. Win nɔni kun wɑhɑlɑ ye wɑsi ye u koo de yu Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ yen tɔmbu deemɑ. Yerɑ Hilikiyɑ kɑ wigibu bɑ kɑ sinɑ boko gɑri yi dɑɑwɑ.
Mɑ sinɑ boko u gɔrɑ bu Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun guro gurobu kpuro mɛnnɑ.
Yen biru, u dɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kpuro kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Lefibɑ tɔmbu kpuro gesi, sɑɑ bukurobun di n kɑ dɑ bibɔ. Mɑ u be kpuro Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑn tire te gɑriɑ te bɑ wɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten mi.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko u yɔ̃rɑ win turɑru wɔllɔ, mɑ u kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ u nɛɛ, u koo wi, Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑbɑ kɑ win gere swĩiwɑ kɑ win gɔ̃ru kpuro kɑ win bwɛ̃rɑ kpuro kpɑ u kɑ gɑri yi mɛm nɔɔwɑ yi bɑ yoruɑ woodɑn tire te sɔɔ.
Mɑ u derɑ tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ bɑ duɑ ɑrukɑwɑni ye sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ kuɑ nge mɛ Gusunɔ ben bɑɑbɑbɑn Yinnin ɑrukɑwɑni ye, yɑ gerumɔ.
Yosiɑsi u bũnun bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kɔsukɑ ni Isirelibɑ bɑ wɑɑmɑ tem tukum di. Mɑ u be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Isireliɔ kpuro tilɑsi kuɑ bu kɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni sɑ̃. Win wɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃ru kpuro sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ gɛre Yinni Gusunɔn yirɑn di.
Yosiɑsi u Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru di Yerusɑlɛmuɔ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃. Bɑ ten yɑ̃ku yɛɛ sɑkirɑwɑ wɔ̃ɔn suru gbiikoon sɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ nnɛse sɔɔ.
U yɑ̃ku kowobu doke ben sɔmburu sɔɔ. Mɑ u bu dɑm kɑ̃ bu kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔmburu ko.
U Lefi be bɑ gɔsɑ nɛnɛm Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃ bɑ Isirelibɑ keu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, i Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑn kpɑkoro dɛɛrɑ te dokeo sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ tè Sɑlomɔɔ Dɑfidi Isirelibɑn sinɑ bokon bii u bɑnɑ. I ǹ mɑɑ tu suɑmɔ senɔ. I de bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn tɔmbu i Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni sɑ̃.
I de i n sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ yɛnu kɑ yɛnu kɑ nge mɛ Dɑfidi Isirelibɑn sinɑ boko kɑ win bii Sɑlomɔɔ bɑ bɛɛ bɔnu kuɑ bɑ yoruɑ.
I de i bɛɛn ɑyeru mwɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ yɛnu kɑ yɛnu nge mɛ bɑ bɛɛn mɛro bisibu Lefibɑ bɔnu sɑ̃ɑ.
Bɛɛyɑ i ko i Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun yɑ̃ku yɛɛ sɑkiri. Yen sɔ̃, i de i tii dɛɛrɑsiɑ, kpɑ i ten sɔɔru ko bɛɛn mɛro bisibun sɔ̃ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u Mɔwisi woodɑ wɛ̃.
Yosiɑsi u tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ bonu wɛ̃ nɔrɔbun subɑ tɛnɑ (30.000) kɑ sere kɛtɛbɑ nɔrɔbun subɑ itɑ (3.000) bu kɑ ye kpuro Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru ko. Yɑɑ sɑbe ni kpuro nu weewɑ sinɑ bokon ɑrumɑnin di.
Win sinɑ bwɑ̃ɑbu bɑ tɔmbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Lefibɑ kɛ̃nu kɑ̃ kɑ nuku tiɑ. Mɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun wirugibu, Hilikiyɑ kɑ Sɑkɑri kɑ Yehiɛli bɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu yɑ̃ɑnu nɔrɔbun subɑ yiru kɑ nɑtɑ (2.600) kɑ sere kɛtɛbɑ goobɑ wunɔbu (300) wɛ̃.
Konɑniɑ kɑ Semɑyɑ kɑ Nɛtɑnɛɛli kɑ ben mɛro bisibu Lefibɑn wirugibu, Hɑsɑbiɑ kɑ Yeyɛli kɑ Yosɑbɑdi bɑ Lefibɑ yɑ̃ɑnu nɔrɔbun subɑ nɔɔbu (5.000) kɑ kɛtɛbɑ nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu (500) wɛ̃.
Wee nge mɛ bɑ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ ten kpunɑɑ koosinɑ. Yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Lefibɑ bɑ ben ɑyeru suɑ wuu wuukɑ nge mɛ sinɑ boko u geruɑ.
Bɑ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun yɛɛ go. Mɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ yɛm yɛ̃kɑmɔ mɛ Lefibɑ bɑ bu tĩimɔ. Yen biru, mɑ Lefi be, bɑ yɛɛ yi kokumɔ.
Bɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginun yɛɛ yi nɛnɛm bu kɑ ye tɔmbu wɛ̃ yɛnu kɑ yɛnu kpɑ bu kɑ ye Yinni Gusunɔ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ nge mɛ bɑ yoruɑ woodɑn tireru sɔɔ te Yinni Gusunɔ u Mɔwisi wɛ̃. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ kuɑ kɑ kɛtɛbɑ.
Bɑ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun yɑ̃ku yɑɑ ye wɔ̃ɔwɑ nge mɛ woodɑ yɑ geruɑ. Yen biru, bɑ yɑɑ ye bɑ wĩɑ nɛnɛm Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃ yikuɑ. Mɑ bɑ yɑnde ye tɔmbu kpuro bɔnu kuɑ.
Yen biruwɑ bɑ ben tiigiɑ kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobugiɑ yikuɑ. Domi yɑ̃ku kowo Aronin bibu bɑ sɔmburu kuɑ sere kɑ wɔ̃kurɔ. Bɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kɑ yɑɑ gum yɑ̃kunu mɔ̀. Yen sɔ̃nɑ Lefibɑ bɑ bu yɑɑ yikuɑmmɛ.
Wom kowo Asɑfun bibu bɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben ɑyerɔ nge mɛ Dɑfidi kɑ Asɑfu kɑ Hemɑni kɑ Yedutum, sinɑ bokon bwisi kɛ̃ɔ bɑ woodɑ yi. Mɑ kɔnnɔn kɔ̃sobu bɑ yɔ̃ kɔnnɔ bɑɑgeren mi. Bɑ ǹ doonɛ ben ɑyerun di, domi Lefibɑ bɑ bu ben dĩɑnu kuɑmmɛ.
Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kpunɑɑ yi dɔmɑ te, bu kɑ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru di, kpɑ bu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko Yinni Gusunɔn yɑ̃ku yerɔ nge mɛ sinɑ boko u woodɑ yi.
Isireli be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuro bɑ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru di dɔmɑ te, mɑ bɑ pɛ̃ɛ ye bɑ kun seeyɑtiɑ doken tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru di sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Sɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Sɑmuɛlin wɑɑtin di sere n kɑ gisɔ girɑri, bɑ ǹ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru gɑru diire mɛ Isireliɔ. Mɛyɑ sinɑ boko goo mɑɑ sɑri Isireliɔ wi u Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru diire nge Yosiɑsi kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Lefibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ dɔmɑ te.
Yosiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu yiru sɑrise sɔɔrɑ bɑ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ te di.
Ye Yosiɑsi u Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yee te sɔnwɑ u kpɑ, yen biruwɑ Egibitin sunɔ Nɛko u seewɑ u tɑbu dɔɔ Kɑɑkemisiɔ, dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Efɑrɑtiɔ. Yerɑ Yosiɑsi u seewɑ u nùn wɔrim dɑ mi.
Yerɑ Nɛko u nùn sɔmɔbu gɔriɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑ n sun mɔɔsinɛ nɛ kɑ wunɛ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko. Domi n ǹ wunɛ nɑ tɑbu wɔrim wee gisɔ. Yɛnu ge gɑ kɑ mɑn tɑbu mɔ̀, gerɑ nɑ wɔrim dɔɔ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n doo fuuku. Yen sɔ̃, ɑ ku kɑ Gusunɔ gɑbirinɑ wi u kɑ mɑn wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ u ku rɑɑ nun kɑm koosiɑ.
Adɑmɑ Yosiɑsi u yinɑ u nùn deri. U ǹ Nɛkon gɑri yi wure yi yi wee Yinni Gusunɔn min di. Mɑ u tii kɔsɑ bu ku kɑ nùn tubu. U dɑ u Nɛko tɑbu wɔri wɔwɑɔ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Mɛgido.
Yerɑ tɛn towobu bɑ Yosiɑsi twee. Mɑ u win sɔm kowobu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, i kɑ mɑn doonɔ minin di, domi bɑ mɑn mɛɛrɑ kuɑ yɑ kpɑ̃.
Win sɔm kowobu bɑ nùn suɑ sɑɑ win tɑbu kɛkɛn di mɑ bɑ nùn doke win tɑbu kɛkɛ gɑɑ sɔɔ bɑ kɑ dɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Mɑ u kpunɑ u gu. Mɑ bɑ nùn sikuɑ win bɑɑbɑbɑn sikɑɔ. Mɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ win gɔɔ swĩ.
Yeremi u gɔɔ swĩ Yosiɑsin sɔ̃. Mɑ wom kowobu, tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu bɑ Yosiɑsi doke gɔɔ swĩin womusu sɔɔ sere kɑ gisɔ. Su kuɑ wororu Isireliɔ. Womu si, su wɑ̃ɑ ben gɔɔ swĩin womusun tireru sɔɔ.
Ye Yosiɑsi u kuɑn sukum, ye u gbiɑ u kuɑ kɑ ye u kuɑ dɑ̃ku te, kɑ nge mɛ u Gusunɔ sɑ̃wɑ kɑ nɑɑnɛ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑn tirerɑ geruɑ, ye kpuron gɑri yi yoruɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbun fɑɑgin tireru sɔɔ.
<range>
Tɔmbɑ Yoɑkɑsi, Yosiɑsin bii suɑ mɑ bɑ nùn kuɑ sunɔ win tundon ɑyerɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Yoɑkɑsi u mɔwɑ wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ itɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di Yudɑɔ. Mɑ u kuɑ suru itɑ bɑn te sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Egibitin sunɔwɑ u nùn bɑndu yɑrɑ. Mɑ u win tɔmbu sii geesun tɔnnu itɑ kɑ wurɑn kilo tɛnɑ bure bu kɔsiɑ wɔ̃ɔ kɑ wɔ̃ɔ.
Yen biruwɑ u Yoɑkɑsi win wɔnɔ, Eliɑkimu suɑ u kɔsire kuɑ bɑndu sɔɔ. Mɑ u nùn yĩsi kpɑɑru kɑ̃ Yoyɑkimu. Mɑ u Yoɑkɑsi suɑ u kɑ dɑ Egibitiɔ.
Yoyɑkimu u mɔwɑ wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di Yudɑɔ, mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑ bɑndu sɔɔ. Kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Gusunɔ win Yinnin nɔni sɔɔ.
Yerɑ sɔ̃ɔ teeru Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko, Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u nɑ u Yoyɑkimu tɑbu wɔri. Mɑ u nùn mwɑ u bɔkuɑ kɑ sii gɑndun yɔni u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃nu gurɑ u kɑ dɑ u yi win sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ.
Ye Yoyɑkimu u kuɑn sukum kɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye u kuɑ, ye kpuron gɑri yi yoruɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbun fɑɑgin tireru sɔɔ. Yen biru, win bii Yoyɑkiniwɑ u bɑndu kɔsire kuɑ.
Wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑwɑ Yoyɑkini u mɔ sɑɑ ye u bɑndu di. Mɑ u kuɑ suru itɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuru bɑn te sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ.
Ye n kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ kpɔɔ, yerɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u nɑ u Yoyɑkini mwɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Mɑ u Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃nu gɑnu gurɑ. Mɑ u Yoyɑkinin bɑɑ yɑ̃kɑbu Sedesiɑsi kuɑ sunɔ Yudɑbɑn suunu sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Sedesiɑsi u mɔwɑ wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ tiɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di Yudɑɔ. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑ bɑn te sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Gusunɔ win Yinnin wuswɑɑɔ. U ǹ tii kɑwe Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Yeremin wuswɑɑɔ wi u rɑ nùn Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri sɔ̃.
U swɑɑ tɑɑyɑ, mɑ u gɔ̃ru bɔbiɑ. U ǹ win gɔ̃ru wesie Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinnin mi giɑ. U mɑm Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ seesiwɑ wi u nùn bɔ̃rusiɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yĩsiru sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkumɔ.
Yɑ̃ku kowobun wirugibu kɑ Yudɑ be bɑ tie kpuro bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ yɑ kpɑ̃. Domi bɑ tɔn tukobun komɑnu swĩi. Mɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru disi doke te u gɔsɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
N deemɑ Gusunɔ ben bɑɑbɑbɑn Yinni wi, u bu kirɔ kuɑ yee yellun di sɑɑ win sɔmɔbun min di. Domi u kĩ u win tɔmbu kɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yee te fɑɑbɑ ko.
Adɑmɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔmɔ be yɛ̃ɛ bɑ yɑɑkoru koosi. Bɑ ben gɑri ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ sere Yinni Gusunɔn tii u kɑ bu mɔru kuɑ ye bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu suresiɑ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u bu tɑbu wɔri, mɑ u ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑ tɑkobinu sɔkurɑ u go ben sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. U ǹ goo deri, ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑ wɔndiɑbɑ kɑ durɔ tɔkɔnu. Be kpurowɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u bɛri win nɔmɑɔ.
Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun ɑrumɑni gurɑ bɑkɑ kɑ piibu kɑ ben sinɑ kpɑɑrun ɑrumɑni kɑ sinɑ bokon tiigiɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ win sinɑ bwɑ̃ɑbugiɑ.
Mɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun dii geenu dɔ̃ɔ sɔkɑ. Mɑ bɑ yen gɑ̃ɑ geenu kɔsukɑ. Mɑ bɑ yen gbɑ̃rɑru surɑ.
Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u be bɑ ǹ go tɑbu sɔɔ gurɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Mɑ bɑ kuɑ wi kɑ win bibun yobu sere Pɛɛsibɑ bɑ kɑ bɑndu di.
Nge mɛyɑ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi kɑ koorɑ yi win sɔmɔ Yeremi u rɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ, bɑ koo Yudɑbɑ yoru mwɑ kpɑ tem mɛ, mu wɑ mu sɑnɑm wɛ̃rɑgim di kpɑ mu wɛ̃rɑ sere wɔ̃ɔ wɑtɑ kɑ wɔkuru, wɑhɑlɑ ye mu rɑɑ wɑn sɔ̃.
Sirusi, Pɛɛsin sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ gbiikuu sɔɔ, yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔ̃ru doke u win gɑri yibiɑ yi u rɑɑ geruɑ sɑɑ win gɔro Yeremin nɔɔn di. Mɑ u doke Sirusin gɔ̃ruɔ bu kɑ gɑri yini yore. Mɑ bɑ yi kpɑrɑ win tem kpuro sɔɔ.
Yi nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Sirusi, Pɛɛsin sinɑ boko u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, Gusunɔ Wɔrukoo u mɑn hɑnduniɑn bɑnnu kpuro wɛ̃. Mɑ u mɑn yiire n nùn sɑ̃ɑ yeru bɑniɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ Yudɑbɑn temɔ. Yen sɔ̃, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑ kpuro bu wuro Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kpɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni u n kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ.
Pɛsianↄ kína Sirusu kíblena wɛ̃̀ káaku gũn Dikiri tɛ́ kàagu de yã kũ à dà Ilimianɛ à ò kɛ yãi. Akũ Sirusu kpàkpaa kɛ̀ a bùsun pínki, gbasa à kɛ̃̀ takadan à pì:
Yã kũ makũ Sirusu, Pɛsianↄ kína ma òon dí. Dikiri Luda Musude tò andunia kpata sĩnda pínki gↄ̃̀ ma pↄ́ ũ, akũ à ma ditɛ mà kpɛ́ boarɛ Yurusalɛmu, Yudanↄ bùsun.
Gbɛ̃ kũ à de a gbɛ̃ ũ á tɛ́, Luda gↄ̃ kú kãao à tá Yurusalɛmu, Yudanↄ bùsun, à kpɛ́ bo Dikiri Isarailanↄ Luda kũ à de Dikiri ũ Yurusalɛmunɛ gwe.
Ń gbɛ̃ kũ ò gↄ̃̀ↄ pìnↄ gbɛ̃dakenↄ kpáńyĩ kũ andurufuuo kũ wuraao kũ aruzɛkɛnↄ kũ pↄ́kãdenↄ kũ Luda kpɛ́ kũ òtɛn gɛ́ bo Yurusalɛmu gbanↄ.
Akũ Yudanↄ kũ Biliaminunↄ ↄmbedenↄ kũ sa'orinↄ kũ Levinↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kũ Luda tɛ́ kàńgunↄ fùtɛ, òtɛn gɛ́ Dikiri kpɛ́ bo Yurusalɛmu.
Ń gbɛ̃dakenↄ ↄ dàḿma ò ń gbá andurufu pↄ́nↄ kũ wura pↄ́nↄ kũ aruzɛkɛnↄ kũ pↄ́kãdenↄ kũ pↄ́ ↄgↄdenↄ kũ Dikiri kpɛ́ gbanↄ pínki.
Akũ Pɛsianↄ kína Sirusu bò kũ Dikiri kpɛ́ pↄ́ kũ Nɛbukanɛza sɛ̀tɛ yã zaa Yurusalɛmu à kàtɛ a tãna kpɛ́ gũnnↄo.
À pì a ↄgↄ'utɛri Mitirɛdanɛ à pↄ́ pìnↄ naro à kpá Yudanↄ kína Sesebazaa, akũ à kɛ̀ lɛ.
Pↄ́ pìnↄ dasi lɛ́n dí: Wura ta baraakuri, andurufu ta wàa sↄↄro, tire baraakuri donsari,
wura toko baraakuri, andurufu toko wàa pla kũ kuriio, ta buri pãndenↄ wàa sↄↄro.
Wura kũ andurufu tanↄ fùtɛ pínki mɛ̀n dúbu sↄↄro kpɛ́ wàa pla. Kũ zĩ̀zↄↄ pìnↄ bↄ̀tɛ Babilↄnu ò sù Yurusalɛmu, akũ Sesebaza sù kũ pↄ́ pìnↄ pínki.
Babilↄnu kína Nɛbukanɛza Isarailanↄ kũ̀kũ zĩ̀zↄ ũ à tà kũńwo Babilↄnu yã, akũ ń gbɛ̃kenↄ bò zĩ̀zↄkɛ pìn ò sù Yurusalɛmu, Yudanↄ bùsun sà, akũ ń baadi tà wɛ̃tɛa.
Ń don'arɛdenↄn dí: Zɛrubabɛli, Yesua, Nɛɛmaya, Seraya, Relaya, Mↄdekai, Bilisã, Misipa, Bigivai, Reumu kũ Baanao. Isaraila gↄ̃gbɛ̃ kũ ò sùnↄ dasi lɛ́n dí.

Sa'ori buri kũ ò sùnↄn dí: Yesua buri Yedaya burinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa siikↄ̃ kũ mɛ̀n basↄraakↄ̃ akuri awɛɛ'aakↄ̃o.
Ima burinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa sↄↄro kũ mɛ̀n bupla akuri awɛɛplao.
Pasu burinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa suddo kũ mɛ̀n bupla awɛɛsupplao.
Arimu burinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa sↄↄro kũ mɛ̀n gɛ̃ro awɛɛplao.
Levi kũ ò sùnↄn dí: Odavia buri Yesua kũ Kadamiɛlio burinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn baaakↄ̃ akuri awɛɛsiikↄ̃o.
Asafa buri lɛ̀sirinↄ gbɛ̃nↄn basuddo akuri plansari.
Zɛ́dãkpãri kũ ò de Salumu kũ Atao kũ Talamↄo kũ Akubuo kũ Atitao kũ Sobaio buri ũnↄ gbɛ̃nↄn basuppla donsari.

Yala, Daakↄ̃, Gidɛli,
Sefatia, Atili, Pↄkɛrɛ Azebaimu kũ Amio.
Luda ↄn zĩkɛrii pìnↄ kũ Sulemanu zↄ̀blerii buri pìnↄ kà gbɛ̃nↄn wàa do kũ mɛ̀n bakɛ̃ndo akuri awɛɛplao.
Gbɛ̃kenↄ bò Tɛlɛmɛla kũ Tɛlasao kũ Kɛrubuo kũ Adↄ̃o kũ Imao, akũ odi le ò ń buri bozirɛ òńnɛ kũ Isarailanↄmɛ ń ũro.
Delaya kũ Tobiao kũ Nɛkodao burinↄmɛ, ò kà gbɛ̃nↄn wàa aakↄ̃ kũ mɛ̀n bupla akuri awɛɛplao.
Sa'ori buri kũ ò de Obaya kũ Akozuo kũ Bazilaio burinↄ ũ sù dↄ. Bazilai pì Giliada bùsu gbɛ̃ Bazilai nɛ́ sɛ̀ yã, akũ à a anzure pì tↄ́ sɛ̀.
Gbɛ̃ pìnↄ ń tↄ́ wɛ̀tɛ buri bozirɛ takadan, ama odi boaro, akũ ò gìńnɛ kũ sa'orikɛo.
Bùsu don'arɛde pìńnɛ, tó adi kɛ sa'ori ń yã gwà kũ Urimuo kũ Tumimuo baasiro, òsun sa'opↄ blero.
Gbɛ̃ pìnↄ ń pínki gbɛ̃nↄn dúbu bupla awɛɛpla kpɛ́ wàa do kũ basↄraakↄ̃omɛ.
Ń zↄ̀bleri gↄ̃gbɛ̃nↄ kũ nↄgbɛ̃nↄ kun dↄ gbɛ̃nↄn dúbu suppla kpɛ́ wàa do kũ basuddo akuri awɛɛsupplao. Lɛ̀sirinↄ gↄ̃gbɛ̃ kũ nↄgbɛ̃o kú kũńwo dↄ gbɛ̃nↄn wàa do.
Ò sↄ̃ vĩ mɛ̀n wàa aakↄ̃ kũ mɛ̀n basuddo akuri awɛɛsuddoo, baragbãsↄ̃ wàa do kũ mɛ̀n bupla awɛɛsↄↄroo,
lakumi wàa pla kũ mɛ̀n baraakuri awɛɛsↄↄroo, zaaki dúbu suddo kpɛ́ wàa aakↄ̃ kũ basuddo.
Kũ ò kà Dikiri kpɛ́ bokia Yurusalɛmu, ń ↄmbedenↄ gba dà, de ò le ò Luda kpɛ́ kɛkɛ ò boo a gbɛ̀n.
Ò gba dà kpɛ́ zĩ ↄgↄditɛki gũn ń gbãna lɛ́n, wura kiloo wàa pla kpɛ́ basↄↄro, andurufu tↄn aakↄ̃ kũ sa'ori gyabanↄ basↄↄro.
Sa'orinↄ kũ Levinↄ kũ lɛ̀sirinↄ kũ zɛ́dãkpãrinↄ kũ Luda ↄn zĩkɛrinↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kpara kenↄ vùtɛvutɛ lakutu kũ ò kɛ̀kɛńnɛnↄ gũn, akũ Isaraila kparanↄ vùtɛ ń wɛ̃tɛnↄ gũn.
Kũ wɛ̃̀ mↄ supplade kà, Isarailanↄn vutɛna ń wɛ̃tɛnↄ gũn, akũ ò kↄ̃ kàkara Yurusalɛmu gbɛ̃ dokↄ̃nↄnↄ ũ.
Yozadaka nɛ́ Yesua kũ a sa'ori dakenↄ kũ Sealatiɛli nɛ́ Zɛrubabɛlio kũ a gbɛ̃nↄ Isarailanↄ Luda gbagbaki bò, de ò sa'opↄ kũ òdi ká tɛ́n à tɛ́ kũ oa lákũ Luda gbɛ̃ Musa ò a doka gũn nà.
Bee kũ òtɛn vĩna kɛ gbɛ̃ kũ ò kú bùsuu pìi gũnnↄnɛ, ò gbagbaki pìi bò a gbɛ̀n, akũ ò sa'opↄ kũ òdi ká tɛ́n à tɛ́ kũ ò Dikiria kↄnkↄ kũ ↄkↄsio.
Ò Kutadↄna dikpɛ kɛ̀ lákũ à kú takada gũn nà, òdigↄ̃ sa'opↄ kũ òdi ká tɛ́n à tɛ́ kũ o lákũ gu dìgↄ̃ dↄ nà lákũ ò a lɛ́ dìtɛ nà.
Abire gbɛra ò sa'opↄ kũ òdigↄ̃ ká tɛ́n à tɛ́ kũ gↄrↄ sĩnda pínki ò kũ mↄ dufu pↄ́o kũ dikpɛ kũ Dikiri dìtɛnↄ pↄ́o kũ gba kũ òdi suonɛnↄ.
Mↄ supplade gↄrↄ káaku zĩn ò nà Dikiri gbagbanaa lɛ, bee kũ odi a kpɛ́ bo kↄ̀ro.
Ò ↄgↄ kpà gbɛ̀'arinↄ kũ lí'arinↄa, akũ ò pↄ́ble kũ pↄ́minaao kũ nísio kpà Sidↄ̃denↄ kũ Tayadenↄa, de ò sida lí zↄ̃zↄ̃ Lɛbana bùsun ò yĩyĩ ò gɛ́o ari Yↄpa funa ísirala, lákũ Pɛsianↄ kína Sirusu ń gbá zɛ́ nà.
Ń kana Luda kpɛ́ bokia Yurusalɛmu wɛ̃̀ plade mↄ plade gũn, Sealatiɛli nɛ́ Zɛrubabɛli kũ Yozadaka nɛ́ Yesuao nà zĩa kũ ń gbɛ̃ kparanↄ, sa'orinↄ kũ Levinↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kũ ò bò zĩ̀zↄkɛn ò sù Yurusalɛmunↄ ń pínki. Ò Levi kũ ò kà wɛ̃̀ baro ke kũ ò dealanↄ dìtɛ Dikiri kpɛ́ zĩ pì gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ ũ.
Yesua kũ a burinↄ nàkↄ̃a kũ Kadamiɛlio kũ a nɛ́ Odavia burinↄ, akũ ò gↄ̃̀ zĩ pì gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ ũ kũ Enadadao kũ a burinↄ. Levinↄmɛ ń pínki.
Kũ Dikiri kpɛ́borinↄ tɛn kpɛ́ pì ɛ̃ pɛ́tɛ, sa'orinↄn zɛzɛ gwe sa'ori pↄ́kasanↄ dadana, ò ń kãkãkinↄ kũkũna, akũsↄ̃ Levi nɛ́ Asafa burinↄn kú gwe dↄ kũ sɛ̃̀gɛ̃nↄ de ò Dikiri táaki lɛ́o lákũ Isarailanↄ kína Dauda dìtɛ yã nà.
Ò lɛ̀ sì ò Dikiri táaki lɛ̀ ò a sáabu kpà ò pì: Dikiri mana, a gbɛ̃kɛ kɛna ókↄ̃nↄ Isarailanↄnɛ lakana vĩro. Akũ gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki wiki gbãna lɛ̀ ò Dikiri táaki lɛ̀, kũ ò Dikiri kpɛ́ ɛ̃ pɛ̀tɛ yãi.
Ama sa'ori paride kũ Levinↄ kũ bede kũ ò zĩ kũ̀ ò wɛ́ sì kpɛ́ káakulɛnↄ, kũ ò kpɛ́ pì ɛ̃bonaa è, ò wɛ̃nda ↄ́ↄ dↄ̀. Gbɛ̃ kparanↄ sↄ̃, òtɛn pↄnna wiki lɛ́ dasi.
Gbɛ̃ke dí pↄnna wiki dↄ̃kↄ̃nɛ kũ wɛ̃nda ↄ́ kũ òtɛn dↄo doro, kũ baadi tɛn wiki gbãna lɛ́ yãi, akũsↄ̃ ò wiki pìi mà zã̀.
Kũ Yudanↄ kũ Biliaminunↄ ibɛrɛnↄ mà zĩ̀zↄ kũ ò sùnↄ tɛn kpɛ́ bo Dikiri Isarailanↄ Ludanɛ,
ò sù ò Zɛrubabɛli kũ ↄmbedenↄ lè ò pìńnɛ: À tó ò kpɛ́ bo kãáo, zaakũ odì á Luda ki wɛtɛ lán á bàmɛ se. Odìgↄ̃ a gbagbamɛ zaa gↄrↄ kũ Asirianↄ kína Esaradↄ̃ sù kũoo la.
Akũ Zɛrubabɛli kũ Yesuao kũ Isaraila bede kparanↄ pìńnɛ: Ó Luda kpɛ́bona de á yã ũro. Óni ó pↄ́ bo Dikiri Isarailanↄ Ludanɛ ó tɛ̃nɛ lákũ Pɛsianↄ kína Sirusu dìtɛwɛrɛ nà.
Akũ bùsupidenↄ tɛn wɛtɛ ò Yudanↄ nɛ̀sɛɛ yaka, òtɛn wɛ́ tãḿma de òsun kpɛ́ pì boro yãi.
Ò fĩna bò kína lɛ́dammarinↄnɛ zaa Sirusu gↄrↄ ari à gɛ̀ɛ pɛ́ Pɛsianↄ kína Dariusu kíblegↄrↄa, akũ ò gìńnɛ kũ yã kũ òtɛn pɛ́aao.
Ò takada kɛ̃̀ Asuerunɛ kũ à kí blè gↄ̃nↄ ò gbɛ̃ kũ ò kú Yurusalɛmunↄ kũ Yudanↄ bùsuuo pínki káara kɛ̀ a kia.
Bisilamu kũ Mitirɛdao kũ Tabɛlio kũ ń gbɛ̃ kparanↄ takada kɛ̃̀ Pɛsianↄ kína Atasɛsɛnɛ dↄ a kíblegↄrↄa. Ò kɛ̃̀nɛ kũ Siria yão, akũ ò bↄ̀kↄtɛnɛ.
Bùsu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ Reumu kũ a takadakɛ̃ri Simisaio takada kɛ̃̀ kína Atasɛsɛnɛ Yurusalɛmu yã musu dↄ ò pì:
Bùsu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ Reumu kũ a takadakɛ̃ri Simisaio kũ ń gbɛ̃ kpara yãkpatɛkɛrinↄ kũ gbãnadenↄ kũ Tiripↄlidenↄ kũ Pɛsianↄ kũ Ɛrɛkidenↄ kũ Babilↄnudenↄ kũ Susade kũ ò bↄ̀tɛ Elamu bùsuu gũnnↄ
kũ gbɛ̃ kũ kína zↄ̃kↄ̃ bɛ̀ɛrɛde Asubanipali ń bↄ́tɛ ń bùsun à ń vútɛvutɛ Samaria wɛ̃tɛn kũ Yuflati bara la gu pãndenↄ,
ókↄ̃nↄ Yuflati baraladenↄ n zↄ̀blerinↄ mɛ́ o takada dí kɛ̃̀nnɛ kína Atasɛsɛ, o pì:
Kína, ǹgↄ̃ dↄ̃ kũ Yuda kũ ò bò n kĩnaa ò sù lanↄ gɛ̀ɛ òtɛn Yurusalɛmu wɛ̃tɛ vãni pãsĩ pì kátɛ, ò ɛ̀ra òtɛni a bĩni bo dↄ, òtɛni a bɛzĩ futɛ.
Kína, ǹgↄ̃ dↄ̃ dↄ, tó ò ɛ̀ra ò wɛ̃tɛ pìi kàtɛ ò a bĩni bò ò làka, oni táfe bonnɛ doro ke ɛtɛ'ↄgↄ ke bɛ'ↄgↄ, n ↄgↄ kũ ndì sí ni lago.
Tera lán dí bà kína, lákũ n bɛ wisin odì ble nà, adi kũ ò n kpɛ ero. A yã mɛ́ à tò o takada díkĩna kpã̀zãnnɛ de ò yã pì onnɛ.
Ǹ wɛtɛ n dizinↄ takadanↄ gũn ǹ gwa, ĩni dↄ̃ dera wɛ̃tɛpidenↄ sã gbãna, ò wari dↄ̀ kínanↄa kũ bùsu gbãnadenↄ. Zaa zĩ wɛ̃tɛpidenↄ yãkete kɛ̀ zↄ̃kↄ̃. Abire yãin ò wɛ̃tɛ pìi gbòro.
Kína, ótɛn onnɛ, tó ò ɛ̀ra ò wɛ̃tɛ pìi fùtɛ ò ɛ̀ra ò a bĩni bò ò làka, ĩnigↄ̃ pↄ́ke vĩ Yuflati bara la doro.
Abire gbɛra kína takada kpã̀zãńnɛ à pì: Bùsu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ Reumu kũ a takadakɛ̃ri Simisaio kũ á gbɛ̃ kpara kũ ò kú Samaria kũ Yuflati bara direnↄ, ma fↄ kpàáwa.
Takada kũ a kpã̀zãmɛnɛ, ò a kyó kɛ̀ ò bↄ̀kↄtɛmɛnɛ.
Ma pì ò wɛtɛ takada zĩnↄ gũn, akũ ò lè yãpuramɛ, wɛ̃tɛpidenↄ dìgↄ̃ bo kínanↄ kpɛmɛ. Zaa zĩ yãketedenↄmɛ.
Kína zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ kpata blè Yurusalɛmu gwe, ò gbãna blè Yuflati baradiredenↄa ń pínki, akũ ò táfe bòńnɛ kũ ɛtɛ'ↄgↄo kũ bɛ'ↄgↄo.
À yã ditɛ gbɛ̃ pìnↄnɛ ò kámma bo sà. Òsun ɛra ò wɛ̃tɛ pì futɛro ari mà ń gba lɛ́.
À laakari kɛ! Àsun nigãzĩ kpá yã pìiaro, de yã vãni pì sún ↄ tá à ó ásaru kɛro yãi.
Kũ ò kína Atasɛsɛ takada pì kyó kɛ̀ ò bↄ̀kↄtɛ Reumunɛ kũ a takadakɛ̃ri Simisaio kũ ń gbɛ̃ kparanↄ, akũ ò fùtɛ ò gɛ̀ɛ ò Yudanↄ lè Yurusalɛmu gↄ̃̀nↄ. Ò gìńnɛ pãsĩpãsĩ ò pì ò kámma bo.
Lɛn ò kámma bò lɛ kũ Luda kpɛ́ zĩ kũ òtɛn kɛ Yurusalɛmuo ari Pɛsianↄ kína Dariusu kíblena wɛ̃̀ plade gũn.
Annabi Agai kũ annabi Zakari, Ido nɛ́o annabikɛyã ò Yuda kũ ò kú Yurusalɛmunↄ kũ Yudanↄ bùsuuo kũ Isarailanↄ Luda tↄ́o.
Akũ Sealatiɛli nɛ́ Zɛrubabɛli kũ Yozadaka nɛ́ Yesuao fùtɛ ò nà Luda kpɛ́ bonaaa Yurusalɛmu. Luda annabii pìnↄn kú kũńwo òtɛn kpáńyĩ.
Gwe gↄ̃̀nↄ Yuflati bara la don'arɛde Tatenai kũ Seta Bozɛnaio kũ ń gbɛ̃nↄ sù ò ń lé ò ń lá ò pì: Dí mɛ́ à á gbá zɛ́ à kpɛ́ dí kɛkɛ à boo?
Ò gbɛ̃ kũ òtɛn kpɛ́ pì bonↄ tↄ́ gbɛ̀ka dↄ.
Ama Luda wɛ́ tɛ́ Yuda gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄ pìnↄi, akũ odi ońnɛ ò kámma boro. Ò pì oni lɛ́gbãzã kɛ Dariusunɛ gĩa, oni takada kũ ani kɛ̃ a yã musu le.
Yuflati bara la don'arɛde Tatenai kũ Seta Bozɛnaio kũ ń gbɛ̃ Pɛsianↄ takada kɛ̃̀, akũ ò kpã̀zã kína Dariusunɛ.
Lɛ́gbãzã kũ ò kɛ̀nɛɛn dí, ò pì: Kína Dariusu, o fↄ kpàmma manamana.
Kína, ǹgↄ̃ dↄ̃ kũ o gɛ Yudanↄ bùsun ari Luda kũ à zↄ̃kↄ̃ kpɛ́n. Òtɛn kpɛ́ pì bo kũ gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃nↄ òtɛn lí lɛ̀kɛtɛ kpátɛ kpɛ́ pìi gbĩ̀nↄn. Òtɛn zĩ pì kɛ kũ laakariio àtɛn táa o.
O yã làla ń gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄa o pì: Dí mɛ́ à á gbá zɛ́ à kpɛ́ díkĩna kɛkɛ à boo?
O ń tↄ́ gbɛ̀ka de ò le ò onnɛ, akũ o ń don'arɛde pìnↄ tↄ́ dà takadan.
Lákũ ò yã wèwá nàn dí. Ò pì, musu kũ zĩtɛo Luda zↄ̀blerinↄmɛ ń ũ. Kpɛ́ kũ ò bò yã à wɛ̃̀ɛ kɛ̀ ò kɛ̀kɛ òtɛn bo dↄ. Isarailanↄ kína zↄ̃kↄ̃ mɛ́ à bò yã.
Ò pì ń dizinↄ Luda Musude pↄ fɛ̃̀, akũ à ń ná Kaladia buri Nɛbukanɛza, Babilↄnu kínanɛ a ↄĩ, akũ à kpɛ́ pìi wìwi à gbɛ̃ pìnↄ sɛ̀tɛ à tà kũńwo Babilↄnu.
Ama Babilↄnu kína Sirusu kíblena wɛ̃̀ káaku gũn à yã dìtɛ à pì ò ɛra ò Luda kpɛ́ pì bo dↄ.
Bee wura kũ andurufu pↄ́ kũ Nɛbukanɛza sɛ̀tɛ Luda kpɛ́n zaa Yurusalɛmu à kàtɛ a tãna kpɛ́n Babilↄnunↄ, kína Sirusu bↄ̀tɛ à kpà Sesebaza kũ à dìtɛ bùsu don'arɛde ũa.
À pìnɛ à pↄ́ pìnↄ sɛ́ à gɛ́ à kátɛ Luda kpɛ́n zaa Yurusalɛmu, tó ò kpɛ́ pìi kɛ̀kɛ ò bò.
Akũ Sesebaza sù Luda kpɛ́ ɛ̃ pɛ̀tɛ. Òtɛn kpɛ́ pì bo zaa gↄrↄ kũ̀a ari kũ a gbãrao, ama adi láka kↄ̀ro.
Kína, tó à kɛ̀nnɛ mana, ǹ takada wɛtɛ kínanↄ takadakatɛkia zaa Babilↄnu ǹ gwa tó kína Sirusu yã dìtɛ ò Luda kpɛ́ bo Yurusalɛmu. Lákũ n è nà, ǹ lɛ́gbãzã kɛwɛrɛ.
Kína Dariusu yã dìtɛ, akũ ò takada pìi wɛ̀tɛ takada kũ ò kàtɛ Babilↄnu takadakatɛkianↄ tɛ́.
Akũ ò bò takada kokonaaa Ɛkɛbatana wɛ̃tɛ bĩniden Midiã bùsun. Yã díkĩna kú a gũn de òsun sãsãiro yãi:
Kína Sirusu kíblena wɛ̃̀ káaku gũn à yã dìtɛ Luda kpɛ́ kũ à kú Yurusalɛmu musu, à pì ò kpɛ́ pì bo sa'oki ũ. Ò a ɛ̃ kpátɛ, kpɛ́ pì lei ká gã̀sãkuru baaakↄ̃, a yàasa gã̀sãkuru baaakↄ̃.
Ò gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃ mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ didikↄ̃a, lí lɛ̀kɛtɛ mɛ̀n do, gbɛ̀ gbɛ̃̀ntɛ̃ aakↄ̃, lí lɛ̀kɛtɛ mɛ̀n do. Oni a fĩna bo kũ kínabɛ ↄgↄo.
Wura kũ andurufu pↄ́ kũ Nɛbukanɛza sɛ̀tɛ Luda kpɛ́n Yurusalɛmu à sùo Babilↄnunↄ sↄ̃, oni ɛra ò gɛ́ kátɛ a gbɛ̀n Luda kpɛ́n Yurusalɛmu.
Akũ kína Dariusu lɛ́gbãzã kɛ̀ à pì: Tera sà Yuflati bara dire gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ Tatenai kũ Seta Bozɛnaio kũ á gbɛ̃ kũ ò kú Yuflati bara gwenↄ, à á zĩda gá gwe.
À Luda kpɛ́ bòrinↄ tó tɛɛnɛ. À tó Yuda don'arɛdenↄ kũ ń gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ Luda kpɛ́ pì kɛkɛ ò bo.
Matɛn yã kũ àsun kɛ Yuda gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄnɛ Luda kpɛ́ pì bonaa musu ditɛárɛ. À pↄ́ kũ ò yeinↄ sɛ́tɛ ma aruzɛkɛkatɛkin gwe kũ Yuflati bara dire táfe kũ ò bòo, à kpáḿma pínki de zĩ pì sún zɛ doro yãi.
Pↄ́ kũ ò yei pínki, zùsaa, sãkaroo, sãnɛ bↄ̀rↄ kũ òdi Luda Musude gbagbaoo, pↄ́blewɛ, wisi, sèwɛ̃, nísi, àgↄ̃ kpá Yurusalɛmu sa'orinↄa lákũ gu dìgↄ̃ dↄ nà lákũ ò gbɛ̀ka nà funaa sari,
de ò le ò sa kũ à kà Luda Musudegu oa, ò wɛ́ kɛamɛnɛ kũ ma nɛ́gↄ̃gbɛ̃nↄ.
Tó gbɛ̃ke yã kũ ma dìtɛ díkĩna lìtɛ, oni ade kpɛ́ lí wo ò a páa ò pɛ́tɛ ò a bɛ kɛ tubura ũ.
Tó kína ke buri ke tɛn wɛtɛ yã pì litɛ ke àtɛn wɛtɛ Luda kpɛ́ kũ à kú Yurusalɛmu pì wí, Luda kũ à tò a tↄ́ kúaa pì a kakatɛ. Makũ Dariusu makũ mɛ́ ma yã pìi dìtɛ. Ò zĩ kɛa manamana.
Kũ kína Dariusu lɛ́gbãzã pìi kɛ̀ lɛ, Yuflati bara la gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ Tatenai kũ Seta Bozɛnaio kũ ń gbɛ̃nↄ yã pìi kɛ̀ kũ laakariio.
Akũ Yuda gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ kpɛ́bona tɛn gɛ́ arɛ lákũ annabi Agai kũ annabi Zakari Ido nɛ́o annabikɛyã ò nà. Ò kpɛ́ pìi bò ò làka lákũ Isarailanↄ Luda ò nà, lákũ Pɛsianↄ kínanↄ Sirusu kũ Dariusuo kũ Atasɛsɛo a yã dìtɛ nà.
Ò Luda kpɛ́ làka Ada gↄrↄ aakↄ̃de zĩ kína Dariusu kíblena wɛ̃̀ suddode gũn.
Akũ Isarailanↄ Luda kpɛ́ sa kɛ̀ kũ pↄnnao, sa'orinↄ kũ Levinↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kpara kũ ò sù kũ zĩ̀zↄkɛonↄ ń pínki.
Luda kpɛ́ sakɛnaa pì yãi ò sa ò kũ zùsanↄ mɛ̀n basↄↄro kũ sãkaronↄ mɛ̀n wàa do kũ sãnɛ bↄ̀rↄnↄ mɛ̀n wàa pla, akũ ò sa ò kũ blèkofĩninↄ mɛ̀n kuri awɛɛpla Isaraila dasi lɛ́n ń pínki durunna kútɛkɛbↄ ũ.
Ò sa'orinↄ dìtɛditɛ gã̀ kũ gã̀ao, akũ ò Levinↄ dìtɛditɛ gã̀ kũ gã̀ao dↄ de ò zĩ kɛ Ludanɛ Yurusalɛmu lákũ à kú Musa takada gũn nà.
Mↄ káaku gↄrↄ kuri awɛɛsiikↄ̃de zĩ, zĩ̀zↄ kũ ò sùu pìnↄ Vĩnla dikpɛ kɛ̀.
Sa'orinↄ kũ Levinↄ gbã̀ bò ń zĩdanɛ ò gↄ̃̀ gbãsĩ sari ń pínki, akũ ò Vĩnla sã kùtu kpàkpa zĩ̀zↄ kũ ò sùnↄnɛ kũ ń sa'ori dakenↄ pↄ́o kũ ń zĩda pↄ́o.
Isaraila zĩ̀zↄ kũ ò sùu pìnↄ mɛ́ ò sò kũ gbɛ̃ kũ ò ń zĩda kɛ̃̀ buri pãndenↄ yãbɛ̃̀nɛkɛnanↄa òtɛn Dikiri Isarailanↄ Luda ki wɛtɛnↄ.
Akũ ò Burodi Futɛnasari dikpɛ kɛ̀ kũ pↄnnao ari gↄrↄ suppla. Dikiri tò ń pↄ kɛ̀ nna, zaakũ à tò Asirianↄ kína nɛ̀sɛɛ lìtɛ ń yã musu, akũ à kpàńyĩ a kpɛ́ bona zĩ gũn, Isarailanↄ Luda pìi.
Yã birenↄ gbɛra Pɛsianↄ kína Atasɛsɛ kíblegↄrↄa Ɛzɛra bò Babilↄnu à sù. Sa'oriki zↄ̃kↄ̃ Haruna mɛ́ à Ɛlɛaza ì, Ɛlɛaza Finɛasi ì, Finɛasi Abisua ì, Abisua Buki ì, Buki Uzi ì, Uzi Zeraya ì, Zeraya Mɛrayo ì, Mɛrayo Azaria ì, Azaria Amaria ì, Amaria Aitubu ì, Aitubu Zadↄki ì, Zadↄki Salumu ì, Salumu Ilikia ì, Ilikia Azaria ì, Azaria Seraya ì, akũ Seraya Ɛzɛra pìi ì.
