Gbɛ̃kenↄ kun òdi ń zĩda bi, òdi gbɛ̃nↄ gwa ò mì zu.
Gbɛ̃kenↄ kun ń saka de lán fɛ̃nɛda bà, ń saka sↄ̃ntɛnↄn de lán fɛ̃nɛnↄ bà, òdi andunia takasidenↄ kũ bisãsiri wɛ̃ndadenↄ kɛo yákiyaki.
Toro nɛ́nↄgbɛ̃nↄ vĩ mɛ̀n pla, òdi pi: Ǹ ó gba, ǹ ó gba. Pↄ́ mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ kun kũ òdi kãro, à kà siikↄ̃ se, òdi pi pↄ́ mↄ̀ḿmaro:
Gyãwãn kũ para nɛ́'isↄↄo kũ zĩtɛ kũ í dì mↄ́aroo kũ tɛ́ kũ àdi pi a kãroo.
Wɛ́ kũ nɛ́ dì a de foboo akũsↄ̃ àdi a da gya boo, swawɛɛ kãakãannanↄ ni a wɛ́ pì bo, yumburukunↄ ni a gɛ̀ ble.
Yã mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ kun kũ ò de ma dↄ̃nala, à kà mɛ̀n siikↄ̃ se má ń mì dↄ̃ro:
Zɛ́ kũ vãu dìgↄ̃ tɛ́o musu, zɛ́ kũ mlɛ̃̀ɛ dìgↄ̃ táa on gbɛ̀ sàraaa, zɛ́ kũ gó'itɛ dìgↄ̃ tɛ́n ísira dagura kũ zɛ́ kũ gↄ̃gbɛ̃ dìgↄ̃ ye nↄkpareiio.
Nↄ zinakɛri yãkɛnaan dí: Àdi pↄ́ ble à ↄ má a lɛ́a à pi ádi yã vãni kɛro.
Yã mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ mɛ́ àdi tó zĩtɛ lukaluka, à kà siikↄ̃ se, zĩtɛ ni yã pìnↄ fↄ̃ro:
Zↄ̀ kũ à kpata blè, yↄ̃nkↄ kũ à pↄ́ blè à kã̀,
nↄgbɛ̃ kũ ò zã̀agu akũ à zã kɛ̀ kũ zↄ̀ nↄkpare kũ à gↄ̃̀ a dikiri zã nↄ ũo.
Pↄ́ fítinↄn kú zĩtɛ mɛ̀n siikↄ̃, ama ò ↄ̃ndↄ̃ vĩ manamana:
Babarenↄn kun pↄ́ gbãnanↄ ũro, ama òdi pↄ́ble zàna kɛ sakaremɛ.
Gbɛ̀'ɛ̃nɛnↄn kun pↄ́ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ ũro, ama òdi bɛ bo gbɛ̀ daguramɛ.
Kwanↄ dìgↄ̃ kína vĩro, ama òdi bↄtɛ ò zɛzɛ gã̀ kũ gã̀aomɛ.
Ĩni fↄ̃ ǹ zukpata kũ kũ ↄo, ama àdi gɛ́ na kína kpɛ́ sakaaimɛ.
Pↄ́ mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ kun kũ ń tɛna mana, à kà siikↄ̃ se, ń táa'ona nna:
Músu kũ à de gↄ̃sa ũ nↄ̀bↄnↄ tɛ́, àdi boru kpɛ pↄ́kenɛro
kũ kosa kũ à tuke bòoo kũ blèkofĩniio kũ kína kũ à kú a zĩ̀karinↄ arɛo.
Tó n yↄ̃nkↄyã kɛ̀ zĩdabinaa gũn ke tó n yã vãni laasun lɛ̀, ǹ ↄ kú n lɛ́a,
zaakũ lákũ òdi vĩ fakam pá à nísi bo nà, ke lákũ òdi yĩ kũ ò fĩ à aru bo nà, lɛn gbɛ̃ pↄfɛ̃naa dì fìti da lɛ.
Kína Lemuɛli da lɛ́ dàa à pì:
Deramɛɛ, ma nɛ́? Bↄ́mɛɛ, ma nɛ́'ina? À kɛ̀ deramɛɛ, nɛ́ kũ ma a lɛ́ sɛ̀ Ludanɛ?
Ǹsun n wó dɛ nↄgbɛ̃nↄ kĩnaaro, ǹsun zɛ́ kũ àdi kínanↄ yaka sɛ́ro.
Lemuɛli, sèwɛ̃ de kínanↄ pↄ́mina ũro, í gbãna de kpatablerinↄ pↄ́mina ũro,
de òsun mi, dokayãnↄ sãńgu, ò yã gↄ̃gↄ̃ takasidenↄnɛ faya sariro yãi.
À í gbãna kpá gbɛ̃ kũ òtɛn ganↄa, à sèwɛ̃ kpá pↄsiradenↄa
ò mi, ń takasi sãńgu, ń yã'ũmmana súngↄ̃ dↄńgu doro.
Ǹ yã o gbɛ̃ kũ oni fↄ̃ ò yã oronↄ gɛ̃nɛ ũ, ǹ yã sí gbɛ̃ kũ ò kpanyĩri vĩronↄnɛ.
Ǹsungↄ̃ yĩtɛnaro, ǹ yãkpatɛ kɛ a zɛ́a. Ǹ takasidenↄ kũ wɛ̃ndadenↄ yã nna kpáḿma.
Dí mɛ́ ani nↄ laakaride lee? A bɛ̀ɛrɛ vĩ de gbɛ̀ bɛ̀ɛrɛdenↄla zã̀.
A zã dìgↄ̃ a náani kɛ kũ nɛ̀sɛdoomɛ, pↄ́ mana ke dì kĩaaro.
Yã manan àdigↄ̃ kɛ a zãnɛ, adi kɛ yã vãninlo ari a wɛ̃̀ndi lɛ́n.
Àdi sãkã kũ bàwisio wɛtɛ à a ↄzĩ kɛ kũ pↄnnao.
Àdi gɛ́ pↄ́ble sɛ́ zã̀ lán gó'itɛ lagatarii bà.
Àdi futɛ gukɛ̃kↄ̃ana à pↄ́ble kɛ a ↄndenↄnɛ, àdi zĩ kpaatɛtɛ a nↄkparenↄnɛ.
Àdi zĩtɛ mana wɛtɛ à lú, àdi geepi línↄ pɛ́pɛn kũ a zĩda bↄ̀kↄↄ ↄgↄo.
Àdi gbãna dↄ a pia asa ũ à gã̀sãwa bobo a zĩa.
Àdigↄ̃ dↄ̃ kũ áni ɛtɛ le, a fitilaa dìgↄ̃ nana gwãanimɛ.
A ↄ dìgↄ̃ porona àgↄ̃ buutãbↄ kũna, àdigↄ̃ kɛkɛ ũ wã kũ a ↄnɛo.
Àdi ↄ poro wɛ̃ndadenↄnɛ, àdi ↄ lika takasidenↄi.
Àdi ĩampurugↄrↄ vĩna kɛ a bedenↄ yã musuro, zaakũ a ↄndenↄ dì uta didikↄ̃amɛ.
Àdi wutɛbↄ bizanↄ tã a zĩda, a pↄ́kasanↄ bi táaru biza kũ biza gaaruradenↄmɛ.
A zã dì tↄ́ bo fàaibokia, àdigↄ̃ vutɛna gu dokↄ̃nↄ kũ bùsu gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ.
Nↄgbɛ̃ pìi dì pↄ́dangãn kɛ àgↄ̃ yía, àdi gère tã à kpá a lagatarinↄa.
Àdigↄ̃ gbãna kũ gakurio dana pↄ́kasa ũ, a kunna zia yã dì swɛ̃̀ kɛ̃aguro.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃yã dìgↄ̃ da a lɛ́n, àdi yã dańnɛ kũ yenyĩo.
A wɛ́ dìgↄ̃ pɛ́ a ↄn yãkɛnaai, àdi pↄ́ ble ma'ãnlo.
A nɛ́nↄ dì futɛ ò sa mana onɛ, a zã dì a sáabu kpá à pi:
Nↄgbɛ̃nↄ kokari vĩ dasi fá, ama mↄkↄ̃n mɛ́ ń deńla ń pínki.
Kakana mana dìgↄ̃ náani vĩro, nↄmanakɛ dì gɛ̃ zɛ́lamɛ, nↄgbɛ̃ kũ à Dikiri vĩna vĩn òdi sáabu kpá.
Ǹ zĩ kũ à kɛ̀ àre kpáa, ǹ a tↄ́ kpá a yãkɛnaa musu batun.
Laasunde Dauda nɛ́, Yurusalɛmu kína yãn dí.
Makũ laasunde ma pì: Yã pã búgubugu, yã pã búgubugu, a pínki pãmɛ.
Bↄ́ àreen bisãsiri dì le andunia gũn wari kũ àtɛn kɛ a zĩ sĩnda pínki gũnwaa?
Kpàinↄ dì gɛ̃tɛ, wurenↄ dì su, ama andunia dìgↄ̃ kun gↄrↄ sĩnda pínkimɛ.
Ifãntɛ̃ dì bo àdi gɛ̃, àdi wã à ɛra à gɛ́ gu kũ àdi bon.
Ĩa dì káka gɛ̀nↄmidↄki kpa, àdi ɛra à su gugbãnduru kpa, àdigↄ̃ likara àgↄ̃ gɛ́ àgↄ̃ su.
Swa sĩnda pínki í dìgↄ̃ ká ísira gũmmɛ, ama ísira dì paro, í pìnↄ dì ɛra ò su swa pìnↄ mìiamɛ.
Pↄ́ sĩnda pínki dì ń kpasa, kpasa pì yã gɛ̃̀ onala. Gugwana dì mↄ́ wɛ́aro, yãmana dì sã paro.
Yã kũ à kun yã mɛ́ ani ɛra àgↄ̃ kun dↄ, yã kũ ò kɛ̀ yãn oni ɛra ò kɛ dↄ. A dufu ke kú andunia gũnlo.
Pↄ́ke kun kũ oni pi: Ǹ pↄ́ dufu ke gwa yá? Oi! À gĩnakɛ à kun ó ã zaa zĩ kↄ̀.
Gbɛ̃ káakunↄ yã dìgↄ̃ dↄ gbɛ̃ken doro. Bee gbɛ̃ kũ onigↄ̃ kun zianↄ, ń yã ni dↄ gbɛ̃ken ziakpɛzĩro.
Makũ laasunde ma kí blè Isarailanↄa Yurusalɛmu.
Ma mɛ̀ɛ kpà yã kũ òtɛn kɛ andunia gũn pínki tàasikanaaa, ma gwàgwa ↄ̃ndↄ̃'ↄ̃ndↄ̃ ma è Luda zĩ pãsĩ dà bisãsirinↄnɛ ò kɛ.
Ma yã kũ òtɛn kɛ andunia gũn è pínki, a pínki bi pãmɛ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Pↄ́ fĩkarana porona vĩro, òdi le ò pↄ́ kũ à kunlo naroro.
Akũ ma ò ma swɛ̃̀ɛ gũn ma pì: Ǹ gwa! Ma ↄ̃ndↄ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ de gbɛ̃ kũ ò kpata blè Yurusalɛmu ma ãnↄla ń pínki, ma ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kũ ma dↄ̃naao wɛ́ bò manamana.
Akũ ma mɛ̀ɛ kpà ↄ̃ndↄ̃ asiri dↄ̃naaa de mà yↄ̃nkↄkɛ kũ mìsariyão asiri dↄ̃, akũ ma è abirekũ bi pɛna gukoriamɛ dↄ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄ dì su kũ nɛ̀sɛyakana zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄomɛ, òdi yã'ũmmana le ń dↄ̃na lɛ́mmɛ.
Ma ò ma zĩdanɛ: Ǹ futɛ ǹ pↄnnakɛna yↄ̃ ǹ gwa ǹ nnamana dↄ̃, akũ ma è abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Ma è kũ yáadↄna bi yↄ̃nkↄyãmɛ. Pↄnnakɛna sↄ̃, bↄ́n òdi leaa?
Ma pↄnna wɛ̀tɛ wɛ̃minaa gũn ma ↄ lìka yↄ̃nkↄyãi, ama ma swɛ̃̀ tɛn domɛnɛ arɛ ↄ̃ndↄ̃ gũn de mà dↄ̃ yã kũ à mana bisãsirinɛ à kɛ andunia gũn a wɛ̃̀ndi zaka lɛ́n.
Ma zĩ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ ↄ kpà, ma kpɛ́nↄ bò ma zĩdanɛ ma geepi línↄ pɛ̀pɛ dasidasi.
Ma karanↄ kpàkpa ma swa dàkonↄ kɛ̀kɛ ma lí kũ òdi a nɛ́ ble buri sĩnda pínki bàban.
Ma íkakinↄ kɛ̀kɛ ògↄ̃ mↄtↄ pisi líkpɛ pìnↄa.
Ma zↄ̀nↄ lùlu gↄ̃gbɛ̃nↄ kũ nↄgbɛ̃nↄ, ò a kenↄ ì ma bɛa. Má zùnↄ kũ pↄ́kãde ketenↄ vĩ dasidasi de gbɛ̃ kũ ò kú Yurusalɛmu ma ãnↄla ń pínki.
Ma andurufu kũ wuraao kàkaramai kũ kínanↄ aruzɛkɛnↄ kũ ń bùsu pↄ́nↄ. Ma lɛ̀sirinↄ sɛ̀ gↄ̃gbɛ̃ kũ nↄgbɛ̃nↄ, ma nↄgbɛ̃ kũ gↄ̃gbɛ̃ dì lukańyĩnↄ sɛ̀ dasi.
Ma tↄ́ bò, má zↄ̃kↄ̃ de gbɛ̃ kũ ò kú Yurusalɛmu ma ãnↄla ń pínki, akũ má kpɛ́ ↄ̃ndↄ̃ vĩ a pínki gũn.
Mádi gí ma zĩdanɛ kũ pↄ́ kũ à ma wɛ́ blèeoro. Mádi pↄ́ kũ à ma pↄ gbà ke tóro. Ma pↄ kɛ̀ nna ma zĩkɛna sĩnda pínkia, àkũmɛ ma ísimmawarana pínki láada ũ.
Kũ ma wɛ́ pɛ̀ yã kũ ma kɛ̀nↄi pínki kũ ísimma kũ ma wàraao a musu, ma è a pínki bi pãmɛ, pɛna gukoriamɛ, à àre vĩ andunia gũnlo.
Akũ ma laasun lɛ̀ gɛna ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kũ yↄ̃nkↄkɛo kũ mìsarikɛo kpa. Yã kũ ò kɛ̀ zaa zĩ baasiro, a kpaten kína gɛ̃nɛ ni kɛ dↄↄ?
Ma è ↄ̃ndↄ̃ àre vĩ de yↄ̃nkↄkɛla lákũ gupura dìgↄ̃ àre vĩ de gusirala nà.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri wɛ́ dìgↄ̃ kú a arɛ, yↄ̃nkↄ dìgↄ̃ kure gusiran. Akũ ma è gó dokↄ̃nↄ mɛ́ ani ń bikũ ń pínki.
Akũ ma laasun lɛ̀ ma swɛ̃̀n ma pì, zaakũ gó dokↄ̃nↄ mɛ́ ani ó bikũ kũ yↄ̃nkↄnↄ nà, bↄ́ àreen mani le ma ↄ̃ndↄ̃aa? Akũ ma pì, abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri yã ni dↄ gbɛ̃ken de yↄ̃nkↄlaro, ń pínki ń yã ni sã gbɛ̃nↄn zia. Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri dì ga lán yↄ̃nkↄ bàmɛ.
Akũ ma a kunna gya bò, zaakũ yã kũ òtɛn kɛ andunia gũn pínki dì kɛmɛnɛ nɛ̀sɛyakayã ũmɛ. A pínki bi pãmɛ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Akũ ma zĩ kũ ma kɛ̀ andunia gũnnↄ gya bò pínki kũ mani tó ma gɛ̃nɛnɛ yãi.
Dí mɛ́ à dↄ̃ tó ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri ke yↄ̃nkↄn a ũu? Bee kũ abireo zĩ kũ ma kɛ̀ andunia gũn kũ ↄ̃ndↄ̃o ni gↄ̃nɛmɛ. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Akũ ma pↄ yàka ísimma kũ ma wàra andunia gũn pínki yã musu.
Zaakũ gbɛ̃ dì zĩ kɛ kũ ↄ̃ndↄ̃o kũ dↄ̃naao kũ gonikɛo, akũ àdi tó gbɛ̃ kũ adi a ke kɛronɛ à gↄ̃ a pↄ́ ũ. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, nɛ̀sɛyakayãmɛ manamana.
Bↄ́n gbɛ̃ dì le ísimma kũ à wàra andunia gũn kũ ↄsi kũ à kàao pínki yã musuu?
A kunna andunia gũn gↄrↄ sĩnda pínki a zĩ dìgↄ̃ sunɛ kũ yã'ũmmanaao kũ pↄyakanaaomɛ. Bee gwãani a laakarii dìgↄ̃ kpatɛnaro. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Yã kũ à mana kũ bisãsirio mɛ́ à de à pↄ́ ble à í mi à a zĩ sáabu kpá. Ma è abirekũ bò Luda ↄĩmɛ dↄ.
Luda kpányĩ sari dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à pↄ́ ble à pↄnna kɛɛ?
Luda dì ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kũ dↄ̃naao kũ pↄnnao kpá gbɛ̃ kũ à kɛ̀nɛɛa, ama àdi aruzɛkɛ kakarana zĩ da durunnakɛriinɛ de à sí à kpá gbɛ̃ kũ a kɛ̀nɛɛa. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Yã sĩnda pínki kũ a gↄrↄomɛ, bↄkↄtɛ sĩnda pínki kũ a kɛgↄrↄo.
Nɛ́'igↄrↄ kun, gagↄrↄ kun, pↄ́tↄ̃gↄrↄ kun, a wotogↄrↄ kun.
Dɛgↄrↄ kun, gbana aafia gↄrↄ kun, gborogↄrↄ kun, a dↄgↄrↄ kun.
Ɔ́ↄdↄgↄrↄ kun, yáadↄgↄrↄ kun, wɛ̃ndakɛgↄrↄ kun, kↄ̃kↄ̃'ogↄrↄ kun.
Gbɛ̀kↄtɛna gↄrↄ kun, gbɛ̀kakarana gↄrↄ kun, bã̀ndaragagↄrↄ kun, a kɛ̃na gↄrↄ kun.
Pↄ́wɛtɛna gↄrↄ kun, a ↄgbarɛna gↄrↄ kun, pↄ́kũna gↄrↄ kun, a gbarɛna gↄrↄ kun.
Pↄ́gaokɛ̃na gↄrↄ kun, a nabigↄrↄ kun, lɛ́kũna gↄrↄ kun, yã'ona gↄrↄ kun.
Yenyĩ gↄrↄ kun, zãngu gↄrↄ kun, zĩ̀kana gↄrↄ kun, vutɛna aafia gↄrↄ kun.
Bↄ́ àreen zĩkɛri dì le wari kũ à kɛ̀aa?
Ma zĩ kũ Luda dà bisãsirinↄnɛ ò kɛ è.
Luda tò pↄ́ sĩnda pínki mana a gↄrↄa. À kunna gↄrↄ sĩnda pínki laasun dà bisãsiri swɛ̃̀n dↄ, bee kũ abireo ani fↄ̃ à yã kũ Luda tɛn kɛ zaa andunia naana ari a lakanaa dↄ̀rↄ dↄ̃ro.
Má dↄ̃ kũ pↄ́ke mana kũ bisãsirio de kunna pↄnna gũn kũ manakɛnaao a wɛ̃̀ndi lɛ́nlaro.
Tó gbɛ̃ tɛn pↄ́ ble àtɛn í mi àtɛni a zĩ sĩnda pínki sáabu kpá, Luda mɛ́ à a gbà.
Má dↄ̃ kũ yã kũ Luda dì kɛ nigↄ̃ kun gↄrↄ sĩnda pínki. Oni fↄ̃ ò pↄ́ke karanlo, oni fↄ̃ ò pↄ́ke lagonlo. Luda kɛ̀ lɛ de ògↄ̃ a vĩna vĩ yãimɛ.
Pↄ́ kũ à kun tera gĩnakɛ à kun zaa zĩ kↄ̀. Pↄ́ kũ anigↄ̃ kun zia kun yã kↄ̀. Luda dì yã kũ ò kɛ̀ yãnↄ gbɛ̀ sísi.
Ma yã è andunia gũn dↄ, gu kũ à de yãzɛde gↄ̃ kún, yãzɛsaride mɛ́ à kú gwe, gu kũ à de yã mana gↄ̃ kun sↄ̃, yã vãni mɛ́ à kú gwe.
Ma ò ma swɛ̃̀ɛ gũn, Luda ni yãkpatɛ kɛ kũ gbɛ̃ mananↄ kũ gbɛ̃ vãninↄ ń pínki, zaakũ yãkɛna sĩnda pínki kũ a gↄrↄomɛ, bↄkↄtɛ sĩnda pínki kũ a kɛgↄrↄo.
Ma ò ma swɛ̃̀ɛ gũn dↄ, bisãsirinↄ sↄ̃, Luda dì ń yã wɛ́ wɛ̃ńnɛ de ò dↄ̃ ń zĩdaa kũ ò de lán nↄ̀bↄnↄ bàmɛ.
Bee zaa zĩ bisãsirinↄ kũ nↄ̀bↄnↄ, gó dokↄ̃nↄ mɛ́ àtɛni ń bikũ. Lákũ nↄ̀bↄↄ dì ga nà lɛn bisãsiri dì ga lɛ se, ń we'ona dokↄ̃nↄmɛ. Bisãsiri de nↄ̀bↄlaro, zaakũ a pínki pãmɛ.
Ń pínki dì gɛ́ gu dokↄ̃nↄmmɛ, zaakũ ń pínki bò bùsutiti gũmmɛ, ń pínki ni ɛra à gↄ̃ bùsutiti ũmɛ.
Tó bisãsiri nini dì tá musu, nↄ̀bↄ pↄ́ sↄ̃ àdi tá zĩtɛmɛ, dí mɛ́ à dↄ̃ↄ?
A yã mɛ́ à tò ma è yãke mana kũ bisãsirio de à a zĩ sáabu kpálaro, zaakũ a bakaan gwe. Dí mɛ́ ani tó à dↄ̃ yã kũ ani kɛ a gbɛraa?
Akũ ma gbãna kũ òtɛn mↄ gbɛ̃nↄnɛ andunia gũn yã gwà dↄ pínki. Ma gbɛ̃ kũ òtɛn wɛ́ tãḿmanↄ wɛ́tɛ̃ è, ò laakarikpatɛri vĩro. Ò laakarikpatɛri vĩro, zaakũ ń wɛ́tãmmarii pìnↄ mɛ́ ò gbãna vĩ.
Akũ ma pì, gbɛ̃ kũ ò gànↄn sáabu vĩ de gbɛ̃ kũ ò kunnↄla,
ama gbɛ̃ kũ odi i kↄ̀ro akũsↄ̃ adi wɛ́ kɛ pla kũ a vãni kũ òdi kɛ andunia gũnworo sã̀naḿma ń pínki.
Ma è kũ pↄ́ kũ à tò gbɛ̃ dì zĩ kɛ à mɛ̀ kpáa, de àgↄ̃ de a gbɛ̃dakela yãimɛ. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Yↄ̃nkↄ dì ↄ kpa a kùla ari à fɛ̃fɛ̃.
Kunna kũ pↄ́ okũ doo kũ laakarikpatɛnaao mana de kunna kũ pↄ́ okũ plao kũ ísimmawaranaao kũ pɛna gukoriaola.
Akũ ma ɛra ma yã pã pãnde è andunia gũn dↄ.
Gbɛ̃ke mɛ́ à kun à nɛ́ vĩro, à vĩ̀ni kesↄ̃ dakũna vĩro. A ísimma dì lákaro, bee kũ abireo a aruzɛkɛ dì mↄ́aro. Dí yãin àtɛn zĩ kɛɛ? Bↄ́yãi à nnamanaa tɛ̃̀ a zĩdanɛɛ? Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, yãbↄkↄtɛ pãsĩmɛ.
Pla de dola, zaakũ ń zĩkɛna àre nigↄ̃ mana.
Tó gbɛ̃ mɛ̀n do lɛ̀tɛ, a gbɛ̃ndo ni a sɛ́. Waiyoo gbɛ̃ mɛ̀n do! Tó à lɛ̀tɛ, anigↄ̃ sɛ̀ri vĩro.
Tó gbɛ̃nↄn planↄn wutɛna gu dokↄ̃nↄn, oni kↄ̃ puusu ma. Deran gbɛ̃ mɛ̀n do ni kɛ nà à bo ĩann?
Òdi gbãna mↄ gbɛ̃mɛndonɛ, gbɛ̃nↄn planↄ sↄ̃ òdi zɛ ò gímɛ. Bà nɛ́ mɛ̀n aakↄ̃ dì kɛ̃ likaro.
Kɛfɛnna ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri takaside mana de kína zĩkũna yↄ̃nkↄ kũ àdi lɛ́damma ma dorola,
bee tó kɛfɛnna pìi bò kpɛ́sira gũn, akũ à gↄ̃̀ kína ũ, ke tó ò a ì bùsuu pìn takaside ũ.
Ma è andunia tɛ̀ kína gɛ̃nɛ kũ à de kɛfɛnna ũ pìiimɛ.
Gↄrↄ birea à gbɛ̃nↄ dasi lɛ́ vĩro, à de ń don'arɛde ũ. Ama gbɛ̃ kũ ò sù zãnↄ dí a sáabu kpáro. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Tó n gɛ Luda ↄnn, ǹgↄ̃ kú kũ laakariio. Ǹ nai ǹ a yã ma mana de yↄ̃nkↄnↄ sa'ona gwela, zaakũ ń yãdↄ̃nasari mɛ́ àdi tó ò yã vãni kɛ.
N lɛ́ súngↄ̃ wãnaro, ǹsun wã ǹ yã o Ludanɛro. Lákũ à kú musu ń kú zĩtɛ nà, ǹsun yã o dasiro.
Lákũ yãbↄkↄtɛ dasi dì su kũ nana'onaao nà, lɛn yã dasi bↄtɛnaa dì su kũ yↄ̃nkↄyão lɛ.
Tó n lɛ́ kɛ̀ Ludaa, ǹsun a fĩnabona gↄrↄ gágaro. Ǹ a fĩna bo, zaakũ yↄ̃nkↄnↄ yã dì kánɛro.
Lɛ́kɛna Ludaa sari mana de n lɛ́ kɛ̀a papanaa sarila.
Ǹsun tó n lɛ́ n da yãnlo. Ǹsun o sa'oriinɛ n pì n sã lɛ́kɛna yãnlo. Ń ye Luda pↄ fɛ̃nyĩ n yã pì yãi à zĩ kũ ntɛn kɛ kakatɛn yá?
Nana dasi ona kũ yã dasi bↄtɛnaao dì su kũ yã pãomɛ. Abire yãi ǹgↄ̃ Luda vĩna vĩ.
Tó n è òtɛn gbãna mↄ takasidenↄnɛ gukea, òtɛn gíńnɛ kũ yãzɛdeo òtɛn yã gↄ̃gↄ̃ńnɛ a zɛ́aro, ǹsun tó yã pì bo n sarɛro, zaakũ bùsuu pì gbãnadenↄ tɛn wɛ́ dↄkↄ̃i, akũ ń gbɛ̃ zↄ̃kↄ̃nↄ tɛn wɛ́ dↄńyĩ dↄ.
Ń pínki dì bùsuu pì baka blemɛ, zaakũ kína mɛ́ à buranↄ vĩ.
Gbɛ̃ kũ à ye ↄgↄↄi dì kĩaa, gbɛ̃ kũ à ye aruzɛkɛii àree dì mↄ́aro. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Tó aruzɛkɛ tɛn kara, a blèrinↄ dìgↄ̃ karamɛ. Bↄ́ àreen à vĩ a dikiriinɛɛ? À wɛ́ pitia baasiro.
Zĩgbãnakɛrii dì i nna o à pↄ́ blè fítin yá ke dasin yá. Aruzɛkɛde sↄ̃ a pↄ́ dasi dì tó à i oro.
Ma nɛ̀sɛyakana yã pãsĩ è andunia gũn, gbɛ̃ke zɛ́ tàta a ↄgↄdalɛ à a zĩda karii bò,
akũ à bↄkↄtɛ vãni kɛ̀o, a aruzɛkɛ làka pínki. Kũ à nɛ́gↄ̃gbɛ̃ ì, à pↄ́ke vĩ kũ à tónɛro.
Bisãsiri dì bo a da gbɛrɛn pótompomɛ. Lákũ à sù nà lɛn àdi ɛra à tá lɛ dↄ, àdi a zĩ àre ke le à sɛ́ à na a ↄĩ à táoro.
Abirekũ bi nɛ̀sɛyakayã pãsĩmɛ dↄ. Lákũ gbɛ̃ sù nà lɛn àdi ɛra à tá lɛ dↄ. À ísimma wàra à pɛ̀ gukoria pã, bↄ́ mɛ́ à gↄ̃̀nɛɛ?
Abire gbɛra à a gↄrↄ dɛ̀ gusiran kũ nɛ̀sɛyakana zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄo kũ gyão kũ pↄfɛ̃o.
Akũ ma è à mana kũ bisãsirio à pↄ́ ble à í mi à zĩ kũ à kɛ̀ kũ wario andunia gũn sáabu kpá a wɛ̃̀ndi zaka kũ Luda a gbà lɛ́n, zaakũ a bakaan gwe.
Abire gbɛra tó Luda gbɛ̃ gbà ↄgↄda kũ aruzɛkɛo, akũ à a gbà zɛ́ à anfãni kɛo, à zɛ kũ a bakaao à a zĩ sáabu kpá. Luda mɛ́ à a gbà.
Àdigↄ̃ laasun lɛ́ a wɛ̃̀ndi zakaaa dasi doro, zaakũ Luda mɛ́ à yã màa kũ pↄnnao.
Ma nɛ̀sɛyakana yã è andunia gũn dↄ kũ à tↄ̃̀ bisãsirinↄa.
Luda gbɛ̃ gbà ↄgↄda kũ aruzɛkɛo kũ bɛ̀ɛrɛɛo, a pↄ́ kũ à de àgↄ̃ a ni dɛ pínki vĩ, akũ Luda dí a gba zɛ́ à anfãni kɛ̀oro, gbɛ̃ pãnde mɛ́ à gↄ̃̀ vĩ. Abirekũ pãmɛ, nɛ̀sɛyakayã pãsĩmɛ dↄ.
Tó gbɛ̃ nɛ́ ì mɛ̀n basↄↄro, akũ à zĩ kũ̀ yúkuyuku, bee kũ a gìkɛnakɛo, tó adi pↄnna kɛoro, tó à gà, tó a gɛ̀vĩ kpetanaro, ma pì nɛ́ kũ ò ì gɛ̀ ũ sã̀na deala.
Zaakũ nɛ́ pìi sù pãmɛ, akũ à tà gusiran, a tↄ́ gↄ̃̀ tatana.
Bee kũ adi ifãntɛ̃ ero akũsↄ̃ à yãke dↄ̃ro, à nna mà de aruzɛkɛde pìla.
À de gbɛ̃ kũ à kun wɛ̃̀ wàa kuri pↄnnakɛsarila. Gu dokↄ̃nↄn òdi gɛ́n ń pínkinloo?
Bisãsiri ísimma kũ à wàra, de à pↄ́ le à da lɛ́n yãimɛ, ama a gbɛrɛ dì kãro.
Bↄ́n ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri deo yↄ̃nkↄlaa? Bↄ́ àreen yãkɛna a zɛ́aa dì i takasidenɛɛ?
Pↄnnakɛna kũ pↄ́ kũ ń vĩo mana de a pãnde nidɛnala. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ, pɛna gukoriamɛ.
Pↄ́ kũ à kɛ̀ yã tↄ́ vĩ kↄ̀, pↄ́ kũ bisãsiri de a ũ sↄ̃, ò dↄ̃ kↄ̀. Bisãsiri ni fↄ̃ à lɛ́kpakↄ̃a kɛ kũ gbɛ̃ kũ a gbãna dealaoro.
Yãbↄtɛna dasi dì yã yaka. Bↄ́ àreen abire vĩ gbɛ̃nɛɛ?
Dí mɛ́ à dↄ̃ pↄ́ kũ à mana kũ bisãsirio a wɛ̃̀ndi kori zaka kũ àdi gɛ̃tɛ lán uraa bà gũnn? Dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à yã kũ ani kɛ a kpɛ andunia gũn onɛɛ?
Tↄ́ nna mana de nísi gbĩ nna bɛ̀ɛrɛdela, gagↄrↄ mana de igↄrↄla.
Gɛ̃na ↄn kũ òtɛn gɛ̀ ↄ́ↄ dↄn mana de gɛ̃na ↄn kũ òtɛn dikpɛ kɛnla, zaakũ gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki lakanaan gwe, à mana gbɛ̃ kũ ò kunnↄ yã pì da.
Wɛ̃ndakɛna mana de yáadↄnala, pↄsirakɛnaa gbɛra nɛ̀sɛɛ dì were.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri laakarii dìgↄ̃ kú ↄn kũ òtɛn ↄ́ↄ dↄnwa, yↄ̃nkↄ laakarii dìgↄ̃ kú ↄn kũ òtɛn pↄnna kɛnwa.
À mana ǹ ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri kpãkɛ̃nyĩna da de ǹ sã kpá yↄ̃nkↄ n tↄ́kpanala,
zaakũ yↄ̃nkↄnↄ yáadↄna de lán sàkpa lí tɛ́pũtãna kĩnii gũn bàmɛ. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Gbãna mↄna gbɛ̃nↄnɛɛ dì tó ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri yↄ̃nkↄ kũmɛ, gusarɛgba dì gbɛ̃ yakamɛ.
Yã mìdɛna mana de a naanala, mɛna mana de ń zĩda binala.
Ǹsun tó n pↄ fɛ̃ likalikaro, zaakũ yↄ̃nkↄ mɛ́ àdigↄ̃ pↄfɛ̃ vĩ.
Ǹsun pi, bↄ́yãin yãgↄrↄ mana de tera pↄ́laro, zaakũ yãlana dí taka bi ↄ̃ndↄ̃yãnlo.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ bi pↄ́ manamɛ lán túbi bà, à àre vĩ gbɛ̃ kũ òtɛn ifãntɛ̃ enↄnɛ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ bi utɛkimɛ, lákũ ↄgↄ de utɛki ũ nà, ama dↄ̃na àreen dí: Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ dì gbɛ̃ kũ ò vĩnↄ sura ba.
Ǹ laasun lɛ́ Luda yãkɛnanↄa. Dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à pↄ́ kũ à kɛ̀ kotinaa dↄdↄↄ?
Tó gↄrↄ nna sùmma, ǹ pↄnna kɛo. Tó gↄrↄ vãnimɛ sↄ̃, ǹ laasun lɛ́. Luda mɛ́ à a pínki kɛ̀, de gbɛ̃ke súngↄ̃ a zia dↄ̃ro yãi.
Ma wɛ̃̀ndi kori dí gũn ma yã díkĩnanↄ è pínki. Ma gbɛ̃ mana è, à gà a manakɛnaa gũn, ma gbɛ̃ vãni è, àtɛn gì kɛ a yãvãnikɛnaa gũn.
Ǹsun tó n manakɛna gɛ̃ ↄlaro, ǹsun tó n ↄ̃ndↄ̃ gɛ̃ ↄlaro. À kɛ̀ dera ĩni n zĩda kakatɛɛ?
N vãni sún gɛ̃ ↄlaro, ǹsungↄ̃ yↄ̃nkↄ ũro. À kɛ̀ dera ĩni ga n gↄrↄ ãa?
À mana ǹgↄ̃ yã mɛ̀n pla pìnↄ kũnamɛ, ǹsun ↄ gbarɛiro, zaakũ gbɛ̃ kũ à Luda vĩna vĩ dì a pla pìnↄ zɛ́ le pínkimɛ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ dì tó ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri gbãna gↄ̃ de wɛ́tɛ gbãnade gbɛ̃nↄn kurinↄla.
Gbɛ̃ mana kũ àdigↄ̃ yã mana kɛ kũ àdi durunna kɛro kú andunia gũnlo.
Ǹsun sã kpá yã kũ gbɛ̃nↄ tɛn oi pínkiro, de ǹsun ma n zĩkɛri tɛni n sↄ̃sↄ̃ro.
Zaakũ ń dↄ̃ n zĩdanɛ, kũ mↄkↄ̃n se n gbɛ̃nↄ sↄ̃̀sↄ̃ dasi.
Ma yã birenↄ gwà kũ ↄ̃ndↄ̃o pínki, ma zɛo kũ mà ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kũ, akũ à zã̀ kũmao.
Bee tó ↄ̃ndↄ̃ fↄ̃̀ àgↄ̃ dera, a kúki zã̀, a asiri zↄ̃kↄ̃ manamana, dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à boaa?
Ma ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kũ yã sĩnda pínkioo mìi tàasii kà, ma gwàgwa de mà le mà dↄ̃, de mà yãvãnikɛna dↄ̃ yↄ̃nkↄkɛ ũ, de mà yↄ̃nkↄkɛ dↄ̃ mìsarikɛ ũ.
Nↄgbɛ̃ kũ à de tankutɛ ũ a swɛ̃̀ bi gbàgidiimɛ a ↄnↄ bi mↄ̀kakↄ̃anaamɛ, a yã dì ma pↄ yaka de gala. Gbɛ̃ kũ a yã kà Ludanɛɛ dì wotoa, ama nↄgbɛ̃ pìi dì durunnakɛri kũmɛ.
Makũ laasunde ma pì, ǹ yã kũ ma boa gwa. Kũ matɛn yã gwa zɛ́azɛa de mà le mà a mì dↄ̃,
gↄrↄ kũ matɛn wɛtɛ lenaa sari, ma gↄ̃gbɛ̃ mana lè mɛ̀n do gbɛ̃nↄn wàa sↄↄronↄ tɛ́, ama bee nↄgbɛ̃ mana mɛ̀n do mádi le ń tɛ́ro.
Yã kũ ma boaan dí. Luda bisãsirinↄ kɛ̀ nɛ̀sɛpuradenↄ ũmɛ, akũ ò gɛ̃̀ manafiki zɛ́n.
Dí mɛ́ à de lán ↄ̃ndↄ̃rii bàa? Dí mɛ́ à yãnↄ bↄkↄtɛna dↄ̃ↄ? Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ dì bisãsiri ãn werenɛ, àdi a wɛ́ pãsĩ litɛ wɛ́ mana ũ.
Ǹ mì natɛ kína yãnɛ, zaakũ n lɛ́ kɛ̀a kũ Luda tↄ́omɛ.
Ǹsun wã ǹ go a arɛro, ǹsun zɛ yã kũ àdi kɛnɛ vãni kpɛro, zaakũ yã kũ à kɛ̀nɛ nnan àdi kɛ pínki.
Zaakũ kína yã mɛ́ à zɛ́ vĩ, dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à pinɛ: Bↄ́n ntɛn kɛ gwee?
Gbɛ̃ kũ à mìi nàtɛnɛ ni gɛ̃ yãnlo, gbɛ̃ kũ à ↄ̃ndↄ̃ ni a gↄrↄ kũ a kɛnaao dↄ̃.
Yã sĩnda pínki a gↄrↄ kũ a kɛnaao vĩmɛ, bee tó yã'ũmmana tɛn tↄ̃ gbɛ̃a manamana.
Zaakũ gbɛ̃ke zia dↄ̃ro, dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à yã kũ ani su onɛɛ?
Gbɛ̃ke a wɛ̃̀ndi kũna gbãna vĩro, lɛmɛ se gbɛ̃ke ni fↄ̃ à a gagↄrↄ sↄ̃sↄ̃ arɛro. Òdi le ò bò sozan zĩ̀i gũnlo, lɛmɛ dↄ yã vãni dì a kɛ̀rinↄ gbarɛro.
Kũ ma yã kũ òtɛn kɛ andunia gũn laasun lɛ̀ pínki, ma è bisãsiri dì gbãna bleḿma à wari kpáńyĩ.
Akũ ma yãvãnikɛri kũ òtɛni ń vĩnↄ è. Gbɛ̃nↄ bò Luda ↄnn ò sù ń tↄ́ nna sí wɛ́tɛ kũ ò ń yã vãni kɛ̀n gũn. Abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Tó odi wari dↄ dàkɛriia likalikaro, a yã dì tó gbɛ̃nↄ zɛo ń swɛ̃̀n ò a vãni kɛmɛ se.
Bee tó durunnakɛrii dàa kɛ̀ gɛ̃̀n baaakↄ̃, akũ à gìi kɛ̀, má dↄ̃ kũ gbɛ̃ kũ ò Luda vĩna vĩ akũsↄ̃ òtɛn mì natɛnɛnↄ sã̀na deala.
Yã ni bo kũ gbɛ̃ vãninↄo nnaro, kũ ò Luda vĩna vĩro yãi, ń gↄrↄ ni gì kɛro lán uraa bàmɛ.
Yã pã pãnde kun àtɛn kɛ andunia gũn. Yã dì gbɛ̃ mana le lákũ yãvãnikɛriin a ũ bà, yã dì yãvãnikɛri le lákũ gbɛ̃ manan a ũ bà. Ma pì abirekũ pãmɛ dↄ.
Madì pↄnnakɛna sáabu kpá, zaakũ à mana kũ bisãsirio andunia gũn à pↄ́ ble à í mi à pↄnna kɛ, pↄnna pì ni donɛ arɛ a zĩkɛnaa gũn lákũ Luda a gbà a wɛ̃̀ndi lɛ́n nà andunia gũn.
Ma mɛ̀ɛ kpà ↄ̃ndↄ̃kũnaaa, akũ bↄkↄtɛ kũ òtɛn kɛ andunia gũn kũ i dì na ń wɛ́nlo fãnantɛ̃ kũ gwãanio, ma a laasun lɛ̀
ma è Luda tò gbɛ̃ke ni fↄ̃ à yã kũ àtɛn kɛ andunia gũn dↄ̃ro. Bee tó gbɛ̃ kpátɛ kɛ̀i manamana, ani a mì dↄ̃ro. Bee tó ↄ̃ndↄ̃rii pì á dↄ̃, ani fↄ̃ à boaro.
Ma abirenↄ laasun lɛ̀ pínki, akũ ma zɛo kũ gbɛ̃ mananↄ kũ ↄ̃ndↄ̃rinↄ kũ ń yãkɛnanↄn kú Luda ↄĩmɛ. Gbɛ̃ke dìgↄ̃ dↄ̃ tó yenyĩ ke zãngu tɛni a dãro.
Yã dokↄ̃nↄ mɛ́ àtɛn gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki dã, yãpuradenↄ kũ nɛ̀sɛpãsĩdenↄ, gbɛ̃ mananↄ kũ gbɛ̃ vãninↄ, gbãsĩsaridenↄ kũ gbãsĩdenↄ, ludagbagbarinↄ kũ ludagbagbarisarinↄ. Lákũ à de kũ gbɛ̃ mananↄ nà, lɛn à de lɛ kũ durunnakɛrinↄo. Lákũ à de nà kũ gbɛ̃ kũ òdi la da kũ Ludaonↄ, lɛn à de lɛ kũ gbɛ̃ kũ òdi la da kãaoronↄ.
Yã kũ àdi kɛ andunia gũn pínki nɛ̀sɛyakayãmɛ, kũ yã dokↄ̃nↄ mɛ́ àdi gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki le. Yã vãni kↄ̃̀ bisãsirinↄ swɛ̃̀n, yↄ̃nkↄyã mɛ́ àdi dońnɛ arɛ, a gbɛra òdi tá gyãwãnn.
Gↄrↄ kũ gbɛ̃ kú kũ wɛ̃̀ndiio àdigↄ̃ tãmaa vĩ. Bee gbɛ̃da bɛ̃nɛ à sã̀na de músu gɛ̀la.
Gbɛ̃ bɛ̃nɛnↄ dↄ̃ kũ oni ga, gɛ̀nↄ sↄ̃ ò pↄ́ke dↄ̃ro. Ò láada ke vĩ doro, ń yã ni dↄ gbɛ̃ken doro.
Ń yena gbɛ̃i kũ ń zãna gbɛ̃nwo kũ ń nɛ̀sɛgↄ̃bakɛnaao gɛ̃̀ zɛ́lan gwe kↄ̀. Ń bàka nigↄ̃ kú kũ yã kũ àdi kɛ andunia gũnwo ziki doro.
Ǹ gɛ́ ǹ n pↄ́ ble kũ pↄnnao, ǹ n sèwɛ̃ mi kũ yáadↄnaao, zaakũ Luda n yãkɛnaa pìnↄ sáabu kpà kↄ̀.
Ǹgↄ̃ uta pura dana gↄrↄ sĩnda pínki. Ǹsungↄ̃ kun nísi dↄkↄna n mìia sariro.
Ǹ pↄnna kɛ kũ n nanↄ yenyĩdeo n wɛ̃̀ndi kori kũ Luda kpàmma andunia gũn lɛ́n, zaakũ n bakaan gwe gↄrↄ kũ ntɛn ísimma wara andunia gũn.
Zĩ kũ n ↄ nà a kɛnaaa, ǹ kɛ n gbãna lɛ́n, zaakũ zĩ ke yãgↄ̃gↄ̃na ke dↄ̃na ke ↄ̃ndↄ̃ kú gyãwãn kũ ntɛn tánlo.
Ma è andunia gũn dↄ kũ bàkpakũsũblenaa dì kɛ bà nna yãnlo, zĩ̀blenaa dì kɛ gbãna yãnlo, pↄ́blelenaa dì kɛ ↄ̃ndↄ̃ yãnlo, aruzɛkɛlenaa dì kɛ wɛ́zɛ̃ yãnlo, nna kũ gbɛ̃nↄ dì kɛ kyódↄ̃na yãnlo, zaakũ gↄrↄ vãni kũ kisirao dì ń lé ń pínki,
gbɛ̃ke gↄrↄ kũ yã vãni ni a le dↄ̃ro. Lán kpↄ̀ kũ à sì táaru gũn bà, lán bã kũ bà a kũ̀u bà, lɛn gu dì dↄ gbɛ̃nɛ vãnivãni à a kũ bùrum lɛ.
Ma ↄ̃ndↄ̃ ke taka è andunia gũn, a yã ma kũ gbãna.
Lakutu ke kun yã, a gbɛ̃nↄn dasiro, akũ kína gbãnade sù à lɛ̀tɛa à lìka a bĩnii.
Gↄ̃gbɛ̃ takaside ↄ̃ndↄ̃ri ke kú lakutu pìi gũn, à lakutu sura bà kũ a ↄ̃ndↄ̃o, akũ takaside pì yã dí dↄ gbɛ̃kenlo.
Akũ ma pì ↄ̃ndↄ̃ de gbãnala, ama òdi takaside ↄ̃ndↄ̃ gya bo, òdi a yã daro.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri yã yĩdayĩda kũ ò sã kpài mana de yↄ̃nkↄnↄ kína patammanala.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ mana de gↄ̃kɛbↄnↄla, ama durunnakɛri mɛ̀n do dì yã mana zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄ yakamɛ.
Lákũ ífĩni gɛ̀nↄ dì tó turarekɛri nísi gbĩ vãni kũ nà, lɛn yↄ̃nkↄkɛ fíti dì gbɛ̃ kũ à ↄ̃ndↄ̃ vĩ kũ bɛ̀ɛrɛɛo tↄ́ yaka lɛ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri laasun dì tá ↄplai, yↄ̃nkↄ pↄ́ dì ta ↄzɛi.
Bee tó yↄ̃nkↄ tɛn táa o zɛ́n, a ↄ̃ndↄ̃ dìgↄ̃ kĩanamɛ, àdi tó gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki a mìsarikɛ dↄ̃.
Tó gbãnade pↄ fɛ̃̀nyĩ, ǹsun go n tíaro, kunna n laakariia dì lá ká taari zↄ̃kↄ̃ↄa.
Ma nɛ̀sɛyakayã ke è andunia gũn, à de gbãnade sãtɛna yãa ũmɛ.
Òdi yↄ̃nkↄnↄ ká kpata zↄ̃kↄ̃n dasi, aruzɛkɛdenↄ sↄ̃ òdigↄ̃ kú kpata fítin.
Ma zↄ̀nↄ è di sↄ̃a, zĩdadenↄ sↄ̃ òtɛn táa o gɛ̀sɛ lán zↄ̀nↄ bà.
Gbɛ̃ kũ àtɛn wɛ̀ɛ yↄ̃ ni zu a gũn, gbɛ̃ kũ àtɛn bĩni gboro, mlɛ̃̀ ni a só.
Gbɛ̃ kũ àtɛn gbɛ̀ wí, gbɛ̀ ni a kĩnna, gbɛ̃ kũ àtɛn yaka para, yaka ni a kari bo.
Tó kpása lɛ́nnaro, akũ odi a lɛ́ kɛkɛro, sé ǹ gã̀sãwa boboi kũ gbãnao, ama ↄ̃ndↄ̃ dì tó ò zɛ́ lemɛ.
Tó mlɛ̃̀ bon'ã kɛ̀ a kↄ̃kↄ̃'oriinɛ à a sò, à àre vĩ a gũn doro.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri lɛ́gbɛ nna, ama yↄ̃nkↄ lɛ́ dì a kakatɛmɛ.
Àdi na yã'onaaa yↄ̃nkↄyↄ̃nkↄ, àdi a mì dɛ kũ mìsariyã vãnio,
zaakũ yↄ̃nkↄ dì yã bↄtɛmɛ. Lákũ gbɛ̃ke yã kũ ani su dↄ̃ro nà, dí mɛ́ ani fↄ̃ à yã kũ ani kɛ a kpɛ onɛɛ?
Yↄ̃nkↄ zĩ dì a kpasamɛ, ari se àdi zɛ́ dↄ̃ gɛna wɛ̃tɛ gũnlo.
Waiyoo bùsu kũ a kína de kɛfɛnna ũ, a ìbanↄ dìgↄ̃ pↄ́ble gbɛ̃ zaa kↄnkↄ.
Mìnnaden bùsu kũ a kína de kínanɛ ũ, a ìbanↄ dì pↄ́ ble a gↄrↄa gbãnakarana yãi, adi kɛ wɛ̃dɛna yãinlo.
Tó gbɛ̃ ma'ã vĩ, a kpɛ́ líkↄ̃kũnↄ dìgↄ̃ sikũnamɛ, tó àtɛn gwa kũ wɛ́o, a kpɛ́ ni í bo.
Òdi pↄ́ble zↄ̃kↄ̃ kɛ pↄnnakɛna yãimɛ, wɛ̃mina dì su kũ yáadↄo, ama ↄgↄ mɛ́ àdi su kũ a pínkio.
Ǹsun kína sↄ̃sↄ̃ro, bee n nɛ̀sɛɛ gũn, ǹsun aruzɛkɛde káro, bee n kpɛ́ gũn, zaakũ bã ni yã pì sɛ́tɛ à gɛ́ à ońnɛ.
Ǹ gba da kũ pↄ́bleo gbɛ̃nↄnɛ, zĩkea ĩni le dↄ.
Ǹ kpaatɛtɛ gbɛ̃nↄn supplanↄnɛ ke sↄraakↄ̃, zaakũ ń kisira kũ ani bùsu le dↄ̃ro.
Tó ludambɛ sira kũ̀ kũ ío, àdi ma zĩtɛ legũ ũmɛ, tó lí lɛ̀tɛ ifãboki kpa ke ifãlɛtɛ kpa, gu kũ à lɛ̀tɛn, gwen àdigↄ̃ wútɛn.
Gbɛ̃ kũ à wɛ́ dↄ ĩai dì pↄ́ tↄ̃ro, gbɛ̃ kũ àtɛn ludambɛ sira gwa dì pↄ́ kɛ̃ro.
Lákũ ń wɛ̃̀ndiboki dↄ̃ro nà ke nɛ́ kasana a da gbɛrɛn, ĩni fↄ̃ ǹ Luda Pↄ́sĩndapinkikɛri zĩ dↄ̃ro.
Ǹ pↄ́ tↄ̃ kↄnkↄ, ǹsun ma'ã kũ ↄkↄsiro, zaakũ ń dↄ̃ a kpate mɛ́ ani arubarika kɛro. Adíkĩnan yá ke adirekũn yá, ke onigↄ̃ mana ń pínkin yá, ń dↄ̃ro.
Gupura nna, ifãntɛ̃'ena dì káńgu.
Bee tó gbɛ̃ wɛ̃̀ndi gbã̀na fↄ̃ àgↄ̃ dera, à pↄnna kɛn pínki. Bee kũ abireo à laasun lɛ́ gusira gↄrↄa, zaakũ onigↄ̃ dasimɛ. Yã kũ àtɛn su pínki pãmɛ.
Kɛfɛnna, ǹ pↄnna kɛ n kɛfɛnnakɛgↄrↄa, ǹ tó n pↄ kɛ nna n nɛ́gↄ̃gbɛ̃kɛgↄrↄ zĩ. Ǹ yã kũ à n pↄ gbà kɛ ǹ tɛ́ pↄ́ kũ à kàngui, ama a pínki gũn ǹgↄ̃ dↄ̃ kũ Luda ni yãkpatɛ kɛ kũnwo.
Ǹsun tó n pↄ yakaro, ǹ n mɛ̀'ũmmanↄ gonla, zaakũ kɛfɛnnakɛ kũ mìkã sirao dì gɛ̃ zɛ́lamɛ.
Ǹ tó n Kɛ̀ri yã gↄ̃ dↄngu n kɛfɛnnakɛgↄrↄ zĩ ari gↄrↄ vãni gɛ́ ká, ari wɛ̃̀ kũ ĩni pi ntɛni a nna ma doroa.
Ǹ tó a yã gↄ̃ dↄngu ari ifãntɛ̃ kũ gupurao gↄ̃ lago, ari mↄvura kũ susunɛnↄ gↄ̃ sira kũ, ari legũmanaa gbɛra guweresari gↄ̃ gɛ́ su.
Gↄrↄ birea n ↄnↄ nigↄ̃ lukaluka, n gbánↄ ni koko, n pↄ́sobↄnↄ ni kámma bo kũ ò dasi doro yãi, n gugwabↄnↄ ni gu e ń wondoo gũn dãadãa.
N lɛ́ nigↄ̃ nakↄ̃ana gãnulɛa, wísilↄgbɛ kĩni ni busɛ kũnnɛ. Bãnↄ wiki ni n vu in, nↄkparenↄ lɛ̀ ni kɛnnɛ busɛ.
Ĩni vĩna kɛ guleinɛ kũ kurena zɛ́ gũnwo, n mìkã ni pura kũ lán desu vú bà. Ĩni n zĩda gátɛ lán kwa táa'onaa bà, pↄ́ke ni n mɛ̀ futɛ doro, zaakũ bisãsiri dì gɛ́ a gɛ́kiamɛ, akũ ↄ́ↄdↄrinↄ dìgↄ̃ kure gãnulɛa.
Ǹ tó n Kɛ̀ri yã gↄ̃ dↄngu ari n andurufu bà gↄ̃ gɛ́ kɛ̃, ari n wura ta gↄ̃ gɛ́ kpakoto kũ, ari n í lo gↄ̃ gɛ́ wíwi, ari n lↄ̀gↄ guga gↄ̃ gɛ́ wí,
ari n bùsutiti gↄ̃ ɛra à gɛ́ gɛ̃ zĩtɛn, gu kũ à bòn, ari n nini gↄ̃ gɛ́ tá Luda kũ à kpàmma kĩnaa.
Makũ laasunde ma pì: Yã pã búgubugu, a pínki pãmɛ.
Abire gbɛra lákũ laasunde pì ↄ̃ndↄ̃ nà, à dↄ̃naa dàdańnɛ. À laasun lɛ̀ à kpátɛ kɛ̀ yãi, akũ à yáasinↄ lɛ̀ dasi.
À kpátɛ kɛ̀ yã manai, akũ a yã pìnↄ kɛ̃̀ a zɛ́a, akũsↄ̃ yãpuramɛ.
Ɔ̃ndↄ̃ri yãnↄn de lákũ gò kũ òdi pↄ́kãdenↄ lɛ́o bàmɛ, ń yã'onanↄn de lán koosa kũ ò pà gínginnↄ bà. Sãdãri mɛ̀n do mɛ́ à yã pìnↄ dà.
Ma nɛ́, ǹ laakari kɛ, ǹsun yãke karanlo. Òdi takadanↄ kɛ̃ dasidasi, à lɛ́ vĩro. Kyókɛna zↄ̃kↄ̃ sↄ̃ àdi mɛ̀ɛ kpasamɛ.
Ò a pínki mà, a mìdɛnaan dí: Ǹ vĩna kɛ Ludanɛ, ǹgↄ̃ a yãditɛnanↄ kũna, zaakũ gbɛ̃ sĩnda pínki yãn gwe.
Luda ni yãkpatɛ kɛ ó yã sĩnda pínki musu, kũ yã kũ utɛnaao pínki, bee a mana ke a vãni.
Womu ge gɑ dobu bo wee. Sɑlomɔɔwɑ gɑ kɑ yɑ̃.
ɑ mɑn sɔ̃suo kɑ wunɛn tiin nɔɔ. Domi wunɛn kĩrun kookoosu su tɑm dobu kere.
Wunɛn wɑni yi nuburu do. A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge turɑre ye yɑ pusɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ wɔndiɑbɑ bɑ nun kĩ.
A mɑn tii gɑwemɑ kpɑ su nun nɑɑ swĩi kɑ dukɑ. A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn sunɔ, ɑ kɑ mɑn doo wunɛn wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Wunɛn sɑɑbuwɑ sɑ nuku dobu mɔ. Wunɛn kĩru tɑ tɑm dobu kere. Bɑ gem mɔ be bɑ nun kĩ.
Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ. Nɑ tĩri, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ kurɔ burɔ. Nɑ tĩri nge Kedɑɑn kuu bekuruginu, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ wɑ̃wɑ nge beku kɑrenu ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Sɑlomɔɔn sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ.
I ku mɑn gɛm yèn sɔ̃ nɑ tĩri. Sɔ̃ɔwɑ u mɑn kuɑ mɛ. Nɛn sesubu bɑ kɑ mɑn mɔru kuɑ. Bɑ mɑn kuɑ ben reseɛm dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun kɔ̃so. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ nɛn tiigiru kɔ̃su.
A mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɔ nɛn kĩnɑsi mi ɑ rɑ wunɛn sɑbenu kpɑre, kɑ mi ɑ rɑ de nu sɔ̃ɔ sure. Kpɑ nɑ kun mɑɑ sirenɛ wunɛn berusebun sɑbenun suunu sɔɔ.
wunɛ wi ɑ tɔn kurɔbu kpuro burɑm kere, ɑ̀ kun yɑm mi yɛ̃, ɑ doo ɑ yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔn yirɑ swĩi. Kpɑ ɑ wunɛn bonu kpɑrɑ kpɑrobun wɑ̃ɑ yerun bɔkuɔ.

nɛn kĩnɑsi, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ durɔ burɔ, wunɑ ɑ mɑn wɛ̃re. Bɛsɛn kpin yeru tɑ ko n nɔɔ nɛ nge yɑkɑ bekusu.
Dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru, yerɑ bɑ kɑ bɛsɛn dirun dɑ̃ɑ mwɑɑnɑtiɑ kuɑ. Mɑ bɑ ten yɑri kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ sipɛrɛ.
Nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge gunɑrun biibii ye yɑ kpiɑ tem tɛɛrɑɔ. Nɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑkɑsun biibii ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑɔ.
ɑ̀ n nɛn kĩnɑsi wɑ win wɔndiɑ kpɑɑsibun wuurɔ, u rɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge biibii ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃kin suunu sɔɔ.
ɑ̀ n nɛn kĩnɑsi wɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑn suunu sɔɔ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ pɔmiɛ dɑ̃nun suunu sɔɔ tèn mɑrum mu dibu do. Nɑ rɑ kɑ̃ nɑ n sɔ̃ win sɑɑrɔ.
U kɑ mɑn dɑ mi bɑ rɑ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ dĩɑnu di. Mɑ u mɑn nɛnuɑ kɑ kĩru.

bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ kɑ yɛɛ kpiki kɑ nɛnnun yĩsinu, i ku nɛn kĩnɑsi yɑmiɑ sɑɑ ye u ǹ kĩ u se.
nɑ nɛn kĩnɑsin nɔɔ nɔɔmɔ. Wɔɔ u guunu sɑrikirɑmɔ u wee.
U sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yɑɑ kpiku ǹ kun mɛ nge gini kpɛmɑ. Wi wee dirun biruɔ, u mɑn mɛɛrimɑ fɛnɛntin di.

wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sɑ̃kusɑ̃ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpee bɑɑ sɔɔ yɑ kukuɑ. A mɑn wunɛn wuswɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsio. A de n wunɛn nɔɔ nɔ. Domi wunɛn dɔkɔrɑ nɔɔbu do. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑ rɑ mɑn wɛ̃re.

wɔ̃ku girirɑ nɑ kpĩ nɛn kpin yeru wɔllɔ. Nɑ kɑsu wi nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ kĩ. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ nùn wɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, kon sewɑ n bɔsu wuu sɔɔ, gen swɛɛɔ kɑ gen yɑburɔ nɑ n kɑsu wi nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ kĩ. Nɑ nùn kɑsu kɑsu, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ ǹ nùn wɑ.
Ye wuu gen kɔ̃sobɑ bɔsu bɑ wuu mɛɛrimɔ, bɑ mɑn wɑ, mɑ nɑ bu bikiɑ nɑ nɛɛ, i nɛn kĩnɑsi wɑ?
Ye nɑ bu deri kese, yerɑ nɑ nɛn kĩnɑsi wi wɑ. Nɑ nùn sɛ̃re, nɑ ǹ nùn yɔ̃su sere nɑ kɑ nùn dɑ nɛn mɛro wi u mɑn mɑrɑn dirɔ.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ kɑ yɛɛ kpiki kɑ nɛnnun yĩsinu, i ku nɛn kĩnɑsi yɑmiɑ sɑɑ ye u ǹ kĩ u se.
wɑrɑ u sɑrɑm wee gbɑburun di mɛni nge wii tĩɑ. U turɑre ye bɑ mɔ̀ miru kɑ turɑre dɛkɑgiɑ bwese bwesekɑn nuburu mɔ.
Sɑlomɔɔn kpin yerɑ bɑ sɔɔwɑ bɑ kɑ wee, Isirelibɑn tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu wɑtɑ bɑ nùn swĩi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gɔn gɔnkɑ.
Be kpuro bɑ kɑ tɑkobi sɑnnɔ yɛ̃. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔbu. Ben bɑɑwure u win tɑkobi bɛki win yɛ̃sɑɔ u kɑ sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bɑɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ̀ n kurɑmɑ wɔ̃kuru.
Sinɑ boko Sɑlomɔɔ u derɑ bɑ nùn ɑmɑkɛɛn kitɑru kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ kɑ nɑ Libɑnin di.
Mɑ bɑ ten suɑtiɑn dɛki kuɑ kɑ sii geesu. Bɑ mɑɑ ten gbɑllitiɑ kuɑ kɑ wurɑ. Bɑ ten sin yerun leferi beku wunɔmgiru wukiri te Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ bɑ burɑru kuɑ kĩrun sɔ̃.
I yɑrimɑ bɛɛ Siɔnin wɔndiɑbɑ, i sinɑ boko Sɑlomɔɔ wɑ. U win furɔ doke ge win mɛro nùn dokeɑ sɑɑ ye u kurɔ kpɑɑru kuɑ. Dɔmɑ te, u wɑ̃ɑ nuku dobu sɔɔ.
ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ kurɔ burɔ, nɛn kĩnɑsi. Wunɛn nɔni yi bɑllimɔ nge wɑɑ bɑkɑgii wunɛn sɔnditiɑn wɛ̃rin di. Wunɛn seri yi sɑ̃ɑ nge boo wuuru te tɑ sɑrɑmɑmɔ Gɑlɑdin guuru wɔllun di.
Wunɛn donnu nu buriri nge yɑ̃ɑ nìn sɑnsu bɑ bɔɔrɑ nu nim nɔrum wee. Nu mɑɑ nɔɔ nɛwɑ swɛɛ swɛɛ, nin gɑrɑ kun kɑnde.
Wunɛn nɔɔ gɑ swɛ̃riwɑ nge tom, mɑ gɑ wɑɑbu wɑ̃. Wunɛn bɑɑnu nu bɑllimɔwɑ nge dire sɔnsɔm biɑ wunɛn sɔnditiɑn wɛ̃rin di.
Wunɛn wĩirɑ wɑ̃wɑ nge Dɑfidin dii bwereku gɑgu mi bɑ rɑ tɑbu yɑ̃nu bere. Wunɛn sɑbɑn bɑtɑnibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ bwɛ̃ mi.
Wunɛn bwɑ̃su sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑɑ kpikun binu yiru ni nu yɑkɑsu dimɔ biibiin suunu sɔɔ.
Sere sɔ̃ɔ u kɑ du sɑɑru tu kpɛ̃ɑ, kon dɑ guuru wɔllɔ mi turɑre ye bɑ mɔ̀ miru kɑ turɑre dɛkɑgiɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
A sɑ̃ɑwɑ kurɔ burɔ, nɛn kĩnɑsi. A ǹ bɑu gɑgu mɔ.
A nɑ su doonɑ sɑɑ Libɑnin guunun di kɑ Seniri kɑ Hɛɛmɔɔn guurun di mi gbee sinɑnsu kɑ musuku yɑmbɑrɔsu rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ.
Bɛsɛn nɔni yì n yinnɑ, ǹ kun mɛ nɑ̀ n wunɛn sɑbɑn bɑtɑni tiɑ wɑ, wunɛn kĩrɑ rɑ nɛn gɔ̃ru kpuro mwɛwɑ, nɛn sesu, nɛn kurɔ.
Wunɛn kĩru tɑ nuku dobu mɔ nɛn sesu, nɛn kurɔ. Wunɛn kĩru tɑ tɑm dobu kere. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ wunɛn turɑren nuburu tɑ do tɑ turɑre kpuro kere.
Wunɛn nɔɔ gɑ sɔ̃subu do nge tim bɑu. Tim kɑ bom mu wɑ̃ɑ wunɛn nɔɔ sɔɔ. Wunɛn yɑ̃nu nu nuburu dowɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru Libɑniɔ.
A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑru te bɑ kɑrɑ koosi, nɛn sesu, nɛn kurɔ. A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɔkɔ ye bɑ kɛnuɑ, ǹ kun mɛ nge bwiɑ ye bɑ mɑrɑ.
Wunɛn nim mu dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun dɑ̃nu yɛ̃kɑmɔ. Nin binu ni bɑ sokumɔ gerenɑdi nu do too. Mɛyɑ lɑlle kɑ nɑɑdi yɑ mɑɑ kpiɑ mi,
kɑ sɑfɑrɑni, kɑ yɑkɑ si su nuburu do, kɑ kɑnɛli, kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ rɑ kɑ turɑre dɛkɑgiɑ ko, kɑ miru, kɑ ɑloɛsi, kɑ sere yɑkɑ si su nuburu dobu bo kpuro.
Wunɛ ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun dɔkɔ ǹ kun mɛ nge bwiɑ ye yɑ nim sumɔ mɛ mu wee sɑɑ Libɑnin guunun di.
sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃si yɛ̃sikɑn wosu, i seewo i nɛn dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun dɑ̃nu kɔ̃, kpɑ nin nubu duroru tu yɑri kpuro. I de nɛn kĩnɑsi u du win dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑru sɔɔ kpɑ u yen dɑ̃ɑ bii geenu di.
nɑ duɑ nɛn dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑru sɔɔ, nɛn sesu, nɛn kurɔ. Nɑ nɛn turɑre ye bɑ mɔ̀ mirun dɑ̃ɑ yorimɔ kɑ kiki si su nuburu do. Nɑ nɛn tim bɑun tim dimɔ. Nɑ nɛn tɑm kɑ nɛn bom nɔrumɔ. i dio, bɛɛ be i kĩɑnɛ. I nɔruo kpɑ i n kĩru bɑrɔ.
nɑ dò ɑdɑmɑ nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ yɑ ǹ kpĩ. Nɑ kɑ nɛn kĩnɑsi dosimɔ u gɑmbo soomɔ. ɑ mɑn kɛniɔ, nɛn sesu, nɛn kĩnɑsi. Wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sɑ̃kusɑ̃, ɑ yibɑ. Nɛn wirɑ nikererɑ. Mɑ nɛn seri nim sɛ̃ɛrɑ.
wee nɑ nɛn yɑberu potɑ. Kon mɑɑ kpĩ n se n tu sebe? Nɑ nɛn kɔ̃ri kpɑkiɑ kɔ, yerɑ kon mɑɑ se n yi disinu ko?
Yerɑ nɛn kĩnɑsi wi, u win nɔmu kpɛ̃ɛmɑ gɑmbon wem di, mɑ nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ wurɑ win mi.
Nɑ seewɑ n kɑ nùn kɛniɑ. Turɑre ye bɑ mɔ̀ miru yɑ dɑ̃ɑkumɔ nɛn nɔmɑn di gɑmbon nɛnutiɑ sɔɔ.
Nɑ nɛn kĩnɑsi kɛniɑ, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ deemɑ u doonɑ. Nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ rɑɑ wurɑ win mi, sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ win nɔɔ nuɑ. Nɑ nùn kɑsu kɑsu, nɑ ǹ nùn wɑ. Nɑ nùn sokɑ, u ǹ wure.
Wuu gen kɔ̃sobu bɑ kɑ mɑn yinnɑ. Bɑ mɑn so bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ. Be bɑ gbɑ̃rɑru kɔ̃su, bɑ nɛn sɔnditiɑ mwɑ.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ, ì n nɛn kĩnɑsi wɑ, i nùn sɔ̃ɔwɔ win kĩrɑ mɑn bɑrɔ kuɑ.
wunɛ wi ɑ kurɔbu kpuro burɑm kere, mbɑ wunɛn kĩnɑsi wi, u mɔ ye goo kun mɔ ɑ kɑ sun sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɛ.
nɛn kĩnɑsi, tɔn swɑ̃ɔwɑ, win wuswɑɑ bɑllimɔ. Tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ wɔkuru (10.000) sɔɔ, wiyɑ kɑɑ wɑɑbu gbi.
Win wuswɑɑ yɑ bɑllimɔ nge wurɑ geɑ. Win seri yi tĩriwɑ nge gunɔ mɔrɑn sɑnsu.
Win nɔni yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wɑɑ bɑkɑgii ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ dɑɑrɔ. Win nɔni kpiki yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bom bekum. Nɔni yi, yi kɑ kpee gobiginu weenɛ ni bɑ doke tɑɑbu sɔɔ.
Win bɑɑnu nu wɑ̃wɑ nge turɑre bii yi yi kpiibu wee. Win nɔɔ gɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge biibii yèn min di turɑre yɑ dɑ̃ɑkumɔ.
Win nɔmɑ yɑ kɑ wurɑn sumɑ weenɛ ye bɑ kpee gobiginu dokeɑ. Win wɑsi yi wɔru nge suunu don te bɑ wɔriɑsiɑ bɑ burɑru koosi kɑ kpee burɑnu ni nu nɔni boogu mɔ.
Win kɔ̃ri yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbere yiru ye bɑ kuɑ kɑ kpee kpikiru. Mɑ bɑ ye girɑ wurɑ geɑn wɔllɔ. À n nùn mɛɛrɑ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge Libɑnin dɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru.
Win nɔɔn gɑri do. Wi sɔɔrɑ nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mɑm mɑm. Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, mɛ nɛn bɔrɔ kĩnɑsi wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ mi.
mɑnɑ wunɛn kĩnɑsi wi, u dɑ, wunɛ wi ɑ kurɔbu kpuro burɑm kere. Berɑ mɑnɑ u gɛre, kpɑ su kɑ nun wi kɑsu.
nɛn kĩnɑsi u dɑwɑ win dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrɔ, mi turɑre bii wɑ̃ɑ yi yi kpiibu wee, u kɑ win sɑbenu kpɑrɑ kpɑ u biibii bɔɔri.
Nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn kĩnɑsigii, mɑ u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgii. U win sɑbenu kpɑrɑmɔ biibiin suunu sɔɔ.

A ku mɑɑ mɑn mɛɛri. Domi wunɛn nɔni yi nɛn kĩru seeyɑmɔ. Wunɛn seri yi sɑ̃ɑ nge boo wuuru te tɑ sɑrɑmɑmɔ Gɑlɑdin guurun wɔllun di.

Adɑmɑ nɛn kĩnɑsi wi, u ǹ bɑu mɔ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛnɛm be sɔɔ. U sɑ̃ɑwɑ win mɛron bii wɔndiɑ teereru te u kĩ too. Wɔndiɑ be bɑ nùn wɑ, bɑ nɛɛ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ domɑrugii. Sinɑnibu kɑ bɑn sinɑ kurɔbu bɑ mɑɑ nùn siɑrɑ bɑ nɛɛ,
wɑrɑ u yɑrimɑm wee nge buruku sɔ̃ɔ. Wɑrɑ u wɑ̃ mɛ nge suru. Wɑrɑ u bɑllimɔ nge sɔ̃ɔ. U nɑnum mɔ nge tɑbu sĩɑ kɑ yen gidi bɔrɑ.
Nɑ dɑ dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrɔ mi dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum wɑ̃ɑ, n kɑ wɑ yɑkɑsu sù n kpiɑ wɔwɑɔ, kpɑ n wɑ resɛm tɔ̃kɑ yɑ̀ n kpɑrɑ, kpɑ n mɑɑ wɑ dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ gerenɑdi tɑ̀ n wɛ̃su sɑ̃ɑ.
Nɑ ǹ kɑ bɑɑru nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ mɑn suɑ, yɑ mɑn doke nɛn tɔmbun tɑbu kɛkɛbɑn suunu sɔɔ yi dumi gɑwe.

ɑ gɔsirɑmɑ, ɑ gɔsirɑmɑ, Sunɛmun bii, ɑ gɔsirɑmɑ su nun mɛɛri. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i nɛ Sunɛmun bii mɛɛrɑ nge wi u yɑɑmɔ tɔn wuunu yirun bɑɑ sɔɔ.
wɔndiɑ bɛɛrɛgii, wunɛn nɑɑsu su wɑ̃ sɑlubɑtɑ sɔɔ. Wunɛn pɔrɑ yɑ wɑ̃wɑ nge sɑbɑ. Wi u ye kuɑ mɔmɔn tiiwɑ.
Wunɛn bwĩirun girɑ yerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bwɛrɛrɛ nge nɔrɑn nɔɔ ye yɑ ku rɑ tɑm kpe. Wunɛn bɔsɔ gɑ swɛ̃ri nge ɑlikɑmɑ ye bɑ kɑ biibii sikerenɛ.
Wunɛn bwɑ̃su sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yɑɑ kpikun binu yiru.
Wunɛn wĩiru tɑ buririwɑ nge suunu donnu. Wunɛn nɔni yi dɛɛrewɑ nge Hɛsibonin yɛru si su wɑ̃ɑ wuu bɔkɔ gen kɔnnɔn bɔkuɔ. Wunɛn wɛ̃ru tɑ dɛndewɑ mɑm mɑm nge Libɑnin kɔ̃su yeru te tɑ Dɑmɑsi mɛɛrɑ.
Wunɛn wirɑ suɑrewɑ nge guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑɑmɛli. Mɑ wunɛn tɑrɑ yɑ bɑllimɔ nge beku gobigiru sere yɑ sinɑ bokon bwɛ̃rɑ kpuro mwɑ.
Wunɛn burɑm bɑndɑ, ɑ mɑn wɛ̃re too. Wunɛ sɔɔrɑ nɛn kĩru kpuro wɑ̃ɑ.
Wunɛn wɑsi yi dɛndewɑ nge kpɑkpɑ bɑ̃ɑ. Wunɛn bwɑ̃su su sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum swɑɑru.
Nɑ nɛɛ, kon kpɑkpɑ yɔwɑ kpɑ n yen mɑrum nɛnɛ. Wunɛn bwɑ̃su su sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge resɛm swɑɑru. Wunɛn wɛ̃siɑru tɑ nuburu do nge dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum mɛ bɑ mɔ̀ pɔmu.

nɛn kĩnɑsi, ɑ yɑrimɑ su dɑ bɑru kpɑɑnɔ kpɑ sɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Bururu sɑ ko se su dɑ dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrɔ, su wɑ resɛm tɔ̃kɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ gerenɑdi yɑ̀ n kpɑre yɑ wɛ̃su sɑ̃ɑ. Miyɑ kon nun kĩru sɔ̃ɔsi. Dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ mɑndɑrɑgore tɑ ten turɑre yɛ̃kɑmɔ. Bɛsɛn yɛnu kɔnnɔwɔ, sɑ dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum kpuro mɔ mɛ mu dobu bo, ginɑkugim kɑ gisɔku gegim. Nɑ mɛ kpuro yii wunɛn sɔ̃ nɛn kĩnɑsi.
À n dɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn sesu mɛro turosi, kon kɑ nun yinnɑ tɔɔwɔ, kpɑ n nun bɔkɑsi, goo kun mɑɑ mɑn gɛmmɔ.
Kon kɑ nun dɑ nɛn mɛron yɛnuɔ kpɑ ɑ mɑn bwisi kɛ̃. Kon nun tɑm nubu durorugim wɛ̃ mɛ nɑ kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ bii ni bɑ mɔ̀ gerenɑdi.
Nɑ kĩ nɑ n nɛn wiru sɔndi win nɔm dwɑrɔ, kpɑ win nɔm geu gu mɑn bɔkɑsi.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmun wɔndiɑbɑ, nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, i ku nɛn kĩnɑsi yɑmiɑ sɑɑ ye u ǹ kĩ u se.
wɑrɑ u wee gbɑburun di u win kĩnɑsi gbɑlli. nɑ nun yɑmiɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɑɑrɔ wunɛn yɛnun bɔkuɔ, mi wunɛn mɛro u wunɛn gurɑ suɑ u nun mɑrɑ.
A de nɛ turon gɑri yi n wɑ̃ɑ wunɛn gɔ̃ruɔ. A de ɑ n nɛ turo bɔkɑsi. Domi kĩru tɑ dɑm mɔwɑ nge gɔɔ. Nisinu nu mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɑ̃ɑ gɔbunu nge gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru. Nin dɑm mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ yɑri. Yinni Gusunɔn min diyɑ yi wee.
Nim wɔ̃kun nim kɑ mɛn kpɑ̃ɑru mu ǹ kpɛ̃ mu kĩrun dɔ̃ɔ go. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ dɑɑnun nim yiburu tɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ tu kĩi te wukiri. Tɔnu wi u win dukiɑ kpuro wɛ̃ bu kɑ nùn kĩɑn sɔ̃, u ǹ kĩi te wɑsi. Yen kɔkɔrɔ, bɑ koo nùn gɛmwɑ.
sɑ sesu piibu mɔ wi u kun ginɑ bwɑ̃ɑ kpiɑ. Amɔnɑ sɑ ko nùn kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ nùn kĩɑn nɑ.
Ù n sɑ̃ɑ nge gbɑ̃rɑru, sɑ ko tu tɑ̃sisiɑwɑ kɑ sii geesu. Ù n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge kɔnnɔ, sɑ ko ge kɔrewɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛdurun gɑmbo.
nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbɑ̃rɑru, mɑ nɛn bwɑ̃ɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge wuu kɔ̃sobun wɑ̃ɑ yeru. Nɛn kĩnɑsi u yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ bɔri yɛndu mɔ win mi.
Sɑlomɔɔ u resɛm tɔ̃kɑn gbɑɑru mɔ Bɑɑli Hɑmɔɔwɔ. Mɑ u gbɑɑ te kɔ̃sobu nɔmu sɔndiɑ. Ben bɑɑwure u rɑ kɑ sii geesun gobi nɔrɔbu (1.000) nɛwɑ bu sere gbɑɑ ten mɑrum sɔri.
Sɑlomɔɔ u win sii geesun gobi nɔrɔbu (1.000) suo u n mɔ, kpɑ u win gbɑɑ kɔ̃sobu yen goobu (200) wɛ̃. Nɛnɑ nɑ nɛn tiin resɛm gbɑɑru mɔ, mɑ nɑ tu kɔ̃su.
A de n wunɛn nɔɔ nɔ nɛn kĩnɑsi, wunɛ wi ɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑru sɔɔ. Kpɑɑsibɑ kĩ bu gu nɔ.
ɑ wɑsi suo nɛn kĩnɑsi, kpɑ ɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑɑ kpiku ǹ kun mɛ nge gini kpɛmɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ guuru wɔllɔ mi yɑkɑ nubu durorugisu wɑ̃ɑ.











































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Tire ten gɑri yi sun sɔ̃ɔmɔ ye Yeremi Hilikiyɑn bii u kuɑ kɑ gɑri yi Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Hilikiyɑ wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑ̃ku kowo goo Anɑtɔtuɔ, Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ.
Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Yosiɑsi Amɔɔn biin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ itɑse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi wi gɑri kuɑ.
U mɑɑ kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ Yoyɑkimu wi u sɑ̃ɑ Yosiɑsin bii Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon wɑɑti sɔɔ, kɑ mɑɑ Sedesiɑsi Yosiɑsin biin wɑɑti sɔɔ sere n kɑ girɑri win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑsen suru nɔɔbuse. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ nɛ, Yeremi gɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ,
u sere mɑn mɔmɛ nɛn mɛron nukurɔ, u mɑn yɛ̃ sɑɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn mɑrubu kpɑ. U mɑn gɔsɑ u yi nɛnɛm n kɑ ko win gɔro hɑnduniɑn bwesenun mi bu sere mɑn mɑ.
Mɑ nɑ nùn wisɑ nɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, wee nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n gɑri gere tɔn dɑbinun wuswɑɑɔ, domi nɛ biiwɑ.
Adɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n ku gere mɛ. Domi bèn mi u mɑn gɔriɔ kpuro kon dɑwɑ. Ye u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro kon ye gerewɑ.
N ku ben bɛrum ko. Domi u ko n kɑ mɑn wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ u mɑn wɔrɑ kɑrin di. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Mɑ u win nɔmu dɛmiɑ u nɛn nɔɔ bɑbɑ u nɛɛ, wee u win gɑri doke nɛn nɔɔwɔ.
Yen biruwɑ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, wee gisɔ, u mɑn yiiko wɛ̃ bwesenu kɑ nin sinɑmbu kpuron wɔllɔ n kɑ nu wukiri n surɑ, kpɑ n mɑɑ wure n nu girɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ. Mɛyɑ n mɑɑ kɑ nu kɔsuku n kɑm koosiɑ, kpɑ n mɑɑ wure n nu seeyɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ mɑn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ mi. Mɑ nɑ nùn wisɑ nɑ nɛɛ, dɑ̃ru gɑrun kɑ̃ɑsɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ.
Mɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ wɑwɑ dee dee, domi u ko n tii sɛ u kɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibiɑ.
Mɑ u kpɑm mɑn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑ nɑ mɑɑ wɑɑmɔ mi. Nɑ nùn wisɑ nɑ nɛɛ, wekerɑ nɑ wɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ tɑ mɑn nɔɔ sike tɑ swɛ̃ɛ tɑ gbisimɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, geemɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn diyɑ wɑhɑlɑ yɑ koo nɑ yu tem mɛn tɔmbu kpuro wɔri.
U koo sinɑm be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ seeyɑmɑ bu nɑ bu Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ Yudɑn wuu si su tie tɑbu wɔri kpɑ bu Yerusɑlɛmu ye tɑrusi bu sinɑ yen gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔsɔ nge siri kowobu.
U koo win tɔmbu sɛɛyɑsiɑ ben kɔ̃sɑ yen sɔ̃ ye bɑ kɑ nùn deri, bɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ, mɑ bɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku ni ben nɔmu gɑ kuɑ yiirɑ bɑ sɑ̃wɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, n be sɔɔru koowo, n kpɑkɑ sɛ̃kɑ kpɑ n se n bu sɔ̃ kpuro ye u koo mɑn yiire. U nɛɛ, n ku de nɛn tororu tu kɑrɑ ben suunu sɔɔ, kpɑ u ku rɑɑ mɑn bɛrum sosiɑ n diiri ben wuswɑɑɔ.
Wee tɛ̃, Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbu kɑ ben wirugibu kɑ ben yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ sere tɔn be bɑ tie kpuro bɑ koo kɑ mɑn tɑbu ko. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu mɑn kɑmiɑ. Domi sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, u koo mɑn dɑm wɛ̃ nge wuu ge bɑ gbɑ̃rɑru toosi, ǹ kun mɛ nge gbere ye bɑ kuɑ kɑ sisu, ǹ kun mɛ nge gbɑ̃rɑ te bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu. U ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑ nɛ u kɑ mɑn wɔrɑ ben nɔmɑn di. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
<range>
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
n doo n bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, u yɑɑye nge mɛ i nùn kĩɑ yellu nge kurɔ kpɑo, i kɑ nùn swĩi gbɑbu tèn mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ wi turon sɔ̃. I sɑ̃ɑwɑ win ɑrumɑni ye u tii gɔsiɑ. Wi u nɑ u bɛɛ gurɑ, wɑhɑlɑ yɑ rɑ yɛ̃ro deemɛwɑ. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Tɛ̃, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, torɑ terɑ̀ bɛɛn sikɑdobɑ bɑ nùn wɑɑsi bɑ kɑ nùn deri, bɑ dɑ bɑ kɑm swĩi, mɑ ben tii bɑ kɑm kuɑ.
Bɑ ǹ tii bikie bu nɛɛ, mɑnɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ, wi, wi u bu yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di. Mɑnɑ u wɑ̃ɑ, wi, wi u kɑ bu dɑ gbɑburɔ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi. Gbɑbu te sɔɔ, nim sɑri, dɔkɔ kpirinɑ nu yibɑ, wɑ̃ɑrɑ mɑɑ sɛ̃ mi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ goo kun wɑ̃ɑ mi, goo ku rɑ mɑɑ sĩ mi.
Yen biru, u kɑ bu dɑ mi tem gem wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ bu kɑ mɛn dɑ̃ɑ bii duronu kɑ mɛn dĩɑ geenu di. Adɑmɑ ye bɑ turɑ mi, bɑ tem mɛ sɑnkɑ, bɑ mu disi doke.
Ben yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ǹ bikie bu nɛɛ, mɑnɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ woodɑ yɛ̃robu bɑ ǹ nùn gie. Ben wirugibu bɑ nùn seesi. Bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli, win gɑriyɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bɑ swĩi bɑ kɑ gɑri mɔ̀. Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃wɑ ni nu ǹ bu ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ u koo bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bibun bweseru siribu soku.
I be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun tem bure te bɑ sokumɔ Sipu mɛɛrio. I goo gɔrio Kedɑɑɔ u mɛɛri sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ u kɑ wɑ bɑ̀ n mɔ̀ nge bɛɛ,
u kɑ wɑ bweseru gɑru tɑ̀ n ten bũnu kɔsire bɑɑ mɛ nu ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gem, nge mɛ bɛɛ, i Gusunɔ deri wi u sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn bɛɛrɛ. Mɑ i wurɑ yè sɔɔ i ǹ ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ wɑsi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ wɔllugibu, i biti sooro yenin sɔ̃, kpɑ i wɛ̃nu wurɑ.
Wee win tɔmbu bɑ durum yiru kuɑ. Bɑ nùn deri, wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ nge nim gem mɛ mu koo nɔrurɑ, mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu swĩi ni nu sɑ̃ɑ nge dɔkɔ kpiri ni nu ǹ nim nɛnumɔ.
Isirelibɑ, i ǹ sɑ̃ɑ yobu. Bɑ ǹ bɛɛ mɑrɑ yoru sɔɔ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bɛɛ nɑɑ swĩi nge gbeeku yɛɛ.
Wee bɑ bɛɛ kukirisi nge gbee sinɑnsu. Bɑ bɛɛn tem yɑ̃nu gurɑ, mɑ bɑ bɛɛn wusu dɔ̃ɔ mɛniki, goo mɑɑ sɑri mi.
Nɔfu kɑ Tɑpɑnɛsigibun tii bɑ koo bɛɛ kɔni bu pɔɔru wokɑ bu kɑ bɛɛ yoru mwɛɛri.
Yeni yɑ koo bɛɛ deemɑ, domi i Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni deri sɑnɑm mɛ u bɛɛ kpɑre swɑɑ geɑ sɔɔ.
Ì n dɑ i tii Asirigibu ǹ kun mɛ Egibitigibu wɛ̃, i ben dɑɑrun nim nɔrumɔ, mbɑ i ko wɑ.
I n yɛ̃ mɑ bɛɛn nuku kɔ̃suru kɑ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ sɑriru tɑ koo bɛɛ nɔni sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ i ko wɑ, kpɑ i giɑ mɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunɑ i kuɑ mi, ye i kɑ mɑn deri, i ǹ mɑɑ mɑn nɑsie. Nɛ, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ yellun di, i tii yoru yɑrɑ, i sugu kɑ yɔni yi bɑ rɑɑ bɛɛ doke kɑsukɑ. Mɑ i nɛɛ, i ǹ mɑɑ kĩ i mɑn yoru diiyɑ. Mɑ i dɑ gungunu wɔllɔ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ kubenɔ i bũnu gɑsirimɔ i sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Yellu, nɑ bɛɛn bweseru duurɑwɑ nge resɛm dɑ̃ɑ geeru te tɑ kpuro kere, ɑdɑmɑ tɛ̃, i kɔsɑ i kuɑ nge resɛm dɑ̃ɑ te tɑ yinɑ.
Bɑɑ ì n woburɑ kɑ werem mɛ mu gɛm durom mɔ, kɑ mɛ, ko nɑ n bɛɛn disi yi wɑɑmɔwɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Amɔnɑ i ko kpĩ i siki i nɛɛ, i ǹ tii disi koosi, i ǹ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃wɑ. I bɛɛn nɑɑsun yirɑ mɛɛrio wɔwɑ sɔɔ. I de i wurɑ ye i kuɑ, bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ nge yooyoo niu ge gɑ bɔsu gɑ durɔbu kɑsu.
Bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ nge gbeeku kɛtɛku niu ge gɑ gbɑburun dɔɔnɛ mɔ. Gen yɔɔbun sɑɑ sɔɔ, gɑ rɑ n yɔ̃ɔkumɔwɑ, goo kun kpɛ̃ u gu yɔ̃rɑsiɑ. Kɛtɛku dwɑɑ ye yɑ gu kɑsu kpuro, yɑ ku rɑ wɑsire yu kɑ gu wɑ. Domi yɑ rɑ gu deemɛwɑ gen yɔɔbun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, nɑ nɛɛ, i ku bũnu gɑsiri sere bɛɛn bɑrɑnu nu diirɑ, kpɑ nim nɔru gu bɛɛ go. Adɑmɑ i ǹ wure. Mɑ i nɛɛ, n ǹ koorɔ, domi niyɑ i kĩ, i ko mɑɑ nu swĩi i sɑ̃wɑ.
Nge mɛ sekuru tɑ rɑ gbɛnɔ mwɛ bɑ̀ n nùn mwɑ subɑru sɔɔ, nge mɛyɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kɑ bɛɛn sinɑmbu kɑ bɛɛn wirugibu kɑ bɛɛn yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu i ko i sekuru wɑ.
Domi i bũu dɑ̃ru sokumɔ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑ, mɑ i mɑɑ kperu sokumɔ bɛɛn mɛro. Wee bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kpuro i mɑn biru kisi, i ǹ mɑɑ mɑn mɛɛrimɔ. Adɑmɑ ì n wɑ̃ɑ wɑhɑlɑ sɔɔ, i rɑ nɛɛwɑ, n seemɑ n bɛɛ fɑɑbɑ ko.
Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, bɛɛn bwɑ̃ɑroku ni i tii sekuɑ nu kɑ bɛɛn wusu geeru nɛ mi, mɑnɑ nu wɑ̃ɑ. Nu seewo nu bɛɛ fɑɑbɑ ko wɑhɑlɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ nù n koo kpĩ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i kɑ mɑn sikirinɑmɔ. Wee bɛɛ kpuro i ǹ kɑ mɑn yɔ̃re.
Kɑm sɔɔrɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. I ǹ nɛn sɛɛyɑsiɑ bi gɑrisi gɑ̃ɑnu. I Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu wɔri i go nge mɛ gbee sunɔ gɑ rɑ yɑɑ wɔri gu go.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛ be i tie, i nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ. Nɑ bɛɛ sɑ̃ɑwɛwɑ nge tem mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi? Nɑ bɛɛ sɑ̃ɑwɛwɑ nge yɑm wɔ̃ku nɑnumgiru? Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu i gerumɔ i mɔ̀, i tii mɔ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɑmɔ nɛn mi.
Wɔndiɑ u rɑ win burɑ yɑ̃nu duɑri ro? Kurɔ kpɑo u rɑ win sɔnditiɑ duɑri? Amɔnɑ bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu i kɑ mɑn duɑri n kɑ tɛ mɛ, nɑ ǹ mɑm yen tɔ̃nun geeru yɛ̃.
I durɔ dɑmɑ bwisi mɔ sere kurɔ tɑnɔbu bɑ yi giɑmɔ bɛɛn min di.
Wee tɔn be bɑ ǹ toren yɛm mu yibɑ bɛɛn yɑbenɔ be, be i ǹ kɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu gɑnu mwɛ.
Kɑ mɛ, i tii sokumɔ be bɑ dɛɛre. Mɑ i mɔ̀, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru yu bɛɛ doonɑri. Adɑmɑ kon bɛɛ siribu soku yèn sɔ̃ i mɔ̀, i ǹ durum mɔ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i sirenɛ i kɑ swɑɑ kɔsi. Egibitigibɑ koo bɛɛ sekuru doke nge mɛ Asirigibɑ bɛɛ kuɑ.
Kpɑ i yɑri min di i n tuke. Domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ be i nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ mi yinɑ. I ǹ mɑɑ somiru gɑru wɑsi ben min di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, goo ù n win kurɔ yinɑ, mɑ kurɔ wi, u dɑ u durɔ goo suɑ, durɔ guro wi, u rɑ mɑɑ kurɔ wi nɑɑ de? Aɑwo. Ù n kuɑ mɛ, yɑ koo win tem disi doke. Adɑmɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i kuɑ mɛ. I dɑ i bũu dɑbiru sɑ̃ɑmɔ, mɑ i kĩ n mɑɑ bɛɛ mwɑɑmɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
I seewo i mɛɛri guunu giɑ, kpɑ i wɑ nge guuru gɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ tèn mi i ǹ bũnu sɑ̃wɑ. Wee, i rɑ bũnu kɑsu nge mɛ kurɔ tɑnɔ u rɑ win kĩnɑsibu kɑsu. I sɑ̃ɑ nge Dɑɑrubu swɑɑ dio be bɑ rɑ n tɔmbu mɑrɑ swɛɛ sɔɔ. Mɑ i tem mɛ disi doke bɛɛn bũu gɑsiribu kɑ bɛɛn nuku kɔ̃surun sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ gurɑ kun tɑ̃rɑmɔ bu sere nɛɛ, yɑ koo nɛ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, i bũnu gɑsirimɔ i dɔɔwɑ. Sekurɑ kun bɛɛ mɔ̀.
Wee tɛ̃, i mɑn nɔɔgiru suemɔ i mɔ̀, i mɑn nɔɔgiru mɔ̀ i gerumɔ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑ, i mɑɑ mɑn kĩwɑ sɑɑ bɛɛn piiburun di.
Mɑ i bikiɑmɔ, ko nɑ n kɑ bɛɛ mɔru sɑ̃ɑwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ? Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, yeniwɑ i rɑ n gerumɔ, ɑdɑmɑ i kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ i dɔɔ nge mɛ̀n nɔɔ i kĩ.
Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Yosiɑsin wɑɑti sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ wɑ ye Isirelibɑ bɑ mɔ̀? Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ. Wee, bɑ dɑ mi gungunu kɑ dɑ̃ɑ kubenu wɑ̃ɑ kpuro, bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ tii sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ̀ n yenibɑ kpuro kuɑ, bɑ koo wurɑmɑ nɛn mi. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ wurɑmɛ. Ben mɛro bisibu, Yudɑn bweseru te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge kurɔ nɑɑnɛ sɑrirugii, ben tii bɑ wɑ mɛ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ tem mɛ disi doke ben bũu gɑsiribun sɔ̃ kɑ ben sekuru sɑrirun sɔ̃ te bɑɑwure u gerumɔ. Mɑ bɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑmɔ kpenu kɑ dɑ̃nun nuurɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bu yinɑ mɑ nɑ bu yinɑbun tireru wɛ̃. Kɑ mɛ, nɑ wɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ ǹ bɛrum kue. Bɑ dɑwɑ bɑ bũnu gɑsirɑ ben tii. Bɑ ǹ wurɑmɛ nɛn mi kɑ ben gɔ̃ru kpuro. Weesu sɔɔrɑ bɑ yɔ̃.

<range>
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɑɑ mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ, bɑ sɑnɔ bo kɑ sere Yudɑbɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ doo sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ ɑ Isirelibɑ gɑri yini sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, bu wurɑmɑ, nɑ ǹ kɑ bu nɔnu kɔ̃su mɛɛrimɔ. Domi nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔnwɔndugii. Nɑ ku rɑ mɔru ko n kɑ tɛ.
Bu gesi ben durum wuro. Bu wuro mɑ bɑ ǹ kɑ mɑn yɔ̃re, nɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni. Domi bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu gɑsirɑ dɑ̃ɑ kubenɔ. Bɑ yinɑ bu nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bu wurɑmɑ nɛn mi, be, bii mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ. Domi nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ben Yinni. Kon be bɑ tie yɑrɑmɑ wuu sìn mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpuron di, bɑɑ ǹ n tɔn turon nɑ, ǹ kun mɛ yiru. Kpɑ n kɑ bu wurɑmɑ nɛn mi Siɔniɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon bu kpɑrobu wɛ̃ be nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ kĩ. Kpɑ bu bu kpɑrɑ kɑ bwisi, kɑ lɑɑkɑri.
Bɑ koo mɑrurɑ bu dɑbiɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ. Sɑnɑm mɛ sɔɔ, bɑ koo mɑn giɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɛn woodɑn kpɑkororun gɑri mɔ̀. Goo kun mɑɑ ten bwisikunu mɔ̀. Goo kun mɑɑ tu yɑɑyɑmɔ u nɛɛ, mɑnɑ tɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Goo kun mɑɑ ten kɔsire mɔ̀.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, nɛn sinɑ gɔnɑ yɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Kpɑ bwese ni nu tie kpuro nu mɑɑ mɛnnɑ mi, nɛn yĩsirun sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben bwisi kɔ̃si swĩimɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Yudɑbɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ koo mɛnnɑ bu ko tiɑ. Domi bɑ koo wurɑmɑ sɑnnu sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di. Kpɑ bu sinɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃ bɑ tubi di.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon dɑɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kowɑ nɛn bii kĩnɑsibu, kpɑ n bɛɛ tem gem wɛ̃ mɛ mu burɑm bo hɑnduniɑ yeni sɔɔ. Nɑ rɑɑ tɑmɑɑ i ko mɑn sokuwɑ bɛɛn Bɑɑbɑ, kpɑ i ku mɑɑ mɑn deri.
Adɑmɑ i mɑn tɔnu kɑm kom kuɑ nge mɛ kurɔ nɑɑnɛ sɑrirugii u rɑ win durɔ kue. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee, nɔɔ gɑgu gɑ nɔɔrɑ guuru wɔllɔ. Ase Isirelibɑrɑ bɑ kuuki mɔ̀ bɑ bũnu kɑnɑmɔ, domi ben sɑnu sɑnusu kpuro su sɑnkirɑ, bɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni duɑri.
Bɛɛ, bii mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ, i wurɑmɑ nɛn mi. Kon bɛɛ bɛɛn mɛm nɔɔbu sɑriru suuru kuɑ. Mɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ nɛɛ, Gusunɔ, wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn Yinni. Bɛsɛ wee, wunɛn miyɑ sɑ wee.
Geemɑ bũu ni sɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ guunu wɔllɔ sɑ kuuki mɔ̀, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ weesu. Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni, wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛ Isirelibɑn fɑɑbɑ kowo.
Wee, sɑɑ bɛsɛn birun di sɑ wɑɑmɔ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli, wiyɑ u bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑn gbeɑn dĩɑnu di kpuro, kɑ mɑɑ ben yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ ben kɛtɛbɑ kɑ sere ben bibu. Mɑ bɑ sekuru wɑ.
Su kpunɑ sekuru sɔɔ kpɑ su bɛsɛn bɛɛrɛ sɑriru wukiri nge bekuru. Domi bɛsɛ kɑ bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ sɑ wunɛ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni torɑri. Sɑɑ bɛsɛn birun di n kɑ gisɔ girɑri sɑ ǹ wunɛn gere wure.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, ì n kĩ i wurɑmɑ nɛn mi, i ko kpĩ i wurɑmɑ. Ì n bɛɛn bũu sɑ̃ɑru deri, i ǹ mɑɑ yɑɑyɑɑre mɔ̀,
ì n dɑ bɔ̃re gem sɔɔ kɑ gɔ̃ru dɛɛrɔ, i nɛɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru, sɑɑ yerɑ bwese tukunu nu koo domɑru wɑ nɛn min di, kpɑ bu woo kɑnɑ nɛn sɔ̃.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɑ mɔ̀, i gbee kpɑɑnu kɑsirio, i dɑ̃ɑ dɔ̃ɔ go. I ku rɑ mɑɑ bɛɛn dĩɑnu duure sɑ̃ki sɔɔ.
Geemɑ, i bɑngo sɑ̃ɑ wɑsi sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ n tiewɑ i mɑn tii wɛ̃, kpɑ nɛn mɔru yu ku rɑɑ yɑburɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ, wi goo kun kpɛ̃ u go, domi bɛɛn nuku kɔ̃suru tɑ kpɑ̃.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, i Yudɑbɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ kpɑ i gbɑ̃rɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. I kɔbɑ soowo tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ. I nɔɔgiru suo kɑ dɑm i nɛɛ, bu mɛnnɑmɑ bu dɑ wuu si su gbɑ̃rɑnu mɔ sɔɔ.
Bu gidi bɔrɑ sueyo Siɔni giɑ bu duki yɑkuro bu ku yɔ̃rɑ. Domi Gusunɔ u koo de kɔ̃sɑ yu nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di.
Yibɛrɛ be bɑ rɑ bwesenu kɑm koosie bɑ seewɑ ben wɑ̃ɑ yerun di nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ tii dɛmiɑmɔ gen bweun di, bɑ wee bu kɑ tem mɛ kɑm koosiɑ. Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, bɑ koo bɛɛn wusu kɔsuku kpɑ su ko bɑnsu.
I sɑɑki sebuo nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃ kpɑ i swĩ i weeweenu ko, domi Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru kun sun doonɑrimɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yen tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ, sinɑ boko kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu bɑ koo mwiɑ kpɑnɑ kpɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bu biti soorɑ, kpɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bu nɔsu nɛnɛ,
bu nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ be, Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ ye nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ koo bɔri yɛndu wɑ. Wee tɛ̃ bɑ woburu sɔndi ben wĩinɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon bu sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, wee, woo gɑ wee sɑɑ gbɑburun guunun di, gu kɑ nɛn tɔmbu Yudɑbɑ swee. Woo ge, gɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ fɛrɛ fɛrɛ nge ge bɑ koo kɑ dobi sɑrɑ.
Gɑ ko n dɑm mɔwɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ gu sokusiɑmɔ. Tɛ̃wɑ kon bu siri.
Mɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ nɛɛ, gberɑ sun di, domi sɑ kɑm kuɑ. Wee, wi u koo sun kɑm koosiɑ u sĩimɔ nge guru wiru. Win tɑbu kɛkɛ yi sɑ̃ɑ nge guru woo. Mɑ win dumi yi gunɔ bɑkeru sɑ̃ɑbu kere.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ i kĩ i n kɔ̃sɑ bwisikumɔ. I bɛɛn gɔ̃rusu dɛɛrɑsio, kpɑ i fɑɑbɑ wɑ.
I swɑɑ dɑkio gɑri yi bɑ kɑ nɑ Dɑnun tem di kɑ Efɑrɑimun guunun di bɑ nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ wee.
I ye bwesenu kpuro nɔɔsio. Kpɑ i ye Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ i nɛɛ, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wee sɑɑ tontonden di. Bɑ koo Yudɑbɑn wusu tɑbun kuuki koosi.
Kpɑ bu Yerusɑlɛmu sikerenɑ nge be bɑ gberu kɔ̃su. Domi yen tɔmbu bɑ mɑn seesi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, geemɑ wɑhɑlɑ yɑ bɛɛ nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ sere bɛɛn woo sɔndɔ. Adɑmɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɛɛn kom kɔ̃sum kɑ bɛɛn nuku kɔ̃surun ɑre.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, nɛn nuki mɑn wuririmɔ mɑ nɛn tororɑ kɑrɑ. Nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n nɔɔ mɑri wɑhɑlɑ yenin sɔ̃. Nɑ tɑbun kɔbɑ nɔɔmɔ. Bu wee.
Bɑ sun nɔɔsiɑmɔ mɑ bɑ wuu dɑbinu kɔsukɑ. Tem mɛ kpuro mu kɑm kobu dɔɔwɑ. Subɑru sɔɔrɑ bɑ nɑ bɑ bɛsɛn tɑbu kowobun kuu bekuruginu wukurɑ. Mɑ bɑ nu gurɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ.
Sere dommɑ nɑ kon yibɛrɛbɑn gidi bɔrɑ wɑɑmɔ, kpɑ nɑ n kɔbɑn swĩi nɔɔmɔ tɑ̃ɑ tɑ̃ɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee, nɛn tɔmbu bɑ ǹ bwisi mɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn yɛ̃. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɑri bɑkɑsu. Bɑ kɔ̃sɑn kobun bwisi mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ geɑn kobu yɛ̃.
Nɑ tem mɛɛrɑ mɑ mu sɑ̃ɑ bitɑm, gɑ̃ɑnu sɑri mɛn wɔllɔ. Nɑ mɑɑ wɔllu mɛɛrɑ, nɑ deemɑ yɑm bururɑm sɑri mi.
Nɑ guunu mɛɛrɑ, nɑ wɑ wee, nu wɔrumɑ. Mɑ gungunu nu bɑ̃ɑrimɔ.
Nɑ mɑɑ mɛɛrɑ nɑ wɑ wee, tɔnu sɑri tem sɔɔ. Mɑ gunɔsu su yɑrinɑ kpuro.
Nɑ tem mɛɛrɑ mɛ mu rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tem gem. Nɑ deemɑ wee, mu kuɑ tem sɑɑrɑm. Mɑ wuu si su wɑ̃ɑ mi, su wɔrukɑ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u ye kuɑ win mɔrun sɑɑbu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, u koo tem mɛ gɔsiɑ tem sɑɑrɑm, ɑdɑmɑ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, u ǹ derimɔ mu n sɑ̃ɑ mɛ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, tem mu ko n gɔɔ wooru sɔ̃, kpɑ wɔllu tu yɑm tĩrɑ. Domi u himbɑ yi kɔ, u ǹ mɑɑ biru wurɔ.
Ye wusu kpuron tɔmbu bɑ mɑɑsɔbu kɑ tɛn towobun wɔkinu nuɑ, yerɑ bɑ duki yɑkikirɑ kpuro. Gɑbɑ wɔriki dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃sɔ mɑ gɑbɑ duɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ. Bɑ wuu si deri su kuɑ bɑnsu.
Wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmu, burɑru mbɑ kɑɑ mɑɑ tii kuɑ. Kɑɑ tii beku wunɔmgiru kɑsuɑwɑ ɑ dewe, kpɑ ɑ wurɑn sɑbɑ sebe, kpɑ ɑ kiro doke? Kɑm sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ tii burɑru kuɑ. Wee wunɛn kĩnɑsibu bɑ nun tusɑ bɑ kɑsu bu nun go.
Nɑ wuri kɑ weeweenu nɔɔmɔ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u win bii gbiikoo mɑ. Ase Yerusɑlɛmun nɔɔwɑ gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ mi. Yɑ wom gɑbɑmɔ, yɑ nɔmɑ dɛmiɛ yɑ mɔ̀, yɑ kɑm kuɑwɑ. Wee yen yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ ye sɛ̃re, yɑ gɔɔ dɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i bɛɛn swɛɛ kpuro swĩiyɔ. I doo kɑ mi tɔmbɑ rɑ mɛnnɛ i kɑsu ì n ko i goo wɑ wi u rɑ ko dee dee mɑ u rɑ gem gere. Ì n yɛ̃ro wɑ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon bɛɛn durum wɔkɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u nɛɛ, wee, bɑ rɑ n bɔ̃rumɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru, ɑdɑmɑ weesu sɔɔrɑ bɑ bɔ̃ri yi mɔ̀.
Yinni, n ǹ wi u gem swĩi, wiyɑ ɑ kɑsu? Wee, ɑ bu surɑ ɑdɑmɑ bɑ nun ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ. A bu nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ, ɑdɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu gie. Ben gɔ̃ru gɑ bɔbiɑwɑ nge kperu. Bɑ yinɑ bu wurɑmɑ wunɛn mi.
Mɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bibu, bɑ mɔ̀wɑ nge gɑri bɑkɑsu. Domi bɑ ǹ wunɛn swɛɛ yɛ̃, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wunɛn woodɑbɑ yɛ̃.
Kon gɔsirɑ n dɑ be bɑ bukuren mi, kpɑ n kɑ bu gɑri ko. Domi be, bɑ wunɛn swɛɛ yɛ̃, bɑ mɑɑ wunɛn woodɑbɑ yɛ̃. Wee, ben tii bɑ nun yinɑ nge yɑ̃ɑ te tɑ wɛ̃ɛ yinɑ mɑ tɑ yi kɑsukɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ̀ n duɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ, gbee sinɑnsu su rɑ bu go. Bɑ̀ n duɑ yɑkɑsɔ, gbeeku bɔ̃nu nu rɑ bu go. Mɑ musuku gbeeku gɑ rɑ bu yɔɔru bwɛ̃ɛyɛ ben wuun gbɑ̃rɑrun kɔnnɔwɔ, be bɑ yɑrɑ min di, gu kɑ bu sɛ̃re gu kɑsuku. Domi ben torɑnu nu dɑbiɑ. Ben nɑɑnɛ sɑriru tɑ kpɑ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kon nɛn tɔmbun durum wɔkɑ. Domi wee, bɑ mɑn deri mɑ bɑ bɔ̃rumɔ kɑ bũnun yĩsinu. Nɑ bu debiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bũnɑ bɑ kɑ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ bɑ nu gɑsirimɔ.
Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dum dwɛɛ yi yi debɑ yi wuri mɔ̀ yi kurɔbu gire. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ rɑ n ben berusebun kurɔbu nɑɑ gire, bɑ n kpeeki mɔ̀.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ ko n bwese teni mɔru kɔsie, kpɑ n tu sɛɛyɑsiɑ yenin sɔ̃.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon bu yibɛrɛbɑ suremɑ, be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge nɛn resɛm gbɑɑru. Bɑ koo ten kɑrɑ surɑ kpɑ bu ten dɑ̃ɑ kɑ̃ɑsi bɔɔri yi yi ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgii. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ gbɑɑ te kɑm koosiɑmɔ kpuro.
Mɛyɑ kon ko domi Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ ǹ kɑ nɛ turo yɔ̃re. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑn siki bɑ nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ dɑm gɑm mɔ. Kɔ̃sɑ kun mɑɑ bu deemɑmɔ. Bɑ ǹ tɑbu wɑsi, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɔ̃ɔru wɑsi.
Nɛn sɔmɔbun gɑri yi mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wom dirum. Ben goo ku rɑ bu gɑri gee sɔ̃. Bɑ mɑɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, sɔmɔ ben gɑri yi wɔri ben tii sɔɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, nɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, ye bɑ kɑ geruɑ mɛ, wee, nɛn gɑri yi ko n sɑ̃ɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ wunɛ Yeremin nɔɔ sɔɔ, kpɑ nɛn tɔn be, bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ ye dɔ̃ɔ wi, u koo mwɑ.
Tɛ̃ bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, Isirelibɑ, kon bɛɛ bweseru gɑru suremɑ tontonden di. Bwese te, tɑ dɑm mɔ tɑ rɑɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑɑ yellun di. I ǹ mɑɑ ten bɑrum nɔɔmɔ.
Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔbu be kpuro. Ben sɛ̃ɛnun sɑɑbu, gonu rɑ n yibɑwɑ sikɑɔ.
Bwese te, tɑ koo bɛɛn dĩɑnu kɑm koosiɑ, kɑ bɛɛn bibu, kɑ bɛɛn yɑɑ sɑbenu, kɑ bɛɛn dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum, kpɑ bu bɛɛn wuu si su gbɑ̃rɑnu mɔ tɑbu wɔri, bu kɔsuku, sì sɔɔ bɛɛn yĩiyɔbu wɑ̃ɑ.
Adɑmɑ yen tɔ̃ɔ te, n ǹ bɛɛ kpuro kon kɑm koosiɑ.
Tɛ̃ Yeremi, bɑ̀ n nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni nɑ bu yenin bweseru kuɑmmɛ, kɑɑ bu wisiwɑ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ mɑn deri bɑ kɑ tɔn tukobun bũnu nɑ ben temɔ bɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Nge mɛyɑ ben tii bɑ koo dɑ bu tɔn tukobu sɑ̃ tem tukumɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, i Yɑkɔbun bweseru sɔ̃ɔwɔ, be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yudɑbɑ, i nɛɛ,
bu swɑɑ dɑkio ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wɔ̃kobu, bɑ ǹ bwisi mɔ. Bɑ nɔni mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ yɑm wɑɑmɔ. Bɑ swɑsu mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ gɑri nɔɔmɔ.
Bɑ ǹ koo mɑn nɑsiɑ? Bɑ ǹ koo diiri nɛn wuswɑɑɔ? Nɛnɑ nɑ derɑ yɑni sɛɛri yi nim wɔ̃kun nim gunuɑ. Mɑ nɑ nɛɛ, mu ǹ mɑɑ sɑrɑmɔ mi nɑ mɛn nɔɔ burɑ yeru yi mi. Miyɑ mu ko n wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Bɑɑ mɛ nim kurenu nu rɑ se, nu ǹ dɑm mɔ. Bɑɑ mɛ nu rɑ wɔki, mu ku rɑ gɑm de.
Adɑmɑ be, nɛn tɔmbu, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ. Bɑ rɑ kɑ mɑn mɔru ko kpɑ bu mɑn deri.
Bɑ ku rɑ tii sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, bu nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑsiɑ, nɛ wi nɑ rɑ bu gurɑ wɛ̃ wɔ̃ɔ kɑ wɔ̃ɔ yen sɑɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ n mɑɑ sɑɑ yi bu kɑ dĩɑnu gɛ̃.
Bɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ ben durum kɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ domɑ ten bweseru wɑ.
Domi ben suunu sɔɔ tɔn kɔ̃sobɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ rɑ tɔmbu yɛ̃ri bɛriewɑ bu kɑ bu mwɛɛri nge be bɑ rɑ gunɔsu tɑɑ yinuɛ.
Tɑkiwɑ yɑ rɑ n yibɑ ben yɛnusɔ, nge mɛ gunɔ tɑɑson gunɔ diru tɑ rɑ n gunɔsu yibɑ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kuurɑ mɑ bɑ dɑm kuɑ.
Bɑ dĩɑ geenu di mɑ bɑ bɔriɑ. Bɑ rɑ kɔ̃sɑ kowɑ yu bɑndɑ. Bɑ ku rɑ kɑ gobeku yinɛ, ǹ kun mɛ sɑ̃ɑro. Bɑ ku rɑ bu ben gem wɛ̃. Kpɑ ben tii bɑ n kuurɑmɔ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ kon bwese teni mɔru kɔsie, kpɑ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ yenin sɔ̃.
Wee, nɛn tɔmbɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu mɔ̀ tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Ben sɔmɔbu bɑ gɑri weesugii mɔ̀. Mɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ben tiin ɑrufɑɑni kɑsu. Mɑ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ bu yen dɑm kɛ̃mɔ. Sɑnɑm mɛ kpuro yɑ koo nɔru ko, ɑmɔnɑ bɑ koo ko.
Bɛɛ Bɛnyɑmɛɛbɑ, i duki yɑkuro Yerusɑlɛmun di. I kɔbɑ soowo Tekoɑɔ. I yĩreru koowo Bɛti Hɑkerɛmuɔ. Domi nɔni swɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑru kɑ kɑm kobu sisi, sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di.
Bɑ koo Yerusɑlɛmu, wuu burɔ ge kɔsuku.
Wee, tɔmbɑ ye wɔrim wee nge kpɑrobu kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu. Bɑ ben sɑnsɑni girɑ bɑ kɑ ye sikerenɑ. Ben bɑɑwure u win bweu mwɑ, wi kɑ win tɑbu kowobu.
Bɑ kuuki mɔ̀ bɑ mɔ̀, i de su se sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ su wuu ge wɔri. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ sɔ̃ɔ kpɑ, yɑm mɑɑ tĩrɑmɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i de su se wɔ̃kuru su dɑ su gen dii geenu kɔsuku.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bu dɑ̃ɑ bɔɔrio kpɑ bu kɑ ye sɑsɑnu girɑ bu kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu sikerenɑ, bu ye sɛɛyɑsiɑ yèn sɔ̃ yen tɔmbɑ dɑm dɔrenɑmɔ.
Nge mɛ dɔkɔ yɑ rɑ nim swĩ mu n kokumɔ, nge mɛyɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibun nuku kɔ̃suru tɑ rɑ n sɔ̃ɔsirɑmɔ. Dɑɑ bɔɔbɔyɑ kɑ kɑm kobun kookoosun gɑriyɑ yi rɑ n nɔɔrɑmɔ mi. Nɑ rɑ n wɑɑmɔ bɑɑdommɑ bɑ tɔmbu nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ bu mɛɛrɑ mɔ̀.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i nɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru lɑɑkɑri koowo, kpɑ n ku rɑ nɛn tii gɑwɑ sɑɑ bɛɛn min di n bɛɛn tem kɑm koosiɑ.
Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɑ koo Isireli be bɑ tie gurɑ mɑm mɑm nge mɛ bɑ rɑ dɑ̃ɑ binu sɔri bɑ kun gɑ̃ɑnu deri.
Mɑ Yeremi u wisɑ u nɛɛ, wɑrɑ kon gɑri sɔ̃, kpɑ n nùn kirɔ ko. Wɑrɑ koo mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. Wee, bɑ swɑɑ tɑu. Bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu lɑɑkɑri ko. Ben mi, wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi rɑ bu sekuru kowɑ. Bɑ ku rɑ kɑ̃ bu yi nɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, wee, nɑ kɑ tɔn be mɔru mɔ̀ wunɛn sɔ̃. Nɑ kpɑnɑ n tii nɛnɛ. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ de mɔru ye ɑ mɑn kuɑmmɛ mi, yu wɔri bibu sɔɔ be bɑ dweemɔ dɑ̃ɑ sɑɑnɔ, kɑ sere mɑɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑn wuunu sɔɔ. Domi kurɔbu kɑ durɔbu kɑ tɔkɔnu, kpurowɑ bɑ koo gurɑ bu kɑ doonɑ.
Kpɑ ben yɛnusu su ko gɑbugisu kɑ ben gbeɑ kɑ ben kurɔbu. Domi kon tem mɛ kpuron tɔmbu nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Domi sɑɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbun di sere kɑ dɑmgibɔ, ben tii tiin ɑrufɑɑniwɑ bɑ rɑ n nɑɑ gire. Nɛn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobun tii, bɑ rɑ n weesu mɔ̀wɑ.
Bɑ rɑ n nɛn tɔmbun wɑhɑlɑ ɑtɑfiiru sɑ̃ɑwɑ, bɑ n mɔ̀, ɑlɑfiɑ wɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ ɑlɑfiɑ gɑɑ sɑri.
N weenɛwɑ sekuru tɑ n bu mɔ̀, kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀n sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ sekuru mɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑm wure mɑ bɑ tore. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo wɔrumɑ bu gbi. Bɑ koo fukurɑ bu wɔruku dɔmɑ te kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni kpuro geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u win tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, i seewo i swɛɛ mɛɛri i bɛɛn yellun swɑɑ burɑ ye kɑsu i swĩi, kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ ǹ ye swĩimɔ.
Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, nɑ bɛɛ kɔ̃sobu wɛ̃ i kɑ ben kɔbɑn swĩi swɑɑ dɑki. Adɑmɑ bɑ wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ ǹ swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, u nɛɛ, bɛɛ bwese ni nu tie, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye yɑ koo nɛn tɔmbu deemɑ.
Bɛɛ temgibu, i wɑɑwo. Wee kon nɛn tɔmbu kɔ̃sɑ sure. Yerɑ yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ ben bwisikunun ɑre. Domi bɑ ǹ nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki, mɑ bɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ gɛmɑ.
Nɑ ǹ ben turɑre ye yɑ wee Sebɑn di ǹ kun mɛ dɑ̃ɑ kiku nubu duroruguu ge bɑ kɑ nɑ sɑɑ tontonden din bukɑtɑ mɔ sɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃. Nɑ ǹ ben yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kĩ. Mɛyɑ ben yɑ̃ku ni nu tie, nu ǹ mɑɑ mɑn wɛ̃remɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon bu sokurɑtiɑ dokeɑ, kpɑ bɑɑbɑbɑ kɑ ben bibu, tɔnu mɑɑ kɑ win bɔrɔ bu sokurɑ mi bu gbi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee bweseru gɑrɑ sisi sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di mi n tomɑ. Bwese ten tɔmbu bɑ dɑm mɔ.
Bɑ tɛnnu kɑ yɑɑsi nɛni. Bɑ nuki sosu, bɑ ǹ wɔnwɔndu mɔ. Mɑ bɑ kukirimɔ nge nim wɔ̃kun nim. Bɑ yɔɔwɑ dumi wɔllɔ, mɑ bɑ yɔ̃ swɛɛ swɛɛ, bɑ tɑbun sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri, wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ Siɔni.
Yerusɑlɛmugibɑ nɛɛ, ye sɑ ben lɑbɑɑri nuɑ, yerɑ bɛsɛn gɔmɑ dwiiyɑ. Sɑ wururɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Goo u ku rɑɑ yɑri u dɑ swɛɛɔ. Goo ku rɑɑ mɑɑ yɑri u dɑ yɑkɑsɔ. Domi yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, bɑ ben tɑkobibɑ nɛni. Tɔmbɑ bɛrum soore bɑɑmɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, i sɑɑki pɔrɑ sɛ̃keo kpɑ i tii torom wisi nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Bɛɛn bɑɑwure u gɔɔ swĩiyɔ nge wi u win bii teereru biɑ. I wuri koowo kɑ nɔni yĩresu. Domi wi u koo bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑ u koo bɛɛ wɔriwɑ subɑru sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wunɛ Yeremi, nɑ nun yi ɑ kɑ nɛn tɔmbu sɔwɑ nge mɛ seko u rɑ sii geesu sɔwe, kpɑ ɑ kɑ ben dɑɑ giɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u nɛɛ, tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wee kowobu kɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ. Bɑ bɔɔbuwɑ nge sisu. Be kpuro bɑ sɑnkirewɑ.
Bɑ̀ n sisu kɑ pɛɛrum dɔ̃ɔ doke bɑ wure, ye kpuro yɑ rɑ yɑndewɑ, kpɑ pɛɛrum mɛ, mu sii si sɔwɑ. Adɑmɑ kɑm sɔɔrɑ bɑ Isirelibɑ sɔwɑ. Ben tɔn kɔ̃sobu bɑ ǹ wunɑrɑmɔ,
mɑ bɑ bu sokumɔ sii si su ǹ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u bu biru kisi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ doo ɑ yɔ̃rɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, yeniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, be Yudɑbɑ, be, be bɑ rɑ gesi du sɑɑ kɔnnɔ minin di bu kɑ mɑn sɑ̃, bu swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bu ben sɑnu sɑnusu kɑ ben dɑɑ kɔsio. Sɑɑ yerɑ kon de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Bu ku ben nɑɑnɛ doke dii teni sɔɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɑ mi!
Bɑ̀ n ben sɑnu sɑnusu kɑ ben dɑɑ kɔsɑ, mɑ bɑ geɑ kuɑnɑmmɛ,
mɑ bɑ kun sɔbu kɑ gɔminibu kɑ gobekubɑ dɑm dɔremɔ, mɑ bɑ kun mɑɑ tɔnu wi u kun gɑ̃ɑnu kuen yɛm yɑrimɔ, mɑ bɑ kun bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ ni nu koo de bu kɑm ko,
sɑɑ yerɑ kon de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃, bɑ n mɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Adɑmɑ wee gɑri weesugiiyɑ bɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ yi yi ǹ ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ mɔ.
Bɑ rɑ n gbɛnimɔ, bɑ rɑ n tɔmbu goomɔ, bɑ rɑ n sɑkɑrɑru mɔ̀, kpɑ bɑ n nɔɔ mwɛɛ weesuginu mɔ̀, kpɑ bɑ n bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑmmɛ, kpɑ bɑ n mɑɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑru mɔ̀ te bɑ ku rɑ rɑɑ ko.
Kɔ̃si yiniwɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀, kpɑ bu sere nɑ bu yɔ̃rɑ dii tèn mi bɑ rɑ mɑn sɑ̃ bɑ n mɔ̀, sɑ yɑkiɑrɑ yibɛrɛbɑn nɔmɑn di.
Bɑ tɑmɑɑ dii tèn mi bɑ rɑ mɑn sɑ̃ tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gbɛnɔbun wɑ̃ɑ yeru? Domi mɛsumɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bu doo Siloɔ bu yɑm mi nɑ rɑɑ gɔsɑ bu kɑ mɑn sɑ̃ mɛɛri. Kpɑ bu wɑ nge mɛ nɑ mu kuɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃.
Tɛ̃, yèn sɔ̃ bɑ kookoo sinin bweseru kuɑ, mɑ nɑ bu gerusi kpeetim sɑri ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki, nɑ bu sokɑ mɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn wurɑri,
yen sɔ̃nɑ kon nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee tè sɔɔ bɑ ben nɑɑnɛ doke kɑ tem mɛ nɑ be kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃ kɑm koosiɑ nge mɛ nɑ Silo kuɑ.
Kon bu girɑ bu tondɑ nɛn wuswɑɑn di nge mɛ nɑ ben mɛro bisibu Isirelibɑ girɑ.
Wunɛ Yeremi, ɑ ku mɑn suuru kɑnɑ Yudɑbɑn sɔ̃. A ku bu kɑnɑru gɑru kuɑ. Domi nɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
A ǹ wɑɑmɔwɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Yudɑbɑn wuu mɑrosɔ kɑ sere Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ?
Bibu bɑ dɑ̃ɑ gurɑmɔ bũu yɑ̃kunun sɔ̃. Mɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ kɑ ye dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃rumɔ bũu sɑ̃ɑ yenɔ. Tɔn kurɔbɑ pɛ̃ɛ som burimɔ bu kɑ kirɑnu ko ni bɑ koo kɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑte kɑ sere mɑɑ bũnu gɑnu sɑ̃, kpɑ bu kɑ mɑn torɑri.
Adɑmɑ kɑ gem, n ǹ nɛ bɑ torɑrimɔ, beyɑ bɑ tii sekuru dokemɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon de nɛn mɔru yu wɔri nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee te sɔɔ, kɑ tɔmbu sɔɔ, kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu sɔɔ, kɑ dɑ̃ɑɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ dĩɑnu sɔɔ. Nɛn mɔru ye, yɑ ko n gbisimɔwɑ, yɑ ǹ suremɔ.
Wee ye nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, i rɑ yɑ̃kunu ko ńn sukum i rɑ di, kɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu, ɑdɑmɑ n burɑm bo i ni kpuro mɛnnɑ i bɛɛyɑm di.
Domi nɑ ǹ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ yɑ̃kuru gɑru yiire dɔmɑ te nɑ bu yɑrɑ sɑɑ Egibitin di.
Ye nɑ bu yiire yerɑ, bu nɛn gɑri nɔɔwɔ, kpɑ nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni, kpɑ be, bɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu. Bu nɛn woodɑ kpuro swĩiyɔ ye nɑ bu wɛ̃, kpɑ ben wɑ̃ɑru tu wɛ̃rɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ swɑɑ tem kpĩ bu nɛn gɑri nɔ. Ben tiin gɔ̃ru kĩrɑ bɑ swĩi, mɑ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ yɑ sosi.
Sɑɑ dɔmɑ tèn di bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ yɑrɑ Egibitin di sere n kɑ gisɔ girɑri, nɑ rɑ n bɛɛ nɛn sɔmɔbu gɔriɑmmɛwɑ sɑɑ bɑɑyere.
Adɑmɑ i swɑɑ tɑɑyɑ i ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. Mɑ i kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ n kere ye bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ kuɑ.
Wunɛ Yeremi, ɑ̀ n yenibɑ kpuro geruɑ, bɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑkimɔ. À n mɑɑ bu sokɑ, bɑ ǹ nun wurɑrimɔ.
Kɑ mɛ, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bwese te tɑ ku rɑ Gusunɔ ten Yinnin gɑri nɔ. Torɑ tee teyɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀ bɑɑ ù n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Gem ku rɑ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben nɔsɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Yudɑbɑ bu ben seri buro bu kɔ̃ yi yi sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgibu. Bu yɔɔwo guuru wɔllɔ, kpɑ bu gɔɔ swĩ. Wee bɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ, mɑ nɑ bu biru kisi.
Domi be, Yudɑbɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ nɛn nɔni sɔɔ. Bɑ kɑ bũnu duɑ diru mi bɑ rɑ mɑn sɑ̃, bɑ tu disi doke.
Mɑ bɑ bũu turɑnu bɑnɑ Tofɛtiɔ, Bɛni Hinɔmun wɔwɑɔ bu kɑ ben bibu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko mi, yɑ̃ku nìn bweseru nɑ ǹ mɑm gɔ̃ru doke n bu sɔ̃ bu ko.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ tɔ̃nu gɑnu sisi nì sɔɔ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɔwɑ ye sokumɔ Tofɛti ǹ kun mɛ Bɛni Hinɔmu. Bɑ koo ye sokuwɑ tɔn goo yeru. Miyɑ bɑ koo tɔmbu sike yèn sɔ̃ ɑyeru mɑɑ sɑri gɑm.
Gunɔsu kɑ yɛɛ yi koo tɔn gonu di. Goo sɑri wi u koo yi yinɑri.
Kon de Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ Yudɑbɑn wusu su mɑri sɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nuku dobun kuuki mɔ̀ wuu si sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kurɔ kpɑɑrun womusu nɔɔmɔ mi. Domi tem mɛ, mu koo kowɑ bɑnsu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yen tɔ̃ɔ te, bɑ koo Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbu kɑ ben ɑsɑkpɔbun kukunu sikiɑ sikirun di kɑ ben yɑ̃ku kowobuginu kɑ ben sɔmɔbuginu kɑ sere mɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmun tɔmbuginu.
Sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ, nu ko n sɔ̃ɔ soore. Wɔ̃kuru kpɑ nu n wɑ̃ɑ suru kɑ kperin tɑrum sɔɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nu gurɑmɔ bu sike. Nu koo kowɑ tɑɑki tem sɔɔ. Domi sɔ̃ɔ kɑ suru kɑ kperi yiyɑ bɑ rɑɑ kĩɑ mɑ bɑ yiirɑ bɑ yi sɑ̃wɑ.
Be bɑ koo tiɑrɑ be, Yudɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑgii be sɔɔ, mi nɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑ kpuro, gɔɔwɑ bɑ ko n kĩ n kere wɑ̃ɑru. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ nɛn tɔmbu bikio ɑ nɛɛ, tɔnu ù n wɔrumɑ, u ku rɑ se? Goo ù n gɛrɑ win swɑɑn di, u ku rɑ wurɑmɛ?
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɛn tɔmbu Yudɑbɑ bɑ swɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ swĩi bɑ dɔɔ. Bɑ yɔ̃rɑriwɑ dim dim ben weesu sɔɔ bɑ n bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Bɑ ǹ kĩ bu gɔsirɑmɑ nɛn mi.
Nɑ yɔ̃ sɛ̃ɛ nɑ bu swɑɑ dɑki kɑ lɑɑkɑri. Bɑ gɑri gerumɔ yi yi ǹ ɑsɑnsi gɑɑ mɔ. Ben goo kun gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑmɔ win nuku kɔ̃surun di, u nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ u yeni mɔ̀. Be kpuro bɑ ben tiin swɑɑ swĩiwɑ nge dumɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɑbu sɔɔ.
Bɑɑ tionko kɑ kpurɑbu kɑ kpɑɑru bɑniku nu yɛ̃ sɑɑ ye n weenɛ nu sĩ kɑ sɑɑ ye n weenɛ nu wurɑmɑ nin wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Adɑmɑ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑ yɛ̃ ye nɑ kɑ bu kpɑre.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɔnɑ bɑ koo kɑ kpĩ bu nɛɛ bɑ bwisi mɔ. Beyɑ bɑ nɛ Gusunɔn woodɑ mɔ. Domi be bɑ woodɑ ye yoruɑ, bɑ ye gɔsiɑwɑ.
Wee bwisigibɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri gɛmɑ. Mɑ bɑ yibɛrɛbɑn yinɑ mwɑɑrɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ biti kɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bwisi yirɑ̀ bɑ mɑɑ mɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu ben kurɔbu kɑ ben gbeɑ mwɛɛri. Domi sɑɑ ben bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbun di n kɑ girɑri ben dɑmgibɔ, ben tii tiin ɑrufɑɑniwɑ bɑ rɑ n nɑɑ gire kɑ tɑki. Nɛn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu, weesɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀.
Bɑ rɑ n nɛn tɔmbun wɑhɑlɑ ɑtɑfiiru sɑ̃ɑwɑ, bɑ n mɔ̀, ɑlɑfiɑ wɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ ɑlɑfiɑ gɑɑ sɑri.
N weenɛwɑ sekuru tu bu mwɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀n sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ sekurɑ ku rɑ bu mwɛ bu tukɑ. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ ben torɑnu tubu. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo wɔrumɑ bu gbi dɔmɑ te kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, gbɑɑ wuko u rɑ win dĩɑnu gɛ̃wɑ u mɛnnɑ. Adɑmɑ wee, nɑ kĩ n nɛn dĩɑnu mɛnnɑ Isirelibɑn mi, mɑ nɑ deemɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge resɛm ǹ kun mɛ nge figie ye yɑ wurusu dɛllɑ yɑ ǹ binu mɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon bu deri swɑɑ sɑrobun sɔ̃.
Yudɑbɑ bɑ nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ sɑ sɔ̃ mini. I de su mɛnnɑ kpɑ su dɑ wuu si su gbɑ̃rɑnu mɔn mi, sɑ n gɔɔ mɑrɑ. Domi Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni u yiwɑ su gbi. U koo sun nim dɛ̃ɛgim nɔrusiɑ, yèn sɔ̃ sɑ nùn torɑri.
Wee, sɑ tɑmɑɑ wɑ̃ɑrɑ koo kɔsi, ɑdɑmɑ yɑ ǹ koore. Sɑ tɑmɑɑ sɑɑ gɑɑ wee yè sɔɔ bɛsɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑru tɑ koo kpe, ɑdɑmɑ nɑndɑbɑ bu sun deemɑ.
Wee sɑ yibɛrɛbɑn dumin wɔkinu nɔɔmɔ Dɑnun berɑ giɑ. Mɑ yi wuri mɔ̀, yi tem kpuro nɛni mu diirimɔ. Yibɛrɛ be, bɑ dĩɑnu gurɑmɔ bɑ gbeɑ mwɑɑmɔ, kɑ sere Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ yen tɔmbu.
Adɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ dɑɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɛ ro? Wee kon bɛɛ wɛɛ dɛ̃ɛgii kpɑremɑ yi yi ǹ dobo dobogibun gɑri nɔɔmɔ. Yi koo bɛɛ dwɛ̃ɛwɑ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, nɛn nuki sɑnkirɑ nɛn tɔmbun wɑhɑlɑn sɔ̃. Nɑ kĩ n tii nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ yɑ ǹ koorɔ.
Wee, nɑ nɛn tɔmbun weeweenu nɔɔmɔ bɑɑmɑn di. Bɑ mɔ̀, Yinni Gusunɔ u sɑriwɑ Siɔniɔ? Yen sunɔ u ǹ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ mi? Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ nìn bwɑ̃ɑrokunu bɑ wɑɑmɑ tɔn tukobun min di.
Mɑ Yeremi u nɛɛ, sɑɑ ye sɑ rɑɑ yĩiyɔ su fɑɑbɑ wɑ, yɑ doonɑ nge gɛ̃ɛbun sɑɑ. Wee, sɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ wɑ.
Nɛn tɔmbu bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre. Ben nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te, tɑ mɑn bɔkɑnɑ. Nɑ nɑnde, nɑ nuki sɑnkire.
Tibu sɑriwɑ Gɑlɑdiɔ? Dokotoro goo sɑriwɑ mi? Nge mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ Isirelibɑn bosu kun kpeemɔ.
Nɛn wiru tɑ̀ n dɑɑ nim yibɑ mɑ nɛn nɔni yi sɑ̃ɑ nge bwii, kon dɑɑ wuri kowɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ kɑ wɔ̃kuru nɛn tɔn be bɑ gun sɔ̃. Yeremi u nɛɛ, nɑ̀ n dɑɑ kuru mɔ gbɑburɔ, kon dɑɑ dɑwɑ ten mi, n nɛn tɔmbu deri nɑ n kɑ bu tondinɛ. Domi be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sɑkɑrɑ kowobu. Mɑ bɑ kuɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑrirugibu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, bɑ rɑ n nɔɔ dɛ̃ɛrɑwɑ bu kɑ weesu ko. Bɑ ku rɑ tem mɛ kpɑre dee dee gem sɔɔ, sere kɑ weesu. Wee siyɑ su kuɑ ben dɑm. Bɑ rɑ n nuku kɔ̃suru mɔ̀wɑ bɑ n dɔɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ku rɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ wure.
Bɑɑwure u rɑ n win kpɑɑsi tɑki dimɔwɑ. Bɑ ǹ nɑɑnɛ mɔɔsinɛ. Bɑ rɑ n kɔrumɔtɔnu kuɑnɑmmɛwɑ, kpɑ bɑ n weesu sɔ̃ɔnɑmɔ.
Kpɑ bɑ n nɔni wɔ̃kunɑmɔ. Bɑ ku rɑ gem sɔ̃ɔnɛ, kpɑ bɑ n ben nɔɔ dɛ̃ɛrimɔ bu kɑ weesu ko. Mɛyɑ bɑ rɑ n mɛɛrimɔ nge mɛ bɑ koo kɑ kɔ̃sɑ ko.
Bɑ rɑ tii wɛ̃ kɔ̃sɑn kobu kɑ weesu sɔɔ sere bɑ yinɑ bu mɑn wurɑ.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, wee, kon bu sɔwɑ n ben lɑɑkɑri mɛɛri. Domi nɑ ǹ yɛ̃ ye kon kɑ nɛn tɔn beni ko ben nuku kɔ̃surun sɔ̃.
Wee, tɔn ben yɑrɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sɛ̃ɛ dɛ̃ɛguu ge gɑ rɑ go. Weesɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀, kpɑ bɑ n ben berusebu bɔri yɛndun gɑri sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Adɑmɑ ben gɔ̃ruɔ, yinɑ bɑ rɑ n bu bɛrie.
Yenibɑn sɔ̃, kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ kpɑ n bu mɔru kɔsie. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, kon guunu kɑ mi bɑ rɑ rɑɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu kpɑre swĩiyɑ. Domi nu gberɑ, goo ku rɑ mɑɑ sɑre mi, bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ yɑɑ sɑbenun wuri nɔ mi. Mɑ gunɔsu kɑ gbeeku yɛɛ yi duki yɑkikirɑ min di. Gɑ̃ɑnu kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, u koo de Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko bɑnsu, kpɑ yu ko gbeeku bɔ̃nun wɑ̃ɑ yeru. Mɛyɑ u koo mɑɑ de Yudɑbɑn wusu su ko bɑnsu.
Wɑrɑ u bwisi mɔ u kɑ ye tubusiɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ ù n kɑ yɛ̃ro gɑri kuɑ, u geruo yèn sɔ̃ tem mɛ, mu kuɑ bɑnsu mi goo ku rɑ mɑɑ sɑre.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, yeni yɑ koorɑwɑ yèn sɔ̃ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ deri ye nɑ bu wɛ̃, mɑ bɑ ǹ nɛn gere wure, bɑ ǹ kɑ ye sɔmburu kue.
Mɑ bɑ ben tiin kĩru swĩi bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃wɑ nge mɛ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ bu sɔ̃ɔsi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ nɛɛ, wee, kon bu dɑ̃ɑ kiku gɑgu ge gɑ sosu diisiɑ, kpɑ n bu nim mɛ mu dɛ̃ɛ mɔ nɔrusiɑ.
Kpɑ n de bu yɑrinɑ bu dɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ, mi be kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ ǹ dɑɑ yɛ̃. Kon de bu bu go kɑ tɑkobi, kpɑ bu bu kɑm koosiɑ mɑm mɑm.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Yeremi u nɛɛ, i doo i tɔn kurɔ be bɑ rɑ gɔɔ swĩ kɑsumɑ. I doo i yen gonibɑ sokumɑ
bu nɑ fuuku bu sun gɔɔ wuri kuɑ, kpɑ bɛsɛn nɔni yĩresu su koku.
Domi wuri nɔɔrɑ Siɔniɔ. Bɑ mɔ̀, wee, bɑ sun gurɑ, seku bɑkɑrɑ sun deemɑ. N kuɑ tilɑsi su kɑ bɛsɛn tem deri. Wee bɑ bɛsɛn yɛnusu kɔsukɑ.
Bɛɛ kurɔbu, i Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri nɔɔwɔ. Kpɑ i swɑɑ dɑki i nɔ ye u gerumɔ. I bɛɛn wɔndiɑbɑ wuri sɔ̃ɔsio, i gɔɔ wuri sɔ̃ɔsinɔ.
Domi gɔɔ u sun kɑ̃ɑsi sɑɑ fɛnɛntin di, mɑ u duɑ sere sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ. Mɛyɑ u mɑɑ bii be bɑ bɔsu swɛɛ sɔɔ goomɔ, kɑ sere mɑɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑ mi bɑ rɑ gesi mɛnnɛ kpuro.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔmbɑ koo wɔruku bu gbisuku, kpɑ ben gonu nu n tɛrie yɑkɑsɔ nge nɑɑ bisu, ǹ kun mɛ nge dobi yi yi geɑ yinɑ bɑ deri gberɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ yi suɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, bwisigii u ku woo kɑnɑ win bwisin sɔ̃. Dɑmgii u ku mɑɑ woo kɑnɑ win dɑm sɔ̃. Mɛyɑ dukiɑgii u ku woo kɑnɑ win dukiɑn sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ wi u kĩ u woo kɑnɑ, u woo kɑnɔ yèn sɔ̃ u bwisi mɔ u kɑ mɑn tubu, mɑ u yɛ̃ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. Nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɑɑnɛgii wi u rɑ siri dee dee, kpɑ u de durom mu n wɑ̃ɑ tem sɔɔ. Tɔn benin bweserɑ bɑ rɑ mɑn wɛ̃re. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon bu kɑm koosiɑ be bɑ bɑngo mɔ wɑsi sɔɔ mɑ bɑ ku rɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni yibie.
Beyɑ Egibitigibu, kɑ Yudɑbɑ, kɑ Edɔmubɑ, kɑ Amɔnibɑ, kɑ Mɔɑbubɑ, kɑ be bɑ rɑ ben wii bɑɑrun seri kɔni, kɑ sere be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ. Domi bwese tuku ni kpuro kɑ mɑm Isirelibɑn tii, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɑngo sɑribɑ ben gɔ̃rusɔ.

Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ. U nɛɛ,
i ku bwese tukunun yirɑ swĩi. I ku wururɑ wɔllun yĩre nin sɔ̃, ni bwese tukunu nù n wɑ, nu rɑ nɑnde.
Domi bwese nin sɑ̃ɑru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑm dirum. Nu rɑ sewɑ nu dɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ nu dɑ̃ɑ burɑ. Kpɑ dɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ko u kɑ ye bwɑ̃ɑroku ko.
Kpɑ bu gu burɑru kuɑ, bu gu sii geesu kɑ wurɑ pote. Kpɑ bu girɑ bu kulumbɑ kpɑre kɑ mɑtɑlɑkɑ, gu ku kɑ wɔrumɑn sɔ̃.
Bwɑ̃ɑrokunu nu rɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɑre ye bɑ rɑ ko gberɔ. Nu ǹ gɑri mɔ̀, bɑ rɑ n nu sɔɔwɑwɑ, domi nu ǹ kpɛ̃ nu kɑ tii sĩ. Yen sɔ̃, i ku nin bɛrum ko. Nu ǹ kpɛ̃ nu bɛɛ kɔ̃sɑ ǹ kun mɛ geɑ kuɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u Gusunɔ siɑrɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ kpɑ̃. Goo sɑri wi u kɑ nun weenɛ. Mɑ ɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ wunɛn dɑm sɑɑbu.
Wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ bwesenu kpuron sinɑ boko. Wɑrɑ u ǹ koo nun nɑsiɑ. Wunɑ ɑ yiiko kpuro mɔ. Bwesenu kpuron bwisigibu sɔɔ, goo sɑri wi u kɑ nun weenɛ.
Be kpuro bɑ ǹ bwisi mɔ. Ben yɛ̃ru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑm. Domi dɑ̃rɑ bɑ rɑ dɑ̃ku bɑ n sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Kpɑ bu tu sii geesu pote, si bɑ kɑ nɑ Tɑɑsisin di, ǹ kun mɛ wurɑ ye yɑ wee Ufɑsin di, kpɑ bu tu yɑbe gɑɑdurɑgiru kɑ wunɔmgiru sebusiɑ. Yebɑ kpuro yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔnun nɔmɑn sɔmburu.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni, wunɑ n weenɛ bu sɑ̃. A wɑ̃ɑwɑ. Kɑɑ n mɑɑ bɑndu diiwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Wunɛn mɔru yɑ̀ n seewɑ, tem mu rɑ yĩiriwɑ, kpɑ bwesenu kpuro nu kpɑnɑ nu yɔ̃rɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ.
Bɛɛ bwese tukunu, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ, bɛɛn bũu ni, nu ǹ wɔllu kɑ tem tɑkɑ kue. Nin tii nu koo kɑm kowɑ mɑm mɑm.
Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u tem tɑkɑ kuɑ kɑ win dɑm, kɑ win yɛ̃ru, mɑ u wɔllu tɛriɑ kɑ win bwisi.
Wiyɑ u rɑ de bukɔ gu se wɔllɔ, kpɑ u woo seeyɑmɑ sɑɑ gen wɑ̃ɑ yerun di, kpɑ guru winu nu nim kpɑɑsinɑ, kpɑ guru mɑɑkinu nu koorɑ, kpɑ gurɑ yu nɛ.
Tɔnu ù n ye kpuro mɛɛrɑ, u rɑ biti soorewɑ. Sekuru tɑ rɑ mɑɑ sekobu mwɛwɑ bɑ̀ n ben bwɑ̃ɑroku ni wɑ. Domi nu ǹ kpɛ̃ nu ko mɛ, nu ǹ wɛ̃siɑru mɔ.
Bɑ nu kuɑwɑ bu kɑ tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃ke. Nu ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gɑ̃ɑnu. Nu koo kɑm ko sɔ̃ɔ teeru, dɔmɑ te Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nu siri.
Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni u ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nge ni. Domi wiyɑ u kpuro tɑkɑ kuɑ. Wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ win tɔmbun ɑrumɑni. Win yĩsirɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, wee, yibɛrɛ bɑ bɛɛ tɑrusi. I seewo i bɛɛn yɑ̃nu kpɑɑsinɑ.
Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, u koo de yibɛrɛ be, bu bɛɛ wɔri, kpɑ bu bɛɛ gurɑ bu kɑ bɛɛ dɑ mi n tomɑ.
Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ wuri wɔri bɑ mɔ̀, sɑ kɑm kuɑ. Wee, bɛsɛn bosu kpɛ̃ɑ, bɛsɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Sɑ rɑɑ nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ yɑ̀ n sun deemɑ, sɑ ko kpĩ su ye mɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛsɛn diɑ yɑ wɔrukɑ. Yen wɛ̃ɛ kpuro kɑsikirɑ. Mɑ bɑ bɛsɛn bibu gurɑ kpuro. Goo sɑri wi u koo mɑɑ bɛsɛn wuu seeyɑ.
Yerɑ Yeremi u nɛɛ, bɛɛn kpɑrobu bɑ kuɑ gɑri bɑkɑsu. Bɑ ǹ Yinni Gusunɔ kɑsu. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ǹ kuure, mɑ bɛɛ kpuro i yɑrinɑ.
Wee dɑmu gɑgu gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ. Tɔn dɑbirɑ wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, bu kɑ Yudɑbɑn wusu kpeerɑsiɑ, kpɑ su ko gbeeku bɔ̃nun wɑ̃ɑ yeru.
Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ tɔnu kun kpɛ̃ u win tii kpɑrɑ nge mɛ n weenɛ. Goo sɑri wi u koo kpĩ u win tii swɑɑ geɑ sure.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑn sɛɛyɑsio sɑkɑ sɔɔ, n kun kɑ mɔru, kpɑ ɑ ku rɑ mɑn kɑm koosiɑ.
A wunɛn mɔru sureo bwese ni nu ǹ nun mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛn mi, ni, ni nu ǹ nun sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Domi nu wunɛn tɔmbu Yɑkɔbun bweseru kpeerɑsiɑmɔ, nu ben tem bɑnsu koosiɑmɔ.
Gɑri yiniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U nɛɛ,
ɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑnin gɑri nɔɔwɔ, kpɑ ɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ,
nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u yinɑ u nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni yenin gɑri nɔ,
ye nɑ rɑɑ kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɔkuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ bu yɑrɑ Egibitin di mi bɑ rɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre too. Miyɑ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bu nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio, kpɑ bu ko ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu, kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ nɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibiɑ te nɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ kuɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu tem wɛ̃ mɛ̀ sɔɔ tim kɑ bom mu kokumɔ. Tem mɛyɑ i wɑɑmɔ gisɔ. Mɑ Yeremi u Yinni Gusunɔ wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ gɑri yini geruo Yudɑbɑn wusu kpuro sɔɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun nukurun swɛɛ kpuro sɔɔ, ɑ nɛɛ, bu nɛn ɑrukɑwɑnin gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio kpɑ bu yi mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Sɑɑ dɔmɑ tèn di nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di sere kɑ gisɔ, nɑ rɑ n bu sɔ̃ɔmɔwɑ bu de bu mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ nɛn gɑri yi swɑɑ dɑki, bu sere yi mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Ben bɑɑwure u win tiin gɔ̃ru kĩru swĩiwɑ. Mɑ nɑ derɑ bɔ̃ri yìn gɑri yi wɑ̃ɑ ɑrukɑwɑni ye sɔɔ, yi bu di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ nɔɔ tiɑ kuɑ.
Bɑ wurɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑn yirɑ sɔɔ, be, be bɑ yinɑ bu nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki. Mɑ bɑ kɑ bũnu ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ bɑ nu sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni ye kusiɑ ye nɑ kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɔkuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon de kɔ̃sɑ yu bu wɔri. Bɑ ǹ yɑriɔ kɔ̃sɑ yen min di. Bɑ koo mɑn nɔɔgiru sue ɑdɑmɑ nɑ ǹ bu swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
