Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ koo dɑ bu bũnu soku ni bɑ yɑ̃kunu koosimɔ. Adɑmɑ bũu ni, nu ǹ bu fɑɑbɑ mɔ̀ wɑhɑlɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, nge mɛ bɛɛn wusu su geeru nɛ, nge mɛyɑ bɛɛn bũnu nu geeru nɛ. Nge mɛ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ yi geeru nɛ, nge mɛyɑ yen sɑ̃ɑ yenu nu geeru nɛ, mi i rɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ Yeremi, ɑ ku kɑnɑru ko tɔn ben sɔ̃. Domi bɑɑ bɑ̀ n mɑn sokɑ ben wɑhɑlɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ, nɑ ǹ bu wurɑrimɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, bɛɛ nɛn tɔn be nɑ kĩ, mbɑ i kɑsu nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Domi murɑfitirɑ i rɑ n mɔ̀. I tɑmɑɑ kon mɑɑ bɛɛn yɑ̃kunu mwɑ, kpɑ i kun mɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre? I tɑmɑɑ kon de i yɑri wɑhɑlɑn di?
Yellu i sɑ̃ɑ nge nɛn dɑ̃ɑ geeru, te tɑ kpɑre tɑ mɑɑ bii geenu mɑrumɔ. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ kon dɑ̃ɑ te kɑ ten kɑ̃ɑsi kpuro dɔ̃ɔ mɛni subɑru sɔɔ.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ nɑ rɑɑ bɛɛ girɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ. Nɛnɑ kon de kɔ̃sɑ yu bɛɛ deemɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kɑ bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ i kɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑn sɔ̃. Domi i bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli yɑ̃kunu koosimɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔsi ye nɛn tɔmbu bɑ mɑn bɔkuɑmmɛ. U mɑn ben sɑnu sɑnusu sɔ̃ɔsi.
Nɑ rɑɑ bu nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yɑ̃ɑ te bɑ kɑ dɔɔ bu go. Nɑ ǹ yɛ̃ kɔ̃sɑ bɑ mɑn bwisikusimɔ, bɑ mɔ̀, bu de bu dɑ̃ɑ te surɑ kɑ ten mɑrum. Bu tu wunɑ wɑsobun suunu sɔɔn di kpɑ bu ku mɑɑ ten yĩsiru nɔ.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wi u rɑ siri dee dee. Wunɑ ɑ tɔnun gɔ̃ru kɑ win bwisikunu yɛ̃. Wunɑ nɑ nɛn weeweenu nɔmu sɔndiɑ. Nɑ mɑrɑwɑ n wɑ mɔru ye kɑɑ bu kɔsiɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee ye u koo Anɑtɔtugibu kuɑ, be, be bɑ kɑsu bu nɛn wɑ̃ɑru wunɑ bɑ mɔ̀, n ku Gusunɔn gɑri gere kɑ win yĩsiru. Nɑ̀ n mɑɑ yinɑ, bɑ koo mɑn go.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u koo bu mɔru kɔsiɑ. Ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bɑ koo gbi tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ ben bii tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu bu gbi gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃.
Domi u koo Anɑtɔtugibu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kpɛ̃ɛwɑ wɔ̃ɔ gè sɔɔ u koo bu mɔru kɔsiɑ kpɑ goo kun tiɑre be sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gemgii bɑɑdommɑ, nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n nun siribu soku. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, nɑ kĩ n nun gɑ̃ɑnu bikiɑ wunɛn gem mɛ sɔɔ. Ye nɑ bikiɑmɔ wee. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ durumgiin wɑ̃ɑru tɑ rɑ n kuurɑmɔ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ rɑ de be bɑ ǹ nun nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Wunɑ ɑ bu duurɑ nge dɑ̃ru, mɑ bɑ nuuru kuɑ, bɑ kpɛ̃ɑ bɑ binu mɑrumɔ. Mɛyɑ wunɛn gɑri rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben nɔɔwɔ. Adɑmɑ yi ǹ wɑ̃ɑ ben gɔ̃ruɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑn yɛ̃. A mɑn wɑɑmɔ mɑ ɑ nɛn gɔ̃ru wɛ̃ɛrɑ, ɑ wɑ mɑ gɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wunɛ. A tɔn kɔ̃so be wunɔ nge yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ rɑ mwɛ bu sɑke. A bu sɔɔru koowo ɑ yi tɔ̃ɔ te bɑ koo tɔmbu gon sɔ̃.
Sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ kɑɑ n derɑ bɛsɛn tem mu n wɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ. Wee yɑkɑsu kpuro gberɑmɔ, mɑ gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ gunɔsu gbimɔ bɛsɛn tem mɛn tɔn kɔ̃sobun sɔ̃. Domi bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, ɑ ǹ ben sɑnu sɑnusu wɑɑmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Yeremi, ɑ̀ n kɑ nɑɑsugibu dukɑ mɔ̀, mɑ ɑ bu kpɑnɑ, ɑ wɑsirɑ, ɑmɔnɑ kɑɑ kɑ kpĩ ɑ kɑ dumigibu dukɑ dɑ. À n bɔri yɛndu mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ tem mu ɑlɑfiɑ mɔ tɔnɑ, ɑmɔnɑ kɑɑ ko Yuudɛnin dɑɑru tɑ̀ n nim yibɑ tɑ yɑrimɔ.
Domi wunɛn mɛro bisibu kɑ wunɛn yɛnugibu bɑ nun nɑɑnɛ sɑrirun kom kuɑmmɛ. Wee bɑ nun nɔɔgiru suemɔ biruɔ. A ku bu nɑɑnɛ ko, bɑɑ bɑ̀ n nun gɑri dori sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, nɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru deri. Nɑ nɛn tɔmbu biru kisi, be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn ɑrumɑni. Wee be, be nɑ kĩ mi, nɑ bu yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Domi bɑ mɑn seesi nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ kukirimɔ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu kĩ nge yellu.
Bɑ kuɑ nge gunɔ ge gunɔsu gɑsu su kɑsu su di. Kon gbeeku yɛɛ kpuro soku yi nɑ yi di.
Yibɛrɛ dɑbiru bɑ nɑ nɛn tɔmbun temɔ bɑ mu sɑnkɑ, nge mɛ yɑɑ sɑbenu nu rɑ gberun dĩɑnu sɑnku. Tem mɛ, mu rɑɑ wɑ̃, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu deri mi.
Bɑ tem mɛ gɔsiɑ nge tem sɑɑrɑm. Wee mu sɑ̃ɑre nge tɔnu wi u gɔɔ sumɔ u nuki sɑnkire. Tem mɛ kpuro mu kɑm kuɑ. Goo sɑri wi u mɛn weeweenu kuɑ.
Kɑ guunun wii kpiirɔ kpuro yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ yɔɔwɑwɑ. Nɑ derɑ tɑbu bu tem mɛ kpuro wukiri. Goo sɑri wi u wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Wee bɑ dĩɑnu duurɑ, mɑ sɑ̃ki kpiɑ. Bɑ tii wɑhɑlɑ kuɑ kɑm. Sekurɑ bɑ gɑ̃ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mɔrun sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bwese ni nu kɑ Isirelibɑ sikerenɛ, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu. Nu tem mɛ mwɑ mɛ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ Isirelibɑ wɛ̃ mu n sɑ̃ɑ ben tubi. Wee ye nɑ gerumɔ bwese nin sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon nu wukɑ sɑɑ nin tem di, kpɑ n Yudɑbɑ wunɑ nin suunu sɔɔn di.
Adɑmɑ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ nu wukɑ nɑ kpɑ, kon mɑɑ nin wɔnwɔndu ko kpɑ n de nin bɑɑtere tu wurɑ ten temɔ mɛ tɑ tubi di.
Geemɑ bɑ rɑɑ nɛn tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔsi bu bɔ̃re kɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑlin yĩsiru, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ̀ n gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ, bɑ mɔ̀ nge mɛ n weenɛ nɛn tɔmbu bu ko, kpɑ bɑ n bɔ̃rumɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru. Sɑɑ yerɑ kon de bu sinɑ kɑ nuku dobu nɛn tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ bwese te tɑ yinɑ tu mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑ, kon tu wukɑwɑ kpɑ n tu kpeerɑsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, nɛ, Yeremi, n doo n kpɑkɑ dwe kpɑ n ye sɛ̃kɑ pɔrɑɔ, ɑdɑmɑ n ku ye doke nim sɔɔ.
Mɑ nɑ kpɑkɑ ye dwɑ nɑ sɛ̃kɑ pɔrɑɔ nge mɛ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kpɑm nɛɛ,
n kpɑkɑ ye suo kpɑ n se n dɑ dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Efɑrɑtiɔ kpɑ n ye bere mi, kpee wɔru gɑgu sɔɔ.
Mɑ nɑ seewɑ nɑ dɑ nɑ ye beruɑ mi, nge mɛ u geruɑ.
Ye n tɛ, u mɑɑ nɛɛ, n wuro Efɑrɑti mi, kpɑ n kpɑkɑ ye suɑmɑ ye u rɑɑ nɛɛ, n bere mi.
Mɑ nɑ seewɑ nɑ dɑ nɑ kpɑkɑ ye suɑ mi yɑ rɑɑ beruɑn di. Adɑmɑ nɑ deemɑ wee, yɑ sɑnkirɑ yɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑru koorɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
nge mɛyɑ u koo Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibun tii suɑbu kpeerɑsiɑ.
U nɛɛ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu, bɑ ku rɑ wure bu win gɑri nɔ. Ben gɔ̃ru kĩrun gɑriyɑ bɑ rɑ n yɔ̃rɑri, kpɑ bɑ n bũnu yiirɑmmɛ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Bɑ koo kowɑ nge kpɑkɑ ye, ye yɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑru koorɔ mi.
Nge mɛ bɑ rɑ kpɑkɑ sɛ̃ke pɔrɑɔ, nge mɛyɑ u rɑɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro suɑ u tii sɛ̃ke bɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ win tɔmbu, bɑ n win yĩsiru sɔɔwɑ, bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ win burɑru, kpɑ tɔmbɑ n nùn siɑrɑmɔ ben sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ win gɑri wure. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛ, Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n doo n nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ mɑ wi, ben Yinni, u geruɑ u nɛɛ, tɑm bwɑ̃ɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑm sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ n wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, bɑ yɛ̃ mɛ,
sɑɑ yerɑ kon bu sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, mɛsumɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, u koo de win mɔru yu ko nge tɑm mɛ mu koo Yerusɑlɛmun tɔmbu kpuro go, kɑ sinɑm be bɑ sɔ̃ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑ sɔɔ, kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu, kɑ win sɔmɔbu, tem mɛn tɔmbu kpuro gesi.
Kpɑ bu soonɑ bu kɔsukunɑ, bɑɑbɑ kɑ bii, u ǹ ben goon wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀. Gɑ̃ɑnu mɑɑ sɑri ni nu koo nùn yɔ̃rɑsiɑ sere u kɑ be kpuro go.
Bɛɛ, Isirelibɑ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ, ye nɑ gerumɔ. I ku mɑɑ tii suɑ, domi Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ bɛɛ gɑri mɔ̀.
I Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛyɔ u sere kɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru nɑ te tɑ koo de i sokukirɑ guunu wɔllɔ. Mɛyɑ i yɑm bururɑm mɑrɑ, ɑdɑmɑ u koo de mu tĩrɑ mɑm mɑm kpɑ mu gɔsiɑ yɑm wɔ̃ku bɑkɑru nge te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Ì kun gɑri yi swɑɑ dɑki, kon dɑ n swĩ bɔkuɔ bɛɛn tii suɑ bin sɔ̃. Kon nɔni yĩresu yɑri n bɑndɑ. Domi bɑ koo bɛɛ Yinni Gusunɔn tɔmbu yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n sinɑ boko kɑ win mɛro sɔ̃ɔwɔ n nɛɛ, bu sinɔ temɔ domi ben sinɑ furɔsu wɔrukɑ si su sɑ̃ɑ ben burɑru.
Wee, wuu si su wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ Nɛgɛbuɔ, sin tɔmbɑ doonɑ kpuro, mɑ wuu si, su kɛnuɑ. Goo sɑri wi u koo mɑɑ su kɛniɑ, domi bɑ sin tɔmbu Yudɑbɑ gurɑ kpuro sem bɑ kɑ doonɑ tem tukumɔ.
Wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmu, ɑ nɔni seeyo ɑ wɑ, wee, wunɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wee sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di. Mɑnɑ tɔn be nɑ rɑɑ nun nɔmu sɔndiɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ, bèn sɔ̃ ɑ rɑɑ bɛɛrɛ mɔ.
Be bɑ rɑɑ nun sokumɔ yinni, bɑ̀ n nun sɛɛyɑsiɑbu nɑ, mbɑ kɑɑ gere. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ wuriribu bu koo nun deemɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Kɑɑ tii bikiɑ gɔ̃ruɔ ɑ nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ yeni yɑ nun deemɑ. Wunɛn torɑ dɑbinun sɔ̃nɑ bɑ wunɛn bekuru potɑ kɑ dɑm bɑ nun sekuru doke.
Etiopigii u koo kpĩ u win wɑsin gɔnɑ kɔsi? Musuku gbeeku gɑ koo mɑɑ kpĩ gu gen sɑnsun bɑusu kɔsi? Aɑwo. Nge mɛyɑ bɛɛ be i kɔ̃sɑn dɔɔnɛ mɔ, i ǹ kpɛ̃ i geɑ ko.
Yen sɔ̃, kon bɛɛ yɑrinɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ woo gɑ rɑ yɑkɑsu yɑrinɑsie gbɑburɔ.
Wunɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu, yèn sɔ̃ ɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ duɑri, mɑ ɑ wunɛn nɑɑnɛ doke weesu sɔɔ, wee ye nɑ nun yiiye.
Kon wunɛn bekuru gbɑbiɑ kpɑ bu wunɛn tereru wɑ.
Nɑ wɑɑmɔ sɑkɑrɑru kɑ kuuki yi ɑ mɔ̀, sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ bũnu gɑsirimɔ ɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ guunu wɔllɔ kɑ yɑkɑsɔ. Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu nɛn nɔni sɔɔ. Yen sɔ̃, wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmu, kɑɑ kɑm ko ɑ̀ kun tii dɛɛrɑsie. Sɑɑ yerɑ̀ ɑ mɑrɑ, ɑ kɑ tii dɛɛrɑsiɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ nim gɔ̃ɔrɑ wɑ̃ɑ, Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
Yudɑbɑ bɑ gɔɔ wooru sɔ̃. Goo mɑɑ sɑri ben wuu mɑrosun kɔnnɔsɔ. Wee bɑ wɔrukɑ temɔ bɑ nuki sɑnkire. Mɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ nɔɔgiru sue bɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑnɑmɔ.
Dɑmgibu bɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu gɔrimɔ bu nim kɑsumɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ n dɔkɔ dɑ bɑ ku rɑ nim wɑ. Bɑ rɑ gɔsirɑmɛwɑ kɑ koto gbebusu, kpɑ seku bɑkɑru tɑ n bu mɔ̀, bɑ n wuswɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu wukiri.
Tem mu bɛsikirɑ yèn sɔ̃ gurɑ kun nɛmɔ. Mɑ sekurɑ gbee wukobu mɔ̀ bɑ wuswɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu wukiri.
Yɑkɑ bekusu sɑri. Bɑtumɑ sɔɔrɑ nɛnnu rɑ mɑ kpɑ nu doonɑ nu binu deri.
Wee gbeeku kɛtɛkunu nu wɑ̃ɑ guunu wɔllɔ, nu wom gɑbirimɔ nge gbeeku bɔ̃nu. Nin nɔni tondɑ yèn sɔ̃ yɑkɑsu sɑri.
Yudɑbɑ bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bɑɑ mɛ sɑ tɑɑrɛ mɔ bɛsɛn durum sɔ̃, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sun somiɔ wunɛn yĩsirun bɛɛrɛn sɔ̃. Wee sɑ kuɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ, mɑ sɑ nun torɑri.
Wunɛ wi bɛsɛ Isirelibɑ sɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ, wunɑ ɑ rɑ sun fɑɑbɑ ko wɑhɑlɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge sɔɔ wi u sɑrɔ bɛsɛn temɔ u kpunɑ wɔ̃ku teeru tɔnɑ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge wi bɑ wɔri subɑru sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ nge tɑbu durɔ wi u kpɑnɑ u sun fɑɑbɑ ko, ɑ sere wɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn suunu sɔɔ. Yinni Gusunɔ, mɑ sɑ wunɛn yĩsiru sɔɔwɑ, ɑ ku sun deri.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ win tɔmbun sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, bɑ rɑ kɑ̃ bɑ n yɑɑyɑɑre mɔ̀. Bɑ ku rɑ kpĩ bu sinɑ bu tii nɛnɛ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nùn wɛ̃remɔ. U ben durum yɑɑye. Yen sɔ̃nɑ u bu sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ku tɔn be kɑnɑru kuɑ n kɑ bu geɑ kuɑ.
Domi bɑɑ bɑ̀ n nɔɔ bɔkuɑ, nɑ ǹ ben kɑnɑru nɔɔmɔ. Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kɑ kɛ̃nu gɑnu kuɑ, nɑ ǹ nu mwɑɑmɔ. Kon de bu gbiwɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃ kɑ kɛ̃si kɛ̃si bɑrɑrun sɔ̃ kɑ mɑɑ tɑbu sɔɔ.
Mɑ Yeremi u wisɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, wee wunɛn sɔmɔbu bɑ wunɛn tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ tɑbu wɑsi. Gɔ̃ɔrɑ kun mɑɑ duɔ ben temɔ. Kɑɑ de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ kɑ toro sindu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, weesɑ bɑ gerumɔ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru. Nɑ ǹ bu gɔre, nɑ ǹ bu woodɑ gɑɑ wɛ̃. Mɛyɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu gɑri gɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Kɑ̃sinu kɑ siɑn gɑri kɑ ben gɔ̃rusun gɑri yi bɑ gerumɔ, ye kpuro weesɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, sɔmɔ be nɑ ǹ gɔre mi, bɑ kɑ tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ tɑbu wɑsi ben temɔ, gɔ̃ɔrɑ kun duɔ mi, kon de bu gbi tɑbu sɔɔ, kɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃.
Kpɑ tɔn be bɑ mɑɑ weesun gɑri sɔɔmɔ mi, bɑ n wɔrukɑ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ gɔ̃ɔ te, kɑ tɑɑ bin sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ goo wɑsi wi u koo bu sike, be kɑ ben kurɔbu kɑ bibu. Kon de ben nuku kɔ̃suru tu wɔriwɑ ben tii sɔɔ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ n tɔn be sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, nɛn nɔni yĩresu su kokumɔ bururu kɑ yokɑ, su ǹ yɔ̃re. Domi wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ yɑ nɛn tɔmbu deemɑ. Bɑ bu so bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ.
Nɑ̀ n yɑrɑ nɑ dɑ yɑkɑsɔ, nɑ rɑ tɔn be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔn gonu wɑwɑ nu kpĩ. Nɑ̀ n mɑɑ wurɑmɑ wuuɔ, kpɑ n deemɑ tɔmbɑ bɑrɔ gɔ̃ɔrun sɑɑbu. Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ rɑ n den sirenɛwɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ ǹ yɛ̃ ye bɑ mɔ̀.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ bɛsɛ Yudɑbɑ biru kisiwɑ mɑm mɑm? A sun bwɛ̃rɑ yɑrɑwɑ? Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ sun sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ ɑ mɛɛrɑ mɔ̀ ye yɑ ǹ bɛkurɑmɔ. Sɑ bɔri yɛndu mɑrɑ, ɑdɑmɑ sɑ ǹ tu wɑ. Sɑ mɑrɑ ɑ sun bɛkiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔrɑ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, sɑ durum kuɑ wunɛn mi. Sɑ tubɑ mɑ nuku kɔ̃surɑ sɑ kuɑ, bɛsɛ kɑ bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ.
A wunɛn ɑrukɑwɑni yɑɑyo ye ɑ kɑ sun bɔkuɑ. Wunɛn yĩsirun sɔ̃, ɑ ku sun gɛm. A ku mɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmu funɛ wĩɑ mi ɑ wunɛn sinɑ gɔnɑ yiikogiɑ yii.
Bũu goo sɑri wi u koo kpĩ u gurɑ nɛɛsiɑ, wɔllun tii, tɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ tu gurɑ nɛɛsiɑ. Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni, wunɑ ɑ rɑ de gurɑ yu nɛ. Wunɑ sɑ mɑɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Domi wunɑ ɑ rɑ ye kpuro ko.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ nɛn tɔmbu Yudɑbɑ wɔnwɔndu kuɑmmɛ, bɑɑ Mɔwisi kɑ Sɑmuɛli bɑ̀ n nɑ nɛn mi, bu kɑ mɑn suuru kɑnɑ ben sɔ̃. Kon bu sɔ̃wɑ n nɛɛ, bu doonɔ nɛn wuswɑɑn di.
Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ wunɛ Yeremi bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, mɑnɑ bɑ koo dɑ, kpɑ ɑ bu wisi ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ koo gbiwɑ. Gɑbɑ koo ben yɑron gɔɔ gbi, gɔɔ wiyɑ koo bu suɑ. Gɑbɑ koo gbi tɑbu sɔɔ, gɔɔ wiyɑ koo bu suɑ. Gɑbɑ koo gbi gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃, gɔɔ wiyɑ koo bu suɑ. Kpɑ bu mɑɑ gɑbu yoru mwɛɛri, yoo terɑ bɑ koo di.
Kon de kɛ̃sinu nnɛ yu bu deemɑ. Bɑ koo gbi tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ bɔ̃nu nu ben gonu gɛɛri, kpɑ gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ gunɔsu bu di mɑm mɑm.
Biti kɑ bɛrum koo bwese tukunu mwɑ bɑ̀ n wɑ ye yɑ bu deemɑ, ye Yudɑn sinɑ boko Mɑnɑse Esekiɑsin bii u kuɑn sɔ̃ kpuro Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Yerusɑlɛmu, wɑrɑ u koo wunɛn wɔnwɔndu wɑ. Wɑrɑ u koo nun wɑnyo kuɑ. Wɑrɑ u koo nɑ u bikiɑ ye n nun mɔ̀.
Wee ɑ mɑn deri, mɑ ɑ biru wurɑ. Yen sɔ̃, kon nun nɔmɑ doke n nun kpeerɑsiɑ. Domi nɑ wɑsirɑ kɑ bɑɑdommɑn wɔnwɔn te nɑ nun kuɑmmɛ.
Kon nɛn tɔn be sɑrɑwɑ nge dobi wusun gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔsɔ. Kon de bu ben bibu biɑ, kpɑ n bu kɑm koosiɑ. Domi bɑ yinɑ bu ben swɛɛ kɔ̃si deri.
Kon de ben gɔminibu bu yɑni sɛɛri dɑbiru kerɑ yi yi wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ. Kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu nɑ bu ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑn mɛrobu wɔri sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ. Kpɑ nuku sɑnkirɑru kɑ bɛrum ben mɛro be deemɑ subɑru sɔɔ.
Wi bɑ rɑɑ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ yèn sɔ̃ u bii tɔn durɔbu nɔɔbɑ yiru mɑrɑ u wɑsikirɑmɔ. U koo mɑm gbiwɑ sɛkum kɑ seku bɑkɑru. Be bɑ tie, kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu bu gowɑ tɑbu sɔɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, nɛn mɛro, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɑn mɑrɑ. Wee nɑ kuɑ bɔ̃ruro. Domi nɛn sɔ̃nɑ tem mɛn tɔmbu kpuro bɑ sikirinɑmɔ bɑ sɑnnɑmɔ. Nɑ ǹ goon mi gɑ̃ɑnu bɔkure, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ goo gɑ̃ɑnu bɔkure. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, bɑ mɑn bɔ̃rusimɔwɑ kpuro.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, kon nun yɑkiɑ wunɛn geɑn sɔ̃, kpɑ n nun wunɛn yibɛrɛbɑ kɑmiɑ wɑhɑlɑ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɑɑ.
Goo kun kpɛ̃ u sisu bɔɔku, si su wee sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di kɑ sere mɑɑ sii gɑndu.
Kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu nɑ bu tem mɛn ɑrumɑni kpuro gurɑ nɛn tɔmbun durum sɔ̃ ye bɑ kuɑ tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Kon de bu ben yibɛrɛbɑ sɑ̃ tem tukumɔ mi bɑ ǹ yɛ̃. Domi nɛn mɔru seewɑwɑ be sɔɔ nge dɔ̃ɔ.
Yerɑ Yeremi u Yinni Gusunɔ wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ kpuro yɛ̃. A mɑn yɑɑyo. A ku mɑn duɑri. A be bɑ mɑn nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɔru kɔsio. A ku mɑn go, wunɛ wi ɑ suuru mɔ. A yɛ̃ mɑ wunɛn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ sekuru sɔɔwɑ.
Wunɛn gɑri kpurowɑ nɑ swɑɑ dɑki. Mɑ nɑ yi doke gɔ̃ruɔ. Yiyɑ yi mɑn nuku dobu wɛ̃. Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, ɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ wunɛn yĩsirɑ nɑ sɔɔwɑ.
Mɛyɑ nɑ ǹ wure n sinɑ kɑ tɔn yɑɑ kɑsikiobu su kɑ nuku dobu ko sɑnnu. Nɑ tii gɔwɑwɑ nɑ sɔ̃ nɛ turo, domi ɑ derɑ nɛn mɔru seewɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ wɑhɑlɑ mɔ̀ sere kɑ tɛ̃. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge boo wi u ku rɑ kpe. Yinni, kɑɑ n mɑn sɑ̃ɑwɛwɑ nge bwiɑ ye yɑ ǹ nɑɑnɛ mɔ, ǹ kun mɛ nge dɑɑ te tɑ rɑ nim kpe?
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ̀ n gɔsirɑmɑ nɛn mi, kon de ɑ mɑɑ ko nɛn sɔm kowo. À n wurɑ ɑ mɛm sɑɑrinu deri kpɑ ɑ gɑri ɑrufɑɑnigii gere, kon mɑɑ nɛn gɑri doke wunɛn nɔɔwɔ. N ǹ mɔ wunɑ kɑɑ gɔsirɑ ben mi, beyɑ n weenɛ bu wurɑmɑ wunɛn mi.
Kon de ɑ n dɑm mɔ nge gbɑ̃rɑ te bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu. Bɑ koo kɑ nun tɑbu ko, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ nun kɑmiɑmɔ. Domi ko nɑ n kɑ nun wɑ̃ɑ n nun fɑɑbɑ ko.
Kon nun yɑkiɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobun nɔmɑn di. Kpɑ n nun wɔrɑ be bɑ nuki sosun nɔmɑn di. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ ku kurɔ suɑ, kpɑ ɑ ku bibu mɑ tem mini.
Wee ye yɑ koo bii be bɑ koo mɑrurɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ deemɑ, kɑ ben mɛrobu kɑ ben tundobu.
Bɑrɑrɑ tɑ koo bu go. Bɑ ǹ bu gɔɔ swĩiyɑmmɛ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu sikumɔ. Bɑ koo kowɑ tɑɑki tem sɔɔ. Be bɑ tiɑ kpɑ bu bu go tɑbu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ, gɔ̃ɔru tu bu go, kpɑ gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ gunɔsu ben gonu di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, ɑ ku du diru mi bɑ gɔɔ wooru sɔ̃ ɑ kɑ bu duurɑ. Domi nɑ nɛn bɔri yɛndu wunɑ tɔn ben min di. Nɑ ǹ ben kĩru mɔ, mɛyɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀.
Dɑmgibu kɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu bɑ koo gbiwɑ. Bɑ ǹ bu sikumɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben gɔɔ wooru sinɑmɔ. Goo kun tii muririmɔ, goo kun mɑɑ kɔnimɔ ben gɔɔn nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Bèn tɔmbɑ gu mi, bɑ ǹ goo wɑsi wi u koo kɑ bu dĩɑnu nɑɑwɑ u kɑ bu nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ. Goo mɑɑ sɑri wi u koo kɑ bu tɑm nɑɑwɑ u kɑ bu dɑm kɛ̃, bɑɑ ǹ n ben mɛron nɑ u gu, ǹ kun mɛ, ben tundo.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, yɛnu mi bɑ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ dim mɔ̀, ɑ ku du mi, i di i nɔ kɑ be sɑnnu.
Domi nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ kon yɑm min nuku dobu kpeerɑsiɑ bɛɛn nɔni biru. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nuku dobun womusu kɑ be bɑ suɑnɑmɔn nɔɔgiru nɔɔmɔ mi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ kɑɑ tɔn be gɑri yi nɔɔsiɑ, bɑ koo nun bikiɑ bu nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu nɔni swɑ̃ɑ tenin bweserun gɑri sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Mbɑ bɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinni torɑri.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ bu wisi ɑ nɛɛ, ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ mɑn deri, mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃wɑ bɑ yiirɑ nin nuurɔ, mɑ bɑ mɑn biru kisi, bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Mɑ ben tii bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ n kere ben bɑɑbɑ be. Wee ben bɑɑwure u yɔ̃rɑri u win gɔ̃run kĩru kɑnkɑm swĩi. Bɑ ǹ nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, kon bu yɑrɑ tem minin di, kpɑ bu dɑ tem mi ben bɑɑbɑbɑ kɑ ben tii bɑ ǹ yɛ̃. Miyɑ bɑ koo bũnu sɑ̃ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ kɑ wɔ̃kuru. Domi nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu durom gɑm kuɑmmɛ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yen sɔ̃nɑ tɔ̃nu gɑnu sisi nì sɔɔ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɔ̃rumɔ bu nɛɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru wi u Isirelibɑ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di.
Adɑmɑ bɑ koo bɔ̃rewɑ bu nɛɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru wi u Isirelibɑ yɑrɑmɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di kɑ sere tem mi u rɑɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑn di. Domi kon de bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ mɛ nɑ rɑɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee, kon yibɛrɛbɑ seeyɑ bu Isirelibɑ mwɛɛri nge mɛ susure kowobu bɑ rɑ swɛ̃ɛ mwɛɛri. Yenibɑn biru, kon mɑɑ yibɛrɛ gɑbu seeyɑ bu bu wɔri bu go gungunu wɔllɔ kɑ guunɔ, kɑ sere mɑɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ nge mɛ tɑɑsobu bɑ rɑ yɛɛ wɔri bu go.
Domi nɛn nɔni yi ben sɑnu sɑnusu mɛɛrɑ, sin gɑsu kun beruɑ nɛn nɔni sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ nɑ mɑɑ ben torɑnu kpuro wɑɑmɔ.
Kon bu ben durum ɑre wɛ̃ mɑm mɑm. Domi bɑ nɛn tem disi doke mɛ mu sɑ̃ɑ nɛn ɑrumɑni, mɑ bɑ derɑ mu ben bũun bwɑ̃ɑrokunu yibɑ ni nu ǹ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn dɑm kɑ nɛn kuku yee dɑmgiru, nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun sɑɑ. Wunɛn miyɑ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ kpuron tɔmbu bɑ koo nɑ, kpɑ bu nɛɛ, weesɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ swĩi. Ben bũnu nu ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu sosi, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑm dirum.
Tɔnu u koo kpĩ u tii kuɑ ye u koo sɑ̃. Adɑmɑ kɑ gem, nu ǹ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ, wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ ɑ nɛɛ, kɑɑ bu wunɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi, kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yudɑbɑn durum yɑ yoruɑ ben gɔ̃rusɔ. Yɑ mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsire ben yɑ̃ku yenun kɑ̃ɑnu sɔɔ. Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre bɑ ye yoruɑ mi, kɑ yorutii sisugiɑ kɑ kpee te tɑ bɔbunu bo.
Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ seedɑ ye yɑ bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Nge mɛyɑ ben bũu turɑnu kɑ ben bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kɑ ben dɑ̃ɑ kubenu kɑ ben gungunu mi bɑ rɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑte sɑ̃, yɑ mɑɑ bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon nɛn guu tèn mi bɑ rɑ mɑn sɑ̃, kɑ ben dukiɑ kɑ ben gbeɑ kɑ gungunu mi bɑ rɑ bũnu sɑ̃ yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ, ben durum yen sɑɑbu ye bɑ kuɑ ben tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Ben torɑnun sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo ben tem biɑ mɛ mu sɑ̃ɑ ben tubi. Kon bu ko ben yibɛrɛbɑn yobu, kpɑ bu dɑ tem mi bɑ ǹ yɛ̃. Domi bɑ derɑ nɛn mɔru yɑ yɑburɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ. Yɑ ko n mɑɑ yɑburewɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɔ̃rigiiwɑ wi u win gɔ̃ru sĩiyɑ nɛn min di, mɑ u tɔnu nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ, u tɑ̃sɑ wi sɔɔ.
U ko n wɔnwɔndu soorewɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ kiki si su wɑ̃ɑ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi. U ǹ nuku dobu wɑsi. U ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ tem sɑɑrɑmɔ mi goo sɑri.
Adɑmɑ domɑrugiiwɑ wi u win nɑɑnɛ doke nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ sɔɔ, mɑ win toro sindu tɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛ sɔɔ.
Yɛ̃ro ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ te tɑ yɔ̃ dɑɑrun goorɔ, tèn gbini yi ku rɑ nim bie. Dɑ̃ɑ ten bweseru tɑ ku rɑ n yɑm susuru gɑrɑ. Ten wurusu rɑ n bekusu sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑɑ kpuro. Sɔ̃ɔ sɑ̃rerun sɑɑ yɑ̀ n nɑ, tɑ ku rɑ gbere, bɑɑ wɔ̃ɔ ge gbeburɑ yɔ̃rɑ. Mɛyɑ tɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ mɑrubu yɔ̃re.
Tɔnun gɔ̃ru gɑ rɑ kɔ̃sɑ berewɑ. Mɛyɑ gen bɑrɑrɑ ku rɑ bɛkure. Goo u wɑ̃ɑ wi u koo kpĩ u gen bwisikunu giɑ?
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ rɑ tɔnun gɔ̃ru kɑ win bwisikunu wɛ̃ɛri, n kɑ nùn ye u kuɑn ɑre wɛ̃.
Wi u dukiɑ gurɑmɔ kɑ swɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kusu ge gɑ sĩɑ tukɑ wee ye gɑ ǹ kɑ. Dukiɑ ye, yɑ koo nùn deriwɑ win wɑ̃ɑrun suunu suunukɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ u n sɑ̃ɑ nge gɑri bɔkɔ win wɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑkiru sɔɔ.
Bɛsɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sinɑ kitɑ yiikogiru te tɑ wɔlle suɑre yellun di.
Yinni Gusunɔ, wunɑ bɛsɛ Isirelibɑ sɑ yĩiyɔ. Be bɑ nun biru kisi, bɑ koo sekuru wɑ. Be bɑ kɑ nun tondinɛ, bɑ koo bu duɑri. Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bèn yĩsɑ bɑ yoruɑ tuɑ sɔɔ. Domi bɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ deri, wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge bwiɑ yèn nim mu wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑn bɛkio, kpɑ n wɑ n bɛkurɑ mɑm mɑm. A mɑn fɑɑbɑ koowo kpɑ n fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Domi wunɛ turowɑ nɑ rɑ n siɑrɑmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, wee, tɔmbɑ mɑn bikiɑmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, mɑnɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun gɑri yi ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ mi, yi woo. I den bu wɔrimɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ yinɛ n wunɛn tɔmbu kpɑrɑ. N ǹ nɛ, nɑ sɛnde nɔni swɑ̃ɑ ten tɔ̃ru tu kɑ nɑ. Wunɛn tii, ɑ yɛ̃ mɛ. A mɑɑ yɛ̃ gɑri yi nɑ yɑrɑ nɛn nɔɔn di kpuro.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ ku de nɑ n mɑɑ bɛrum soore wunɛn sɔ̃, wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn kuku yeru nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun sɑɑ.
A de be bɑ mɑn nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ bu sekuru wɑ. Kpɑ nɛ, nɑ kun tu wɑ. A de bu diiri, kpɑ nɛ, nɑ n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ toro sindu. A de nɔni swɑ̃ɑru tu bu deemɑ, kpɑ ɑ bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ n kpɑ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Yeremi, ɑ seewo ɑ dɑ ɑ yɔ̃rɑ kɔnnɔwɔ ge bɑ mɔ̀ tɔmbun kɔnnɔ mi Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbu bɑ rɑ kɑ du kpɑ bu kɑ yɑri, kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ dɑ ɑ yɔ̃rɑ kɔnnɔ si su tien mi.
Kpɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, be, Yudɑbɑ kɑ ben sunɔ kɑ be, Yerusɑlɛmugibu, be kpuro be bɑ dumɔ kɔnnɔ sin min di, bu nɛ Yinni Gusunɔgiɑ swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ.
Nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ n tii sɛ kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ sɔmunu sɔbe tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru sɔɔ. Bu ku rɑɑ mɑɑ nu duusiɑ Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔsun di.
Bu ku rɑɑ mɑm nu yɑrɑ ben yɛnusun di. Bu ku sɔmburu gɑru ko. Adɑmɑ bu sɑnɑm mɛ yiiyo nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃ nge mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ yiire.
Geemɑ, ben bɑɑbɑ be, bɑ swɑɑ tɑɑyɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. Bɑ nɛn sɔ̃ɔsinu yinɑ.
Adɑmɑ be, bɑ̀ n mɑn swɑɑ dɑki kɑ gem, mɑ bɑ ǹ sɔmunu gɑnu duusie Yerusɑlɛmun kɔnnɔsun di tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ tɔ̃ɔ te yi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃, mɑ bɑ ǹ sɔmburu gɑru kue te sɔɔ,
sɑɑ yerɑ sinɑm be bɑ sɔ̃ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑɔ kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu bɑ koo du sɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmun kɔnnɔ sin min di, bɑ n tɑbu kɛkɛbɑ duɑ, be dumi gɑwe, kpɑ gɑbu bɑ n dumi sɔni. Mɛyɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kpuro bɑ koo mɑɑ du mi, kpɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ n tɔmbu yibɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Tɔmbɑ koo nɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ Yudɑn wusu kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun bɑru kpɑɑnu kpuron di kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn tem di, kɑ sere mɑɑ guunun di kɑ wɔwin di, kɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑn di, tem mɛ kpuron di gesi, bu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko kɑ siɑrɑbun yɑ̃kunu, kpɑ bu kɑ kɛ̃nu nɑ, kpɑ bu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ doke mi.
Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ kun nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki, yi nɑ nɛɛ, bu mɑn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugii te yiiyɑ, mɑ bɑ dumɔ Yerusɑlɛmun kɔnnɔsun di, bɑ n sɔmunu sɔɔwɑ, tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugii te sɔɔ, sɑɑ yerɑ kon wuu ge dɔ̃ɔ doke wi u ǹ gbimɔ kpɑ be kpuro bu dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ seewo kpɑ ɑ dɑ mɔmɔn yɛnuɔ. Miyɑ kon nun gɑri sɔ̃.
Mɑ u seewɑ u dɑ mɔmɔn yɛnu mi. U deemɑ wee u wekeru mɔ̀.
Weke te u mɔ̀ mi, tɑ ǹ geɑ kue. Mɑ u ten sɔn te suɑ u kɑ weke kpɑɑru kuɑ te tɑ nùn wɛ̃re.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n kɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ ko nge mɛ. Wee nge mɛ mɔmɔ wi, u sɔndu suɑ u nɛni win nɔmuɔ, nge mɛyɑ i mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛn nɔmuɔ.
Gɑsɔ, nɑ rɑ gere bweseru gɑrun sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, kon tu wukɑ n surɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ n tu kɑm koosiɑ.
Adɑmɑ bwese te, tɑ̀ n ten dɑɑ kɔsɑ tɑ nuku kɔ̃suru deri, nɑ rɑ tu deriwɑ nɑ kun mɑɑ tu kɔ̃sɑ kue.
Mɛyɑ gɑsɔ, nɑ rɑ mɑɑ gere bweseru gɑrun sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, kon tu seeyɑ.
Adɑmɑ bwese te, tɑ̀ n kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ mɑ tɑ ǹ nɛn gere swɑɑ sue, nɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ tu geɑ ye kue ye nɑ rɑɑ gɔ̃ru doke mi.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ sɔɔru mɔ̀ n kɑ bu kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ. Nɑ yen kpunɑɑ yi. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ben bɑɑwure u win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ derio u wurɑmɑ nɛn mi.
Adɑmɑ bɑ koo gere bu nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo kɔsi. Ben bɑɑwure u koo win bwisiku kɔ̃sunu swĩiwɑ u ko ye u kĩ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ bɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu kuɑ n sɑrɑ. I bwesenu kpuro bikio, wɑrɑ u yenin bweseru nɔɔre.
Nim mu rɑ kokubu kpe Libɑnin guunu wɔllun di? Dɑɑ te tɑ kokumɔ, tɑ rɑ nim gem kpe?
Adɑmɑ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ mɑn duɑri bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑmmɛ. Yɑ derɑ bɑ ǹ yɛ̃ ye bɑ mɔ̀ ben swɛɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ ben yellun swɑɑ dosu derimɔ, mɑ bɑ swɑɑ kisi swĩi.
Bɑ derɑ ben tem mu sɑnkirɑ. Mɑ tɔmbu bɑ bu yɛ̃ɛmɔ bɑɑdommɑ. Wi u sɑrɔ mi gesi, ù n mu wɑ, u rɑ wiru kpɑrewɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de bu yɑrinɑ yibɛrɛbɑn wuswɑɑɔ nge tuɑ ye sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun woo gɑ yɑrinɑsiɑ. Kon bu biru kisi. Nɑ ǹ bu mɛɛrimɔ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre.
Yerɑ tɔn be, bɑ nɛɛ, su Yeremi nɔɔ tiɑ kuɑ su nùn mwɑ. Domi woodɑ kun gbimɔ bɑɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ̀ kun wɑ̃ɑ. Bwisi kun kpeemɔ bɑɑ bwisigibu bɑ̀ kun wɑ̃ɑ. Gusunɔn gɑri kun gbimɔ yèn sɔ̃ win sɔmɔbɑ sɑri. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i nɑ su nùn wɔri su yɑɑ kɑsiki, kpɑ su ku mɑɑ win gɑri nɔ su sere yi lɑɑkɑri ko.
Sɑɑ yerɑ Yeremi u Yinni Gusunɔ kɑnɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑn swɑɑ dɑkio. A nɛn yibɛrɛbɑn gɑri yi nɔɔwɔ.
Kɑɑ de geɑ yu gɔsirɑ kɔ̃sɑ? Wee bɑ dɔkɔ kpiriru gbɑ bu kɑ mɑn kpɛ̃ɛ sɔɔ. A yɑɑyo mɑ nɑ yɔ̃rɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ ben sɔ̃, nɑ kɑ nun gɑri kuɑ kpɑ ɑ ku mɑɑ kɑ bu mɔru ko.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ de gɔ̃ɔru tu ben bibu go. A de bu gbisuku tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ kurɔbu bu durɔbu kɑ bibu biɑ, kpɑ bu ko gɔminibu. A de bɑrɑnu nu durɔ be go, kpɑ bu ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ.
A de tɑbu kowo wuunu nu bu wɔri. Kpɑ wuri yi nɔɔrɑ ben yɛnusɔ. Domi bɑ dɔkɔ kpiriru gbɑ bu kɑ mɑn kpɛ̃ɛ te sɔɔ. Bɑ mɑn yinɑ bɛriɑ nɛn swɑɑ sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ ben nɔɔsinɑɑ kpuro yɛ̃, ye bɑ kuɑ bu kɑ mɑn go. Yen sɔ̃, ɑ ku bu ben torɑnu wɔkɑ. A ku ben durum ye duɑri. A de bu fukurɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ. A bu sɛɛyɑsio wunɛn mɔrun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ doo mɔmɔn mi ɑ boo dwe ge bɑ kuɑ kɑ sɔndu. Kpɑ ɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be bɑ bukure kɑ wuun guro gurobu mɛnnɑ,
kpɑ i dɑ wɔwɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Bɛni Hinɔmuɔ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ gen mi giɑ, mi bɑ rɑ wekenu mɔm. Miyɑ kɑɑ nɔɔgiru suɑ ɑ gɑri gere yi kon nun sɔ̃.
Kɑɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbu kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ bu swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ ye nɛ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ nɑ geruɑ. Kon de nɔni swɑ̃ɑru tu nɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ sere wi u ten gɑri nuɑ kpuro, win swɑsu su sikɑri.
Domi bɑ mɑn deri, mɑ bɑ yɑm mi disi doke. Bɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ mi, ni be kɑ ben sikɑdobɑ kɑ ben sinɑmbu bɑ ǹ yɛ̃. Mɑ bɑ tɔn dɑbinu go mi, be bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu kue.
Bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli yɑ̃ku yeru bɑniɑ gunguru wɔllɔ. Miyɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ ben bibu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru ko, yɑ̃ku tèn bweseru nɑ ǹ bu yiire, nɑ ǹ mɑm ten bwisikunu koore.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃nu gɑnu sisi nì sɔɔ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɔwɑ ye sokumɔ Tofɛti ǹ kun mɛ Bɛni Hinɔmu. Bɑ koo ye sokuwɑ tɔn goo yeru.
Wɔwɑ yen miyɑ kon Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibun nɔɔ tiɑ ye bɑ kuɑ kɑm koosiɑ, kpɑ n de yibɛrɛbɑ bu bu go tɑbu sɔɔ. Kon de gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ gunɔsu ben gonu di.
Kpɑ n de Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko bɑnsu si bɑ koo yɛ̃ɛ. Wi u sɑrɔ mi kpuro, ù n ye wɑ, u biti soorɑ u wiɑ ko nɔni swɑ̃ɑ ten sɔ̃.
Kon de yibɛrɛ be, bu bu nɔni sɔ̃ sere bu ben berusebu kɑ ben bibun gonun yɑɑ di.
Yen biruwɑ wunɛ Yeremi kɑɑ boo ge kɔrɑ tɔn be bɑ kɑ nun dɑ min wuswɑɑɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ kpɑ n wuu ge kɔsuku nge boo ge, ge bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu mɑɑ sɔmɛ. Tofɛtin wɔwɑ miyɑ bɑ koo tɔmbu sike yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɑyeru wɑsi gɑm.
Mɛyɑ kon tem mɛ kɑ mɛn tɔmbu kuɑ, kpɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko nge Tofɛti.
Yerusɑlɛmugibun yɛnusu kɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbun yɛnusu, yɛnusu kpuro gesi mi bɑ rɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeye kɑ mi bɑ rɑ suru kɑ kperi kɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɑ̃, kɑ sere mi bɑ rɑ mɑɑ bũnu gɑnu sɑ̃, si kpuro su koo disi duurɑwɑ nge Tofɛti.
Yen biru, Yeremi u gɔsirɑmɑ Tofɛtin di mi Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn gɔrɑ u win gɑri gere. Mɑ u nɑ u yɔ̃rɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑɔ u tɔmbu kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u nɛɛ, wee u koo de kɔ̃sɑ ye u rɑɑ geruɑ kpuro yu Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ yen wuu si su tie deemɑ. Domi sin tɔmbɑ swɑɑ tɑɑyɑ, bɑ ǹ win gere nuɑ.
Yerɑ sɔ̃ɔ teeru, Pɑsuri Imɛrin bii wi u sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowo u kɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔ̃sobun tɔnwero u nuɑ mɑ Yeremi u yenibɑn gɑri geruɑ.
Yerɑ u derɑ bɑ nùn so, mɑ bɑ nùn dɑ̃ɑ doke nge wiiro Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, kɔnnɔ ge bɑ sokumɔ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn kɔnnɔn berɑ giɑ.
Adɑmɑ yen sisiru bururu, Pɑsuri u Yeremi dɑ̃ɑ ye wunɑ. Mɑ Yeremi u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kun mɑɑ nun sokumɔ Pɑsuri. Yĩsi ten tubusiɑnɑ bɔri yɛndɑ kɑ nun sikerenɛ. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, u nun sokumɔ Mɑgɔɔ Misɑbibu. Yen tubusiɑnɑ nɑndɑbu kɑ nun sikerenɛ.
Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, u koo wunɛ kɑ wunɛn bɔrɔbɑ nɑndɑbu kpɛ̃ɛ. U koo de bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bu bɛɛn gɑbu go tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ ɑ ye wɑ kɑ wunɛn nɔni. Kpɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Yudɑbɑ go kpɑ u gɑbu yoru mwɛɛri u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
U koo de yibɛrɛbɑ bu Yerusɑlɛmun ɑrumɑni gurɑ, kɑ sɔmɑ ye tɔmbɑ kuɑn ɑre kpuro, kɑ sere gɑ̃ɑ gee ni nu wɑ̃ɑ ye sɔɔ. U koo de bu Yudɑbɑn sinɑmbun ɑrumɑni gurɑ, kpɑ bu kɑ ye kpuro dɑ Bɑbiloni mi.
Pɑsuri, wunɛ kɑ wunɛn yɛnugibu, bɑ koo bɛɛ yoru mwɑ bu kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Miyɑ i ko i gbi, wunɛ kɑ be ɑ gɑri weesugii kuɑ, kpɑ bu bɛɛ sike mi.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑn kɔkurɑ, mɑ nɑ wunɛn gɑri wurɑ. A mɑn sɛ̃re ɑ kɑmiɑ. Wee tɔ̃ru bɑɑtere tɔmbu kpuro bɑ rɑ n mɑn yɛ̃ɛmɔwɑ, kpɑ bɑ n mɑn gɑri bɔkɔ mɔ̀.
Nɑ̀ n kĩ n gɑri gere, sere n nɔɔgiru suɑ kɑ dɑm n nɛɛ, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wee bu sun dɑm dɔre, kpɑ bu sun kɑm koosiɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ, tɔmbɑ rɑ n mɑn yɛ̃ɛmɔwɑ wunɛn gɑrin sɔ̃ bɑɑdommɑ.
Nɑ̀ n nɛɛ, kon nun deriwɑ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wunɛn gɑri kpɑrɑmɔ, n dɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ u wɑ̃ɑ nɛn wɑsi sɔɔ u nɛn kukunu mɛnimɔ. Kpɑ n kookɑri ko n kɑ tii mɑrisi, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ ku rɑ kpĩ.
Nɑ nɔɔmɔ tɔn dɑbinu nu mɑn kɔ̃sɑ bwisikusimɔ. Bɑ mɔ̀, nɑndɑbu wɑ̃ɑ bɑɑmɑ. Su kɑ win gɑri dɑ wirugibun mi. Be bɑ rɑɑ kɑ mɑn nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɑ mɛɛrimɔ nɑ̀ n kon sokurɑ. Bɑ mɔ̀, sɔrɔkudo kon de bu mɑn sɑmbɑ ko. Kpɑ bu wɑ bu mɑn mwɑ bu mɔru kɔsie.
Adɑmɑ nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ nɛ nge tɑbu durɔ dɑmgii. Yen sɔ̃nɑ be bɑ mɑn nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ koo sokurɑ. Bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu mɑn kɑmiɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo sekuru wɑ kpɑ bɑ n tu yɑɑye sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Wunɛ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, wunɛ wi ɑ rɑ tɔnu wɛ̃ɛri, ɑ kɑ wɑ ù n sɑ̃ɑ gemgii, kpɑ ɑ n win bwisikunu kɑ win gɔ̃run gɑri yɛ̃, wunɑ kon de ɑ nɛn yibɛrɛbɑ mɔru kɔsie. Domi wunɑ nɑ tii nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
I Yinni Gusunɔ siɑro kɑ womusu. Domi u rɑ wɔnwɔndo wɔre sɑɑ tɔn kɔ̃son nɔmɑn di.
Tɔ̃ɔ bɔ̃rigirɑ tɔ̃ɔ tè sɔɔ bɑ mɑn mɑrɑ. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tu ku domɑru wɑ.
Bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u dɑ u nɛn tundo sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee, bɑ nùn bii tɔn durɔ mɑruɑ. Mɑ lɑbɑɑri ye, yɑ nùn nuku doo bɑkɑbu wɛ̃.
Durɔ wi, u kɑm koowo nge wuu si Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑm koosiɑ u ǹ sin wɔnwɔndu kue. Kpɑ u wuri nɔ bururu, kpɑ u tɑbun wurenu nɔ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ u ǹ yɑnde dere n gbi sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛn mɛron nukurɔ, kpɑ nuku te, tu yɑnde ko nɛn sikiru, kpɑ nɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mi sere kɑ tɛ̃.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ yɑrɑ nɛn mɛron nukurun di, nɑ kɑ sere wɑhɑlɑ yeni kɑ wɑsi wuriri bini wɑɑmɔ, mɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑrɑ wiru goorɑmɔ kɑ sekuru.
Sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u Pɑsuri, Mɑɑkiyɑn bii, kɑ Sofoni, yɑ̃ku kowo Mɑseyɑn bii gɔrɑ Yeremin mi, bu nùn sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, u bu bikiɑru kuo Yinni Gusunɔn mi, domi Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko, u kɑ bu tɑbu mɔ̀. Sɔrɔkudo Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nùn mɑɑmɑɑki gɑɑ kpɑre ben sɔ̃, kpɑ u wɑ u bu deri. Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ.
<range>
Mɑ Yeremi u tɔn be wisɑ u nɛɛ, bu doo sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsin mi bu nɛɛ,
ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wee, u koo de ben tɑbu kowo be bɑ kɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɔmbu sɑnnɑmɔ wuun biruɔ bu duki su bu wurɑ wuu ge sɔɔ.
Kpɑ wi, Gusunɔn tii u kɑ be Yudɑbɑ sɑnnɑ kɑ mɔru u bu win dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi,
u de bɑrɑ kɔ̃suru tu hunde konibɑ kpuro wɔri tu go wuu ge sɔɔ, tɔmbu kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu.
Yen biruwɑ u koo sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi, Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ, wi kɑ win sɔm kowobu kɑ win tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuu ge sɔɔ, be bɑ gesi yɑrɑ bɑrɑrun di, kɑ tɑbun di, kɑ gɔ̃ɔrun di. Be kpurowɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u koo go. U ǹ ben wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀. U ǹ mɑɑ goo derimɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ win tɔmbun sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, wee, u bu swɑɑ yiru yiiyɑmmɛ, swɑɑ yèn mi wɑ̃ɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ, kɑ yèn mi gɔɔ u wɑ̃ɑ.
Wi u koo gesi yɔ̃rɑ wuu ge sɔɔ, u koo gbiwɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ kɑ gɔ̃ɔru, ǹ kun mɛ kɑ bɑrɑru. Adɑmɑ wi u yɑrɑ u tii Bɑbilonigibu wɛ̃ be bɑ bu tɑrusi, yɛ̃ro koo win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ. Teyɑ tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ win ɑrumɑni ye u kpĩɑ u yɑrɑ.
Domi u yɔ̃rɑriwɑ u wuu ge kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, n ǹ mɔ geɑ. U koo gu Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko nɔmu sɔndiɑwɑ u gu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ wunɛ Yeremi kɑɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bweseru sɔ̃. A nɛɛ, bu nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri nɔɔwɔ.
Be, Dɑfidin bweseru, bɑ n dɑ gem swĩi bɑɑdommɑ. Kpɑ bu be bɑ dɑm dɔre yɑkiɑ be bɑ bu dɑm dɔremɔn nɔmɑn di. Bɑ̀ kun kue mɛ, nɛn mɔru yɑ koo bu yɑbure ben kom kɔ̃sum sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu ye go.
Kon Yerusɑlɛmugibu wɔri. Be, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑ sɔɔ kperun wɔllɔ, bɑɑ bɑ̀ n gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u du ben wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, u ben kuku yeru turi.
Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nge mɛ ben kookoosu nɛ. Kon ben sinɑ kpɑɑru dɔ̃ɔ mɛni te bɑ bɑnɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru, kpɑ ye yɑ kɑ tu sikerenɛ kpuro yu dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ doo Yudɑn sinɑ bokon yɛnuɔ kpɑ ɑ bu gɑri yini sɔ̃.
A nɛɛ, wi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko, wi, wi u sɔ̃ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑɔ, kɑ win bwɑ̃ɑbu kɑ win tɔmbu kɑ be bɑ gesi wɑ̃ɑ sinɑ kpɑɑru mi,
bu nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yini swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ. Bu gem swĩiyɔ. Bu be bɑ dɑm dɔremɔ wɔro be bɑ bu dɑm dɔremɔn nɔmɑn di. Bu ku sɔbu kɑ gɔminibu kɑ gobekubɑn gɑ̃ɑnu mwɑ kɑ dɑm. Bu ku mɑɑ tɑɑrɛ sɑrirugibu go yɑm mini.
Bɑ̀ n woodɑ yeni mɛm nɔɔwɑ, gɑbu ben bweseru sɔɔ, bɑ ko n bɑndu diiwɑ bɑ n sɔ̃ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑ yeni sɔɔ. Bɑ koo du sɑɑ kɔnnɔ minin di bɑ n duɑ tɑbu kɛkɛ sɔɔ ye dumi gɑwe, ǹ kun mɛ, bɑ n dumi sɔni, be kɑ ben bwɑ̃ɑbu kɑ ben tɔmbu.
Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ n yinɑ bu ye mɛn nɔɔwɑ, sere kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru, sinɑ kpɑɑ te, tɑ koo kowɑ bɑnsu.
Wee ye nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ kpɑɑrun sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, bɑɑ mɛ nɑ sinɑ kpɑɑ te wɑ tɑ wɑ̃ nge dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ Gɑlɑdiɔ, ǹ kun mɛ, nge Libɑnin guurun wii kpiiru, kɑ gem kon tu bɑnsu koosiɑ. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ mi.
Kon tɑbu kowobu tɑbu yɑ̃nu sebusiɑ bu tu wɔri. Kpɑ bu ten gbere yi bɑ kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru wukiri bu dɔ̃ɔ doke.
Tɔn tuko dɑbinu bɑ koo sɑrɑ wuu gen mi, kpɑ bu sɔ̃ɔnɑ bu nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wuu bɔkɔ geni kuɑ mɛsum.
Kpɑ bu bu wisi bu nɛɛ, gen tɔmbu bɑ wi, ben Yinnin ɑrukɑwɑni kusiɑwɑ, mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, i ku wuri ko Yosiɑsi wi u gun sɔ̃. I ku mɑɑ win ɑrio ko. Adɑmɑ i wuri koowo Sɑlumun sɔ̃, wi bɑ yoru mwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Domi u ǹ mɑɑ wee. Mɛyɑ u ǹ mɑɑ tem mɛ wɑsi mi bɑ nùn mɑrɑ mini.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Sɑlumu, Yosiɑsi Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon biin sɔ̃, wi u bɑndu dii win bɑɑn ɑyerɔ. U nɛɛ, u doonɑ, u ǹ mɑɑ wee.
U koo gbiwɑ dɛsiru sɔɔ mi bɑ kɑ nùn dɑ mi, u ǹ mɑɑ tem mɛ wɑsi.
Yeremi u Yoyɑkimu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wunɛ Yoyɑkimu, bɔ̃rurowɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Wee ɑ wunɛn sinɑ kpɑɑru bɑnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ ɑ ǹ gem swĩi. A tu gidɑmbisɑbɑ sosiɑ ɑdɑmɑ ye n weenɛ ɑ tɔmbu kuɑ, ɑ ǹ bu kuɑmmɛ. A rɑ gɑbu sɔmburu koosie kɑm. A ku rɑ bu ben kɔsiɑru wɛ̃.
Mɑ ɑ nɛɛ, kɑɑ tii sinɑ kpɑɑ bɑkɑru bɑniɑwɑ kpɑ tɑ n gidɑmbisɑ bɑkɑ mɔ. Mɑ ɑ fɛnɛntibɑ doke, ɑ ten gɑni dɑ̃ɑ geɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru wukiri. Mɑ ɑ tu swɛ̃rɑsiɑ kom kom ɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
Yèn sɔ̃ ɑ kɑ sinɑ kpɑɑ te sɛdurubɑ bɑnɑ, yeyɑ n derɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ boko? Wunɛn bɑɑbɑn tii u ǹ sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ boko ro? U rɑ diwɑ kpɑ u nɔ nge bɑɑwure, ɑdɑmɑ u rɑ bɑɑwure kuewɑ ye n weenɛ u ko. U rɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu kɑ wɔnwɔndobu siriewɑ dee dee. Yen sɔ̃nɑ ye kpuro yɑ nùn koorɑ dee dee win wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. Wi u mɑɑ mɔ̀ nge mɛ, wiyɑ u wi, Yinni Gusunɔ yɛ̃ kɑ gem.
<range>
Adɑmɑ wunɛ, wunɛn tiin ɑrufɑɑniwɑ ɑ kɑsu. A kɑsuwɑ ɑ tɑɑrɛ sɑrirugibu dɑm dɔre kpɑ ɑ bu go.
Yen biru, Yeremi u mɑɑ nɛɛ, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u gerumɔ Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, ù n gu, bɑ ǹ nùn gɔɔ swĩiyɑmmɛ bu nɛɛ, wɑiyo nɛn mɔɔ! Wɑiyo nɛn sesu! Wɑiyo nɛn yinni!
Adɑmɑ bɑ koo win goru gɑwɑwɑ bu yɑrɑ Yerusɑlɛmun di bu sike nge yɑɑ sɑberu.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i doo i yɔ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Libɑniɔ, kɑ Bɑsɑnin guurɔ, kɑ Abɑrimun gungunu wɔllɔ, kpɑ i kuuki ko i nɔɔgiru suɑ. Domi be i kɑ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ bɑ munkirɑ.
U bɛɛ kirɔ kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ i wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, ɑdɑmɑ i nɛɛ, i ǹ nùn swɑɑ dɑkimɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɛɛn dɑɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɑɑ bɛɛn piiburun di, i ku rɑ nùn swɑɑ dɑki.
Tɛ̃, bɛɛn kpɑrobu bɑ koo kɑ woo doonɑ kpɑ be i kɑ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ bu bu yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ i ko i sekuru wɑ, bɛɛn kom kɔ̃sum sɔ̃.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, bɛɛ be i sɔ̃ sɛ̃ɛ bɛɛn dii burɑnu sɔɔ ni i kuɑ kɑ Libɑnin dɑ̃ɑ geɑ, ɑmɔnɑ bɛɛn weeweenu ko n nɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ wuriribu koo bɛɛ deemɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, kɑɑ Yoyɑkini, wi bɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ Yekoniɑ, Yoyɑkimun bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, bɑɑ ù n sɑ̃ɑn nɑ nge tɑɑbu nɛn nɔm geuɔ, kon nùn wunɑ min di.
Kon nùn win yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ, be, be bɑ kɑsu bu nùn go. Kon nùn bu nɔmu sɔndiɑ be, bèn bɛrum u mɔ mi. Beyɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu.
Kon bu kɔ̃, wi kɑ win mɛro wi u nùn mɑrɑ. Kpɑ bu kɑ bu dɑ tem tukumɔ mi bɑ ǹ bu mɑrɑ. Miyɑ bɑ koo gbi.
Sɑɑ gɑɑ sɔɔ, bɑ ko bɑ n kĩ bu gɔsirɑmɑ ben temɔ ɑdɑmɑ yɑ ǹ koorɔ.
Gɑbɑ koo bikiɑ bu nɛɛ, Yoyɑkini wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge weke te tɑ kɔsire, ǹ kun mɛ, nge gɑ̃ɑ ni goo kun mɑɑ kĩ? Aɑwo. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɑ wi kɑ win bweseru tem yɑrɑ mɑ bɑ kɑ bu dɑ sere mi bɑ ǹ yɛ̃.
Mɑ Yeremi u nɛɛ, nɛn temgibu, i nɔɔwɔ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ.
U nɛɛ, i durɔ wi gɑrisio wi u ǹ koorɑmɔ win wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. U ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wi u bibu biɑ, domi win bweseru sɔɔ, goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ sinɑ gɔnɑ sɔɔ u Yudɑbɑ kpɑrɑ.
Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u nɛɛ, bɔ̃rurobɑ kpɑro be bɑ nɛn tɔmbu goomɔ, mɑ bɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑmɔ nge yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro kɔ̃sobu. Nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, wee bɑ nɛn tɔmbu girɑ, bɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑ yinɑ bu bu nɔɔri. Yen sɔ̃, kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ ben nuku kɔ̃su ten sɑɑbu.
<range>
Kpɑ n nɛn tɔn be bɑ tie mwɛɛrimɑ tem kpuron di, mi nɑ rɑɑ derɑ bɑ yɑrinɛ, n kɑ bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ, kpɑ bu mɑrurɑ bu dɑbiɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon bu kpɑro kpɑobu wɛ̃ be bɑ koo bu kpɑrɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɑndɑmɔ bɛrum sɔ̃. Bɑɑ ben turo kun mɑɑ biɑrɑmɔ.
Wee sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon gemgii goo seeyɑ Dɑfidin bweserun di nge dɑ̃ɑ kpii pɔturɑ, kpɑ u n bɑndu dii kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. U koo tɔn be kpɑrɑwɑ kɑ bwisi gee. Kpɑ u gem sɔ̃ɔsi tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Win wɑɑti ye sɔɔ, Yudɑbɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Kpɑ u de Isirelibɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Kpɑ bɑ n nùn sokumɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ben fɑɑbɑ kowo.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nɛɛ, wee sɑɑ yɑ mɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɔ̃rumɔ bu nɛɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru wi u bu yɑrɑmɑ sɑɑ Egibitin tem di.
Adɑmɑ bɑ ko n dɑ gerewɑ bu nɛɛ, kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru wi u bu yɑrinɑsiɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ kɑ wusu gɑsu sɔɔ, mɑ u mɑɑ kɑ bu wurɑmɑ min di, bu kɑ sinɑ ben temɔ.
Ǹ n sɔmɔbun sɔ̃n nɑ, nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ sɑnkirɑ too, mɑ nɑ diirimɔ sere kɑ nɛn kukunɔ. Nɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge wi tɑm mu goomɔ Yinni Gusunɔ kɑ win gɑri dɛɛrin sɔ̃, yi u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔmbɑ yibɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, be bɑ sɑkɑrɑru mɔ̀. Kɔ̃sɑ bɑ nɑɑ gire. Miyɑ ben dɑm mu wɑ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ tem mɛ, mu sɑnkire, mɑ mɛn kpɑrɑ yee ni nu wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburun berɑ giɑ nu gberɑ. Domi u mu bɔ̃rusi.
Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ sɑnkire, u wɑ mɑ bɑ nuku kɔ̃su kom mɔ̀ sere kɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ ben swɑɑ yɑ koo wɔriɑ, kpɑ yu bu yɑm tĩre. U koo de bu bu bɔriɑ, kpɑ bu wɔruku sɑɑ ye u koo bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ u de wɑhɑlɑ yu bu deemɑ. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ ye nɑ wɑ nɛn sɔmɔbu bɑ mɔ̀ Sɑmɑriɔ, yɑ ǹ kɑ nɔɔ gerurɔ. Domi bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑlin yĩsirɑ bɑ kɑ gɑri mɔ̀. Mɑ bɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ gɛrɑsiɑ nɛn swɑɑn di.
Adɑmɑ kom kɔ̃sum mɛ nɑ wɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun suunu sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, mu beɔnɔgim kere. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu, mɑ bɑ weesu mɔ̀, bɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu dɑm kɛ̃mɔ bu ku kɑ ben kom kɔ̃sum deri, mɑ nɑ be kpuro gɑrisi nge Sodomu kɑ Gomɔrɑn tɔmbu.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɑ nɛn sɔmɔbu Yerusɑlɛmuɔ sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ wee kon de bu dɑ̃ɑ kiku gɑgu ge gɑ sosu di, kpɑ bu nim mɛ mu dɛ̃ɛ mɔ nɔ. Domi beyɑ bɑ derɑ tem mɛn tɔmbu kpuro bɑ ǹ mɑɑ mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, i ku mɑɑ nɛn sɔmɔ ben gɑri swɑɑ dɑki. Domi bɑ derɑ i yĩiyɔ ye i ǹ wɑsi. Ben tiin gɔ̃run bwisikunɑ bɑ gerumɔ, n ǹ mɔ yi yi wee nɛn nɔɔn di.
Bɑ rɑ mɑm be bɑ mɑn gɛmɑ sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, nɑ be geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ koo bɔri yɛndu wɑ. Kpɑ bɑ n be bɑ ben tii tiin gɔ̃ru kĩru mɔ̀ sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ wɑsi.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, ben wɑrɑ u kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wesiɑnɑ. Nge ben wɑrɑ u win gɑri nuɑ u yi lɑɑkɑri kuɑ.
Wee Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru yɑ koo nɑ nge guru woo bɔkɔ kpɑ yu tɔn kɔ̃sobu wɔri.
Win mɔru ye, yɑ ǹ suremɔ, mɑ n kun mɔ u win himbɑ yibiɑ. Amɛn biru, yɑ koo bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu yeeri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɔmɔ be, bɑ duki dɑ, bɑɑ mɛ nɑ ǹ bu gɔre. Bɑ mɑɑ gɑri geruɑ, bɑɑ mɛ nɑ ǹ kɑ bu gɑri kue.
Bɑ̀ n dɑɑ nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki, nɛn gɑriyɑ bɑ koo rɑɑ kpɑrɑ nɛn tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ. Kpɑ bu wɑ bu gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ bu ben kom kɔ̃sum deri.
Nɛ Gusunɔ, nɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm kpuro, turuku kɑ tontondeɔ.
Goo u koo kpĩ u kuke nɑ kun nùn wɑ? Nɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm kpuro, wɔllɔ kɑ temɔ.
Nɑ nɔɔmɔ ye sɔmɔbu bɑ gerumɔ. Be bɑ gɑri weesugii mɔ̀ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru bɑ mɔ̀, nɑ kɑ bu gɑri kuɑ dosu sɔɔ,
sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ sɔmɔ beni bɑ ko n gɑri weesugii mɔ̀, kpɑ bɑ n nɛn tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ kɑ ben gɔ̃run gɑri.
Bɑ kĩwɑ ben dosu weesugisun gɑri yi de nɛn tɔmbu bu nɛn yĩsiru duɑri nge mɛ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ rɑɑ mɑn duɑri bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑlin sɔ̃.
Sɔmɔ wi u dosɑ u geruo mɑ u dosɑ. Wi nɑ mɑɑ kɑ gɑri kuɑ u yi tusio dee dee. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, mbɑ yɑkɑsu kɑ dobi yi mɔɔsinɛ.
Nɛn gɑri kun sɑ̃ɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ ro? Yi ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nge mɑtɑlɑkɑ ye yɑ rɑ kperu kɔre ro?
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon sɔmɔ be sɛɛyɑsiɑ, be, be bɑ ben winsim gɑri suɑmɔ bɑ kɑ gɑri weesugii mɔ̀.
Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ be bɑ ben tii tiin gɑri suɑmɔ bɑ gerumɔ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru.
Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ be bɑ ben dosu weesugisu tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Mɑ bɑ derɑ nɛn tɔmbɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑmɔ ben wee si kɑ ben tɔn biɑrun sɔ̃. Nɑ ǹ bu gɔre, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu woodɑ wɛ̃. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ mɔ tɔn ben suunu sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔn ben goo, ǹ kun mɛ nɛn sɔmɔ goo, ǹ kun mɛ yɑ̃ku kowo goo ù n nun bikiɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ, sɔmu nirɑ̀ nɑ bu sɔbi, kɑɑ nùn wisiwɑ ɑ nɛɛ, berɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn sɔmunu. Adɑmɑ kon bu biru kisi.
Ben wi u gesi nɔɔ wukiɑ u nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔmunu sɔbi, kon yɛ̃ro sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ wi kɑ win yɛnugibu.
Ye bɑɑwure u koo kpĩ u win winsim bikiɑ, yerɑ, u nɛɛ, mbɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ, mbɑ u wisɑ.
Adɑmɑ bu ku rɑɑ mɑɑ gere bu nɛɛ, nɑ bu sɔmunu sɔbi. Wi u ye geruɑ, win gɑri koo wɔri win tii sɔɔ. Domi bɑ nɛn gɑri tɛmɑmɔwɑ nɛ wi nɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni wi u rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ, u dɑm kpuro mɔ.
Kɑɑ mɑɑ sɔmɔ be bikiɑ ɑ nɛɛ, mbɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Mbɑ nɑ bu wisɑ.
Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ nun wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔmunu sɔbi, bɑɑ mɛ nɑ nɛɛ, bu ku mɑɑ yen gɑri ko, ɑ bu wisio ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ,
kon bu biru kisi kpɑ n bu duɑri, be kɑ ben wuu ge nɑ rɑɑ be kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃.
Kon mɑɑ bu seku bɑkɑru doke te tɑ ǹ duɑrirɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Kpɑ bɑ kun mɑɑ bɛɛrɛ mɔ tɔmbun nɔni sɔɔ.
Ye Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Yoyɑkini, Yoyɑkimun bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko mwɑ kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ ben dɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃kobu kɑ ben sekobu, u kɑ bu dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi figie bii ni bɑ doke birenu yiru sɔɔ sɔ̃ɔsi sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔwɔ.
Bire nin teeru tɑ figie bii geenu yibɑ ni nu sɑ̃ɑ nge yen mɑrum gbiikum. Mɑ teerɑ mɑ bii kɔ̃sunu yibɑ ni nu ǹ diirɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi bikiɑ u nɛɛ, Yeremi, mbɑ ɑ wɑɑmɔ mi. Mɑ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, birenu yiruwɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ, ni nu figie binu yibɑ. Gɑnu geɑ sɑ̃ɑ, mɑ gɑnu kɔ̃sunu sɑ̃ɑ, nu ǹ diirɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wee ye nɑ geruɑ, nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni. Nɑ nɛɛ, nge mɛ figie bii gee ni, nu rɑ tɔmbu wɛ̃re, nge mɛyɑ kon Isireli be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ mɛɛri kɑ nɔnu geu.
Kon de bu wurɑmɑ ben tem mini. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu surɑmɔ, kon bu tɑ̃sisiɑwɑ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu wukɑmɔ, kon bu girɑwɑ n sire.
Kon bu gɔ̃ru kpɔɔ wɛ̃, kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ kpuron Yinni. Bɑ koo wurɑmɑ nɛn mi kpɑ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ n mɑn sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Adɑmɑ Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kɑ be kpuro be bɑ sɔ̃ tem mɛ sɔɔ, kɑ sere be bɑ kpikiru dɑ Egibitiɔ, kon dewɑ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge figie bii kɔ̃su ni nu ǹ diirɔ mi.
Tɔmbu bɑ̀ n bu wɑ bɑ koo biti soorɑ. Gee kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ kpuro, bɑ koo bu yɛ̃ɛwɑ bu bu yɑɑkoru koosi kpɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ kpɑ bɑ n dɑ kɑ ben yĩsiru tɔmbu bɔ̃rusi.
Kon bu tɑbu suremɑ kɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑnu sere bu kɑ gbi tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ, mɛ nɑ be kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃.
Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ Yudɑbɑn sɔ̃. Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ gbiikuu.
Mɑ Yeremi u Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
sɑɑ Yosiɑsi, Amɔɔn biin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ itɑsen di, n kɑ gisɔ girɑri, yen wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ itɑwɑ mi. Sɑɑ min diyɑ nɑ rɑ n bɛɛ Gusunɔn gɑri sɔ̃ɔmɔ ɑdɑmɑ i ku rɑ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki.
Yinni Gusunɔ u rɑ n bɛɛ win sɔm kowobu gɔriɑmmɛ, berɑ win sɔmɔbu. U derɑ bɑ nɑ nɑ sɑɑ yee yellun di. Adɑmɑ i ǹ bu swɑɑ dɑki, i ǹ ben gɑri wure.
Sɔmɔ be, bɑ rɑ n gerumɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, i gɔ̃ru gɔsio kpɑ i bɛɛn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn tem sɔɔ, mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
I ku mɑɑ bũu goo yiirɑ i nùn sɑ̃. I ku Gusunɔn mɔru seeyɑ kɑ bɛɛn bwɑ̃ɑroku ni i kuɑ kɑ bɛɛn tii, kpɑ u ku mɑɑ bɛɛ kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔn tii u nɛɛ, i ǹ nùn swɑɑ dɑki. I win mɔru seeyɑwɑ bɛɛn bwɑ̃ɑroku ni i kuɑn sɔ̃. Mɑ yɑ kɑ bɛɛ kɔ̃sɑ nɑɑwɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ i ǹ nùn swɑɑ dɑki,
yen sɔ̃nɑ u koo mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geun tɔmbu kpuro gurɑmɑ kɑ win sɔm kowo Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko. Kpɑ bu bɛɛn tem mɛn tɔmbu wɔri bu kɑm koosiɑ, kɑ be bɑ bɛɛ sikerenɛ kpuro. Tem mɛ, mu koo kowɑ bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Wi u sɑrɔ mi, kpɑ biti yu nùn mwɑ, sere u wiɑ ko.
Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnun womusu nɔɔmɔ mi, kɑ sere kurɔ kpɑɑnun womusu. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɑmbun wɔkinu nɔɔmɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ fitilɑnu wɑsi mi.
Tem mɛ kpuro mu koo kowɑ bɑnsu, kpɑ bɛɛ, win tɔmbu, i Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko yoru diiyɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɑtɑ kɑ wɔkuru.
Adɑmɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɑtɑ kɑ wɔku ten biru, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɔmbu seesimɑ ben torɑ ni bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃, kpɑ u ben tem kɑm koosiɑ mu ko bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Bɔ̃ri yi u geruɑ tem mɛn sɔ̃, kɑ sere yèn gɑri nɛ, Yeremi nɑ geruɑ nɑ yoruɑ tire te sɔɔ, bwesenu kpuron sɔ̃, yi koo koorɑwɑ.
Domi bwese dɑmginu kɑ sinɑm dɑmgibɑ koo bu yoru mwɛɛri. Nge mɛyɑ Gusunɔ u koo kɑ bu ben kɔ̃sɑ kɔsie ye bɑ rɑɑ kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u win mɔru weesinɑ kɑ tɑm mɛ u doke nɔrɑ sɔɔ u nɛ, Yeremi tĩi u nɛɛ, n ye mɔɔ kpɑ n de bwese nìn mi u mɑn gɔriɔ nu ye nɔ.
Bɑ̀ n wɑ mɑ u derɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bu wɔri bɑ goomɔ, bɑ ko n bɑ̃ɑrimɔwɑ kpɑ bɑ n burisinɛ nge wiirobu.
Yerɑ nɑ nɔrɑ ye mwɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔmɑn di. Mɑ nɑ derɑ bwese nìn mi u mɑn gɔrɑ nu win mɔru ye nɔrɑ.
Nɑ toruɑ nɑ ye Yerusɑlɛmugibu nɔrusiɑ, kɑ Yudɑn wusu kpuron tɔmbu kɑ ben sinɑmbu kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu, kpɑ Gusunɔ u wɑ u ben tem kɑm koosiɑ kpɑ wi u sɑrɔ mi, u biti soorɑ sere u wiɑ ko. Kpɑ bɑ n dɑ kɑ ye tɔmbu bɔ̃rusi nge mɛ yɑ koorɑ tɛ̃.
Yen biru, nɑ bwese ni nu tiegibu ye nɔrusiɑ. Beyɑ Egibitin sunɔ kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu, kɑ win tɔmbu kpuro,
kɑ bwese tuku ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Egibitiɔ, kɑ Usɑn sinɑmbu, kɑ Filisitibɑn sinɑmbu, beyɑ Asikɑlonigii, kɑ Gɑsɑgii, kɑ Ekoronigii, kɑ sere be bɑ mɑɑ tie Asidɔduɔ, ben sunɔ,
kɑ Edɔmubɑ, kɑ Mɔɑbubɑ, kɑ Amɔnigibu,
kɑ Tirin sinɑmbu kɑ Sidonin sinɑmbu, kɑ sere sinɑm be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun berɑ giɔ,
kɑ sere mɑɑ Dedɑnigibu, kɑ Temɑgibu, kɑ Busigibu, kɑ be bɑ rɑ wii bɑɑnun seri kɔni,
kɑ mɑɑ Dɑɑrububɑn sinɑmbu, kɑ bwesenu kpuron sinɑmbu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ mi yɑni sɛɛri wɑ̃ɑ,
kɑ Simirin sinɑmbu kɑ Elɑmun sinɑmbu kɑ sere Mɛdibɑn sinɑmbu,
kɑ sinɑm be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ kpuro, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ turuku kɑ be bɑ tomɑ. Bwese ni nu gesi wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ, ni kɑ nin sinɑmbu bɑ mɔru ye nɔrɑ mɑ Bɑbiloni ye bɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ Sesɑki, yen sinɑ boko u ye dɑkurɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ n Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ n nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ wi, ben Yinni, wi u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bu nɔruo sere yu bu go, bu siruku kpɑ bu wɔruku sere bu kpɑnɑ bu se yèn sɔ̃ u derɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bu wɔri bɑ goomɔ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, bwese nin gɑru tɑ̀ n yinɑ tu nɔ ye nɑ tu tĩi, n tu sɔ̃ɔwɔ n nɛɛ, tu nɔruo bɑɑ ǹ n mɛren nɑ. Wi, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinnin woodɑwɑ.
Domi u ǹ win wuu Yerusɑlɛmu deri. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, u koo bweseru gɑru deri? Aɑwo, u ǹ derimɔ. Bwesenu kpuro sɔɔrɑ u koo win mɔru sure. Wi, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
U mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ n nɛɛ, wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo kukiri wɔllun di. Win nɔɔ gɑ koo nɔɔrɑ sɑɑ win wɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑrun di. U koo win tem kukirisi. U koo hɑnduniɑgibu kpuro kukirisi nge tɔn dɑbi te tɑ dĩɑnu gɛ̃ɛmɔ gberɔ.
Win kukiribu koo nɔɔrɑ hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ. Domi u tɔmbu kpuro sokumɔ win siri gbɑburɔ. Wi siribu di, u koo yɛ̃ro gowɑ kɑ tɑkobi.
Wi Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u mɑɑ nɛɛ, win siribu bu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge woo bɔkɔ ge gɑ bwesenu kpuro gɑsirimɔ, gɑ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ kpuro bukiɑnɛ.
Be Yinni Gusunɔ u koo de bu gbi siri bi sɔɔ, bɑ ko n tɛriewɑ bɑɑmɑ hɑnduniɑɔ. Goo sɑri wi u koo ben gonu mɛnnɑ u sike, kpɑ bu ben gɔɔ swĩ. Nu koo kowɑ tɑɑki tem sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ, win tɔmbun kpɑrobu, i wuri koowo, i bindio temɔ. Domi tɔ̃rɑ tunumɑ tè sɔɔ bɑ koo bɛɛ sɑkiri. I ko i wɔrumɑ i kɔsikirɑ nge tem mɔn weke burɑru.
I ǹ kisirɑmɔ domi i ǹ kuku yeru wɑsi.
Wee, kpɑro ben wuri yi koo nɔɔrɑ domi Yinni Gusunɔ u koo ben tem kɑm koosiɑ
kɑ win mɔru bɑkɑ. Tem mɛ, mu wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, ɑdɑmɑ mu koo ko bɑnsu.
Nge mɛ gbee sunɔ gɑ rɑ yɑri gen wɑ̃ɑ yerun di gu kɑ dĩɑnu kɑsu, nge mɛyɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u koo yɑri win wɑ̃ɑ yerun di, u de bwesenu nu goonɑ kpɑ tem mu tɔmbu biɑ win mɔru bɑkɑn sɔ̃.
Ye Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii Yudɑn sinɑ boko u bɑndu di, yen sɔ̃ɔ mɛɛ terɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri yini kuɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, ɑ yɔ̃ro sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑ mini. Tɔn be bɑ koo nɑ sɑɑ Yudɑn wusu kpuron di bu kɑ mɑn sɑ̃, kpɑ ɑ bu gɑri yi kpuro sɔ̃ yi nɑ nɛɛ, ɑ bu sɔ̃. Bɑɑ yin tiɑ ɑ ku rɑ bure.
Bɑ̀ n wurɑ bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki, mɑ bɑ wurɑ ben dɔɔ sɔɔ, bɑ ben kom kɔ̃sum deri, kɔ̃sɑ ye nɑ rɑɑ gɔ̃ru doke n bu kuɑ, kon ye deri.
A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, bu mɑn swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɛn woodɑbɑ swĩi ye nɑ bu wɛ̃,
kpɑ bu ku nɛn gɔrobun gɑri ɑtɑfiiru ko. Nɑ rɑ be bu gɔrie sɑɑ yellun di, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ bu swɑɑ dɑki.
Yen sɔ̃, kon sɑ̃ɑ yee te kɑm koosiɑ nge mɛ nɑ Silogiru kuɑ, kpɑ n de bwesenu kpuro nu wuu gen yĩsiru siɑ nù n bɔ̃rumɔ.
Yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ wuun tɔmbu bɑ Yeremin gɑri yi nuɑ yi u gerumɔ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Ye u gɑri yi geruɑ u kpɑ yi Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn yiire u tɔn be kpuro sɔ̃ mi, yerɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be, kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ be, kɑ sere wuun tɔn be bɑ tie kpuro bɑ nɑ bɑ nùn sɛ̃re. Bɑ gbɑ̃sukumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, kɑɑ gbiwɑ.
Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ nɑ bɑ Yeremi mɛnnɛ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi, bɑ mɔ̀, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ gerumɔ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ yĩsiru ɑ mɔ̀, sɑ̃ɑ yee teni tɑ koo kɑm kowɑ nge Silogiru, kpɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko bɑnsu.
Ye Yudɑn wirugibu bɑ nuɑ mɛ, yerɑ bɑ seewɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrun di bɑ dɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, mɑ bɑ sinɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔwɔ ge bɑ sokumɔ kɔnnɔ kpɔɔ.
Mɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be, kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ be, bɑ wirugibu kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, n weenɛwɑ bu durɔ wini go. Domi gɑri kɑmwɑ u wuu geni gerusimɔ. Bɛɛn tii i mɑɑ yi nuɑ kɑ bɛɛn swɑɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u wirugii be kɑ tɔn be kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u mɑn gɔrimɑ n kɑ gɑri ko sɑ̃ɑ yee teni kɑ wuu genin sɔ̃, nge mɛ i nuɑ kpuro.
I gɔ̃ru gɔsio kpɑ i kom kɔ̃sum deri. I Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinnin gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio, kpɑ u kɔ̃sɑ ye deri ye u rɑɑ kĩ u bɛɛ kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ wee bɛɛn nɔmɑɔ, i kɑ mɑn koowo nge mɛ n bɛɛ dɛnde.
I yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ ǹ tɑɑrɛ gɑɑ mɔ. Yen sɔ̃, ì n mɑn go, nɛn yɛm mu kuɑ bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn wuu gen sɔmunu. Domi kɑ gem Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u mɑn gɔrimɑ n kɑ bɛɛ gɑri yini kpuro sɔ̃.
Yerɑ wirugii be, kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie bɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be, kɑ sɔmɔ be sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, n ǹ weenɛ su durɔ wi go domi kɑ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinnin yĩsirɑ u gɑri yini geruɑ.
Mɑ wuu gen guro gurobu gɑbu bɑ seewɑ bɑ tɔn wɔru ge sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ,
Misee Mɔresɛtigii u rɑɑ Gusunɔn gɑri geruɑ Yudɑn sinɑ boko Esekiɑsin wɑɑti u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bɑ koo Yerusɑlɛmu bwiiyɑ nge gberu, kpɑ yu ko nge kpee ni bɑ subɑ, kpɑ guu tèn wɔllɔ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yee te bɑnɑ, tu dɑ̃nu kpi n ko dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ bɔkɔ.
Yudɑbɑ kɑ ben sinɑ boko Esekiɑsi wi, bɑ Misee wi go? Esekiɑsi wi, u ǹ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑsie? Nge u ǹ Yinni Gusunɔ suuru kɑnɛ ro? Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɔ̃sɑ ye deri ye u rɑɑ kĩ u bu kuɑ. Yerɑ i ko de bɛsɛ, su tii durum bɑkɑ yeni sɔbi?
N deemɑ Yoyɑkimun wɑɑti ye sɔɔ, durɔ goo mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ wi bɑ mɔ̀ Uri, Semɑyɑ Kiriɑti Yɑrimugiin bii. Durɔ wi, u rɑ gɑri gere kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yĩsiru. Mɑ u gɑri tee yi geruɑ win tii, wuu genin sɔ̃ nge mɛ Yeremi u geruɑ mi. Mɑ Yoyɑkimu kɑ win tɑbu durɔbu kɑ mɑɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu bɑ gɑri yi nuɑ. Yerɑ sinɑ boko wi, u kɑsu u Uri go. Ye Uri u nuɑ mɛ, u bɛrum soorɑ, mɑ u kpikiru suɑ u dɑ Egibitiɔ.
<range>
Yerɑ Yoyɑkimu u Ɛlinɑtɑni Akɑborin bii gɔrɑ Egibitiɔ kɑ tɔmbu gɑbu sɑnnu bu kɑ Uri mwɑɑmɑ.
Mɑ bɑ Uri wi mwɑɑmɑ bɑ kɑ nùn nɑ sinɑ bokon mi. Mɑ u derɑ bɑ nùn go kɑ tɑkobi. Yerɑ bɑ win goru kɑre mi bɑ rɑ tɔn dirobu sike.
Adɑmɑ Akikɑmu Sɑfɑnin bii u yɔ̃rɑwɑ kɑ Yeremi mɑ u yinɑ bu tɔn be Yeremi nɔmu bɛriɑ bu go.
Ye Sedesiɑsi Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko u bɑndu di u kpɑ, n tɛ fiiko, yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ,
Yeremi, ɑ tii sugubɑ kuo kɑ mɑɑ wɛ̃ɛ ɑ ye sɔbe,
kpɑ ɑ ye sɔmɔbu wɛ̃ be sinɑm beni, Edɔmubɑn sunɔ, kɑ Mɔɑbubɑn sunɔ, kɑ Amɔnibɑn sunɔ, kɑ Tirin sunɔ, kɑ Sidonin sunɔ bɑ gɔrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon mi, kpɑ ben bɑɑwure u kɑ ye win yinni dɑɑwɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ bu sɔ̃ bu ben yinnibu sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, nɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, wi Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ, nɑ nɛɛ,
nɛnɑ nɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ kɑ tɔmbu kɑ yɛɛ yi yi wɑ̃ɑ mɛ sɔɔ, kɑ nɛn dɑm bɑkɑm. Wi nɑ kĩ, wiyɑ nɑ rɑ mu wɛ̃.
Wee tɛ̃ kon bɛɛn tem mɛ kpuro nɛn sɔm kowo Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wɛ̃. Kpɑ n de sere kɑ gbeeku yɛɛyɔ yi nùn sɔmburu kuɑ.
Bwesenu kpuro nu koo wi kɑ win bibu, kɑ win debuminu sɑ̃. Adɑmɑ sɑɑ gɑɑ koo nɑ yè sɔɔ bwese dɑmginu ni nu sinɑm dɑmgibu mɔ, nu koo rɑ win tii kɑ win temgibu yoru mwɑ.
Bweseru gɑru tɑ̀ n yinɑ tu Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ sɑ̃ tu nùn yoru diiyɑ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon de u bwese te tɑbu wɔri. Kon mɑɑ tu bɑrɑru kɑ gɔ̃ɔru kpɛ̃ɛ, u kɑ kpĩ u tu kpeerɑsiɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bɛɛ, i ku mɑɑ bɛɛn sɔmɔbu swɑɑ dɑki, kɑ bɛɛn sɔrobu kɑ bɛɛn tiin dosusu, kɑ bɛɛn gɔri sokobu, be, be bɑ rɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, i ǹ ko Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko sɑ̃.
Domi weesɑ bɑ gerumɔ, ye yɑ koo de n bɛɛ tondɑsiɑ bɛɛn tem di kpɑ n bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑ.
Adɑmɑ bwese te tɑ wurɑ tu Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon sugu sɔbe, tu nùn yoru diiyɑ, kon bwese te deri ten tem sɔɔ kpɑ tu gbeɑ ko mi, tɑ n wɑ̃ɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u mɑɑ gɑri tee yi Sedesiɑsi sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U nɛɛ, Sedesiɑsi, wunɛ kɑ wunɛn tɔmbu, i Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon sugu dokeo, i nùn yoru diiyɑ, wi kɑ win tɔmbu, kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ de bu wunɛ kɑ wunɛn tɔmbu go tɑbu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ i gbi gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑnun sɔ̃ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bwese te tɑ yinɑ tu Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wiru kpĩiyɑ tɑ koo gbiwɑ nge mɛ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, i ku sɔmɔ ben gɑri swɑɑ dɑki, be, be bɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, i ǹ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko yoru diiyɑmmɛ. Domi gɑri weesugiiyɑ bɑ mɔ̀.
N ǹ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu gɔrɑ. Bɑ gɑri mɔ̀wɑ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru ɑdɑmɑ weesɑ bɑ mɔ̀. Ì n bu swɑɑ dɑki, kon bɛɛ girɑwɑ, kpɑ i gbi, bɛɛ kɑ be sɑnnu.
Mɑ Yeremi u mɑɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ tɔn be bɑ mɛnnɛ mi, gɑri yi sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U nɛɛ, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, i ku bɛɛn sɔmɔbun gɑri swɑɑ dɑki, be bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bɑ koo kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃nu wurɑmɑ sɑɑ Bɑbilonin di n ǹ tɛɛmɔ. Domi gɑri weesugiiyɑ bɑ mɔ̀ mi.
I ku bu swɑɑ dɑki. I Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wiru kpĩiyɔ, kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i ko i de bɛsɛn wuu geni gu ko bɑnsu.
Yeremi u mɑɑ nɛɛ, sɔmɔ be, bɑ̀ n sɑ̃ɑn nɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ gem mɑ win gɑriyɑ bɑ kpɑrɑmɔ, bu nùn kɑnɔ, wi, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u ku de bu yɑ̃ɑ ni gurɑ ni nu tie win sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu sɔɔ kpuro, bu kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Domi sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Yoyɑkini, Yoyɑkimun bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko yoru mwɑ kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu, u ǹ ginɑ dendi yɑ̃ɑ nini gure, gberebɑ, kɑ boo sii gɑnduguu, kɑ gen sɔwɑritii, kɑ dendi yɑ̃ɑ ni nu tie Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
<range>
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ dendi yɑ̃ɑ nin sɔ̃.
U nɛɛ, ni kpurowɑ bɑ koo gurɑ bu kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Miyɑ nu ko n wɑ̃ɑ sere win tii u rɑ kɑ de bu kɑ nu wurɑmɑ min di.
Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse te sɔɔ, yen suru nɔɔbuse sɔɔ, Hɑnɑniɑ, Asurin bii, wi u sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Gɑbɑoniɔ, u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ tɔmbu kpuron wuswɑɑɔ, Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
U nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, u koo wigibu yɑrɑ Bɑbilonigibun yorun di, te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sugu ben wĩinɔ.
N kɑ ko wɔ̃ɔ yiru u koo de Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u kɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃ɑ ni wurɑmɑ, ni u rɑɑ gurɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
U koo mɑɑ de Yoyɑkini, Yoyɑkimun bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko u wurɑmɑ, kɑ sere Yudɑbɑn tɔn be bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Domi u koo bu yɑrɑ Bɑbilonin yorun di.
Yerɑ Yeremi u Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Hɑnɑniɑ wisɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi kpuron wuswɑɑɔ,
u nɛɛ, ɑmi. Gusunɔ u de yu koorɑ nge mɛ ɑ geruɑ. Kpɑ u de tɔn be kpuro bu wurɑmɑ Bɑbilonin di kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dendi yɑ̃ɑ ni.
Adɑmɑ Hɑnɑniɑ, ɑ gɑri yini swɑɑ dɑkio ɑ nɔ, yi nɑ gerumɔ wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ kɑ tɔn ben wuswɑɑɔ.
Gusunɔn sɔmɔ be bɑ gbiɑ bɑ nɑ yellun di, sɑ sere nɑ, nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kɑ tɑbu kɑ bɑrɑnun gɑriyɑ bɑ bwese bɑkɑnu kɑ sinɑ bokobu sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Tɛ̃ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ goo ù n seewɑ u bɔri yɛndun gɑri mɔ̀, ɑmɔnɑ tɔmbɑ koo kɑ tubu mɑ Gusunɔwɑ u yɛ̃ro gɔrimɑ, mɑ n kun mɔ ye u geruɑ mi, yɑ koorɑ.
Yerɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Hɑnɑniɑ u Yeremi sugu ye wunɑ mɑ u ye bɔɔkɑ.
Mɑ u tɔmbu kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, n kɑ ko wɔ̃ɔ yiru u koo Bɑbilonigibun dɑm mɛ buɑ nge mɛ nɑ sugu ye bɔɔkɑ. Mɑ Yeremi u win swɑɑ mwɑ u n doonɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Hɑnɑniɑ u sugu dɑ̃ɑ ye wunɑ Yeremin wĩirun di u bɔɔkɑ u kpɑ, yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ doo ɑ Hɑnɑniɑ sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, u kpĩɑ u sugu dɑ̃ɑgiɑ ye bɔɔkɑ, ɑdɑmɑ u koo yen kɔsire wɑ ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ sisugiɑ.
Nɛ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ nɛɛ, wee nɑ sugu sisugiɑ dokemɔ bwese ni kpuron wĩinɔ, kpɑ nu kɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko yoru diiyɑ. Bɑɑ kɑ gbeeku yɛɛyɔ, kon nùn ye nɔmu bɛriɑwɑ.
Yerɑ Yeremi u Hɑnɑniɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ swɑɑ dɑkio ɑ nɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ kun nun gɔre. Kɑ mɛ, ɑ dɑ ɑ tɔmbu gɑri weesugii sɔ̃ɔwɑ, mɑ bɑ yi nɑɑnɛ kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, tɛ̃, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, u koo nun wunɑ tem minin di, domi wunɛn gɑri yi derɑ tɔmbɑ nùn seesi. Kɑɑ gbi gisɔku ge.
Mɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Hɑnɑniɑ wi, u gu wɔ̃ɔ gen suru nɔɔbɑ yiruse sɔɔ.
Sɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmun diyɑ Yeremi u bukurobu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu tireru kuɑ, tɔmbu kpuro gesi be Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u yoru mwɛɛrɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
N deemɑ sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ sinɑ boko Yoyɑkini mwɑ kɔ kɑ win mɛro kɑ win sɔm kowo be bɑ mɑɑtɑm kuɑ, kɑ wirugibu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kɑ Yudɑn wuu si su tie sɔɔ, kɑ dɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃kobu kɑ sekobu.
Wee sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko u Eleɑsɑɑ Sɑfɑnin bii, kɑ Gemɑriɑ, Hilikiyɑn bii gɔriɔ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑn mi, Bɑbiloniɔ. Mɑ Yeremi u bu win tire te wɛ̃. Wee ye tire te, tɑ gerumɔ.
Tɑ nɛɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑn Yinni. Wiyɑ u kɑ bɛɛ gɑri mɔ̀, bɛɛ be u derɑ bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbilonin temɔ.
U nɛɛ, i diɑ bɑniɔ kpɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ ye sɔɔ. I gbeɑ koowo kpɑ i yen dĩɑnu di.
I kurɔbu suo kpɑ i bibu mɑ. I de bɛɛn bii tɔn durɔbu bu kurɔbu suɑ bu bibu mɑ, kpɑ i bɛɛn bii tɔn kurɔbu durɔbu kɛ̃ kpɑ ben tii bu mɑɑ kɔwɑrɑ. I dɑbio mi i wɑ̃ɑ mi, i ku kɑɑrɑ.
I kɑsuo nge mɛ tem mɛ, mu koo kɑ kuurɑ mi Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ i yoru dimɔ. Kpɑ i nùn kɑnɑ tem mɛn sɔ̃, domi mù n kuurɑ, bɛɛn tii i ko i kuurɑwɑ.
Gusunɔ, bɛɛn Yinni wi, u mɑɑ nɛɛ, i ku de nɛn sɔmɔ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ, bu bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃ke. I ku sɔrobu kɑ be bɑ bɛɛ bɛɛn dosusu tubusiɑmɔ nɑɑnɛ ko.
Domi bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, wiyɑ u bu gɔrɑ, bu kɑ bɛɛ gɑri sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ weesɑ bɑ mɔ̀, n ǹ wi.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, wɔ̃ɔ wɑtɑ kɑ wɔkurun bɑɑ yɑ̀ n doonɑ, u koo nɑ u bɛɛ yɑrɑ u kɑ wurɑmɑ bɛɛn temɔ. Nge mɛyɑ u koo kɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibiɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, u yɛ̃ himbɑ ye u yii bɛɛn sɔ̃. Himbɑ geɑ, n ǹ mɔ himbɑ kɔ̃sɑ. U koo de ye i yĩiyɔ yu bɛɛ koorɑ siɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, ì n nùn sokɑ bɛɛn kɑnɑru sɔɔ, u koo bɛɛ swɑɑ dɑki kpɑ u bɛɛ wurɑri.
Ì n nùn kɑsu kɑ bɛɛn gɔ̃ru kpuro, u koo de i nùn wɑ,
kpɑ u bɛɛ be bɑ rɑɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ mi, mɛnnɑmɑ sɑɑ tem kpuron di kɑ bwesenu kpuro sɔɔn di mi u derɑ i yɑrinɛ, kpɑ u bɛɛ gɔsiɑmɑ i wurɑmɑ bɛɛn temɔ, mìn di u derɑ bɑ bɛɛ gurɑ. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
U bɛɛ yeni sɔ̃ɔmɔwɑ, domi i gerumɔ i mɔ̀, wiyɑ u bɛɛ sɔmɔbu wɛ̃ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Tɛ̃, wee ye u gerumɔ sunɔ wi u sɔ̃ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑɔn sɔ̃, kɑ sere tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ be bɑ ǹ yoru mwɛ bɑ kɑ de Bɑbiloniɔn sɔ̃.
U nɛɛ, wee, u koo de bu bu tɑbu wɔrimɑ kpɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑru tu bu wɔri. U koo bu wɑhɑlɑ kpɛ̃ɛ kpɑ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum mɛ mu kɔ̃sɑ bɑ yinɑ bu di.
Bɑ̀ n duki yɑkurɑ, u koo bu nɑɑ girɑwɑ kɑ tɑbu, kpɑ u de gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑru tu bu wɔri sere bwesenu kpuro nu nɑndɑ nù n bu wɑ. Kpɑ u bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ kpɑ bɑ n dɑ kɑ ben yĩsiru tɔmbu bɔ̃rusi, ǹ kun mɛ, bu kɑ goo gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu sie, ǹ kun mɛ gɑ̃ɑ nɑnumginu, ǹ kun mɛ, gɑ̃ɑ sekuruginu.
Domi bɑ ǹ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri swɑɑ sue bɑɑ mɛ u rɑ n bu yi sɔ̃ɔmɔ sɑɑ win sɔmɔbun nɔɔn di. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ be u derɑ bɑ gurɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye u gerumɔ.
U nɛɛ, Akɑbu, Kolɑyɑn bii kɑ Sedesiɑsi, Mɑseyɑn bii, be, be bɑ bɛɛ gɑri weesugii sɔ̃ɔmɔ kɑ win yĩsiru, u koo bu Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko nɔmu bɛriɑ kpɑ u bu so u go, bɛɛn nɔni biru.
Kpɑ bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Bɑbiloniɔ, i tɔmbu yiru yen yĩsinu suɑ i n dɑ kɑ tɔmbu bɔ̃rusi, i nɛɛ, Gusunɔ u nun kuɑ nge Sedesiɑsi kɑ Akɑbu be Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u sɛ̃ɛwɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ.
Domi tɔn be, bɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu kuɑ, bɑ sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ kɑ ben berusebun kurɔbu. Mɑ bɑ weesu kuɑ kɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn yĩsiru, bɑɑ mɛ u ǹ bu yiire. Adɑmɑ u yɛ̃ ye bɑ kuɑ kpuro, u sɑ̃ɑ yen seedɑgii.
Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ, u Yeremi gɔrɑ Semɑyɑ, Nɛɛlɑmugiin mi. N deemɑ Semɑyɑ wi, u rɑɑ yɑ̃ku kowo Sofoni, Mɑseyɑn bii tireru mɔrisiɑ kɑ sere yɑ̃ku kowo be bɑ tie, kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kpuro.
<range>
Ye u geruɑ tire te sɔɔ wee. U nɛɛ, Sofoni, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u nun gɔsɑ ɑ kɑ ko yɑ̃ku kowo Yehoyɑdɑn ɑyerɔ, kpɑ ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru kɔ̃su. Goo ù n seewɑ u tii kuɑ nge wiiro mɑ u tii sokumɔ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ, kpɑ ɑ nùn mwɑ ɑ bɔke kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii kɑ yɔni.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ ǹ Yeremi, Anɑtɔtugii mwɛ ɑ sɛɛyɑsie, wi u tii kuɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Wee, u mɑm sun goo gɔriɑmɑ Bɑbiloni mini u sun sɔ̃ mɑ sɑ ko yoru di mini n kɑ tɛ. Yen sɔ̃, su be diɑ bɑniɔ kpɑ sɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ye sɔɔ, kpɑ su be gbeɑ ko kpɑ su yen dĩɑnu di.
Mɑ Sofoni u Yeremi tire te gɑriɑ.
Sɑɑ yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ mi gɔrio ɑ nɛɛ,
wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ Semɑyɑ, Nɛɛlɑmugiin sɔ̃. Semɑyɑ wi, u bɛɛ gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ, ɑdɑmɑ nɑ ǹ nùn gɑri gɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɛɛn sɔ̃. Wee tɛ̃ u derɑ i weesu nɑɑnɛ kuɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon nùn wɔri wi kɑ win bweseru kpuro. Ben goo kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑru dimɔ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. U ǹ mɑɑ durom mɛ wɑsi mɛ kon nɛn tɔmbu kuɑ. Domi u derɑ bɑ mɑn seesi.
Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ gɑri yi kpuro yoruo tireru sɔɔ yi nɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Nɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ yɑkiɑmɑ yorun di, n kɑ bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ. Kon de bu wurɑmɑ tem mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃ sɔɔ, kpɑ mu ko begim.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn sɔ̃.
U nɛɛ, nɑ nɑndɑbun kuuki nɔɔmɔ. Tɔmbɑ bɛrum soore, bɑ ǹ bɔri yɛndu mɔ.
I bikio kpɑ i nɔ tɔn durɔ ù n dɑ yiire u mɑ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ tɔmbu wɑ bɑ ben gɑ̃ɑnu nɛni nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ be kpuron wuswɑɑ burisinɛ.
Annɑ ɑ wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ wɑ yɑ wee. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃surɑ. Tɑ ǹ kɑ tɔ̃ru gɑru weenɛ. Te sɔɔrɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ koo nɔni swɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑru wɑ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, kon bu fɑɑbɑ ko.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ, kon ben sugu wunɑ sɑɑ ben wĩinun di n bɔɔku kpɑ n wɛ̃ɛ yi bɑ rɑɑ kɑ bu sɔri kɑsuku, n ben yoru kpeesiɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tɔn tukobu sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ ben Yinniwɑ bɑ koo sɑ̃, kɑ sere mɑɑ Dɑfidin kɔsire wi kon swĩi ben sinɑ gɔnɑɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, Yɑkɔbun bweseru, bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ nɛn sɔm kowobu, i ku nɑndɑ, i ku diiri. Wee, kon bɛɛ yɑkiɑmɑ sɑɑ tem tukum di mi i yoru dii, bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bibun bweseru. I ko i wurɑmɑ kpɑ i wɛ̃rɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ bɛɛ tɔ̃yɑ mɔ̀.
Domi ko nɑ n kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ kpɑ n bɛɛ fɑɑbɑ ko. Kon bwesenu kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ nìn mi i rɑɑ yɑrinɛ i wɑ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, nɑ ǹ bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑmɔ. Kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ n weenɛ. Domi nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n bɛɛ deri n nɛɛ, i ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu kue.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, bɛɛn bɑrɑrɑ kpɑ̃, bɛɛn mɛɛrɑ yɑ ǹ bɛkurɑmɔ.
Goo kun bɛɛn wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀ u bɛɛn mɛɛrɑ ye tim doke. Tim gɑm sɑri mɛ mu koo bɛɛn mɛɛrɑ ye bɛkiɑ.
Be bɑ rɑɑ kɑ bɛɛ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛ kɑsu, domi nɑ bɛɛ sowɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ yibɛrɛ so. Nɑ bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ kɑ dɑm bɛɛn durum dɑbinun sɔ̃.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i mɛɛrɑn weeweenu mɔ̀ ye i wɑ bɛɛn torɑnun sɔ̃. I n yɛ̃ mɑ bɛɛn durum bɑkɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bɛɛ yeni kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ be bɑ bɛɛ wɔri bɑ di, kon ben tii wɔriwɑ n di. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ kpuro bɑ koo bu yoru mwɛɛriwɑ. Be bɑ bɛɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑmɔ, kon de bu mɑɑ ben tiin yɑ̃nu gurɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, be bɑ rɑɑ mɔ̀ i kɑm kuɑ, mɑ goo kun bɛɛn lɑɑkɑri mɔ̀, kon bɛɛn mɛɛrɑn bosu bɛkiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ wure nɑ nɛɛ, wee, kon bɛɛ Isirelibɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru yɑrɑ yorun di, kpɑ i wurɑ bɛɛn yɛnusɔ. Kon bɛɛn yɛnusun wɔnwɔndu ko, kpɑ n bɛɛn wuu bɑni gen bɑnsɔ n bɛɛn sinɑ kpɑɑru seeyɑ n swĩi mi tɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
I ko i siɑrɑbun womusu ko kɑ nuku dobun kuuki. Kon bɛɛ dɑbiɑsiɑ, i ǹ mɑɑ kɑɑrɑmɔ. Kon de bu bɛɛ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ bu ku bɛɛ gɛm.
I ko i n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yellu, kpɑ i n dɑ bɛɛn mɛnnɔsu ko nɛn wuswɑɑɔ. Kpɑ n be bɑ bɛɛ dɑm dɔremɔ kpuro sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Bɛɛn turowɑ koo ko bɛɛn sunɔ. Kpɑ n de u mɑn susimɑ, domi goo kun kɑ̃kɔ u mɑn susi, mɑ n kun mɔ nɑ nùn sokɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ i ko i n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu, kpɑ n ko bɛɛn Yinni.
Wee, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru yɑ wee nge guru woo bɔkɔ, kpɑ yu tɔn kɔ̃sobu wɔri.
Nɛn mɔru ye, yɑ ǹ suremɔ mɑ n kun mɔ yɑ nɛn himbɑ yibiɑ. Amɛn biru kpɑ yu bɛɛ yeeri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon mɑɑ ko Isirelibɑn bwesenu kpuron Yinni, kpɑ be, bɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ, nɑ bu nɛn durom sɔ̃ɔsi, ben be bɑ yɑrɑ tɑbun di, bɑ wee bu wɛ̃rɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, nɑ bɛɛ nɛn tii sɔ̃ɔsi sɑɑ yellun di. Nɑ bɛɛ kĩwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bɛɛ nɛn durom derie.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, kon mɑɑ wure n bɛɛ swĩi, kpɑ i yɔ̃rɑ. Kon de i bɛɛn bɑrɑnu so, kpɑ i yɑri i n yɑɑmɔ be bɑ nuku dobu mɔ̀n suunu sɔɔ,
i ko i mɑɑ resɛmbɑ duure Sɑmɑrin guunɔ, kpɑ i yen binu wɑ i sɔri.
Sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ wuun kɔ̃sobu bɑ koo nɔɔgiru suɑ Efɑrɑimun guuru wɔllun di bu nɛɛ, i seewo su dɑ Siɔniɔ mi Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni u wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, i Yɑkɔbun bweseru tɑki kuo kɑ nuku dobu. I yɛ̃ɛrio ten sɔ̃ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ bwesenun wiru. I nɔɔgiru suo kpɑ i siɑrɑbun womusu ko. I nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ u win tɔmbu Isireli be bɑ tie fɑɑbɑ mɔ̀.
Wee nɑ kɑ bu wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di. Nɑ bu mɛnnɑmɔ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛn di. Tɔn be, bɑ dɑbi. Be sɔɔ, wɔ̃kobɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ yɛmɔbu kɑ gurigibu, kɑ be bɑ yiire bɑ kĩ bu mɑ.
Be wee bɑ wee kɑ swĩi, bɑ mɑn kɑnɑmɔ. Mɑ nɑ bu kpɑre nɑ kɑ dɔɔ nim bwerɔ kɑ swɑɑ ye yɑ nɔɔ nɛ sɔɔ, mi bɑ ǹ sokurɑmɔ. Domi nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelin bweserun Bɑɑbɑ. Mɑ tɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn bii yerumɑ.
Bɛɛ bwese tukunu, i nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio, kpɑ i yi kpɑrɑ i kɑ dɑ sere mi n tomɑ. I nɛɛ, nɛ wi nɑ Isirelibɑn bweseru yɑrinɑsiɑ, nɑ kon mɑɑ tu mɛnnɑ, kpɑ n tu kɔ̃su nge mɛ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro u rɑ win yɑ̃ɑnu kɔ̃su.
Domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru yɑkiɑ, nɑ tu wɔrɑ sɑɑ wi u tu dɑm keren nɔmun di.
Bɑ koo nɑ Siɔnin guuru wɔllɔ, bɑ n nuku dobu mɔ̀ kɑ kuuki. Bɑ koo duki nɑ ɑrumɑni ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu wɛ̃n sɔ̃. Yeyɑ, dobi kɑ resɛm kɑ olifi ye bɑ rɑ kɑ gum ko, kɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ nɛɛ. Ben bwɛ̃rɑ koo yɛmiɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑru te tɑ nim wɑɑmɔ. Bɑ ǹ koo mɑɑ wɑhɑlɑ ko.
Wɔndiɑbɑ bɑ koo nuku dobu ko, bɑ n yɑɑmɔ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑ durɔ tɔkɔnu ko n yɛ̃ɛrimɔ. Domi kon ben nuku sɑnkirɑnu gɔsiɑ nuku dobu, n bu nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ. Kpɑ n mɑɑ ben nɔni swɑ̃ɑru gɔsiɑ bɔri yɛndu.
Kon de nɛn yɑ̃ku kowobu bu dĩɑ geenu di bu debu, kpɑ nɛn tɔmbu bu debu nɛn ɑrumɑnin sɔ̃. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Amɛniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bɑ swĩi gɛɛ nɔɔmɔ Rɑmɑɔ. Yɛ̃ro u sumɔ u weeweenu mɔ̀. Ase, Rɑsɛliwɑ u sumɔ win bibun sɔ̃. Mɑ u yinɑmɔ bu nùn suuru kɑnɑ domi bii be kpurowɑ bɑ gu.
Adɑmɑ nɑ nɛɛ, u mɑrio, u win nɔni yĩresu woko. Domi u koo ɑre wɑ ye u win bibu kuɑn sɔ̃. Bɑ koo wurɑmɑ yibɛrɛbɑn tem di.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, win siɑ yɑ koo wɛ̃rɑ, domi win bibɑ koo wurɑmɑ ben temɔ.
Nɑ Isirelibɑn nɔɔ nɔɔmɔ bɑ weeweenu mɔ̀, bɑ mɔ̀, n de bu wurɑmɑ nɛn mi kɑ gem. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɑɑ buu ge gɑ gen tii kpɑre, mɑ nɑ bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Domi nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Ye ben lɑɑkɑri yɑ wurɑmɑ, mɑ bɑ tuubɑ kuɑ. Ye bɑ ben torɑnu giɑ, mɑ bɑ tukɑ kɑ sekuru ye bɑ kuɑ sɑɑ ben ɑluwɑɑsirun din sɔ̃.
Isirelin bweseru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɛn bii kĩnɑsi. Mɛyɑ nɑ mɑɑ tu kĩru sɔ̃ɔsi. Domi nge mɛ̀n nɔru nɑ ten gɑri mɔ̀, nge mɛyɑ ten kĩru tɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ nɛn gɔ̃ruɔ. Nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ kun kpunɛ ten sɔ̃. Kon tu wɔnwɔn bɑkɑru kuɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i yĩreru koowo bɛɛn swɑɑ sɔɔ kpɑ i dɑ̃ɑ girɑ. I swɑɑ ye lɑɑkɑri koowo ye i rɑɑ swĩi. Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i wurɑmɑ bɛɛn wusɔ.
Sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ i ko i n kɔ̃ɔre i n yɑɑyɑɑre mɔ̀, bɛɛ nɑɑnɛ sɑribɑ. Wee nɛ Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ gɑ̃ɑ kpɑɑnu kuɑ temɔ. Tɔn kurɔwɑ u koo durɔ kɑsu.
Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ̀ n kɑ Isirelibɑ wurɑmɑ sɑɑ yorun di, ɑmɛniwɑ bɑ koo gere Yudɑn tem kpuro sɔɔ bu nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ u guu te u gɔsɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ domɑru kuo, mi gem mu wɑ̃ɑ.
Yudɑbɑ kpuro, kɑ ben gbɑɑ wukobu, kɑ be bɑ rɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu kpɑre bɑ koo wurɑ bu sinɑ ben tem wuu mɑrosɔ kɑ mɛn bɑru kpɑɑnɔ.
Domi kon wi nim nɔru gɑ mɔ̀ nim wɛ̃, kpɑ win gɔ̃ru gu yɛmiɑ. Kpɑ n de wi u wɔkɔnu wɔrimɔ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃ u di u debu.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Yeremi u dom yɑndɑ, mɑ u mɛɛrɑ u deemɑ win dosu ge, gɑ dorɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon de yɑɑ sɑbenu kɑ tɔmbu bu yibu Isireliɔ kɑ Yudɑɔ.
Nge mɛ nɑ rɑɑ bu wukurɑ nɑ sururɑ nge dɑ̃nu, nɑ bu kɔsukɑ nɑ kɑm koosiɑ nge diɑ, nge mɛyɑ kon mɑɑ wure n bu seeyɑ n girɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gerumɔ bu nɛɛ, bɑɑbɑbɑrɑ bɑ resɛm gɔmɑ di, mɑ ben bibun nɔsu yɑɑyɑ.
Adɑmɑ wi u win resɛm gɔmɑ di, win nɔɔwɑ gɑ koo yɑɑyɑ. Wi u mɑɑ durum kuɑ, wiyɑ u koo gbi.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃nu gɑnu sisi nì sɔɔ kon kɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ ɑrukɑwɑni kpɑɑ bɔke.
Adɑmɑ yɑ ǹ ko n sɑ̃ɑ yèn bweseru nɑ rɑɑ kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɔkuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ bu nɔmu nɛnuɑ nɑ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di. Bɑ ǹ ye mɛm nɔɔwɛ, bɑɑ mɛ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Tɛ̃, ɑrukɑwɑni kpɑɑ ye wee, ye kon kɑ Isirelibɑ bɔke. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon de nɛn woodɑbɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben bwisikunu sɔɔ, kpɑ n ye yorusi ben gɔ̃rusɔ. Kpɑ nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni, kpɑ be, bɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbu.
Domi tɔmbu kpurowɑ bɑ ko n mɑn yɛ̃ sɑɑ bibun di sere kɑ bukurobɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ win winsim ǹ kun mɛ win mɛro bisi goo keu mɔ̀ u kɑ Gusunɔ giɑ. Kon bu ben durum wɔkɑ, kpɑ n ku mɑɑ ye yɑɑyɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u sɔ̃ɔ kuɑ u kɑ yɑm dɛɛrɑsiɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ. Mɑ u suru kɑ kperi yi yi, yi kɑ yɑm dɛɛrɑsiɑ wɔ̃kuru. U rɑ mɑɑ de nim kurenu nu se nim wɔ̃kun di, kpɑ nu wɔki. Win yĩsirɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ. Wiyɑ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɑkɑ koorɑ yenibɑ kpuro yɑ̀ n koo kpe, Isirelibɑn bweserɑ koo mɑɑ kpe, kpɑ tɑ kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
U mɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ, mɑ bɑ kpĩɑ bɑ wɔllun kpɑ̃ɑru yĩirɑ bɑ giɑ, mɑ bɑ duɑ temɔ bɑ mɛn kpɛɛkpɛɛkun ɑsɑnsi giɑ, sɑɑ yerɑ u koo mɑɑ Isirelin bweseru kpuro yinɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Wee sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ bɑ koo mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ bu Yerusɑlɛmu bɑni sɑɑ Hɑnɑnɛɛlin di sere n kɑ dɑ wuun gbɑ̃rɑrun kɔnnɔwɔ ge bɑ mɔ̀ gɑni gɔmburun kɔnnɔ.
Kpɑ bu mɑɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɛmiɑmɑ min di bu yĩire bu kɑ dɑ Gɑrɛbun gungurɔ, kpɑ bu besirɑ bu dɑ sere Goɑtiɔ.
Wɔwɑ ye kpuro mi bɑ rɑ gonu sike kpɑ bu kubɑnu yɑri mi, kɑ gbeɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ berɑ mi sere n kɑ dɑ Sedoronin dɑɑrɔ, kɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, mìn di dumi yi rɑ kɑ du, yebɑ kpurowɑ yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔgiɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ye kɔsukumɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ. N deemɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑn bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu yiru sɑrisewɑ mi.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu tɑrusi, mɑ Yeremi u wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm sɔɔ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ.
Sedesiɑsi wiyɑ u nùn pirisɔm ye kpɛ̃ɛ yèn sɔ̃ u Gusunɔn gɑri geruɑ u nɛɛ, wee Yinni Gusunɔ u Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wuu geni nɔmu bɛriɑ kpɑ u gu kɑmiɑ.
Sedesiɑsi kun mɑɑ kisirɑmɔ tɑbu kowobun nɔmɑn di. Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u koo nùn nɔmɑ turi, kpɑ bu wɑɑnɑ nɔni kɑ nɔni bu gɑri ko.
Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wi, u koo kɑ nùn dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Miyɑ u ko n wɑ̃ɑ sere Gusunɔ u kɑ win gɑri ko. Yen sɔ̃, bɑɑ ì n kɑ Bɑbilonigibu tɑbu mɔ̀ tɛ̃, i ǹ bu kɑmiɑmɔ.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wee, Hɑnɑmɛɛli, Sɑlumun bii, nɛn bɑɑn tundo turosin bii, u koo nɑ u nɛɛ, n nɑ n win gberu dwe Anɑtɔtuɔ, Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ. Domi nɛnɑ n weenɛ n tem mɛ yɑkiɑ n tubi di.
Yerɑ n koorɑ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. Hɑnɑmɛɛli wi, u nɑ nɛn mi pirisɔm dirɔ u nɛɛ, n win tem mɛ dweeyo mɛ mu wɑ̃ɑ Anɑtɔtuɔ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ domi nɛnɑ n weenɛ n mu yɑkiɑ n tubi di. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ nɑ tubɑ mɑ Gusunɔwɑ u kĩ mɛ.
Mɑ nɑ gbee te yɑkiɑ kɑ sii geesun gobi wɔkurɑ nɔɔbu kɑ yiru.
Mɑ nɑ seedɑgibu suɑ nɑ tem mɛn dwee tirenu yoruɑ yiru nɑ nɛn yĩreru doke ten teeru wɔllɔ nɑ wukiri nge mɛ woodɑ yɑ geruɑ mɑ nɑ sii gee si suɑ nɑ kilo sɔndi seedɑgii ben wuswɑɑɔ. Mɑ nɑ tire ni suɑ
<range>
nɑ Bɑruku, Nɛriyɑn bii, Mɑseyɑn debubu wɛ̃ Hɑnɑmɛɛli kɑ seedɑgii be bɑ ben yĩrenu doke tire te sɔɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ Yudɑbɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm dii yɑɑrɑ min nɔni biru.
Be kpuron nɔni birɑ nɑ mɑɑ Bɑruku sɔ̃ɔwɑ
nɑ nɛɛ, Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, wiyɑ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, u dwee tirenu yiru ye suo, te bɑ yĩreru koosi, u dɑ u nu doke wekeru sɔɔ kpɑ nu ku rɑɑ sɑnkirɑ.
Domi sɔ̃ɔ teeru tɔmbu bɑ koo mɑɑ diɑ kɑ gbeɑ dwe tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ tem mɛn dwee tire ni Bɑruku, Nɛriyɑn bii wɛ̃ nɑ kpɑ, nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ kɑnɑ nɑ nɛɛ,
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ wɔllu kɑ tem kuɑ wunɛn dɑm bɑkɑm kɑ wunɛn yiikon sɑɑbu. Gɑ̃ɑnu sɑri ni ɑ kpɑnɛ.
A rɑ bwesenu durom kue sere kɑ nin bibun bibɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ̀ n torɑ, ɑ rɑ ben bibu sɛɛyɑsie torɑ nin sɔ̃. Gusunɔ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni boko, mɑ ɑ dɑm mɔ. Wunɛn yĩsirɑ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni.
Wunɛn himbɑ yɑ kpɑ̃, ɑ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ ɑ kɑ ye yibiɑ. A rɑ n mɛɛrɑ ye tɔmbɑ mɔ̀ kpɑ ɑ bɑɑwure kuɑ nge mɛ win kookoosu nɛ.
A sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiginu kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ bɛsɛn sikɑdobɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Egibitiɔ. Mɛyɑ gisɔ ɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ bɛsɛn suunu sɔɔ Isireliɔ kɑ bwese ni nu tien suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ ɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ nge mɛ sɑ nɔɔmɔ gisɔ.
A wunɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi, ɑ sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiginu kuɑ. Mɑ tɔmbɑ nɑndɑ. Yerɑ yɑ derɑ ɑ wunɛn tɔmbu yɑrɑ sɑɑ Egibitin di.
Mɑ ɑ bu tem mɛ wɛ̃ mɛ ɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri, mɛ mu tim kɑ bom yibɑ.
Mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ nɑ bɑ tem mɛ mwɑ mu kuɑ begim. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ wunɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wunɛn woodɑbɑ swĩi. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kue ye ɑ bu yiire. Sɑɑ yerɑ ɑ derɑ kɔ̃sɑ yeni kpuro yɑ bu deemɑ.
Wee tɛ̃ Bɑbilonigibu bɑ gungunu bɑnɑ bu kɑ wɑ bu wuu ge wɔri. Bɑ koo mɑɑ gu mwɑ, domi ɑ bu gu nɔmu bɛriɑ. Kɑɑ de bu gu kɑmiɑ kɑ tɑbu kɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑru. Mɛyɑ ye ɑ geruɑ kpuro yɑ koorɑ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɑɑ ye wɑɑmɔ.
Wee wuu ge, gɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑbilonigibun nɔmɑ sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, ɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɑ nɛɛ, n tem dweeyo kɑ gobi kpɑ n yi kɔsiɑ seedɑgibun wuswɑɑɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi wisɑ u nɛɛ,
wee, nɛ Gusunɔ, nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ hɑnduniɑgibu kpuron Yinni. Gɑ̃ɑnu sɑri ni nɑ kpɑnɛ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon de Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ kɑ win tɑbu kowobu bu Yerusɑlɛmu nɔmɑ turi. U koo mɑɑ ye mwɑ.
Bɑ koo ye wɔri kpɑ bu ye dɔ̃ɔ mɛni kpɑ bu diɑ yèn wɔllɔ Yudɑbɑ bɑ rɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli yɑ̃kuru kue dɔ̃ɔ sɔku, kɑ sere mi bɑ rɑ tɔn tukobun bũu sɑ̃ bu tɑm tɑ̃rɑ. Domi yebɑ kpurowɑ bɑ kɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ.
Wee kɔ̃sɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀ sɑɑ ben toren di. Ben ye bɑ mɔ̀ kpuro yɑ rɑ nɛn mɔru seeyewɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Sɑɑ mìn di bɑ wuu ge swĩi, n kɑ girɑri gisɔ, gen tɔmbu bɑ rɑ nɛn mɔru seeyewɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ kĩ n gu wɑ nɛn wuswɑɑɔ.
Domi Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kɑ Isirelibɑ, be kɑ ben sinɑmbu kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ ben yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu, bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ. Yerɑ yɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ.
Bɑ yinɑ bu mɑn mɛɛri. Biruwɑ bɑ mɑn kisi. Nɑ bu keu kuɑ sɑɑ yee yellun di. Adɑmɑ bɑ yinɑ bu nɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru nɔ.
N ǹ mɑm ye tɔnɑ, bɑ mɑɑ ben bwɑ̃ɑrokunu duusiɑwɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ tu disi doke.
Bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃ɑ yeru bɑniɑ Bɛni Hinɔmun wɔwɑɔ. Miyɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ ben bibu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko Mɔlɔkun sɔ̃. N deemɑ nɑ ǹ bu yen gɑɑ yiire. Nɑ ǹ mɑm bwisikɑ bu kɔ̃sɑ yenin bweseru ko ye yɑ derɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro bɑ mɑn torɑri.
Nɛ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, Yeremi, Yerusɑlɛmu ye i nɛɛ, bɑ koo Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko nɔmu bɛriɑ mi, kpɑ u ye wɔri u kɑmiɑ kɑ tɑbu kɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑru,
wee, kon yen tɔmbu mɛnnɑ bu wurɑ ye sɔɔ. Domi nɑ rɑɑ kɑ bu mɔru kuɑ gem gem, mɑ nɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑɑmɑ, ɑdɑmɑ kon de bu wurɑmɑ mini kpɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Bɑ koo wure bu ko nɛn tɔmbu kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Kon de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɔɔ bɑ n kookoo teesu mɔ̀, kpɑ bɑ n mɑn nɑsie bɑɑdommɑ. Yerɑ yɑ koo de bɑ n nuku dobu mɔ sere kɑ ben bibun bibɔ.
Kon kɑ bu ɑrukɑwɑni bɔke ye yɑ kun kpeemɔ. Nɑ ǹ bu biru kisimɔ, kon bu geɑ kuɑwɑ, kpɑ n de bɑ n mɑn nɑsie ben gɔ̃ruɔ kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ mɑɑ gɛrɑ nɛn swɑɑn di.
Kɑ nuku dobɑ kon bu geɑ kuɑ kpɑ n bu swĩi mɑm mɑm tem mɛ sɔɔ kɑ gɔ̃ru tiɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, nge mɛ nɑ derɑ kɔ̃sɑ bɑkɑ yɑ tɔn be deemɑ, nge mɛyɑ kon mɑɑ de durom bɑkɑm mu nɑ be sɔɔ mɛ̀n nɔɔ mwɛɛru nɑ kuɑ.
Yeremi, ɑ geruɑ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ tem mɛ Bɑbilonigibu nɔmu bɛriɑ. Wee, mu kuɑ bɑnsu. Tɔmbu kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu mɑɑ sɑri mɛ sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ miyɑ tɔmbu bɑ koo wurɑ kpɑ bu gbeɑ dwe.
Kɑ gem bɑ koo gbeɑ dwe bɑɑmɑ kpuro kɑ gobi, kpɑ bu yen dwee tirenu ko, bu nu yĩrenu koosi seedɑgibun wuswɑɑɔ. Bɑ koo gbeɑ dwe Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun bɑru kpɑɑnɔ, kɑ Yudɑn wusɔ, kɑ wuu si su wɑ̃ɑ guunun berɑ giɑ, kɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ wɔwi sɔɔ, kɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Domi sin tɔn be bɑ rɑɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ mi, kon de bu wurɑmɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kpɑm kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm sɔɔ.
U nɛɛ, nɛ wi nɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ, nɛ wi nɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ mɑ nɑ mu nɛni, nɛnɑ nɑ nɛɛ,
ɑ mɑn sokuo, kon nun wurɑri. Kon nun gɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑ ɑsiriginu sɔ̃ɔsi ni ɑ ǹ yɛ̃.
Nɛ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɑ gɑ̃ɑnu mɔ ni nɑ kĩ ɑ nɔ, Yerusɑlɛmun diɑ kɑ sere Yudɑbɑn sinɑ kpɑɑnun sɔ̃, ni Bɑbilonigibɑ wɔri bɑ sururɑ.
Mɑ be bɑ kɑ Bɑbilonigii be tɑbu kuɑ, ben gonu yibɑ wuu ge sɔɔ, nɛn mɔru bɑkɑn sɔ̃, domi Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ sere nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kĩ n wuu ge wɑ.
Wee, sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon gu nɔɔri nge bɑrɔ. Kon gu bɛkiɑ n bwɑ̃ɑ dorɑsiɑ, kpɑ n de gen tɔmbu bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Kon de be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ Yudɑn di, ben wɑ̃ɑru tu kɔsi, kpɑ n bu swĩi nge yellu.
Kon bu ben durum kpuro wɔkɑ ye bɑ mɑn koosi. Kon ben torɑ ni bɑ mɑn torɑri sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ mɑn seesi suuru kuɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, nɑ kon nuku dobu mɔ Yerusɑlɛmun sɔ̃, kpɑ yɑ n nɛn yĩsiru bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, kpɑ bwese tukunu nu n mɑn siɑrɑmɔ. Bwese ni, nù n wɑ durom bɑkɑm mɛ kon ye kuɑ kɑ doo nɔɔ te kon ye wɛ̃, nu koo biti ko sere nu diiri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, i nɛɛ, bɛɛn tem mu kuɑ bɑnsu. Tɔmbu kɑ yɛɛ mɑɑ sɑri mi. Mɑ Yerusɑlɛmu kɑ Yudɑbɑn wusun swɛɛ yi kuɑ swɛɛ gonu yi goo ku rɑ mɑɑ sĩ.
Adɑmɑ bɑ koo wure bu nuku dobun kuuki nɔ kɑ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrugii. Bɑ koo kurɔ kpɑɑnun womusu nɔ. Bɑ koo mɑɑ wure bu womu geni nɔ, ge gɑ nɛɛ, i Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni siɑro. Domi u sɑ̃ɑ tɔn geo. Win kĩru tɑ ǹ nɔru mɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ koo mɑɑ tɔn be bɑ kɑ yɑ̃kunu nɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔn womusu nɔ. Domi kon de tɔn be bɑ rɑɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ mi, bu wurɑmɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, kpɑ n bu wesiɑ nge yellu. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tem mɛ, mu rɑɑ kuɑ bɑnsu mi goo sɑri, yɑɑ sɑbenu sɑri mɛn wusu kpuro sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, yɑ̃ɑ kpɑrobu bɑ koo wɑ̃ɑ yeru wɑ mi, kpɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu nu wɛ̃rɑ.
Yɑ̃ɑ kpɑrobu bɑ koo mɑɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kpɑrɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuro wuu si su wɑ̃ɑ guunun berɑ giɑ kɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ wɔwi sɔɔ, kɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ, kɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun bɑru kpɑɑnɔ kɑ Yudɑbɑn wusɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔ̃rɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon nɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛ gee ni yibiɑ ni nɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ kuɑ.
Sɑɑ ye, yɑ̀ n tunumɑ, kon goo seeyɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ kpii pɔturɑ Dɑfidin bweseru sɔɔ u n sɑ̃ɑ gemgii, kpɑ u tɔmbu kpɑrɑ gem sɔɔ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, Yuubɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ kpɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ye yĩsiru kɛ̃, Yinni Gusunɔn miyɑ bɛsɛn gem wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Dɑfidi sinɑ boko u ǹ goo biɑmɔ wi u koo sinɑ win bweserun sinɑ gɔnɑɔ Isireliɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ Lefibɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu, bɑ ǹ kɔsire biɑmɔ ben bweseru sɔɔ bu kɑ mɑn yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kuɑ, kpɑ bu mɑn turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ kpɑ bɑ n dɑ yɑ̃kunu ko tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
nɛnɑ nɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ kɑ wɔ̃kuru ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ. Ì n ko i kpĩ i yen gɑɑ yɔ̃rɑsiɑ yu ku mɑɑ sɔmburu ko yen sɑɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ yu nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni ye kusiɑ,
