Mɛyɑ kon Sedesiɑsi Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kuɑ. Kon bu yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ be bɑ kɑsu bu bu go. Kon bu Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowobu nɔmu bɛriɑ bɑɑ bɑ̀ n kɑ bu tonde.
Kon de bu nɑ bu wuu ge wɔri bu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni kpɑ Yudɑn wusu su ko bɑnsu. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon wɑɑti sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ doo ɑ Rekɑbun bweseru deemɑ kpɑ ɑ kɑ tu nɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ten yɛ̃si yɛ̃sibun teerɔ kpɑ ɑ bu tɑm wɛ̃ mi, bu nɔ.
Mɑ Yeremi u dɑ u Yɑɑsɑniɑ Yeremin bii, Hɑbɑsiniɑn debubu sokɑ kɑ win dusibu kɑ win bibu kpuro, Rekɑbun bweseru kpuro gesi.
Mɑ u kɑ bu dɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dii teeru mi, tèn mi Hɑnɑnu, Yigidɑliɑn bii, Gusunɔn sɔm kowo u wɑ̃ɑ. Dii te, tɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbun dirun bɔkuɔ, gbɑ̃rɑ kɔ̃so, Mɑɑseyɑ, Sɑlumun biin dirun wɔllɔ.
Mɑ Yeremi u bu tɑm bwɑ̃ɑnu wɛ̃ kɑ nɔri u nɛɛ, bu nɔruo.
Adɑmɑ bɑ nùn wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ ǹ tɑm nɔrumɔ. Domi bɛsɛn sikɑdo Yonɑdɑbu, Rekɑbun bii, u sun woodɑ wɛ̃ u nɛɛ, su ku rɑ tɑm nɔ sere kɑ bɛsɛn bibun bibɔ,
su ku rɑ diɑ bɑni, su ku rɑ gbenu ko, su ku rɑ mɑɑ resɛm gbɑɑnu ko, sɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ sɑ n mɑm ye mɔ. Adɑmɑ sɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ kuu bekunuginu sɔɔ bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑru kpuro sɔɔ. Nge mɛyɑ sɑ ko kɑ tɛ tem mɛ sɔɔ, mi sɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ sɔru dimɔ mini.
Yen sɔ̃, bɛsɛ kɑ bɛsɛn bibu sɑ Yonɑdɑbu, Rekɑbun biin gere ye mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ. Sɑ ǹ tɑm nɔrumɔ bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃nu kpuro sɔɔ, bɛsɛ kɑ bɛsɛn kurɔbu kɑ bɛsɛn bibu.
Sɑ ǹ mɑɑ diɑ bɑnimɔ yè sɔɔ sɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ. Mɛyɑ sɑ ǹ gbeɑ mɔ̀, sɑ ǹ mɑɑ resɛm gbɑɑnu mɔ̀.
Sɑ wɑ̃ɑ kuu bekuruginu sɔɔ. Mɛsumɑ sɑ kɑ bɛsɛn sikɑdo Yonɑdɑbun gere ye mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ.
Adɑmɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u tem mɛ wɔrimɑ, yerɑ sɑ nɛɛ, su se su dɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, kpɑ su Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowobu kɑ Sirigibu dukɑ suuri. Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmu mini gisɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, ɑ doo ɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ ǹ nɛn kirɔbɑ swɑɑ dɑkimɔ kpɑ bu mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑ?
Wee Rekɑbun bweseru tɑ Yonɑdɑbu, Rekɑbun biin gere mɛm nɔɔwɑ ye u nɛɛ, win bibu bu ku rɑɑ tɑm nɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tɑm mɛ nɔrɑ sere kɑ gisɔn gisɔ. Bɑ ben sikɑdo mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Adɑmɑ nɛ, nɑ kɑ be, Yudɑbɑ gɑri kuɑ sɑɑ yee yellun di, mɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki.
Nɑ bu nɛn sɔmɔbu gɔriɑmɑ sɑɑ yellun di, bu kɑ ben bɑɑwure sɔ̃ u win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri. Bu ku mɑɑ bũnu sɑ̃ kpɑ bu wɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ sɔmɔ be swɑɑ dɑki, bu sere mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Yonɑdɑbu, Rekɑbun biin bweseru tɑ ten sikɑdon gere mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Adɑmɑ be, nɛn tɔmbu, bɑ ku rɑ mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, wee kon de kɔ̃sɑ kpuro ye nɑ rɑɑ geruɑ mi yu Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu deemɑ. Domi nɑ kɑ bu gɑri kuɑ, bɑ ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. Nɑ bu sokɑ, bɑ ǹ mɑn wurɑri.
Yerɑ Yeremi u Rekɑbun bwese te sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni wi u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn Yinni u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wee i bɛɛn sikɑdo Yonɑdɑbun gere kɑ win yiirebu kpuro mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, Yonɑdɑbu, Rekɑbun bii wi, u ǹ kɔsirebɑ biɑmɔ win bweseru sɔɔ be bɑ ko n nɛn sɔmburu mɔ̀.
Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Yoyɑkimu Yosiɑsin biin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ tireru suo, kpɑ ɑ gɑri yi yore yi nɑ rɑɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ bwese tukunu kpuron sɔ̃ sɑɑ dɔmɑ tèn di nɑ kɑ nun gɑri toruɑ Yosiɑsin wɑɑti sɔɔ n kɑ gisɔ girɑri.
Yudɑbɑ bɑ̀ n nuɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye kon bu kuɑ sɔrɔkudo bɑ koo gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ bu ben kom kɔ̃sum deri. Sɑɑ yerɑ kon bu ben durum wɔkɑ.
Yen biru Yeremi u Bɑruku Nɛriyɑn bii sokɑ mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro ye Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Mɑ Bɑruku u ye yoruɑ tire te sɔɔ.
Yerɑ Yeremi u mɑɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee bɑ mɑn mwɑ bɑ nɛni, nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n dɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, dɔmɑ te bɑ koo nɔɔ bɔke, ɑ doo wunɛn tii, kpɑ ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi nɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɑ yore mi gɑri sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi. Kpɑ Yudɑ be bɑ koo nɑ sɑɑ ben wusun di kɑ sere mɑɑ tɔn be bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuro bu yi nɔ.
Sɔrɔkudo bɑ koo gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ bu ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, kpɑ bu Yinni Gusunɔ suuru kɑnɑ. Domi win mɔru yɑ kpɑ̃ ye u kɑ bu mɔ̀.
Yerɑ Bɑruku Nɛriyɑn bii wi, u kuɑ kpuro ye Yeremi u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi gɑrɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten mi.
Yoyɑkimun bɑn ten wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbuse sɔɔ, yen suru nɔɔbɑ nnɛse sɔɔ, yerɑ bɑ nɔɔ bɔkurun tɔ̃ru yi tè sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro bɑ koo nɑ bu nɔɔ bɔke Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔrɑ Bɑruku u Yeremin gɑri yi gɑrɑ tɔn ben wuswɑɑɔ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, sɑɑ Gemɑriɑ, Sɑfɑnin biin dirun di, wi u sɑ̃ɑ tire yoro. Dii te, tɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ kɔnnɔ ge bɑ mɔ̀ kɔnnɔ kpɔɔn berɑ giɑ, gunguru wɔllɔ.
Ye Misee Gemɑriɑn bii, Sɑfɑnin debubu u Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi nuɑ yi bɑ yoruɑ tire te sɔɔ,
yerɑ u dɑ sinɑ bokon yɛnuɔ sere win tire yoron dirɔ. Mɑ u deemɑ wirugii beni bɑ mɛnnɛ mi. Beyɑ, tire yoro Elisɑmɑ kɑ Delɑyɑ Semɑyɑn bii, kɑ Ɛlinɑtɑni, Akɑborin bii, kɑ Gemɑriɑ Sɑfɑnin bii, kɑ Sedesiɑsi Hɑnɑniɑn bii kɑ sere wirugii be bɑ tie.
Mɑ Misee u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro gɑri yi u nuɑ Bɑruku u tɔn be gɑriɑ.
Yenibɑn biru, wirugii be, bɑ Bɑruku Yehudi Nɛtɑniɑn bii, Selemiɑn debubu, Kusin sikɑdobu gɔriɑ bɑ nɛɛ, u kɑ tire te nɑ te u Yudɑbɑ gɑriɑ mi. Mɑ Bɑruku u tire te suɑ u kɑ dɑ.
Ye u turɑ mi, yerɑ bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ sinɔ kpɑ ɑ sun tire te gɑriɑ. Mɑ Bɑruku u sinɑ u bu tu gɑriɑ.
Ye bɑ gɑri yi nuɑ, yerɑ bɑ mɛɛrinɑ kɑ nɑndɑbu mɑ bɑ Bɑruku bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ,
ɑ sun sɔ̃ɔwɔ nge mɛ ɑ koosinɑ ɑ kɑ gɑri yi yoruɑ. Sɑ ko kɑ yi sinɑ boko dɑɑwɑwɑ.
Yerɑ Bɑruku u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, Yeremiwɑ u mɑn gɑri yi sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ nɑ yorumɔ tireru sɔɔ kɑ ɑnkiri.
Mɑ wirugii be, bɑ nùn wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, i doo i kuke wunɛ kɑ Yeremi, kpɑ goo u ku rɑɑ bɛɛ wɑ.
Yenibɑn biru, wirugibɑ tire te mwɑ bɑ beruɑ Elisɑmɑ tire yoron dirɔ. Mɑ bɑ dɑ sinɑ bokon mi, bɑ nùn gɑri yi sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko u Yehudi gɔrɑ u nɛɛ, u doo u tire te suɑmɑ. Mɑ u dɑ Elisɑmɑn dirɔ u tu suɑmɑ u gɑrɑ sinɑ boko kɑ wirugii ben wuswɑɑɔ.
N deemɑ sɑɑ ye, purɑn sɑɑwɑ. Wɔ̃ɔn suru nɔɔbɑ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ mɛ. Mɑ u deemɑ sinɑ boko u sɔ̃ u dɔ̃ɔ wɔ̃su win diru mi u rɑ sinɛ purɑn sɑɑ.
Yehudi ù n tire ten kɑburɑ itɑ, ǹ kun mɛ nnɛ gɑrɑ u kpɑ, yerɑ sinɑ boko u rɑ tire yoron kɔ̃ɔ piibu gɑgu sue u kɑ mi bɑ gɑrɑ burɑ u kpɛ̃ɛ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ, sere te kpuro tɑ kɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ muku muku.
Ye sinɑ boko kɑ win bwɑ̃ɑbu bɑ ye kpuro nuɑ bɑ ǹ nɑnde, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben yɑ̃nu gɛ̃ɛkɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ ko nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Sinɑ boko u sere tire te dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, Ɛlinɑtɑni kɑ Delɑyɑ kɑ Gemɑriɑ bɑ nùn suuru kɑnɑ gem gem u ku kɑ tu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni. Adɑmɑ u ǹ bu swɑɑ dɑki.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko u Yerɑmɛɛli wi u sɑ̃ɑ sunɔn bii, kɑ Serɑyɑ Asiriɛlin bii, kɑ Selemiɑ Abudɛlin bii woodɑ wɛ̃ u nɛɛ, bu tire yoro Bɑruku kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Yeremi mwɑɑmɑ, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔ u bu beruɑ, bɑ ǹ bu wɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ sinɑ boko u tire te dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, te Yeremi u Bɑruku sɔ̃ɔwɑ u yore mi, yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ mɑɑ tire kpɑɑru suo kpɑ ɑ gɑri yi yore yi yi rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ tire te sɔɔ, te sinɑ boko Yoyɑkimu u dɔ̃ɔ mɛni mi.
Kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ nùn sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Wee u tire te dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, mɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ wunɛ Yeremi ɑ yoruɑ mɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u koo nɑ kpɑ u tem mɛ kɑm koosiɑ, kpɑ u mɛn tɔmbu kɑ mɛn yɑɑ sɑbenu gurɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ wi sinɑ boko Yoyɑkimu sɔ̃ɔmɔ, mɑ win goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ Dɑfidin sinɑ gɔnɑ sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ koo mɑɑ win tiin goru deri tɔɔwɔ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ kɑ wɔ̃kuru tɑ n sɔ̃ɔ kɑ purɑ soorɑmɔ.
Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ ben durum sɔ̃ wi kɑ win bibun bweseru, kɑ win bwɑ̃ɑbu. Kon de kɔ̃sɑ yu Yerusɑlɛmugibu kɑ Yudɑbɑ deemɑ, ye nɑ rɑɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ, yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ǹ wure bu mɑn swɑɑ dɑki.
Mɑ Yeremi u tireru gɑru suɑ u Bɑruku, Nɛriyɑn bii, wi u sɑ̃ɑ tire yoro wɛ̃. Yerɑ u mɑɑ nùn tire te Yoyɑkimu u dɔ̃ɔ mɛni min gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro. Mɑ u yi yoruɑ u mɑɑ gɑri gɛɛ yoruɑ yi yi kɑ yi weenɛ.
Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u Sedesiɑsi Yosiɑsin bii kuɑ sinɑ boko Yudɑɔ, Yekoniɑ Yoyɑkimun biin ɑyerɔ.
Sedesiɑsi wi, kɑ win bwɑ̃ɑbu, kɑ win tɔmbu bɑ ǹ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi swɑɑ dɑki yi Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Yeremi u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ mi.
N deemɑ sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ ginɑ Yeremi pirisɔm doke. U rɑ dewɑ mi u kĩ, win tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ. Yerɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u Yukɑli Selemiɑn bii kɑ Sofoni Mɑɑseyɑn bii wi u sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowo gɔrɑ win mi, bu kɑ nùn sɔ̃ u bu Gusunɔ ben Yinni kɑnɑ u kɑ bu nɔnu geu mɛɛri.
<range>
Sɑɑ yerɑ Bɑbilonigibu bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu tɑrusi. Ye bɑ nuɑ mɑ Egibiti sunɔn tɑbu kowobu bɑ Yerusɑlɛmugii be somiru sisi, yerɑ bɑ yɑrinɑ bɑ doonɑ min di.
Sɑɑ yerɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko wi u nun gɔrimɑ nɛn mi sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee, Egibiti sunɔn tɑbu kowo be bɑ rɑɑ wee bu kɑ nùn somi bɑ gɔsirɔ ben temɔ.
<range>
Tɛ̃, Bɑbilonigii be, bɑ koo mɑɑ wurɑmɑ bu Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri bu ye mwɑ, bu dɔ̃ɔ sɔku.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, bu ku tii nɔni wɔ̃ke bu nɛɛ, Bɑbilonigii be, bɑ tondɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ bɑ ǹ gɑm de.
Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowo be kɑmiɑ, kpɑ n tie be bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ, kɑ mɛ, bɑ koo se sɑɑ ben kuu bekuruginun di bu wuu ge dɔ̃ɔ mɛni.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonigibun tɑbu kowo be, bɑ yɑrinɑ bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu deri Egibiti sunɔn tɑbu kowo ben sɔ̃,
yerɑ Yeremi u kĩ u yɑri Yerusɑlɛmun di u dɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn temɔ u kɑ win bɑɑ suɑ tubi ye bɑ bɔnu mɔ̀ sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u yɑriɔ u kɔnnɔ turɑ ge bɑ mɔ̀ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ, mɑ u deemɑ ben kɔ̃sobun tɔnwero wi bɑ mɔ̀ Yirɛyɑ Selemiɑn bii, Hɑnɑniɑn debubu u yɔ̃ mi. Mɑ u nùn yɔ̃rɑsiɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ tii Bɑbilonigibu wɛ̃.
Yerɑ u nɛɛ, ɑɑwo, nɑ ǹ nɛn tii Bɑbilonigibu wɛ̃. Adɑmɑ durɔ wi, u ǹ win gɑri yi wure. Mɑ u nùn mwɑ u kɑ dɑ wirugibun mi.
Yerɑ wirugii ben mɔru yɑ seewɑ bɑ nùn mwɑ bɑ so bɑ pirisɔm doke Yonɑtɑm dirɔ wi u sɑ̃ɑ tire yoro. N deemɑ bɑ win dii te gɔsiɑwɑ pirisɔm diru.
Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ nùn pirisɔm doke dirɔ wɔru sɔɔ sere n kɑ tɛ.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru, sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u gɔrɑ u nɛɛ, bu Yeremi sokumɑ. Ye u nɑ, mɑ u nùn gɑri bikiɑ ɑsiri sɔɔ u nɛɛ, Yeremi, ɑ gɑri gɛɛ mɔ yi yi wee Yinni Gusunɔn min di ɑ mɑn sɔ̃? Mɑ u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, oo. Yinni Gusunɔ u koo de Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u nun nɔmɑ turi.
Mɑ Yeremi u mɑɑ nùn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, torɑ terɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛ torɑ wunɛ kɑ wunɛn bwɑ̃ɑbu kɑ sere wunɛn tɔmbu kpuro i kɑ mɑn mwɑ i pirisɔm kpɛ̃ɛ.
Mɑnɑ bɛɛn sɔmɔ be, bɑ wɑ̃ɑ be bɑ bɛɛ gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kun nun wɔrim wee u sere tem mɛ mwɑ.
Tɛ̃, nɛn yinni sinɑ boko, ɑ mɑn swɑɑ dɑkio kpɑ ɑ nɛn kɑnɑru nɔ, kpɑ ɑ mɑn kuɑ ye nɑ kĩ. A ku mɑɑ de n wurɑ Yonɑtɑm tire yoron diru mi, kpɑ n ku rɑ kɑ gbi.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u woodɑ wɛ̃ u nɛɛ, bu nùn yiiyo pirisɔm dirun yɑɑrɑɔ kpɑ bɑ n dɑ nùn pɛ̃ɛ kuse teeru wɛ̃ bɑɑdommɑ ye wuun pɛ̃ɛ kowobɑ rɑ ko sere wuu nukurun pɛ̃ɛ yu kɑ kpe. Nge mɛyɑ u kɑ sinɑ pirisɔm dirun yɑɑrɑ mi.
Sefɑtiɑ Mɑtɑnin bii, kɑ Gedɑliɑ Pɑsurin bii, kɑ Yukɑli Selemiɑn bii, kɑ Pɑsuri Mɑɑkiyɑn bii bɑ nuɑ ye Yeremi u tɔn be sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U nɛɛ,
ɑmɛniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wi u sinɑ Yerusɑlɛmu ye sɔɔ, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nùn gowɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ u gbi gɔ̃ɔrun sɑɑbu, ǹ kun mɛ kɑ bɑrɑru gɑru. Adɑmɑ wi u tii Bɑbilonigibu nɔmu sɔndiɑ, wiyɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ. Win wɑ̃ɑ terɑ tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ win dukiɑ ye u wɑ u kɑ yɑrɑ wɑhɑlɑ yen min di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, u koo de Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowobu bu Yerusɑlɛmu mwɑ.
Yerɑ wirugibu bɑ nɑ bɑ sinɑ boko sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, durɔ wini u tɑbu kowobu kɑ tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuu ge sɔɔ bɛrum tiɑmɔwɑ kɑ win gɑri. U ǹ bɛsɛn geɑ kɑsu sere bɛsɛn kɔ̃sɑ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, n weenɛ bu nùn go.
Mɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u wisɑ u nɛɛ, wi wee u wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn nɔmuɔ. Nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n bɛɛ gɑ̃ɑnu yinɑri.
Yerɑ bɑ nùn suɑ bɑ kpɛ̃ɛ sinɑ bii wi bɑ mɔ̀, Mɑɑkiyɑn dɔkɔ kpiriru gɑru sɔɔ. Dɔkɔ kpiri te, tɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ pirisɔm dirun yɑɑrɑɔ. Te sɔɔrɑ bɑ nùn kpɛ̃ɛ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ. Adɑmɑ tɑ ǹ nim mɔ. Pɔtɔkɔwɑ tɑ mɔ, mɑ u numɑ pɔtɔkɔ ye sɔɔ.
Etiopigii goo wi bɑ mɔ̀, Ebɛdi Mɛlɛki u wɑ̃ɑ u sɔmburu mɔ̀ sinɑ kpɑɑru mi. Yerɑ u nuɑ mɑ bɑ Yeremi kpɛ̃ɛ dɔkɔ kpiriru sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, sinɑ boko u wɑ̃ɑ u sɔ̃ gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔwɔ ge bɑ sokumɔ Bɛnyɑmɛɛ, u sirimɔ.
Yerɑ Ebɛdi Mɛlɛki wi, u yɑrɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrun di u dɑ u sinɑ boko deemɑ u nɛɛ,
nɛn yinni sinɑ boko, ye tɔn be, bɑ kuɑ mi, yɑ ǹ wɑ̃, ye bɑ kɑ Yeremi kpɛ̃ɛ dɔkɔ kpiriru sɔɔ. U koo gbi mi, gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃, domi dĩɑnu kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuuɔ.
Mɑ sinɑ boko u Ebɛdi Mɛlɛki woodɑ wɛ̃ u nɛɛ, ɑ tɔmbu tɛnɑ suo kpɑ i dɑ i Yeremi yɑrɑ sɑɑ dɔkɔ kpiri ten min di u sere gbi.
Yerɑ Ebɛdi Mɛlɛki wi, u tɔn be suɑ. Mɑ u dɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrun ɑrumɑni beru yerɔ u yɑ̃ɑ tɔkɔnu yɑrɑmɑ. U nu Yeremi kpɛ̃ɛyɑ dɔkɔ ye sɔɔ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ.
Mɑ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ yɑ̃ɑ tɔkɔ ni dokeo wunɛn bũu bɑkusɔ ɑ sere wɛ̃ɛ yi doke. Mɑ Yeremi u kuɑ mɛ.
Mɑ bɑ nùn yɑrɑmɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ yi, sɑɑ dɔkɔ kpiri ten min di, bɑ derɑ u wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm dirun yɑɑrɑɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Sedesiɑsi u mɑɑ gɔrɑ u nɛɛ, bu Yeremi sokumɑ kpɑ u nɑ u nùn deemɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔ itɑserɔ. Ye u tunumɑ, yerɑ sinɑ boko u nɛɛ, nɑ gɑri gɛɛ mɔ kon nun bikiɑ. A ku mɑn gɑ̃ɑnu beruɑ.
Mɑ u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ̀ n nun ye sɔ̃ɔwɑ, ɑ ǹ mɑn goomɔ? Nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ̀ n nun bwisi kɛ̃mɔ ɑ ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
Yerɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi u bɔ̃ruɑ ɑsiri sɔɔ u nɛɛ, sere kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru wi u sun wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃, nɑ ǹ nun goomɔ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ nun tɔn be nɔmu bɛriɑmmɛ be bɑ kɑsu bu nun go mi.
Yerɑ u sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, ɑ̀ n wunɛn tii Bɑbilonin sunɔn tɑbu sinɑmbu wɛ̃ kɑɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ wunɛ kɑ wunɛn yɛnugibu. Mɛyɑ u ǹ mɑɑ wuu ge dɔ̃ɔ mɛnimɔ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ kun bu tii wɛ̃, u koo bu wuu ge nɔmu bɛriɑ kpɑ bu gu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni. A ǹ mɑɑ kisirɑmɔ ben nɔmɑn di.
Yerɑ Sedesiɑsi u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ wurure Yuu be bɑ tii Bɑbilonigibu wɛ̃n sɔ̃. Nɑ bɛrum mɔ̀ bu ku rɑɑ mɑn bu nɔmu sɔndiɑ kpɑ bu mɑn nɔni sɔ̃.
Mɑ Yeremi u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, bɑ ǹ nun bu nɔmu sɔndiɑmmɛ. A nɔɔwɔ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u gerumɔ sɑɑ nɛn min di, kpɑ ɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ, ɑ n wɑ̃ɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ n yinɑ ɑ bu tii wɛ̃, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔsi kɑ̃siru sɔɔ.
Nɑ wɑ bɑ wunɛ Yudɑn sinɑ bokon kurɔ be bɑ tie mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbilonin sunɔn tɑbu sinɑmbun mi. Mɑ kurɔ be, bɑ mɔ̀, wee, be bɑ rɑɑ nun gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, kɑɑ n bɔri yɛndu mɔ mi, bɑ nun nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ mɑ bɑ nun kɑmiɑ. Ye bɑ deemɑ ɑ nummɔ pɔtɔkɔ sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ yɑrinɑ bɑ nun deri.
Wee bɑ koo wunɛn kurɔbu kɑ wunɛn bibu kpuro mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ Bɑbilonigibun mi. Wunɛn tii ɑ ǹ mɑɑ kisirɑmɔ ben nɔmɑn di. Ben sinɑ bokowɑ koo nun mwɑ kpɑ u wuu ge dɔ̃ɔ mɛni.
Yerɑ Sedesiɑsi u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ku rɑ de goo u gɑri yi nɔ kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ nun go.
Wirugibu bɑ̀ n nuɑ mɑ nɑ kɑ nun gɑri kuɑ, mɑ bɑ nɑ bɑ nun bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ ku bu gɑ̃ɑnu beruɑ ye ɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ kɑ ye nɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ nun go,
sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, ɑ bu wisio ɑ nɛɛ, ɑ mɑn suuru kɑnɑm nɑwɑ n ku kɑ nun dɑ Yonɑtɑm yɛnuɔ kpɑ ɑ ku rɑ kɑ gbi.
Yerɑ wirugii be kpuro bɑ nɑ Yeremin mi, bɑ nùn gɑri yi bikiɑ. Mɑ u bu wisɑ nge mɛ sinɑ boko u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɑm mɑm, mɑ bɑ nɔɔ mɑri bɑ yɑrɑ. Domi gɑri yi u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ mi, yi ǹ ginɑ yɑrɑ tɔɔwɔ.
Pirisɔm dirun yɑɑrɑ miyɑ u wɑ̃ɑ sere bɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu mwɑ. Wee ye n koorɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonigibɑ Yerusɑlɛmu mwɑ.
Sedesiɑsi Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ nnɛse, yen suru wɔkuruse sɔɔrɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Yerusɑlɛmu wɔrimɑ kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kpuro. Mɑ bɑ sɑnsɑni girɑ yen bɔkuɔ, mɑ bɑ kuku yenu kuɑ bɑ kɑ sikerenɑ.
Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑsen suru nnɛse, yen sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ bɑ gbɑ̃rɑru yɑbɑ.
Sɑɑ yerɑ Bɑbilonin tɑbu sinɑmbu bɑ duɑ bɑ wuu ge tɑrusi gen kɔnnɔ wuu suunuguu giɑn di. Tɑbu sinɑm ben yĩsɑ wee, Nɛɛgɑli Sɑrɛsɛɛ, kɑ Sɑngɑɑ Nɛbu, kɑ Sɑɑsekimu, sinɑ bokon sɔm kowobun wirugii, kɑ mɑɑ Nɛɛgɑli Sɑrɛsɛɛ wi u sɑ̃ɑ dobo dobogibun wirugii, kɑ sere sinɑ bokon tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ tie.
Ye Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ bu wɑ, yerɑ bɑ duki yɑrinɑ wɔ̃kuru bɑ yɑrɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑ̃rɑnu yirun bɑɑ sɔɔ sinɑ bokon dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun bɔkuɔ wɔwɑn berɑ giɑ.
Adɑmɑ Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowo be, bɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi nɑɑ swĩi mɑ bɑ nùn nɑɑmwɛ Yerikon wɔwɑɔ. Yerɑ bɑ nùn mwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon mi, Ribilɑɔ, Hɑmɑtin temɔ. Miyɑ u nùn siri.
Mɑ u derɑ bɑ Sedesiɑsin bibu kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu sɑkirɑ Ribilɑ mi, win nɔni biru.
Yen biru u Sedesiɑsin tiin nɔni wɔwɑ mɑ u nùn bɔkuɑ kɑ sii gɑndun yɔni bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Bɑbilonigii be, bɑ Yerusɑlɛmun sinɑ kpɑɑru kɑ yen yɛnusu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, mɑ bɑ yen gbɑ̃rɑru sururɑ.
Yen biru Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ, kɔ̃sobun wirugii, u tɔn be bɑ tie Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kɑ be bɑ nùn tii wɛ̃ kɑ sere mɑɑ be bɑ tie tem mɛ sɔɔ gurɑ u kɑ doonɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Adɑmɑ u ben bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛ be bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu mɔ deri tem mɛ sɔɔ mɑ u bu gbeɑ wɛ̃.
Mɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ, kɔ̃sobun wirugii woodɑ wɛ̃ Yeremin sɔ̃ u nɛɛ,
ɑ nùn mɛɛrio kpɑ ɑ nùn kɔ̃su. A ku nùn kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ kuɑ. Ye u nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro, ɑ koowo.
Mɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ, kɔ̃sobun wirugii, kɑ Nɛbusɑsibɑni, sinɑ bokon sɔm kowobun wirugii, kɑ Nɛɛgɑli Sɑrɛsɛɛ, dobo dobogibun wirugii, kɑ sere sinɑ bokon tɑbu sinɑmbu kpuro,
bɑ gɔrɑ bu Yeremi yɑrɑmɑ pirisɔm dirun di, kpɑ bu kɑ nùn dɑ bu Gedɑliɑ, Akikɑmun bii, Sɑfɑnin debubu nɔmu sɔndiɑ. Wiyɑ u kɑ nùn dɑ win yɛnuɔ. Nge mɛyɑ Yeremi u kɑ yɑrɑ u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ Yudɑ be bɑ tie.
Sɑɑ yè sɔɔ Yeremi u wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
ɑ doo ɑ Ebɛdi Mɛlɛki, Etiopigii wi sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ rɑɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ yɑ koo wuu ge deemɑ, n ǹ mɔ geɑ. Tɛ̃, kon de kɔ̃sɑ ye, yu tunumɑ. Ye kpurowɑ yɑ koo koorɑ win nɔni biru.
Adɑmɑ yen tɔ̃ɔ te, kon nùn yɑkiɑ. Bèn bɛrum u mɔ̀ mi, bɑ ǹ nùn nɔmɑ turi.
Nɑ ǹ derimɔ bu nùn go. Kon win wɑ̃ɑru yɑkiɑ, domi u mɑn nɑɑnɛ kuɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yeremi gɑri kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ u derɑ u wurɑmɑ sɑɑ Rɑmɑn di. N deemɑ bɑ rɑɑ nùn bɔkuɑwɑ wi kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu gɑbu bɑ kɑ dɔɔ Bɑbiloniɔ. Min diyɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ u nùn yɑrɑ.
Mɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ wi, u nùn sokɑ u kɑ dɑ bee tiɑ u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ wunɛn Yinni u rɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ yɑ koo wuu geni deemɑ.
Wee, tɛ̃, ye u geruɑ mi, yɑ koorɑ yèn sɔ̃ i nùn torɑri, i ǹ win gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Tɛ̃, kon nun yɑkiɑ n nun yɔni yi potɑ. Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ n kĩ ɑ kɑ mɑn dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ, ɑ nɑ su dɑ. Kon nun nɔɔri. À kun mɑɑ kĩ, ɑ sinɔ. A doo ɑ sinɑ mi n nun wɛ̃re.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ u wɑ mɑ Yeremi kun fuuku wisɑ, yerɑ u nɛɛ, ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑ doo ɑ Gedɑliɑ, Akikɑmun bii, Sɑfɑnin debubu deemɑ. Wiyɑ sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u kuɑ sunɔ Yudɑbɑn wusu sɔɔ. Kɑɑ n kɑ nùn wɑ̃ɑ kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie sɑnnu, ǹ kun mɛ, ɑ doo mi ɑ kĩ. Mɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ wi, u nùn dĩɑnu kusenu kuɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ kɛ̃nu gɑnu. Mɑ u derɑ u doonɑ.
Yerɑ Yeremi u dɑ Gedɑliɑn mi, Misipɑɔ, u sinɑ mi kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie tem mɛ sɔɔ sɑnnu.
Sɑɑ yè sɔɔ tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ rɑɑ woo tɑbu gberɔ kɑ ben tɑbu kowobu bɑ nuɑ mɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Gedɑliɑ, Akikɑmun bii kuɑ Yudɑbɑn sunɔ, mɑ u nùn tɔn be bɑ tie Yudɑɔ kpuro nɔmu bɛriɑ, kɑ sere bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛ be bɑ ǹ yoru mwɛ bɑ kɑ de Bɑbiloniɔ,
yerɑ bɑ dɑ Gedɑliɑn mi, Misipɑɔ. Be bɑ dɑ mi, berɑ, Isimɛɛli, Nɛtɑniɑn bii, kɑ Yokɑnɑni kɑ Yonɑtɑm, Kɑreɑn bibu, kɑ Serɑyɑ, Tɑnumɛtin bii, kɑ Efɑi Nɛtofɑgiin bibu, kɑ Yesɑniɑ, Mɑɑkɑgiin bii, be kpuro kɑ ben tɔmbu.
Yerɑ Gedɑliɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri u nɛɛ, i ku bɛrum ko i kɑ Bɑbilonigibu sɑ̃. I gesi sinɔ bɛsɛn tem mɛ sɔɔ kpɑ i Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko sɑ̃. Sɑɑ yerɑ i ko i n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Wee, nɑ wɑ̃ɑ Misipɑ mini nɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn nɔni Bɑbilonigii ben mi. Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, i doo i gberun dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum sɔri mɛ bɑ rɑ di kɑ mɛ bɑ rɑ kɑ mɑɑ gum kɑ tɑm ko. Kpɑ i mu bere bɛɛn wekenɔ, kpɑ i sinɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ wuu si i mwɑ sɔɔ.
Mɑ Yudɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Mɔɑbun temɔ kɑ Amɔnibɑn temɔ kɑ Edɔmubɑn temɔ, bɑ nuɑ mɑ Bɑbilonin sunɔ u gɑbu deri Yudɑbɑn temɔ, mɑ u Gedɑliɑ kuɑ ben kpɑro.
Yerɑ be kpuro bɑ wurɑmɑ ben temɔ. Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ Gedɑliɑ deemɑ Misipɑɔ. Wɔ̃ɔ ge sɔɔ, bɑ resɛm wɑ too, kɑ mɑɑ dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum gɑm.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii, kɑ sere tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ wurɑmɑ tɑbu gberun di mi, bɑ nɑ Gedɑliɑn mi Misipɑɔ.
Mɑ bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ yɛ̃ mɑ Bɑɑlisi, Amɔnibɑn sinɑ boko u Isimɛɛli, Nɛtɑniɑn bii gɔrɑ u nun go? Adɑmɑ Gedɑliɑ u ǹ ye wure.
Mɑ Yokɑnɑni u dɑ Misipɑɔ u Gedɑliɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɑsiri sɔɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ de n dɑ n Isimɛɛli, Nɛtɑniɑn bii wi go, kpɑ goo u kun yɛ̃. Nge mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ de u nun go, kpɑ Yudɑ be bɑ mɛnnɛ mini bu mɑɑ yɑrinɑ kpɑ ben gɑbu bu gbi.
Mɑ Gedɑliɑ u Yokɑnɑni wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ku Isimɛɛli go, domi ye ɑ geruɑ win sɔ̃ mi, weesɑ.
Adɑmɑ wɔ̃ɔ gen suru nɔɔbɑ yiruse sɔɔ, yerɑ Isimɛɛli u nɑ Misipɑɔ Gedɑliɑn mi. Isimɛɛli wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ sinɑ bii kɑ mɑɑ sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔ. Tɔmbu wɔkurɑ bɑ nùn swĩimɑ bɑ kɑ nɑ mi. Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ sɔ̃ bɑ dimɔ kɑ Gedɑliɑ,
yerɑ Isimɛɛli kɑ tɔn be bɑ nùn yɔ̃sirimɑ mi, bɑ seewɑ sɑnnu sɑnnu bɑ Gedɑliɑ tɑkobi sɔkurɑ bɑ go, wi, wi Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u gɔsɑ u kɑ Yudɑn tem kpɑrɑ mi.
Isimɛɛli wi, u mɑɑ Yudɑbɑ kpuro kɑ Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowo be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi go.
N deemɑ goo kun yɛ̃ mɑ Gedɑliɑ u gu. Ye n kuɑ sɔ̃ɔ yiru, win gɔɔn biru,
yerɑ tɔmbu wɛnɛ gɑbu bɑ seemɑ sɑɑ Sikɛmu kɑ Silo kɑ Sɑmɑrin di. Tɔn be, bɑ ben tobɑ kɔnɑ, ben yɑ̃nu nu gɛ̃ɛkire mɑ bɑ tii mururɑ bɑɑmɑ nuku sɑnkirɑrun sɔ̃. Mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ ɑlikɑmɑ sɔɔwɑ kɑ turɑre bu kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ win sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Yerɑ Isimɛɛli u seewɑ Misipɑn di u dɑ u kɑ bu yinnɑ swɑɑɔ, u sumɔ. Ye u turɑ ben mi, mɑ u nɛɛ, i nɑ su dɑ Gedɑliɑn mi.
Adɑmɑ ye bɑ duɑ wuuɔ, yerɑ wi kɑ win tɔmbu bɑ tɔn be mwɑ bɑ sɑkirɑ. Mɑ bɑ ben gonu kpɛ̃ɛ dɔkɔ kpiriru gɑru sɔɔ.
N deemɑ be sɔɔ, u ǹ tɔmbu wɔkuru go yèn sɔ̃ bɑ rɑɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, u ku bu go, be, bɑ ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ gbɛɛ, kɑ gum kɑ tim beruɑ yɑkɑsɔ.
Dɔkɔ kpiri tè sɔɔ u tɔn ben gonu doke mi, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ te Asɑ u derɑ bɑ gbɑ sɑnɑm mɛ wi kɑ Bɑsɑ Isirelibɑn sinɑ boko bɑ tɑbu mɔ̀. Te sɔɔrɑ u tɔn goo ni yibiɑ.
Yen biru, u be bɑ tiɑrɑ mi yoru mwɛɛrɑ u kɑ doonɑ kɑ sinɑ bokon bii wɔndiɑbɑ kɑ sere tɔn be Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ, kɔ̃sobun wirugii u Gedɑliɑ deriɑ. Be kpurowɑ u yoru mwɛɛrɑ u kɑ dɑ Amɔnibɑn mi.
Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii, kɑ Yudɑbɑn tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi, bɑ nuɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye Isimɛɛli u kuɑ.
Yerɑ bɑ tɑbu durɔbu suɑ bɑ dɑ bu kɑ Isimɛɛli wɔri. Mɑ bɑ nùn deemɑ yɛru bɔkɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ Gɑbɑoniɔ.
Tɔn be Isimɛɛli u mwɛɛrɑ mi, ye bɑ Yokɑnɑni wɑ kɑ win tɑbu sinɑmbu, yerɑ ben nuki dorɑ.
Mɑ be kpuro bɑ Isimɛɛli deri, bɑ dɑ bɑ Yokɑnɑni deemɑ.
Adɑmɑ Isimɛɛli wi, u dukɑ yɑkurɑ Yokɑnɑnin min di kɑ tɔmbu nɔɔbɑ itɑ gɑbu, mɑ u dɑ u wɑ̃ɑ Amɔnibɑn mi.
Yokɑnɑni kɑ win tɑbu sinɑm be, bɑ tɔn be bɑ tie mwɛɛrɑ Isimɛɛlin nɔmɑn di, be u rɑɑ mwɛɛrɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u Gedɑliɑ go. Berɑ tɑbu kowobu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu kɑ bibu kɑ sinɑ bokon sɔm kowobu. Be kpurowɑ u mwɛɛrimɑ sɑɑ Gɑbɑonin di.
Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔbun sɔbiɑ yeru gɑrun mi, te bɑ rɑ soku Kimuhɑmu Bɛtelehɛmun bɔkuɔ. Yen biru, bɑ kpikiru dɑ Egibitiɔ.
Domi bɑ Bɑbilonigibun bɛrum mɔ yèn sɔ̃ Isimɛɛli u Gedɑliɑ go wi Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u kuɑ Yudɑbɑn kpɑro.
Yerɑ tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ rɑɑ kpikiru suɑ, kɑ Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii, kɑ Yesɑniɑ, Hoseen bii, kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie kpuro, sɑɑ wirugibun di sere kɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbɔ, bɑ nɑ bɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ,
ɑ de ɑ nɔ ye sɑ nun bikiɑmɔ. A sun Gusunɔ kɑnɔ, bɛsɛ be sɑ tien sɔ̃, domi sɑ rɑɑ dɑbi, ɑdɑmɑ tɛ̃ sɑ kɑɑrɑ, nge mɛ ɑ wɑɑmɔ.
A Gusunɔ wunɛn Yinni kɑnɔ u sun sɔ̃ɔsi mi sɑ ko dɑ kɑ ye sɑ ko ko.
Mɑ Yeremi u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ nuɑ. Kon Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni kɑnɑ nge mɛ i mɑn bikiɑ kpɑ n wurɑmɑ n bɛɛ sɔ̃ ye u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ gɑ̃ɑnu beruɑmmɛ.
Mɑ bɑ Yeremi wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ wurɑ su ko mɑm mɑm ye Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nun sɔ̃ su ko. Wiyɑ u koo ko bɛsɛn seedɑ dio gemgii kɑ nɑɑnɛgii sɑ̀ kun bɛsɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibie.
Wee bɛsɛrɑ sɑ nun gɔrɑ ɑ sun Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni bikiɑ. Yen sɔ̃, sɑ ko ko ye u sun sɔ̃ɔwɑ su ko, bɑɑ yɑ̀ kun sun wɛ̃re. Kɑ mɛ, sɑ ko n nuku dobu mɔ yèn sɔ̃ sɑ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ.
Sɔ̃ɔ wɔkurun biru, Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi wisɑ.
Mɑ Yeremi u Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii sokusiɑ kɑ tɑbu sinɑm be bɑ nùn swĩi kɑ sere ben tɔmbu kpuro be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, wirugibu kɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu.
Mɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee bɛɛyɑ i mɑn gɔrɑ n Gusunɔ bɛɛ Isirelibɑn Yinni bikiɑ. Ye u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ wee. U nɛɛ,
ì n sinɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, u koo de bɛɛn tɔmbu bu tɑ̃si. U ǹ mɑɑ bu goomɔ. U koo bɛɛ swĩiwɑ i n nuuru mɔ. U ǹ bɛɛ wukɑmɔ, u ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ kɔ̃sɑ yu bɛɛ deemɑ ye u rɑɑ bwisikɑ u bɛɛ kuɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i ku mɑɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon bɛrum ko. Domi wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u ko n kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ kpɑ u bɛɛ fɑɑbɑ ko.
Wi, Gusunɔ u koo de u bɛɛn wɔnwɔndu wɑ. Kpɑ u de i wurɑmɑ bɛɛn temɔ.
Adɑmɑ ì n nɛɛ, i ǹ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ, i ǹ sinɑmɔ tem mɛni sɔɔ,
i ko i dɑwɑ Egibitiɔ mi i ǹ tɑbu wɑsi, bɑɑ bin kɔbɑn swĩi i ǹ nɔɔmɔ, i ǹ mɑɑ dĩɑnu biɑmɔ, yen sɔ̃, miyɑ i ko sinɑ,
tɛ̃ i swɑɑ dɑkio ye Gusunɔ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, u gerumɔ. U nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yudɑ be i tie, ì n gɔ̃ru doke i kɑ dɑ Egibitiɔ kɑ gem, kpɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ mi,
sɑnɑm mɛyɑ tɑɑ bìn bɛrum i mɔ̀, bu koo bɛɛ deemɑ Egibiti mi. Gɔ̃ɔ tèn weeweenu i mɑɑ mɔ̀ mi, tɑ koo bɛɛ deemɑ, kpɑ i gbisuku mi giɑ.
Be bɑ gesi niɑ kuɑ bu kɑ dɑ Egibitiɔ bu kuke, bɑ koo gbiwɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, kɑ gɔ̃ɔru sɔɔ, kɑ bɑrɑnu sɔɔ. Ben goo kun kisirɑmɔ kɔ̃sɑ yen di ye u koo bu suremɑ mi.
Yeremi u nɛɛ, wee ye Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, nge mɛ u Yerusɑlɛmugibu win mɔru seesi, nge mɛyɑ u koo mɑɑ bɛɛ ye seesi, ì n dɑ Egibitiɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ ko n dɑ kɑ bɛɛn yĩsiru tɔmbu bɔ̃rusi, ǹ kun mɛ, bu kɑ goo gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu sie, kpɑ bu bɛɛ gɛm i seku bɑkɑru wɑ kpɑ i kun mɑɑ sinɛ tem mɛ sɔɔ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, i ku Egibiti dɑ, bɛɛ be i tie Yudɑbɑn bweseru sɔɔ. I de i n yɛ̃ mɑ u bɛɛ ye yinɑriwɑ gisɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ i mɑn gɔrɑ n bɛɛ Yinni Gusunɔ kɑnɑ, ye nɑ wurɑmɑ, i geruɑ i nɛɛ, n bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɔ mɑm mɑm ye Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpɑ i ye ko. Adɑmɑ weesɑ i tii kuɑ.
Domi gisɔ, nɑ kɑ win wisibu nɑ ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ bin gɑbu swɑɑ dɑki bi u nɛɛ, n bɛɛ sɔ̃.
Tɛ̃, mi i dɔɔ i sinɑ mi, i n yɛ̃ mɑ tɑbu sɔɔrɑ i ko i gbi, ǹ kun mɛ gɔ̃ɔru sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ bɑrɑnu sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Yeremi u gɑri yi tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɑ, yi Gusunɔ ben Yinni u nɛɛ, u bu sɔ̃,
yerɑ Asɑriɑ, Hoseen bii, kɑ Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii, be kpuro bɑ Yeremi wisɑ kɑ tɔn piiburu bɑ nɛɛ, ye ɑ geruɑ mi, weesɑ. Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni kun nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɑ sun sɔ̃, su ku Egibiti dɑ.
Adɑmɑ Bɑruku, Nɛriyɑn biiwɑ u nun bɔriemɔ ɑ kɑ sun sɔ̃ su ku dɑ mi, domi u kĩwɑ Bɑbilonigibu bu sun mwɛɛri bu go, ǹ kun mɛ bu sun yoru mwɑ bu kɑ dɑ ben temɔ.
Nge mɛyɑ Yokɑnɑni, Kɑreɑn bii, kɑ tɑbu sinɑmbu kpuro kɑ ben tɔmbu kpuro bɑ yinɑ bu Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri nɔ ye u nɛɛ, bu de bu sinɑ ben tem mi.
Yerɑ Yokɑnɑni kɑ tɑbu sinɑm be, bɑ kɑ Yudɑ be bɑ tie dɑ Egibitiɔ, be, be bɑ rɑɑ kpikiru dɑ tem tukumɔ bɑ wurɑmɑ,
tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu kɑ bibu kɑ sinɑ bokon bii wɔndiɑbɑ, be kpuro gesi be Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ, kɔ̃sobun wirugii, u Gedɑliɑ, Akikɑmun bii, Sɑfɑnin debubu deriɑ. Mɑ bɑ kɑ Yeremin tii dɑ kɑ mɑɑ Bɑruku Nɛriyɑn bii.
Bɑ dɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Egibitin wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Tɑpɑnɛsiɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ kɑ Gusunɔn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ Tɑpɑnɛsiɔ u nɛɛ,
ɑ kpee bɑkɑnu suo kpɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ nu sike Yudɑbɑ kpuron wuswɑɑɔ mi bɑ rɑ birikibɑ wɔ̃ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Egibitin sinɑ kpɑɑrun kɔnnɔwɔ Tɑpɑnɛsiɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ Yudɑbɑ sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee, kon de bu Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, nɛn sɔm kowo kɑsum dɑ kpɑ n win bɑndu swĩi kpee ni ɑ sikuɑn wɔllɔ kpɑ u win sinɑ gɔnɑ tɛriɑ mi,
kpɑ u Egibitigibu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Be u koo go, u go, be u koo mwɛɛri u ko yobu kpɑ u mwɛɛri, be u koo mɑɑ sɑkiri kɑ tɑkobi, kpɑ u sɑkiri.
Kpɑ u ben bũu diɑ dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, kpɑ u bũu nin tii gurɑ kpɑ u mɑɑ ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ yɑ kun nùn sɛ̃sie kpɑ u yɑri min di kɑ bɔri yɛndu, nge mɛ nɑɑ kpɑro u rɑ win kpɑrɑ yɑberu sebe u n doonɔ.
U koo Bɛti Semɛsin bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kɔsuku, kpɑ u bũu diɑ ye yɑ tie dɔ̃ɔ mɛni Egibiti mi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yudɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Migidoliɔ kɑ Tɑpɑnɛsiɔ kɑ Mɛnfisiɔ kɑ Pɑturɔsiɔ Egibitin temɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ sɑɑ Yeremin min di u nɛɛ,
wee, ye nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, i kɔ̃sɑ ye kpuro wɑ ye nɑ Yerusɑlɛmu kuɑ kɑ Yudɑn wuu si su tie. Wee, su kuɑ bɑnsu. Goo mɑɑ sɑri mi.
Domi bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ bɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ ye bɑ kɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu yɑ̃kunu kuɑmmɛ ni bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ i ǹ dɑɑ yɛ̃.
Nɑ bɛɛ nɛn sɔmɔbu gɔriɑ sɑɑ yellun di bu kɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃, i ku sɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃su nini ko, ni nɛn tii nɑ tusɑ.
Adɑmɑ i ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. I ǹ bɛɛn kom kɔ̃sum deri. I ǹ mɑɑ bũu yɑ̃ku kobu deri.
Mɑ nɑ kɑ bɛɛ mɔru kuɑ gem gem. Nɑ Yudɑn wusu kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑ mɑ ye kpuro yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu, nge mɛ i wɑɑmɔ gisɔ.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i tii durum bɑkɑ yeni sɔbimɔ ye i kɑ derɑ bɑ kurɔbu kɑ durɔbu kɑ bibu kɑ bii wɛ̃ɛnu go sere goo kun mɑɑ tie.
I kĩwɑ i nɛn mɔru seeyɑ kɑ bɛɛn bũu yɑ̃ku kookoo si i mɔ̀ Egibitiɔ mi i wɑ̃ɑ? I kĩwɑ i tii kɑm ko, kpɑ i ko bɔ̃rigibu kɑ sekurugibu hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ?
I duɑriwɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ kɑ bɛɛn sinɑmbu kɑ ben kurɔbu kɑ bɛɛn tii kɑ bɛɛn kurɔbu i kuɑ Yudɑɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ?
Wee, sere kɑ tɛ̃ i ǹ tii kɑwe i gɔ̃ru gɔsie. I ǹ mɑn nɑsie, i ǹ mɑɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ swĩi ye nɑ bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ wɛ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ nɑ bɛɛ biru kisi mɑ nɑ bɛɛ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ n kɑ bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ kpuro kɑm koosiɑ.
Kon Yudɑ be bɑ kpikiru dɑ Egibitiɔ kɑm koosiɑ. Egibiti miyɑ bɑ koo gbi kpuro. Bɑ ǹ goo buremɔ. Bɑ koo gbiwɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, kɑ gɔ̃ɔru sɔɔ kpɑ bu bu gɛm bu sekuru wɑ, kpɑ bɑ n dɑ ben yĩsiru sie bu kɑ goo bɔ̃rusi, ǹ kun mɛ bu nùn gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu gerusi.
Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ nɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɛɛyɑsiɑ kɑ tɑbu, kɑ gɔ̃ɔru, kɑ mɑɑ bɑrɑnu.
Kon de ben fiiko bu kpikiru su. Be bɑɑsi, goo kun kisirɑmɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ wee Yudɑn temɔ bɑɑ mɛ bɑ ko n kĩ bu wurɑmɑ ɑmɛn biru.
Yerɑ be kpuro be bɑ yɛ̃ mɑ ben kurɔbu bɑ rɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeye kɑ tɔn kurɔ dɑbinu kpuro be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, kɑ tɔn dɑbi te tɑ tie Pɑturɔsiɔ, Egibitin tem mi, bɑ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ,
sɑ ǹ gɑri yi mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ yi ɑ geruɑ ɑ nɛɛ, yi weewɑ Yinni Gusunɔn min di.
Sɑ ko kowɑ nge mɛ sɑ geruɑ, su bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑte turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ, kpɑ su mɑɑ nùn tɑm tɑ̃rɑ nge mɛ sɑ rɑ rɑɑ ko, bɛsɛ kɑ bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ, kɑ bɛsɛn sinɑmbu kɑ bɛsɛn wirugibu Yudɑn wusu sɔɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ. Domi sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ sɑ rɑ wɑ su di su debu, sɑ n nuku dobu mɔ kpɑ sɑ kun wɑhɑlɑ gɑɑ wɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɑɑ dɔmɑ tèn di sɑ ǹ mɑɑ bũu wi turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑre, sɑ ǹ mɑɑ nùn tɑm tɑ̃rɑre, sɑɑ min diyɑ sɑ kpuro biɑ. Tɑbu sun di, mɑ gɔ̃ɔrɑ sun go.
Mɑ tɔn kurɔ be, bɑ geruɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ bũu wi yɑ̃kunu kuɑmmɛ, kɑ bɛsɛn durɔbun yɛ̃rɑ. Bɑ yɛ̃ mɑ sɑ rɑ bũu wi kirɑru kue su kɑ nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ su nùn tɑm tɑ̃rɑ temɔ.
Mɑ Yeremi u tɔn be kpuro wisɑ, kurɔbu kɑ durɔbu, u nɛɛ,
bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ kɑ bɛɛn sinɑmbu kɑ bɛɛn wirugibu, i rɑ bũu yɑ̃kunu kue Yudɑn wusu sɔɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ. Nge weesɑ? I tɑmɑɑ Yinni Gusunɔ kun ye yɛ̃? Nge i tɑmɑɑ u ye duɑriwɑ.
Aɑwo, u ǹ ye duɑri. U kɑ bɛɛ wɑsirɑwɑ bɛɛn kom kɔ̃sum sɔ̃ kɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑn sɔ̃. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɛɛn tem mu kuɑ bɑnsu. Goo mɑɑ sɑri mɛ sɔɔ. Mɑ mu kuɑ tem bɔ̃rurɑm nge mɛ sɑ wɑɑmɔ gisɔ.
Wɑhɑlɑ ye, yɑ bɛɛ deemɑmɔwɑ gisɔ yèn sɔ̃ i bũnu yɑ̃kuru kuɑ mɑ i Yinni Gusunɔ torɑri i ǹ win gere wure, i ǹ mɑɑ win sɔ̃ɔsinu kɑ win woodɑbɑ kɑ win kirɔbɑ swĩi.
Yeremi u mɑɑ tɔn be kpuro, kurɔbu kɑ durɔbu, sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Egibitiɔ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ.
Wee ye Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn kurɔbu, i nɛɛ, i ko i bɛɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛnu yibiɑ ni i bũu tɔn kurɔ wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑte kuɑ. Wiyɑ i ko i turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ, kpɑ i mɑɑ nùn tɑm tɑ̃rɑ temɔ. Wee, i mɑɑ ye kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ. U bɔ̃rumɔ kɑ win yĩsi bɑkɑru mɑ Egibitin tem kpuro sɔɔ, Yudɑ goo kun mɑɑ bɔ̃rumɔ kɑ win yĩsiru u nɛɛ, sere kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru.
U koo dewɑ kɔ̃sɑ yu bɛɛ deemɑ, n ǹ mɔ geɑ. Yudɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Egibitiɔ kpuro, bɑ koo gbiwɑ tɑbu sɔɔ kɑ gɔ̃ɔru sɔɔ.
Kɑ mɛ, bɛɛn fiiko bɑ koo kisirɑ tɑbun di, kpɑ bu wurɑmɑ Yudɑɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ, bɛɛ be i dɑ mi kpuro i ko i giɑ ǹ n nɛn gɑrin nɑ yi koorɑ, ǹ n mɑɑ bɛɛgiin nɑ yi koorɑ.
U koo bɛɛ deemɑ Egibiti mi, kpɑ u bɛɛ yĩreru wɛ̃ te tɑ koo bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye u rɑɑ geruɑ yɑ koo nɑwɑ kɑ gem. Yĩre terɑ,
u koo Egibitin sunɔ Hofɑrɑ win yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ be bɑ kɑsu bu nùn go, nge mɛ u Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ, wi, wi u kɑsu u nùn go. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑruku Nɛriyɑn bii u gɑri yi yoruɑ tireru sɔɔ yi Yeremi u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ mi. Yen biru Yeremi u Bɑruku sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wee ye Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, u geruɑ wunɛn sɔ̃.
U nɛɛ, ɑ gerumɔ ɑ mɔ̀, ɑ kɑm kuɑwɑ domi wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u wunɛn wɑhɑlɑ sosimɔ. Mɑ ɑ weeweenu mɔ̀ sere ɑ wɑsirɑ. Adɑmɑ ɑ biɑ mi kɑɑ wɛ̃rɑ.
Wee, ye Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ n nun sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, u koo ye u rɑɑ bɑnɑ kɔsukuwɑ, kpɑ u ye u rɑɑ duurɑ wukiri. Yen tubusiɑnɑ, u koo tem mɛ kpuro sɑnku.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, gɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑnɑ ɑ kɑsu wunɛn tiin sɔ̃? A ku be nu kɑsu. Domi u koo de kɔ̃sɑ yu nɑ yu tɔmbu kpuro wɔri. Adɑmɑ wunɛ u koo wunɛn wɑ̃ɑru yɑrɑ mi ɑ dɑ kpuro. Terɑ tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ nge wunɛn ɑrumɑni ye ɑ gurɑ tɑbu sɔɔ.
Gɑri yiniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ bwese tukunun sɔ̃.
Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u Egibitin sunɔ Nɛko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kɑmiɑ Kɑɑkemisiɔ, Efɑrɑtin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔ. N deemɑ sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Yoyɑkimu, Yosiɑsin bii, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ mi. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɑri yini geruɑ Egibitin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu kowobun sɔ̃ u nɛɛ,
wee Egibitin tɑbu sinɑmbu bɑ kuuki mɔ̀ bɑ mɔ̀, i tɛrɛnu sɔɔru koowo, bɑkɑnu kɑ piiminu, kpɑ i se i tɑbu dɑ.
I bɛɛn tɑbu kɛkɛ be dumi gɑwe sɔɔru koowo. Bɛɛ mɑɑsɔbu, i bɛɛn dumi yɔɔwo, kpɑ i bɛɛn tɑbu furɔsu doke. I bɛɛn yɑɑsi sunkuo yi bɑlli, kpɑ i bɛɛn tɑrɑkpenu sebe.
Adɑmɑ mbɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u sere wɑɑmɔ yɑ koorɑmɔ ben suunu sɔɔ. U nɛɛ, be wee bɑ mwiɑ kpɑnɑ bɑ biruku yirɑ wurɑmɔ. Bɑ ben tɑbu durɔbu kɑmiɑ. Mɑ bɑ duki mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ mɑm biru mɛɛrimɔ. Tem mɛ kpuro mu bɛrum duurɑ.
Kɑm sɔɔrɑ be bɑ sɑ̃u bɑ duki mɔ̀. Bɑɑ tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu bɑ̀ n duki suɑ kɑmɑ. Domi sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, Efɑrɑtin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔ, dɑbiru tɑ sokurɑmɔ tɑ wɔrukumɔ.
Wɑrɑ u kɑ dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Nilu weenɛ tɑ̀ n yibɑ. Wɑrɑ u kɑ tu weenɛ sɑnɑm mɛ ten torɑ bɔ.
Egibitigibɑ bɑ kɑ tu weenɛ. Domi bɑ nɛɛ, nge mɛ Nilun nim mu rɑ tɛrie kɑ dɑm tem sɔɔ, nge mɛyɑ ben tɑbu kowobu bɑ koo mɑɑ tɛriɑ tem sɔɔ, kpɑ bu wusu kɑ sin tɔmbu kɑm koosiɑ.
Wee bɑ mɔ̀, ben mɑɑsɔbu bu seewo fuuku. Be bɑ tɑbu kɛkɛ be dumi gɑwe duɑ, bu duki doo. Ben tɑbu durɔbu bu seewo. Puti kɑ Kusin tɑbu durɔbu be bɑ tɛrɛ piiminu nɛni, kɑ sere Ludibɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɛn towobu, bu seewo.
Adɑmɑ tɔ̃ɔ teni, tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinnigiru. Tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ tè sɔɔ u win yibɛrɛbɑ mɔru kɔsiemɔ. Tɑkobi yɑ koo tɔmbu di, kpɑ yu yɛm debu. Tɔn dɑbi te yɑ koo go, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinnin sɔ̃, tɑ ko n kpĩ nge yɑ̃ku yɑɑ Efɑrɑtin dɑɑrun goorɔ, sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ.
Bɛɛ Egibitigibun tɑbu kowobu, bɑɑ ì n seewɑ i dɑ Gɑlɑdiɔ i tim kɑsu, kɑmɑ. Bɛɛn mɛɛrɑ yɑ ǹ kpeemɔ.
Bwesenu kpuro nu koo nɔ nge mɛ bɑ bɛɛ sekuru doke. Domi bɑ koo bɛɛn dɛsirun kuuki nɔ bɑɑmɑ. Bɛɛn tɑbu durɔbu bɑ ko n bɑ̃ɑrimɔwɑ. Bɑ̀ n yinnɑ, bɑ koo wɔrukuwɑ sɑnnu.
Gɑri yiniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko, Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u nɑ u Egibiti wɔri. U nɛɛ,
ɑ Egibitigibu nɔɔsio kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ yen wuu si bɑ mɔ̀ Migidoli, kɑ Mɛnfisi, kɑ Tɑpɑnɛsi sɔɔ, ɑ nɛɛ, ben bɑɑwure u seewo u sɔɔru ko. Domi bɑ bu tɑbu wɔrimɑ bɑɑmɑn di.
Ben tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu bɑ wɔrukɑ. Bɑ ǹ kpĩɑ bɑ kɑ tii yinɛ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ bu fukɑ.
Nɑ derɑ ben tɑbu kowo dɑbiru tɑ sokurɑ tɑ wɔrukɑ. Mɑ bɑ mɔ̀, bu seewo bu wurɑ ben temɔ mi bɑ bu mɑrɑ, mi tɑbu sɑri.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, bu Egibitin sunɔ yĩsi kpɑɑru kɛ̃ɛyɔ bu nɛɛ, woo kɑnɔ. U derɑ sɑɑ geɑ nùn doonɑri.
Nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ boko, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, nge mɛ bɑ yɛ̃ mɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Tɑbori tɑ guu ni nu tie gunum kere, kɑ nge mɛ bɑ yɛ̃ mɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑɑmɛli tɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun bɔkuɔ, nge mɛyɑ bɑ n yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm mɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nɑ bu bu wɔri.
Bɛɛ Egibitigibu, i sɔɔru koowo i bɛɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑ, bɑ koo bɛɛ yoru mwɛɛri. Domi wee, Mɛnfisi yɑ koo ko bɑnsu. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ ye sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ Egibitigibu, i sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɑɑ gbiibɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃. Adɑmɑ wee, dɑru swɑ̃ɑ gɑɑ yɑ wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, yu ye wɔri.
Bɛɛn tɑbu kowo be bɑ rɑ bɛɛ somi gobin sɔ̃, bɑ bɔɔru nge nɑɑ gumgiɑ. Kɑ mɛ, ben tii bɑ koo biruku yirɑ wurɑ bu duki yɑkikirɑ. Domi nɔni swɑ̃ɑrɑ koo bu wɔri. Ben sɛɛyɑsiɑbun sɑɑ yɑ turɑ.
Egibitigibɑ duki mɔ̀ nge wɛɛ yi yi doonɔ wɔkinu sɑri. Domi yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bu wɔrimɔ bɑ suririmɔ, nge dɑ̃ɑ buro wi u dɑ̃ɑ suririmɔ kɑ gbɑ̃ɑ, dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ.
Bɑɑ mɛ ben dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ gɑ kpɑ̃ sere goo kun kpɛ̃ u du mi, kɑ mɛ, bɑ koo gu bɔɔriwɑ. Domi yibɛrɛ be, bɑ twee dɑbiru kere. Goo kun kpɛ̃ u ben geeru giɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Egibitigibɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Domi wee, bɑ bu sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geugibu nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, kon bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Amɔɔ sɛɛyɑsiɑ wi u wɑ̃ɑ Tebɛsiɔ, kɑ Egibitin sunɔ, kɑ Egibitigibu kpuro kɑ ben bũnu kɑ ben sinɑmbu, kɑ sere mɑɑ be bɑ Egibitin sunɔ wi nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ.
Kon bu Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kɑ win sɔm kowobu nɔmu bɛriɑ, be bɑ kɑsu bu bu go. Adɑmɑ yenibɑn biru, Egibiti yɑ koo wurɑmɑ nge yellu. Yeniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, Yɑkɔbun bweseru, bɛɛ, nɛn sɔm kowobu, i ku bɛrum ko, i ku mɑɑ nɑndɑ. Domi kon bɛɛ wɔrɑmɑ sɑɑ tontonden di. Kon bɛɛn bweseru yɑkiɑmɑ sɑɑ yorun di. I ko i wurɑmɑ i wɛ̃rɑ, i n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ bɛɛ nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
I ku bɛrum ko. Domi nɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛɛ. Kon bwese ni kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ, nìn suunu sɔɔ nɑ rɑɑ bɛɛ yɑrinɑsiɑ mi. Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, nɑ ǹ bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑmɔ. Kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ n weenɛ, domi nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ nɑ kun bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsie.
Egibitin sinɑ boko u sere Gɑsɑ tɑbu wɔri, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ Filisitibɑn sɔ̃. U nɛɛ,
wee, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, bɑ tɛriɑmɔ tem sɔɔ nge dɑɑ te tɑ nim yibumɔ tɑ bɔ̃ɔ sɑrɑmɔ. Mɑ bɑ tem kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ mɛ sɔɔ wukiri kɑ mɛn wusu kɑ tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ si kpuro sɔɔ. Tɔn be kpuro bɑ kuuki mɔ̀, bɑ weeweenu mɔ̀.
Dumin nɑɑ dɑmu dɑmusu kɑ tɑbu kɛkɛbɑn uruubɑn wɔkinu nɔɔrɑmɔ. Bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ ben bibu derimɔ, domi ben gɔmɑ kpuro dwiiyɑ.
Sɑɑ yɑ tunumɑ yè sɔɔ bɑ koo Filisitibɑ kpuro go, kɑ tɔn be bɑ koo kpĩ bu Tirigibu, kɑ Sidonigibu somi, kɑ tɔn be bɑ tie bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem bure te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑfitoriɔ.
Gɑsɑgibu bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ bɑ wii pɔɔnu pote. Asikɑlonigibu kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑɔ bɑ nɔɔ mɑɑri. Bɛɛ be i tie, sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ i ko i n wɑ̃ɑ i n tii muririmɔ i kɑ gɔɔ swĩ.
Wee, i gerumɔ i mɔ̀, Yinni Gusunɔn tɑkobi, dommɑ kɑɑ wɛ̃rɑ. A wuro wunɛn kɑrɑrɔ, kpɑ ɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mi sɛ̃ɛ.
Amɔnɑ yɑ koo kɑ wɛ̃rɑ. Domi Yinni Gusunɔn tiiwɑ u ye woodɑ wɛ̃, yu kɑ Asikɑlonigibu kɑ nim wɔ̃kun goonugibu wɔri.
Wee ye Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, u geruɑ Mɔɑbubɑn sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, Nɛbo yɑ kɑm kuɑ domi wee bɑ yen yɑ̃nu gurɑ. Kiriɑtɑimu yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ domi bɑ ye mwɑ. Misigɑbu yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ, domi bɑ ye kɔsukɑ.
Mɔɑbun bɛɛrɛ yɑ kpɑ. Mɑ bɑ bwisikumɔ bu Hɛsiboni kɑm koosiɑ. Bɑ mɔ̀, su dɑ su ye kɑm koosiɑ kpɑ yɑ kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Wunɛ Mɑdimɛni, kɑɑ ko bɑnsu, domi wee bɑ nun tɑbu wɔrimɑm wee.
Bɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑnɑmɔ sɑɑ Koronɑimun di, bɑ mɔ̀, wee bɑ bɛsɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑmɔ. Wee bɑ kpuro kɔsukumɔ.
Bɑ Mɔɑbu kɑm koosiɑ. Mɑ bibun nɔɔ gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ.
Bɑ wuri wennɛ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Lusitiɔ, mɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun kuuki yi sɑrɑmɑmɔ sɑɑ Koronɑimun guurun di.
Bɑ mɔ̀, i duki yɑkuro, i bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ, kpɑ i dɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ nge gbeeku kɛtɛkunu gbɑburɔ.
Domi i bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokewɑ bɛɛn nɔmɑn sɔmburu kɑ bɛɛn ɑrumɑnibɑ sɔɔ. Wee, tɛ̃ bɑ koo bɛɛn tii mwɛɛri kpɑ bu bɛɛn bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Kemɔsi kɑ win yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ win wirugibu yoru mwɑ bu kɑ doonɑ.
Be bɑ koo bu kɑm koosiɑ mi. Bɑ koo duwɑ wuu bɑɑgere sɔɔ. Gen gɑgɑ kun kisirɑmɔ ben nɔmɑn di. Bɑ koo kpuro kɑm koosiɑwɑ wɔwi sɔɔ kɑ tem tɛɛri sɔɔ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, i Mɔɑbubɑn sikɑ sɔɔru koowo, domi ben gɔɔ turuku kuɑ. Ben wusu su koo ko bɑnsu. Goo kun ko n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ si sɔɔ.
Be bɑ Gusunɔn sɔmburu mɔ̀ kɑ ɑtɑfiiru, u bu bɔ̃rusio. Be bɑ yinɑmɔ bu tɔmbu go kɑ tɑkobi, Gusunɔ u bu bɔ̃rusio.
Wee, sɑɑ yellun di, Mɔɑbubɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Bɑ ǹ yoru diire gɑm. Bɑ sɔ̃wɑ kpɛtɛɛ nge tɑm kɔrɔru. Bɑ ǹ bu gɔsiɑre gɑm sɔɔ nge tɑm. Ben dobu kɑ ben wɑni kun kɔsɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon bu tɔmbu suremɑ bu bu gɔsie wekenu gɑnu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu weke ni kɔsuku.
Mɔɑbu be, bɑ koo sekuru wɑ ben bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Kemɔsin sɔ̃, nge mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ sekuru wɑ bũu wi u wɑ̃ɑ Betɛliɔn sɔ̃, domi wi sɔɔrɑ bɑ ben nɑɑnɛ doke.
Bɛɛ Mɔɑbubɑ, ɑmɔnɑ i ko i kɑ kpĩ i gere i nɛɛ, i sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔbu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɑbun sɔ̃.
Domi wee, i kɑm kuɑ. Bɛɛn wusu su dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ. Mɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bɛɛn ɑluwɑɑsi dɑmgibu mwɛɛrɑ bɑ sɑkirɑ. Yeniwɑ sinɑ boko u geruɑ. Win yĩsirɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni. U nɛɛ,
Mɔɑbun kɑm kobu turuku kuɑ. Nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te bɑ koo wɑ, tɑ wee fuuku fuuku.
Bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ ben turuku, i kɑ bu gɔɔ sinɔ. Bɛɛ be i bu yɛ̃, i bu bikio i nɛɛ, ɑmɔnɑ n koosinɑ bɑ kɑ bɑn tenin dɑm bɑkɑm mɛ kpeerɑsiɑ mɛ.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ Dibonigibu, i bɛɛn sin yee bɛɛrɛginu derio, kpɑ i nɑ i sinɑ temɔ. Domi be bɑ Mɔɑbubɑ kɑm koosiɑ, bɑ wee bu bɛɛ wɔri, kpɑ bu bɛɛn gbɑ̃rɑ dɑmginu kɔsuku.
Bɛɛ Aroɛɛgibu, i doo swɑɑɔ i mɛɛri, kpɑ i Mɔɑbu be bɑ kpikiru suɑ bikiɑ i nɛɛ, mbɑ n koorɑ.
Bɑ koo bɛɛ wisi bu nɛɛ, bɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ sekuru sɔɔ bɑ diirimɔ. I kuuki koowo, i gbɑ̃rɑ, kpɑ i bɑɑwure nɔɔsiɑ Aɑnɔɔwɔ mɑ bɑ Mɔɑbubɑ gurɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u bu sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑ sɔɔ kɑ yen wuu sini sɔɔ, si bɑ mɔ̀, Holoni kɑ Yɑhɑsi kɑ Mɛfɑti,
kɑ Diboni kɑ Nɛbo kɑ Bɛti Dibilɑtɑimu,
kɑ Kiriɑtɑimu kɑ Bɛti Gɑmulu kɑ Bɛti Mɛɔni,
kɑ Keriɔtu kɑ Botisirɑ, Mɔɑbubɑn wusu kpuro gesi, si su wɑ̃ɑ turuku kɑ tontondeɔ.
Bɑ Mɔɑbubɑn dɑm buɑ, mɑ ben yiiko yɑ kpɑ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Mɔɑbubɑ bɑ tii suɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ. Yen sɔ̃, bu bu tɑm tɑɑsio sere bu mu siruku kpɑ bu bu yɛ̃ɛ.
Bɛɛ Mɔɑbubɑ, i yɑɑyo mɑ i rɑɑ Isirelibɑ yɛ̃ɛ. I rɑɑ bu wii gimɑnu koosi nge be i gbɛnɑ mwɑ.
Tɛ̃, i yɑrio bɛɛn wusun di kpɑ i dɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ i kpee goominu sɑɑri, i bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑ yenu ko kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ.
Sɑ Mɔɑbubɑn tii suɑbun gɑri nuɑ, kɑ ben tɔn biɑru, kɑ sere mɑɑ ben woo kɑnɑbu, kɑ ben degɑngɑm, kɑ ben nɔni yɔnnu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, nɛn tii, nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ bɑ rɑ tii sue ben gɑri gerubu sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ kpuro, yɑ ku rɑ n ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ mɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ Mɔɑbubɑ kpuro gɔɔ swĩiyɑmmɛ. Mɑ nɑ Kiri Herɛsigibu weeweenu kuɑmmɛ.
Sibimɑn resɛm gbɑɑru, nɑ wuri mɔ̀ wunɛn sɔ̃. Nɛn wuri yi, yi Yɑsɛɛgibugii kere. Yellu, wunɛn dɑ̃ɑ kɑ̃ɑsi yi nim wɔ̃ku sɑrɑmɔ. Yi mɑm Yɑsɛɛn dɑɑrun nim dɛkɑmɔ. Adɑmɑ wee, kɑm koosio u yin mɑrum wɔri u kɑm koosiɑ.
Nuku dobun womusu kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ Mɔɑbubɑn gbeɑɔ. Goo ku rɑ mɑɑ tɑm gɑmɛ mi. Tɑm sɑri wekenu sɔɔ. Nuku dobun kuuki kun mɑɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ mi, mɑ n kun mɔ tɑbugii.
Hɛsibonigibu bɑ nɔɔgiru sue bɑ somiru kɑnɑmɔ. Bɑ ben nɔɔ nɔɔmɔ Eleɑleɔ, kɑ Yɑhɑsiɔ, kɑ Soɑriɔ, kɑ Koronɑimuɔ, kɑ Egɑlɑti Selɑsiɔ. Domi bɑɑ Nimurimun dɑɑru tɑ kɑm kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, kon den Mɔɑbubɑ kpeerɑsiɑ, be, be bɑ yɔɔmɔ ben bũu turɑnɔ bɑ nu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑmmɛ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ sumɔ nge guuru Mɔɑbubɑ kɑ Kiri Herɛsigibun sɔ̃. Domi ben dukiɑ ye bɑ gurɑ kpuro yɑ kɑm kuɑ.
Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ ben seri kɑ ben tobɑ kɔnɑ, bɑ tii mururɑ nɔmɑ yiru kpuro, bɑ sɑɑki deewɑ ben nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Bɑ gɔɔ wuri mɔ̀ yɛnu bɑɑgere sɔɔ kɑ sere mi bɑ rɑ mɛnnɛ kpuro gesi domi nɑ Mɔɑbubɑn tem kɔsukɑ nge weke te goo kun mɑɑ kĩ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
I gɔɔ swĩiyɔ, Mɔɑbubɑ bɑ wɔrumɑ. Bɑ biruku yirɑ wurɑ. Annɑ ɑ sekuru wɑ. Be bɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛ kpuro, bɑ bu yɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nɑ nge yɑberekunu ni nu bɛllimɔ wɔllɔ.
Kpɑ bu wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Keriɔtu mwɑ, bu gen gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsuku. Mɔɑbun tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu bɑ koo nɑndɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Bɑ koo Mɔɑbubɑ kpeerɑsiɑ. Ben bweserɑ koo nɔru ko, domi bɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ seesi.
Wee, bɑ bu yinɑ kɑ tɑɑ kɑ suurɑ bɛrie.
Wi u dukɑ mɔ̀ bɛrum sɔ̃, u koo wɔriwɑ suurɑ ye sɔɔ. Wi u mɑɑ yɑrɑ suurɑ yen di, kpɑ u tɑɑ mwɑɑrɑ. Domi kon de Mɔɑbun sɛɛyɑsiɑbun tɔ̃ru tu nɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Be bɑ kpikiru suɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑm tie, bɑ wɛ̃rɑ yeru kɑsu Hɛsiboniɔ. Adɑmɑ dɔ̃ɔ yɑri yi koo yɑri yen sinɑ boko Sihonin dirun di, yi dɑ yi Mɔɑbubɑn tem nɔɔ burɑ yenu kɑ mɛn guunu di.
Bɛɛ, Mɔɑbubɑ, i kɑm kuɑwɑ. Bɛɛ Kemɔsigibu, i kpeerɑwɑ. Wee, bɑ koo bɛɛn bibu yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ doonɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon kɑ Mɔɑbu be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ mi wurɑmɑ ben temɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ Mɔɑbubɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Amɔnibɑn sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Mɑlikɔmu u Gɑdin tem mwɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ win tɔmbu Amɔnibɑ bɑ Isirelibɑn wusu wɔrɑ. Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ bibu mɔwɑ be bɑ koo mu tubi di?
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, kon de tɑbun wurenu nu nɔɔrɑ ben wuu mɑroɔ ge bɑ mɔ̀ Rɑbɑ. Rɑbɑ ye, yɑ koo bɑnsu ko, kpɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnu nu dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑkirɑ. Nge mɛyɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ koo bu girɑ be, be bɑ rɑɑ bu girɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɛɛ, Hɛsibonigibu, i gɔɔ swĩiyɔ. Domi bɑ koo Ayi kɑm koosiɑ. Rɑbɑn bɑru kpɑɑnugibu, i nɔɔgiru suo i somiru kɑnɑ. I sɑɑki deewo nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃, kpɑ i n sirenɛ i n gɔɔ sumɔ. Domi bɑ koo bɛɛn bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Mɑlikɔmu suɑ, kɑ win yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ win wirugibu bu kɑ doonɑ.
Bɛɛ Rɑbɑgibu, bɛɛ be i ku rɑ mɛm nɔ, wee i tii sue bɛɛn wɔwɑ ye yɑ tem gem mɔn sɔ̃. Mɑ i bɛɛn dukiɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Mɑ i mɔ̀, wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u bɛɛ wɔrimɑ.
Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u nɛɛ, wee kon bɛɛ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru suremɑ. Tɑ koo nɑwɑ sɑɑ bɑɑmɑn di, kpɑ i yɑrinɑ. Goo mɑɑ sɑri wi u koo bɛɛ mɛnnɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑmɛn biru kon de be bɑ yɑrinɛ mi, bu wurɑmɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee ye Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u geruɑ Edɔmubɑn sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, bwisi yi kpɑwɑ Temɑniɔ? Ben bwisigibun bwisi yi kpɑwɑ? Mɑnɑ yi kpuro yi doonɑ.
Bɛɛ Dedɑnigibu, i gɔsiro, i duki yɑkuro i dɑ i kuke kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ. Domi kon Esɑugibu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kpɛ̃ɛ sɑnɑm mɛ kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Be bɑ rɑ resɛm sɔri bɑ̀ n nɑ bɛɛn mi, bɑ rɑ fiiko deri. Gbɛnɔbu bɑ̀ n tɔmbu wɔri, bɑ rɑ suewɑ ye bɑ koo kpĩ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon Esɑun bweseru kpuron yɑ̃nu gurɑwɑ. Kon bu sikiɑmɑ ben kuku yenun di. Bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu kuke. Ben bibu kɑ ben dusibu kɑ be bɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛ kpuro bɑ koo gbiwɑ. Goo kun tiɑrɑmɔ.
Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n ben bibu deri bɑ kuɑ gobekubɑ, nɛnɑ kon de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ ben gɔminibu bu mɑn nɑɑnɛ ko.
Nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, be nɑ ǹ dɑɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ, kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Yerɑ bɛɛ, Edɔmubɑ, i tɑmɑɑ i yɑrɑ min di? Aɑwo, kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ.
Nɑ bɔ̃rumɔ sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru mɑ bɛɛn wuu mɑro Bɔtisirɑ gɑ koo bɑnsu ko kpɑ n sɑ̃ɑ sekuru, kpɑ tɔmbu bɑ n dɑ gu sie bɑ̀ n goo bɔ̃rusimɔ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ bɛɛn wuu si su tie su koo ko bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yeremi lɑbɑɑri yeni sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɑ sɔmɔ goo gɔrɑ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ u nu sɔ̃ u nɛɛ, nu mɛnnɑmɑ nu Edɔmubɑ wɔri, nu seewo nu bu tɑbu wɔri.
Domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon bu ko dɑ̃ɑkobu bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ, be tɔmbɑ ko n gɛmɑ.
Ben tii suɑbu kɑ ben nɔnigiru tɑ derɑ bɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑ. Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ, kɑ sere gungunun wii kpiinɔ, bɑɑ bɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ yenu kuɑ sere wɔllun sɔɔ sɔɔwɔ, nge gunɔ bɑkeru, kon bu surɑmɑ min di. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Edɔmu yɑ koo kowɑ bɑnsu. Be bɑ sɑrɔ mi, bɑ̀ n ye wɑ, biti yɑ koo bu mwɑ kpɑ bu wiɑ ko ɑsɔrɔ yen sɔ̃.
Domi yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge mɛ bɑ Sodomu kɑ Gomɔrɑ kpeerɑsiɑ kɑ yen bɑru kpɑɑnɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ mi.
Ko nɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ yɑrimɑ Yuudɛnin gbee surorun di gɑ dɔɔ gu nim nɔ. Kpɑ n tɔmbu kpuro yɑrinɑsiɑ subɑru sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ kon Edɔmubɑ sunɔ kpɑo wɛ̃ wi nɛn tii nɑ gɔsɑ. Nge wɑrɑ u kɑ mɑn nɛ. Wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u mɑn woodɑ wɛ̃. Sinɑ boko wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u yɔ̃rɑ nɛn wuswɑɑɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ himbɑ ye nɑ kuɑ Edɔmubɑn sɔ̃, kɑ sere kpunɑɑ ye nɑ yi Temɑnigibun sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, kɑm kɑm, kon de bu be kpuro mwɛɛriwɑ nge yɑ̃ɑnu bu kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Bɑ koo ben tem kpuro kɑm koosiɑwɑ.
Kɑm koo bin wurenu sɔɔ, tem mu koo yĩiri. Tɔmbɑ koo nɔɔgiru suɑ bu somiru kɑnɑ, kpɑ ben nɔsu su nɔɔrɑ sere nim wɔ̃kuɔ, ge bɑ mɔ̀ Sɔ̃ɔ.
Wee, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo Botisirɑ wukiri nge mɛ yɑberekunu nu rɑ yɑɑ gonu kunisi. Yen dɔmɑ te, Edɔmun tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu bɑ ko n kpɑsɑ wɔri mɔ̀wɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Dɑmɑsin sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, yen wuu sini, Hɑmɑti kɑ Aɑpɑdi, sin tɔmbɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Bɑ lɑbɑɑri kɔ̃sɑ nuɑ, mɑ bɑ diirimɔ. Ben lɑɑkɑri yɑ burisinɑ nge nim wɔ̃kun nim, sere yɑ ǹ kpĩɑ yɑ wurɑmɛ.
Dɑmɑsigibu bɑ mwiɑ kpɑnɑ bɑ gɔsirɑ bu kɑ duki su, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ bɛrum soore. Mɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu kɑ wuriribu bu nɛni nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Wuu gèn sɔ̃ nɑ rɑ n nuku dobu mɔ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ gen tɔmbu bɑ ǹ kpikiru suɑ. Wuu bɔkɔ ge, ge gɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ mi, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ gen tɔmbu bɑ ǹ gu deri.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru bɑ koo gen ɑluwɑɑsibɑ go gen swɛɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ koo mɑɑ gen tɑbu kowobu kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ, kpɑ n de bu gu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni kɑ Bɛni Hɑdɑdin sinɑ kpɑɑru. Nɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
<range>
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Kedɑɑgibun sɔ̃ kɑ bwese ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Hɑsoriɔn sɔ̃, ni Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u kɑmiɑ. U nɛɛ, i seewo i Kedɑɑgibu wɔri. I be, sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerugii be kpuro goowo.
I ben kuu bekunuginu kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu kpuro guro, kɑ ben bekɑ kɑ ben sɔmunu kɑ ben yooyoosu, kpɑ i kuuki ko bɑɑmɑ i bu bɛrum tiɑ.
Bɛɛ Hɑsorigibu i seewo i duki su fuuku, kpɑ i dɑ i kuke wɔrusu sɔɔ. Domi Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u kpunɑɑ kuɑ u kɑ bɛɛ wɔri. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, i doo i bu wɔri be, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, bɑ sɔ̃ sɛ̃ɛ ben yɛnusɔ. Ben wusu su ǹ gɑmbobɑ kɑ kɔkɔrɔbɑ mɔ, mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔmbu dɛsire.
Yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo ben yooyoosu mwɛɛri kɑ sere mɑɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu yɑ n dɑbi. Kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑɑmɑ, be, be bɑ rɑ ben wii bɑɑnu kɔni beri berikɑ. Kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu nɑ bɑɑmɑn di bu bu kɑm koosiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Hɑsorin wuu gɑ koo ko bɑnsu, kpɑ gɑ n sɑ̃ɑ gbeeku bɔ̃nun wɑ̃ɑ yeru sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ mi.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u win sɔmɔ Yeremi sɔ̃ɔwɑ Elɑmun sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon bɑndun torewɑ mi.
Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u nɛɛ, wee, kon Elɑmugibun tɛnnu bɔɔku ni nu sɑ̃ɑ ben dɑm nuuru.
Kon bu hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ kpuron woo kpɑremɑ, kpɑ n bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑɑmɑ. Tem gɑm sɑri mi bɑ ǹ ko n wɑ̃ɑ.
Kon de Elɑmugibu bu diiri ben yibɛrɛbɑ kɑ be bɑ kɑsu bu bu gon wuswɑɑɔ. Nɛn mɔrun sɑɑbu kon bu nɔni swɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑru kpɛ̃ɛ. Tɑbɑ kon kɑ bu go n kpe,
kpɑ n ben sinɑmbu kɑ ben wirugibu go kpɑ n nɛn tiin bɑndu swĩi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Adɑmɑ tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ wee tè sɔɔ kon de be bɑ rɑɑ yɑrinɑ mi, bu wurɑmɑ.
Wee gɑri yi Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Bɑbilonin sɔ̃ kɑ yen tem kpuron sɔ̃, sɑɑ Yeremin min di. U nɛɛ,
i bwesenu lɑbɑɑri yeni nɔɔsio. I yĩrenu koowo nu kɑ ye giɑ. I ye kpɑro i nɛɛ, Bɑbiloni yɑ wɔrumɑ. Yen bũnu nu sekuru suɑ. Bũu ni bɑ mɔ̀ Bɛli kɑ Mɛrodɑki nu wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Nin bwɑ̃ɑrokunu nu bɛrum soorɑ.
Bweseru gɑrɑ ye wɔrim wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di. Tɑ koo tem mɛ gɔsiɑwɑ bɑnsu. Goo kun ko n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Tɔmbu kɑ yɛɛ kpuro koo yɑrinɑ min di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yen tɔ̃ɔ te, Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ koo wurɑmɑ ben temɔ sɑnnu, bɑ n sumɔ, bɑ n nɛ Gusunɔ, ben Yinni kɑsu.
Bɑ koo Siɔnin swɑɑ bikiɑ, bu wɔrimɑ yen mi, kpɑ bu nɑ bu kɑ mɑn ɑrukɑwɑni bɔke ye bɑ ǹ duɑrimɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Be, nɛn tɔmbu, wee bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ ge gɑ rɑɑ kɔ̃ɔre. Ben kpɑrobɑ rɑɑ bu kɔ̃ bɑ derɑ bɑ sirenɛ guunu wɔllɔ bɑ gɑsirimɔ gee kɑ giɔ, sere bɑ ben wɑ̃ɑ yeru duɑri.
Yibɛrɛ be bɑ bu wɔri gesi, bɑ rɑ bu gurewɑ. Kpɑ yibɛrɛ be, bu nɛɛ, bɑ ǹ kɔ̃sɑ kue. Be, Isireli ben tiiwɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ torɑri, wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ gemgii kɑ wi ben sikɑdobɑ bɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i yɑrio i duki su Bɑbilonin di, nge boo ni nu gɔ̃ɔ gbiiye.
Domi wee, kon bwesenu seeyɑ wuu wuukɑ kpɑ n de nu Bɑbiloni wɔri. Bɑ koo nɑwɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, kpɑ bu ye tɑrusi bu mwɑ. Ben sɛ̃ɛnu nu ǹ kɑm wɔrimɔ. Bɑɑ ben tɑbu durɔ turo kun gɔsirɔ nɔm dirɑ.
Bɑbilonigibu bɑ ǹ kisirɑmɔ kɑm koo bin di. Be bɑ koo ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ kpuro, bɑ koo nu gurɑwɑ kɑ nuku tiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɛɛ Bɑbilonigibu, bɛɛ be i nɛn ɑrumɑni gurɑ, i nuki doro. I n yɔ̃ɔkumɔ nge nɑɑ kpɛmi yɑkɑsɔ. I n sumɔ nge dum dwɛɛ.
Adɑmɑ i bɛɛn tem mɛɛrio. Wee, mu wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Wee, mu kuɑ bɑnsu, nge tem mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi. Mɑ mu biru wurɑ tem kpuro sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔn mɔrun sɑɑbu, mu kuɑ bɑnsu. Be bɑ koo sɑrɑ Bɑbilonin tem mi, biti koo bu mwɑ kpɑ bu wiɑ ko.
Bɛɛ be i rɑ tɛndu to, i nɑ i Bɑbiloni tɑrusi. I ye sɛ̃ɛnu tweeyo. I ku yen wɔnwɔndu ko. Domi yɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ torɑri.
I tɑbun kuuki koowo bɑɑmɑ domi Bɑbilonin gɑni yi wɔrukɑ, yen gbɑ̃rɑrɑ subɑ. Wee yen tɔmbɑ nɔmɑ yiiye bɑ tii yibɛrɛbɑ wɛ̃. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ ye mɔru kɔsiemɔ, nɑ mɔ̀, i ye mɔru kɔsieyo. I ye kuo nge mɛ yɑ rɑɑ gɑbu kuɑ.
Tɑbu wee kɑ kɑm kobu sɑnnu. I bu goowo be bɑ duurumɔ kɑ be bɑ gɛ̃ɛmɔ. Bɑɑwure u seewo u dɑ win temɔ mi win bweserɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yɑ̃ɑ ni nu kɔ̃ɔrɑ mɑ gbee sinɑnsu su nu nɑɑ swĩi. Asirin sinɑ bokowɑ u gbiɑ u nu wɔri u gurɑ, mɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u mɑɑ nɑ u nu wɔri u kɔsukɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ, nɛ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni, wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ nɛɛ, kon Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko kɑ win temgibu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nge mɛ nɑ Asirin sunɔ sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Adɑmɑ kon de Isirelibɑ bu wurɑmɑ ben wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, kpɑ bu ben dĩɑnu yewe guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑɑmɛliɔ kɑ Bɑsɑniɔ kɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Efɑrɑimuɔ, kɑ sere mɑɑ Gɑlɑdin temɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnun yɑ̃ɑru mɔ̀.
Yen domɑ te, bɑ koo Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn durum kɑsu bɑ kun wɑ, domi be, be bɑ tie mi, kon bu ben durum wɔkɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, i Mɛrɑtɑimugibu kɑ Pekodigibu wɔrio. I bu goowo i kɑm koosiɑ mɑm mɑm. I nɛn woodɑbɑ kpuro yibio.
Wee, tɑbun wurenu nɔɔrɑmɔ tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ. Asɔrɔ bɑkɑ yɑ tunumɑ.
Bɑbiloni ye yɑ hɑnduniɑ kpuro kɔsukɑ, nge mɑtɑlɑkɑ, yen tii wee, yɑ kɔsikirɑ, yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu bwesenu kpuron suunu sɔɔ.
Bɑbiloni, nɑ nun yinɑ bɛriɑ, mɑ yɑ nun mwɑ ɑ ǹ kɑ bɑɑru. Wee, tɛ̃, ɑ kuɑ pirisɔm, domi ɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ wɔri.
Mɑ nɑ nɛn tɑbu yɑ̃nun beru yeru wukiɑ. Mɑ nɑ nɛn mɔru sɔ̃ɔsi kɑ tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ ni. Domi nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɑ sɔmburu mɔ te kon ko Bɑbiloniɔ.
Bɛɛ hɑnduniɑgibu kpuro, i nɑ i Bɑbilonigibun birɑnu suriri, kpɑ i ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ i subu subu nge yɑkɑsu, i ye kɑm koosiɑ. Gɑ̃ɑnu nu ku mɑɑ tiɑrɑ mi.
I ben tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu goowo. I bu sɑkirio nge yɑɑ sɑbenu. Bɑ kɑm kuɑ, domi ben tɔ̃rɑ tunumɑ, tè sɔɔ bɑ koo bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Yerɑ Isirelibɑ be bɑ kpikiru suumɑ bɑ nɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ bɑ mɔ̀, Yerusɑlɛmu, Yinni Gusunɔ u nun mɔru kɔsiɑ. U win sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑru mɔru kɔsiɑ.
I tɛn towobu mɛnnɔ bu Bɑbiloni wɔri, kpɑ bu ben sɑnsɑni girɑ bu kɑ ye sikerenɑ, kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ de goo u kisirɑ min di. Bu bu kɔsieyo nge mɛ ben dɑɑ yɑ nɛ. Bu bu kuo nge mɛ bɑ rɑɑ gɑbu kuɑ. Domi bɑ tii wɔlle suɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ, nɛ wi nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn Yinni Dɛɛro.
Yen sɔ̃, mi ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpuro, bɑ koo gbisukuwɑ, kpɑ ben tɑbu kowobun tii bu gbisuku tɔ̃ɔ te.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, nɑ nɛɛ, wunɛ Bɑbiloni, wunɛ wi ɑ tii sue, nɑ kɑ nun mɔru sɑ̃ɑ. Wunɛn tɔ̃rɑ tunumɑ tè sɔɔ kon nun sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Wunɛ wi ɑ tii sue mi, kɑɑ fukurɑ ɑ wɔrumɑ. Goo sɑri wi u koo nun seeyɑ. Kon wuu si su kɑ nun sikerenɛ dɔ̃ɔ doke kpɑ u sin tem kpuro di.
Nɛ, Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ, nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, wee bɑ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ dɑm dɔre bɑ bu yoru nɛnusi, mɑ bɑ yinɑmɔ bu bu yɔ̃su.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, ben yɑkio, nɑ dɑm mɔ. Nɛn yĩsirɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni. Kon kɑ bu yinɑ kpɑ n ben tem bɔri yɛndu wɛ̃, kpɑ n Bɑbilonigibu burisinɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, i Bɑbilonigibu tɑbu wɔrio kɑ sere ben wuu bɔkɔ gen tɔmbu kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ ben bwisigibu.
I ben sɔmɔ tii suo be tɑbu wɔrio kpɑ bu gɔsirɑ wiirobu. I ben tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu wɔrio kpɑ bu nɑndɑ.
I ben dumi kɑ ben tɑbu kɛkɛ yi dumi gɑwe tɑbu wɔrio. I tɔn be bɑ kɑnɑ bɑ bu somimɔ tɑbu sɔɔ, tɑbu wɔrio, kpɑ bu bɛrum soorɑ nge tɔn kurɔbu. I ben dukiɑ wɔrio i gurɑ.
Ben dɑɑnun nim mu gbero. Domi tem mi, bũnɑ bɑ rɑ sɑ̃, mɑ nu derɑ bɑ wiru bie.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de Bɑbiloni yu ko bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ, kpɑ purukɑnu kɑ tɑɑtɑɑnu nu nɑ nu n wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Kon Bɑbiloni ye kɔsukuwɑ nge Sodomu kɑ Gomɔrɑ kɑ sin wuu si nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ kɑm koosiɑ. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ mi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee, bweseru gɑrɑ wee sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di. Bwese te, tɑ kpɑ̃. Ten sinɑmbu bɑ dɑm mɔ. Be wee, bɑ swɑɑ mɔ̀ bɑ wee sɑɑ tontonden di.
Ben tɑbu kowobu bɑ tɑkobi kɑ tɛmɑ nɛni. Bɑ ǹ wɔnwɔndu mɔ, bɑ bɔɔbu. Bɑ wɔki nge nim wɔ̃kun nim. Bɑ dumi yɔɔwɑ bɑ swĩinɛ swɛɛ swɛɛ. Bɑ tɑbun sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ Bɑbilonigibu wɔri.
Ye Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u lɑbɑɑri ye nuɑ, yerɑ win gɔmɑ dwiiyɑ. Bɛrum kɑ wuriribu nùn mwɑ nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kon wuu gbɑ̃rɑruguu wɔri nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ yɑrimɑ sɑɑ Yuudɛnin gbee surorun di, kpɑ n gen tɔmbu kpuro yɑrinɑsiɑ subɑru sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon bu sunɔ kpɑo wɛ̃ wi nɛn tii nɑ gɔsɑ. Nge wɑrɑ u kɑ mɑn nɛ. Wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u mɑn woodɑ wɛ̃. Sinɑ boko wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u yɔ̃rɑ nɛn wuswɑɑɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ himbɑ ye nɑ yi Bɑbiloni kɑ yen tɔmbun sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, kɑm kɑm kon de bu be kpuro gurɑ nge yɑ̃ɑnu bu kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Bɑ koo ben wɑ̃ɑ yeru kpuro kɑm koosiɑwɑ.
Bɑbilonin kɑm koo bin wurenu sɔɔ, tem mu koo yĩiri, kpɑ wɔki bɑkɑnu nu se sɑɑ hɑnduniɑn bɑɑmɑ kpuron di.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Bɑbilonin sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, kon de woo gu Bɑbiloni swee, ye kɑ yen tɔmbu, kpɑ gu bu kɑm koosiɑ.
Kon de tɔmbu bu bu yɑrinɑsiɑ nge mɛ woo gɑ rɑ yɑkɑsu yɑrinɑsie. Tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃su te sɔɔ, bɑ koo ye wɔrimɑ bɑɑmɑn di.
Tɛn towobu bu wuu gen tɔmbu tweeyo. Bu yɛ̃ro tweeyo wi u win tɑrɑkpe nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Bu ku gen ɑluwɑɑsibɑ deri. Bu gen tɑbu kowobu kpuro goowo.
Kpɑ bu ben gonu deri nu n kpĩ kpĩ ben tem kpuro sɔɔ kɑ Bɑbilonin swɛɛyɔ.
Domi bɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni Dɛɛro torɑri n kpɑ̃. Adɑmɑ wi, Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u kɑ win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
I duki yɑrio Bɑbilonin di. Bɑɑwure u win wɑ̃ɑru wɔro, kpɑ u ku rɑɑ gbi Bɑbiloni ye sɔɔ, ye, ye yɑ koo ko bɑnsu mi. Domi Yinni Gusunɔn mɔrun tɔ̃rɑ tunumɑ. U koo Bɑbilonigibu ben kookoosun ɑre wɛ̃.
Bɑbiloni yɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɔrɑ wurɑgiɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔmɑ sɔɔ. Yerɑ u kɑ hɑnduniɑgibu tɑm wɛ̃ bɑ nɔrɑ sere mu bu go bɑ wiru biɑ.
Wee subɑru sɔɔ, Bɑbiloni yɑ wɔrumɑ yɑ kɔsikirɑ. I gɔɔ swĩiyɔ yen sɔ̃, kpɑ i kɑ tim nɑ i doke mi yɑ bosu wɑ. Sɔrɔkudo yɑ koo bɛkurɑ.
Sɔɔ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ Bɑbiloni tim kɑ̃, ɑdɑmɑ yɑ ǹ bɛkure. Su ye deri su gɔsirɑ bɛsɛn temɔ, domi yen sɛɛyɑsiɑ bi, bu kpɑ̃ sere bu nɔɔrɑ hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ.
Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni u sun siriɑ. Su dɑ Siɔniɔ su kpɑrɑ ye u sun kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kĩ u Bɑbiloni kɑm koosiɑ, kpɑ u win sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑru mɔru kɔsiɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ u Mɛdibɑn sinɑmbu dɑm kɛ̃mɔ bu kɑ ye wɔri. I bɛɛn sɛ̃ɛnun nɔsu sɔnwɔ, kpɑ i bɛɛn tɛrɛnu suɑ.
I yĩreru koowo kpɑ i Bɑbiloni wɔri. Wuun kɔ̃sobu, bu wureo bu yɔ̃rɔ sɔmɛ ben kɔ̃su yerɔ. I Bɑbiloni yɔɔru bwɛ̃ɛyɔ. Domi ye Yinni Gusunɔ u yɔ̃rɑri u ko ye sɔɔ, u koo ye kowɑ.
Wunɛ Bɑbiloni, wunɛ wi ɑ sɔ̃ dɑɑ bɑkɑnun bɔkuɔ, wunɛ wi ɑ dukiɑ yibɑ, wee wunɛn kpeerun tɔ̃ru tɑ turɑ. Wunɛn binɛ yɑ koo kpe.
Domi Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, u bɔ̃ruɑ u nɛɛ, sere kɑ win wɑ̃ɑru, u koo nun tɔmbu kpɑremɑ nge twee kpɑ bu nun nɑsɑrɑn kuuki koosi.
Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u tem tɑkɑ kuɑ kɑ win dɑm. Wiyɑ u mɑɑ hɑnduniɑ swĩi kɑ win yɛ̃ru, mɑ u wɔllu tɛriɑ kɑ win bwisi.
Ù n nɔɔgiru suɑ u woodɑ wɛ̃, nim mu rɑ kpɑɑsinɛwɑ wɔllɔ, kpɑ guru winu nu n sĩimɔ, kpɑ guru mɑɑkinu nu de gurɑ yu nɛ, kpɑ woo gu seemɑ gen wɑ̃ɑ yerun di.
Tɔmbu bɑ̀ n ye kpuro mɛɛrɑ, bɑ rɑ biti soorewɑ, kpɑ sekuru tu bwɑ̃ɑrokunun sekobu mwɑ, domi nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ weesu, nu ǹ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ.
Nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑm dirum mɛ mu tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ. Ni kpuro nu koo doonɑwɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nu sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nge bwɑ̃ɑroku ni. U sɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelibɑn ɑrumɑni. Wiyɑ u kpuro tɑkɑ kuɑ, wiyɑ u mɑɑ Isirelibɑ mɔ. Win yĩsirɑ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Bɑbiloni, ɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɛn mɑtɑlɑkɑ bɑkɑ tɑbu sɔɔ. Wunɑ nɑ dendɑ nɑ kɑ bwese dɑbinu kɔsukɑ, mɑ nɑ nin bɑnnu sururɑ.
Wunɑ nɑ mɑɑ dendɑ nɑ kɑ mɑɑsɔbu kɑ ben dumi kɔsukɑ, kɑ tɑbu kɛkɛ yi dumi gɑwe kɑ yin kpɑrobu,
kɑ durɔbu kɑ kurɔbu, tɔkɔnu kɑ bibu, ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑ wɔndiɑbɑ.
Wunɑ nɑ mɑɑ dendɑ nɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑrobu kɑ ben yɑ̃ɑnu kɔsukɑ kɑ gbɑɑ wukobu kɑ ben nɑɑ wukubɑ kɑ sinɑmbu kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon wunɛ Bɑbiloni kɑ wunɛn tem tɔmbu kɔsie wunɛn nɔni biru kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ Siɔniɔ.
Kon nun wɔrimɑ, wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge guu te tɑ hɑnduniɑgibu kpuro kɑm koosiɑ. Kon nun nɔmɑ dɛmiɛ, kpɑ ɑ bindɑ ɑ wɔrumɑ temɔ. Kɑɑ kowɑ nge guu te tɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ.
Bɑɑ wunɛn kperu gɑru, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ suɑmɔ bu kɑ dirun koru swĩi. Kɑɑ kowɑ bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
I tɑbun gidi bɔrɑ yɔ̃rɑsio i Bɑbiloni wɔri. I kɔbɑ soowo kpɑ bwesenu nu mɛnnɑ. I nu sɔɔru koosio. I sinɑm be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Arɑrɑtiɔ kɑ Miniɔ kɑ Asikenɑsiɔ mɛnnɑmɑ bu Bɑbiloni tɑbu wɔri. I tɑbu sinɑmbu gɔsio kpɑ i de dumi yi se nge twee yi bu wɔri.
I bwesenu kpuro sɔɔru koosio n mɑm nɛɛre Mɛdibɑn sinɑmbu kɑ ben berɑ kɑ berɑn wirugibu kɑ sere tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben tem sɔɔ kpuro.
Wee tem mu yĩirimɔ. Yinni Gusunɔn himbɑ yɑ koo koorɑ Bɑbiloni sɔɔ. U koo de yu ko bɑnsu.
Yen tɑbu durɔbu bɑ koo kpɑnɑ bu mɑɑ tɑbu ko. Bɑ koo dɑ bu kuke kuku yee dɑmginu sɔɔ. Ben dɑm mu koo kpe, kpɑ bu ko nge tɔn kurɔbu. Ben gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔsu ko n wukiɑre, kpɑ bu ben yɛnusu dɔ̃ɔ doke.
Sɔmɔbu bɑ ko n dɑɑmɔ bɑ n wurɑmɑmɔ bu kɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko sɔ̃ mɑ bɑ win wuu mwɑ beri berikɑ.
Bɑ swɛɛ kpuro bɔɔrɑ. Bɑ mɑɑ kuku yenu kpuro dɔ̃ɔ mɛni. Mɑ tɑbu durɔbu bɑ wurure.
Amɛniwɑ Gusunɔ, Isirelibɑn Yinni wi u wɔllu kɑ tem mɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wee yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nɑ bu Bɑbilonigibu suriri kpɑ bu bu tɑɑku nge dobi yi yi wɑ̃ɑ doo soo yerɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ nɛɛ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u rɑɑ mɑn gurɑ, mɑ u mɑn deri nge weke diiru. U mɑn sɛ̃re nge yɑɑ gɔbɑ, mɑ u suɑ ye yɑ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ kpuro nɛ sɔɔ. Yen biru u nɛn tɔmbu girɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, Bɑbilonigii be, bu nɔni sɔ̃ɔro dɑm mɛ bɑ mɑn dɔren sɔ̃, kpɑ yɛm mɛ bɑ yɑri mi, mu wɔri ben wiru wɔllɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibun sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, wee, kon bɛɛ sɑnnɑ. Kon Bɑbilonin dɑɑnu kɑ yen bwii kpuro gberɑsiɑ.
Bɑbiloni koo kowɑ bɑnsu mi gbeeku bɔ̃nu nu ko n wɑ̃ɑ. Tɔnu kun ko n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, kpɑ bu ye yɛ̃ɛ.
Wee yen tɔmbɑ ginɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge gbee sinɑnsu si su kukirimɔ.
Adɑmɑ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ gɑ̀rì seewɑ, kon de bu tɑm nɔ sere n bɑndɑ, kpɑ bɑ n nuku dobu mɔ̀, kpɑ mu bu go, bu dweeyɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ seemɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Kon bu sɑkiriwɑ nge yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ bonu yɑɑ goo yerɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Bɑbilonin sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, ɑnnɑ ɑ wɑ mɑ Bɑbiloni, wuu bɔkɔ ge tɔmbɑ rɑɑ siɑrɑmɔ, yɑ wɔrumɑ. Wee, yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu bwesenu kpuron suunu sɔɔ.
Nim kurenu nu ye swee, mɑ nu ye wukiri.
Yen bɑru kpɑɑnu nu kuɑ bɑnsu, mɑ tem mu gberɑ mu kuɑ tem sɑɑrɑm. Goo kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Goo ku rɑ mɑɑ sɑre mi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, kon Bɑbilonin bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɛli seesi. Kon nùn siɑsiɑ ye u rɑɑ mwɛ, kpɑ tɔmbu bu ku mɑɑ nɑ win mi. Wee Bɑbilonin gbɑ̃rɑrɑ wɔrumɑ.
Bɛɛ, nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ, i yɑrio min di. Bɑɑwure u win wɑ̃ɑru wɔro nɛn mɔru bɑkɑ ye yɑ ween di.
I ku nɑndɑ. I ku mɑɑ diiri lɑbɑɑri ye yɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔn sɔ̃. Wɔ̃ɔ bɑɑgere kɑ gen lɑbɑɑriwɑ. Tɔmbu bɑ ko n dɑm diinɑmɔ, kpɑ sinɑmbu bɑ n seesinɑmɔ.
Adɑmɑ sɔ̃ɔ teeru kon Bɑbilonin bũnu seesi, kpɑ yen tem kpuron tɔmbu bu sekuru wɑ. Gonu nu ko n tɛriewɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuro.
Wɔllɔ kɑ temɔ kɑ yɑm kpuro, nuku dobun kuuki koo nɔɔrɑ Bɑbilonin sɔ̃. Domi yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, bu ye kpeerɑsiɑ.
Yen tɔmbɑ tɔn dɑbinu go hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ. Tɛ̃ yen tiin sɑɑ yɑ tunumɑ yu kɑ wɔrumɑ. Domi bɑ Isirelibɑ dɑbinu go.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛ be i kisirɑ ben nɔmɑn di, i ku mɑɑ yɔ̃rɑ mini. I doonɔ n tomɑ Bɑbilonin di. Sɑɑ min di, i Yinni Gusunɔ yɑɑyo kɑ bɛɛn wuu Yerusɑlɛmu.
Mɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ nuɑ bɑ sun wɔmmɔ, sekurɑ rɑ sun mwɛwɑ. Sɑnɑm mɛ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru wɔri bɑ kɔsukɑ, sekurɑ sun mwɑwɑ.
Adɑmɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee, tɔ̃nu sisi nì sɔɔ u koo Bɑbilonin bũnu seesi, kpɑ be bɑ mɛɛrɑ wɑn wuri yi nɔɔrɑ tem kpuro sɔɔ.
Bɑɑ Bɑbilonigibu bɑ̀ n seewɑ bɑ dɑ wɔllɔ, bɑɑ bɑ̀ n ben gbɑ̃rɑnun dɑm sosi sere goo kun kpɛ̃ u dɑ mi, kɑ mɛ, u koo de yibɛrɛbɑ bu bu wɔri bu kɑm koosiɑ.
Kɑm kobu Bɑbilonin tem deemɑ, mɑ kuuki nɔɔrɑmɔ yen wusu sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u ben wusu kɑm koosiɑ. U koo de ben kuuki yi kpe. Yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wee bɑ wɔki nge nim wɔ̃ku.
Bɑ wee bu Bɑbilonigii be wɔri, kpɑ bu ben tɑbu kowo dɑmgibu mwɛɛri bu ben tɛnnu bɔɔku. Domi Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni wi u rɑ bɑɑwure kɔsie ye u kuɑ.
U sɑ̃ɑwɑ sunɔ. Win yĩsirɑ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni. U nɛɛ, u koo de tɑm mu Bɑbilonin sinɑmbu go, kɑ ben bwisigibu kɑ ben tem yɛ̃robu kɑ ben wirugibu kɑ ben tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu kpɑ bu dweeyɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ bɑ kun mɑɑ seewe.
Bɑbilonin gbɑ̃rɑ bɑkɑ ni, nu koo wɔrumɑ. Nin kɔnnɔ bɑkɑ si, su koo dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ. Nge mɛyɑ sɔmbu te bɑ kuɑ gbɑ̃rɑ ten sɔ̃, tɑ koo kɑm ko. Ben hɑniɑ kpuro yɑ koo kɑm kowɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ.
Serɑyɑ, Nɛriyɑn bii, Mɑseyɑn debubu, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Sedesiɑsi, Yudɑbɑn sinɑ bokon sɔm kowobun wirugii. Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ bɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ wi kɑ sinɑ boko.
Yerɑ Yeremi u yoruɑ tireru sɔɔ kɔ̃sɑ ye yɑ koo Bɑbiloni deemɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ gɑri kpuro yi Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ Bɑbilonin sɔ̃.
Mɑ u Serɑyɑ yiire u nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ turɑ Bɑbiloniɔ, ɑ kookɑri koowo ɑ gɑri yini gɑri kɑ dɑm tɔmbu bu nɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ kɑnɑru ko ɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, wunɑ ɑ geruɑ ɑ nɛɛ, goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ Bɑbiloniɔ sere kɑ yɛɛyɔ. Yɑ koo kowɑ bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
À n tire te gɑrɑ ɑ kpɑ, ɑ tu kperu gbinisio kpɑ ɑ tu kpɛ̃ɛ dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Efɑrɑtiɔ,
kpɑ ɑ nɛɛ, nge mɛ tire te, tɑ numɑ mi, nge mɛyɑ Bɑbiloni yɑ koo kɑm ko. Yɑ ǹ mɑɑ seemɔ, kɔ̃sɑ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u ye suremɔn sɔ̃. Yɑ koo wɔrumɑwɑ kpɑ yɑ kun mɑɑ dɑm mɔ. Yeremin gɑrin kpurowɑ mi.
Wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ tiɑ Sedesiɑsi u mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u bɑndu di Yudɑɔ. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑ bɑndu sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Win mɛron yĩsirɑ Hɑmutɑli, Yeremi, Libinɑgiin bii.
Sedesiɑsi wi, kɔ̃sɑ u kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ. U kuɑ mɑm mɑm nge mɛ Yoyɑkimu u rɑɑ kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu kɑ Yudɑbɑ mɔru kuɑ, mɑ u bu girɑ win wuswɑɑn di. Mɑ Sedesiɑsi u Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko seesi.
Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ nnɛsen suru wɔkurusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse, yerɑ Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u nɑ kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kpuro bu kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri. Mɑ bɑ ben sɑnsɑni girɑ gbɑ̃rɑrun gɑ̃ɑrɔ. Miyɑ bɑ kuku yenu gbɑ gbɑ bɑ kɑ gbɑ̃rɑ te sikerenɑ.
Mɑ bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu ye tɑrusi sere n kɑ kuɑ Sedesiɑsin bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑse.
Wɔ̃ɔ gen suru nnɛsen sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ nnɛse sɔɔ, yerɑ gɔ̃ɔrɑ wuu ge nɛnuɑ. Domi dĩɑnu mɑɑ sɑri tem mɛ sɔɔ ni tɔmbɑ koo di.
Yerɑ bɑ gbɑ̃rɑru yɑbɑ, mɑ Yerusɑlɛmun tɑbu kowobu kpuro bɑ duki yɑkikirɑ wɔ̃kuru. Bɑ yɑrɑ sɑɑ kɔnnɔn di ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑ̃rɑru yirun bɑɑ sɔɔ sinɑ bokon dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑrun bɔkuɔ. N deemɑ sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Bɑbilonigibɑ wuu ge sikerenɛ. Be bɑ duki yɑkikirɑ mi, bɑ kpɑwɑ kɑ swɑɑ ye yɑ dɔɔ Yuudɛnin wɔwɑ giɑ.
Mɑ Bɑbilonin tɑbu kowobu bɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi nɑɑ girɑ, bɑ nùn mwɑ Yerikon wɔwɑɔ. Yerɑ win tɑbu kowobu kpuro bɑ yɑrinɑ bɑ nùn deri.
Bɑbilonigii be, bɑ sinɑ boko Sedesiɑsi mwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ ben sinɑ bokon mi Ribilɑɔ, Hɑmɑtin temɔ. Mɑ u nùn siri.
U derɑ bɑ Sedesiɑsin bibu kɑ Yudɑn wirugibu kpuro sɑkirɑ wi, Sedesiɑsin tiin nɔni biru Ribilɑ mi.
Mɑ u Sedesiɑsin tiin nɔni wɔwɑ u nùn bɔkuɑ kɑ sii gɑndun yɔni. Yen biru, u nùn suɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ u nùn doke pirisɔm sɔɔ sere u kɑ gu.
Yenibɑn biru, Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑn bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu tiɑ sɑrise sɔɔ, yen suru nɔɔbusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse, yerɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ bokon kɔ̃sobun guro guro u nɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Mɑ u Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, kɑ sinɑ kpɑɑru, kɑ yɛnu si su tie Yerusɑlɛmu mi kpuro, kɑɑ sere gere dɑmgibun yɛnusu?
Mɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ wi, kɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑru kɔsukɑ bɑ sururɑ.
Mɑ bɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu gɑbu yoru mwɛɛrɑ kɑ be bɑ tie wuu ge sɔɔ kɑ be bɑ tii wɛ̃ kɑ sere nɔmɑn sɔm kowobu.
Adɑmɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ u bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛ ben gɑbu deri bu kɑ resɛm gbɑɑnu kɑ gbeɑ wuku.
Yen biru, Bɑbilonigii be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten torom gɑ̃ritii suɑ kɑ kɑɑtonu kɑ wobɑ kɑ nɔri kɑ gbɛ̃ɑ yè sɔɔ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku yɛm doke kɑ sere sɑ̃ɑ yee ten dendi yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu. Mɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten gberebɑ sururɑ yi bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu, mɑ bɑ boo sii gɑnduguu ge kɔsukɑ kɑ gen yɔ̃rɑtii. Yen biru, bɑ sii gɑn ni kpuro gurɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
<range>
Mɑ kɔ̃sobun guro guro wi, u mɑɑ gbɛ̃ɛ yorukunu suɑ kɑ dɔ̃ɔ gurɑtii kɑ nɔri kɑ torom gɑ̃ritii kɑ gbɛ̃ɑ yè sɔɔ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku yɛm doke, kɑ dɑbunu. Ye kpurowɑ bɑ gurɑ ye bɑ gesi kuɑ mi kɑ wurɑ kɑ sii geesu.
Gbere yiru ye, kɑ boo sii gɑnduguu ge, kɑ sere kɛtɛn weenɑsii wɔkurɑ yiru ye yɑ boo ge sɔɔwɑ, ye sinɑ boko Sɑlomɔɔ u kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yee ten sɔ̃, goo kun yen bunum geeru yɛ̃.
Gbere yiru ye, yɑ gunum nɛwɑ. Yen bɑɑyeren gunum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu yiru sɑri. Mɑ yen bɔɔrum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu wɔkurɑ yiru. Yen bɑɑyere yɑ wem mɔwɑ. Mɑ sii si bɑ kɑ ye kuɑn sinum mu sɑ̃ɑ nɔm tɑrɑrun sɑkɑ.
Bɑ yen bɑɑyere furɔ dokeɑ ge bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu. Furɔ gen bɑɑgeren dɛ̃ɛbu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu, mɑ bɑ gen bɑɑgere sii yɔni kɑ dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum weenɑsii gore bɑ kɑ sikerenɑ. Bɑ ye kpuro kuɑwɑ kɑ sii gɑndu.
Dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum weenɑsii wunɔbuwɑ (100) bɑ gen bɑɑgere goreɑ bɑ kɑ sikerenɑ. Adɑmɑ wunɔbu nnɛ sɑriwɑ bɑ koo kpĩ bu wɑ sɑɑ tem di.
Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ sinɑ bokon kɔ̃sobun guro guro wi, u Serɑyɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero mwɑ kɑ Sofoni wi u sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowo Serɑyɑn yiruse kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔn kɔ̃sobu itɑ,
kɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrun tɑbu kowobun wirugii goo, kɑ tɔmbu nɔɔbɑ yiru gɑbu be bɑ rɑ kɑ sinɑ boko wesiɑnɛ kɑ tɑbu kowobun wirugiin tire yoro wi u rɑ tɑbu kowobun yĩsɑ yore tireru sɔɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ tɔmbu wɑtɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wuugibu.
Be kpurowɑ u mwɛɛrɑ, mɑ u bu kpɑrɑ u kɑ dɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon mi Ribilɑɔ.
Mɑ sinɑ boko u bu so so. Mɑ u derɑ bɑ bu go Ribilɑ mi, Hɑmɑtin temɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ n tomɑ ben tem di.
Yudɑ be Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ u yoru mwɛɛrɑ u kɑ dɑ win temɔ win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiruse sɔɔ, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ itɑ kɑ yɛndɑ itɑ (3.023).
Be u mɑɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndu yiru sɑrise sɔɔ, ben geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɛnɛ kɑ tɛnɑ kɑ yiru (832).
Win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ itɑse sɔɔ, yerɑ Nɛbusɑrɑdɑ wi, u tɔmbu nɑtɑ kɑ wunɑɑ weeru kɑ nɔɔbu (745) mwɛɛrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ u kɑ dɑ. Yudɑ be bɑ mwɛɛrɑ mi kpuro, ben geerɑ kuɑwɑ tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ nnɛ kɑ nɑtɑ (4.600).
Efili Mɛrodɑki Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko, win bɑndun wɔ̃ɔ gbiikuu sɔɔ, yerɑ u Yoyɑkini Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko wɔlle suɑ mɑ u nùn yɑrɑ pirisɔm di win yoru dibun wɔ̃ɔ weeru itɑ sɑrise sɔɔ, yen suru wɔkurɑ yirusen sɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ nɔɔbuse sɔɔ.
U kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ kɑ kĩru mɑ u win bɑndu wɔlle suɑ n kere sinɑm be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑbiloni mi, kɑ wi sɑnnu.
Mɑ u win pirisɔm yɑ̃nu kɔsɑ, u derɑ u rɑ di kɑ wi, sinɑ boko sɑnnu sere kɑ win wɑ̃ɑrun nɔrɔ.
Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wiyɑ u rɑ nùn nɔɔri bɑɑdommɑ kpɑ u nùn wɛ̃ yèn bukɑtɑ u mɔ kpuro sere u dɑ u kɑ gu.
Yerusɑlɛmu yè sɔɔ tɔmbɑ rɑɑ dɑbi, wee yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ye tɔnɑ, yɑ kuɑ nge gɔmini. Yɑ rɑɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ. Wee tɛ̃ bɑ ye yoru diisiɑmɔ.
Yɑ wuri mɔ̀ wɔ̃ku giriru mɑ yen nɔni yĩresu kokumɔ. Be bɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yen kĩnɑsibu, ben goo sɑri wi u ye nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑmɔ. Be kpuro bɑ kuɑwɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑribɑ, mɑ bɑ kuɑ yen yibɛrɛbɑ.
Bɑ Yudɑbɑ gurɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ tem tukumɔ. Mɛyɑ, bɑ bu dɑm dɔremɔ bɑ yoru diisiɑmɔ. Bɑ ku rɑ n wɛ̃rɑbu mɔ. Ben yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bu wɔri subɑru sɔɔ bɑ deemɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru gɑru sɔɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ wɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ, domi bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ yen swɛɛ sĩ bu tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru nɑ. Goo kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yen gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔwɔ. Yen yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ weeweenu mɔ̀. Yen wɔndiɑbɑn nuki sɑnkirɑ. Yen tii yɑ wɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑ bɑkɑru sɔɔ.
Yen yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ ye tɑbu di, mɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u ye nuku sɑnkirɑ ni kpɛ̃ɛ yen torɑ dɑbinun sɔ̃. Wee yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ yen bibu kpɑrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ bɑ yoru diisiɑmɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmun bɛɛrɛ yɑ kpɑ. Mɑ yen wirugibu bɑ kɑ gini weenɛ yi yi ǹ yɑkɑsu wɑ yi di. Yi ǹ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ mɑ yi duki mɔ̀ tɑɑson wuswɑɑn di.
Sɑɑ yeni sɔɔ, Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ, yen tɔmbɑ yɑɑyɑɑre mɔ̀. Yerɑ yɑ yɑɑyɑ gɑ̃ɑ gee ni yɑ rɑɑ mɔ yellu. Sɑnɑm mɛ yen yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ ye kɑmiɑ, yɑ goo biɑ u nɑ u ye somi, mɑ n yibɛrɛ be dore, bɑ ye yɑɑkoru koosimɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ torɑ too. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ye tusɑ. Be bɑ rɑɑ ye doke, bɑ̀ n yen bɑnsu wɑ bɑ rɑ ye gɛmwɑ. Wee, yen tii, yɑ weeweenu mɔ̀, yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ.
Wee, yen durum yĩreru tɑ wɑ̃ɑ yen yɑberɔ. Adɑmɑ yɑ ǹ dɑɑ yen kpeeru bwisikɑ. Yɑ wɔrumɑ subɑru sɔɔ goo kun ye nukuru yɛmiɑsie. Mɑ yɑ nɔɔgiru suɑ yɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ nɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑru mɛɛrio. A mɛɛrio nge mɛ yibɛrɛ u tii sue.
Wee, bɑ nɛn gɑ̃ɑ gee ni nɑ mɔ gurɑ. Wee, bwese tuku ni ɑ yinɑ nu n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wunɛn tɔmbu sɑnnu, nu duɑ wunɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Wee, Yerusɑlɛmugibu kpuro bɑ wɑsire bɑ dĩɑnu kɑsu ni bɑ koo di. Mɑ bɑ kɑ ben gɑ̃ɑ geenu dĩɑ ni kɔsinɑ bu wɑ bɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɛɛrio nge mɛ nɑ wɔnwɔndu soore.
Bɛɛyɑ nɑ kɑ yɑ̃, bɛɛ be i sɑrɔ mini kpuro. I mɛɛrio nɔni swɑ̃ɑru gɑru tɑ̀ n mɑɑ nɛgii teni kere, te Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn kpɛ̃ɛ win mɔrun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Sɑɑ wɔllun di n sɑ̃ɑre u dɔ̃ɔ suremɑ nɛn wɑsi sɔɔ, mɑ u mɑn di. U nɛn nɑɑsu yinɑ bɛriɑ. Mɑ u mɑn surɑ gbɑru gbɑrɑ u mɑn kpɛ̃ɛ nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
U nɛn torɑnu kpuro mɛnnɑ nge wɛ̃ɛ yi bɑ tɑrɑ. Mɑ u nu gbinisi nɛn wĩirɔ. U nɛn dɑm buɑ. Mɑ u mɑn yibɛrɛ nɔmu bɛriɑ mi nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n kɑ tii yinɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛn tɑbu kowobu sururɑ. U tɑbu durɔbu mɛnnɑ bu kɑ nɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑm koosiɑ. U nɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu tɑɑkɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ resɛm tɑɑku.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ wurɑ mɔ̀, nɑ nɔni yĩresu kokumɔ. Wi u koo mɑn nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ u mɑn wɑ̃ɑru wesiɑ, u mɑn deri. Nɛn bibɑ nuki sɑnkire, domi yibɛrɛ u mɑn kɑmiɑ.
Nɑ nɔmɑ yiiyɑ nɑ kɑnɑru kuɑ. Adɑmɑ goo kun nɛ u mɑn nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ be bɑ kɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ sikerenɛ bɑ kuɑ nɛn yibɛrɛbɑ, mɑ bɑ mɑn gɑrisi disi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u gem mɔ ye u kɑ kuɑ mɛ. Domi nɑ ǹ win gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bɛɛ bwesenu kpuro, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ, kpɑ i nɛn nuku sɑnkirɑnu wɑ. Nɛn wɔndiɑbɑ kɑ nɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bɑ yoru dɑ tem tukumɔ.
Nɑ nɛn kĩnɑsibu somiru kɑnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ mɑn bɔrɔ kɔ̃ɔru kuɑ. Nɛn yɑ̃ku kowobu kɑ wuun guro gurobu bɑ gu nɛn swɛɛ sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ dĩɑnu kɑsu ni bɑ koo di bɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ nɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑru mɛɛrio, nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ kun kpĩ. Nɑ nuki sɑnkire too, domi nɑ ǹ nun mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Tɔɔwɔ tɑbu sun dimɔ. Mɑ wuun sɔɔwɔ gɔɔ wɑ̃ɑ.
Bɑ nɛn weeweenu nuɑ. Adɑmɑ goo kun mɑn nukuru yɛmiɑsie. Yibɛrɛbɑn nukurɑ dorɑ, yèn sɔ̃ ɑ mɑn kuɑ mɛ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑ de tɔ̃ɔ te, tu nɑ te ɑ geruɑ mi, kpɑ bu ko nge nɛ.
A ben nuku kɔ̃suru mɛɛrio, kpɑ ɑ bu kuɑ nge mɛ ɑ mɑn kuɑ nɛn durum kpɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃. A mɛɛrio nge mɛ nɑ weeweenu mɔ̀, nɛn nuki sɑnkire.
Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru bɑkɑ yɑ seewɑ. Mɑ yɑ Yerusɑlɛmu wukiri nge guru wii bɑkɑru. Yen bɛɛrɛ ye yɑ rɑɑ girɑri sere guru winɔ, u ye kɑrɑ u kɔ̃ temɔ. Win mɔru yen sɑɑ sɔɔ, u ǹ yɑɑye mɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ sɑ̃ɑ win nɑɑ sɔnditiɑ.
U Isirelibɑn wɑ̃ɑ yenu kɑ ben wusun gbɑ̃rɑnu kpuro sururɑ kɑ mɔru wɔnwɔndu sɑri. Ni wee nu wɔrukɑ temɔ. U ben bɑndu kɑ ten wirugibun dɑm buɑ.
U Isirelibɑn dɑm kpuro buɑ win mɔru bɑkɑn sɔ̃. U tii bɔkuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bu wɔrim nɑ. Mɑ u Isireli be dɔ̃ɔ kɑre, mɑ dɔ̃ɔ wi, u bu di beri berikɑ.
U bu win tɛndu gɑwe kɑ win nɔm geu. Mɑ u bu yĩisi nge yibɛrɛ, u kpuro go ye yɑ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben nɔni sɔɔ. U derɑ win mɔru yɑburɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ ben wɑ̃ɑ yenɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Isirelibɑ wɔri nge yibɛrɛ. U bu mwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ u ben dii geenu di. U ben gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsukɑ, mɑ u derɑ wuri yi nɔɔrɑmɔ bɑɑmɑ ben suunu sɔɔ.
U win sɑ̃ɑ yeru kɔsukɑ. U derɑ bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnu kɑ tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru di. Win mɔru seewɑ kɑ dɑm. Mɑ u sinɑ boko kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu yinɑ.
U win sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi bɑ rɑ nùn yɑ̃kuru kue biru kisi. U yibɛrɛbɑ Yerusɑlɛmun dii geenu nɔmu bɛriɑ. Mɑ wɔkinu nɔɔrɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi, nge tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnun sɑɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔ̃ru doke u Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsuku. Wee u nu kɔsukɑ kpuro mɑm mɑm. Yɑ kuɑ wɔnwɔndu bɑɑmɑ kpuro. Gbɑ̃rɑnu yiru ye kpuro yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu.
Yen kɔnnɔsu su numɑ temɔ. Sin dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ rɑ kɑ su sɛ̃suku yɑ bɔɔkirɑ. Mɑ bɑ yen sinɑ boko kɑ yen wirugibu gurɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Woodɑ mɑɑ sɑri. Bɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ̃sinu wɑɑmɔ win min di.
Wee, yen guro gurobu bɑ sɔ̃ temɔ bɑ nɔsu mɑɑri. Bɑ tii torom wisi winɔ, bɑ sɑɑki deewɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Mɑ yen wɔndiɑbɑ bɑ sɔ̃ bɑ tuke.
Nɛn nɔni yɑndɑmɔ wurin sɔ̃. Nɛn wɑsi gbisimɔ mɑ nɛn tororɑ kɑre. Domi nɛn tɔmbɑ kɑm kuɑ. Wee, bii wɛ̃ɛnu kɑ bibu bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ.
Bɑ ben mɛrobu sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, mɑnɑ sɑ ko dĩɑnu wɑ. Mɑ bɑ wɔrukumɔ swɛɛ sɔɔ nge be bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ. Gɑbɑ gbisukumɔ ben mɛron tororu wɔllɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmu, mbɑ kon nun sɔ̃. Mbɑ kon kɑ nun weesinɑ. Wɑrɑ u mɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre nge wunɛ, n kɑ kpĩ n nun nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ. Domi wunɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑrɑ kpɑ̃ nge nim wɔ̃kun nim. Goo sɑri wi u koo kpĩ u tu kpeesiɑ.
Wunɛn sɔmɔbu bɑ nun gɑri weesugii sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Bɑ ǹ nun wunɛn torɑnu sɔ̃ɔsi bu kɑ nun gbɑrɑ yorun di. Gɑri weesugiiyɑ bɑ nun sɔ̃ɔwɑ yi yi nun nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ.
Wee, tɛ̃ wi u sɑrɔ u rɑ nun tɑkɑ koosiwɑ u yɛ̃ɛ, kpɑ u wiɑ ko u nɛɛ, wuu geniwɑ bɑ rɑ rɑɑ soku wuu burɔ, gèn sɔ̃ hɑnduniɑn tɔmbu kpuro bɑ rɑ n nuku dobu mɔ̀?
Kpɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ n nɔɔ tɛndu bɛri bɑ n nun yɛ̃ɛmɔ bɑ n mɔ̀, sɑ nun mwɛ nge dĩɑ dɔkɑ. Wee, tɔ̃ɔ te sɑ mɑrɑ tɑ tunumɑ, sɑ tu wɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kuɑ ye u gɔ̃ru doke. U yibiɑ ye u geruɑ sɑɑ yellun di u nɛɛ, u koo ko. Wee u wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmu kɑm kuɑ. U ǹ wunɛn wɔnwɔndu wɑ. U derɑ yibɛrɛbɑn nukurɑ dorɑ wunɛn sɔ̃, domi u bu dɑm kɑ̃.
Yerusɑlɛmu, ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɔɔgiru sueyo, ɑ de u wunɛn wuri nɔ. A nɔni yĩresu kokuo nge dɑɑru. A ku wɛ̃rɑ, ɑ ku wuri mɑri.
A seewo ɑ wuri ko wɔ̃kuru, ɑ wunɛn gɔ̃ru kpuro kusiɑ Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ. A nɔmɑ yiiyo ɑ nùn kɑnɑ wunɛn bibun sɔ̃ be bɑ gbimɔ swɛɛ sɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ mɛɛrio ɑ wɑ. Wɑrɑ ɑ kuɑre nge mɛ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ derɑ tɔn kurɔbɑ ben bibu temɑ be bɑ kĩ mi. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ derɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ mɑɑ wunɛn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu go wunɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Wee bukurobu kɑ bibun gonu nu kpĩ swɛɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ nɛn wɔndiɑbɑ kɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ. A derɑ bɑ bu sɑkirɑ wɔnwɔndu sɑri, wunɛn mɔrun sɑɑ.
A nɛn yibɛrɛ be nɑ nɑsie sokusiɑ bɑɑmɑn di bɑ mɛnnɑ nge tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrun sɑɑ. Yen dɔmɑ te, goo kun kisire. Goo kun mɑɑ seewe bii be nɑ kĩ nɑ seeyɑ sɔɔ. A derɑ nɛn yibɛrɛ u bu go kpuro.
Nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔnu wi u nɔni swɑ̃ɑru yɛ̃ te tɑ nɑ Yinni Gusunɔn mɔrun sɔ̃.
U derɑ nɑ dɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ, mi yɑm bururɑm sɑri.
Nɛ turowɑ u nɔmɑ doke bururu kɑ yokɑ.
U derɑ nɑ woorɑ sɑɑ nɛn wirun di sere kɑ nɛn nɑɑsɔ. N sɑ̃ɑre u nɛn kukunu kɔsukɑ,
u kɑ mɑn nuku sɑnkirɑnu kɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru bunɑnɑ nge gbɑ̃rɑru.
U derɑ nɑ dɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ nge gɔri be bɑ gu n tɛ.
U mɑn gbɑ̃rɑru bunɑnɑ n ku kɑ yɑri, mɑ u mɑn bɔkuɑ kɑ yɔni dɑmgii.
Mɑ nɑ nɔɔgiru suɑ nɑ somiru kɑnɑ. Adɑmɑ u ǹ mɑn swɑɑ dɑki u sere nɛn kɑnɑru mwɑ.
U nɛn swɑɑ kɛnuɑ kɑ kpee bɑkɑnu, u ye go.
U kukuɑ u mɑn mɑrɑ nge gbeeku bɔ̃ɔ ge gɑ yɑɑ mɑrɑ. U mɑn mɑrɑ nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ yɑɑ yɔɔru bwɛ̃ɛyɛ.
U nɛn swɛɛ bɔɔrɑ, mɑ u mɑn mwɑ u gɛ̃ɛkɑ. U mɑn deri biti sɔɔ.
U win tɛndu bɛri mɑ u mɑn kuɑ nge yɑɑ ye u koo to.
U nɛn yɛ̃sɑ yɑburɑ kɑ sɛ̃ɛnu.
Mɑ tɔmbu kpuro bɑ mɑn yɛ̃ɛmɔ bɑ womusu dokemɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere.
U derɑ nɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ mɑ nuku sɑnkirɑrɑ mɑn goomɔ nge tɑm.
U derɑ nɑ kpenu temɑ mɑ nɛn donnu bɔɔkirɑ. Mɑ u mɑn torom wisi.
U derɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ nuku dobu mɔ.
Mɑ nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu yĩiyɔ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn mi.
Nɑ̀ n nɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑru yɑɑyɑ, n dɑ n sɑ̃ɑrewɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ sosurɑrun nimɑ nɑ nɔrɑ kɑ dɛ̃ɛ.
Nɑ̀ n yenibɑ kpuro yɑɑyɑ, nɑ rɑ wururewɑ.
Adɑmɑ wee ye yɑ mɑn yĩiyɔbu wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Nɑ kĩ n tii ye yɑɑyɑsiɑ n gere.
Yerɑ, Yinni Gusunɔn durom kun kpɑ, win wɔnwɔndɑ kun mɑɑ nɔru kue.
Tɑ rɑ n wurɑmɑmɔwɑ bururu bɑɑtere. Win bɔrɔkiniru tɑ kpɑ̃.
Nɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛgii. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ yĩiyɔbu mɔ wi sɔɔ.
U rɑ wi u nùn nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ kĩru sɔ̃ɔsi, kpɑ u wi u nùn kɑsu durom kuɑ.
Yɑ wɑ̃ tɔnu ù n Gusunɔn somiru mɑrɑ kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu.
Yɑ wɑ̃ tɔnu u Gusunɔn yoru wurɑ win ɑluwɑɑsiru sɔɔ.
Ù n lɑɑkɑri mɛɛribu gɑbu wɑ, u tii gɑwo sɛ̃ɛ u dɑ u n wɑ̃ɑ wi turo, domi Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u nùn bu kpɛ̃ɛ.
U n nùn wiru kpĩiyɛ win nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ, kpɑ u n yĩiyɔ mɑ u koo nùn somi.
U wi u nùn bɑɑrɑ soomɔ bɑɑru tĩiyɔ u sɔmɛ, kpɑ u wurɑ bu nùn wɔmɛ.
Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u ku rɑ tɔnu biru kisi kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Bɑɑ ù n derɑ yɛ̃ro u nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ, kɑ mɛ, u nùn kĩ too, domi win wɔnwɔndɑ kpɑ̃.
N ǹ win kĩru u kɑ tɔnu nɔni sɔ̃, kpɑ u nùn nuki sɑnku.
Yinni Gusunɔ u yɛ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ yobu nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ bɑ tɑɑkumɔ. U yɛ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ ǹ tɔmbu kuɑmmɛ nge mɛ n weenɛ. U yɛ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ ǹ bu siriɑmmɛ dee dee.

Goo kun kpɛ̃ u nɛɛ, gɑ̃ɑnu nu kooro, Yinni Gusunɔ ù kun nin woodɑ wɛ̃.
Wi, Gusunɔ Wɔrukoo wiyɑ u rɑ de geɑ kɑ kɔ̃sɑ yu nɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ tɔnu u ko n weeweenu mɔ̀. U de u weeweenu ko win durum sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, i de su bɛsɛn dɑɑ mɛɛri kpɑ su ye wɛ̃ɛri su wɑ su kɑ gɔsirɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔn mi.
Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ wɔllɔ. I de su nɔmɑ yiiyɑ su nùn kɑnɑ.
Su nɛɛ, Yinni, sɑ durum kuɑ, sɑ nun seesi. A ǹ sun suuru kue.
A tii beruɑ wunɛn mɔru bɑkɑn sɔ̃, mɑ ɑ sun nɑɑ girɑ ɑ go wɔnwɔndu sɑri.
A duɑ guru wiru sɔɔ ɑ ku kɑ bɛsɛn kɑnɑru nɔn sɔ̃.
A derɑ bɑ sun gɑrisi nge kubɑnu bwesenun suunu sɔɔ.
Bɛsɛn yibɛrɛbɑ kpuro bɑ sun nɔɔ kuurimɔ.
Ye yɑ sun tie, yerɑ nɑndɑbu kɑ bɛrum, domi bɑ bɛsɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑ, bɛsɛn tem mu kuɑ bɑnsu.
Wee nɑ nɔni yĩresu kokumɔ yèn sɔ̃ nɛn tɔmbɑ kɑm kuɑ.
Nɛn nɔni yĩresu kokumɔ, su ǹ yɔ̃re,
nɑ kɑ mɑrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛn lɑɑkɑri koomɑ wɔllun di,
kpɑ u wɑ mɑ ye yɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu deemɑmɔ, yɑ nɛn nuki sɑnkɑ.
Be bɑ mɑn tusɑ kɑm sɔɔ bɑ mɑn nɑɑ girɑ nge gunɔ.
Bɑ kĩ bu nɛn wɑ̃ɑru kpeesiɑ wɔru sɔɔ. Bɑ mɑn kpenu kɑsukɑ.
Nim mu mɑn mwɛɛmɔ, mɑ nɑ nɛɛ, nɑ kɑm kuɑwɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, nɑ kɑnɑru kuɑ nɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ nun sokɑ sɑɑ wɔru ge sɔɔn di,
mɑ ɑ nɛn nɔɔ nuɑ. A ku wunɛn swɑɑ kɔre. A nɛn wuri kɑ nɛn weeweenu nɔɔwɔ.
