Dɔmɑ te, ɑ mɑn susi, ɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɑ nɛɛ, n ku bɛrum ko.
Yinni ɑ mɑn siriɑ mɑ ɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru yɑkiɑ.
A wɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ mɑn kuɑ, ɑ mɑn sirio.
A wɑ mɔru ye bɑ mɑn kɔsiemɔ kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ bu kɑ mɑn seesi.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ ben wɔmɑ nuɑ ye bɑ mɑn koosimɔ.
A ben nɔɔ tiɑ wɑ ye bɑ mɑn koosi bɑ kɑ mɑn gerusimɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere.
Ye bɑ mɔ̀ kpuro sɔɔ gesi, nɛnɑ bɑ rɑ n womu dokemɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ kɑɑ bu kɔsie nge mɛ ben kookoosu nɛ.
Kɑɑ ben gɔ̃run nɔni wɔ̃ke kpɑ ɑ de wunɛn bɔ̃ri yi n sɑ̃ɑ ben bɑɑ.
Kɑɑ bu nɑɑ girɑ kɑ mɔru bɑkɑ kpɑ ɑ bu kpeerɑsiɑ bɑ kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun wurɑ geɑ ye, yɑ tĩrɑ. Ten kpenu nu yɑri swɛɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Yerusɑlɛmun tɔn be bɑ rɑɑ gɑrisi nge wurɑ geɑ, bɑ gisɔ bu gɑrisiwɑ nge tem mɔnnu.
Bɑɑ kɑ gbeeku bɔ̃nɔ, nu rɑ nin binu bom kɛ̃. Adɑmɑ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ ǹ ben bibun wɔnwɔndu mɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge tɑɑtɑɑ niru te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ.
Bɑ derɑ ben bii wɛ̃ɛnun yɑri mɑni nin dɑrosu sɔɔ nim nɔrun sɔ̃. Bibu bɑ dĩɑnu kɑsu, ɑdɑmɑ goo sɑri wi u koo bu wɛ̃.
Be bɑ rɑ rɑɑ dĩɑ geenu di, bɑ gbisukumɔ swɛɛ sɔɔ. Be bɑ seeyɑ doo nɔɔru sɔɔ, bɑ kubɑnu bũurimɔ.
Nɛn tɔmbun sɛɛyɑsiɑbu bu kpɑ̃, bu Sodomugibu kere, wuu ge Yinni Gusunɔ u kpeerɑsiɑ nɔni kpɑki teeru goon nɔmɑ sɑri mi sɔɔ.
Ben sinɑ bibu bɑ rɑɑ wɛ̃su bururɑm kere. Bɑ mɑm bom bekum bururɑm kere. Ben wɑsin gɔnɑ rɑ n sɔ̃riwɑ kpɑ ben wuswɑɑ yɑ n bɑllimɔ nge kpee gobiginu.
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ bɑ dɔ̃ɔ durom tĩrɑm kere. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ bu tubu swɛɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ woorewɑ sere ben gɔnɑ yɑ kukunu mɑni. Mɑ ben wɑsi gbere nge dɑ̃ɑ gbebɑ.
Be bɑ gbimɔ tɑbu sɔɔ, ben gɔɔ burɑm bo n kere be bɑ rɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre bu woorɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃ bu sere gbi.
Bɑɑ mɛ bii mɛrobu bɑ ben bibu kĩ too, kɑ mɛ, bɑ bu yikumɔ bɑ dimɔ wɑhɑlɑ ye yɑ be, nɛn tɔmbu deemɑn sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u win mɔru kpuro sɔ̃ɔsi, u Yerusɑlɛmu dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃re mɑ yɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ sere kɑ yen kpɛɛkpɛɛkuɔ.
Sinɑ boko goo ǹ kun mɛ tɔn diro goo sɑri hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ wi u rɑɑ tɑmɑɑ yibɛrɛ u koo kpĩ u du Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑrun kɔnnɔn di.
Wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ yeni yɑ nɑwɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobun torɑnun sɔ̃. Domi berɑ bɑ be bɑ ǹ torɑnu gɑnu kuen yɛm yɑri Yerusɑlɛmun swɛɛ sɔɔ.
Bɑ rɑ n sirenɛwɑ swɛɛ sɔɔ bɑ n bɑbi nge wɔ̃kobu bɑ n disi sɔɔwɑ tɔmbun yɛm sɔ̃. Goo kun kɑ̃kɔ u mɑm ben yɑ̃nu bɑbɑ.
Bɑ̀ n dɑ tɔmbun bɔkuɔ, bɑ rɑ bu girewɑ bu nɛɛ, i doonɔ minin di, bɛɛ disigibu. I ku susimɑ i sun bɑbɑ. Yerɑ bɑ rɑ doonɛ min di bɑ kun yɛ̃ mi bɑ dɔɔ. Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ, nu rɑ bu sɔ̃wɑ nu nɛɛ, i ku sinɑ bɛsɛn suunu sɔɔ mini n kɑ tɛ.
Yinni Gusunɔn tii u bu yɑrinɑsiɑ kɑ mɔru. U ǹ kĩ u bu wɑ. U ǹ ben yɑ̃ku kowo goo doke gɑ̃ɑnu. U ǹ mɑɑ ben durɔ tɔkɔnun wɔnwɔndu kue.
Sɑ swɑɑ mɛɛrɑ sɑ wɑsirɑ su kɑ wɑ mìn di somirɑ koo sun nɑɑwɑ. Sɑ rɑɑ bweseru gɑru mɛɛrɑ te sɑ yĩiyɔ tɑ koo sun fɑɑbɑ ko. Wee, tɑ ǹ sun fɑɑbɑ kue.
Yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ bɛsɛn sɑnu sɑnusu mɛɛrɑ, bu kɑ sun yinɑri su dɑ wuun bɑtumɑ sɔɔ. Bɛsɛn gɔɔ turuku kuɑ. Bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃rɑ kpɑwɑ mi.
Bɛsɛn yibɛrɛ be, bɑ gunɔ bɑkeru sɑ̃ɑbu kere. Bɑ sun yɔɔru bwɛ̃ɛyɛ gbɑburɔ. Bɑ sun nɑɑ gire sere guunu wɔllɔ.
Bɛsɛn sinɑ boko wi u derɑ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ, wi, wi Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔsɑ, wee, bɑ nùn yinɑ mwɑ. N deemɑ sɑ rɑɑ nɛɛ, win sɑɑbuwɑ sɑ kɑ tii mɔ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ Edɔmubɑ, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Usiɔ, i ko kpĩ i nuku dobu ko tɛ̃, ɑdɑmɑ i n yɛ̃ mɑ siribu bɛɛ mɑrɑ. I ko i ko nge be tɑm mu goomɔ kpɑ i tereru yɔ̃rɑ.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, bɛɛn sɛɛyɑsiɑbu kpɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛ yoru mwɑɑmɔ bu kɑ doonɑ. Adɑmɑ bɛɛ Edɔmubɑ, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo bɛɛ mɔru kɔsiɑ, kpɑ u bɛɛn torɑnu terɑsiɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ yɑɑyo ye n sun deemɑ. A mɛɛrio ɑ wɑ nge mɛ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ.
Bɛsɛn tem mɛ ɑ sun wɛ̃ mu kuɑ gɑbugim. Tɔn tukobɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn diɑɔ.
Bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ gu, mɑ bɛsɛn mɛrobu bɑ gɔminiru sɔ̃. Sɑ wɑ̃ɑ tundobu sɑri.
Gobiyɑ sɑ rɑ kɔsie su sere bɛsɛn tiin dɔkɔn nim nɔ. Gobiyɑ sɑ rɑ mɑɑ kɑ bɛsɛn tem dɑ̃ɑ dwe.
Wee, bɛsɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ sun yoru diisiɑmɔ. Sɑ wɑsire, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ sun wɛ̃rɑbu wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Sɑ Asirigibu kɑ Egibitigibu dĩɑnu kɑnɑ.
Wee, bɛsɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ sun wɑ̃ɑ. Bɛsɛrɑ sɑ yen wɑhɑlɑ sɔɔwɑ.
Yobɑ bɑ kuɑ bɛsɛn yinnibu. Goo mɑɑ sɑri wi u koo sun wɔrɑ ben nɔmɑn di.
Sɑ rɑ bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑru kɑri bɔriewɑ, domi sɑ rɑ kɑ yibɛrɛbɑ tɑbu kowɑ gbɑburɔ su sere wɑ su di.
Gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃ bɛsɛn wɑsi swĩɑ nge pɛ̃ɛ wɔ̃ɔ yeru.
Bɑ tɔn kurɔbu kɑ wɔndiɑbɑ gɑbirimɔ Yudɑn tem kpuro sɔɔ kɑ sere Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Bɑ bɛsɛn wirugibu mwɛɛrɑ bɑ soorɑ doke. Bɑ ǹ durɔ tɔkɔnu bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Bɑ bɛsɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ mwɛɛrɑ nge yobu bu kɑ som nɑm. Mɑ bibɑ dɑ̃ɑ gurɑmɔ bɑ wɔrukumɔ yen bunum sɔ̃.
Bɛsɛn bukurobu bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ sinɛ bu siribu ko siri yerɔ. Mɛyɑ bɛsɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ womusu ko.
Bɛsɛn nuku dobu bu kpɑ. Bɛsɛn nuku dobun yɑɑbu gɔsirɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu.
Bɛsɛn bɛɛrɛ yɑ kpɑ. Annɑ ɑ wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ wɑ torɑ ni sɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Gisɔ sɑ nuki sɑnkire, mɑ sɑ nɔni yĩresu kokumɔ,
yèn sɔ̃ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Siɔni tɑ kuɑ bɑnsu, mɑ tɑ kuɑ gbeeku bɔ̃nun wɑ̃ɑ yeru.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sunɔ. Kɑɑ n bɑndu diiwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Kɑɑ n sun deriwɑ n kɑ tɛ? Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ n sun duɑri sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ̀ n nɛɛ, su wurɑmɑ wunɛn mi, sɑ ko wurɑmɑ. A de bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑru tu wurɑmɑ nge yellu.
Kɑɑ n kɑ sun mɔru bɑkɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ? Kɑɑ n sun deriwɑ mɑm mɑm?
Wɔ̃ɔ tɛnɑsen suru nnɛsen sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbuse sɔɔrɑ Esekiɛli, yɑ̃ku kowo Busin bii u wɑ̃ɑ dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Kebɑrin goorɔ kɑ Yuu be bɑ yoru mwɛɛrimɑ sɑnnu. Miyɑ u wɑ wɔllɑ kɛniɑrɑ mɑ Gusunɔ u derɑ u kɑ̃siru wɑ. U kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ mɑ win dɑm nùn nɛnuɑ. N deemɑ sinɑ boko Yoyɑkimun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbusewɑ mi, ye u kɑ wɑ̃ɑ yoru sɔɔ Bɑbiloniɔ.
<range>
<range>
Wee ye u wɑ kɑ̃si te sɔɔ. U woo bɔkɔ wɑ gɑ seemɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di gɑ guru wiru sɔɔwɑ kɑ guru mɑɑkinu. Mɑ yɑm bururɑm mu guru wii te sikerenɛ. Mɑ ten suunu sɔɔ n bɑllimɔ nge sii gɑn te bɑ wɔriɑsiɑ.
Guru wii te sɔɔ, hunde konibɑ nnɛ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi be bɑ kɑ tɔmbu weenɛ.
Ben bɑɑwure wuswɑɑ nnɛ kɑ kɑsenu nnɛwɑ u mɔ.
Ben kɔ̃ri yi dɛnde. Mɑ ben nɑɑsu su kɑ nɑɑ buun nɑɑ kɑburosu weenɛ, mɑ su bɑllimɔ nge sii gɑn te bɑ wɔriɑsiɑ.
Kɑsɑ yen bɑɑyeren temɔ, tɔnun nɔmuwɑ gɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Nɔmɑ yen bɑɑyere yɑ dɛmiɛwɑ mi wuswɑɑ kɑ kɑsɑ ye, yɑ mɛɛrɑ.
Kɑsɑ ye kpuro yɑ nɔsu girɑrinɛwɑ. Hunde koni be, bɑ̀ n sĩimɔ, bɑ ku rɑ sĩire. Mi bɑ dɔɔ, miyɑ bɑ rɑ n mɛɛrɑ.
Hunde koni ben bɑɑwure u wuswɑɑ mɔwɑ nnɛ. Tiɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔnun wuswɑɑ. Yen nɔm geu giɑ, gbee sunɔn wuswɑɑ. Yen nɔm dwɑru giɑ kɛtɛn wuswɑɑ. Yen biru giɑ mɑɑ gunɔ bɑkerun wuswɑɑ.
Ben bɑɑwuren kɑsɑ yiru yɑ dɛmiɑrewɑ wɔllɔ mɑ yɑ girɑrinɛ mi giɑ. Mɑ yiru ye yɑ mɑɑ tie yɑ ben wɑsi wukiri.
Mi wuswɑɑ yen bɑɑyere yɑ wɑ̃ɑ, mi giɑwɑ yɑ mɛɛrɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ mi bɑ kĩ bu dɑ kpuro, bɑ rɑ dewɑ bɑ kun sĩire.
Hunde koni ben bɑɑ sɔɔ, dɔ̃ɔ gɛ̃ɛyɑ yi wɑ̃ɑ mi, yi fĩɑmɔ nge wĩi bɔnnu. Dɔ̃ɔ win yɑm bururɑm mu kpɑ̃. Min diyɑ dɔ̃ɔ buri yi yɑrimɔ nge guru mɑɑkinu.
Hunde koni be, bɑ rɑ n sɑ̃uwɑ nge guru mɑɑkinu, bɑ n dɔɔ, bɑ n wee.
Ye u bu mɛɛrɑ mɛsum, yerɑ u uruu wɑ yɑ tem girɑri ben bɑɑwuren bɔkuɔ.
Uruu be, bɑ bɑllimɔwɑ nge kpee gobiginu. Mɑ bɑ weenɛ. Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre uruu bɑɑyere yɑ wɑ̃ɑ uruu gɑɑ sɔɔ.
Bɑ koo kpĩ bu dɑ berɑ nnɛ kpuro sɔɔ bɑ kun tii sĩiyɛ.
Ben gunum mu nɑnum mɔ. Mɑ ben nɔsu sɔɔ n sɑ̃ɑre gɑ̃ɑnu mɑni mɑni ni nu bɑllimɔ.
Hunde koni be, bɑ̀ n sɑnum seewɑ, uruu be, bɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑwɑ ben bɔkuɔ. Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ, kɑ be sɑnnɑ.
Hunde koni be, bɑ rɑ dewɑ mi bɑ kĩ, ɑdɑmɑ kɑ uruu be sɑnnɑ. Domi beyɑ bɑ uruu be gɑwe.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ̀ n sĩimɔ, uruu be, bɑ rɑ n mɑɑ sĩimɔ. Bɑ̀ n yɔ̃rɑ kpɑ uruu be, bu yɔ̃rɑ. Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ seewɑ, kpɑ uruu be, bu mɑɑ se. Domi hunde koni ben hunde yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ uruu be sɔɔ.
Mɑ gɑ̃ɑnu tɛrie hunde koni ben wɔllɔ nu bɑllimɔ nge kpee gobiginu.
Mɑ bɑ ben kɑsɑ yiru yiru dɛmiɛ yɑ girɑrinɛ gɑ̃ɑ nin temɔ. Mɑ yiru yiru ye yɑ bu tie yɑ ben wɑsi wukiri.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ sĩimɔ, yerɑ nɑ ben kɑsɑn wɔkinu nɔɔmɔ nge nim wɔ̃kun wɔkinu, ǹ kun mɛ nge Gusunɔ Dɑm kpurogiin nɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ nge tɑbu kowo wuurun wɔkinu. Adɑmɑ ye bɑ yɔ̃rɑ, bɑ ben kɑsɑ ye kuruɑwɑ.
Mɑ nɑ mɑɑ wɔkinu nɔɔmɔ gɑ̃ɑ nin wɔllun di.
Mɑ nɑ gɑ̃ɑnu wɑ mi, nu kɑ sinɑ kitɑru weenɛ, nu bɑllimɔ nge kpee gobiginu. Mɑ nɑ mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu wɑ nu sɔ̃ sinɑ kitɑ ten wɔllɔ nu kɑ tɔnu weenɛ.
Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre tɔnu wi, u bɑllimɔ nge sii gɑn te bɑ wɔriɑsiɑ dɔ̃ɔn suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ yɑm bururɑm kɑ nùn sikerenɛ.
Yɑm bururɑm mɛ, mu kɑ guru wɑɑ weenɛ ye yɑ bɑllimɔ sɑnɑm mɛ gurɑ nɛmɔ. Yenibɑ kpuro yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ. Ye u ye kpuro wɑ mɛ, yerɑ u yiirɑ u wuswɑɑ tem girɑri. Mɑ u nuɑ goo u kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ.
U nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ seewo ɑ yɔ̃rɑ, kpɑ n nun gɑri sɔ̃.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u kɑ nùn gɑri yi mɔ̀, yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔn Hunde u nùn yɔɔwɑ mɑ u nùn yɔ̃rɑsiɑ. Mɑ u yɛ̃ro swɑɑ dɑki wi u kɑ nùn gɑri mɔ̀ mi.
U nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, nɑ nun gɔriɔ Isirelibɑn mi, be bɑ mɑn seesimɔ. Wee be, kɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ mɑn torɑ sere kɑ gisɔ.
Tɔn be, bɑ swɑɑ tɑu, bɑ mɑɑ gɔ̃ru bɔɔbu. Ben miyɑ nɑ nun gɔriɔ kpɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ.
Nɑ nɛɛ, wee bɑ sɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ. Bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki? Bɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑki? Kɑ mɛ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ u wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ.
Wunɛ Esekiɛli, ɑ ku bu nɑsiɑ, ɑ ku mɑɑ ben gɑrin bɛrum ko, bɑɑ mɛ n ko n sɑ̃ɑre ɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ki kɑ niin suunu sɔɔ. Domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ.
Bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki? Bɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑki? A gesi bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ye nɑ geruɑ, bɑɑ mɛ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ nɔɔwɔ ye kon nun sɔ̃. A ku ko mɛm nɔɔ sɑri nge bwese te. A wunɛn nɔɔ wukio kpɑ ɑ tem ye kon nun wɛ̃.
Sɑɑ yerɑ Esekiɛli u nɔmu gɑgu wɑ gɑ dɛmiɛ win mi giɑ, gɑ tireru nɛni te bɑ kuruɑ.
Nɔmu ge, gɑ tire te kusiɑ win wuswɑɑɔ. Bɑ tu yoruɑwɑ berɑ yiru kpuro. Gɑri yi yi yoruɑ tire te sɔɔ, yiyɑ weeweenu kɑ wuri kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun gɑri.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ tire teni temwɔ kpɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ gɑri ko.
Ye u nɔɔ wukiɑ, yerɑ Gusunɔ u tire te kpɛ̃ɛ mi, u derɑ u tu temɑ.
Mɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ wunɛn nukuru yibio kpɑ ɑ wunɛn wɑsi diisiɑ kɑ tire te nɑ nun wɛ̃ mi. Ye u tire te temɑ, mɑ tɑ nùn dore nge tim.
Yerɑ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Esekiɛli, ɑ seewo ɑ dɑ Isirelibɑn mi kpɑ ɑ bu nɛn gɑri sɔ̃.
N ǹ mɔ nɑ nun gɔriɔ bwese tuku dɑbinun mi, nìn bɑrum mu nɔɔbu sɛ̃, ɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ ɑ ben gɑri tubu. Adɑmɑ Isirelibɑn miyɑ nɑ nun gɔriɔ. Nɑ̀ n dɑɑ nun gɔrɑ bwese tuku nin mi, nu koo nun swɑɑ dɑki,
<range>
ɑdɑmɑ wee, Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑkimɔ. Domi bɑ ǹ kĩ bu nɛn gere nɔ yèn sɔ̃ be kpuro bɑ swɑɑ tɑu mɑ ben gɔ̃ru gɑ bɔɔbu.
Yen sɔ̃, kon mɑɑ wunɛn tii bɔbiɑsiɑ kpɑ ɑ swɑɑ tɑɑyɑ nge be,
ɑ n gɔ̃ru bɔ nge kperu. A ku bɛrum ko ben swɑɑ tɑɑ bin sɔ̃. Domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bwese te tɑ ku rɑ mɛm nɔ.
Mɑ u mɑɑ kpɑm nɛɛ, Esekiɛli, ɑ swɑɑ dɑkio ɑ nɔ kpɑ ɑ gɑri yi kon nun sɔ̃ nɛnɛ wunɛn gɔ̃ruɔ.
Yen biru, kpɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ wunɛn mɛro bisibu deemɑ mi bɑ yoru dimɔ. Bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki? Bɑ ǹ nun swɑɑ dɑki? A gesi bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ kɑ bu gɑri mɔ̀.
Yerɑ Gusunɔn Hunde u Esekiɛli suɑ mɑ u nɔɔgiru nuɑ win biruɔ tɑ gerumɔ kɑ dɑm tɑ mɔ̀, bu Yinni Gusunɔ siɑro mi u wɑ̃ɑ u win yiiko bɑkɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ.
Mɑ u hunde koni ben kɑsɑn wɔkinu nɔɔmɔ yɑ soonɑmɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ ben uruubɑn wɔkinu. Wɔki ni, nu kpɛ̃ɑ n bɑndɑ.
Gusunɔn Hunde wi u nùn suɑ mi, u kɑ nùn doonɑ, mɑ win dɑm nùn nɛnuɑ. Mɑ Esekiɛlin mɔru seewɑ u burisinɑ.
U turɑ Tɛli Abibuɔ, Kebɑrin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔ mi yoo be, bɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Mɑ u sinɑ kɑ biti bɑkɑ ben suunu sɔɔ sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru yen biru, Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, kon de ɑ Isirelibɑ nɔni doke. Kɑɑ n dɑ nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki kpɑ ɑ kɑ bu kirɔ ko.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ̀ n tɛ̃ nɛɛ, tɔn kɔ̃so goo u koo gbi, mɑ ɑ ǹ nùn kirɔ kue u win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye deri u kɑ win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ, tɔn kɔ̃so wi, u koo gbiwɑ win dɑɑ yen sɔ̃. Wunɑ kon mɑɑ win yɛm bikiɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ n nùn kirɔ kuɑ, mɑ u ǹ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye deri, u koo gbiwɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen sɔ̃ kpɑ wunɛ ɑ wunɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ.
Gemgii ù n gem deri u kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ mɑ ɑ ǹ nùn kirɔ kue, mɑ nɑ nùn yinɑ bɛriɑ, u koo gbiwɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen sɔ̃. Nɑ ǹ win yellun dɑɑ geɑ gɑrisimɔ, ɑdɑmɑ wunɑ kon win yɛm bikiɑ.
À n mɑɑ nùn kirɔ kuɑ u ku kɑ durum ko, mɑ u ǹ durum ye kue, u ǹ gbimɔ. Wunɛn tii ɑ mɑɑ wunɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑwɑ mi, domi ɑ nùn kirɔ kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm mu Esekiɛli yɔɔwɑ mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ seewo ɑ dɑ wɔwɑɔ. Miyɑ kon nun gɑri sɔ̃.
Mɑ u seewɑ u dɑ wɔwɑ mi. Mɑ u Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ wɑ nge sɑnɑm mɛ u rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ Kebɑrin dɑɑrun bɔku mi. Mɑ u yiirɑ kɑ dɑm u siriru tem girɑri.
Yerɑ Gusunɔn Hunde u mɑɑ nùn yɔɔwɑ. Mɑ u nùn seeyɑ u yɔ̃rɑsiɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ doo ɑ tii kɛnusi wunɛn dirɔ.
Mɛyɑ bɑ koo nun bɔke kpɑ ɑ kpɑnɑ ɑ yɑri tɔɔwɔ, tɔmbu bu nun wɑ.
Kon de wunɛn yɑrɑ yu wunɛn dɑro mɑni kpɑ ɑ kpɑnɑ ɑ gɑri ko. Mɛyɑ ɑ ǹ kɑɑ kpĩ ɑ mɑɑ bu gerusi be, be bɑ ku rɑ mɛm nɔ mi.
Adɑmɑ nɑ̀ n kɑ nun gɑri kuɑ, kon wunɛn nɔɔ wukiɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ tɔn be sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Adɑmɑ ben gɑbɑ bɑ koo nun swɑɑ dɑki, gɑbɑ kun mɑɑ nun swɑɑ dɑkimɔ. Domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bwese te tɑ ku rɑ mɛm nɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wunɛ Esekiɛli tɔnun bii, ɑ biriki suo kpɑ ɑ ye doke wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ ɑ Yerusɑlɛmun weenɑsiɑ ko kɑ yorɑ biriki yen wɔllɔ.
A ye koowo nge wuu ge bɑ tɑrusi, ɑ kuku yenu doke kpɑ ɑ gungunu bɑni ɑ sɑnsɑni girɑ kpɑ ɑ tɑbu sinɑmbu yi yi ɑ kɑ sikerenɑ.
A sii si su yɑsu suo kpɑ ɑ su doke wunɛ kɑ gɑnɑn bɑɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ ɑ su wuswɑɑ kisi. Bɑ koo gu tɑrusi, wunɛn tii kɑɑ n gu yɔ̃re, kpɑ ye kpuro yɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru Isirelibɑn sɔ̃.
Yen biru kpɑ ɑ kpunɑ kɑ wunɛn yɛ̃si nɔm dwɑrugiɑ kpɑ ɑ n Isirelibɑn torɑnu sɔɔwɑ sere tɔ̃ɔ te kɑɑ se.
Tɔ̃ɔ nin geeru tɑ kon sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔ̃ɔ sin geeru, sì sɔɔ Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑn torɑri. Nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɔ̃ɔ goobɑ wunɔbu kɑ wɛnɛ kɑ wɔkuru (390). Tɔ̃ɔ ni kpuro sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ n ben torɑ ni sɔɔwɑ.
Yen biru kpɑ ɑ gɔsiɑ ɑ kɑ wunɛn yɛ̃si nɔm geugiɑ kpunɑ sɔ̃ɔ weeru kpɑ ɑ wɑhɑlɑ ko Yudɑbɑn torɑnun sɔ̃. Sɔ̃ɔ teeru tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔ̃ɔ tiɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑ kisi Yerusɑlɛmu giɑ ye bɑ tɑrusi, kpɑ ɑ ye gɑ̃seru kpɑre kpɑ ɑ yen gɑri gere.
Mɛyɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon kɑ nun wɛ̃ɛ bɔke kpɑ ɑ ku rɑ sĩirɑ. Mɛyɑ kɑɑ n kpĩ kɑ yɛ̃si tiɑ ye, sere tɔ̃ɔ te nɑ nun burɑ mi, tu kɑ yibu.
Kpɑ ɑ ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ swii kɑ gbɛɛ kɑ dɑ̃si kɑ dobi suɑ ɑ ye mɛnnɑ gbɛ̃ɛ teeru sɔɔ ɑ burinɑ ɑ kɑ pɛ̃ɛ ko. Yerɑ kɑɑ n dɑ di sere sɔ̃ɔ goobɑ wunɔbu kɑ wɛnɛ kɑ wɔku te, tu kɑ yibu, kpɑ ɑ n kpĩ kɑ yɛ̃si tiɑ ye.
Pɛ̃ɛ kure piibuwɑ kɑɑ n dɑ di nge gɑrɑmu goobun (200) sɑkɑ sɔ̃ɔ teeru. Nge mɛyɑ kɑɑ n dimɔ mi sere tɔ̃ɔ te, tu kɑ yibu.
Mɛyɑ nim mɛ kɑɑ mɑɑ nɔ mu ko n sɑkɑ mɔwɑ, ditiri tiɑn sɑkɑwɑ kɑɑ n dɑ nɔ sɔ̃ɔ teeru.
Tɔmbun bii gbebusɑ kɑɑ kɑ pɛ̃ɛ wɔ̃. Kɑɑ n dɑ ye wɔ̃wɑ ben nɔni biru.
Nge mɛyɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ ko n dɑ ben dĩɑnu di kɑ disi tɔn tukobun suunu sɔɔ mi kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ.
Esekiɛli u Yinni Gusunɔ wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ tii nɛnuɑ disi kpuron di. Nɑ ǹ yɑɑ goru gɑru diire sɑɑ nɛn piiburun di. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑɑ disigiɑ gɑɑ tende.
Yinni Gusunɔ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ nɑɑ bisu suo ɑ kɑ wunɛn doo ko kpɑ ɑ tɔmbun bisu deri.
Kon dĩɑnu fiiko ye yɑ tie Yerusɑlɛmuɔ kpeesiɑ kpɑ bu bu dĩɑnu kɑ nim sɑkɑ kuɑ kpɑ bu di bu nɔ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu kɑ wururɑbu.
Nge mɛyɑ bɑ koo dĩɑnu kɑ nim biɑ kpɑ bɑ n nuki sɑnkire be kpuro. Bɑ koo woorɑwɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ kɔ̃ɔ suo ge gɑ nɔɔ do kpɑ ɑ kɑ wunɛn seri kɑ wunɛn toburu kɔni. Yen biru kpɑ ɑ kilo suɑ ɑ seri yi yĩire kpɑ ɑ yi bɔnu ko subɑ itɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ sube teeru suɑ ɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke Yerusɑlɛmun suunu sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ yen tɑrusibun tɔ̃rɑ yibɑ. Yen biru kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ sube teeru suɑ ɑ n kɑ tu kɔ̃ɔ ge soomɔ ɑ kɑ wuu ge sikerenɑ. Yenibɑn biru kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ suberu itɑse suɑ ɑ pusi yɑm kpuro, yen biruwɑ kon bu tɑkobi suesi.
Kpɑ ɑ seri yin fiiko kure wunɛn yɑberun swɑɑ buɑɔ.
Kpɑ yi sɔɔ, ɑ gɛɛ suɑ ɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke kpɑ dɔ̃ɔ wi, u Isirelibɑ kpuro seesi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yĩre ni, Yerusɑlɛmuwɑ nu kɑ yɑ̃. Wee nɑ ye kuɑ hɑnduniɑn suunu. Tɔn tukobun tem mu ye sikerenɛ.
Mɑ yen tɔmbu bɑ mɑn seesi n kere bwese tuku ni nu kɑ bu sikerenɛ. Domi bɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ yinɑ. Bɑ ǹ nɛn gere swĩi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, wee bɑ mɑn seesi n kere bwese tuku ni nu kɑ bu sikerenɛ, mɑ bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɛn gere swĩi ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ yɑ mɑm bwese ni nu kɑ bu sikerenɛgiɑ kere.
Yen sɔ̃, nɛn tii kon bu seesi. Kon bu siriwɑ hɑnduniɑgibun wuswɑɑɔ.
Kpɑ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ bi nɑ ǹ dɑɑ bu koore ben bũu sɑ̃ɑnun sɔ̃. Mɛyɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bin bweseru mɔ̀ kpɑm.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ tundobɑ koo ben bibu tem, kpɑ bibu bu mɑɑ ben tundobu tem. Kon bu siriwɑ n go, kpɑ n be bɑ tie yɑrinɑsiɑ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ sɔɔ.
Wee bɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru disi doke kɑ ben bũnu kpuro. Yen sɔ̃, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru nɛn tii kon bu biru kisi, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu mɛɛrimɔ kɑ wɔnwɔndu.
Bɑ̀ n bu bɔnu kuɑ subenu itɑ, sube teeru tɑ koo gbiwɑ Yerusɑlɛmun nukurɔ, bɑrɑru kɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃, kpɑ suberu yiruseru tu mɑɑ gbi tɑbu sɔɔ Yerusɑlɛmun biruɔ. Kpɑ n mɑɑ sube te tɑ tie mini yɑrinɑsiɑ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ kpuro sɔɔ. Kon bu tɑkobi suesiwɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon bu nɛn mɔru seesiwɑ mɑm mɑm sere nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ yu kɑ kpunɑ. Nɑ̀ n bu mɔru kɔsie, sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɑ ǹ kĩ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ.
Ben tem mu koo ko bɑnsu, kpɑ mu bɛɛrɛ biɑ bwese ni nu bu sikerenɛn wuswɑɑɔ.
Kon bu siriwɑ kɑ nɛn mɔru bɑkɑ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ kɑ dɑm. Kpɑ bwese ni nu kɑ bu sikerenɛ mi, nu bu yɛ̃ɛ. Adɑmɑ yeni yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kirɔ ye yɑ koo de ben tii bu bɛrum duurɑ. Nɛ Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Kon de bu gbisuku gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃. Gɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ koo bu nɔni sɔ̃wɑ nge be bɑ sɛ̃ɛnu twee. Kon ben dĩɑ ni nu tie kpeerɑsiɑ kpɑ bu gbisuku gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃.
Kon bu gɔ̃ɔru kɑ gbeeku yɛɛ sure kpɑ yi ben bibu go. Bɑrɑru kɑ tɔn goberu kɑ tɑbu, ye kpurowɑ yɑ koo bu kpeerɑsiɑ. Nɛ Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑ seeyo Isirelibɑn guunun berɑ giɑ, kpɑ ɑ nɛn gɑri gere be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ min sɔ̃.
A nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn guunɔ kɑ gungunɔ kɑ nin wɔwi sɔɔ wɔrimɑ kɑ tɑkobi, kpɑ n ben gunguu nìn mi bɑ rɑ bũu yɑ̃kuru ko kɔsuku.
Kon ben bũu yɑ̃ku yenu kɔsuku kɑ mi bɑ rɑ nu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeye, kpɑ ben gonu nu n wɔrukɑ ben bũnun nuurɔ.
Kon Isirelibɑn gonu kpĩ ben bwɑ̃ɑrokunun wuswɑɑɔ. Kpɑ n ben kukunu yɑruku ben bũu yɑ̃ku yenɔ.
Wuu sìn mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpuro, su koo kowɑ bɑnsu. Kpɑ n ben yɑ̃ku yenu kɔsuku ni bɑ kuɑ gungunu wɔllɔ. Kon ben bwɑ̃ɑroku ni gurɑ n kɔsuku, kpɑ nu kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Mɛyɑ kon bwɑ̃ɑroku ni bɑ rɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɑ̃ suriri. Ye bɑ gesi sekɑ kɑ nɔmɑ yɑ koo kɑm kowɑ mɑm mɑm.
Ben suunu sɔɔ gɑbɑ koo wɔruku bu gbisuku. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Adɑmɑ kon de bu kisirɑ tɑbun di, kpɑ bɑ n yɑrinɛ tem tukumɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, be, be bɑ kisirɑ bɑ koo mɑn yɑɑyɑ mi bɑ yoru dimɔ. Domi kon ben gɔ̃ru ge wĩɑ ge gɑ ǹ kɑ nɛ turo yɔ̃. Kon ben sɑkɑrɑ nɔni wĩɑ yi bɑ kɑ bũnu mɛɛrɑ. Ben tii bɑ koo tii tusi, kɔ̃sɑ kpuro ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. N ǹ kɑm sɔɔ nɑ kɑ bu gerusi, ye nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu wɑhɑlɑ yeni kpɛ̃ɛ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nun sɔ̃ɔmɔ. A nɔmɑ suo kpɑ ɑ kɑ nɑɑsu tem so ɑ nɛɛ, wɑnyo. Wee Isirelibɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ yɑ kpɑ̃. Yen sɔ̃, bɑ koo gbi tɑbu sɔɔ, kɑ gɔ̃ɔru sɔɔ, kɑ bɑrɑru sɔɔ.
Wi u tomɑ, bɑrɑrɑ tɑ koo nùn go. Wi u mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ turuku, tɑbu sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo nùn go. Wi u koo sinɑ yɛnuɔ, bɑ koo nùn tɑrusiwɑ kpɑ u gbi gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃. Kon bu mɔru seesiwɑ mɑm mɑm.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ bɑ̀ n wɑ gonu kpĩ ben bũnun bɔkuɔ kɑ sere ben yɑ̃ku yenɔ kɑ gungunɔ kɑ guunɔ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ kubenɔ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ koo bɑkɑnɔ mi bɑ rɑ rɑɑ bũnu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeye, yɑ n nubu duroru mɔ.
Kon bu nɛn nɔmu dɛmiɛ kpɑ n de tem mɛ, mu ko bɑnsu sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑrun di n kɑ girɑri Dibilɑɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ. Mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpuro kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ swɑɑ dɑkio ɑ nɔ ye nɑ gerumɔ bɛɛ Isirelibɑn sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, kpeerɑ wee. Tɑ pusi bɛɛn tem goonu nnɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Tɛ̃ tɑ koo bɛɛ deemɑ. Kon de nɛn mɔru yu bɛɛ wɔri. Kon bɛɛ siriwɑ nge mɛ bɛɛn sɑnu sɑnusu sɑ̃ɑ. Kpɑ n bɛɛ kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ kpuron ɑre kɔsie.
Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ mɛɛrimɔ kɑ wɔnwɔndu. Nɑ̀ n bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ, nɑ ǹ tii nɛnumɔ. Kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ yerɑ kon bɛɛ kɔsiɑ. Kpɑ i giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ wee, yɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ gɑɑ weenɛ.
Kpeerɑ wee, kpeerɑ wee. Wee tɑ seemɔ tɑ wee bɛɛn mi. Wee tɑ sisi.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, sɑɑ yɑ turuku kuɑ. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ turuku kuɑ, tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɑhɑlɑn tɔ̃ru. Tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ, nuku dobun kuuki kun mɑɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ guunu wɔllɔ.
Tɛ̃ kon de nɛn mɔru yu se. Nɑ ǹ ye yɔ̃rɑsiɑmɔ mɑ n kun mɔ yɑ kɑ tii sɑrɑ. Kon bɛɛ siriwɑ nge mɛ bɛɛn dɑɑ yɑ nɛ.
Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ mɛɛrimɔ kɑ wɔnwɔndu. Nɑ̀ n bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ tii nɛnumɔ. Kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ yerɑ kon bɛɛ kɔsie kpɑ i giɑ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Tɔ̃ɔ te wee tɑ tunumɑ, tɑ turuku kuɑ. Bɔbunu kɑ tii suɑbu bu sosimɔ.
Bɔbunu nu kuɑ nge dɛkɑ ye bɑ rɑ kɑ tɔmbu so. Gɑ̃ɑnu kun mɑɑ bɛɛ tiɑmmɛ. Tɔn dɑbiru tɑ koo gbi. Bɑɑ wɔkinu kun mɑɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ weeweenu mɔ̀ bɛɛn sɔ̃.
Sɑɑ yɑ turuku mɔ̀. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ wee. Wi u dwemɔ u ku yɛ̃ɛri. Wi u mɑɑ dɔrɑmɔ u ku swĩ. Domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru sisi tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ kpuron sɔ̃.
Wi u dɔrɑ u ǹ mɑɑ ye u dɔrɑ wɑsi u mwɑ bɑɑ ù n wɑ̃ɑ wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. Domi gɑri yi bɑ geruɑ tɔn be kpuron sɔ̃, yi koo koorɑ. Goo sɑri wi u koo yɑkiɑrɑ yèn sɔ̃ bɑɑwure u wɑ̃ɑ kom bɛrɛtɛkɛ sɔɔ.
Wee bɑ kɔbɑ so bɑ sɔɔru kpɑ. Adɑmɑ ben goo kun tɑbu seemɔ, domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru seewɑ be tɔn dɑbi ten sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɑbu ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ swɛɛ sɔɔ kpɑ bɑrɑnu kɑ gɔ̃ɔnu nu n wɑ̃ɑ yɛnusɔ. Tɔmbu bɑ koo gbi tɑbu sɔɔ yɑkɑsɔ. Be bɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuu sɔɔ bɑ koo gbiwɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ bɑrɑnun sɔ̃.
Be bɑ mɑɑ kisirɑ bɑ koo kpikiru dɑwɑ guunu wɔllɔ nge kpɑrukonu kpɑ bu weeweenu ko ben torɑnun sɔ̃.
Ben nɔmɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑre dɑm sɑrirun sɔ̃. Kpɑ ben dũɑ yu diiri.
Bɑ koo sɑɑki sebewɑ kpɑ bu ben seri kɔni nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Bɑ koo nɑndɑ kpɑ sekuru bu mwɑ.
Bɑ koo gobi kɔ̃ swɛɛ sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ben wurɑbɑ gɑrisi nge kubɑnu, domi sii geesu ǹ kun mɛ wurɑ yen gɑɑ kun kpɛ̃ yu bu fɑɑbɑ ko Gusunɔn mɔrun tɔ̃ru sɔɔ. Bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu wɑsi ye yɑ koo bu debu, ǹ kun mɛ ye yɑ koo ben binɛ kpunɑsiɑ, domi sii geesu kɑ wurɑ yerɑ yɑ derɑ bɑ torɑ.
Bɑ tii suɑ ben wurɑn sɔ̃. Mɑ bɑ kɑ ye bwɑ̃ɑroku bɑkɑnu kuɑ ni nu nɑnum mɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon de bu ye tusi.
Kon de tɔn tukobu bu ben dukiɑ ye gurɑ, kpɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ bu ye tubi di bu ye kpuro disi doke.
Nɑ ǹ kɑ bɛɛ yinɑmɔ sɑnɑm mɛ gbɛnɔbu bɑ koo nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dukiɑ disi doke bu gurɑ.
A yɔni sɔɔru koowo domi tem mɛ, mu tɔn gowobu yibɑwɑ. Mɛyɑ bɛɛn wuu ge, gɑ tɔmbu yibɑ be bɑ dɑɑ bɔɔbɔyɑ mɔ.
Kon bwesenu sokumɑ ni nu nuku kɔ̃suru bo, kpɑ nu bɛɛn yɛnusu mwɛɛri. Kon bɛɛn dɑmgibun tii suɑbu kpeesiɑ. Kpɑ n de bu bɛɛn sɑ̃ɑ yenu disi doke.
Kɑm kobu wee. I ko i fɑɑbɑ kɑsu, ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ wɑsi.
Kɔ̃sɑ yɑ koo sosi kɔ̃sɑ sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ lɑbɑɑri kɔ̃si yi ko yi n nɔɔrɑmɔ yi n dɔɔ. I ko i Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bikiɑ bu kɑ̃siru kɑsu kpɑ bu bɛɛ sɔ̃ ye yɑ koo nɑ. Adɑmɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ǹ ko n Yinni Gusunɔn woodɑ yɛ̃. Bɛɛn guro gurobu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bwisi gɛɛ mɔ bu tɔnu kɛ̃.
Bɛɛn sinɑ boko u koo gɔɔ sinɑ kpɑ sinɑ bibu bɑ n wurure. Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ ko n diirimɔ. Kon bu kuɑwɑ nge mɛ ben kookoosu nɛ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ tiɑsen suru nɔɔbɑ tiɑsen sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbuse sɔɔ, Esekiɛli u sɔ̃ win dirɔ kɑ Yudɑn guro gurobu. Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm nùn yɔɔwɑ.
Yerɑ u mɛɛrɑ u wɑ gɑ̃ɑnu kurɑmɑ nu kɑ tɔnu weenɛ. Win pɔrɑn tem giɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ mɑ win wɔllu giɑ yɑ bɑllimɔ nge sii gɑn te bɑ wɔriɑsiɑ.
Mɑ u gɑ̃ɑnu dɛmiɑ nge nɔmɑ u kɑ wi, Esekiɛlin seri nɛnuɑ. Kɑ̃si te sɔɔ, Gusunɔn Hunde nùn suɑ wɔllɔ mɑ u kɑ nùn dɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. U deemɑ yen kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ bɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku gɑgu yɔ̃rɑsie ge gɑ Gusunɔn nisinu seeye.
Mɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinnin yiikon yɑm bururɑm nùn kure mi nge mɛ u rɑɑ mu wɑ wɔwɑɔ.
U nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ. Mɑ u mɛɛrɑ. U wɑ yɑ̃ku yerun duu yerɔ bwɑ̃ɑroku gɑgɑ yɔ̃ ge gɑ Gusunɔn nisinu seeye.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ wɑ ye yɑ koorɑmɔ mi? Wee Isirelibɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ bu kɑ mɑn girɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun di. N ǹ mɑɑ ye tɔnɑ, kon kpɑm nun gɑm sɔ̃ɔsi.
Mɑ u mɑɑ nùn suɑ u kɑ dɑ tɔɔwɔ sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑn kɔnnɔwɔ. Mɑ u wɔru gɑgu wɑ gɑnɑɔ.
Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ gɑnɑ ye yɑbo. Mɑ u ye yɑbɑ u deemɑ kɔnnɔ gɑgɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi.
U nɛɛ, ɑ duo kpɑ ɑ wɑ kom kɔ̃sum mɛ tɔn be, bɑ mɔ̀ mini.
U duɑ mi. Ye u wɑ wee, yɛɛ yi yi rɑ kɑbiri kɑ yɛɛ kɔ̃si gɛɛn weenɑsii bɑ kuɑ gɑni sɔɔ bɑ kɑ sikerenɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ bũnu kpuro ni bɑ rɑ sɑ̃.
Mɑ u Isirelibɑn guro gurobu wɑ tɔnu wɑtɑ kɑ wɔkuru yɛɛn weenɑsii yi kpuron wuswɑɑɔ. Mɑ Yɑɑsɑniɑ Sɑfɑnin bii u wɑ̃ɑ be sɔɔ. Bukuro ben bɑɑwure u turɑre kɑ gɑ̃ɑnu nɛni yè sɔɔ bɑ rɑ turɑre dɔ̃ɔ doke. Mɑ turɑren wiisu bɔkuɑ wɔllɔ tuku tuku.
Yinni Gusunɔ u bikiɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ wɑ ye Isirelibɑn guro gurobu bɑ mɔ̀ ɑsiri sɔɔ? Ben bɑɑwure u win bũu yeru mɔ. Mɑ bɑ tii gɑfɑrɑ kuɑmmɛ bɑ mɔ̀, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ ǹ bu wɑɑmɔ. Domi nɑ ben tem deri.
U nɛɛ, ɑ nɑ ɑ mɑɑ wɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ ye yɑ yeni kere.
Mɑ u kɑ nùn dɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ mɛɛrɑ. U deemɑ tɔn kurɔbɑ sɔ̃ bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Tɑmusi swĩiyɑmmɛ.
Yerɑ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, ɑ wɑ nge mɛ mi n sɑ̃ɑ? Tɛ̃, ɑ nɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑm wɑ ye yɑ yeni kere.
Mɑ u nùn suɑ u kɑ dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑɔ yɑ̃ku yeru kɑ dii dɛɛrɑrun kɔnnɔn bɑɑ sɔɔ. Miyɑ u tɔmbu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu wɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yeru biru kisi bɑ yiire sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ bɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, wunɛn tii ɑ wɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀. Yenibɑ kpuron kobu yɑ ǹ Yudɑbɑ turɑ, mɑ bɑ mɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ bɑ goonɑmɔ tem mɛ sɔɔ bu kɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ. Adɑmɑ beyɑ bɑ tii wɛ̃ru dɛkɑ sɔkumɔ.
Nɛn tii kon bu ye bɑ kuɑ kɔsie kɑ nɛn mɔru bɑkɑ. Nɑ ǹ bu mɛɛrimɔ kɑ wɔnwɔndu. Bɑ koo wuri kowɑ kɑ dɑm bu kɑ mɑn somiru kɑnɑ. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ bu swɑɑ dɑkimɔ.
Yen biru Esekiɛli u Yinni Gusunɔn nɔɔ nuɑ. U nɛɛ, i susimɑ bɛɛ be i ko i Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Bɑɑwure u n win tɑbu yɑ̃nu nɛni ni u koo kɑ bu kɑm koosiɑ.
Yerɑ u wɑ wee tɔmbu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ bɑ yɑrimɑ sɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ gungunu wɔllu giɑn di, sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geuɔ. Mɑ ben bɑɑwure u win tɑbu yɑ̃nu nɛni ni u koo kɑ tɔmbu kɑm koosiɑ. Mɑ ben suunu sɔɔ goo u wɑ̃ɑ u yɑ̃ku kowon yɑberu doke bɑ gɑ̃ɑnu sɔre win kpɑkɑ sɔɔ nì sɔɔ u koo yore. Yerɑ u nɑ u yɔ̃rɑ yɑ̃ku yerun bɔkuɔ te bɑ kuɑ kɑ sii gɑndu.
Mɑ Gusunɔn yiiko ye yɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsibu sɔɔ, yɑ seewɑ yɑ dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔ giɑ. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u durɔ wi sokɑ wi u yɑ̃ku kowon yɑ̃nu doke mi, kɑ gɑ̃ɑ nì sɔɔ u koo yore.
U nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ doo wuu suunu sɔɔ ɑ tɔmbu yĩreru koosi sirikɑnɑɔ be bɑ weeweenu mɔ̀ kɔ̃sɑ ye tɔmbɑ mɔ̀ Yerusɑlɛmuɔn sɔ̃.
Mɑ Esekiɛli u nuɑ durɔ wi, u be bɑ tie sɔ̃ɔmɔ u mɔ̀, i durɔ wi swĩiyɔ wuu ge sɔɔ kpɑ i tɔmbu so i go. I ku bu mɛɛri kɑ wɔnwɔndu. I ku tii nɛnɛ.
I bu goowo mɑm mɑm tɔkɔnu kɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑ wɔndiɑbɑ kɑ tɔn kurɔbu kɑ bibu. Adɑmɑ i ku be bɑ yĩreru koosi mi bɑbɑ. I toruo sɑɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun di. Mɑ bɑ toruɑ kɑ Isirelibɑn guro gurobu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ dii ten kɔnnɔwɔ.
U nɛɛ, i sɑ̃ɑ yee te disi dokeo i ten yɑɑri tɔn gonu yibie. Yen biru kpɑ i dɑ tɔɔwɔ i tɔmbu go. Mɑ bɑ yɑrɑ tɔɔwɔ bɑ tɔmbu sɛ̃sukɑ bɑ go.
Sɑnɑm mɛ tɔmbɑ tɔn be goomɔ, Esekiɛli u yɔ̃ mi. Yerɑ u yiirɑ u siriru tem girɑri, u nɔɔgiru suɑ wɔllɔ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kɑɑ Isireli be bɑ tie kpuro gowɑ wunɛn mɔru yen sɔ̃?
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, be Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn torɑnɑ nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Wee ben tem mɛ sɔɔ, tɔn goberɑ tɑ wɑ̃ɑ, gem sɑri. Domi bɑ mɔ̀, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ ben tem deri. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑɑmɔ ye bɑ mɔ̀.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛn tii nɑ̀ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑmɔ, nɑ ǹ bu mɛɛrimɔ kɑ wɔnwɔndu. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ tii nɛnumɔ. Kon bu ben dɑɑ kɔsiewɑ ye bɑ kuɑ.
Durɔ wi u yɑ̃ku kowon yɑ̃nu doke mi, u Yinni Gusunɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee, nɑ kuɑ kpuro ye ɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Esekiɛli u mɛɛrɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsii ben wɔllɔ. Mɑ u kpee gobigiru wɑ tɑ kɑ sinɑ kitɑru weenɛ.
Mɑ Gusunɔ u durɔ wi u yɑ̃ku kowon yɑ̃nu doke mi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ duo uruu ben bɑɑ sɔɔ, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so ben temɔ. Kpɑ ɑ dɔ̃ɔ gɛ̃ɛ gure wunɛn nɔmɑɔ wɔllun kɔ̃so ben suunu sɔɔn di kpɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ dɔ̃ɔ gɛ̃ɛ yi wisi wuu ge sɔɔ. Yerɑ Esekiɛli u wɑ durɔ wi, u dɑ u dɔ̃ɔ gɛ̃ɛ yi suɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u turɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten mi, wɔllun kɔ̃so be, bɑ yɔ̃ ten nɔm geu giɑ. Mɑ guru wiru tɑ dii te yibɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ yɑ seewɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so ben wɔllun di yɑ dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔwɔ. Mɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te, tɑ wiisu yibɑ. Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑn yɑm bururɑm sɔ̃ɔsirɑ sere kɑ ten yɑɑrɑɔ.
Mɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun kɑsenun wɔkinu nu nɔɔrɑ sere sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑɔ. Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre nge Gusunɔ Dɑm kpurogiin nɔɔwɑ gɑ gɑri mɔ̀.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wi u yɑ̃ku kowon yɑ̃nu sebuɑ mi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ doo ɑ dɔ̃ɔ suɑ uruu be sɔɔ, wɔllun kɔ̃so ben bɑɑ sɔɔ. Mɑ durɔ wi, u dɑ uruu ben bɔkuɔ.
Mɑ kɔ̃so ben turo u nɔmɑ dɛmiɛ dɔ̃ɔ giɑ, wi u wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ u kɑ ye dɔ̃ɔ gurɑ u durɔ wi wɛ̃. Mɑ durɔ wi, u kɑ doonɑ.
Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre tɔnun nɔmɑ yɑrimɑ sɑɑ kɔ̃so ben kɑsɑn tem di.
Mɑ Esekiɛli u mɑɑ uruu nnɛ wɑ, yen bɑɑyere yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so ben turon bɔkuɔ. Uruu yen bɑɑyere yɑ bɑllimɔwɑ nge kpee gobigiru.
Ye kpuro yɑ weenɛwɑ mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre tiɑ wɑ̃ɑ tiɑn sɔɔwɔ.
Yɑ koo kpĩ yu sĩ beri nnɛ kpuro yɑ kun tii sĩiyɛ. Mɑ yɑ dɔɔ mì giɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun wirɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Kɔ̃so ben wɑsi kɑ biru kɑ nɔmɑ kɑ kɑsenu, ye kpuro yɑ nɔni mɔwɑ. Nge mɛyɑ mɑɑ uruu nnɛ ye kpuro yɑ mɔ.
Mɑ Esekiɛli u nuɑ bɑ uruu be sokumɔ woo gunɑ.
Wuswɑɑ nnɛwɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so ben bɑɑwure u mɔ. Wuswɑɑ gbiikɑɑ yɑ kɑ Gusunɔn gɔrɑdogiɑ weenɛ. Yiruse yɑ kɑ tɔnugiɑ weenɛ. Itɑse yɑ kɑ gbee sunɔgiɑ weenɛ. Nnɛse mɑɑ yɑ kɑ gunɔ bɑkerugiɑ weenɛ.
Mɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so be, bɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ wɔllɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑre nge hunde koni ye u wɑ Kebɑrin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔ.
Bɑ̀ n swɑɑ wɔri, uruu be, bɑ rɑ n mɑɑ swɑɑ wɔriwɑ. Bɑ̀ n seewɑ bu kɑ yɔ̃, uruu be, bɑ ku rɑ bu deri.
Bɑ̀ n yɔ̃rɑ, uruu ben tii bɑ rɑ yɔ̃rewɑ. Bɑ̀ n yɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ bu yɔ̃wɑ. Domi hunde koni beyɑ, bɑ uruu be gɑwe.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ yɑ doonɑ dii kɔnnɔ gen min di mɑ yɑ nɑ yɑ sinɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so be sɔɔ.
Yerɑ Esekiɛli u wɑ kɔ̃so be, bɑ ben kɑsi dɛriɑ bɑ seewɑ bɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ kɑ uruu be. Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ yɔ̃rɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ. Mɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinnin yiikon girimɑ yɑ bɑllimɔ ben wɔllɔ.
Hunde koni ben bweserɑ Gusunɔ u derɑ u rɑɑ wɑ Kebɑriɔ. Mɑ u giɑ mɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobɑ.
Ben bɑɑwure u wuswɑɑ nnɛ mɔ kɑ kɑsenu nnɛ. Mɑ bɑ nɔmɑ mɔ nge tɔnugiɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben kɑsɑn temɔ.
Ben wuswɛɛ yi, yi kɑ hunde koni ye u wɑ Kebɑriɔ migii weenɛ. Ben bɑɑwure u dɔɔwɑ deedeeru mi u wuswɑɑ kisi.
Yinni Gusunɔn Hunde u Esekiɛli suɑ mɑ u kɑ nùn dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ. Kɔnnɔ gen miyɑ u tɔmbu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu wɑ. Be sɔɔ, u Yɑɑsɑniɑ Asurin bii tubɑ kɑ Pelɑtiɑ Bɛnɑyɑn bii. Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelibɑn wirugibu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, tɔn be ɑ wɑ mi, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ be bɑ kɔ̃sɑ bwisikumɔ mɑ bɑ tɔmbu bwisi kɔ̃si kɛ̃mɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.
Bɑ mɔ̀, n ǹ mɔ tɛ̃ sɑ ko dinu bɑni. Domi Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wekeru. Mɑ bɛsɛ yen tɔmbu sɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ te sɔɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, tɛ̃ tɔnun bii, ɑ bu gerusio.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔn Hunde u nùn yɔɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ yɛ̃ ye be Isirelibɑ bɑ bwisikumɔ kɑ ye bɑ gerumɔ.
Wee bɑ begibu goomɔ dɑbi dɑbinu wuu ge sɔɔ. Mɑ gonu yibɑ ben swɛɛ sɔɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, begii be bɑ go mi, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge yɑɑ. Mɑ wuu gen tii gɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge wekeru. Adɑmɑ be bɑ tie bɑ wɑsi, bɑ koo bu yɑrɑwɑ bu kɑ doonɑ.
Wee bɑ tɑbun bɛrum mɔ. Adɑmɑ kon de tɑɑ bi, bu bu deemɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ ye geruɑ.
Kon de bu yɑri wuu gen di. Kpɑ n bu tɔn tukobu nɔmu bɛriɑ. Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ bu sirisinɑ.
Tɑbu sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo gbi. Kon bu siri be Isirelibɑ, ben tem nɔɔ burɑ yerɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wuu ge, gɑ ǹ bu nɛnumɔ nge wekeru. Bɑ ǹ ko n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑɑ te sɔɔ. Ben tem nɔɔ burɑ yerɔwɑ kon bu siri.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wìn gere bɑ ǹ mɛm nɔɔwɛ, kɑ wìn woodɑbɑ bɑ ǹ swĩi. Mɑ bɑ sere bwese tuku ni nu kɑ bu sikerenɛn gɑri swĩi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Esekiɛli u Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri yi gerumɔ, yerɑ Pelɑtiɑ Bɛnɑyɑn bii u kpunɑ u gu. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Esekiɛli u wuswɑɑ tem girɑri u nɔɔgiru suɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, kɑɑ dewɑ Isireli be bɑ tie bu gbisuku?
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ bɑ Isirelibɑ, wunɛn mɛro bisibu, kɑ be bɑ tie bwisi kɛ̃mɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bu yɔ̃ro mi bɑ yoru dimɔ mi, bɑ n kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ tonde, domi be, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ mi, beyɑ bɑ tem mɛ wɛ̃.
Adɑmɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑɑ mɛ nɑ derɑ bɑ yɑrinɛ mi, bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem tukumɔ, sɔ̃ɔ teeru ko nɑ n kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ nge mɛ nɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Kpɑ n bu mɛnnɑ n yɑrɑ bwese nin suunu sɔɔn di mi bɑ yɑrinɛ mi, n bu Isirelibɑn tem wɛ̃.
Mɛyɑ bɑ koo nɑ kpɑ bu bũu ni kpuro wunɑ ni bɑ rɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ mi, ni nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ ǹ kĩ.
Kon bu gɔ̃ru teu wɛ̃ kpɑ n bu bwisiku kpɑɑnu wɛ̃. Kon ben gɔ̃ru ge gɑ rɑɑ bɔɔbu nge kperu mi wunɑ, kpɑ n bu gɔ̃ru kpɔɔ wɛ̃ ge gɑ du.
Kpɑ bu kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɑ, bu nɛn woodɑbɑ swĩi. Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbu, kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Adɑmɑ be bɑ yɔ̃rɑri bɑ ben kĩru swĩi bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ ni nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ ǹ kĩ mi, kon bu ben kookoosun ɑre kɔsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yen biruwɑ wɔllun kɔ̃so be, bɑ kɑsi dɛriɑ bɑ seewɑ kɑ ben uruu be sɑnnu. Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ yɑ sɔ̃ɔsire ben wɔllɔ.
Mɑ win yiikon girimɑ ye, yɑ seewɑ wuu suunun di yɑ dɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ guuru gɑrun wɔllɔ, wuun sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ.
Mɑ Gusunɔn Hunde u Esekiɛli suɑ kɑ̃si te sɔɔ, u kɑ wurɑmɑ Bɑbiloniɔ mi Isirelibɑ bɑ yoru dimɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ kɑ̃si te u wɑɑmɔ mi, tɑ kpɑ.
Mɑ u Isireli be bɑ yoru dimɔ mi, sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpuro ye Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ u wɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee ɑ wɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑn suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ nɔni mɔ ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ kĩ bu kɑ yɑm wɑ. Bɑ swɑsu mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ kĩ bu kɑ gɑri nɔ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ bɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ sɔɔru koowo kpɑ ɑ se ɑ doonɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ ben bɑɑwuren nɔni biru ɑ dɑ ɑ n wɑ̃ɑ gɑm. Sɔrɔkudo bɑ koo giɑ mɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ bwese mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ.
Yen biru Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ wunɛn yɑ̃nu mɛnnɔ ɑ yɑrɑ wunɛn dirun di sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ. Kpɑ ɑ yɑri wuu gen min di yokɑ ben bɑɑwuren nɔni biru nge wi bɑ yoru mwɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ gɑnɑ yɑbɑ ben nɔni biru ɑ wunɛn yɑ̃nu yɑrɑ min di.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, ɑ yɑ̃ɑ ni sɔɔwo ben nɔni biru kpɑ ɑ kɑ nu yɑri wɔ̃kuru. Kpɑ ɑ tii wɔ̃ke kɑ yɑsɑ ɑ ku kɑ tem mɛ mɛɛri. Domi nɑ kĩwɑ ɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru Isirelibɑn sɔ̃.
Mɑ u kuɑ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U yɑrɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ kɑ win sɔɔru nge wi bɑ yoru mwɑ. Yokɑ u dɑ u gbɑ̃rɑru yɑbɑ kɑ nɔmɑ u win yɑ̃ɑ ni suɑ u yɑrɑ wɔ̃kuru tɔmbun nɔni biru.
Buru buru Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ,
Isirelibɑ, mɛm nɔɔ sɑri be, bɑ̀ n nun bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, mbɑ ɑ mɔ̀ mi,
ɑ bu wisio ɑ nɛɛ, Isirelibɑn sunɔ wi u wɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ mi, wiyɑ ye ɑ mɔ̀ yɑ kɑ yɑ̃, kɑ sere mɑɑ Isirelibɑ kpuro be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi.
A sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩreru te tɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ bɑ koo yoru dɑ tem gɑm. Yɑ koo mɑɑ koorɑ.
Sunɔ wi u wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ u koo win yɑ̃nu gurɑ wɔ̃kuru kpɑ u yɑri. Bɑ koo gbɑ̃rɑru yɑbɑwɑ bu kɑ yɑri min di. Kpɑ u tii wɔ̃ke u ku kɑ win tem wɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon nùn yinɑ bɛriɑ kpɑ u wɔri ye sɔɔ. Kon kɑ nùn dɑ Bɑbilonin temɔ. Adɑmɑ u ǹ tem mɛ wɑsi. Miyɑ u koo gbi.
Win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ win kɔ̃sobu kɑ win tɑbu kowobu be kpurowɑ kon yɑrinɑsiɑ kpɑ n de bu bu tɑkobi sɔkiri.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ̀ n bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ kon de gɑbu bu kisirɑ tɑbun di kɑ gɔ̃ɔrun di kɑ bɑrɑrun di kpɑ bu wɑ bu kɑ gere kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kuɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, kɑ nɑndɑbɑ kɑɑ wunɛn pɛ̃ɛ di kpɑ ɑ n diirimɔ ɑ n kɑ nim nɔrumɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, be, Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ koo ben dĩɑnu diwɑ kɑ bɛrum kpɑ bu nim nɔ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu. Domi ben tem mu kuɑ bɑnsu. Gɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuro, nu koo kɑm kowɑ ben tɔn dɑm dɔrebun sɔ̃.
Wuu si su tɔmbu dɑbi su koo kowɑ bɑnsu, kpɑ tem mɛ kpuro mu kɑm ko. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔndu mɔ̀ bɑ n mɔ̀, wee tɔ̃rɑ dɛnyɑmɔ, ɑdɑmɑ kɑ̃si nin gɑrɑ kun koorɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon de mɔn te, tu kpe. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tu gerumɔ Isireliɔ. Adɑmɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃rɑ turuku mɔ̀. Kɑ̃si nin bɑɑtere tɑ koo koorɑwɑ.
Domi nin gɑru sɑri te tɑ koo kɑm ko. Nɛn gɑri gɛɛ mɑɑ sɑri yi bɑ geruɑ bu kɑ bu nɔni wɔ̃ke Isireliɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ye nɑ geruɑ kon ye ko. Yɑ koo koorɑwɑ yɑ ǹ tɛɛmɔ. Be, mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ, kɑ gem ben nɔni birɑ kon de gɑri yi, yi koorɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee Isirelibɑ bɑ nɛɛ, kɑ̃si ni ɑ wɑ mi, nu ǹ koorɑmɔ tɛ̃. Nu koo koorɑwɑ sere sɑɑ gɑɑ. Yen sɔ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ,
nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, gɑri yi nɑ geruɑ kpuro yi koo koorɑwɑ tɛ̃, yɑ ǹ tɛɛmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ tɔn be gerusio be bɑ tii kuɑ nɛn sɔmɔbu. A de bu swɑɑ dɑki ye kon bu sɔ̃.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kɔ̃sɑ koo bu deemɑ be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɑri bɑkɑsu. Domi ben tiin bwisikunɑ bɑ swĩi bɑ kɑ gɑri gerumɔ, bɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu gɑnu wɑɑmɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ bɛɛn sɔmɔbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbeeku bɔ̃nu ni nu bɔsu bɑnsɔ.
Wee bɑ ǹ dere bu gbɑ̃rɑrun kuunu kɔre. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gbɑ̃rɑru bɑnɛ tu kɑ bu gɑnɛ nɛ, Gusunɔn mɔrun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Wee bɑ kɑ̃si weesuginu sɑɑrimɔ, mɑ bɑ gɑri gerumɔ yi yi ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gem. Bɑ mɔ̀, wee nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ bu ye kpuro wɛ̃. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ bu gɔre. Mɑ bɑ tɑmɑɑ kon ben gɑrin dɑm sirewɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɑ nɛn sɔmɔ be sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ ben kɑ̃sinu nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ ni ben tii bɑ sekɑ. Ben gɑri yi mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ weesu. Bɑ tɑmɑɑ nɛn gɑriyɑ bɑ tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. N deemɑ nɑ ǹ mɑm kɑ bu gɑri koore.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, kon bu wɔrimɑ domi bɑ kɑ̃sinu sekɑ mɑ bɑ weesu kpɑrɑmɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni gerumɔ.
Kon bu nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi be, be bɑ weesu kpɑrɑmɔ mi. Bɑ ǹ ɑyeru wɑsi nɛn tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ koo ben yĩsɑ go mi nɛn tɔmbun yĩsɑ yoruɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wurɔ ben temɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ koo kɑ giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee bɑ nɛn tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, bɔri yɛndɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ bɔri yɛndu gɑru sɑri. Nɛn tɔmbɑ gɑni seeyɑmɔ. Mɑ sɔmɔ be, bɑ ye soo tɛɛnimɔ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ be bɑ soo tɛɛnimɔ mi sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, gɑnɑ ye, yɑ koo wɔrumɑ. Guru bɑkɑ yɑ koo nɛ kɑ kpenu sɑnnu kpɑ woo bɔkɔ gu se.
Gɑnɑ ye, yɑ̀ n wɔrumɑ sɑɑ yerɑ tɔmbɑ koo bikiɑ bu nɛɛ, mbɑ soo yen ɑrufɑɑni ye bɑ tɛɛni mi.
Yen sɔ̃, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon de nɛn mɔru yu woo bɔkɔ seeyɑ, kpɑ guru bɑkɑ yu nɛ. Kpɑ guru kpenu nu nɛ kɑ dɑm nu gɑ̃ɑnu kpuro go.
Kon gɑnɑ ye surɑ yu wɔrumɑ temɔ, kpɑ yen kpɛɛkpɛɛku gu sɔ̃ɔsirɑ. Yɑ koo bɛɛ wɔri kpɑ i gbisuku. Sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon nɛn mɔru yɔ̃suwɑ mɑm mɑm gɑnɑ yen sɔ̃ kɑ be bɑ ye soo doken sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo gere bu nɛɛ, gɑnɑ ye, yɑ wɔrumɑ. Be bɑ rɑɑ ye soo doke, ben goo kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ!
Sɔmɔ weesugii be, bɑ kpɑ be, be bɑ rɑɑ gɑri gerumɔ Yerusɑlɛmun sɔ̃, be, be bɑ rɑ n wɑɑmɔ kɑ̃siru sɔɔ mɑ bɔri yɛndɑ wɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɔri yɛndu gɑru sɑri. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑn tɔn kurɔ be bɑ tii kuɑ nɛn sɔmɔbu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ,
bɔ̃rurobɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Domi bɑ kĩɑsu gbinumɔ tɔmbun nɔm wĩinu sɔɔ nge bɔki mɑ bɑ tɔmbu kpuro yɑsi sɛ̃kemɔ wirɔ bukurobu kɑ bibɔ kpɑ bu wɑ bɑ n kɑ tɔn be tɑɑre. Bɑ kĩwɑ bu nɛn tɔmbun wɑ̃ɑru kpeesiɑ kpɑ nɑ n begiru beruɑ.
Wee bɑ ǹ mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ nɛn tɔmbun wuswɑɑɔ dĩɑ nɔm wɔɔnun sɔ̃. Mɑ bɑ tɔmbu goomɔ be n ǹ weenɛ bu go. Mɑ bɑ gɑbu deri be n weenɛ bu go. Mɛyɑ bɑ rɑ nɛn tɔmbu weesu kue kpɑ bɑ n ben wee si swɑɑ dɑki.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu wɔri ben kĩɑ sin sɔ̃, si bɑ kɑ tɔmbun wɑ̃ɑru mwɛɛrimɔ mi. Kon bu si mwɑɑriwɑ n gɛ̃ɛku kpɑ n be bɑ rɑɑ mwɑ yɑkiɑ.
Kon ben yɑsi yi gɛ̃ɛku kpɑ n nɛn tɔmbu yɑkiɑ ben nɔmɑn di. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bɑ n bu mɔ. Bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Ben weesun sɔ̃, bɑ gemgibu nukuru sɑnkɑ, be, be nɑ ǹ dɑɑ kĩ n kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ. Bɑ yinɑ bu tɔn kɔ̃sobu kirɔ ko bu kɑ ben kom kɔ̃sum deri kpɑ bu ben wɑ̃ɑru yɑkiɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ̃sinu kɑ gɑri weesugii mɔ̀. Kon nɛn tɔmbu yɑkiɑ ben nɔmɑn di. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ koo kɑ giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru Isirelibɑn guro gurobu gɑbu bɑ nɑ bɑ Esekiɛli deemɑ u kɑ bu bikiɑru kuɑ Gusunɔn mi.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, tɔn be, bɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑmɔwɑ ben gɔ̃ruɔ, mɑ bɑ tii nu wɛ̃, mɑ nu derɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ durum sɔɔ. Yerɑ bɑ tɑmɑɑ kon ben bikiɑru wurɑ?
A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, Isireli goo ù n tii wɛ̃ bũu sɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ, mɑ tɑ derɑ u torɑmɔ, mɑ u nɑ nɛn sɔmɔ goon mi u kɑ nùn bikiɑru kuɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mi, nɛn tiiwɑ kon yɛ̃ro wisi nge mɛ̀n nɔɔ win bũnu dɑbiru nɛ.
Nɛn wisi biyɑ bu koo de Isirelibɑ bu bwisiku ben gɔ̃ruɔ be, be bɑ mɑn yinɑ ben bũu sɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛnɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bu gɔ̃ru gɔsio kpɑ bu ben bũnu deri kɑ mɑɑ kom kɔ̃sum mɛ bɑ mɔ̀, mɛ mu ǹ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ wɛ̃remɔ.
Isirelibɑn goo ǹ kun mɛ sɔɔ goo ben suunu sɔɔ ù n mɑn deri u bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ mɑ tɑ derɑ u torɑmɔ mɑ u nɑ nɛn sɔmɔn mi u kɑ bikiɑru ko nɛn mi, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn tiiwɑ kon nùn wisi.
Kon yɛ̃ro wɔriwɑ n sɛɛyɑsiɑ kpɑ u n sɑ̃ɑ seedɑ ye bɑ ko n dɑ kɑ mɔndu ko. Kon nùn wunɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbun suunu sɔɔn di, kpɑ i giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Nɛn sɔmɔ goo ù n wurɑ durɔ wi, u nùn nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ, mɑ u nùn bikiɑru kuɑ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ derɑ u kuɑ mɛ. Nɛn tiiwɑ kon sɔmɔ wi wunɑ nɛn tɔmbun suunu sɔɔn di.
Sɔmɔ wi kɑ durɔ wi u bikiɑru nɑ mi, be kpurowɑ bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ torobu. Bɑ koo mɑɑ ben torɑ nin ɑre sɔbe.
Nge mɛyɑ be Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tondɑmɔ nɛn swɑɑn di. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben tii disi dokemɔ kɑ ben torɑ dɑbi ni. Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbu kpɑ nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, su tɛ̃ nɛɛ, tem gɑm tɔmbu bɑ mɑn mɛm nɔɔbu sɑriru kuɑ. Mɑ nɑ bu nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi nɑ ben dĩɑnu kɑm koosiɑ nɑ bu gɔ̃ɔru kpɛ̃ɛ bɑ gbisukumɔ be kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenɔ kpuro,
bɑɑ tɔmbu itɑ beni Nɔwɛ kɑ Dɑniɛli kɑ Yoobu bɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ mi, bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu tem mɛn tɔmbu kpuro fɑɑbɑ ko ben gem sɔ̃. Ben tii tɔnɑwɑ ben gem mu koo de bu fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Ǹ kun mɛ nɑ̀ n derɑ gbeeku yɛɛ yi tem mɛ wɔri yi bu go kpuro kpɑ tem mɛ, mu ko bɑnsu sere goo kun mɑɑ sɑrɔ mi, gbeeku yɛɛ yin sɔ̃,
sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, bɑɑ tɔmbu itɑ be, bɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, tem mɛgibu bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Tɔmbu itɑ be tɔnɑwɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ, bɑɑ ben tiin bibu bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Mɑ tem mɛ, mu koo kowɑ bɑnsu.
Ǹ kun mɛ nɑ̀ n derɑ bɑ tɔn be tɑbu wɔrimɑ, mɑ bɑ bu kɑm koosiɑ sere kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenɔ,
bɑɑ tɔmbu itɑ be, bɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ mi, be tɔnɑwɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Sere kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru, bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu mɑm ben tiin bibu fɑɑbɑ ko.
Ǹ kun mɛ nɑ̀ n derɑ bɑrɑrɑ duɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ gbisukɑ be kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenɔ,
bɑɑ Nɔwɛ kɑ Dɑniɛli kɑ Yoobu bɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, tem mɛn tɔmbu bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu fɑɑbɑ wɑ ben sɔ̃. Be itɑ ye tɔnɑwɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ ben gem sɔ̃. Bɑɑ mɑm ben tiin bibu bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu fɑɑbɑ ko ben gem sɔ̃.
Yen biruwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee nɑ Yerusɑlɛmu wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ nnɛ yeni kpɛ̃ɛ n kɑ yen tɔmbu kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbenu go. Yerɑ tɑbu kɑ gɔ̃ɔru kɑ gbeeku yɛɛ gɔbi kɑ bɑrɑnu.
Adɑmɑ gɑbu bɑ koo tiɑrɑ kpɑ bu bu yɑrɑ wuun di, kpɑ bu bɛɛ deemɑ kpiki yeru mi. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, ì n ben dɑɑ kɑ ben kookoosu wɑ, biti kun mɑɑ bɛɛ mɔ̀ kɔ̃sɑ ye nɑ Yerusɑlɛmu kuɑn sɔ̃.
Yɑ koo bɛɛn nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ ì n ben dɑɑ kɑ ben kookoosu wɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, i ko i giɑ mɑ n ǹ kɑm sɔɔ nɑ bu wɑhɑlɑ yebɑ kpɛ̃ɛ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, resɛm dɑ̃ɑ yɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye yɑ tie bɛɛrɛ kere? Yen dɑ̃ɑ kɑ̃ɑsɑ yɑ dɑ̃ɑ kɑ̃ɑsi yi yi tie kere?
Bɑ koo kpĩ bu ye dendi bu kɑ sɔmburu gɑru ko? Bɑ koo kpĩ bu kɑ ye gɑbɑtiɑ ko?
Geemɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ bu kɑ ye dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃re ɑdɑmɑ yen nɔsu yiru kpuro kɑ yen suunu sɔɔ yɑ̀ n dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ sɔmbu terɑ̀ yɑ koo mɑɑ kpĩ yu ko.
Sɑnɑm mɛ yɑ ǹ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑre bɑ ǹ kɑ ye gɑ̃ɑnu kue. Kɑɑ sere gere ye yɑ den dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ, yɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑru koorɔ?
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nge mɛ dɑ̃nu sɔɔ resɛm dɑ̃ɑ bɑ rɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke, nge mɛyɑ kon mɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Kon bu wɔrimɑ. Bɑ tɑmɑɑ bɑ yɑrɑ dɔ̃ɔn di. Adɑmɑ dɔ̃ɔ wi, u koo nɑ u bu di, kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon de ben tem mɛ, mu ko bɑnsu, domi bɑ mɑn mɛm nɔɔbu sɑriru koosi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yerusɑlɛmu yen kɔ̃sɑ sɔ̃ɔsi sɑɑ Esekiɛlin nɔɔn di, u nɛɛ,
<range>
Yerusɑlɛmu, bɑ nun mɑrɑwɑ Kɑnɑnin temɔ. Wunɛn tundo u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Amɔrebɑn bweseru. Mɑ wunɛn mɛro u sɑ̃ɑ Hɛtibɑn bweseru.
Dɔmɑ te bɑ nun mɑrɑ bɑ ǹ nun bwiɑ bure. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nun woburɑ ɑ kɑ dɛɛrɑ. Bɑ ǹ nun sĩre kɑ bɔru. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nun bekuru tɛ̃kusi.
Goo kun wunɛn wɔnwɔndu kue u sere nun gɑ̃ɑ nin gɑɑ kuɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ nun kɔ̃wɑ yɑkɑsɔ dɔmɑ te bɑ nun mɑrɑ, domi bɑ nun tusɑ.
Sɑɑ ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ sɑrɔ wunɛn bɔkuɔ, nɑ wɑ ɑ wɔri mɔ̀ wunɛn mɑru yɑ̃nu sɔɔ. Mɑ nɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bu de ɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɑɑ mɛ ɑ yɛm woburɑ.
Mɑ nɑ derɑ ɑ kpɛ̃ɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ yɑkɑsɔ. A kpɛ̃ɑ ɑ kuɑ kurɔ burɔ. Wunɛn bwɑ̃su su ye. Mɑ wunɛn seri yi kpɛ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ tererɑ ɑ sĩimɔ mɑm mɑm.
Mɑ nɑ sɑrɑ wunɛn bɔkuɔ nɑ nun mɛɛrɑ mɑ nɑ wɑ sɑɑ yɑ turɑ su kɑ kĩru ko. Mɑ nɑ nɛn yɑberun soo suɑ nɑ kɑ wunɛn tereru wukiri. Mɑ nɑ kɑ nun ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri nɑ nɛɛ, ɑ kuɑ nɛgii. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Mɑ nɑ nun woburɑ kɑ nim, nɑ yɛm mɛ ɑ mwɑɑre wunɑ, mɑ nɑ nun gum sɑwɑ.
Mɑ nɑ nun yɑbe te bɑ sɔmɑ kuɑ dokeɑ kɑ bɑrɑ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ gɔnɑ bɑ burɑru koosi, kɑ sɛ̃kɑtiɑ ye bɑ kuɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii, kɑ sere yɑbe geeru.
Mɑ nɑ nun burɑ yɑ̃nu dokeɑ kɑ sumi nɔmɑɔ kɑ sɑbɑ wĩirɔ.
Mɑ nɑ tɑɑbu doke wunɛn wɛ̃rɔ kɑ swɑɑ tonkunu kɑ sere yɑsi bɛɛrɛgiɑ wunɛn wirɔ.
Nge mɛyɑ nɑ nun burɑru kuɑ kɑ wurɑ kɑ sii geesu kɑ sere beku geeru te bɑ kuɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii kɑ yɑbe te bɑ sɔmɑ dokeɑ. Dĩɑ ni ɑ rɑ mɑɑ di, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ som gem kɑ tim kɑ olifin gum. Mɑ ɑ burɑm sosimɔ ɑ dɔɔ nge sinɑ kurɔ.
Mɑ ɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ wunɛn burɑm sɔ̃. Wunɛn burɑm mɛ, mu yibɑwɑ nɛn burɑ yɑ̃ɑ ni nɑ nun kuɑn sɔ̃. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu, ɑ wunɛn nɑɑnɛ doke wunɛn burɑm sɔɔ. Mɑ ɑ tii kuɑ nge kurɔ tɑnɔ yĩsi te ɑ yɑrɑn sɔ̃. Tɔnu bɑɑwure wi u sɑrɔ mi kpuro, ɑ rɑ nùn tii wɛ̃wɑ.
Mɑ ɑ wunɛn yɑ̃ɑ nɔniginu suɑ ɑ kɑ dɑ ɑ wunɛn gungunu mi ɑ rɑ bũnu sɑ̃ burɑru kuɑ. Miyɑ ɑ tii wɛ̃. Ye ɑ kuɑ mi, goo kun yen bweseru wɑɑre. Mɛyɑ yen bweserɑ kun mɑɑ koorɑmɔ.
Mɑ ɑ wunɛn burɑ yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ wurɑ kɑ sii geesu suɑ ɑ kɑ bũu tɔn durɔbu sekɑ mɑ ɑ nu sɑkɑrɑru koosi.
Mɑ ɑ wunɛn yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ sɔmɑ doke suɑ ɑ bũu ni wukiri. Mɑ ɑ mɑɑ nɛn gum kɑ nɛn turɑre suɑ ɑ nu wɛ̃.
Mɑ ɑ mɑɑ dĩɑ ni nɑ rɑ kɑ nun diisie suɑ ɑ kɑ bũu ni yɑ̃kuru kuɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ mɑn yɑ̃ku nubu durorugiru kue. Dĩɑ niyɑ som kɑ gum kɑ tim. Yeniwɑ yɑ koorɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɑkɑrɑ te, tɑ ǹ nun turɑ. Mɑ ɑ wunɛn bii be ɑ mɑn mɑruɑ mwɛɛrɑ ɑ kɑ bũu ni yɑ̃kuru kuɑ.
Wee ɑ nɛn bibu sɑkirɑ ɑ kɑ bũnu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru kuɑ.
Yen kom kɔ̃sum mɛ sɔɔ, ɑ ǹ mɑɑ wunɛn wɔndiɑru yɑɑye kɑ sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ wɑ̃ɑ tereru wunɛn mɑru yɛm sɔɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ mɑ ɑ kuɑ bɔ̃rurɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye ɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Wee ɑ tii sɑkɑrɑ kunu girɑ kɑ mɑɑ bũu turɑnu bɑɑmɑ kpuro.
Wee swɑɑ kɛɛnɑnu bɑɑmɑ ɑ bũu turɑnu kuɑ, mɑ ɑ kom kɔ̃sum kuɑ ɑ tii tɔmbu kpuro wɛ̃. Be bɑ gesi sɑrɔ mi kpuro, bɑ rɑ kɑ nun dendiwɑ. Mɑ ɑ wunɛn sɑkɑrɑru kpɛ̃ɑsiɑ.
A kɑ wunɛn berusebu Egibitigibu be bɑ wɑsin dɑm mɔ mi, sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ. Mɑ ɑ wunɛn sɑkɑrɑru kpɛ̃ɑsiɑ ɑ kɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ.
Yerɑ nɑ nun nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi nɑ nun nɔmɑ dɛmiɛ. Mɑ nɑ nun doke nɛn yibɛrɛbɑn nɔmu sɔɔ. Yibɛrɛ berɑ, Filisitibɑ be bɑ biti soorɑ wunɛn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃.
Yen biru mɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ kɑ Asirigibu sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ, domi ɑ ǹ debɑ. A dɑ ɑ tii bu wɛ̃. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, ɑ ǹ debɑ.
Mɑ ɑ dɑ ɑ kɑ Kɑnɑnibɑ sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ kɑ Bɑbilonigibu. Kɑ mɛ, ɑ ǹ debɑ.
Annɑ ɑ dɑm sɑriru wɑ mi. A tii kuɑwɑ nge sɑkɑrɑ kowobun yinni.
Domi ɑ sɑkɑrɑ kunu girɑ swɑɑ kɛɛnɑnɔ mɑ ɑ bũu turɑnu kuɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuro, ɑ ku rɑ mɑm mɑɑ kurɔ tɑnɔ gobi mwɛ.
A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kurɔ tɑnɔ sɑkɑrɑ kowo wi u durɔ tukobu mwɑɑmɔ win durɔn ɑyerɔ.
Kurɔ tɑnɔ bɑɑwurewɑ bɑ rɑ gɑ̃ɑnu kɛ̃. Adɑmɑ wunɛ, ɑ durɔ tɑnɔbu gɑ̃ɑnu wɛ̃ɛmɔ kpɑ ɑ kɑ bu gɑwɑmɑ beri berikɑ kpuron di.
Ye kurɔ tɑnɔbu bɑ ku rɑ ko yerɑ ɑ kuɑ sɑkɑrɑru sɔɔ, domi ye kɑɑ kɑ durɔ tɑnɔbu kɛ̃nu mwɑɑri, wunɛn tiiwɑ ɑ rɑ bu wɛ̃.
Tɛ̃, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu, ɑ mɑn swɑɑ dɑkio wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge kurɔ tɑnɔ.
Wee ɑ derɑ bɑ wunɛn dukiɑ yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑɑmɑ, mɑ bɑ wunɛn tereru wɑ sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ sɑkɑrɑru mɔ̀ kɑ bũnu ni ɑ kĩ, ni nu kun mɑm wɑɑbu wɑ̃. Mɑ ɑ wunɛn bibun yɛm yɑri ɑ kɑ bũu ni yɑ̃kuru kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon wunɛn kĩnɑsi be mɛnnɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ be ɑ tusɑ. Be kpurowɑ kon mɛnnɑmɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuron di, kpɑ n nun yɔ̃su tereru ben wuswɑɑɔ.
Kon nun sɛɛyɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ tɔn gowobu kɑ kurɔ tɑnɔbu sɛɛyɑsie. Yɛm mu koo nun wukiri nɛn mɔru kɑ nɛn nisinun sɑɑbu.
Kon nun bɛri wunɛn kĩnɑsi ben nɔmɑɔ. Bɑ koo wunɛn kunu kɑ wunɛn gunguu ni kɔsuku. Bɑ koo wunɛn burɑ yɑ̃ɑ ni ɑ doke potiri kpɑ bu nun yɔ̃su tereru.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon tɔmbu seeyɑ bu nun seesi bu kpenu kɑsuku kpɑ bu nun tɑkobibɑ sɔkiri.
Bɑ koo wunɛn diɑ dɔ̃ɔ mɛniki kpɑ bu nun sɛɛyɑsiɑ kurɔ dɑbinun wuswɑɑɔ kpɑ n de wunɛn sɑkɑrɑru tu kpe. A ǹ mɑɑ ben goo gɑ̃ɑnu wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Nɛn mɔru koo sure. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ nun nisinu mɔ̀. Mɛyɑ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ nun mɔru mɔ̀.
Kɑ mɛ, yèn sɔ̃ ɑ ǹ yɑɑye nge mɛ nɑ nun nɔɔri wunɛn birun di, mɑ ɑ nɛn mɔru seeyɑ kɑ wunɛn kookoosu, yen sɔ̃, kon de ɑ yen ɑre wɑ. Domi ɑ sekuru sɑri kom kuɑ mɑ ɑ bũnu sɑ̃wɑ.
Wee be bɑ rɑ mɔn teni ko bu nɛɛ, nge mɛ mɛro u sɑ̃ɑ, nge mɛyɑ win bii wɔndiɑ u rɑ n sɑ̃ɑ, bɑ koo nɛɛ, wunɑ tɑ kɑ yɑ̃.
A sɑ̃ɑwɑ wunɛn mɛron bii wi u durɔ kɑ bibu yinɑ. A sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wunɛn mɑɑbu be bɑ durɔ kɑ bibu yinɑ. Bɛɛn mɛro u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Hɛti. Mɑ bɛɛn tundo u sɑ̃ɑ Amɔregii.
Wunɛn mɔɔ wi u wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, wiyɑ Sɑmɑri kɑ yen bii wɔndiɑbɑ. Wunɛn wɔnɔ wi u mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ wiyɑ Sodomu kɑ yen bibu.
N ǹ mɔ ben yirɑ ɑ swĩi tɔnɑ. Ye ɑ kuɑ yɑ kpɑ̃. Wee ɑ sɑnkirɑ ɑ bu kere wunɛn swɛɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru Sodomu ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ wunɛn wɔnɔ yɑ ǹ kue nge mɛ ɑ kuɑ wunɛ kɑ wunɛn bibu.
Torɑ ni yɑ kuɑ wee. Yɑ tii sue mɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ doo nɔɔru kɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Yɑ ku rɑ wɔnwɔndobu kɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu somi.
Wunɛn mɛro bisi be, bɑ tɔnu bie bɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ nɛn nɔni sɔɔ. Ye nɑ wɑ mɛ, yerɑ nɑ bu girɑ.
Wunɛn mɔɔ Sɑmɑri kun mɑm wunɛn torɑrun sɑkɑ kue. Wunɛn kɔ̃sɑ yɑ wigiɑ dɑbinu kerɑ. Mɑ wunɛn kom kɔ̃sum mu derɑ bɑ nun sɑnɔ kerɑ.
Wunɛ wi ɑ rɑ rɑɑ bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ wee ɑ sekuru wɑ. Domi wunɛn kom kɔ̃sum mu begim kerɑ. Bɑ̀ n wunɛn dɑɑ ye mɛɛrɑ bɑ rɑ deemɛwɑ be, bɑ mɑm dɛɛre. Tɛ̃ ɑ kuɑ sekurugii yèn sɔ̃ bɑ̀ n wunɛn dɑɑ mɛɛrɑ bɑ rɑ wɑ bɑ sɑnɔ sɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yerusɑlɛmu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, kon Sodomu kɑ Sɑmɑri kɑ ben bii wɔndiɑbɑ seeyɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu.
Wunɛn mɔɔ Sɑmɑri ye, kɑ wunɛn wɔnɔ Sodomu ben nukurɑ koo yɛmiɑ yèn sɔ̃ wunɛn tii ɑ sekuru wɑ.
Bɑ koo wurɑmɑ nge yellu be, kɑ ben bibu. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ wunɛn tii kɑɑ wurɑmɑ nge yellu wunɛ kɑ wunɛn bibu sɑnnu.
Sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ tii sue, ɑ rɑ kɑ Sodomu gɑri kowɑ kɑ tii suɑbu wunɛn kɔ̃sɑ yu sere sɔ̃ɔsirɑ bɑtumɑ sɔɔ.
Tɛ̃, wunɑ Edɔmubɑ kɑ Filisitibɑ bɑ koo yɛ̃ɛ. Wee bɑ nun gɛmɑ yɑm kpuro.
Mɑ ɑ wunɛn sekuru sɑriru kɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn ɑre sɔɔwɑ. Nɛ Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, wee ɑ mɑn gɛmɑ. A ǹ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni yibie. Yen sɔ̃, kon nun kɔsie ye ɑ mɑn kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, nɑ ǹ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni ye duɑrimɔ ye nɑ kɑ nun bɔkuɑ wunɛn wɔndiɑrun di. Kon mɑɑ kɑ nun ɑrukɑwɑni bɔke yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Kɑɑ bwisiku ye ɑ kuɑ kpɑ sekuru tu nun mwɑ nɑ̀ n nun wunɛn mɑɑbu kɑ wɔnɔbu nɔmu bɛriɑ bu nun wiru kpĩiyɑ nge wunɛn bibu. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ ye mɔ̀ ɑrukɑwɑni ye nɑ kɑ nun bɔkuɑn sɔ̃.
Kon kpɑm kɑ nun nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni bɔke kpɑ ɑ giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ yɑɑyɑ ye ɑ kuɑ gɑsɔ, kpɑ sekuru tu nun mwɑ sere ɑ kpɑnɑ ɑ gɑri gere. Adɑmɑ nɛ kon nun wunɛn torɑnu kpuro suuru kuɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑ mɔndu kuo.
A nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, gunɔ bɑkeru gɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɑ kɑsɑ dɛ̃u mɑ tɑ sɑn bɑkɑsu mɔ si su nɔni bwese bwesekɑ mɔ. Mɑ tɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ tɑ dɑ sere Libɑnin guurun wii kpiirɔ. Mɑ tɑ dɑ tɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛdurun wii kpiiru wĩɑ.
Mɑ tɑ dɑ̃ɑ ten kɑ̃ɑsɑ ye yɑ gunum bo wĩɑ tɑ kɑ dɑ tɑ yi tem mi bɑ rɑ tenkuru ko, wuu gè sɔɔ tenkubɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Mɑ tɑ dɑ̃ɑ kpii pɔturɑ gɑɑ suɑ tɑ dɑ tɑ girɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ ye yɑ rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ nim bɔkuɔ mi tem gem mu wɑ̃ɑ, mi nim mu yibɑ.
Kpii pɔturɑ ye, yɑ seewɑ yɑ kpɛ̃ɑ nge resɛm koru te tɑ yɑsiɑ ɑdɑmɑ tɑ ǹ gunu. Mɑ ten kɑ̃ɑsi yi mɛɛrɑ gunɔ bɑke ten berɑ giɑ. Mɑ ten gbini yi duɑ tem mɛn sɔɔwɔ. Mɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye, yɑ gɔsiɑ resɛm, yɑ kpɑrɑ yɑ kɑ̃ɑsi kuɑ.
Yen biruwɑ gunɔ bɑkeru gɑrɑ nɑ tɑ kɑsɑ dɛ̃u. Ten sɑnsu tɑɑsinɛ. Mɑ resɛm koo te, tɑ ten gbini kɑ ten kɑ̃ɑsi gɔsie gunɔ bɑke ten mi giɑ, domi tɑ tɑmɑɑ tɑ koo nim wɑ mi giɑ.
N deemɑ tɑ rɑɑ girewɑ tem gem sɔɔ mi nim yibɑ kpɑ tu kɑ̃ɑsi geenu ko tu bii geenu mɑ kpɑ tɑ n sɑ̃ɑ resɛm geɑ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bikiɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, resɛm yen bweseru yɑ koo kpĩ yu kuurɑ? Gunɔ bɑke gbiikii te, tɑ koo wurɑ tu ye deri tɑ kun yen gbini wukurɑ? Tɑ koo wurɑ tɑ kun yen mɑrum go, kpɑ ten kpɑrɑ kpɛm mɛ, mu gberɑ? Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, n ǹ mɑɑ tilɑsi tɔn dɑbinu bu nɑ bu kɑ ye wukɑ.
Wee tɑ duurɑ, ɑdɑmɑ tɑ koo kuurɑ? Sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun woo gɑ̀ n tu bɑbɑ, tɑ ǹ koo gberɑ? Geemɑ tɑ koo gberɑ mi tɑ duurɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
ɑ Yudɑn mɛm nɔɔ sɑri be bikio ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ mɔn ten tubusiɑnu yɛ̃? A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u dɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. U ben sinɑ boko mwɑ kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu mɑ u kɑ bu dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ.
Mɑ u turo gɔsɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ nge kpii pɔturɑ sinɑ bibu sɔɔ, u kɑ nùn ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkuɑ. U nùn bɔ̃rusiɑ. Mɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wi, u ben bukurobu gurɑ u kɑ dɑ win temɔ.
Kpɑ Yudɑbɑn tem mu biru wurɑ, mu ku mɑɑ kuurɑ. Kpɑ bu win ɑrukɑwɑni ye mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Adɑmɑ be Yudɑbɑ bɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wi seesi bɑ sɔmɔbu gɔrɑ Egibitiɔ bu kɑ dumi kɑsumɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ tɔn dɑbinu. Wi u yen bweseru kuɑ, u koo kisirɑ? Domi u ɑrukɑwɑni kusiɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, sinɑ boko wi, u koo gbiwɑ sunɔ wi u nùn bɑndu wɛ̃n temɔ. Domi u ǹ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibie. Bɑbiloni miyɑ u koo gbi.
Bɑɑ Egibitin sunɔ ù n tɑbu kowo dɑbiru mɔ be bɑ dɑm mɔ, u ǹ kpɛ̃ u bu somi bu kɑ tii yinɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u koo nɑ u wɔrusu gbe u tɑbu sĩɑ kpĩ u kɑ tɔn dɑbinu go.
Domi durɔ wi, u mɑɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ, mɑ u ɑrukɑwɑni kusiɑ yè sɔɔ u rɑɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru doke. Yen sɔ̃, u ǹ kisirɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, nɛn ɑrukɑwɑniwɑ Isirelibɑn sinɑ boko u ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ u kusiɑ. Yen sɔ̃, u koo yen ɑre wɑ.
Kon nùn yinɑ bɛriɑ kpɑ u wɔri ye sɔɔ. Kon kɑ nùn dɑ Bɑbiloniɔ. Miyɑ kon nùn siri win nɑɑnɛ sɑri te u kuɑn sɔ̃.
Win tɑbu kowo be bɑ koo duki su, kon bu nɑɑ swĩiwɑ n go kɑ tɑkobi. Be bɑ tiɑrɑ kpɑ bu yɑrinɑ nge woo. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, nɛn tiiwɑ kon dɑ̃ɑ kɑ̃ɑsɑ kpɛmɑ mɛɛri sɛduru yen wii kpiirɔ kpɑ n ye burɑ, kpɑ n dɑ n ye girɑ guuru gɑrun wɔllɔ te tɑ gunu.
Kon ye girɑwɑ guuru gɑrun wɔllɔ te tɑ gunum bo Isireliɔ. Ten kɑ̃ɑsi yi koo kuurɑwɑ kpɑ tu binu mɑ tɑ n sɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑ te tɑ wɑɑbu wɑ̃. Gunɔ bwese bwesekɑ yɑ koo sokuru ko ten kɑ̃ɑsi sɔɔ. Kpɑ su n kukuɑ ten sɑɑrɔ.
Sɑɑ yerɑ dɑ̃nu kpuro nu koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. Nɛnɑ nɑ rɑ dɑ̃ɑ ni nu gunu kɑwe, kpɑ n ni nu piiburu bo gunum sosi. Mɛyɑ nɑ rɑ ni nu wuru bekusu sɑ̃ɑ gberɑsie, kpɑ n ni nu gbere bɔrɔm dokeɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Mɛyɑ yɑ koo mɑɑ koorɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
Esekiɛli, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ rɑ mɔn teni ko bu nɛɛ, bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ resɛm birenu di, mɑ ben bibun nɔsu yɑɑyɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, i ǹ mɑɑ mɔn teni gerumɔ Isireliɔ.
Geemɑ, nɛnɑ nɑ bɑɑwuren wɑ̃ɑru nɛni, bɑɑbɑ kɑ bii. Yen sɔ̃, wi u torɑ wiyɑ u koo gbi.
Su tɛ̃ nɛɛ, goo u wɑ̃ɑ u geɑ mɔ̀, win dɑɑ yɑ wɑ̃.
U ku rɑ de gungunɔ u bũu sɑ̃. U ku rɑ mɑɑ bũu yɑ̃kunu di. U ku rɑ kɑ goon kurɔ mɛnnɛ. Mɛyɑ u ku rɑ mɑɑ kɑ tɔn kurɔ mɛnnɛ sɑnɑm mɛ u yɑsɑ mɔ̀.
U ku rɑ goo gbɛni. U ku rɑ mɑɑ goo sɔmburu koosie kɑm. U rɑ wi u win dibu nɛni win tɔrubɑ wesie. U rɑ wi gɔ̃ɔrɑ mɔ̀ dĩɑnu wɛ̃. Kpɑ u wi u tereru sĩimɔ yɑ̃nu wɛ̃.
U ku rɑ tɔnu gobi bɔkure u nim doke. U ku rɑ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ weesun swɑɑ sɔɔ. U rɑ siriwɑ dee dee, u bɑɑwure nùn win gem wɛ̃.
U rɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ mɑm mɑm. Tɔnu win bweserɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ rɑ soku gemgii. Win wɑ̃ɑrɑ tɑ koo dɑkɑɑ dɑ.
Su mɑɑ tɛ̃ nɛɛ, durɔ wi, u bii mɔ wi u rɑ tɔmbu wɔri u go, u ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ, ǹ kun mɛ u rɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ ko.
N deemɑ win bɑɑbɑ ku rɑ yen bweseru ko. Bii wi, u rɑ bũu yɑ̃kuru de gungunɔ. U rɑ kɑ gɑbun kurɔbu mɛnnɛ.
U rɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛ sɔmburu koosie kɑm. U rɑ tɔmbu gbɛni. U ku rɑ be u tɔrubɑ mwɑɑri ye wesie. U rɑ bũnu sɑ̃, kpɑ u n kom bɛrɛtɛkɛ mɔ̀.
U rɑ tɔmbu gobi bɔkure u nim doke. N weenɛ tɔnu win bweseru u n wɑ̃ɑ? Aɑwo, u koo gbiwɑ. Domi u dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ. Win yɛm mu koo wɔriwɑ win tii sɔɔ.
Su tɛ̃ nɛɛ, bii wi, u seewɑ u mɑrɑ. Mɑ win bii u seewɑ u win tundon torɑnu kpuro wɑ. Adɑmɑ u ǹ win tundon yirɑ ye swĩi.
U ku rɑ bũu yɑ̃kunu de gungunɔ. U ku rɑ bũnu sɑ̃ ni Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ. U ku rɑ kɑ goon kurɔ mɛnnɛ.
U ku rɑ goo sɔmburu koosie kɑm. U ku rɑ be bɑ win dibu nɛni tɔrubɑ mwɑɑri. U ku rɑ gbɛni. U rɑ wi gɔ̃ɔrɑ mɔ̀ dĩɑnu wɛ̃. Kpɑ u wi u tereru sĩimɔ yɑ̃nu wɛ̃.
U ku rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ weesun swɑɑ sɔɔ. U ku rɑ tɔnu gobi bɔkure u nim doke. U rɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bii wi, u ǹ gbimɔ win tundon torɑnun sɔ̃. U ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑ gem.
Adɑmɑ tundo wiyɑ u koo gbi win torɑnun sɔ̃ domi u tɔmbu tɔ̃yɑ kuɑ u gbɛnɑ.
I bikiɑmɔ i mɔ̀, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bii kun win tundon durum ɑre sɔɔmɔ. Geemɑ, bii kun ye sɔɔmɔ yèn sɔ̃ u geɑ kuɑ. Mɑ u sĩɑ dee dee nɛn yirɑ sɔɔ, u nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ mɑm mɑm. Yen sɔ̃nɑ u ko n wɑ̃ɑ.
Wi u torɑ, wiyɑ u koo gbi. Bibu bɑ ǹ ben bɑɑbɑbɑn torɑnun ɑre sɔɔmɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben bibun torɑnun ɑre sɔɔmɔ. Kon gemgii nùn win ɑre wɛ̃ yèn sɔ̃ u kom gem kuɑ. Kpɑ n mɑɑ tɔn kɔ̃so sɛɛyɑsiɑ yèn sɔ̃ u kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ.
Tɔn kɔ̃so ù n win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, mɑ u gem swĩi nge mɛ nɛn woodɑ yɑ geruɑ kpuro, u ǹ mɑɑ gbimɔ.
Kon win torɑnu kpuro duɑri, kpɑ n de u n wɑ̃ɑ geɑ ye u mɔ̀n sɔ̃.
I tɑmɑɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ kĩ tɔn kɔ̃so u gbi? Aɑwo. Ye nɑ kĩ, yerɑ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ kpɑ u n wɑ̃ɑ.
Adɑmɑ wi u gem deri, mɑ u dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ nge tɔn kɔ̃so, i tɑmɑɑ u ko n wɑ̃ɑ? Aɑwo. Kon win yellun dɑɑ geɑ ye duɑriwɑ kpɑ n de u gbi win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ kɑ win mɛm nɔɔ sɑrirun sɔ̃.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i mɔ̀, nɛn gere ye, yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ dee dee. I swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ. Nɛn gerewɑ yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ dee dee? Nge bɛɛyɑ i sɑkɑ sɑrɑmɔ.
Gemgii ù n geɑ deri, mɑ u kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀, u koo gbiwɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen sɔ̃.
Tɔn kɔ̃so ù n mɑɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, mɑ u dɑɑ geɑ mɔ̀, u win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑmɔwɑ.
U ko n wɑ̃ɑ, domi u giɑ mɑ kɔ̃sɑ u rɑɑ mɔ̀, mɑ u ye deri. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, u ǹ mɑɑ gbimɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ i mɔ̀, nɛn gere yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ dee dee. Adɑmɑ n ǹ mɛ, bɛɛyɑ i sɑkɑ sɑrɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, kon bɑɑwure siriwɑ nge mɛ win dɑɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i bɛɛn dɑɑ kɔsio i kɔ̃sɑ deri. I ku de bɛɛn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ yu bɛɛ kɑm koosiɑ.
I bɛɛn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ derio kpɑ i bɛɛn gɔ̃run bwisikunu gɔsiɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i ko i tii go.
I yɛ̃ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ ǹ goon gɔɔ kĩ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i gɔ̃ru gɔsio kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ gɔɔ swĩiyɔ Isirelibɑn sinɑ bibun sɔ̃, ɑ nɛɛ,
ben mɛro u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbee sunɔ niu geu ge bɑ yɛ̃ gbee sinɑnsun suunu sɔɔ. Gɑ rɑ n gen binu kpunɛwɑ gɑ n nu diisiɑmɔ.
Mɑ gɑ gen buu teu seeyɑ gɑ kuɑ kpɛmbu. Gɑ gu yɑɑ mwɑɑbu sɔ̃ɔsi, mɑ gɑ tɔmbu sɛ̃sukum wɔri.
Ye sɔbɑ gen gɑri nuɑ, mɑ bɑ gu yinɑ bɛriɑ. Yerɑ bɑ gu mwɑ kɑ kɔkɔru bɑ kɑ dɑ Egibitiɔ.
Mɑ gen mɛro gɑ mɑrɑ gu wurɑmɑ. Adɑmɑ gɑ tɛmɑnɑbu kpɑnɑ, gɑ wɑ n ǹ koorɔ. Yen biruwɑ gɑ mɑɑ gen buu teu suɑ gɑ seeyɑ gɑ dɑm kuɑ, gɑ kuɑ gbee sunɔ kpɛmbu.
Mɑ gɑ wɔri gbee sinɑnsun wuuru sɔɔ. Gɑ yɑɑ mwɑɑbu mɛɛrɑ. Mɑ gɑ tɔmbu sɛ̃sukum wɔri.
Gɑ tem min sinɑ kpɑɑru wɔri gɑ surɑ. Mɑ mɛn wusu kuɑ bɑnsu. Mɑ tɔmbu kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ kpuro yɑ bɛrum soorɑ gen kukiribun sɔ̃.
Mɑ bwesenu nu mɛnnɑ nu kɑ gu tɑbu kuɑ. Bwese ni, nu nɑwɑ yɑm kpuron di. Bɑ gu suurɑ kuɑ gɑ wɔri.
Mɑ bɑ gen wɛ̃ru yɑbɑ bɑ tɑɑbu doke bɑ gu sɔri diru gɑru sɔɔ. Yen biru bɑ kɑ gu dɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon mi. Mɑ bɑ gu kɛnusi sere bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gen kukiribu nɔɔmɔ Isirelibɑn guunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, ben mɛro u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge resɛm ye bɑ duurɑ dɑɑ torɑn bɔkuɔ. Resɛm ye, yɑ rɑ mɑ. Yɑ mɑɑ kɑ̃ɑsi yibɑ nim mɛ yɑ wɑɑmɔn sɔ̃.
Yɑ kɑ̃ɑsi dɑmgii mɔ yi bɑ koo kpĩ bu kɑ sinɑ dɛki ko. Yɑ wɑɑbu wɑ̃, yen gunum kɑ yen kɑ̃ɑsi dɑbinun sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ bɑ ye wukɑ kɑ mɔru bɑ surɑ temɔ. Woo ge gɑ wee sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun di, gɑ yen mɑrum gberɑsiɑ. Yen kɑ̃ɑsi dɑmgii yi, yi gberɑ yi dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ.
Tɛ̃ yɑ gire tem gbebum sɔɔ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi.
Mɑ dɔ̃ɔ u yɑrɑ sɑɑ yen kɑ̃ɑsin di u yen mɑrum mwɑ. Yɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ̃ɑsɑ dɑmgiɑ mɔ ye yɑ koo ko sinɑ dɛkɑ. Womu geni gɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔɔ wuri. Geyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ ko bɑ̀ n gɔɔ wuri mɔ̀.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ yoru sɔɔ Bɑbiloniɔ, yoo ten wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yirusen suru nɔɔbusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse sɔɔrɑ ben guro gurobu gɑbu bɑ nɑ Esekiɛlin mi u kɑ bu bikiɑru kuɑ Yinni Gusunɔn mi. Mɑ bɑ nɑ bɑ sinɑ win wuswɑɑɔ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ tɔn beni sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, n ǹ Isirelibɑ bɑ nɑwɑ bu kɑ nɛn kĩru bikiɑ? Sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru nɑ ǹ wurɑmɔ bu mɑn gɑ̃ɑnu bikiɑ.
Tɛ̃ ɑ sɔɔru koowo ɑ kɑ bu siri. A bu yɑɑyɑsio kom kɔ̃sum mɛ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ mɑn kuɑ.
Ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ wee. Nɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ be, Isirelibɑ gɔsɑ be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru nɑ bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri. Mɑ nɑ bu tii sɔ̃ɔsi Egibitiɔ, nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, nɛnɑ nɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Yen dɔmɑ terɑ nɑ bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ kɑ bɔ̃ri nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu yɑrɑ Egibitin di. Kpɑ n kɑ bu dɑ tem mɛ nɑ bu gɔsiɑ sɔɔ mi tim kɑ bom mu yibɑ. Tem mɛ, mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ mɛ mu tem kpuro burɑm kere.
Nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑɑwure u win bũu ge u kɔdɛ sɑ̃ɑ derio kpɑ u ku rɑɑ tii disi doke kɑ Egibitin bũu ni. Domi nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Kɑ mɛ, bɑ mɑn seesi bɑ yinɑ bu mɑn swɑɑ dɑki. Ben goo kun bũu ni deri, nì sɔɔ ben kɔdɛ wɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ ǹ Egibitin bũu ni deri. Mɑ nɑ bwisikɑ n bu mɔru kpuro seesi n bu wɔri Egibitiɔ.
Adɑmɑ nɑ bu deri, domi nɑ ǹ kĩ nɛn yĩsiru tu sɑnkirɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ yèn sɔ̃ nɑ tii bwese tuku ni sɔ̃ɔsi
sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ Isirelibɑ yɑrɑ Egibitin di nɑ kɑ dɑ gbɑburɔ.
Mɑ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ ye bɑ koo ko kɑ sere nɛn woodɑbɑ ye bɑ koo swĩi bɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Nɑ bu tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru wɛ̃ tɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru te tɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ bu wunɑ nɛnɛm.
Adɑmɑ be Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑn seesi gbɑburɔ bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ ye bɑ̀ n swĩi bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru mɛm nɔɔwɛ sere nɑ bwisikɑ n kɑ bu mɔru ko n bu kpeerɑsiɑ gbɑburɔ.
Adɑmɑ nɑ̀ n ye kuɑ, bwese tukunu nu koo nɛn yĩsiru gɛm, nìn nɔni biru nɑ bu yɑrɑ Egibitin di.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ gbɑburɔ nɑ nɔmu suɑ nɑ bɔ̃ruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ bu dɔɔ tem burɑm mɛ sɔɔ, mi tim kɑ bom mu kokumɔ mɛ nɑ bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ.
Domi bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugii te disi doke yèn sɔ̃ ben gɔ̃ru gɑ woo bũnun mi giɑ.
Kɑ mɛ, nɑ ben wɔnwɔndu wɑ nɑ ǹ bu go gbɑburɔ.
Nɑ ben bibu sɔ̃ɔwɑ gbɑburɔ nɑ nɛɛ, bu ku ben bɑɑbɑbɑn yirɑ swĩi, bu ku ko ye bɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ, bu ku mɑɑ tii disi koosi kɑ ben bũnu.
Adɑmɑ bu nɛ Gusunɔ ben Yinnin woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere swĩiyɔ kpɑ bu kɑ ye kpuro sɔmburu ko.
Bu nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru wunɔ nɛnɛm kpɑ tɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru nɛ kɑ ben bɑɑ sɔɔ, te bɑ koo kɑ giɑ mɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, bii be, bɑ mɑn seesi, bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ ye bɑ̀ n swĩi bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ. Bɑ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru disi doke. Mɑ nɑ bwisikɑ n kɑ bu nɛn mɔru seesi gbɑburu mi.
Adɑmɑ bwese tukunu nu ku kɑ nɛn yĩsiru gɛm sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ bu gɑ̃ɑnu kue. Domi bwese nin wuswɑɑɔrɑ nɑ be, Isirelibɑ yɑrɑ Egibitin di.
Gbɑburu miyɑ nɑ nɔmɑ suɑ wɔllɔ nɑ bɔ̃ruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bwesenu sɔɔ kɑ tem tukumɔ.
Domi bɑ ǹ nɛn woodɑbɑ kɑ nɛn gere mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Mɑ bɑ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugii te disi doke. Mɑ bɑ ben kɔdɛ doke ben bɑɑbɑbɑn bũnu sɔɔ.
Nɛnɑ nɑ mɑɑ bu woodɑ wɛ̃ ye yɑ ǹ bu geɑ mɑruɑmmɛ kɑ ye yɑ ǹ bu wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Nɑ derɑ bɑ disi duurɑ ye bɑ kɑ ben bii gbiikobu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru mɔ̀, kpɑ nɑnum bu mwɑ kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, ben bɑɑbɑbɑn tii bɑ mɑn torɑ, bɑ ǹ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni yibie.
Nɑ kɑ bu dɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ mɛ nɑ bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ nɑ sire kɑ bɔ̃ri. Miyɑ bɑ ben binɛ doke gungunu giɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ kubenu giɑ. Mɑ ye kpuro yɑ kuɑ ben bũu yɑ̃ku yenu. Miyɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko kɑ sere ni bɑ rɑ ko kɑ gberun dĩɑnu kɑ tɑm kpɑ bu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ doke. Ye kpuro yɑ derɑ nɛn mɔru seewɑ.
Mɑ nɑ bu bikiɑ nɑ nɛɛ, mbɑ gunguu ni, nìn mi i rɑ n nɑɑmɔ. Sɑɑ yen dɔmɑ ten di, bɑ ben yɑ̃ku yenu sokumɔ gungunu.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, bu ku tii disi koosi nge ben bɑɑbɑbɑ. Bu ku mɑɑ bũnu gɑsiri bu sɑ̃.
Wee tɛ̃, bɑ tii disi mɔ̀ bɑ bũnu gɑsirimɔ bɑ kɑ nu kɛ̃nu dɑɑwɑmmɛ mɑ bɑ kɑ nu ben bibu yɑ̃kunu kuɑmmɛ. Yerɑ bɑ tɑmɑɑ bɑ koo bikiɑru ko nɛn mi? Aɑwo, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru nɑ ǹ wurɑmɔ bu bikiɑru ko nɛn mi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɑ tɑmɑɑ bɑ koo ko nge bwese ni nu tie, kpɑ bɑ n dɑ̃nu kɑ kpenu sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Adɑmɑ n ǹ koorɔ.
Sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru kɑ dɑmɑ kon bu wɔri kpɑ n bu seesi, kpɑ nɑ n bɑndu dii be sɔɔ.
Kon bu yɑrɑ bwese tuku nin suunu sɔɔn di mi bɑ yɑrinɛ kpɑ n bu mɛnnɑ n bu nɛn dɑm kɑ nɛn mɔru sɔ̃ɔsi.
Kon kɑ bu dɑ gbɑburɔ be tɔnɑ mi goo kun wɑ̃ɑ. Miyɑ kon bu siri.
Kon bu siri nge mɛ nɑ ben sikɑdobɑ siri gbɑburɔ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ wee Egibitin di. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon bu tilɑsi ko kɑ sɛnɑ bɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge nɛn yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ kpɑ bu ɑrukɑwɑni ye mɛm nɔɔwɑ ye nɑ kɑ bu bɔkuɑ.
Kon bu wunɑ ben suunu sɔɔn di be bɑ mɑn seesi kɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu kpɑ n bu yɑrɑ tem mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑn di. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ dɔɔ Isireliɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ be, Isirelibɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Tɛ̃, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ ben sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, bu doo bu ben bũnu sɑ̃. Adɑmɑ ɑmɛn biru, bɑ koo mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɛn yĩsiru sɑnkumɔ kɑ ben bũu sɑ̃ɑru.
Domi Isirelibɑ kpurowɑ bɑ koo mɑn sɑ̃ Isirelin guurɔ te nɑ gɔsɑ nɛn sɔ̃. Miyɑ kon kɑ bu nɔnu geu mɛɛri. Kpɑ n bu yɑ̃kunu bikiɑ kɑ kɛ̃ɛ gee ni bɑ sɔɔru kuɑ nɛn sɔ̃.
Nɑ̀ n bu yɑrɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔn di mi bɑ rɑɑ yɑrinɛ mɑ nɑ bu mɛnnɑmɑ, sɑɑ yerɑ kon bu mwɑ nge yɑ̃ku nubu durorugiru. Bwese tuku ni, nù n wɑ mɛ, kpɑ nu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ Yinni Gusunɔ Dɛɛro.
Mɛyɑ ben tii bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ̀ n bu kpɑrɑ nɑ kɑ dɑ Isireliɔ mi nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ.
Bɑ koo bwisiku dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑ yellu, yè sɔɔ bɑ tii disi doke kpɑ bu tii tusi kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ̀ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nɛn yĩsirun bɛɛrɛn sɔ̃. N ǹ mɔ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.





Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑrɔ, kpɑ ɑ bu gerusi be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ mi.
A de bu nɛn gɑri swɑɑ dɑki yi kon gere dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mi. A nɛɛ, kon gu dɔ̃ɔ doke, kpɑ dɔ̃ɔ wi, u dɑ̃ɑ bekunu kɑ gbebunu mwɑ. Dɔ̃ɔ wi, kun gbimɔ. Tɔmbu kpurowɑ bɑ koo dɔ̃ɔ soorɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑrun di n kɑ dɑ nɔm geuɔ.
Tɔmbu kpurowɑ bɑ koo wɑ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ dɔ̃ɔ wi sɔ̃ruɑ, u ǹ mɑɑ gbimɔ.
Mɑ Esekiɛli u Yinni Gusunɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, wee bɑ rɑ n kɑ mɑn wɔki bɑ n mɔ̀, sukɑ nɑ rɑ n bu kuɑmmɛ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio Yerusɑlɛmu giɑ kpɑ ɑ Isirelin tem kɑ mɛn sɑ̃ɑ yenu gerusi.
A Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee ye nɑ gerumɔ ben sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu deemɑ, kpɑ n nɛn tɑkobi womɑ yen kɑrɑrun di kpɑ n gemgii kɑ tɔn kɔ̃so go.
Kon bɛɛ kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon nɛn tɑkobi womɑ sɑɑ yen kɑrɑrun di, kpɑ n tɔmbu go sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑn di n kɑ dɑ nɔm geuɔ.
Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɑ nɛn tɑkobi womɑ sɑɑ yen kɑrɑrun di, nɑ ǹ mɑɑ ye wesiɑmɔ mi.
Yen sɔ̃, wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ yɑ̃ɑro ɑ weeweenu ko nge wìn gɑbu gɑ bɔɔrɑ.
Bɑ̀ n nun bikiɑ mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ weeweenu mɔ̀, kɑɑ bu wisiwɑ ɑ nɛɛ, lɑbɑɑri kɔ̃sɑ ɑ nuɑ. Yɑ koo mɑɑ tunumɑ. Kpɑ tɔmbun toronu nu kɑrɑ. Bɑ koo gɔmɑ dwiiyɑ. Kpɑ ben wɔrugɔru tu kpe, bu dũunu soonɑ. Wee, yɑ koo nɑ yɑ mɑm tunumɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ tɔmbu gerusio. A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, tɑkobi gɑɑ wee yɑ wee, yɑ nɔɔ dɛ̃ɛrɑwɑ mɑm mɑm.
Yɑ bɑllimɔ, yerɑ bɑ koo kɑ tɔmbu go. I tɑmɑɑ bɛɛn bɑndu tɑ ǹ kpeemɔ,
ɑdɑmɑ bɑ tɑkobi ye nɔɔ dɛ̃ɛrɑwɑ bɑ nɛni. Bɑ ye tɔn gowo nɔmu bɛrie.
A gbɑ̃ro, kpɑ ɑ weeweenu ko, wunɛ tɔnun bii. Domi bɑ ye nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kɑ ben sinɑmbu suesi.
Wee bɑ be kpuro yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ. A wunɛn nɔmɑ bɔkuo, nɔni swɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑrɑ wee. Bɛɛn bɑndu tɑ̀ n wɔrumɑ mɑɑ ni. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Tɛ̃ wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ bu gerusio. A tɑkɑ koowo nɔn teeru, yen biru nɔn yiru, yen biru nɔn itɑ, ɑ kɑ tɑkobi yen dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi. Domi yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑkobi ye yɑ kɑ gɔɔ wee. Gɔɔ bokowɑ yɑ kɑ wee bɑɑmɑn di.
Yɑ bɑɑwuren wɔrugɔrun dɑm buɑmɔ. Yɑ derɑ bɑ wɔrukumɔ. Wee nɑ derɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑɑwuren kɔnnɔwɔ. Wee yɑ bɑllimɔ nge guru mɑɑkinu, yɑ sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ yu kɑ go.
Nɑ mɑɑ ye sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɑ mɔ̀, yu soowo nɔm geu giɑ, kpɑ yu wurɑ nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Tɑkobi nɔɔ durorɑ wunɛ, ɑ doo mi bɑ nun tĩi.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn tii, kon tɑkɑ ko kpɑ n nɛn mɔru kpuro sɔ̃ɔsi mɑm mɑm sere yu kɑ sɑrɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kpɑm geruɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ swɑɑ yiru yɑbo ye yɑ koo sɔ̃ɔsi mìn di Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u koo kɑ tɑbu duumɑ. A de ye yiru ye, yu yɑri wuu teun di kpɑ ɑ yen bɑɑyere yĩreru ko yu kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi wuu gèn mi yɑ dɔɔ.
Kɑɑ swɑɑ yiru ye kowɑ, tiɑ yɑ n dɔɔ Rɑbɑ giɑ, ye bɑ koo swĩi bu kɑ Amɔnibɑ tɑbu wɔri, tiɑ mɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmu giɑ ye bɑ koo swĩi bu kɑ Yudɑbɑ tɑbu wɔri.
Domi wee Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u wɑ̃ɑ swɑɑ yiru yen kɛɛnɑnɔ u bikiɑru mɔ̀ bũu ni bɑ mɔ̀ Terɑfimun mi, kɑ sɛ̃ɛnu kɑ yɑɑ woru.
Mɑ bikiɑ te, tɑ Yerusɑlɛmu sɔ̃ɔsi win nɔm geu sɔɔ. Tɛ̃, u koo woodɑ wɛ̃ bu Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri bɑ n tɑbun kuuki mɔ̀. U koo tɑbu yɑ̃nu yi yi Yerusɑlɛmun kɔnnɔsɔ. Kpɑ bu gungunu kɑ kuku yenu ko mi, bu kɑ ye wɔri.
Adɑmɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ tɑmɑɑ win bikiɑ ten gɑri yi ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gem. Domi bɑ tɑmɑɑ u koo bu deri ɑrukɑwɑni ye bɑ kɑ nùn bɔkuɑn sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ u ǹ ben torɑnu duɑri. Yen sɔ̃, u koo bu wɔri. Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ Amɔnibɑ gerusio ben kom kɔ̃sum mɛ bɑ Isirelibɑ kuɑn sɔ̃. A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee, bɑ tɑkobi nɔɔ dɛ̃ɛrɑ yɑ bɑllimɔ yɑ bu mɑrɑ yu go.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɑ mɔ̀, wee ben mɛm nɔɔbu sɑri te tɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑmɔ ben dɑɑ sɔɔ, tɑ mɑn ben torɑnu yɑɑyɑsiɑmɔ mɑ nu bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nu deri. Yen sɔ̃, kon bu nɔmu doke n mwɑ. Ben kɑ̃si weesugii ni kɑ gɑri weesugii yin sɔ̃, bɑ koo bu gowɑ nge tɔn kɔ̃sobu be bɑ wiru bɔɔrɑ. Domi ben tɔ̃rɑ turuku mɔ̀, ben torɑnu nu den turɑ mɛ.
Wunɛ mɑɑ Isirelibɑn kpɑro, wunɛn tɔ̃rɑ turuku mɔ̀. Wunɛn torɑnu nu den turɑ mɛ. Bu ben tɑkobibɑ wesio ben kɑrɑnɔ. Kon bu siri mi bɑ bu mɑrɑ.
Bɑ koo wunɛn sinɑ furɔ potɑ. Gɑ̃ɑnu koo kɔsi. Be bɑ tii kɑwe bɑ koo wɔlle suɑrɑ. Kpɑ be bɑ tii sue bu wɔrumɑ. Kon bu mɔru seesi n bu wure nge dɔ̃ɔ kpɑ n bu tɔmbu nɔmu bɛriɑ be bɑ koo bu wɔri kɑ dɑm bu kɑm koosiɑ.
Kon de Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko bɑnsu mɑm mɑm. Yɑ koo koorɑwɑ sɑɑ ye wi kon yen dɑm wɛ̃ u tunumɑ. Kon de dɔ̃ɔ u bu di, kpɑ ben yɛm mu yɑri ben tem suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu yɑɑyɑmɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ sɔɔru koowo ɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu siri be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn gowobu mi. A ku sikɑ ko. A de bu bwisiku ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Wee bɑ tɔmbu goomɔ. Yerɑ yɑ koo de ben wuu Yerusɑlɛmun tii yu kɑm ko. Wee bɑ bwɑ̃ɑrokunu sekumɔ mɑ bɑ ben tem disi doke.
Tɔn be bɑ go mi, ben tɑɑrɛwɑ. Bɑ tii disi doke ye bɑ kɑ tii bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kuɑ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ ben wɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃nu kɑwɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de bwese tukunu nu bu yɛ̃ɛ.
Be bɑ tomɑ kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ turuku bɑ koo bu yɛ̃ɛ yèn sɔ̃ ben wuu Yerusɑlɛmun yĩsirɑ bɛɛrɛ biɑ, mɑ yɑ burisire.
Wee be, Isirelibɑn sinɑmbu bɑ tɔmbu dɑm dɔremɔ bɑ goomɔ Yerusɑlɛmu ye sɔɔ.
Mɑ yen tɔmbu bɑ ben mɛrobu kɑ ben tundobu gɛmɑ. Gɑbɑ sɔbu dɑm dɔremɔ. Gɑbɑ mɑɑ gobekubɑ kɑ gɔminibu tɑki dimɔ.
Tɔmbu bɑ ǹ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru dɑɑbu kĩ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kĩ bu nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Gɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑ ben winsim kɔ̃sɑ gerumɔ bu kɑ nùn go. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ tɔmbu bɑ rɑ bũnun dĩɑnu di gungunun wɔllɔ kpɑ bɑ n sekuru sɑri kookoosu mɔ̀.
Gɑbu bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ ben tundon kurɔbu kpunɛ. Gɑbu bɑ rɑ mɑm tɔn kurɔbu gɑbe sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ yɑsɑ mɔ̀.
Gɑbɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑ sɑkɑrɑru mɔ̀ kɑ ben bensim kurɔbu, ǹ kun mɛ kɑ ben biin kurɔ ǹ kun mɛ kɑ ben sesu tundo turosibu.
Gɑbɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ be bɑ rɑ wure bu gobi mwɑ bu kɑ tɔmbu go. Gɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑ rɑ ɑre bɛkɛ kɑsu bɑ̀ n ben winsim gobi bɔkurɑ. Gɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ be bɑ ben winsim tɑki dimɔ bu kɑ gobi ko. Mɑ bɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ duɑri mɑm mɑm. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee kon bu so be, Yerusɑlɛmugibu ben gbɛnɑ kɑ tɔn be bɑ gon sɔ̃.
Nɑ̀ n bu wɔri yen tɔ̃ɔ te, bɑ ǹ ko n mɑɑ dɑm kɑ mwiɑ mɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Yɑ koo mɑɑ koorɑ.
Kon de bu yɑrinɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bwese tukunu sɔɔ. Kpɑ bu dɑ bɑɑmɑ. Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ ben disi yi wunɑ Yerusɑlɛmu ye sɔɔn di.
Bwese ni nu tie, nu koo bu gɛm. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yen biru, Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee nɛn nɔni sɔɔ Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sii bisu ǹ kun mɛ nge sii gɑndu ǹ kun mɛ nge sii kpikisu ǹ kun mɛ nge pɛɛrum ǹ kun mɛ nge sii wɔ̃kusu si bɑ doke sɔwɑtiɑ sɔɔ bu kɑ su sɔwɑ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sii geesun bisu.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon bu mɛnnɑ Yerusɑlɛmu sɔɔ.
Nge mɛ bɑ rɑ sii geesu kɑ sii gɑndu kɑ sii wɔ̃kusu kɑ sii kpikisu kɑ sii pɛɛrum mɛnnɛ bu doke sɔwɑtiɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ bu dɔ̃ɔ doke su kɑ yɑndɑ, nge mɛyɑ kon bu mɛnnɑ nɛn mɔru sɔɔ, kpɑ n bu deri bu yɑndɑ.
Kon bu mɛnnɑ sube teeru sɔɔ, kpɑ n bu kpɛ̃ɛ nɛn mɔrun sundu sɔɔ kpɑ bu yɑndɑ nge sisu.
Nge mɛ sii geesu su rɑ yɑnde dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ, nge mɛyɑ ben tii bɑ koo yɑndɑ Yerusɑlɛmun suunu sɔɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɑ kɑ bu mɔru seewɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ben tem mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge mi gurɑ ku rɑ nɛ. Yen sɔ̃, kon de mu kɑm ko nɛn mɔrun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Ben sɔmɔbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbee sinɑn si su kukirimɔ sɑnɑm mɛ su yɑɑ wɑ su sɛ̃re. Domi bɑ tɔmbu goomɔ. Mɑ bɑ gɑbun gobi kɑ dukiɑ wɔrɑmɔ. Mɑ bɑ derimɔ kurɔ gɔminibu bɑ dɑbiɑmɔ.
Ben yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ku rɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃. Bɑ ku rɑ wunɑnɛ ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgiɑ kɑ ye yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgiɑ. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔsi ye yɑ dɛɛre kɑ ye yɑ ǹ dɛɛre. Bɑ ku rɑ mɑm nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugii te mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Ye kpuro sɔɔrɑ bɑ ku rɑ mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Ben sinɑmbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbeeku yɛɛ. Domi bɑ tɔmbu goomɔ bu wɑ bu kɑ ben binɛ suresiɑ.
Ben sɔmɔbu bɑ ye kpuro wukirimɔ nge gɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ soo tɛɛni. Wee bɑ bu kɑ̃si weesuginu kɑ gɑri weesugii sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, gɑri yi bɑ tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ yi weewɑ nɛn min di. N deemɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ ǹ bu gɑ̃ɑnu sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Tem mɛn tɔmbu bɑ dɑm dɔrenɑmɔ bɑ gbɛnimɔ bɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu kɑ be bɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ tɑɑremɔ. Mɑ bɑ sɔbu tɑki dimɔ bɑ gem birɑmɔ.
Wee nɑ goo kɑsu ben suunu sɔɔ u gbɑ̃rɑru bɑni u kɑ sikerenɑ, ǹ kun mɛ u yɔ̃rɑ kururu mi, u kɑ tem mɛ yinɑ n ku kɑ mu kɑm koosiɑ. Adɑmɑ nɑ ǹ goo wɑ.
Kon bu mɔru seesiwɑ. Nɑ ǹ yɔ̃rɑmɔ sere nɛn mɔru yu kɑ kpe. Kon de bu bu ben dɑɑn ɑre kɔsie. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, kurɔbu yiruwɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ be kpuro mɛro turo.
Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ kurɔ tɑnɑru di Egibitiɔ ben wɔndiɑru sɔɔ. Miyɑ bɑ ben bwɑ̃su sɛ̃kurɑ. Bɑ ben toronu bɔkɑsi.
Mɔɔn yĩsirɑ Oholɑ. Wɔnɔgirɑ mɑɑ Oholibɑ. Oholɑ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Sɑmɑri. Oholibɑ u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yerusɑlɛmu. Nɑ bu suɑ kurɔbu mɑ bɑ mɑn bii tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu mɑruɑ.
Oholɑ wi, u kuɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑrirugii, u kurɔ tɑnɑru wɔri. Mɑ u Asirigibu kĩɑ too too be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ win bɔkuɔ.
Tɔn be, bɑ yɑ̃ɑ wunɔmginu doke domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tem yɛ̃robu kɑ siri kowobu. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɑluwɑɑsi durɔ burɑbu. Mɑ bɑ mɑɑsɔru yɛ̃.
Beyɑ Oholɑ u tii wɛ̃. Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Asirin wirugibu mi, be kpurowɑ u kɑ sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ. U bu kĩɑ too sere u ben bũnu sɑ̃wɑ.
U ǹ win sɑkɑrɑ te deri te u rɑɑ kuɑ Egibitiɔ. Domi sɑnɑm mɛ u sɑ̃ɑ wɔndiɑ, bɑ rɑ n kɑ nùn kpunɑmɔ bɑ n win bwɑ̃su bɑbirimɔ, mɑ bɑ nùn sɑkɑrɑru kpɛ̃ɛ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nùn deri win kĩnɑsi Asirigii ben nɔmuɔ.
Mɑ bɑ win yɑ̃nu potirɑ bɑ nùn yɔ̃su tereru. Mɑ bɑ win bibu gurɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ. Yen biru bɑ win tii go kɑ tɑkobi. U sɛɛyɑsiɑbu wɑ bi bu kuɑ seedɑ tɔn kurɔ be bɑ tien sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Oholɑn wɔnɔ Oholibɑ u win mɔɔn sɑkɑrɑ kookoo si wɑ. Kɑ mɛ, wigirɑ tɑ boyɑ sere tɑ ǹ kɑ nɔɔ gerurɔ.
Mɑ win tii u Asirin tem yɛ̃robu kĩɑ kɑ ben siri kowobu. Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɑluwɑɑsi durɔ burɑbu. Bɑ yɑ̃ɑ burɑnu doke, bɑ mɑɑ mɑɑsɔru yɛ̃.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ wɑ mɑ Oholibɑn tii u disi mɔ. Be kpuro swɑɑ tiɑ yerɑ bɑ swĩi mi.
Oholibɑ wi, u mɑm kuɑ ye yɑ sɑkɑrɑru kere. Sɔ̃ɔ teeru u tɔmbun weenɑsibu wɑ bɑ yorusi gɑni sɔɔ. Bɑ bu kuɑwɑ kɑ gɑ̃ɑ swɑ̃ɑnu. Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Bɑbilonigibu.
Bɑ kpɑki sɛ̃ke pɔrɑɔ, mɑ bɑ dɑwɑni nɔni bwese bwesekɑgii bɔkuɑ wirɔ. Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sinɑmbu bɑ kɑ Bɑbilonigibu weenɛ.
Ye u bu wɑ mɛ, yerɑ u bu kĩɑ sere u sɔmɔbu gɔrɑ Bɑbiloni mi.
Mɑ bɑ nɑ win mi bɑ kɑ nùn kpunɑ bɑ nùn sɑkɑrɑru kpɛ̃ɛ sere win bwɛ̃rɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ ben min di.
U win sɑkɑrɑ te sɔ̃ɔsi bɑtumɑ sɔɔ. Mɑ nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ doonɑ win min di nge mɛ gɑ rɑɑ doonɑ win mɔɔn min di.
Kɑ mɛ, u sɑkɑrɑ te mɔ̀ u dɔɔwɑ nge mɛ u kuɑ win wɔndiɑrun sɑɑ sɔɔ Egibitiɔ,
mi u tii kurɔ dɑmɑ kowobu wɛ̃ be bɑ rɑ n kurɔbu yɔɔmɔ nge kɛtɛkunu ǹ kun mɛ nge dumi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Oholibɑ, wee ɑ mɑɑ wure ɑ wurɑ sekuru sɑriru sɔɔ te ɑ rɑɑ kuɑ wunɛn wɔndiɑru sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ derɑ Egibitigibu bɑ wunɛn bwɑ̃su bɑburɑ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Kon de wunɛn yellun kĩnɑsi be ɑ tusɑ mi tɛ̃ bu nun seesi kpɑ bu nɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuron di bu nun wɔri.
Beyɑ Bɑbilonigibu kɑ Pekodigibu kɑ Koɑgibu kɑ sere mɑɑ Asirigibu. Ben ɑluwɑɑsi durɔ burɔ be kɑ ben tem yɛ̃robu kɑ ben sinɑmbu kɑ ben tɑbu durɔbu be kpuro bɑ yɔɔwɑ dumin wɔllɔ.
Wee bɑ nun wɔrim wee bɑ tɑbu yɑ̃nu nɛni kɑ tɑbu kɛkɛbɑ yi dumi gɑwe. Bɑ mɛnnɑ bɑ dɑbi bɑ kɑ nun sikerenɛ yɑm kpuro. Be kpuro bɑ sii furɔsu doke mɑ bɑ tɛrɛnu nɛni. Kon bu siribu nɔmu sɔndiɑ kpɑ bu nun siri kɑ ben woodɑ.
Kon nun mɔru seesi kpɑ n de bu nun wɔri kɑ dɑm. Bɑ koo wunɛn wɛ̃ru kɑ wunɛn swɑsu bɔɔri kpɑ bu nun dɑkurɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu wunɛn bibu gurɑ. Be bɑ tiɑrɑ kpɑ bu be dɔ̃ɔ mɛni.
Bɑ koo wunɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑ kpɑ bu wunɛn burɑ yɑ̃nu wunɑ.
Kon wunɛn sekuru sɑriru kpeesiɑ te ɑ mɔ̀ sɑɑ yee yellun di Egibitiɔ. Wunɛn nɔni kun mɑɑ wurɔ ben mi giɑ. A ǹ mɑɑ bu yɑɑyɑmɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, wee nɑ nun bɛri be ɑ tusɑn nɔmuɔ, bèn mi wunɛn bwɛ̃rɑ kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Bɑ koo nun nɔni sɔ̃ tusirun sɔ̃ kpɑ bu wunɛn dukiɑ gurɑ bu nun deri kɑ nɔm dirɑ bɑsi mɑm mɑm. Wunɛn sekuru sɑriru kɑ wunɛn sɑkɑrɑ te, tɑ koo sɔ̃ɔsirɑ.
Ye kpurowɑ yɑ koo nun deemɑ domi ɑ kɑ bwese tukunu sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ mɑ ɑ tii disi doke bũu sɑ̃ɑrun swɑɑ sɔɔ.
A wunɛn mɔɔn yirɑ swĩi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de ɑ nɛn mɔrun nɔrɑ ye nɔ nge wi.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, kɑɑ kɑ nɔrɑ ye nɔ ye wunɛn mɔɔ u kɑ nɔrɑ. Nɔrɑ ye, yɑ yɑsu, yɑ mɑɑ dɛ̃u. Yerɑ yɑ koo de bu nun yɛ̃ɛ bu yɑɑkoru koosi. Nɔrɑ ye, yɑ nɛn mɔru yibɑwɑ sere kɑ nɔɔwɔ.
Yɑ koo nun go nge tɑm kpɑ yu nun nɔni sɔ̃. Nɔrɑ ye, yɑ rɑ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu kɑ kɑm kobu nɛwɑ. Yerɑ wunɛn mɔɔ Sɑmɑri u nɔrɑ.
Kɑɑ ye nɔwɑ mɑm mɑm sere ɑ ye kɔrɑ kɑ donnu kpɑ ɑ wunɛn tororu mɛɛrɑ ko kɑ yen kɛ̃ki. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee ɑ mɑn duɑri mɑ ɑ mɑn deri. Tɛ̃, ɑ wunɛn sekuru sɑrirun ɑre sɔɔwo.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ Oholɑ kɑ Oholibɑ sirio. A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑ.
Wee bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ kurɔ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu mɑ ben nɔmɑ yɛm yibɑ. Domi bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ mɑ bɑ kɑ ben bibu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu mɔ̀. N deemɑ nɛnɑ bɑ rɑɑ bii be wɛ̃.
Wee ye bɑ mɑɑ mɑn kuɑ. Bɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru disi doke, mɑ bɑ ǹ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugirun woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Domi dɔmɑ te bɑ duɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ kɑ ben bibu bũu yɑ̃kunu kuɑ mɑ bɑ tu disi doke. Yenin bweserɑ bɑ kuɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔɔwɔ.
Yen biru, bɑ mɑɑ sɔmɔbu gɔrɑ bu bu durɔbu kɑsuɑmɑ sɑɑ tontonden di. Mɑ durɔ be, bɑ seemɑ bɑ nɑ. Sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ woburɑ mɑ bɑ kiro doke mɑ bɑ ben burɑ yɑ̃nu doke durɔ ben sɔ̃.
Mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ sinɑ kitɑ burɑnu sɔɔ. Tɑbulu yɑ yii ben wuswɑɑɔ yèn wɔllɔ bɑ nɛn turɑre ye bɑ rɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke kɑ gum nubu durorugim sɔndi.
Mɑ tɔn dɑbirɑ bu nɑɑwɑ te tɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnun bwisikunu mɔ, tɑ wure. Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Sebɑgibu be bɑ nɑ sɑɑ gbɑburun di. Mɑ bɑ kurɔ be sumi dokeɑ nɔm wĩinɔ, mɑ bɑ mɑɑ bu sinɑ furɔ burɑsu dokeɑ winɔ.
Yerɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑɑ kɑ wi u tɔkɔ kuɑ sɑkɑrɑ te sɔɔ, u ko n tu mɔ̀wɑ u n dɔɔ? Durɔbɑ ko n mɑɑ nùn nɑɑwɑmmɛ?
Wee durɔbu bɑ rɑ nɛ bu kɑ nùn dendi nge kurɔ tɑnɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ Oholɑ kɑ Oholibɑ kuɑ be, be bɑ sɑnkire.
Adɑmɑ gemgibu bɑ koo kurɔ be siri bu bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ ben sɑkɑrɑrun sɔ̃ kɑ tɔn be bɑ gon sɔ̃. Domi ben nɔmɑ yɑ yɛm yibɑ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon de tɔn dɑbiru tu dɑ tu bu wɔri kpɑ tu bu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kpɛ̃ɛ, kpɑ tu ben dukiɑ gurɑ.
Kpɑ tu bu kpenu kɑsuku tu go, kpɑ tu bu bɔtiri kɑ tɑkobi. Kpɑ tu ben bibu go tu ben yɛnusu dɔ̃ɔ mɛniki.
Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ sɑkɑrɑru kpeesiɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ. Kon tɔn kurɔ bɑɑwure sɔ̃ u ku mɑɑ ben mɑɑbu yiru yen yirɑ swĩi.
Domi bɑ sɑkɑrɑru kuɑ bɑ bũnu sɑ̃wɑ. Yen sɔ̃, bɑ koo ben torɑnun ɑre sɔbe. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ koo kɑ giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ nnɛsen suru wɔkurusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ gisɔn tɔ̃ɔ te yoruo. Domi gisɔrɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u koo Yerusɑlɛmu tɑrusim tore.
A nɛn tɔmbu mɛm nɔɔ sɑri be mɔn teni sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ kɑ bu kirɔ ko. A nɛɛ, nɛnɑ nɑ nun yiire nɑ nɛɛ, ɑ sii wekeru suo kpɑ ɑ tu nim doke.
Kpɑ ɑ yɑɑ tɑɑrun yɑɑ geɑ kɑ yɑɑ nɔmun yɑɑ geɑ suɑ ɑ doke mi. Yen biru, kpɑ ɑ yɑɑ kuku bɔrɔkɔbɑ sɔndi yen wɔllɔ.
A mɑɑ yɑ̃ɑ geeru gɔsio wunɛn yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔn di kpɑ ɑ ten yɑɑ doke weke te sɔɔ. Kpɑ ɑ doo dɑ̃ɑ doke ɑ yɑɑ ye kpuro yike yu ye sere kɑ yen kukunɔ.
