Kpɑ ɑ yɑɑ ye wunɑ tiɑ tiɑ. Bɑɑ yen tiɑ ɑ ku rɑ deri mi. Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɔ̃rurɑ yen tɔn goberun sɔ̃. Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sii weke te tɑ wuuru diire, te bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu teɑ bu nɑɑmwɛ.
Yɛm mɛ Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ yɑri mi, mu wɑ̃ɑwɑ yen suunu sɔɔ. Yɑ mu yɑriwɑ kperu wɔllɔ, n ǹ mɔ tem dirɑ sɔɔ tuɑ yu sere mu wukiri.
Tɛ̃ kon yɛm mɛ deri kpee ten wɔllu mi, mi mu ǹ berurɔ, kpɑ nɛn mɔru yu ku kɑ se n Yerusɑlɛmu ye mɔru kɔsie.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɔ̃rurɑ yen tɔn goberun sɔ̃. Nɛn tii kon dɑ̃ɑ sube bɑkɑru ko.
A dɑ̃ɑ tɑɑsio kpɑ ɑ dɔ̃ɔ doke kpɑ ɑ de yɑɑ ye, yu ye mɛtɛ mɛtɛ. A ye kpee yɑ̃nu dokeo kpɑ ɑ de yen kukunu nu dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ mɑm mɑm.
Yen biru, ɑ weke dii te sɔndio dɔ̃ɔ gɛ̃ɛ sɔɔ sere tu swĩɑ tu swɛ̃rɑ. Kpɑ disi ni nu rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ te sɔɔ nu kpe tɑ kun mɑɑ wuuru diire.
Kɑ mɛ, kookɑri ye, yɑ koo kɑm kowɑ, domi dɔ̃ɔ kun kpɛ̃ u wuu diirɑm mɛn bweseru kpeesiɑ.
Nge mɛyɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ disi duurɑ yen torɑ ni yɑ kuɑn sɔ̃. Wee nɑ kĩɑ n ye dɛɛrɑsiɑ ɑdɑmɑ yɑ ǹ wure. Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, yɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ yu dɛɛrɑ sere nɛn mɔru yu kɑ sure.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Kon ye siriwɑ nge mɛ yen dɑɑ yɑ nɛ, nɑ ǹ yen wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀. Yɑ koo mɑɑ koorɑ. Kon ye kowɑ nɑ ǹ sikɑ mɔ̀. Nɑ ǹ biru wurɑmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, kon nun wi ɑ kĩru bo goori subɑru sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ ɑ ǹ yɛ̃ron gɔɔ yeru mɔ̀. A ǹ win gɔɔ sinɑmɔ. A ǹ mɑɑ gɔɔ sumɔ win sɔ̃.
A weeweenu koowo wunɛn tii sɔɔ ɑ ku de goo u nɔ. A ku gɔɔ sinɑ. A wunɛn dɑwɑni bɔkuo kpɑ ɑ wunɛn bɑrɑnu doke nge mɛ ɑ rɑ ko. A ku wunɛn wuswɑɑ wukiri. A ku mɑɑ gɔɔ dĩɑnu di.
Yerɑ Esekiɛli u ye tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔwɑ bururu mɑ yen yokɑ win kurɔ u kpunɑ u gu. Yen sisiru bururu mɑ u kuɑ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn yiire.
Yerɑ tɔmbu bɑ nùn bikiɑmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, u bu tubusio ye u mɔ̀ mi.
Yerɑ u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
u be Isirelibɑ gɑri yini sɔ̃ɔwɔ u nɛɛ, wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo de bu win sɑ̃ɑ yeru kɔsuku tèn sɔ̃ bɑ tii sue kɑ te bɑ̀ n mɛɛrɑ bɑ rɑ n nuku dobu mɔ̀ kɑ tè sɔɔ bɑ ben yĩiyɔbu doke. Bɑ koo ben bii be bɑ tie Yerusɑlɛmuɔ mwɛɛri bu go.
Bɑ koo kowɑ nge mɛ Esekiɛli u kuɑ. Bɑ ǹ ben wuswɑɑ wukirimɔ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɔɔ dĩɑnu dimɔ.
Bɑ koo ben dɑwɑni bɔkewɑ kpɑ bu ben bɑrɑnu doke. Bɑ ǹ koo gɔɔ yeru ko, bɑ ǹ koo mɑɑ gɔɔ swĩ. Adɑmɑ bɑ koo woorɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃ kpɑ bɑ n weeweenu mɔ̀.
Wi, Esekiɛli u ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩreru ben suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ koo kowɑ nge mɛ u kuɑ. Sɑnɑm mɛ yebɑ kpuro yɑ koo bu deemɑ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni.
Yen biruwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, u koo de Isirelibɑ bu win sɑ̃ɑ yeru biɑ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben kuku yeru mi, te bɑ̀ n mɛɛrɑ tɑ rɑ bu nuku dobu wɛ̃ mi, kɑ tèn sɔ̃ bɑ tii sue mi, mɑ bɑ ben yĩiyɔbu doke te sɔɔ. Yen biru kpɑ u de ben bibu bu gbisuku.
Sɑnɑm mɛ kɛ̃si ni, nu koo bu deemɑ, goo u koo nu kisirɑri kpɑ u nɑ u nun sɔ̃.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, wunɛn nɔɔ gɑ koo wukiɑrɑ kpɑ ɑ kɑ yɛ̃ro gɑri ko. Wunɑ kɑɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru wunɛn tɔmbun sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛ Gusunɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ wuswɑɑ sĩiyɔ Amɔnibɑn mi giɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, bu nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ. Yèn sɔ̃ bɑ yɛ̃ɛ sɑnɑm mɛ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɑ disi duurɑ kɑ yèn sɔ̃ Isirelibɑ bɑ kɑm kuɑ mɑ bɑ Yudɑbɑ yoru mwɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ,
yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, kon bu sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerugibu nɔmu bɛriɑ, kpɑ bu ben kɑrɑbɑ girɑ ben tem suunu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ben wɑ̃ɑ yenu ko mi. Beyɑ bɑ koo ben dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum di kpɑ bu ben sɑbenun bom nɔ.
Kon de Rɑbɑ yu ko yooyoosun kpɑrɑ yeru kpɑ ben tem kpuro mu n sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ɑnun wɑ̃ɑ yeru. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ bɑ tɑki kuɑ, bɑ yɔ̃ɔkɑ mɑ bɑ nuku dobu kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre,
yen sɔ̃nɑ tɛ̃, kon bu nɔmu dɛmiɛ, kpɑ n bu bwesenu gɑnu nɔmu bɛriɑ nge gbeeku yɛɛ. Kon bu kpeerɑsiɑ bwesenun suunu sɔɔn di kpɑ bu kɑm ko mɑm mɑm. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ Mɔɑbubɑ kɑ Edɔmubɑ bɑ nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tiɑ kɑ bwese ni nu tie hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ,
yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, u koo wuu si wɔri si su dɑm mɔ mi, si su ǹ derimɔ bu Mɔɑbubɑn tem du. Wuu si, su koo wɔrukuwɑ tiɑ tiɑ bɑɑ kɑ si su burɑm bo nge Bɛti Yesimɔti kɑ Bɑɑli Mɛɔni kɑ Kiriɑtɑimu.
U koo dewɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerugibu bu bu wɔri nge mɛ bɑ Amɔnibɑ kuɑ sere bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu yɑɑyɑmɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Bɑ koo win siribu wɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ Edɔmubɑ bɑ torɑ bɑ Yudɑbɑ mɔru kɔsie,
yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, u koo bu nɔmu dɛmiɛ kpɑ u tɔmbu kɑ sɑbenu go. U koo de ben tem mu ko bɑnsu sɑɑ Temɑnin di n kɑ dɑ Dedɑniɔ, kpɑ mɛn tɔmbu bu gbisuku tɑbu sɔɔ.
U koo de win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ bu bu mɔru kɔsie. Bɑ koo bu kuɑ nge mɛ win mɔru yɑ kpɑ̃ɑru nɛ kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ bɑ ku rɑ nùn tore kɑm. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wee Filisitibɑ bɑ Isirelibɑ mɔru kɔsie kɑ dɑm domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ben yibɛrɛbɑ sɑɑ yellun di.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, u koo bu win nɔmu dɛmiɛ kpɑ u be kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ be, be bɑ wee Keretin di bɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ.
U koo bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ u mɔru kɔsiɑ kɑ dɑm. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑsen surun tɔ̃ɔ gbiikiru sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Esekiɛli gɑri kuɑ. U nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee Tirigibu bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yɛ̃ɛmɔ bɑ mɔ̀, wee yɑ kɑm kuɑ yèn mi giɑ tɔmbu bɑ rɑ rɑɑ kpe bɑ̀ n gɑm dɔɔ. Tɛ̃ ben mi giɑ tɔmbɑ koo wurɑ kpɑ be, bu gobi ko. Domi Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo Tiri ye mɔru seesi u de bwese dɑbinu nu ye wɔri nu tɛriɑ nge mɛ dɑɑrɑ rɑ nim yibu.
Kpɑ nu yen gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsuku kɑ yen tɑbu durɔbun kuku yenu. Nu koo ye kpuro kɛrɑwɑ mɑm mɑm kpɑ Tiri ye, yɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge kpee sɑɑrɑ.
Yɑ koo kowɑ nge tem bureru te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ mi surɔkɔbɑ bɑ rɑ ben yɑ̃ɑkoronu kewe. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ. Bwese tukunu nu koo nɑ nu wuu ge wɔri.
Kpɑ nu be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gen turuku go go. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ geruɑ. U nɛɛ, u koo de Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko wi u sinɑmbu kpuro dɑm kere u nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di u Tiri ye wɔri. U koo nɑ kɑ dumi kɑ tɑbu kɛkɛ be dumi gɑwe kɑ sere mɑɑsɔbu kɑ tɑbu kowo dɑbi dɑbinu.
U koo Tirin bɑru kpɑɑnu kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ. Tɑbu kowobu bɑ koo kuku yenu gbe kpɑ bu tɑbu sĩɑ kpĩ bɑ n tɛrɛnu nɛni bu kɑ tii gɑnɛ.
Bɑ koo Tiri yen gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsuku bu suriri kɑ ben tɑbu yɑ̃nu.
Kpɑ ben dumi dɑbi dɑbi ten tuɑ yu ye wukiri kpɑ yen gɑni yi n diirimɔ mɑɑsɔbun wɔkinun sɔ̃ kɑ tɑbu kɛkɛ ben wɔkinun sɔ̃. Domi bɑ koo Tiri ye wɔriwɑ nge wuu ge bɑ kɑmiɑ kɔ.
Bɑ koo kɑ dumi swɛɛ kpuro swĩiwɑ kpɑ bɑ n tɔmbu goomɔ kɑ tɑkobi kpɑ bu yen bũu sɑ̃ɑ yenun gberebɑ suriri bèn sɔ̃ yɑ woo kɑnɑmɔ.
Bɑ koo yen dukiɑ kɑ yen kiɑ ni yɑ dɔrɑmɔ gurɑwɑ nge ye bɑ tɑbu diimɑ kpɑ bu yen gbɑ̃rɑnu kɑ yen dii geenu kɔsuku bu suriri kpɑ bu yen kpenu kɑ yen dɑ̃ɑ kɑ yen kɛ̃ki gurɑ bu sure nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ.
U koo de ben womusu su nɔru ko. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ mɔrɔkunun swĩi nɔɔmɔ mi.
U koo de yu kowɑ nge kpee sɑɑrɑ yèn wɔllɔ surɔkɔbɑ bɑ ko n dɑ ben yɑ̃ɑkoronu kewe. Bɑ ǹ yen bɑnsu seeyɑmɔ. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u gerumɔ Tiri yen sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ n tomɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ, bɑ̀ n nuɑ Tiri yɑ bɑnsu kuɑ mɑ bɑ be bɑ mɛɛrɑ wɑn weeweenu nɔɔmɔ, bɑ koo diiri.
Wee tem mɛn kpɑro be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun berɑ giɑ kpuro bɑ koo se ben sinɑ kitɑnun di bu ben yɑbe bɑkɑnu kɑ ben yɑbe ni bɑ sɔmɑ doke potiri bɑ n wurure bɑ n sɔ̃ temɔ. Sɑɑ kpuro sɔɔ, bɑ ko n bɛrum soorewɑ kpɑ bɑ n nuki sɑnkire Tirin sɔ̃.
Bɑ ko n gɔɔ wuri mɔ̀ Tirin sɔ̃ bɑ n mɔ̀, wee yɑ kɑm kuɑ ye, ye yɑ rɑɑ yĩsiru yɑrɑ mi. Ye, yèn tɔmbu bɑ rɑɑ dɑbiru bo nim wɔ̃kun berɑ mi giɑ. Beyɑ bɑ rɑɑ mɑɑ dɑm bo, mɑ be bɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛ bɑ bu nɑsie.
Wee be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem burenɔ bɑ diirimɔ Tiri yen kɑm kobun sɔ̃. Be bɑ tomɑ bɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ bɑ nɑnde yen kpeerun sɔ̃.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ geruɑ. U nɛɛ, u koo de Tiri yu ko bɑnsu kpɑ goo u kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ u koo de nim wɔ̃kun nim mu ye wukiri kpɑ ye kpuro yu num yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ mi yeruku tɔmbɑ kpĩ.
U koo de yu dɑ sere tem sɔɔwɔ mi yeruku tɔmbɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpɑ yɑ n kɔ̃ɔre mi. U koo de yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mi kɑ gɔribu. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ ye sɔɔ. Yɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɑyeru wɑsi wɑsobun suunu sɔɔ.
Tɔmbɑ koo nɑndɑ ye yɑ koo ye deemɑn sɔ̃. Yɑ ǹ ko yɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɑ̃ɑnu. Domi bɑ koo ye kɔsukuwɑ mɑm mɑm kpɑ bu ye kɑsu bu biɑ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Esekiɛli u nɛɛ, Tiri, Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
n nun gɔɔ wuri kuo,
n nun sɔ̃ n nɛɛ, wunɛ Tiri ɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ mɑ ɑ kɑ bwese dɑbinu tenkuru mɔ̀. Ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ wee. U nɛɛ, wunɛ Tiri, ɑ rɑ rɑɑ nɛɛ, ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wuu burɔ.
Wunɛn dɑm mu wɑ̃ɑwɑ sere nim wɔ̃kuɔ. Be bɑ nun bɑnɑ, bɑ nun kuɑwɑ nge goo nimkuu burɔ.
Mɑ bɑ wunɛn wɑsi kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sipɛrɛ ye yɑ wee Senirin di. Mɑ bɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru ye yɑ wee Libɑnin di suɑ bɑ kɑ wunɛn beku sɔretiru kuɑ.
Mɑ bɑ wunɛn sɛsɛnu kuɑ kɑ Bɑsɑnin dɑ̃ɑ geɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛɛni. Mɑ bɑ wunɛn kitɑnu kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ buyi ye bɑ kɑ nɑ sɑɑ Kitimun di mɑ bɑ nu suunu donnu mɑni.
Mɑ bɑ beku ni bɑ koo nun kɑreɑ kuɑ Egibitiɔ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii bɑ sɔmɑ doke. Beku ni, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wunɛn gidi bɔrɑ. Mɑ bɑ bekɑ ye yɑ rɑ wunɛn kiɑnu wukiri kuɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ gɑɑdurɑgii, kɑ mɑɑ wɛ̃ɛ wunɔmgii yi yi wee sɑɑ tem bure te bɑ mɔ̀ Sipun di.
Sidonigibu kɑ Aɑfɑdibɑ bɑ rɑ wunɛn sɛsɛnu bwie kpɑ wunɛgii be bɑ yɛ̃ru bo bɑ n bu kpɑre.
Gebɑlin nɔmɑn sɔm kowo be bɑ sɔmɑ ye yɛ̃ sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ, berɑ bɑ rɑ wunɛn wɔrusu kɔre. Be bɑ tenkuru mɔ̀ kɑ goo nimkusu kpuro, bɑ rɑ yɔ̃rewɑ wunɛn mi bu wunɛn kiɑru dwe.
Pɛɛsibɑ kɑ Ludibɑ kɑ Putigibun tii bɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wunɛn tɑbu kowobu. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑbu durɔbu kɑ gem. Wunɛn miyɑ bɑ rɑ ben tɛrɛnu kɑ ben sii furɔ kɔkɔnu bwɛ̃ kpɑ ye kpuro yɑ n nun bɛɛrɛ doke.
Aɑfɑdibɑ kɑ wunɛn tiin tɑbu kowobɑ bɑ rɑ wunɛn gbɑ̃rɑru kɔ̃su bu kɑ sikerenɑ. Tɑbu kowo dɑmgibu gɑbɑ bɑ rɑ mɑɑ wunɛn kuku yenu kɔ̃su. Wunɛn gbɑ̃rɑrɔwɑ bɑ rɑ ben tɛrɛnu bwɛ̃ kpɑ nu n nun bɛɛrɛ doke.
Tiri, wunɛn ɑrumɑni bɑkɑn sɔ̃nɑ Tɑɑsisigibu bɑ rɑ tenkuru nɛ wunɛn mi. Beyɑ bɑ rɑ n kɑ kiɑnu nɑɑmɔ wunɛn yɑburɔ. Niyɑ sii geesu, kɑ sii wɔ̃kusu, kɑ sii kpikisu, kɑ sii pɛɛrum.
Wunɛ kɑ Gɛrɛkibɑ, kɑ Tubɑligibu, kɑ Mɛsɛkigibun tii i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ. Bɑ rɑ kɑ nun yobu kɑ gɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ sekɑ kɑ sii gɑndu kiɑru dweeri.
Togɑɑmɑgibu bɑ rɑ mɑɑ dumi yi bɑ rɑ kɑ sɔmburu ko kɑ yi bɑ rɑ kɑ tɑbu de kɑ kɛtɛkunu dɔrɑm nɛ wunɛn yɑburɔ.
Wunɛ kɑ Dedɑnigibu kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem bureru giɑ kpuro i rɑ mɑɑ tenkuru koosinɛ. Bɑ rɑ nun wunɛn dibu kɔsie kɑ suunu donnu kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ ebɛni.
Wunɛ mɑɑ kɑ Sirigibu i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ. Gɑ̃ɑ dɑbinɑ bɑ rɑ nun dweeri kpɑ bu kɑ nun kpee gobiginu nɑɑwɑ ni nu sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑkɑ bekusu, kɑ beku gɑɑdurɑginu, kɑ beku ni bɑ sɔmɑ dokeɑ, kɑ beku ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii, kɑ nim wɔ̃kun kpee burɑnu, kɑ kpee gobigii ni nu sɔ̃ri.
Wunɛ kɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ. Bɑ rɑ kɑ nun ɑlikɑmɑ ye yɑ wee Minitin di kɑ pɛ̃ɛ bwese bwesekɑ kɑ tim kɑ gum kɑ sere gum sɑwɑrɑm kiɑru dweeri.
Wunɛ kɑ Dɑmɑsigibu i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ wunɛn ɑrumɑni bɑkɑn sɔ̃. Bɑ rɑ kɑ nun tɑm mɛ mu wee Hɛlubonin di kɑ wɛ̃ɛ kpiki yi bɑ kuɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑ sɑnsu kiɑru dweeri.
Sɑɑ Usɑlin di, Yɑfɑnigibu kɑ Gɛrɛkibɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ kiɑnu nɛ wunɛn yɑburɔ. Niyɑ, sisu kɑ dɑ̃ɑ gɑɑ kɑ sere dɑ̃ɑ kiki nubu durorugisu kpɑ bu kɑ nun ye kpuro kiɑru dweeri.
Wunɛ kɑ Dedɑnigibu i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ kpɑ bu nun gɑɑri bekɑ dɔre.
Wunɛ kɑ Dɑɑrububɑ kɑ Kedɑɑn wirugibu i tenkuru koosinɑmɔ. Bɑ rɑ nun kiɑru dweeriwɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpɛmminu kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kinɛnu kɑ sere mɑɑ bonu.
Wunɛ kɑ Sebɑn tenkubɑ kɑ Rɑmɑgibu i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ. Bɑ rɑ kɑ turɑre ye yɑ geɑ bo nɛ wunɛn yɑburɔ kɑ kpee gobiginu bwese bwesekɑ kɑ sere mɑɑ wurɑ.
Wunɛ kɑ Hɑrɑnigibu kɑ Kɑnnɛgibu kɑ Edɛnigibu kɑ Sebɑn tenkubɑ kɑ Asirigibu kɑ Kilimɑdigibu i rɑ tenkuru koosinɛ.
Yɑ̃ɑ gobiginɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ nun kiɑru dweeri. Yɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ rɑ kɑ nɛ wunɛn yɑburɔ niyɑ, yɑbe gɑɑdurɑginu kɑ yɑbe ni bɑ sɔmɑ doke kɑ bekɑ ye bɑ sɔmɑ doke kɑ sere mɑɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii yi bɑ tɑrɑ.
Tɑɑsisin goo nimkusɑ su rɑ n wunɛn kiɑnu sɔɔwɑ. Mɑ wunɛn dukiɑ kɑ wunɛn bɛɛrɛ yɑ kpɛ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun berɑ mi giɑ.
Goo tɛmɔbu bɑ kɑ nun bɔsu nim bɑkɑm sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ woo gɑgɑ koo nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun di gu nun kɔsuku nim wɔ̃ku gen suunu sɔɔ.
Wunɛn dukiɑ kɑ wunɛn kiɑnu kɑ be bɑ rɑ wunɛn sɛsɛnu bwie kɑ be bɑ rɑ bu kpɑre kɑ be bɑ rɑ wunɛn wɔrusu kɔre kɑ wunɛn kiɑ dɔrobu kɑ wunɛn tɑbu kowobu kɑ sere be kpuro be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wunɛn tii sɔɔ bɑ koo num nim wɔ̃kun sɔɔwɔ dɔmɑ te ɑ wɔrumɑ.
Be bɑ rɑ nun kpɑre bɑ koo kuuki ko kpɑ nim wɔ̃kun goonu nu diiri.
Be bɑ wunɛn sɛsɛnu bwiɑmɔ kɑ be bɑ bu kpɑre, be kpuro bɑ koo sɑrɑwɑ wunɛn min di bu nɑ tem dirɑɔ.
Bɑ koo nɔɔgiru suɑ bu nun wuri kɔ̃si koosi kpɑ bu tii tuɑ wisi winɔ bu bindi torom sɔɔ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Bɑ koo ben winu kɔni wunɛn sɔ̃, kpɑ bu sɑɑkibɑ dewe bu nun gɔɔ swĩiyɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Ben nuku sɑnkirɑ ni sɔɔ, bɑ koo nun womu koosi bu nɛɛ, wunɛ Tiri, ɑ ǹ kɑ wuu gɑgu weenɛ. Wee ɑ kɑm kuɑ nim wɔ̃kun suunu sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ wunɛn tenkuru mɔ̀ tɔn dɑbirɑ ɑ rɑ diisie. Wunɛn dukiɑ kɑ wunɛn kiɑnun kpɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃, ɑ derɑ sinɑmbɑ kuɑ dukiɑgibu.
Adɑmɑ ɑ kɔsikirɑ ɑ wɔri nim wɔ̃kun sɔɔwɔ mɑ wunɛ kɑ wunɛn kiɑnu kɑ wunɛn tɔn dɑbi te kpuro i nim diirɑ.
Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem burenu sɔɔ bɑ nuki sɑnkire wunɛn sɔ̃. Mɑ ben sinɑmbu bɑ bɛrum soore bɑ wuswɑɑ burisinɛ.
Tem tukum tenku be bɑ koo sɑrɑ mi, biti koo bu mwɑ kpɑ bu nun wiɑ koosi. Domi ɑ kɑm kuɑ. A ǹ kɑɑ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ Tirin sunɔ sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee u tii suɑ sere u gerumɔ u mɔ̀, wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ. Mɑ u sɔ̃ Gusunɔn sinɑ kitɑru wɔllɔ nim wɔ̃kun suunu sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ u n yɛ̃ mɑ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔnu, n ǹ mɔ Gusunɔ, bɑɑ mɛ u tɑmɑɑ win bwisikunu sɑ̃ɑwɑ teenu kɑ nɛ Gusunɔginu.
U tɑmɑɑ u Dɑniɛli bwisi kere mɑ ɑsiri gɑɑ kun nùn berue.
Win yɛ̃ru kɑ win bwisin sɔ̃ u tii kuɑ dukiɑgii. U wurɑ kɑ sii geesu yibiɑ win ɑrumɑnin beru yerɔ.
Win bwisi bɛkɛ kɑ win tenkurun sɔ̃, win dukiɑ yɑ kuurɑ. Mɑ u tii suɑ dukiɑ yen sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ u tɑmɑɑ win bwisikunu nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ teenu kɑ nɛginu,
yen sɔ̃nɑ kon nùn tɔn tukobu kpɑremɑ be bɑ nuki sosum bwesenu kpuro kere. Bɑ koo nùn tɑkobi sɔkiri bwisi bɛkɛ yin sɔ̃ kpɑ bu win bɛɛrɛ ye disi doke.
Bɑ koo nùn surewɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, kpɑ u gbi nim wɔ̃kun suunu sɔɔ nge wi bɑ sɔkurɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ̀ n nùn goobu (200) nɑ, u koo kpĩ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ? Aɑwo, u ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔnu, n ǹ mɔ Gusunɔ, wi u nùn goomɔn nɔmɑɔ.
U koo gbiwɑ nge wi u kun Gusunɔ yɛ̃. Tɔn tukobɑ bɑ koo nùn go. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ mɑɑ gɔɔ swĩiyɔ Tirin sunɔn sɔ̃. A nùn sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee u rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ wi u yibɑn yĩreru bwisi sɔɔ kɑ burɑm sɔɔ.
U rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Edɛniɔ, Yinni Gusunɔn gbɑɑrɔ. Mɑ bɑ nùn kpee gobigii bwese bwesekɑ dokeye ni nu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru mɔ kɑ dɔm buuru kɑ digi kɑ wuru beku kɑ swɑ̃ɑru kɑ boogu kɑ swɑ̃ɑru kɑ sere mɑɑ wuru beku kɑ wurɑ. Mɑ bɑ nùn gɑ̃ɑsu kɑ guunu soowɑmmɛ ni bɑ kɑ wurɑ. Mɑ bɑ nùn gɑ̃ɑsu kɑ guunu soowɑmmɛ ni bɑ sɔɔru kuɑ win mɑrubun tɔ̃run sɔ̃.
U rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge wɔllun kɔ̃so mɑ u kɑsɑ dɛrie. Mɑ nɑ derɑ u wɑ̃ɑ nɛn guu dɛɛrɑrɔ u sĩimɔ kpee ni nu bɑllimɔn wɔllɔ.
Sɑɑ mìn di bɑ nùn tɑkɑ kuɑ, win dɑɑ yɑ wɑ̃wɑ sere n kɑ girɑri tɔ̃ɔ te bɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ wɑ wi sɔɔ.
Win tenkurun kpɑ̃ɑru tɑ derɑ u bɔbunu kɑ keetɑ wɔri. Yen sɔ̃, kon nùn surɑ sɑɑ nɛn guu dɛɛrɑ ten min di, wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ nge wɔllun kɔ̃so mi. Kon de u doonɑ sɑɑ kpee ni nu bɑllimɔ min suunu sɔɔn di.
U tii suɑ win burɑm sɔ̃ mɑ u win bwisi kɑ win bɛɛrɛ ye kpuro sɑnkɑ. Yen sɔ̃, kon nùn kɔ̃ temɔ kpɑ sinɑm be bɑ tie bu nùn kɑ.
Win durum kpɑ̃ɑru kɑ win keetɑ ye u mɔ̀ tenkuru sɔɔn sɔ̃, u win wuun sɑ̃ɑ yenu disi doke. Yen sɔ̃, kon de dɔ̃ɔ u se win tiin min di kpɑ u nùn gɔsiɑ torom tɔn be bɑ nùn mɛɛrɑn nɔni biru.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bwese ni nu nùn yɛ̃ kpuro nu koo biti kowɑ, domi u koo kɑm ko. U ǹ ko n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio Sidonin berɑ giɑ kpɑ ɑ ye gerusi.
A nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee kon ye wɔri. Kon ye nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi kpɑ bu mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ yen suunu sɔɔ. Nɑ̀ n ye siri, mɑ nɑ ye sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Dɛɛro, sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon de bɑrɑnu nu ye wɔri. Kon de bu tɔmbu go yen swɛɛ sɔɔ. Tɔmbɑ koo wɔruku bu gbisuku tɑɑ bi bɑ koo ye wɔrimɑ beri berikɑn din sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Bwese ni nu Isirelibɑ sikerenɛ nu bu gɛmɑ nu ǹ ko n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sɑ̃ku ni nu bu mɛɛrɑ mɔ̀ nu gɛ̃ɛkumɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ kon Isirelibɑ mɛnnɑmɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔn di mi bɑ yɑrinɛ, kon sɔ̃ɔsi bwese tuku nin nɔni biru mɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Dɛɛro. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ koo dɑ bu sinɑ ben temɔ mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑ Yɑkɔbu wɛ̃.
Bɑ koo sinɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Bɑ koo diɑ bɑni kpɑ bu resɛmbɑ duure. Bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ domi kon be bɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛ bɑ bu gɛmɑ siri n sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurusen suru wɔkurusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yiruse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑ kisio Egibiti sunɔn mi giɑ kpɑ ɑ wi, kɑ win temgibu kpuro sɔ̃
ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee kon nùn wɔrimɑ wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ nge kɑrɑku ge gɑ nɑnum mɔ gɑ kpĩ dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Niluɔ. Mɑ u gerumɔ u mɔ̀, dɑɑ te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wigiru domi wiyɑ u tu kuɑ.
Kon kɔkɔnu sɔre win bɑɑ sɑburosu sɔɔ kpɑ n de dɑɑ ten swɛ̃ɛ yi n sɔre sɔre win koko wɔrukisɔ. Kpɑ n nùn gɑwɑ n yɑrɑ dɑɑ ten min di kɑ swɛ̃ɛ yi sɑnnu.
Kpɑ n nùn suɑ n kɔ̃ gbɑburɔ kɑ swɛ̃ɛ yi kpuro. U koo wɔriwɑ yɑkɑsɔ. Goo kun nùn seeyɑmɔ, goo kun mɑɑ nùn dɔbɑmɔ. Gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ gunɔsɑ su koo win goru di.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Egibitigibu kpuro bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. Domi somi te u Isirelibɑ kuɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kɑbɑru, tɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ.
Bɑ nùn tɑ̃sisi mɑ u bɔɔrɑ ben nɔmɑɔ u ben senu mɛɛrɑ kuɑ mɑ u derɑ bɑ subɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon de bu nùn wɔrimɑ kɑ tɑkobi kpɑ n de bu win tɔmbu kɑ yɛɛ kpuro go.
Egibitin tem mu koo ko bɑnsu kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. Domi yen sunɔ u nɛɛ, wiyɑ u dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Nilu mɔ. Wiyɑ u mɑɑ be tu kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, kon wi kɑ win dɑɑ te wɔrimɑ. Kpɑ win tem mu ko bɑnsu sɑɑ Migidolin di n kɑ dɑ Asuɑniɔ kɑ Etiopin tem nɔɔ burɑ yenɔ.
Tɔnu kun mɑɑ sɑrɔ mi, mɛyɑ yɑɑ gɑɑ kun mɑɑ sɑrɔ mi. Yɑ koo kowɑ wɔ̃ɔ weeru goo kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Wɔ̃ɔ weerun bɑɑ sɔɔ, kon de Egibitin tem kɑ yen wusu su ko bɑnsu n kere bɑnsu kpuro. Kon bu yɑrinɑsiɑ n de bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wɔ̃ɔ wee ten biru, kon Egibitigibu mɛnnɑmɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔn di mi bɑ yɑrinɛ.
Be, Egibitigii be bɑ rɑɑ yoru dimɔ kon kɑ bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ berɑ mi bɑ mɔ̀ Pɑturɔsi. Miyɑ bɑ koo bɑndu swĩi te tɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ.
Tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɑn te tɑ piiburu bo kpɑ tɑ kun dɑm mɔ bwese ni nu tie sɔɔ. Kon tu kɑwɑwɑ kpɑ tu ku rɑɑ kɑ bwese ni nu tie tɑɑre.
Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tu nɑɑnɛ mɔ̀. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɔɔ ten mi, bu somiru kɑnɑ ye yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ ben durum. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu kɑ yirusen suru gbiikoon tɔ̃ɔ gbiikiru sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko u derɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ sɔm sɛ̃sɔginu kuɑ bu kɑ Tiri kɑmiɑ. Adɑmɑ win tɑbu kowo be kpuro bɑ wii kpɑki kuɑ mɑ ben senu potikirɑ. Kɑ mɛ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon tii kɑ win tɑbu kowo be, bɑ ǹ ɑrufɑɑni gɑɑ wɑ sɔmbu te sɔɔ, te bɑ kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko Egibitin dukiɑ kpuro wɛ̃. U koo ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ kpɑ nu n sɑ̃ɑ win tɑbu kowobun kɔsiɑru.
Kon nùn Egibiti wɛ̃wɑ yɑ n sɑ̃ɑ win sɔmbu te u kuɑn kɔsiɑru. Domi nɛnɑ, wi kɑ win sɔm kowobu bɑ sɔmburu kuɑ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, kon Isirelibɑ dɑm kɛ̃ kpɑ n mɑɑ wunɛ tɔnun biin nɔɔ wukiɑ ɑ kɑ bu gɑri ko kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ Egibitigibu gerusio kpɑ ɑ bu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃surɑ wee. Bu weeweenu koowo.
Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ sisi tè sɔɔ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon bu wɔri. Wee tɑ mɑm turuku kuɑ. Tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru.
Tɑbu koo nɑ Egibitiɔ kpɑ bu tɔn dɑbiru go mi, bu ben dukiɑ gurɑ kpɑ tem mɛ, mu ko bɑnsu, kpɑ nuku sɑnkirɑ bɑkɑnu nu n wɑ̃ɑ Etiopiɔ.
Etiopigibu kɑ Putigibu kɑ Ludibɑ kɑ Dɑɑrububɑ kpuro kɑ Libigibu kɑ sere mɑɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isireli be bɑ kɑ bu nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɑ koo wɔruku bu gbisuku tɑɑ bi sɔɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, be bɑ kɑ Egibitigibu yinɑmɔ mi, bɑ koo bu go tɑbu sɔɔ sɑɑ Migidolin di n kɑ girɑri Asuɑniɔ kpɑ dɑm mɛ Egibitigibu bɑ rɑɑ kɑ tii sue mi, mu kpe. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Ben tem mɛ, mu koo ko bɑnsu n kere tem mɛ n tie hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Ben wusu su koo kowɑ bɑnsu mɑm mɑm n kere wuu si su tie.
Nɑ̀ n Egibitigibu dɔ̃ɔ sɔkumɑ mɑ nɑ derɑ be bɑ kɑ bu yinɑmɔ min dɑm mu kpɑ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ, kon sɔmɔbu gɔri goo nimkusu sɔɔ bu Etiopigii be bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ nɑndɑsiɑ kpɑ bu bɛrum soorɑ Egibitigibun wɑhɑlɑn tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ, te tɑ sisi.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon sinɑ boko Nɛbukɑnɛsɑɑ dendi n kɑ Egibitin tɔn dɑbi te kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ.
Wi, kɑ win tɑbu kowo wɔnwɔndu sɑrirugii be, bɑ koo nɑ bu tem mɛ wɔri bu kpeerɑsiɑ. Bɑ koo Egibitigibu go kɑ tɑkobi kpɑ gonu nu yibu tem mɛ kpuro sɔɔ.
Kon de dɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Nilun kɛri yi gberɑ kpɑ n Egibitin tem tɔn kɔ̃sobu nɔmu bɛriɑ. Tɔn tukobu bɑ koo nɑ bu ye kpuro kɑm koosiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, kon Nɔfun bũu turɑnun bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kpuro kɔsuku. Goo kun mɑɑ bɑndu dimɔ Egibitiɔ. Kon dewɑ tem mɛ, mu bɛrum duurɑ.
Kon Pɑturɔsi kpeerɑsiɑ kpɑ n Soɑni dɔ̃ɔ mɛni kpɑ n mɑɑ Tebɛsi siri.
Kon kɑ Sini mɔru ko ye, ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge Egibitigibun gbɑ̃rɑ bɑkɑru kpɑ n Tebɛsin tɔn dɑbi dɑbi te go.
Kon Egibiti dɔ̃ɔ sɔku kpɑ Sini yu burisinɑ. Bɑ koo Tebɛsin gbɑ̃rɑru kɔrɑ kpɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bu Nɔfu kɑmiɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ.
Bɑ koo Onin ɑluwɑɑsibɑ kɑ Pibesɛtigibu go kɑ tɑkobi. Wuu si kpuron tɔmbɑ bɑ koo yoru mwɑ.
Nɑ̀ n Egibitigibun dɑm buɑ mɛ bɑ mɔ bɑ kɑ tɔmbu yoru diisie, mɑ dɑm mɛ bɑ rɑɑ kɑ tii sue mi, mu nɔru kuɑ, yɑm mu koo tĩrɑ Tɑpɑnɛsiɔ kpɑ bu yen tɔmbu yoru mwɛɛri.
Kon Egibitigibu siri kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑsen suru gbiikoon sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiruse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, nɑ Egibitin sunɔn gɑ̃seru buɑ. Wee, bɑ ǹ wɑ wi u koo nùn bɛkiɑ. Domi bɑ ǹ win mɛɛrɑ ye bɔkue u sere nɛɛ, u koo kpĩ u tɑkobi nɛnɛ.
Wee nɑ Egibitin sunɔ wi wɔrim wee. Kon win gɑ̃senu kpuro bɔɔku te tɑ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ te tɑ ǹ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Kon de tɑkobi yu wɔrumɑ win nɔmɑn di.
Kon Egibitigibu yɑrinɑsiɑ bu dɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ. Kon de bu dɑ tem bɑɑmɛre sɔɔ.
Kon Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko dɑm wɛ̃ kpɑ n nùn nɛn tɑkobi nɔmu bɛriɑ. Adɑmɑ kon Egibitin sunɔn gɑ̃seru buɑ kpɑ u weeweenu ko Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon wuswɑɑɔ nge u gɔɔ dɔɔ.
Kon Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko dɑm wɛ̃ kpɑ Egibitin sinɑ bokogim mu kpe. Nɑ̀ n nɛn tɑkobi Bɑbilonin sinɑ boko nɔmu bɛriɑ, mɑ u kɑ ye Egibitigibu wɔri, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon Egibitigibu yɑrinɑsiɑ bu dɑ bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ. Kon dewɑ bu dɑ tem bɑɑmɛre sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ tiɑsen suru itɑsen tɔ̃ɔ gbiikiru sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ Egibitin sunɔ kɑ win tɔn dɑbi dɑbi te sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wɑrɑ kɑ nùn weenɛ win kpɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ.
Wee u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge Libɑnin dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru. Yen kɑ̃ɑsi yi wɑ̃ mɑ yen wurusu kubenu sɑ̃ɑ. Mɑ yɑ gunu yɑ guru winu girɑri.
Gurɑ yɑ ye kpɛ̃ɑsiɑ. Nim mɛ mu duɑ tem sɔɔ mu derɑ yɑ guniɑ. Nim mɛ kpuro mu kokumɔwɑ mi yen gbini yi wɑ̃ɑ. Min diyɑ mu kokumɔ mu dɑɑmɔ dɑ̃ɑ ni nu tien mi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ yɑ kpɛ̃ɑ yɑ dɑ̃nu kpuro gunum kerɑ. Yen kɑ̃ɑsi yi dɑbiɑ mɑ yi tɛriɑ. Domi yɑ nim wɑɑmɔ too.
Gunɔsu nɑ su sin sokunu kuɑ yen kɑ̃ɑsiɔ. Mɑ gbeeku yɛɛ nɑ yi mɑrurɑmɔ yen kɔkɔrɔ. Mɑ bwese dɑbirɑ nɑ tɑ sɔ̃ yen sɑɑrɔ.
Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ dɑ̃ɑ burɑru mɑ yɑ gunu yɑ kɑ̃ɑsi dɛ̃u. Domi yen nuwi yi duɑwɑ sere tem sɔɔwɔ mi nim mu kpɑ̃.
Bɑɑ nɛ, Gusunɔn dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Edɛni sɔɔ, sɛduru gɑɑ sɑri ye yɑ kɑ ye weenɛ. Mɛyɑ dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ sipɛrɛ yen gɑɑ sɑri ye yɑ kɑ̃ɑsi burɛ mɔ nge ye. Dɑ̃ɑ wuru bɑkɑsu gɑsu mɑɑ sɑri si su kɑ yegisu weenɛ. Dɑ̃ru gɑru sɑri te tɑ kɑ ye burɑm nɛ.
Kɑ̃ɑsi burɛyɑ nɑ ye wɛ̃ sere dɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ nɛ, Gusunɔn dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Edɛniɔ nu nisinu seewɑ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, sɛduru ye, yɑ kpɛ̃ɑ yɑ guru winu girɑri. Mɑ yɑ tii suɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon ye girɑ kpɑ n ye sinɑ boko wi u sinɑmbu kpuro dɑm kere nɔmu bɛriɑ kpɑ u ye kuɑ nge mɛ yen torɑrɑ nɛ.
Tɔn tuko be bɑ nuku kɔ̃suru bo bɑ koo ye kĩi bu surɑ bu kɔ̃. Kpɑ yen kɑ̃ɑsi yi wɔri guunu kɑ wɔwi sɔɔ kpɑ yi bɔɔkirɑ tem mɛ kpuron wɔwi sɔɔ. Kpɑ tɔn be bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yen sɑɑrɔ bu yɑrinɑ bu ye deri.
Yen bĩirun wɔllɔwɑ gunɔsu su koo nɑ su sinɑ. Kpɑ gbeeku yɛɛ yi yin wɑ̃ɑ yeru ko yen kɔkɔrɔ.
Yeni yɑ koo koorɑwɑ kpɑ dɑ̃ɑ ni nu nim wɑɑmɔ nu ku rɑɑ kɑ guniɑ nu guru winu girɑri nu sere tii suɑ nin gunum sɔ̃. Domi dɑ̃nu kɑ tɔmbu kpuro bɑ koo gbiwɑ bu dɑ bu gɔribu deemɑ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, dɔmɑ te sɛduru ye, yɑ koo du gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, kon de tɑkɑ koorɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑm mi kpuro yu gɔɔ wooru sinɑ. Kon nim yɔ̃rɑsiɑ yen sɔ̃, kpɑ n de dɑɑnu nu kokubu yɔ̃rɑ. Kon mɑɑ de yɑm mu tĩrɑ Libɑniɔ, kpɑ n dɑ̃nu gberɑsiɑ yɑkɑsɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ kon de sɛduru ye, yu wɔrumɑ yu dɑ gɔriɔ kɑ tɔn be bɑ dɔɔ mi sɑnnu, be bɑ koo yen wɔrumɑɑn dɑmu nɔ bɑ koo diiri bɛrum sɔ̃. Gbɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Edɛnin dɑ̃ɑ ni nu burɑm bo kɑ ni nu geɑ sɑ̃ɑ ni kpuro ni nu gesi nim wɑɑmɔ Libɑniɔ nu ko n nuku dobu mɔwɑ sere tem sɔɔwɔ.
Nin tii nu koo sɑrɑ nu dɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ nu bu deemɑ be bɑ go kɑ tɑkobi. Bɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yen dɑm mɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ yen sɑɑrɔ tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ.
Edɛnin gbɑɑ te sɔɔ, dɑ̃ɑ gɑɑ kun kɑ Egibitin sinɑ boko nɛ burɑm sɔɔ kɑ kpɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. Kɑ mɛ, bɑ koo nùn surewɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ tem sɔɔ sɔɔwɔ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Edɛni mi sɑnnu kpɑ u n kpĩ kɑ be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ kɑ tɑkobi, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃n suunu sɔɔ. Yeniwɑ yɑ koo Egibitin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɔn dɑbi te kpuro deemɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni kpuro geruɑ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yirusen suru wɔkurɑ yirusen tɔ̃ɔ gbiikiru sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ gɔɔ swĩiyɔ Egibitin sunɔn sɔ̃. A nùn sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbee sunɔ kpɛmbu bwesenun suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge kɑrɑku nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ. U rɑ tii kpɑre dɑɑ ten nim sɔɔ kpɑ u ten nim buri kɑ nɑɑsu kpɑ ten kurenu nu soonɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon nùn nɛn yɑ̃ɑkororu suremɑ sɑnɑm mɛ tɔn dɑbinu nu mɛnnɛ kpɑ bu nùn gɑwɑ bu yɑrɑmɑ.
Kon nùn yɑrɑwɑ kɑsɑɔ kpɑ n nùn kɔ̃ yɑkɑsɔ. Kon dewɑ gunɔsu su nɑ su sinɑ win wɔllɔ kpɑ gbeeku yɛɛ yi nùn di.
Kon win yɑɑ yɑriwɑ guunu wɔllɔ kpɑ n ye yɑ tie tɑɑsi wɔwi sɔɔ.
Kon de win yɛm mu n yɑri tem mɛ̀ sɔɔ u wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ guunɔ kpɑ yɛm mu n yibɑ mɛn wɔwi sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u koo gbi, kon de wɔllu tu tĩrɑ. Kon kperin yɑm bururɑm go kpɑ guru wiru tu sɔ̃ɔ wukiri, kpɑ suru u ku mɑɑ yɑm bururɑsiɑ.
Kon wɔllun fitilɑnu kpuro go win sɔ̃. Kpɑ n de yɑm mu tĩrɑ win tem sɔɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Kon de bwese dɑbinu nu biti soorɑ nù n win kpeerɑbun lɑbɑɑri nuɑ, bɑɑ kɑ tem mɛ u ǹ yɛ̃.
Kon de bwese ni, nu n biti soore win sɔ̃. Kpɑ nin sinɑmbu bɑ n diirimɔ bɛrum sɔ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ kon nɛn tɑkobi fĩɑ ben wuswɑɑɔ. Sɑnɑm mɛ u koo kpeerɑ mi, bɑ ko n diirimɔwɑ sɑɑ kpuro sɔɔ, ben bɑɑwure u n kɑ win wɑ̃ɑru nɑnde.
Domi ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, Bɑbilonin sinɑ bokon tɑbu kowobu bɑ koo nùn wɔri kɑ tɑkobi.
Kon nùn tɑbu kowo dɑmgibu be bɑ nuku kɔ̃suru bo suremɑ bu win tɔn dɑbi te go. Kpɑ Egibitin tii suɑbu bu kpe.
Kon win yɑɑ sɑbenu go nim bɑkɑm bɔkuɔ kpɑ tɔmbu ǹ kun mɛ yɑɑ sɑbenun nɑɑsu su ku mɑɑ nim mɛ buri.
Kon de mu kpunɑwɑ kpɑ mu n kokumɔ nge gum yɑrum. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ̀ n derɑ Egibiti yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu mɑ nɑ yen dukiɑ gurɑ mɑm mɑm, nɑ yen tɔmbu kɑm koosiɑ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Womu geniwɑ bwesenu kpuron tɔn kurɔbu bɑ koo ko Egibiti kɑ yen tɔn dɑbi ten sɔ̃. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Isirelibɑn yorun wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yirusen suru wɔkurɑ yirusen sɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ nɔɔbuse sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ gɔɔ wuri koowo Egibitigibun sɔ̃ kpɑ ɑ de wunɛn gɔɔ wuri yi, yi bu sure sere tem sɔɔwɔ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ be kɑ bwese ni nu dɑm mɔn tɔmbu.
A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, bɑ tɑmɑɑ bɑ gɑbu bɛɛrɛ kerewɑ? Aɑwo! Bɑ koo dɑwɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ n kpĩ mi sɑnnu kɑ be bɑ kun Gusunɔ yɛ̃.
Bɑ koo wɔrukuwɑ bu kpunɑ kɑ be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ sɑnnu. Wee, bɑ tɑkobi womɑ kɑrɑrun di bu kɑ be kpuro go.
Tɑbu durɔ dɑmgii be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ be, Egibitigibun somiɔ be bɑ gu, bɑ koo nɔɔgiru suɑ bu bu dɑm koosiɑ bu nɛɛ, be wee bɑ sɑrɑmɑ be, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃. Wee bɑ kpĩ. Bɑ bu gowɑ kɑ tɑkobi.
Mɛyɑ Asirin sinɑ boko kɑ win tɔn dɑbinu bɑ kpĩ mɑ ben sikɑ yɑ nùn sikerenɛ. Be kpurowɑ bɑ gu tɑbu sɔɔ.
Siki ni, nu wɑ̃ɑwɑ sere tem sɔɔ sɔɔwɔ, mɑ nu kɑ ben sinɑ bokogiru sikerenɛ. Tɑbu sɔɔrɑ bɑ be kpuro go be, be bɑ rɑɑ nɑsie.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ Elɑmun sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ kpĩ. Mɑ win tɑbu kowobun sikinu wigiru sikerenɛ. Be kpurowɑ bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ be, be tɔmbɑ rɑɑ nɑsie. Bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃. Wee bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sikɑɔ sere tem sɔɔwɔ. Bɑ sekuru sɔɔwɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru mi.
Elɑmun sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu bɑ kpĩ kɑ be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ. Win tɑbu kowobun sikɑ yɑ wigiru sikerenɛ. Be, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃ bɑ gu tɑbu gberɔ. Beyɑ tɔmbɑ rɑɑ nɑsie. Be wee tɛ̃ bɑ kpĩ bɑ sekuru sɔɔwɑ kɑ be bɑ gu tɑɑ bii sɔɔ.
Mɛsɛki kɑ Tubɑli bɑ kpĩ kɑ ben tɑbu kowobu kpuro. Mɑ tɑbu kowo ben sikɑ begiɑ sikerenɛ. Be, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃ mi, bɑ guwɑ tɑbu sɔɔ. Beyɑ tɔmbɑ rɑɑ nɑsie.
Be, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃ mi, bɑ ǹ kɑ bu yellun tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu mɛnnɛ bɑ sikuɑ. Bɑ duɑwɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ ben tɑbu yɑ̃nu bɑ kpunɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃, mɑ ben tɑkobibɑ bɑ kuɑ ben leferi. N deemɑ beyɑ tɔmbu bɑ rɑɑ nɑsie.
Nge mɛyɑ Egibitigibu bɑ koo mɑɑ gbisuku kpɑ bu bu sike tɔn be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃n suunu sɔɔ be, be bɑ go tɑbu gberɔ.
Edɔmubɑ kɑ ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu ben tii bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru mi. Bɑɑ mɛ bɑ wɔrugɔru mɔ, bɑ bu gowɑ. Wee bɑ bu sikuɑ kɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃ sɑnnu.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn sinɑmbu kɑ sere Sidonigibu bɑ sɑrɑ bɑ dɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Wee tɔn be, bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sekuru sɔɔ bɑɑ mɛ bɑ rɑɑ bu nɑsie ben wɔrugɔrun sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, bɑ dɑ bɑ kpĩ kɑ be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ sɑnnu be, be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃ mi. Bɑ sekuru sɔɔwɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru mi.
Egibitin sinɑ boko u koo bu wɑ kpɑ win lɑɑkɑri yu kpunɑ win tɔn dɑbi ten sɔ̃ kɑ win tɑbu kowobun sɔ̃ be bɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ derɑ tɔmbu bɑ rɑ n bɛrum soore Egibitin sinɑ boko win sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, wi kɑ win tɑbu kowo be bɑ gu tɑbu sɔɔ, bɑ koo bu sikewɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃n suunu sɔɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ wunɛgibu Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, tɑbu bù n wɑ̃ɑ ben tem sɔɔ, bɑ rɑ gbɑmgbɑ sowo gɔsiwɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, gbɑmgbɑ sowo wi, ù n yibɛrɛbɑ wɑ kpɑ u gbɑmgbɑ so u kɑ wigibu nɔɔsiɑ.
Wi u gbɑmgbɑ ye nuɑ, mɑ u ye ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ, yibɛrɛ ù n nùn sɑmbɑ kuɑ u go, sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, win yɛm mu koo wɔriwɑ win tii sɔɔ.
U koo gbiwɑ yèn sɔ̃ u gbɑmgbɑ ye ɑtɑfiiru kuɑ. Ù kun dɑɑ ye ɑtɑfiiru kue, u koo rɑɑ win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ.
Su nɛɛ, gbɑmgbɑ sowo wi, u yibɛrɛbɑ wɑɑmɔ bɑ wee, mɑ u ǹ gbɑmgbɑ so u kɑ wigibu nɔɔsiɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ̀ n goo sɑmbɑ kuɑ bɑ mwɑ bɑ go, u koo gbiwɑ win durum sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ gbɑmgbɑ sowo win tɑɑrɛwɑ. Wiyɑ bɑ koo wi bɑ go min yɛm bikiɑ.
Tɔnun bii, wunɑ nɑ gɔsɑ nge gbɑmgbɑ sowo Isirelibɑn suunu sɔɔ ɑ kɑ bu kirɔ ko. A de ɑ nɛn gɑri kɑ nɛn kirɔbɑ swɑɑ dɑki kpɑ ɑ bu ye nɔɔsiɑ.
Nɑ̀ n tɛ̃ nɛɛ, tɔn kɔ̃so goo u koo gbi, mɑ ɑ ǹ nùn kirɔ kue u kɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye deri, u koo gbiwɑ win durum sɔɔ kpɑ n nun win yɛm bikiɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ n nùn kirɔ kuɑ u kɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, mɑ u yinɑ u ye deri, yɛ̃ro u koo gbiwɑ win durum sɔɔ. Kpɑ wunɛ ɑ wunɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑ yeni sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee bɑ rɑ gere bu nɛɛ, ben torɑnu kɑ ben durum yɑ bu wɑ̃ɑsi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre. Amɔnɑ bɑ koo kɑ kpĩ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ bu wisio ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, nɑ ǹ tɔn kɔ̃son gɔɔ kĩ. Nɑ kĩwɑ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ kpɑ u wɑ u n wɑ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, be, Isirelibɑ bu gɔ̃ru gɔsio. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo tii go.
Tɔnun bii, ɑ mɑɑ wunɛgibu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, gemgii ù n kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀, win geɑ ye u rɑɑ kuɑ yɑ ǹ win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑmɔ. Tɔn kɔ̃so ù n mɑɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri u geɑ mɔ̀, win yellun dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye, yɑ ǹ derimɔ u kɑm ko. Yen sɔ̃nɑ gemgii ù n kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀, win yellun dɑɑ yɑ ǹ win wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑmɔ.
Nɑ̀ n gemgii sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, u ko n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ win dɑɑ geɑn sɔ̃, mɑ u tɑmɑɑ win dɑɑ geɑ ye, yɑ turɑ, mɑ u seewɑ u dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ wɔri, u n yɛ̃ mɑ kon win yellun dɑɑ geɑ ye duɑriwɑ. Kpɑ u gbi win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃.
Nɑ̀ n mɑɑ tɔn kɔ̃so sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, u koo gbi, mɑ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ u win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, mɑ u geɑ mɔ̀ u gem swĩi,
mɑ u tɔrubɑ ye u rɑɑ goo mwɑɑri kɑ sere mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑ ni u rɑɑ gbɛnɑ wesiɑ, mɑ u nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ɛmɔ, u ǹ gbimɔ. U ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑ gem, domi u geɑ mɔ̀.
Kon win torɑnu kpuro duɑriwɑ kpɑ u n wɑ̃ɑ domi u geɑ mɔ̀.
Tɔnun bii, wunɛgibɑ nɛɛ, nɛn gere ye, yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ dee dee. Adɑmɑ berɑ bɑ sɑkɑ sɑrɑmɔ.
Gemgii ù n win dɑɑ geɑ deri, mɑ u kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀, u koo gbiwɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen sɔ̃.
Tɔn kɔ̃so ù n mɑɑ win dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, mɑ u geɑ mɔ̀, u ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ yen sɔ̃.
Be, Isirelibɑ bɑ nɛɛ, nɛn gɑri yi, yi ǹ sɑ̃ɑ dee dee. Bɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ kon bɑɑwure siriwɑ nge mɛ win dɑɑ yɑ nɛ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ yoru sɔɔ, ten wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ yirusen suru wɔkurusen sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbuse sɔɔ, yerɑ goo u kisirɑmɑ Yerusɑlɛmun di. Mɑ u nɑ Esekiɛlin mi u nɛɛ, bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu mwɑ.
N deemɑ yokɑ durɔ wi, u sere tunumɑ, Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli win dɑm wɛ̃, mɑ win yɑrɑ kusiɑrɑ. Ye durɔ wi, u nɑ sisiru bururu win mi, yerɑ u kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, wee ye tɔn be bɑ tiɑrɑ Yerusɑlɛmun bɑnsɔ bɑ gerumɔ. Bɑ mɔ̀, Aburɑhɑmu u wɑ̃ɑwɑ wi turo. Kɑ mɛ, u tem mɛ mwɑ. Kɑɑ sere gere bɛsɛ be sɑ dɑbi, mɑ bɑ sun tem mɛ wɛ̃?
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ yɑɑ temmɔ kɑ yen yɛm sɑnnu. Bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ, mɑ bɑ tɔmbu goomɔ. Yerɑ bɑ tɑmɑɑ tem mɛ, mu ko n sɑ̃ɑ begim?
Ben tɑbu yɑ̃nɑ bɑ rɑ n nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ rɑ n dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀wɑ, bɑɑwure u kɑ win winsim kurɔ kpunɑmɔ. Yerɑ bɑ tɑmɑɑ tem mɛ, mu ko n sɑ̃ɑ begim?
A mɑɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑnsu sɔɔ mi, bɑ koo bu gowɑ kɑ tɑkobi. Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑkɑsu sɔɔ, gbeeku yɛɛyɑ yi koo bu tem. Be bɑ mɑɑ kukuɑ gbɑ̃rɑ dɑmginu sɔɔ kɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ, bɑrɑrɑ tɑ koo bu go.
Kon tem mɛ gɔsiɑ bɑnsu. Mɛn dɑm mu koo kpe mɛ̀n sɔ̃ bɑ tii sue. Bɑ koo mɛn guunu deri. Goo kun mɑɑ sɑrɔ mi.
Nɑ̀ n tem mɛ bɑnsu koosiɑ mɑm mɑm n kɑ be, Isirelibɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Tɔnun bii, wunɛgibu Isirelibɑ bɑ wunɛn fɑɑgi mɔ̀ gɑnin bɔkuɔ kɑ dii kɔnnɔsɔ. Bɑɑwure u win winsim sɔ̃ɔmɔ u mɔ̀, ɑ nɑ su dɑ su Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri nɔ.
Mɑ bɑ nɑɑmɔ dɑbi dɑbinu bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ mɔ̀ ye ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Bɑ wunɛn gɑri yɑɑkoru sɑ̃ɑ mɑ bɑ ben tii tiin ɑrufɑɑni nɑɑ gire.
Wee ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge ben bɑrɔ wi u dɔkɔru do. A mɑɑ bɑrɑ soberu yɛ̃. Bɑ rɑ wunɛn kirɔbɑ swɑɑ dɑki kpɑ bɑ kun be mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Adɑmɑ ye ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ mi kpuro yɑ̀ n koorɑ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛn sɔmɔ u wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑn kpɑrobu gerusio. A bu nɛn kirɔbɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ. Wee ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, be, Isirelibɑn kpɑrobu, bɑ kuɑwɑ bɔ̃rurobu. Domi ben tiin gɑriyɑ bɑ mɔ̀. Bɑ ǹ yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ nɔɔrimɔ.
Wee bɑ yɑ̃ɑ ni nu gum mɔ goomɔ bɑ temmɔ mɑ bɑ nin bom nɔrumɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ nu kpɑrɑmɔ.
Bɑ ǹ ni nu kpɑnɑmɔ somi. Bɑ ǹ ni nu bɑrɔ nɔɔri. Bɑ ǹ ni nu mɛɛrɑ wɑn bosu tim doke. Bɑ ǹ ni nu gɛrɑmɔ sure swɑɑ geɑ sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ ni nu kɔ̃ɔrɑ kɑsu. Adɑmɑ bɑ nu dɑm dɔremɔwɑ.
Mɑ nu yɑrinɑ domi nu ǹ kpɑro mɔ. Nu kuɑ gbeeku yɛɛn dĩɑnu.
Mɑ nu sirenɛ guunu kɑ gungunu wɔllɔ nu yɑrinɛ tem kpuro sɔɔ. Goo kun nin bwisikunu kue u sere mɑm nu kɑsum dɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, be, Isirelibɑn kpɑrobu bu swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, nɑ wɑ mɑ bɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑnu wɔri bɑ goomɔ. Mɑ nu kuɑ gbeeku yɛɛn dĩɑnu yèn sɔ̃ nin kpɑrobɑ kun nin bwisikunu kue bu nu nɔɔri. Mɑ bɑ sere ben tii nɔɔrimɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, bu swɑɑ dɑkio bu nɔ ye nɑ bu sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ bu seesimɔ. Bɑ ǹ ko n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑnun kpɑrobu bu sere nin ɑrufɑɑni di. Kon nu wɔrɑ ben nɔmɑn di, kpɑ nu kun mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben dĩɑnu.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ sɑɑ tɛ̃n di. Nɑ nɛɛ, nɛn tiiwɑ kon nɛn yɑ̃ɑnu mɛnnɑ n nu nɔɔri.
Kon nu mɛnnɑwɑ nge mɛ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro u rɑ win yɑ̃ɑnu mɛnnɛ nù n yɑrinɑ. Tɔ̃ɔ te nu yɑrinɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm wɔ̃ku bɑkɑru. Kon dɑ n nu kɑsuwɑ bɑɑmɑ mi nu yɑrinɛ.
Kon nu yɑrɑmɑ tem tukum di. Kpɑ n nu mɛnnɑ n kɑ nɑ nin temɔ Isireliɔ. Kon nu kpɑrɑ guunɔ kɑ wɔwi sɔɔ kɑ sere mi tɔmbɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpuro.
Kon kɑ nu dɑ kpɑrɑ yee geeru sɔɔ. Kpɑ nu di nu wɛ̃rɑ. Nu koo yɔ Isirelibɑn guunɔ kpɑ nu yɑkɑ geesu wɑ nu di.
Nɛn tiiwɑ kon nu kpɑrɑ kpɑ n de nu wɛ̃rɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Kon ni nu kɔ̃ɔrɑ kɑsumɑ n kɑ nɑ. Kpɑ n ni nu mɛɛrɑ wɑn bosu tim doke. Kpɑ n mɑɑ ni nu bɑrɔ nɔɔri nu dɑm ko. Adɑmɑ kon ni nu bɔɔru go. Nɛn tiiwɑ kon nɛn yɑ̃ɑnu kpɑrɑ gem sɔɔ.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ Isirelibɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑ̃ɑnu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon nin geenu kɑ kɔ̃sunu wunɑnɑ. Kon yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ bonu wunɑnɑ.
Domi yɑkɑ gee si nin gɑnu di su nu turɑ sere nu si nu ǹ di tɑɑkumɔ. Nu nim gem nɔrɑ n nu turɑ mɑ nu mɛ mu tie tɑɑkɑ nu burisi.
Yɑkɑ si nu tɑɑkɑ mi, siyɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑ ni nu tie nu dimɔ. Nim mɛ nu mɑɑ burisi mi, mɛyɑ nu nɔrumɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nu sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɑ mɔ̀, kon yɑ̃ɑ ni nu bɔɔru kɑ ni nu woore wunɑnɑ.
Domi ni nu bɔɔru nu ni nu woore kɑ kɔbi bɔrikiɑ nu yɑrinɑsiɑ.
Wee nɑ nu somiru wee. Kpɑ goo u ku rɑɑ mɑɑ nu mwɛɛri. Kon nu siriɑ.
Kon nu kpɑro turo wɛ̃ wi u koo nu nɔɔri. U koo yɑriwɑ nɛn sɔm kowo Dɑfidin bweserun di. U koo nu nɔɔri kpɑ u n sɑ̃ɑ nin kpɑro geo.
Nɛ Gusunɔ ko nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nin Yinni. Kpɑ nɛn sɔm kowo Dɑfidi u n sɑ̃ɑ nin kpɑro. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ mɑ kon nu bɔri yɛndu wɛ̃. Kon de gbeeku yɛɛ kpuro yi doonɑ tem minin di. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, nu koo kpĩ nu kpunɑ gbɑburɔ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ.
Kon de nu n wɑ̃ɑ guu te nɑ gɔsɑn bɔkuɔ. Kpɑ n nu domɑru kuɑ n de gurɑ yu nɛ yen sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Dɑ̃nu nu koo binu mɑ. Tem mu koo de dĩɑnu nu mɑ, kpɑ bɑɑwure u n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Kon nɛn tɔmbun yorun yɔni kɑsuku kpɑ n bu yɑkiɑ be bɑ bu yoru mwɛɛrɑn nɔmɑn di. Kpɑ bu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Tɔn tukobu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu dimɔ. Gbeeku yɛɛ yi ǹ mɑɑ bu mwɛɛrimɔ. Bɑ koo yɑriwɑ kɑrin di. Goo kun mɑɑ bu nɑrumɔ.
Kon bu gbeɑ wɛ̃ ye yɑ koo yĩsiru yɑri. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɔ̃ɔrun wɑhɑlɑ mɔ̀ ben tem sɔɔ. Tɔn tukobu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu sekuru dokemɔ.
Bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛ Gusunɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ben Yinni. Nɛnɑ nɑ kɑ be, Isirelibɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbu. Nɛnɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Be nɛn tɔmbu, beyɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑ ni nɑ nɔɔrimɔ mi. Domi nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ben Yinni. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio Seirin guurun berɑ giɑ, kpɑ ɑ tu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ,
ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, wee kon tu wɔrimɑ. Kon tu nɛn nɔmu dɛmiɛ kpɑ n tu ko bɑnsu.
Kon ten wusu bɑnsu koosiɑ, kpɑ tu yɔ̃rɑ diiru. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ tɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wee tɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ yibɛrɛ tɛɛru nɛni sere kɑ gisɔ. Isirelibɑn wɑhɑlɑn sɑɑ sɔɔ, tɑ bu tɑkobi sɔkurɑ sɑnɑm mɛ ben durum yɑ yewɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, sere kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru, kon ten yɛm yɑri. Yɛm mɛ tɑ rɑɑ yɑri mi, mu ko n tu swĩi. Domi tɑ ǹ tɔmbun yɛm yɑribu yinɛ. Yen sɔ̃, bɑ koo ten tiin yɛm yɑri.
Kon de Seirin guu te, tu ko bɑnsu. Kon be bɑ sɑrɔ mi kpuro go.
Tɔn be bɑ gon gonu nu ko n tɛriewɑ bɑɑmɑ guunɔ kɑ gungunɔ kɑ wɔwi sɔɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ wɔrusɔ.
Kon de tu kowɑ bɑnsu sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ sinɑmɔ ten wusu sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Seiri yɑ nɛɛ, Isireli kɑ Yudɑn temgibu bɑ koo ko yegibu. Yɑ koo be kpuro mwɑ bɑɑ mɛ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Yen sɔ̃, sere kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑru, kon ye mɔru kɑ nisinu kɑ tusiru kɔsie nge mɛ yɑ rɑɑ bu kuɑ. Kon bu tii sɔ̃ɔsi sɑnɑm mɛ kon ye siri.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, yɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nuɑ wɔmɑ ye yɑ Isirelibɑn guunu wɔnwɑ. Yɑ nɛɛ, wee nu kɑm kuɑ. Wee bɑ ye nu nɔmu sɔndiɑ nge gbeeku yɛɛ.
Yɑ tii suɑ nɛn wuswɑɑɔ kɑ yen gɑri gerubu. Yɑ mɑn tɔn biɑ gɑri gerusi. Nɛn tiiwɑ nɑ ye nuɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ tem kpuro mu ko n wɑ̃ɑ nuku dobu sɔɔ, yen tem mu koo ko bɑnsu.
Domi yɑ nuku dobu kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ yɑ Isirelibɑn tem kɑm koosiɑ. Nge mɛyɑ kon Seirin guuru kɑ Edɔmun tem mɛ kpuro kɑm koosiɑ kpɑ n ko bɑnsu. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Esekiɛli sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑn guunu nɛn gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɔ kpɑ nu yi swɑɑ dɑki. Mɑ Esekiɛli u kɑ guu ni gɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ,
wee yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, ɛhɛ̃, tɛ̃ i kuɑ beginu.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑmɛniwɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, n bɛɛ sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, u wɑ mɑ bɑ kĩɑ bu bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑ beri berikɑ kpuro, bu bɛɛ mwɛ. Kpɑ bwese ni nu tie nu n bɛɛ mɔ. Mɛyɑ nu rɑ n bɛɛ yɛ̃ɛmɔ nu n kɑ fɑɑgi mɔ̀ yɑm kpuro.
Yen sɔ̃, u nɛɛ, bɛɛ guunu kɑ gungunu kɑ dɑɑnu kɑ wɔwi kɑ bɑnsu kɑ wuu si bɑ deri si yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wɔri bɑ yɑ̃nu gurɑ mɑ bwese ni nu kɑ su sikerenɛ nu su yɛ̃ɛmɔ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye u gerumɔ bɛɛn sɔ̃.
Wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, kɑ nisi bɑkɑnɑ u kɑ Edɔmubɑ kpuro gɑri mɔ̀ kɑ bwese ni nu tie, ni nu tii win tem wɛ̃ kɑ nuku dobu kɑ win gɛndu mɑ nu kɑ mɛn yɑ̃nu kpuro gurɑ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑn tem guunu kɑ gungunu kɑ dɑɑnu kɑ wɔwi, wee ye u nɛɛ, n bɛɛ sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, wi wee u gɑri gerumɔ mɔru kɑ nisinun sɔ̃. Domi bwese tukunu nu bɛɛ sekuru doke.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ u nɔmɑ yiiyɑ u bɔ̃ruɑ u nɛɛ, bwese ni nu kɑ bɛɛ sikerenɛ mi, niyɑ nu koo sekuru wɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɛɛ guunun dɑ̃nu i ko kpɑrɑ kpɑ i binu mɑ win tɔmbu Isirelibɑn sɔ̃. Domi ben wurɑmɑru tɑ turuku kuɑ kɔ.
Wi wee u kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ. U koo bɛɛ wuswɑɑ kisimɑ. Bɑ koo mɑɑ wuku bɛɛn temɔ bu duure.
U koo de tɔmbu bu dɑbiɑ. Isirelibɑ kpuro bɑ koo wurɑmɑ mi, kpɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Kpɑ bu bɑnsu sɔɔ dii kpɑɑnu bɑni.
U koo de tɔmbu kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu bu dɑbiɑ bu kɔwɑrɑ kpɑ bu sinɑ mi nge yellu. Kpɑ u bu geɑ kuɑ n kere ye u rɑɑ kuɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
U koo de win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ bu sĩ bɛɛn wɔllɔ kpɑ bɑ n bɛɛ mɔ. I ko n sɑ̃ɑ ben tubi. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, i ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ bu ben bibu biɑ.
Wee tɔmbɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, Isirelin tem mu sɑ̃ɑ nge gbeeku yɑɑ ye yɑ yen tiin binu temmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ i ǹ mɑɑ tɔmbu temmɔ. I ǹ bɛɛn tɔmbu kɑm koosiɑmɔ.
U ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ i bwese tukunun wɔmɑ nɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛ sekuru dokemɔ. Mɛyɑ i ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ bɛɛn tɔmbu bu kɑm ko. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ geruɑ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben temɔ, bɑ mu disi doke ben dɑɑn sɔ̃ kɑ ben kookoosun sɔ̃. Mɑ nɑ ben kookoo si gɑrisi disi nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yɑsɑ mɔ̀.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bu mɔru seesi yɛm mɛ bɑ yɑri ben tem sɔɔn sɔ̃ kɑ sere bũu ni bɑ kɑ mu disi doke.
Nɑ bu siri ben dɑɑ kɑ ben kookoosun sɔ̃. Mɑ nɑ bu yɑrinɑsiɑ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɑ̃ɑ bwesenu gɑnu sɔɔ tem tukumɔ.
Ye bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bwese nin mi, ni bɑ tii wɛ̃, miyɑ bɑ nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ te sɑnkɑ sere tɔmbɑ mɔ̀, Yinni Gusunɔn tɔmbɑ. Win tem diyɑ bɑ yɑrimɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ kĩ n nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ te fɑɑbɑ ko te be, Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑnkumɔ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, tɔnun bii, ɑ kpɑm Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, n ǹ ben sɔ̃ nɑ yeni mɔ̀. Nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ ten sɔ̃nɑ te bɑ sɑnkɑ bwesenu sɔɔ.
Kon nɛn yĩsi bɑkɑ te bɛɛrɛ wesiɑ te bɑ sɑnkɑ bwesenun suunu sɔɔ mi. Bwese ni, nù n wɑ bɑ mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, nu koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon bu wunɑ bwese nin suunu sɔɔn di n bu mɛnnɑ n kɑ wurɑmɑ ben temɔ.
Kon bu nim dɛɛrɑm wisi kpɑ bu dɛɛrɑ. Kon ben torɑnu kpuro wɔkɑ kpɑ n ben bũnu kpuro wunɑ n kɔ̃.
Kon bu bwisiku kpɑɑnu kɑ gɔ̃ru kpɑɑsu wɛ̃. Kon ben gɔ̃ru si su bɔɔbu nge kperu wunɑ kpɑ n bu gɔ̃rusu wɛ̃ si su du nge wɑsi.
Kon bu nɛn Hunde wɛ̃ kpɑ n de bu nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ bɑ n kɑ ye sɔmburu mɔ̀.
Bɑ koo sinɑ tem mɛ nɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ko nɛn tɔmbu kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Kon bu torɑnu kpuro gbɑrɑ. Kon de bu dĩɑnu wɑ nu n kpɑ̃. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu gɔ̃ɔru kpɑremɔ.
Kon de dɑ̃nu nu mɑ, kpɑ gbeɑ yu dĩɑnu ko kpɑ bu ku mɑɑ sekuru wɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃ bwesenu sɔɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo tubu mɑ ben kookoosu kɑ ben dɑɑ yɑ ǹ wɑ̃ kpɑ bu tii tusi yen sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ be, Isirelibɑ bɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ n ǹ ben sɔ̃ nɑ mɔ̀ mɛ. Bu de sekuru tu bu mwɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, dɔmɑ te kon bu dɛɛrɑsiɑ ben torɑnu kpuron di, kon de tɔmbu bu yibu wusu sɔɔ kpɑ bu ben bɑnsu seeyɑ.
Bɑ koo mɑɑ dĩɑnu yewe tem mɛ sɔɔ, mɛ bɑ rɑɑ deri tɔmbu kpuro bu kɑ wɑ mɑ gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi mi.
Kpɑ bu nɛɛ, tem mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi mi, wee mu kuɑ nge gbɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Edɛni. Mɛn wuu si su rɑɑ bɑnsu sɑ̃ɑ su tɛ̃ tɔmbu yibɑ mɑ bɑ su gbɑ̃rɑnu toosi.
Kpɑ bwese ni nu kɑ bɛɛ sikerenɛ nu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ ye bɑ rɑɑ surɑ seeyɑ, mɑ nɑ ye bɑ rɑɑ wukɑ girɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ. Kon mɑɑ ye ko.
Wee ye kon mɑɑ wure n Isirelibɑ kuɑ. Kon bu dɑbiɑsiɑ nge yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ.
Wuu si su rɑɑ bɑnsu sɑ̃ɑ, su koo tɔmbu yibu nge yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ si bɑ gɔsɑ yɑ̃kurun sɔ̃, si bɑ rɑ kɑ nɛ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrun sɔ̃. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm mu Esekiɛli nɛnuɑ mɑ mu win bwɛ̃rɑ suɑ mu kɑ dɑ wɔwɑ gɑɑn suunu sɔɔ. Wɔwɑ ye sɔɔ, kukunɑ nu yibɑ.
Mɑ dɑm mɛ, mu derɑ u sĩɑ kuku nin suunu sɔɔ. U deemɑ nu dɑbi wɔwɑ ye sɔɔ, mɑ nu gbere woko woko.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, kuku ni, nu koo kpĩ nu wɑ̃ɑru wɑ? Mɑ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, wunɑ ɑ yɛ̃ mɛ, Yinni.
Mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ gɑri geruo kuku gbebu nin sɔ̃ ɑ nu sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, nu nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri swɑɑ dɑkio nu nɔ.
Nɑ nɛɛ, kon nu hunde kpɑɑ wɛ̃ kpɑ nu mɑɑ se nu n wɑ̃ɑ.
Kon nu sĩi kpɑɑnu wɛ̃ kpɑ n de nu wɑsi kpɑrɑ. Kon nu hunde kpɑɑ wɛ̃ kpɑ nu se nu n wɑ̃ɑ. Sɑɑ yerɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Mɑ Esekiɛli u gɑri yi geruɑ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Sɑnɑm mɛ u gɑri yi mɔ̀, yerɑ u dɑmu gɑgu kɑ yĩiribu gɑbu nuɑ mɑ kuku ni, nu susinɑ.
Yerɑ u wɑ nu sĩinu kuɑ mɑ nu wɑsi kpɑrɑ, ɑdɑmɑ nu ǹ ginɑ hunde mɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ gɑri geruo ɑ hunde sɔ̃ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, hunde yu nɑ sɑɑ hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛn di kpɑ yu goo ni wom wure kpɑ nu se nu n wɑ̃ɑ.
Mɑ u gɑri geruɑ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Mɑ hunde yɑ nɑ ni sɔɔ, nu wɑ̃ɑru wɑ mɑ nu seewɑ nu yɔ̃rɑ. Nu dɑbi nge tɑbu kowobu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, kuku ni, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelibɑ. Wee bɑ mɔ̀, ben kukunu nu gberɑ. Ben yĩiyɔbu bu doonɑ mɑ bɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑ.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, ɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee kon be, nɛn tɔmbun sikɑ wukiɑ kpɑ n bu yɑrɑ min di n kɑ bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ.
Nɑ̀ n bu kuɑ mɛ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon bu nɛn Hunde dokeɑ kpɑ bu wɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ. Kon de bu wurɑ bu sinɑ ben temɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gɑri geruɑ nɑ mɑɑ yi kuɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ,
wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ dɑ̃ɑ kukuru gɑru suo kpɑ ɑ Yudɑbɑn bɑndun yĩsiru yore ten wɔllɔ. Kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ dɑ̃ɑ kukuru gɑru suɑ ɑ Isirelibɑn bɑndun yĩsiru yore ten wɔllɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ dɑ̃ɑ kukunu yiru ye swɛɛnɑ nu ko nge dɑ̃ɑ kuku teeru wunɛn nɔmɑ sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ tɔmbɑ koo nun bikiɑ bu nɛɛ, ɑ ǹ kɑɑ sun dɑ̃ɑ yen tubusiɑnu sɔ̃?
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ bu wisi ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon Isirelibɑn bɑndun dɑ̃ɑ kuku te suɑ kpɑ n tu swɛɛnɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn bɑndugiru nu ko dɑ̃ɑ kuku teeru nɛn nɔmɑɔ.
Dɑ̃ɑ kuku ni, nu ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ wunɛn nɔmɑɔ bɑ n wɑɑmɔ.
A mɑɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wee, kon Isirelibɑ mɛnnɑmɑ beri berikɑn di mi bɑ yɑrinɛ bwesenu sɔɔ, kpɑ n de bu wurɑmɑ ben temɔ.
Bɑ koo ko bwese teeru sere kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ guunɔ kpɑ bɑ n sunɔ turo mɔ. Bɑ ǹ ko n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ bwesenu yiru. Bɑ ǹ ko n mɑɑ sinɑmbu yiru mɔ.
Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tii disi dokemɔ ben bũu sɑ̃ɑnun sɔ̃ kɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃. Kon bu yɑrɑmɑwɑ mi bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑ kɑ torɑ kpuron di. Kon bu dɛɛrɑsiɑwɑ mɑm mɑm. Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbu kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Dɑfidi nɛn sɔm kowon bibun bweseru sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo sunɔ wɑ. Kpɑro turowɑ bɑ ko n mɔ. Bɑ koo nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ kpɑ bu kɑ ye sɔmburu ko.
Bɑ koo wure bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ mɛ nɑ nɛn sɔm kowo Yɑkɔbu wɛ̃. Miyɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ sinɑ. Ben tii bɑ koo mɑɑ sinɑ mi sere kɑ ben bibun bibɔ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Dɑfidin bibun bweserɑ tɑ ko n bɑndu dii mi sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Kon kɑ bu ɑrukɑwɑni bɔri yɛndugiɑ bɔke ye yɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Kon de bu sinɑ tem mi, kpɑ bu dɑbiɑ. Kpɑ n nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru girɑ ben suunu sɔɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Nɛn wɑ̃ɑ yeru tɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ ben suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn tɔmbu kpɑ nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ben Yinni.
Nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru tɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ, sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bwesenu nu koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wi u Isirelibɑ gɔsɑ nɛnɛm.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ,
tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio Gɔgun berɑ giɑ Mɑgɔgun temɔ wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ Mɛsɛki kɑ Tubɑlin kpɑro kpɑ ɑ nùn gerusi ɑ nɛɛ,
wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon Gɔgu wɔrimɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ Mɛsɛki kɑ Tubɑlin kpɑro.
Kon nùn gɔsiɑmɑ kpɑ n kɔkɔnu doke win bɑɑ sɑburosɔ, kpɑ n nùn gɑwɑmɑ, wi kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kɑ dumi kɑ mɑɑsɔbu, kpɑ win tɔn dɑbi te, tɑ n tɑbu yɑ̃nu sebuɑ tɑ n tɛrɛ bɑkɑnu kɑ piiminu nɛni kpɑ tɑ n tɑkobibɑ fĩɑmɔ.
Pɛɛsibɑ kɑ Etiopigibu kɑ Putigibu be kpuro bɑ tɛrɛnu kɑ sii furɔ kɔkɔnu doke, be kpurowɑ bɑ koo kɑ nùn dɑ.
Gomɛɛn tɑbu kowobu kɑ Bɛti Togɑɑmɑgii be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geun sɔɔ sɔɔ giɑ, be kɑ ben tɑbu kowobu kpuro kɑ sere bwese dɑbi dɑbinun tɔmbu, be kpurowɑ bɑ koo nùn swĩi.
U gesi win sɔɔru koowo wi kɑ tɔn be bɑ koo nùn swĩi kpɑ u n sɔɔru kpeere. Wiyɑ u koo bu kpɑrɑ.
Amɛn biru kon de u ko ben wirugii, kpɑ u Isirelibɑ wɔri be bɑ kisirɑ tɑbun di. N deemɑ bɑ rɑɑ yɑrinɛwɑ tem tukumɔ mɑ bɑ seemɑ tem kpuron di mi bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ wurɑmɑ bɑ mɛnnɑ Isirelibɑn guunɔ ni bɑ rɑɑ deri n tɛ. Mɑ bɑ sinɑ mi kɑ bɔri yɛndu.
Adɑmɑ wi kɑ win tɔn be bɑ nùn swĩi bɑ koo tem mɛ wukiriwɑ nge woo bɔkɔ ǹ kun mɛ nge guru wiru.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, sɑɑ ye, yɑ̀ n tunumɑ, bwisiku kɔ̃sunu koo nùn deemɑ kpɑ u kɔ̃sɑ himbɑ ko.
U koo gɔ̃ru doke u nɛɛ, u koo tem gɑm tɔmbu wɔri be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, bèn wusu su ǹ gbɑ̃rɑnu kɑ gɑmbobɑ mɔ.
U koo dɑ u tɔmbu wɔri be bɑ ben wuun bɑnsu seeyɑ kpɑ u ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ. Tɔn be, bɑ wurɑmɑwɑ sɑɑ tɔn tukobun suunu sɔɔn di. Bɑ dukiɑ kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenu wɑ. Mɑ ben tem mu wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑn suunu sɔɔ.
Sɑbɑn tɔmbu kɑ Dedɑnigibu kɑ Tɑɑsisin tenkubɑ kɑ sere be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ turuku mi, bɑ koo nùn bikiɑ bu nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ u tɔn dɑbi teni mɛnnɑ. U kĩwɑ u tɔmbu wɔri u ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ? U kĩwɑ u tɔmbun sii geesu kɑ ben wurɑ gurɑ? U kĩwɑ u ben yɑɑ sɑbenu ǹ kun mɛ ben dukiɑ bɑkɑ gurɑ?
Wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ Gɔgu sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, dɔmɑ te nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ bɑ koo sinɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, u ko n yɛ̃.
Sɑɑ ye, u koo nɑ sɑɑ win wɑ̃ɑ yerun di sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geuɔ wi kɑ bwese dɑbi dɑbinun tɑbu kowobu be kpuro bɑ n yɔɔwɑ dumin wɔllɔ.
Yen biru u koo sewɑ u nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ seesi kpɑ win tɑbu kowo be, bu Isirelibɑ wukiri nge mɛ guru wiru tɑ rɑ tem wukiri. Amɛn biru kon de u nɑ u nɛn tem wɔri kpɑ n bwese ni nu tie sɔ̃ɔsi sɑɑ wi, Gɔgun min di mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ dɛɛro.
Amɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, Gɔgu wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ wìn gɑri nɑ derɑ nɛn sɔmɔbu bɑ geruɑ gɑsɔn di Isireliɔ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon de u nɛn tɔmbu wɔri.
Tɔ̃ɔ tè sɔɔ Gɔgu u koo Isirelibɑn tem wɔri, nɛ Yinni Gusunɔ kon wɛ̃ru wurɑ kɑ mɔru.
Nɛnɑ nɑ mɑɑ yeni geruɑ kɑ nisinu kɑ mɔru bɑkɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, tɔ̃ɔ te, tem mu koo yĩiri too too Isireliɔ.
Swɛ̃ɛ kɑ gunɔsu koo diiri bɛrum sɔ̃ nɛn wuswɑɑɔ kɑ sere gbeeku yɛɛ kɑ yɛɛ yi yi rɑ kɑbiri kɑ tɔmbu kpuro. Guunu nu koo wɔruku kpɑ kpenu nu kɑnkirɑ kpɑ gbɑ̃rɑnu kpuro nu wɔruku.
Kon de tɑbu bu nùn wɔri nɛn guunu kpuron wɔllɔ. Bɑɑwure u koo win winsim tɑbu wɔriwɑ.
Kon Gɔgu wi siri n nùn bɑrɑru kpɛ̃ɛ kpɑ n de bu nùn go bu yɛm yɑri. Kon de guru bɑkɑ yu nɛ kɑ kpenu kpɑ dɔ̃ɔ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ bisu yu wi kɑ win tɑbu kowobu wɔri kɑ sere tɔn dɑbi te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi.
Nge mɛyɑ kon kɑ bwese dɑbinu sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ nɑ kpɑ̃ nɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ dɛɛro kpɑ nu giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ Gɔgu gerusio ɑ nɛɛ, ɑmɛniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, nɛ wee nɑ Gɔgu seesi wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ Mɛsɛki kɑ Tubɑlin kpɑro.
Kon nùn yɑrɑ win tem di mɛ mu wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geun sɔɔ sɔɔwɔ. Kpɑ n de u Isirelibɑ wɔri.
Adɑmɑ kon win tɛndu wɔrɑ win nɔm dwɑrun di kpɑ n win sɛ̃ɛnu mwɛɛri win nɔm geun di.
U koo wɔrumɑ Isirelibɑn guunu wɔllɔ wi, kɑ win tɑbu kowobu kɑ tɔn be bɑ nùn swĩimɑ. Kpɑ gunɔsu kɑ gbeeku yɛɛ yi ben yɑɑ di.
U koo wɔrumɑwɑ temɔ nge mɛ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ.
Kon Mɑgɔgu ye dɔ̃ɔ doke kɑ sere be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ tem burerɔ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Kon de bu nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑru giɑ Isirelibɑn suunu sɔɔ. Nɑ ǹ derimɔ bu tu sɑnku. Sɑɑ yerɑ bwesenu kpuro nu koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinni Dɛɛro.
Wee ye kpuro yɑ koorɑmɔ yɑ wee. Yɑ koo koorɑwɑ tɔ̃ɔ te nɛn tii nɑ yi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, Isirelibɑ bɑ koo yɑri ben wusun di, kpɑ bu ben yibɛrɛbɑn tɛrɛ bɑkɑnu kɑ piiminu mwɛɛri kɑ ben tɛmɑ kɑ sɛ̃ɛnu kɑ ben yɑɑsi kɑ ben bɔri kpɑ bu kɑ ye kpuro dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃re wɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑ̃ɑ kɑso dɔɔ yɑkɑsɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑ̃ɑ burɑmɔ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ bu kɑ doo ko. Domi tɑbu yɑ̃ɑ niyɑ bɑ koo kɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃re. Bɑ koo ben yibɛrɛbɑ mwɛɛri be, be bɑ rɑɑ bu mwɛɛrɑ. Bɑ koo tɔmbun yɑ̃nu gurɑ be bɑ rɑɑ ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ. Nɛ Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, Isireliɔ kon Gɔgu siku yeru wɛ̃ nim wɔ̃ku bɔruguun sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, mi tɔmbɑ rɑ sɑre. Kpɑ tu berɑ min swɑɑ go. Miyɑ bɑ koo Gɔgu kɑ win tɔn dɑbi te sike, kpɑ bu yɑm mi soku Gɔgun tɔn dɑbinun wɔwɑ.
Isirelibɑrɑ bɑ koo bu sike kpɑ bu wɑ bu kɑ ben tem dɛɛrɑsiɑ. Bɑ koo ye kowɑ suru nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Isirelibɑ kpurowɑ bɑ koo goo ni sike. Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, bɑ koo mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ bu mɔm. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Suru nɔɔbɑ yiru yen bɑɑ sɔɔ, bɑ koo tɔmbu gɔsi be bɑ ko n sirenɛ bɑ n goo ni nu tie kɑsu bɑ n sikumɔ. Be bɑ sɑrɔ mi kpuro, bɑ koo bu somi. Mɛyɑ bɑ koo kɑ tem mɛ kpuro dɛɛrɑsiɑ.
Tɔn be bɑ bɔsu tem mɛ sɔɔ, bɑ̀ n tɔn kukunu wɑ, kpɑ bu yĩreru ko mi. Be bɑ siku ten sɔmburu mɔ̀ bɑ̀ n nɑ kpɑ bu kuku ni gurɑ bu sike Gɔgun tɔn dɑbi ten wɔwɑ mi.
Bɑ koo mɑm wuu gɑgu yĩsiru kɛ̃ Hɑmɔnɑ. Yĩsi ten tubusiɑnɑ dɑbiru. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ koo kɑ tem mɛ dɛɛrɑsiɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ gunɔ bwese bwesekɑ kɑ gbeeku yɛɛ kpuro sɔ̃ɔwɔ ɑ nɛɛ, yi mɛnnɑmɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuron di nɛn yɑ̃ku te kon kon sɔ̃. Kon yɑ̃ku bɑkɑru ko Isirelibɑn guunɔ kpɑ yi yɑɑ tem yi yɛm nɔ.
Yi koo tɑbu durɔbun gonu di kpɑ yi wirugibun yɛm nɔ be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge Bɑsɑnin yɑ̃ɑ kinɛnu kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpɛmminu kɑ bonu kɑ kɛtɛ kinɛ ni nu gum mɔ.
Yi koo yɑɑ gum di yi debu kpɑ yi yɛm nɔ sere mu yi go nge tɑm nɛn yɑ̃ku te kon yi kuɑ min sɔ̃.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, yi koo dumi kɑ yin mɑɑsɔbun yɑɑ di kɑ tɑbu durɔbu kɑ sere tɑbu kowobu be bɑ tie. Yi koo yɑɑ ye diwɑ yi debu nɛn dii yerɔ.
Kon bwesenu nɛn yiiko sɔ̃ɔsi kpɑ nu wɑ nge mɛ nɑ bu siri kɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ bi nɑ bu kuɑ.
Sɑɑ yen dɔmɑ ten di sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ, nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni.
Bwesenu nu koo giɑ mɑ Isirelibɑn torɑnun sɔ̃nɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bu biru kisi mɑ nɑ derɑ bɑ bu yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ. Nɑ bu ben yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ bɑ bu go tɑbu sɔɔ.
Nɑ bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nge mɛ ben torɑnu nu nɛ ni nu bu kuɑ disigibu. Mɑ nɑ bu nɛn wuswɑɑ beruɑ.
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, kon de Isirelibɑ be, Yɑkɔbun bweseru bu wurɑmɑ yorun di. Kon be kpuron wɔnwɔndu ko. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, kon nisinu se nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ ten sɔ̃.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ koo sinɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, goo kun mɑɑ bu bɑɑsimɔ bɑ koo ben sekuru duɑri kɑ ben nɑɑnɛ sɑri te bɑ mɑn kuɑ.
Tɔmbu bɑ koo mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ nɑ̀ n Isirelibɑ wunɑmɑ ben yibɛrɛbɑn suunu sɔɔn di nɑ kɑ wurɑmɑ.
Bɑ koo giɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ derɑ bɑ kɑ bu yoru dɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ, mɑ nɑ derɑ bɑ mɑɑ wurɑmɑ ben temɔ. Bɑɑ ben turo nɑ ǹ derimɔ u sinɑ tem tukumɔ.
Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu biru kisimɔ. Domi kon bu nɛn Hunde wɛ̃. Nɛ Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Ye bɑ Isirelibɑ yoru mwɑ yen wɔ̃ɔ yɛndɑ nɔɔbusen suru gbiikoon sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuruse sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm mu Esekiɛli nɛnuɑ. N deemɑ ye bɑ Yerusɑlɛmu wɔri bɑ kɔsukɑ yen wɔ̃ɔ wɔkurɑ nnɛse sɔɔrɑ mi. Mɑ u nùn kpɑrɑ u kɑ dɑ Isirelibɑn temɔ
kɑ̃siru sɔɔ. U nùn suɑ u yi guuru wɔllɔ te tɑ gunu too. Ten sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ, u diɑ wɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge wuu.
Mɑ u kɑ nùn dɑ mi giɑ. Mɑ u durɔ goo wɑ mi, u kɑ sii gɑndu weenɛ u wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii kɑ dɛkɑ nɛni ye bɑ rɑ kɑ yĩire. Mɑ u yɔ̃ gɑmbon bɔkuɔ kɔnnɔwɔ.
Durɔ wi, u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ mɛɛrio kpɑ ɑ swɑɑ dɑki ɑ de ɑ ye kpuro lɑɑkɑri ko ye kon nun sɔ̃ɔsi. Domi bɑ kɑ nun nɑwɑ mini ɑ kɑ mɛɛri kpɑ ɑ kɑ wɑ ɑ Isirelibɑ tubusiɑ ye ɑ wɑ.
Wee ye u wɑ. U gbɑ̃rɑru wɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sikerenɛ. U dɛkɑ wɑ durɔ win nɔmɑ sɔɔ. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu kɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ nɛ. Adɑmɑ yen gɔm soo ten bɑɑtere tɑ dɛ̃ɛbu sosiwɑ kɑ nɔm wĩi teeru. Yen yɑsum mɑɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ tiɑ. Yen gunum mɑɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ tiɑ.
Mɑ u dɑ kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ mɑ u yɔɔwɑ gen yɔɔtiɑɔ. Mɑ u kɔnnɔ gen yɑsum yĩirɑ. Mɑ mu kuɑ dɛkɑ tiɑ. Adɛrɔ gɑ wɑ̃ɑ dii ten suunu sɔɔ mɑ kɔ̃su yenu wɑ̃ɑ gen yɛ̃si yɛ̃sikɑɔ.
Kɔ̃su yee nin bɑɑteren dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ ten yɑsum mu nɛwɑ. Ye kpuro yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ dɛkɑ tiɑ. Bɑtumɑ ye yɑ nu kɑrɑnɛ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu. Gɑmbo ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ dii sɔɔn kɔnnɔwɔ ɑ sere sɑ̃ɑ yerun tii du, yen yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ dɛkɑ tiɑ.
Mɑ durɔ wi, u dii sɔɔ ge yĩirɑ. Gen gɑnɑn gunum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ dɛkɑ nɔɔbɑ itɑ. Mɑ gen gɑni tɔɔkii yi mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yiru kɔnnɔ gen sɔɔwɔ. Diru gɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten bɔkuɔ.
<range>
Kɔ̃su yerun dii ni kpuro ni nu wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ nu nɛwɑ. Diɑ itɑ itɑwɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ɑdɛrɔ gen beri berikɑɔ. Bɑtumɑ ye yɑ bu kɑrɑnɛ yɑ mɑɑ nɛwɑ.
Durɔ wi, u mɑɑ kɔnnɔ gen yɑsum yĩirɑ mɑ yɑ kuɑ gɔm soonu wɔkuru. Mɑ gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu kuɑ gɔm soonu wɔkurɑ itɑ.
Kɔ̃su yee nin bɑɑteren wuswɑɑɔ bɑ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ wĩɑ gɔm soo teeru. Kɔ̃su yee ten bɑɑteren goonu nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ tiɑ.
Durɔ wi, u yĩirɑ sɑɑ kɔ̃su yee teerun gɑnɑ sɔɔn di n kɑ girɑri yirusen gɑnɑ sɔɔ te tɑ gbiikii te mɛɛrɑ. Mɑ n kuɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
U mɑɑ dii sɔɔ ge yĩirɑ mɑ gɑ kuɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu. Dii ten berɑ giɑ, sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ yɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ ge sikerenɛwɑ.
Bɑtumɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ gèn min di bɑ rɑ kɑ du n kɑ dɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔɔwɔ, yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru.
Bɑ kɔ̃su yee nin fɛnɛntibɑ kuɑwɑ nge kɔkɔsɔ nin gɑni tɔɔkiiɔ kɑ mɑɑ gɑni yi yi nu burɑnɛ sɔɔ kɑ sere dii sɔɔ gen gɑni sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ dii nin gɑnin sɔɔwɔ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu koosi ye yɑ kuɑ yen burɑru.
Yen biru durɔ wi, u kɑ nùn dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑɔ mi diɑ tɛnɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ. N deemɑ bɑ gɑ̃ɑnu tɑ̃wɑ nge simɑɑ bɑ kɑ yɑɑrɑ ye sikerenɑ.
Simɑɑ ye bɑ tɑ̃wɑ mi, yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ diɑ yen bɔkuɔ. Mɑ yɑ kɑ diɑ yen gɑni dɛ̃ɛbu nɛ. Adɑmɑ yɑ ǹ yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑ gunum turɑ.
Mɑ u bɑtumɑ yen dɛ̃ɛbu yĩirɑ sɑɑ kɔnnɔ gbiikuun sɔɔn di n kɑ girɑri yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑn gɑnɑɔ mɑ n kuɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu (100). U ye yĩirɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ.
Mɑ u mɑɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yɑsum yĩirɑ.
Kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ kɔ̃su yenu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ mɔ, itɑ itɑ gen ɑdɛrɔn yɛ̃si yɛ̃sikɑɔ. Gen gɑni yi, kɑ gen dii sɔɔ yɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yɑsum nɛwɑ.
Yen fɛnɛntibɑ kɑ dii sɔɔ ge, kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun burɑ ni bɑ kuɑ mi, ye kpuro yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tiɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru mi. A kɑ dɑ yen kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, kɑɑ yɔɔtiɑ yɔwɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geun kɔnnɔn dee deeru, kɔnnɔ gɑgɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔɔwɔ gèn min di bɑ rɑ kɑ du yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑɔ. Kɔnnɔsu yiru yen bɑɑ sɔɔ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu nge mɛ n sɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ.
Mɑ u kɑ mɑn dɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mi kɔnnɔ gɑgɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Mɑ u gen kɔ̃su yenu kɑ gen dii sɔɔ kɑ gen gɑni yĩirɑ. Ye kpuro yɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ siɔnɔgiɑ nɛwɑ.
Kɔnnɔ ge, kɑ gen diɑ yɑ fɛnɛntibɑ mɔ yɑ kɑ sikerenɛ nge fɛnɛnti beɔnɔ. Gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru. Gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
Gen yɔɔtiɑ yɑ mɔwɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu nɔɔbɑ yiru ɑ kɑ dɑ dii sɔɔ gen mi. Bɑ dii ten gɑni sɔɔkii burɑru kuɑwɑ kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu.
Yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑ yɑ mɑɑ kɔnnɔ mɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Kɔnnɔsu yiru ye, yɑ tondinɛwɑ kɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru.
Durɔ wi, u kɑ mɑɑ mɑn dɑ yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑ yen mi, sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑn kɔnnɔn di. Mɑ u kɔnnɔ ge yĩirɑ u deemɑ yɑ nɛwɑ kɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn kɔnnɔsu.
Gen kɔ̃su yenu kɑ gen gɑni kɑ gen dii sɔɔ, ye kpuro yɑ nɛwɑ kɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn kɔnnɔsu. Kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ fɛnɛntibɑ mɔ bɑ kɑ sikerenɛ. Gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru. Mɑ gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
Kɔnnɔ gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru. Gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
Dii sɔɔ gen kɔnnɔ gɑ mɛɛrɑwɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑɔ. Bɑ gen gɑni sɔɔkii burɑru koosiwɑ kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu. Gen yɔɔtiɑ ye, yɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu mɔwɑ nɔɔbɑ itɑ.
Yen biru, u mɑɑ kɑ mɑn dɑ yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑ yen mi, sɑɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn di. Mɑ u kɔnnɔ ge yĩirɑ u deemɑ gɑ kɑ si u rɑɑ yĩirɑ mi nɛwɑ.
Gen dii sɔɔ kɑ gen gɑni kɑ gen kɔ̃su yenu, ye kpuro yɑ nɛwɑ kɑ kɔnnɔ si u rɑɑ yĩirɑ. Yen biru gɑ fɛnɛntibɑ mɔ yɑ kɑ sikerenɛ. Kɔnnɔ gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru. Gen yɑsum mɑɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
Gen dii sɔɔ gɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑ mɛɛrɑwɑ. Mɑ bɑ gen gɑni sɔɔkii burɑru koosi kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu. Mɑ gen yɔɔtiɑ yɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu mɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑ.
U kɑ mɑɑ mɑn dɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ. Mɑ u gu yĩirɑ. U deemɑ kɔnnɔ ge, kɑ si u rɑɑ yĩirɑ mi, su dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yɑsum nɛwɑ.
Kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ mɑɑ kɔ̃su yenu mɔ kɑ gɑni yi yi nu burɑnɛ kɑ sere dii sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ fɛnɛntibɑ kuɑ bɑ kɑ gu sikerenɑ. Gen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru, mɑ gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu.
Dii sɔɔ ge, gɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑ mɛɛrɑwɑ. Mɑ bɑ gen gɑni sɔɔkii burɑru koosi kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu. Gen yɔɔtiɑn nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔɔbɑ itɑ.
Kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ gɑ diru gɑru mɔ te tɑ mɛɛrɑ gen dii sɔɔ giɑ. Miyɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginun yɑɑ kpɑkie.
Dii sɔɔ gen beri berikɑɔ tɔɔwɔ, tɑbulu yiru yiruwɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Tɑbulu ben wɔllɔwɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kɑ torɑnun yɑ̃kunu kɑ yɑ̃ku ni bɑ rɑ kɑ torɑnu sɔmɛn yɑɑ sɑke.
Dii sɔɔ gen tɔɔwɔ, tɑbulu nnɛwɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ. À n dɔɔ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, kɑɑ kpĩ ɑ ye wɑ berɑ kɑ berɑ yiru yiru.
Tɑbulu nɔɔbɑ itɑwɑ bɑ mɔ yèn wɔllɔ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku yɑɑ go. Bɑ ye yiwɑ nnɛ nnɛ kɔnnɔ gen beri berikɑɔ.
Tɑbulu yen nnɛ sɔɔrɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu sɔɔru ko. Bɑ ye kuɑ kɑ kpee ni bɑ dɑ̃kɑ. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soo teeru kɑ bɔnu, yen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soo teeru kɑ bɔnu, mɑ yen gunum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soo teeru. Tɑbulu yen miyɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku sɔm yɑ̃nu yi.
Mɑ bɑ tɑbulu ye nɔɔ bɔki kuɑ nɔm tɑrɑrun yɑsum sɑkɑ. Tɑbulu yen wɔllɔwɑ bɑ rɑ yɑ̃ku yɑɑ sɔndi.
Yen biruwɑ durɔ wi, u kɑ mɑn dɑ yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑɔ. Mɑ nɑ diɑ yiru wɑ mi. Teerɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ mɑ tɑ nɔɔ tĩi sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Teerɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mɑ ten kɔnnɔ gɑ mɑɑ tĩi sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ.
U mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, dii tèn kɔnnɔ gɑ tĩi sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mi, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑ̃ku kowobun diru be bɑ rɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔmburu ko.
Dii tèn kɔnnɔ gɑ mɑɑ tĩi sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ mi, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑ̃ku kowobugiru be bɑ rɑ yɑ̃kuru ko yɑ̃ku yerɔ. Mɑ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Lefin bweseru sɔɔ, Sɑdɔkun bwese kɛrɑ yɑ koo kpĩ yu du sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ yu Yinni Gusunɔ sɑ̃.
Durɔ wi, u sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑ kpuro yĩirɑ mɑ u deemɑ yen goonu kpuro nu nɛwɑ. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu (100) mɑ yen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu. Mɑ yɑ̃ku yerɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔwɔ.
Mɑ u mɑɑ kɑ mɑn dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten ɑdɛrɔwɔ mìn di bɑ rɑ kɑ du. Mɑ u ɑdɛrɔ gen gberebɑ yĩirɑ. Mɑ yen bɑɑyeren bɔɔrum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu. Kɔnnɔ gen yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wɔkurɑ nnɛ. Gen yɛ̃sɑ bɑɑyeren dɑ̃ɑ yɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu itɑ.
Adɛrɔ gen tiin dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu. Mɑ gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu wɔkurɑ tiɑ. Bɑ rɑ gu duwɑ kɑ yɔɔtiɑ ye yɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑnu wɔkuru mɔ. Mɑ gɑ gbere mɔ berɑ kɑ berɑ tiɑ tiɑ.
Durɔ wi, u kɑ mɑɑ mɑn dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ u ye kpuro yĩirɑ. Adɛrɔ gen gɑnin sinum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ.
Kɔnnɔ gen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wɔkuru, gen beri berikɑ nɔɔbu nɔɔbu. Mɑ u sɑ̃ɑ yee ten tii yĩirɑ. Ten dɛ̃ɛbu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weeru. Mɑ ten yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu.
Yen biru u duɑ dii ten sɔɔwɔ u ten kɔnnɔn dɑ̃ɑ yĩirɑ, yɑ kuɑwɑ gɔm soonu yiru. Mɑ kɔnnɔ gen tiin yɑsum sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ. Mɑ gen gɑnin yɑsum beri berikɑɔ mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ yiru yiru.
Mɑ u dii sɔɔ gen tii yĩirɑ, gen dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ gen yɑsum mu nɛwɑ. Yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu. Mɑ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, gɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem.
Sɑ̃ɑ yee te, tɑ gɑni yiru mɔ, tiɑ sɔɔwɔ, tiɑ mɑɑ tɔɔwɔ. Mɑ durɔ wi, u ten gɑnɑ sɔɔkɑɑ yĩirɑ mɑ yen sinum mu kuɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ. Mɑ bɑ dinu gɔri gɔri gɑni yiru yen bɑɑ sɔɔ bɑ kɑ sikerenɑ.
Dii ni, nu swɛɛnɛwɑ gidɑmbisɑ itɑ itɑ beri berikɑ. Gidɑmbisɑ bɑɑyeren diɑn geerɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɛnɑ. Dii nin gɑni yi kɑ tɔɔkɑɑginu mɑninɛ ɑdɑmɑ yi ǹ kɑ sɔɔkɑɑginu mɑninɛ.
Gidɑmbisɑ ye, yɑ yɑsum kerɑnɛ wɔllu giɑ. Domi yen gɑnɑ tɔɔkɑɑ yɑ sinum kɑɑrɑ. Mɛyɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yɑ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sikerenɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ wɔllu giɑ bɑtumɑ yɑ kpɑ̃ɑru bo yen sɔɔwɔ. Sɑɑ gidɑmbisɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ temɔn di, tɔnu koo kpĩ u yɔ u dɑ sere ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllɔ u kun kpɑ kɑ swɑɑ gɑɑ.
Mɑ nɑ diɑ ye kpuron gunum mɛɛrɑ nɑ deemɑ ye bɑ gɔri gɔri mi, sɑɑ yen kpɛɛkpɛɛkun di, yen gunum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ dɛkɑ nɔɔbɑ tiɑ tiɑ.
Diɑ yen gɑnɑ tɔɔkɑɑn sinum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu. Diɑ ye bɑ gɔri gɔri sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɛ̃si yɛ̃sikɑɔ,
kɑ yɑ̃ku kowobun diɑn bɑɑ sɔɔ, bɑ bɑtumɑ deri yèn yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu.
Diɑ ye bɑ gɔri gɔri mi, yɑ nɔɔ tĩiwɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ derin berɑ giɑ. Kɔnnɔsu yiruwɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Teu sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, teu mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ. Gɑnɑ ye yɑ bɑtumɑ ye sikerenɛ, yen sinum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu.
Sɑ̃ɑ yee ten sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ, diru gɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri mi nɔɔ tĩi. Dii ten dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wɛnɛ kɑ wɔkuru. Mɑ ten yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu wɑtɑ kɑ wɔkuru. Ten gɑnɑn sinum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu nɔɔbu.
Durɔ wi, u sɑ̃ɑ yee te yĩirɑ mɑ ten dɛ̃ɛbu kuɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu (100). Bɑtumɑ ye bɑ mɑɑ deri mi, kɑ dii te bɑ bɑnɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ mi, ye kpuro yɑ mɑɑ kuɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu.
Sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, sɑ̃ɑ yee ten dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri min yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu.
Mɑ u mɑɑ dii te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun biruɔ yĩirɑ kɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri mɑ ye kpuro yɑ mɑɑ kuɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu. Sɑ̃ɑ yee ten duu yeru kɑ dii dɛɛrɑru kɑ dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem mi,
bɑ ye kpuron gɑni kɑ fɛnɛntibɑn kɑdiribɑ dɑ̃ɑ bɛsi mɑniwɑ. Mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ kuɑ gidɑmbisɑ yebɑ sɔɔ.
Sɑ̃ɑ yee ten tɔɔwɔ kɑ ten sɔɔwɔ sɑɑ ten kɔnnɔn di sere kɑ dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem mi, bɑ ye kpuron gɑni burɑru koosiwɑ
kɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsibu kɑ mɑɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu. Kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsii si, kɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsii be, bɑ yɔwenɛwɑ.
Wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsii ben bɑɑwure u wuswɑɑ mɔwɑ yiru. Wuswɛɛ yin tiɑ yɑ kɑ tɔnugiɑ weenɛ yɑ kpɑkpɑ wuru sin weenɑsi teu wuswɑɑ kisi. Wuswɑɑ tiɑ yɑ mɑɑ kɑ gbee sunɔgiɑ weenɛ mɑ yɑ mɑɑ kpɑkpɑ wuru sin weenɑsi teu wuswɑɑ kisi. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ dii te kpuron gɑni burɑru kuɑ.
Bɑ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsii be kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsii si kuɑwɑ ten temɔ kɑ ten gɑniɔ kɑ ten kɔnnɔsun wɔllɔ.
Sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔn kɑdirin dɑ̃nu nu nɛwɑ. Dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem wuswɑɑɔ, gɑ̃ɑnu wɑ̃ɑ mi.
Nu sɑ̃ɑre nge yɑ̃ku yeru te bɑ kuɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ. Ten gunum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu itɑ. Ten dɛ̃ɛbu mɑɑ gɔm soonu yiru. Bɑ tu nɔɔ bɔkɑ kuɑwɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑ. Yerɑ durɔ wi, u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɑbulu ye bɑ rɑ n yii Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ yerɑ mi.
Dii dɛɛrɑru kɑ dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem nu mɔwɑ kɔnnɔsu yiru.
Gɑmbo sikɑnɛ yiruwɑ kɔnnɔ si, su mɔ. Ye kpuro yɑ rɑ n kɛniɑrewɑ.
Bɑ gɑmbo yen wɔllɔ wɔllun kɔ̃sobun weenɑsibu kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu kuɑ nge mɛ bɑ kuɑ gɑni yi sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ kɔbɛ kuɑ ten tɔɔwɔ dii dɛɛrɑ ten kɔnnɔwɔ.
Dii ten yɛ̃si yɛ̃sikɑɔ kɑ sere dii ni bɑ gɔri gɔri mi kɑ mɑɑ yen kɔbɛɔ, bɑ yen fɛnɛntibɑ kɔkɔrɔ dokeɑwɑ kɑ kpɑkpɑ wurusun weenɑsisu.
Durɔ wi, u kɑ mɑn dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ, sere diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri kɑ dii te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten biruɔn deedeeru.
Diɑ yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu (100) mɑ yen yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru.
Yen bee tiɑ yɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri mi nɔɔ kisi. Bɑtumɑ yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu yɛndu. Mɑ yɑ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sikerenɛ. Bee tiɑ, diɑ ye, yɑ mɑɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑ ye bɑ simɑɑ doke nɔɔ kisi. Yɑ gidɑmbisɑ itɑ mɔ. Mɑ bɑ ye kɔbɛ kuɑ kuɑ.
Diɑ yen wuswɑɑɔ, bɑ bɑtumɑ deri gɔm soonu wɔkurun sɑkɑ. Mɑ bɑ swɑɑ wĩɑ ye sɔɔ gɔm soo teeru. Diɑ yen kɔnnɔsu su nɔɔ tĩiwɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ.
Diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllɔ yɑ piiminu bo yɑ kere ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ temɔ kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ suunu sɔɔ. Domi kɔbɛ ye bɑ kuɑ mi, yɑ yen sukum kɑwɑwɑ.
Adɑmɑ yen kɔbɛ yɑ ǹ gberebɑ mɔ nge yɑɑrɑ yen dinun gberebɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllɔ yɑ ǹ suunukinu kɑ temkinu kpɑ̃ɑru turɑ.
Diɑ yen gɑnɑ ye yɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑ mɛɛrɑ, yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru.
Domi diɑ yen tiin dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu yɛndɑ nɔɔbu. Adɑmɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten berɑ giɑ, yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu wunɔbu (100).
Bɑ̀ n wee sɑɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn di, kɔnnɔ gɑgɑ wɑ̃ɑ diɑ yen temɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ gèn min di bɑ rɑ kɑ du.
Kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn gɑnɑ yɑ toruɑ. Diɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ bɑtumɑ ye bɑ deri kɑ dii te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten biruɔn deedeeru.
Diɑ yen wuswɑɑɔ, swɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Diɑ ye, yɑ kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ weenɛ. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yen yɑsum kɑ nge mɛ bɑ ye bɑnisinɑ kɑ yen kɔnnɔsu ye kpuro yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tiɑ.
Nge mɛyɑ diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑn kɔnnɔsu su sɑ̃ɑ. Kɔnnɔ gɑgɑ wɑ̃ɑ swɑɑ yen duu yerɔ, yɑɑrɑ tɔɔkɑɑn gɑnɑɔ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ. Min diyɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ du.
Durɔ wi, u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, diɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ mi, kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mi, yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃. Miyɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be bɑ rɑ du Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ ko n dɑ yɑ̃ku dĩɑ ni di. Diɑ ye, yɑ dɛɛrewɑ. Miyɑ bɑ koo mɑɑ kɛ̃nu yi kɑ yɑ̃ku yɑɑ ye bɑ kɑ torɑnun yɑ̃kunu kuɑ kɑ ni bɑ kɑ torɑnu sɔnwɑ.
Yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ̀ n duɑ mi, bɑ ǹ yɑriɔ tɔɔwɔ kɑ ben yɑ̃nu. Bɑ koo ginɑ nu potiriwɑ. Domi yɑ̃ɑ ni, nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃nu. Ben tiin yɑ̃nɑ bɑ ko n dɑ doke bu kɑ dɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑɔ mi tɔn be bɑ tie bɑ yɔ̃.
Sɑnɑm mɛ durɔ wi, u dii ten sɔɔwɔ yĩirɑ u kpɑ, yerɑ u derɑ nɑ yɑrɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn kɔnnɔ. Mɑ u bɑtumɑ ye yɑ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sikerenɛ yĩirubu wɔri.
Yerɑ u sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn berɑ yĩirɑ kɑ win dɛkɑ mɑ yɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ yen nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu (500).
Mɑ u mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ yĩirɑ. Mɑ yɑ mɑɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ yen nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu.
U mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ yĩirɑ mɑ yɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ yen nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu.
U mɑɑ yĩirɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yeru giɑ mɑ mi giɑn tii mɑɑ kuɑ dɛkɑ nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu.
Nge mɛyɑ u gɑnɑ yen goonu nnɛ kpuro yĩirɑ u kɑ sikerenɑ. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yen yɑsum mu nɛwɑ. Yen bɑɑyere dɛkɑ nɛɛrɑ wunɔbu. Gɑnɑ ye, yɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te wunɑ nɛnɛm Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃.
Durɔ wi, u kɑ Esekiɛli dɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ.
Yerɑ Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinnin yiiko yɑ nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn di. Mɑ win nɔɔ gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ nge nim bɑkɑm. Mɑ tem mu win yiikon girimɑ yibɑ.
Kɑ̃si te u wɑ mi, tɑ kɑ te u wɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Gusunɔ u kĩ u Yerusɑlɛmu kɑm koosiɑgiru weenɛwɑ. Mɛyɑ tɑ mɑɑ kɑ kɑ̃si ni u wɑ Kebɑrin dɑɑrun bɔkuɔginu weenɛ. Mɑ u yiirɑ u wuswɑɑ tem girɑri.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ ye, yɑ duɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sɔɔ sɑɑ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑn di.
Yerɑ Hunde nùn suɑ sɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑn di yɑ kɑ nùn dɑ sɔɔwɔ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ yɑ dii te yibumɔ.
Yerɑ u nuɑ goo u kɑ nùn gɑri mɔ̀ sɑɑ dii ten min di. Mɑ durɔ wi u kɑ nùn wɑ̃ɑ mi, u yɔ̃ win bɔkuɔ.
Mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, yɑm miniwɑ nɛn sinɑ kitɑru. Miyɑ kon nɛn nɑɑsu sɔndi. Kon kɑ Isirelibɑ sinɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Be kɑ ben sinɑmbu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ te sɑnkumɔ bɑ n bũnu gɑsirimɔ kɑ sere sinɑmbun gonu ni bɑ sikuɑ gungunu wɔllɔ mi bɑ rɑ yɑ̃kuru ko.
Domi ben sinɑm be, bɑ ben sinɑ kpɑɑrun kɔnnɔsu bɑkunɑsiɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔnnɔsun bɔkuɔ. Gɑnɑ tiɑ tɔnɑ yɑ nu kɑrɑnɛ. Mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ nɛn yĩsi dɛɛrɑ te disi doke kɑ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ kuɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bu wɔri kɑ nɛn mɔru bɑkɑ.
Tɛ̃ ben bũu gɑsiribu bu koo nɔru ko kpɑ bu ben sinɑmbun goo nin gɑri duɑri. Kpɑ nɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Wunɛ tɔnun bii, ɑ Isirelibɑ dii ten kpunɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsio kpɑ bu sekuru wɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃, kpɑ bu wɑ bu yen kpunɑɑ yen ɑsɑnsi mɛɛri.
Sekuru tɑ̀ n bu mwɑ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ tubɑ ye bɑ kuɑ, ɑ bu dii ten kpunɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsio nge mɛ bɑ koo tu bɑnisinɑ, ten dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ ten yɑsum kɑ ten kɔnnɔsu kɑ ten gɑnɑn burɑru kɑ ten woodɑbɑ, ɑ ye kpuro yoruo ben nɔni biru. Bɑ koo woodɑ ye kpuro swĩiwɑ ten bɑnɑ sɔɔ. Yeni yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ ten bɑnɑn woodɑ.
Guuru wɔllɔ bɑtumɑ ye yɑ kɑ bu sikerenɛ, bɑ koo ye gɑrisiwɑ dɛɛrɑ. Yeniwɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ dii ten woodɑ.
Durɔ wi, u yɑ̃ku yeru yĩirɑ kɑ yĩirutiɑ ye yɑ kɑ gɔm soo teeru kɑ nɔm wĩi teeru nɛ. Wɔru ge gɑ kɑ yɑ̃ku yee te sikerenɛ gen yɑsum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩirutiɑ tiɑ. Mɑ yen dukum mu sɑ̃ɑ yĩirutiɑ tiɑ. Mɑ yen nɔɔ bɔkɑn biruɔ, yɑ sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soorun bɔnu.
Sɑɑ wɔru gen tem di n kɑ girɑri sɑ̃ɑ yee ten temɔ yɑ kuɑ yĩirutii yiru. Mɑ yen yɑsum mu mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yĩirutiɑ tiɑ. Sɑɑ yɑ̃ku yee ten bɔkɑ piibun di n kɑ girɑri ten bɔkɑ bɑkɑɔ, yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩirutii nnɛ. Mɑ yen yɑsum mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yĩirutiɑ tiɑ.
Yɑ̃ku yee ten wɔllɔ mi bɑ rɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃re, ten gunum mu sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩirutii nnɛ, mɑ bɑ kɑ̃ɑnu nnɛ kuɑ bɑ girɑ tiɑ tiɑ ten goonun yinnɑ yenɔ.
Yɑ̃ku yee ten goonu nnɛ kpuro nu nɛwɑ. Nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ yĩirutii wɔkurɑ yiru yiru.
Ten bɔkɑ yirusen goonu nnɛ kpuro nu nɛwɑ. Ni kpuro nu mɔwɑ yĩirutii wɔkurɑ nnɛ nnɛ. Mɑ bɑ wɔru kuɑ ye sɔɔ bɑ kɑ ye sikerenɑ yĩirutiɑ tiɑn yɑsum sɑkɑ. Bɔkɑ yen nɔɔ bɔkɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soorun bɔnu. Mɑ yen yɔɔtii yi mɛɛrɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ.
Durɔ wi, u mɑɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑmɛniwɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, dɔmɑ te bɑ yɑ̃ku yee te bɑnɑ bɑ kpɑ, mɑ bɑ kĩ bu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu ko kpɑ bu yɛm yɛ̃kɑ, woodɑ ye bɑ koo swĩi wee.
Lefibɑ sɔɔ, Sɑdɔkun bweseru sɔɔrɑ kɑɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu wunɑ bɑ n dɑ nùn yɑ̃kuru kue kpɑ ɑ bu nɑɑ kinɛ kpɛndu wɛ̃ torɑrun yɑ̃kurun sɔ̃.
Kpɑ ɑ ten yɛm suɑ ɑ yɛ̃kɑ yɑ̃ku yee ten kɑ̃ɑnu nnɛ ye sɔɔ kɑ ten goonu nnɛ ye sɔɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ yen bɔkɑ yiruse ye sɔɔ ɑ kɑ sikerenɑ. Nge mɛyɑ kɑɑ kɑ yɑ̃ku yee te disi wɔkɑ kpɑ ɑ tu sɑ̃rɑsiɑ.
Kpɑ ɑ nɑɑ kinɛ ten yɑɑ suɑ ɑ doke dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ sɔɔ ye bɑ sɔɔru kuɑ tɔɔwɔ.
Tɔ̃ru yiruse sɔɔ, kɑɑ kɑ boo kinɛru nɑwɑ te tɑ ǹ ɑlebu gɑɑ mɔ kpɑ ɑ kɑ tu yɑ̃kuru ko torɑrun sɔ̃. Nge mɛyɑ kɑɑ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee te sɑ̃rɑsiɑ nge mɛ ɑ rɑɑ kuɑ kɑ nɑɑ kinɛ te.
À n torɑrun yɑ̃ku te kuɑ ɑ kpɑ, kɑɑ mɑɑ nɑɑ kinɛru kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kinɛru suɑ ni nu kun ɑlebu gɑɑ mɔ.
Kpɑ ɑ kɑ nu dɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn mi ɑ kɑ yɑ̃kuru ko. Yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ koo nin yɑɑ bɔru yɛ̃kɑwɑ kpɑ bu kɑ nùn ye yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru kuɑ.
Sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yirun bɑɑ sɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere, kɑɑ n dɑ boo kinɛru kɑ nɑɑ kinɛru kɑ yɑ̃ɑ kinɛru gowɑ ɑ kɑ torɑrun yɑ̃kuru ko.
Nge mɛyɑ sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru yen bɑɑ sɔɔ bɑ koo kɑ yɑ̃ku yee te sɑ̃rɑsiɑ kpɑ tɑ n wɑ̃ɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃.
Sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru yen biru, sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑse, yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ koo kpĩ bu den tɔmbu yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kɑ siɑrɑbuginu kuɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn mi. Kpɑ u kɑ bɛɛ nɔnu geu mɛɛri. Wi, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Durɔ wi, u mɑɑ kɑ Esekiɛli dɑ tɔɔwɔ kɔnnɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ. N deemɑ kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ kɛnuɑwɑ.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, kɔnnɔ ge, gɑ ko n kɛnuɑwɑ bɑ ǹ gu kɛniɑmɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ sɑrɔ mi, domi nɛ, Gusunɔ Isirelibɑn Yinniwɑ nɑ duɑ min di. Yen sɔ̃, gɑ ko n kɛnuɑwɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛn kpɑro u koo kpĩ u sinɑ mi, u kɑ di nɛ Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ. Wiyɑ u koo mɑɑ kpĩ u du kɔnnɔ gen ɑdɛrɔn di kpɑ u yɑri min di.
Mɑ durɔ wi, u kɑ Esekiɛli dɑ kɔnnɔwɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten dee deeru. Ye Esekiɛli u mɛɛrɑ yerɑ u wɑ wee Yinni Gusunɔn yiikon girimɑ yɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yee te yibɑ. Mɑ u yiirɑ u wiru ten girɑri.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔnun bii, ɑ wunɛn lɑɑkɑri dokeo kpɑ ɑ mɛɛri sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ wunɛn tiin nɔni kpɑ ɑ swɑɑ dɑki ɑ nɔ ye kon nun sɔ̃ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten woodɑbɑn sɔ̃. A yen dubu kɑ yen yɑribun woodɑ nɔni dokeo.
A Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ be, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑribɑ ɑ nɛɛ, ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye, yɑ den mɑn nuɑ.
Wee bɑ derɑ tɔn tuko bɑngo sɑribɑ be bɑ ǹ mɑn sɑ̃ɑmɔ bɑ duɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ tu disi doke. Sɑnɑm mɛ be, Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑn yɑ̃kuru kuɑmmɛ kɑ pɛ̃ɛ kɑ yɑɑ gum kɑ yɑɑ yɛm, bɑ ku rɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni mɛm nɔɔwɛ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃.
Ben tii bɑ ǹ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔmburu nɔni doke. Adɑmɑ sɔbɑ bɑ tu nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, tɛ̃, sɔɔ goo ù n wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ, mɑ u ǹ mɑn sɑ̃ɑmɔ, mɑ u ǹ mɑɑ bɑngo kue, u ǹ duɔ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi.
Yenibɑn biru, Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Lefi be bɑ rɑɑ kɑ mɑn tondɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ mɑn deri mɑ bɑ dɑ bɑ bũnu swĩi, bɑ koo ben torɑnun ɑre mwɑ.
Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔm kowobu. Berɑ bɑ ko n dɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yee ten kɔnnɔsu mɑrɑ. Kpɑ bɑ n ten sɔmɑ mɔ̀. Beyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ Isirelibɑn yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrugirun yɑɑ sɑke kpɑ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ nɛ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃.
Wee tɛ̃, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Isirelibɑn yɑ̃ku kowobu bũnun nuurɔ, mɑ bɑ derɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ torɑ. Yen sɔ̃, kon nɔmɑ suɑ n bu so kpɑ bu ben torɑnun ɑre mwɑ.
Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wurɑmɔ bu mɑn susi bu Isirelibɑ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ duɔ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun dii dɛɛrɑrɔ kɑ dii te tɑ dɛɛre gem gem mi. Bɑ koo sekuru wɑ kpɑ bu ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn ɑre mwɑ.
Sɑ̃ɑ yerun nɛnubun sɔmɑ kon bu wɛ̃ bu ko.
Adɑmɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu Lefibɑ Sɑdɔkun bweseru sɔɔ, be bɑ sɔmburu kuɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ sɑnɑm mɛ Isirelibɑ bɑ torɑ bɑ mɑn deri, beyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ mɑn susi bu yɑ̃kuru ko kɑ pɛ̃ɛ kɑ yɑɑ gum kɑ yɑɑ yɛm. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Beyɑ bɑ ko n dɑ du nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kpɑ bu susi nɛn tɑbuluɔ bu mɑn sɑ̃. Kpɑ bu nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee ten sɔmburu nɔni doke.
Bɑ̀ n duɔ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑɔ, kon de bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃nu dokewɑ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii. Bɑ̀ n sɔmburu mɔ̀ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten yɑɑrɑ mi kɑ sere ten tiin sɔɔwɔ bɑ ǹ yɑ̃nu dokemɔ ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑ sɑnsu.
Bɑ ko n dɑwɑni bɔkuɑwɑ kpɑ bɑ n sokoto kpirinu deewɑ, ye kpuro yɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ wesɑ kɑ wɛ̃ɛ dɑmgii. Kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ kpɑkɑ sɛ̃ke bu ku kɑ wɛnyɑn sɔ̃.
Bu sere yɑri bu dɑ yɑɑrɑ mi Isirelibɑ bɑ mɛnnɛ, bɑ koo ginɑ ben yɑ̃ku yɑ̃ɑ ni potiriwɑ bu yi sɑ̃ɑ yeru mi. Kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ kɑ nu tɔmbu bɑbɑn sɔ̃ nu disi duurɑ. Sɑɑ ye, kpɑ bu gɑnu doke bu kɑ yɑrimɑ.
Yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ǹ wii pɔɔru potɑmɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ ben seri yi dɛnyɑ.
Yɑ̃ku kowo goo u ku rɑɑ tɑm nɔ u sere dɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑ sɔɔkɑɑɔ.
Ben goo u ku rɑɑ mɑɑ gɔmini ǹ kun mɛ kurɔ wi bɑ yinɑ suɑ kurɔ. Isirelibɑ sɔɔrɑ u koo wɔndiɑ wi u kun durɔ yɛ̃ suɑ. Adɑmɑ u koo kpĩ u yɑ̃ku kowo goon gɔmini suɑ.
Bɑ koo nɛn tɔmbu sɔ̃ɔsiwɑ ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛ Gusunɔgiɑ kɑ ye yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nɛgiɑ. Yeyɑ, ye yɑ dɛɛre kɑ ye yɑ ǹ dɛɛre.
Berɑ bɑ koo nɛn tɔmbu siriɑ nge mɛ nɛn woodɑbɑ bɑ geruɑ. Kpɑ bu nɛn woodɑbɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ kɑ nɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ ni nɑ bu wɛ̃, kpɑ bu nɛn tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugiru bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Yɑ̃ku kowo u ku goon goru bɑbɑ kpɑ u ku rɑɑ tii disi doke. Adɑmɑ u koo kpĩ u win tiin tundon goru bɑbɑ kɑ win mɛrogiru kɑ win bibuginu kɑ win mɔɔgiru kɑ win wɔnɔgiru kɑ win sesu wi u kun durɔ yɛ̃giru.
Ù n tii dɛɛrɑsiɑ goo ten sɔ̃, sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiruwɑ u koo ko u sere win sɔmburu tore.
Dɔmɑ te u koo du dii te tɑ dɛɛre mi, u koo ginɑ win tiin torɑnun yɑ̃kuru ko. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee ye yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ ben tubi. Nɛnɑ bɑ koo sɔmburu kuɑ. Bɑ ǹ bu tem gɑm wɛ̃ɛmɔ bɑ n mɔ Isireliɔ. Nɛnɑ ko nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge ben tem kɔsire.
Ye bɑ kɑ torɑrun yɑ̃kunu kɑ yɑ̃ku ni bɑ rɑ kɑ torɑnu sɔmɛ kuɑ kɑ kɛ̃ɛ ni bɑ kɑ nɑɑmɔ kɑ sere ye bɑ yi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃, ye kpuro yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ ben dĩɑnu.
Dĩɑ gbiikii ni bɑ koo kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑɑwɑ, nu koo kowɑ yɑ̃ku kowobuginu. Isirelibɑ bɑ ko n dɑ ben dĩɑ bimin som gem yɑ̃ku kowobu wɛ̃wɑ kpɑ n bu domɑru kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ ǹ yɑɑ goru ǹ kun mɛ gunɔ goru dimɔ ǹ kun mɛ ye gɑ̃ɑnu kɑsukɑ nu go.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ koo Isirelibɑn bwese kɛri yi tem bɔnu kuɑ, bɑ koo tem gɑm wunɑwɑ mu n sɑ̃ɑ kɛ̃ru te bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wɛ̃. Tem mɛn dɛ̃ɛbu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu (25.000). Mɛn yɑsum mɑɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ wɔkuru (10.000). Mɛ kpuro mu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ mɛ bɑ wunɑ bɑ yi Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃.
Tem mɛ sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo bɑtumɑ wunɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun sɔ̃. Yen dɛ̃ɛbu kɑ yen yɑsum mu ko n nɛwɑ mu n sɑ̃ɑ dɛkɑ nɛɛrɑ wunɔm wunɔm (500) kpɑ bu mɑɑ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ deri mi, bu kɑ sikerenɑ yɑ n sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu weerɑɑkuru.
Bɑ koo mɑɑ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ wunɑ gbiikɑɑ ye sɔɔ mi bɑ koo Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru swĩi. Yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛnɛm Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃ tem mɛ sɔɔ.
Yerɑ yɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowobugiɑ be, be bɑ rɑ Yinni Gusunɔ sɔmburu kue sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Miyɑ ben diɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru.
Bɑtumɑ mi Lefibɑ bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ yen dɛ̃ɛbu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu (25.000). Yen yɑsum mɑɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ wɔkuru (10.000). Kpɑ bu diɑ yɛndu ko mi.
Yinni Gusunɔn bɑtumɑ yen deedeeru, bɑ koo mɑɑ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ wunɑ mi Isirelibɑ bɑ koo ben diɑ bɑni. Bɑtumɑ yen dɛ̃ɛbu bu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ nɔɔbu (25.000) kpɑ yen yɑsum mu n sɑ̃ɑ gɔm soonu nɔrɔbun subɑ nɔɔbu (5.000).
Bɑ koo mɑɑ bɑtumɑ gɑɑ wunɑ ben kpɑron sɔ̃. Yɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ Isirelibɑgiɑn nɔɔwɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ Yinni Gusunɔgiɑn nɔɔwɔ.
