Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Isirelibɑ, mbɑ kon bɛɛ kuɑ. Wee bɛɛn kĩru nɛn sɔ̃ tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bururun kɑkoru ǹ kun mɛ nge dirum mɛ mu rɑ yɑrinɛ fuuku.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon bɛɛ nɛn sɔmɔbu gɔriɑmɑ bu bɛɛ sɔ̃ mɑ kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Kpɑ bu mɑɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ mɑ kon bɛɛ go. Nɛn siribu bu koo sɔ̃ɔsirɑ nge yɑm bururɑm.
Domi wɔnwɔndɑ nɑ kĩ, n ǹ mɔ yɑ̃kuru. Mɛyɑ nɑ mɑɑ kĩ nɛn tɔmbu bu mɑn giɑ n kere bu mɑn yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑruginu kuɑ.
Bɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni kusiɑ nge mɛ tɔmbu bɑ rɑ n kuɑnɑmmɛ. Wee bɑ mɑn tɔnu kɑndu kuɑ.
Gɑlɑdigibu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu mɑ bɑ yɛm yɑri bɑɑmɑ.
Nge mɛ swɑɑ diobu bɑ rɑ n swɑɑ mɑrɑ, nge mɛyɑ yɑ̃ku kowobun wuuru tɑ wɑ̃ɑ Sikɛmun swɑɑɔ tɑ tɔmbu goomɔ.
Nɑ gɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu wɑ Isireliɔ, niyɑ bɑ bũnu gɑsirimɔ, bɑ tii disi dokemɔ nge sɑkɑrɑ kowo.
Sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ kon mɑɑ bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ kĩ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ bu wurɑmɑ yorun di,
kpɑ n bu bɛkiɑ, sɑɑ yerɑ ben durum mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑ Sɑmɑriɔ. Gbɛnɔbu bɑ dumɔ diɑɔ bɑ gbɛnimɔ. Mɑ ben gɑbɑ yibɑ swɛɛ sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ ben goo sɑri wi u rɑ tii sɔ̃ u nɛɛ, nɑ yɑɑye kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀. Tɛ̃, wee bɑ mwɑɑrɑ ben kom kɔ̃sum mɛ sɔɔ. Nɑ ye kpuro wɑɑmɔ.
Ben nuku kɔ̃su kookoosu kɑ ben weesu su sinɑ boko kɑ ben wirugibu nuku dobu wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Be kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu bɑ sum nge pɛ̃ɛ wɔ̃ɔ yeru te pɛ̃ɛ kowo u dɔ̃ɔ doke u deri. Mɑ u dɑ u win pɛ̃ɛ som burɑ u yi sere mu kɑ se.
Bɑ̀ n ben sinɑ bokon tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru mɔ̀, ben sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu kɑ sunɔn tii bɑ rɑ tɑm nɔwɑ kpɑ bɑ n tɔmbu yɑɑ kɑsikimɔ.
Be bɑ rɑ nɔɔ tiɑ ko bu kɑ tɔmbu seesi, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge pɛ̃ɛ wɔ̃ɔ yeru. Wɔ̃kuru, ben wɔrugɔru tɑ rɑ yɛmiɛwɑ kpɑ yɑm sɑ̃re bururu tu se nge bɑ gɑ̃ɑnu dɔ̃ɔ doke.
Be kpuro bɑ sumwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ. Bɑ rɑ ben kpɑrobu gowɑ kpɑ ben sinɑmbu bɑ n wɔrukumɔ tiɑ tiɑ. Adɑmɑ ben goo ku rɑ mɑɑ mɑn somiru kɑnɛ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ bɑ kɑ bwese tukunu mɛnnɑ. Mɑ bɑ kuɑ nge kirɑ te bɑ ǹ gɔsie.
Bwese tuku ni, nu bu dɑm mwɑɑrimɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ yɛ̃ mɛ. Tɔkɔrɑ bu deemɑmɔwɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ tubɑ.
Ben tii suɑbu sɔ̃ɔsirɑmɔ. Domi bɑ ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛ Gusunɔ ben Yinnin mi. Kɑ yen de kpuro, bɑ ǹ mɑn kɑsu.
Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge totobɛrɛ te tɑ ǹ bwisi mɔ. Bɑ Egibitigibu somiru kɑnɑmɔ, mɑ bɑ dɑɑmɔ Asiriɔ.
Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ n swɑɑ wɔri nɑ rɑ bu tɑɑ bɛriewɑ n bu mwɛɛri nge gunɔsu. Kpɑ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nge mɛ bɑ bu nɔɔsiɑ.
Bɑ kɑm kuɑwɑ mi, domi bɑ mɑn dukɑ suurimɔ. Bɑ mɑn seesi, bɑ mɑn weesu kuɑ. N deemɑ nɛnɑ kon dɑɑ bu fɑɑbɑ ko.
Bɑ̀ n mɑn somiru kɑnɑmɔ, bɑ ku rɑ tu ko gɔ̃ruɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ rɑ sinɛwɑ bɑ n tii muririmɔ. Kpɑ bɑ n yĩiyɔ yeyɑ yɑ koo de ben gbeɑ yu ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ resɛm geɑ mɑ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ rɑ n mɔ̀ bu kɑ mɑn seesi.
N deemɑ nɛnɑ nɑ bu nɔni doke nɑ bu dɑm wɛ̃. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, bɑ mɑn kɔ̃sɑ bwisikusimɔ.
Bɑ gɔsirɑ goon mi giɑ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge tɛn te tɑ ǹ geɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, bɑ koo ben wirugibu go tɑbu sɔɔ ben gɑri kɑm gerubun sɔ̃. Yerɑ yɑ koo de bu bu yɛ̃ɛ Egibitiɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, i kɔbɑ soowo. Wee yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yeru wuusimɑ nge kɑsi. Domi Isirelibɑ bɑ nɛn ɑrukɑwɑni kusiɑ. Mɑ bɑ nɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru yinɑ.
Bɑ koo mɑn nɔɔgiru suemɑ bu nɛɛ, bɑ nɛ ben Yinni yɛ̃.
Adɑmɑ bɑ geɑ deri, mɑ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo bu nɑɑ swĩi.
Bɑ tii sinɑmbu kuɑ bɑ ǹ mɑn sɑɑwɑrɑ kue. Mɑ bɑ bũnu sekɑ kɑ sii geesu kɑ wurɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo kɑm ko.
Bɛɛ Sɑmɑrigibu, nɑ bɛɛn nɑɑ wurɑgiɑ ye tusɑ. Nɑ mɑɑ kɑ bɛɛ mɔru mɔ̀. Sɑɑ yerɑ̀ i ko i sinɑ bɑ ku n bɛɛ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃.
Wi u bwɑ̃ɑrokunun sɔmburu yɛ̃ Isirelibɑ sɔɔ wiyɑ u nɑɑ wurɑgiɑ ye kuɑ. Yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo ye kɔsuku muku muku.
Wee i woo duurɑ, yen sɔ̃nɑ i ko i woo bɔkɔ gɛ̃. Mɔndu gɑrɑ nɛɛ, dobi bɛm sɑri ku rɑ n som mɔ. I n mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ bɛɛn gbeɑn dĩɑnu nù n dɑɑ geɑ kuɑ, sɔbɑ bɑ koo nu gurɑ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ derɑ bɑ bu mwɛ. Be wee bwesenu sɔɔ nge weke te goo kun mɑɑ kĩ.
Domi bɑ dɑ Asiriɔ nge gbeeku kɛtɛku ge gɑ tii kpɑre. Bɑ dɑ bɑ somiru kɑsu mi.
Bɑ bwese tukunu gobi kɔsiɑ bɑ n kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, kon bu mɛnnɑ, kpɑ Asirin sinɑ boko u bu yoo sɔmɑ koosiɑ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ bũu turɑnu kuɑ nu dɑbi. Niyɑ nu derɑ bɑ durum mɔ̀.
Bɑɑ nɑ̀ n bu nɛn woodɑbɑ yoruɑ sere kɑ yen gɑri piiminɔ, bɑ rɑ ye gɑrisiwɑ nge ye yɑ wee tɔn tukon min di.
Bɑ rɑ yɛɛ go bu kɑ mɑn yɑ̃kuru kuɑ, kpɑ bu yin yɑɑ tem. Adɑmɑ ben yɑ̃ku ni, nu ǹ mɑn doremɔ. Nɑ ǹ ben torɑnu duɑri. Kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo gɔsirɑ bu dɑ Egibitiɔ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ tii sinɑ kpɑɑru bɑniɑ. Mɑ bɑ nɛ ben tɑkɑ kowo duɑri. Yudɑbɑ bɑ mɑɑ ben wuu dɑbinu gbɑ̃rɑru toosi. Adɑmɑ kon ben wusu dɔ̃ɔ sɔkiri kpɑ u ben dii geenu di.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i ku tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑru ko gɛ̃ɛbun sɑɑ sɔɔ nge bwese ni nu tie. Domi i Yinni Gusunɔ biru kisi. Mɑ i dɑ i bũnu gɑsirimɔ i nu siɑrɑmɔ mi bɑ ɑlikɑmɑ soomɔ kpuro.
Adɑmɑ ɑlikɑmɑ ye bɑ soomɔ kɑ gum mɛ bɑ gɑmɑmɔ, yen gɑɑ kun ko n sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛgiɑ. Mɛyɑ i ǹ tɑm kpɑm wɑsi i wunɑ.
Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ sinɑmɔ tem mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u bu wɛ̃ sɔɔ. Bɑ koo wurɑmɑ Egibitiɔ ǹ kun mɛ Asiriɔ. Kpɑ bu dĩɑ sesenuginu di mi.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu yɑ̃kuru ko kɑ tɑm. Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n tu kuɑ, tɑ ǹ Gusunɔ wɛ̃remɔ. Ben yɑ̃ku dĩɑnu nu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gɔɔ dĩɑnu. Wi u nu di, u koo disi duurɑwɑ. Dĩɑ ni, nu koo win gɔ̃ɔru kpeesiɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ kɑ ye duɔ Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Mbɑ i ko ko Yinni Gusunɔn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnu sɔɔ.
Ì n bɛɛn yɛnusu deri bɑnsu, Egibitigibɑ koo bɛɛ dɑm koosiɑ ben mi. Adɑmɑ yen wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Mɛnfisi gɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bɛɛn sikiru. Awĩi yi koo bɛɛn ɑrumɑni di. Kpɑ sɑ̃ki yi kpi bɛɛn kunɔ.
Sɑɑ yɑ turɑ yè sɔɔ Yinni Gusunɔ u koo siri. Sɑɑ yɑ tunumɑ yè sɔɔ u koo bɑɑwure kɔsiɑ ye u kuɑ. Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ i ko ye wɑ. Wee bɛɛn torɑnu kɑ bɛɛn tusirun kpɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃, i rɑ n tɑmɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ u wiirɑwɑ. Wi, wi Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ gɑri kuɑ u tɑm nɔrɑwɑ. N deemɑ bɛɛ, i torewɑ n kpɑ̃, mɑ i nùn tusɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɔmɔ wi u bɛɛ kirɔ mɔ̀, u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ Gusunɔ. Kɑ mɛ, i nùn yinɑ bɛriɑmmɛ mi u dɔɔ kpuro. I rɑ mɑm nùn seesiwɑ Gusunɔ win Yinnin sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Wee i dɑ i kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ nge mɛ i rɑɑ kuɑ Gibeɑɔ. Yinni Gusunɔ kun bɛɛn torɑnu duɑri. U koo bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ nin sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ gbiɑ nɑ Isirelibɑ wɑ, nɛn nɔni sɔɔ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge resɛm mɑrum mɛ bɑ wɑ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi. Mɑ nɑ mɑɑ ben bɑɑbɑbɑ wɑ nge figie mɑrum gbiikum. Adɑmɑ ye bɑ tunumɑ Bɑɑli Peoriɔ, miyɑ bɑ tii bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli wɛ̃. Mɑ nɑ bu tusɑ nge bũu wi.
Tɛ̃ Isirelibɑn bɛɛrɛ yɑ koo doonɑ nge gunɔ mɔrin wuuru. Ben kurɔbu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ guri suɑmɔ bu sere mɑ.
Bɑ̀ n mɑɑ bibu seeyɑ, kon de bu gbiwɑ bu sere bukurɑ. Bɑ koo wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ wɑ nɑ̀ n bu biru kisi.
Nge mɛ nɑ Isirelibɑ wɑɑsinɑmɔ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ ni bɑ duurɑ tem gem sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ koo ben bibu yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ be bɑ koo bu go.
Osee u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, bɑ̀ n koo Isirelibɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ, sɛɛyɑsiɑ birɑ̀ bɑ koo gɔsi. A de ben kurɔbu bu nukuru yɑri, kpɑ ben bwɑ̃su su gberɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, geemɑ ben nuku kɔ̃suru kpuro tɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑ Giligɑliɔ. Miyɑ nɑ bu wɑ mɑ nɑ bu tusɑ. Kon bu girɑ nɛn wuswɑɑn di ye bɑ kuɑn sɔ̃. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu kĩ. Domi ben sinɑmbu kpurowɑ bɑ mɑn seesimɔ.
Nɑ be, Isirelibɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ te tɑ gberɑ nuurun di kpuro. Tɑ ǹ mɑɑ binu mɑrumɔ. Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n mɑɑ bibu mɑrɑ, kon de bii be bɑ kĩ mi, bu gbiwɑ.
Osee u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ nɛn Yinni u bu yinɑ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ǹ win gɑri swɑɑ dɑki. Bɑ koo kowɑ yɑɑyɑɑre kowobu bwesenun suunu sɔɔ.
Isirelin bweseru tɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge resɛm geɑ ye yɑ rɑ mɑ too. Adɑmɑ nge mɛ bɑ dɑbiɑmɔ, nge mɛyɑ bɑ bũu yenu dɑbiɑsiɑmɔ. Nge mɛ ben tem mu kuurɑmɔ, nge mɛyɑ bɑ bũu yenu sɔmmɔ kɑ kpee geenu.
Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ gɔ̃rusu yirugibu. Bɑ koo yen ɑre sɔbe. Yinni Gusunɔ u koo ben bũu yee ni kɑ nin kpee geenu kɔsuku.
Bɑ koo tɛ̃ nɛɛ, yèn sɔ̃ sɑ ǹ Gusunɔ nɑsie, yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ǹ sinɑ boko mɔ. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃n wɑ̃ɑ te sɑ wɑ̃ɑ mini, mbɑ sinɑ boko koo mɑɑ kpĩ u sun wunɑnɑ.
Wee bɑ gɑri kɑm gerumɔ, mɑ bɑ ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkumɔ kɑ bɔ̃ri weesugii. Yen sɔ̃, siribu dɑbiɑmɔ nge yɑkɑ kɔ̃susu si su rɑ kpi gbee te bɑ wukɑ sɔɔ.
Kpɑ Sɑmɑrigii be bɑ nɑɑ buu wurɑguu sɑ̃ɑmɔ ge ge wɑ̃ɑ Betɛli Afɛniɔ bu nɑndɑ kpɑ bu gɔɔ sinɑ gen sɔ̃. Gen yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ koo diiri bɑ̀ n wɑ gen bɛɛrɛ yɑ kpɑ.
Domi bɑ koo kɑ gu dɑ Asiriɔ bu gu ben sinɑ boko wɛ̃. Isirelibɑ bɑ koo sekuru wɑ. Bɑ koo nɑ̀ n dɑɑ yɛ̃ ko ye bɑ kɑ bũu kuɑ ben suunu sɔɔ.
Ǹ n Sɑmɑrin sɔ̃n nɑ, ye kpuro yɑ kpɑwɑ mi. Domi bɑ koo kɑ yen sinɑ boko doonɑ nge dɛkɑ ye nim mu kɑ doonɔ.
Bɑ koo ben bũu yenu kpuro kɔsuku mi bɑ torɑ. Kpɑ yɑkɑsu kɑ sɑ̃ki yi kpi mi. Sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ bɑ koo guunu kɑ gungunu sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, i sun sɛ̃sikio i wukiri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ dɔmɑ tèn di Isirelibɑ bɑ durum kuɑ Gibeɑɔ, bɑ torɑmɔ bɑ dɔɔwɑ. N ǹ weenɛ tɑbu bu tɔn kɔ̃so be wɔri mi?
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ nge mɛ nɑ kĩ, kpɑ bwesenu nu nɔɔ tiɑ ko nu bu wɔri ben torɑ bɑkɑnun sɔ̃.
Isirelibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nɑɑ kpɛmi yi yi rɑ dobi tɑɑku. Adɑmɑ kon sugu doke ben wĩi burɑ ni sɔɔ. Kon de Yudɑbɑ bu kɔrɔ ko, kpɑ be, Yɑkɔbun bweseru bu tem kusɑnu kɔsuku.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ i gbee kpɑɑru koowo i gem duure. Kpɑ i durom gɛ̃. Domi sɑɑ yɑ turɑ i kɑ gɔsirɑmɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mi, kpɑ n bɛɛ susi n bɛɛ geɑ kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, i kɔ̃sɑ duurɑ mɑ i kɔ̃sɑ gɑ̃. Mɑ i bɛɛn weesun ɑre di. I bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ doke bɛɛn tiin dɑm kɑ tɑbu kowo dɑbi dɑbiru sɔɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ tɑbun wurenu koo nɔɔrɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Kpɑ bu bɛɛn gbɑ̃rɑnu kpuro kɔsuku nge mɛ Sɑlumɑn sinɑ boko u Bɛti Aribɛli wɔri, mɑ u bii mɛrobu kɑ ben bibu munkɑ.
Bɛɛ Betɛligibu, wee ye kon bɛɛ kuɑ bɛɛn nuku kɔ̃surun sɔ̃. Bururu yɑm sɑ̃reru yɑnde, tɑbu sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo bɛɛn sinɑ boko go.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ Isirelin bweserun torubun diyɑ nɑ tu kĩɑ. Mɑ nɑ tu yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di nɑ tu sokɑ nɛn bii.
Adɑmɑ nge mɛ nɑ bu sokumɔ nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ mɑn tondɑmɔ. Bɑ dɑ bɑ bũu ni bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Mɑ bɑ nu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑmmɛ.
N deemɑ nɛnɑ nɑ bu kpɑre, nɑ ben nɔmɑ nɛni. Adɑmɑ bɑ ǹ tubɑ mɑ nɛnɑ nɑ bu nɔɔrimɔ.
Nɑ bu gɑwɑmɑ nɛn mi kɑ kĩru mɑ nɑ bu dĩɑnu wɛ̃ nge wi u yɑɑ sɑbenun sugu yiiyɑmɔ u kɑ nu nɔɔri.
Adɑmɑ bɑ yinɑ bu nɑ nɛn mi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nɛɛ, bɑ koo dɑ Egibitiɔ kpɑ Asirigii u ko ben sunɔ.
Bɑ koo ben wusu tɑbu wɔri, kpɑ bu ben dɑmgibu kɔsuku yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ben tiin kpunɑɑ swĩi.
Wee nɛn tɔmbu bɑ yɔ̃rɑri bu kɑ mɑn tondɑ. Bɑ bu sokɑ bu gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ bu wurɑmɑ nɛ, Wɔrukoon mi. Adɑmɑ ben goo kun wure.
Kɑ mɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n bɛɛ deri, n bɛɛ tɔnu kɑndu kuɑ. Nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n bɛɛ kɑm koosiɑ nge mɛ nɑ wuu si bɑ mɔ̀ Adimɑ kɑ Seboimu kuɑ. Wee nɛn gɔ̃ru gɑ sɑnkire, nɛn bwɛ̃rɑ kun kpunɛ.
Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑmɔ kɑ nɛn mɔru bɑkɑ ye. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wee n bɛɛ kɑm koosiɑ. Domi nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ n ǹ mɔ tɔnu. Nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Dɛɛro bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ wɔrim wee kɑ mɔru.
Bɛɛ nɛn bibu, i ko nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ swĩi nɑ̀ n kukurɑ nge gbee sunɔ kpɑ i duki nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yerun di.
I ko duki nɑ sɑɑ Egibitin di nge gunɔ mɔri kpɑ i nɑ sɑɑ Asirin di nge totobɛrɛnu, kpɑ n de i sinɑ bɛɛn yɛnusɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.

Isirelibɑ bɑ rɑ n mɑn weesu kuɑmmɛwɑ, kpɑ bɑ n mɑn nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ. Adɑmɑ Yudɑbɑ bɑ kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ Dɛɛro sĩimɔ dee dee.
Isirelibɑ bɑ Egibitigibu gum wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Mɑ bɑ kɑ Asirigibu ɑrukɑwɑni bɔkumɔ. Nge mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ kpɑɑsibu kɑsu be bɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gɑ̃ɑnu. N sɑ̃ɑre bɑ woo nɑɑ gire. Bɑ ben weesu dɑbiɑsiɑmɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑtere. Mɑ bɑ dɑɑ bɔɔbɔyɑ mɔ̀ bɑ dɔɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ Yudɑbɑ siribu sokumɔ. Kon be Yɑkɔbun bweseru wɔrimɑ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃. Kpɑ n bu ben kɔ̃sɑn ɑre kɔsiɑ.
Ben bɑɑbɑ Yɑkɔbu u win mɔɔn nɑɑ tokuru nɛnuɑ sɑɑ win mɛron nukurun di. Ye bɑ nùn mɑrɑ u kpɛ̃ɑ, mɑ u kɑ nɛ Gusunɔ wɔri kuɑ kɑ win dɑm kpuro.
U kɑ nɛn gɔrɑdo wɔri kuɑ, mɑ u kɑmiɑ. U swĩ, mɑ u gɔrɑdo wi kɑnɑ u nùn domɑru kuɑ. Betɛli miyɑ u kɑ nɛ Gusunɔ yinnɑ. Mɑ nɑ kɑ nùn gɑri kuɑ.
Nɛnɑ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni. Nɛn yĩsirɑ Wi u rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i de i wurɑmɑ nɛ bɛɛn Yinnin mi. I de i geɑ ko kpɑ i n mɑn nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ bɑɑdommɑ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ i sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge tenku be bɑ kilo weesugiɑ nɛni. Bɑ rɑ gbɛnɑ kɑ̃.
Kpɑ i nɛɛ, kɑ gem i gobi wɑ, i dukiɑ bɑkɑ gurɑ. Kɔ̃sɑ gɑɑ sɑri ye sɔɔ. Bɛɛn sɔmburun ɑreyɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɛɛn Yinni sɑɑ mìn di i wɑ̃ɑ Egibitiɔ. Kon mɑɑ de i wurɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ kuu bekuruginu sɔɔ nge sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ bɛɛ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di i wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ.
Nɛn sɔmɔbɑ nɑ kɑ gɑri kuɑ kɑ̃sinu sɔɔ, kpɑ be, bu mɑɑ kɑ bɛɛ gɑri ko. Beyɑ bɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ nɛn himbɑ sɔ̃ɔsi yɑ kɑ gisɔ girɑri.
Kɑ mɛ, Gɑlɑdigibu bɑ kuɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu. Mɑ bɑ koo kɑm ko. Bɑ rɑ kɛtɛ kinɛ dɑbinu go Giligɑliɔ. Adɑmɑ ben yɑ̃ku yenu nu koo ko kpee subenu gbɑɑnun kpĩi sɔɔ.
Yɑkɔbu u kpikiru dɑ Arɑmuɔ. Miyɑ u sɔmburu kuɑ u yɑ̃ɑnu kpɑrɑ u kɑ kurɔ wɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɔmɔ goowɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔrɑ u dɑ u win bweseru Isirelibɑ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di. Sɔmɔ wiyɑ u bu kpɑrɑ. Adɑmɑ yenibɑ kpuro sɔɔ, Isirelibɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nuki sɑnkɑ too too. Yen sɔ̃, u koo de yɛm mɛ bɑ yɑri mi, mu wɔri ben wiru wɔllɔ. U koo de bu yen sekuru wɑ.
Yellu Efɑrɑimubɑrɑ bɑ dɑm bo Isirelibɑ sɔɔ. Bɑ̀ n bwese kɛri yi yi tie gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ, bɑ rɑ nɑndewɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑli sɑ̃wɑ, mɑ bɑ gu.
Wee sere kɑ tɛ̃, bɑ durum mɔ̀ bɑ dɔɔ. Bɑ tii bwɑ̃ɑroku sii geesuginu kuɑ. Ben tiiwɑ bɑ bwisikɑ mɑ bɑ nu sekɑ kɑ ben nɔmɑ nu kɑ nɑɑ binu weenɛ. Mɑ bɑ gerumɔ nin sɔ̃ bɑ mɔ̀, be bɑ yɑ̃kuru nɑ, bu yiiro bu nɑɑ bii ni sɔ̃su.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo doonɑ nge bururun kɑkoru ǹ kun mɛ nge dirum. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɑkɑ si bɑ gurɑ bɑ yɑri doo soo yerun di su kɑ woo doonɔ ǹ kun mɛ nge wii si su yɑrimɔ gbɑburun di.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinni sɑɑ mìn di nɑ bu yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ Yinni goo mɔ mɑ n kun mɔ nɛ. Fɑɑbɑ kowo mɑɑ sɑri nɛ bɑɑsi.
Nɑ bu kpɑrɑ sɑɑ mìn di bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburɔ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ duɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ, bɑ di bɑ debɑ nge yɑɑ sɑbe ni bɑ kpɑre, mɑ bɑ tii suɑbu toruɑ bɑ mɑn duɑri.
Tɛ̃, ko nɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge gbee sunɔ nɑ n bu mɑrɑ swɑɑɔ nge musuku gbeeku.
Kon bu wɔrimɑwɑ nge gbeeku yɑɑ gɔbɑ yèn binu bɑ mwɑ. Kpɑ n ben toronu bɛsuku. Mɛyɑ kon bu kɑsuku nge mɛ gbeeku yɛɛ yi rɑ yɑɑ kɑsuku, kpɑ gbee sunɔ niu gu bu tem.
Isirelibɑ, wee i kɑm kuɑ yèn sɔ̃ i mɑn seesi nɛ wi kon kpĩ n bɛɛ somi.
Mɑnɑ bɛɛn sinɑ boko u wɑ̃ɑ. I de u bɛɛ fɑɑbɑ ko bɛɛn wusu kpuro sɔɔ. Mɑnɑ bɛɛn kpɑrobɑ wɑ̃ɑ be i bikiɑ i nɛɛ, bu bɛɛ sinɑmbu kuɑ.
Nɑ rɑɑ bɛɛ sinɑ boko wɛ̃ kɑ mɔru. Mɛyɑ kon mɑɑ bɛɛ nùn mwɑɑri kɑ mɔru.
Nɑ Isirelibɑn durum yoruɑ nɑ yii sere sɑɑ gɑɑ.
Isirelin bweseru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge bii wìn mɑrubun sɑɑ yɑ turɑ mɑ u kpɑsɑ wɔri mɔ̀, ɑdɑmɑ bii wi, u yinɑ u yɑrimɑ.
Kon bu wunɑ sɑɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerun dɑm di. Kpɑ n bu yɑkiɑ gɔɔn nɔmɑn di. Gɔɔ, ɑ nɑ kɑ wunɛn bɑrɑ te ɑ rɑ kɑ tɔnu go. Gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru, ɑ nɑ kɑ wunɛn kɑm kootiɑ. Domi nɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀.
Bɑɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ̀ n kuurɑ ɑmɔ, begibun suunu sɔɔ, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo nɑ nge woo sum sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun di. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ kon bu seeyɑmɑwɑ gbɑburun di, kpɑ bu dɔkɔbɑ gberɑsiɑ. Kpɑ bwii yi nim kpe. Gɑ̃ɑ ni nu geɑ sɑ̃ɑ kpurowɑ bɑ koo gurɑ bu kɑ doonɑ.

Nɑ kon de bu Sɑmɑri sɛɛyɑsiɑ yèn sɔ̃ yen tɔmbu bɑ nɛ Gusunɔ ben Yinni seesi. Bɑ koo bu gowɑ tɑbu sɔɔ kpɑ bu ben bii piiminu nɑm. Kpɑ bu ben kurɔ be bɑ guri mɔn nukunu bɛsuku.
Osee u Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bu wurɑmɑ Gusunɔ ben Yinnin mi, domi bɑ wɔrumɑ ben torɑnun sɔ̃.
Bu wurɑmɑ win mi bu kɑnɑ teni ko te tɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ sun bɛsɛn torɑnu kpuro suuru kuo. Kpɑ ɑ sun mɛɛri kɑ nɔnu geu. Ye sɑ ko kɑ nun yɑ̃kuru kuɑ, sɑ ko nun siɑrɑ.
Asirigii wi, u ǹ kpɛ̃ u sun fɑɑbɑ ko. Sɑ mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ dumi kun sun fɑɑbɑ mɔ̀ tɑbu sɔɔ. Sɑ ǹ mɑɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku ni sɑ tii kuɑ sokumɔ bɛsɛn yinnibu pɑi. Domi wunɑ ɑ rɑ gobekubɑ wɔnwɔndu kue.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, kon de nɛn tɔmbu bu kɑ den nɛ turo yɔ̃rɑ kpɑ n bu kĩɑ too. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ bu mɔru mɔ̀.
Ko nɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kɑkoru be, Isirelibɑn sɔ̃. Bɑ ko n wɑ̃wɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ wɛ̃su, kpɑ bu nuuru girɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Libɑniɔ.
Ben kɑ̃ɑsi yi koo tɛriɑwɑ kpɑ yi n wɑ̃ nge dɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ olifi, kpɑ yi n nuburu do nge dɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ Libɑniɔ.
Bɑ koo gɔsirɑmɑ bu sinɑ nɛn kɔkɔrɔ kpɑ bu mɑɑ ɑlikɑmɑ duure. Bɑ koo kpɑrɑwɑ nge resɛm dɑ̃ɑ kpɑ bu yĩsiru yɑri nge Libɑnin tɑm.
Sɑɑ ye, Isirelibɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Domi kon ben kɑnɑru nɔ, kpɑ n bu nɔni doke. Nɑ kon sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ ye yɑ ku rɑ gbere ben sɔ̃. Nɛn min diyɑ bɑ koo domɑru wɑ. Wi u lɑɑkɑri mɔ, u de u n tii sɛ gɑri yinin sɔ̃. Wi u mɑɑ bwisi mɔ, u de yi nùn yeeri. Domi Yinni Gusunɔn swɛɛ yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ dee dee. Gemgibɑ bɑ koo sĩ yi sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ be bɑ nùn seesimɔ, bɑ koo wɔrumɑ yi sɔɔ.
Gɑri wee yi Yinni Gusunɔ u Yoɛli, Pɛtuɛlin bii sɔ̃ɔwɑ u Yudɑbɑ sɔ̃.
U nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yudɑbɑn guro gurobu, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ. Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ kpuro kpuro i swɑɑ tem kpĩiyɔ i gɑri yi nɔ. Gɑ̃ɑ ninin bweseru nu koore bɛɛn wɑɑti sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ bɛɛn sikɑdobɑn wɑɑti sɔɔ?
I bɛɛn bibu yen gɑri sɔ̃ɔwɔ. Kpɑ bii be, bu mɑɑ ben bibu sɔ̃, kpɑ be, bɑ̀ n seewɑ bu mɑɑ begibu sɔ̃.
Wee dĩɑ ni kɔkɔnu nu di n tiɑrɑ, twee yi nɑ yi di. Ye twee yi nɑ yi di n tiɑrɑ mɑ swĩini yi nɑ yi di. Ye swĩini yi di n tiɑrɑ, mɑ gbɑɑnu nɑ nu ye di.
Bɛɛ be tɑm mu goomɔ, i dom yɑndo kpɑ i swĩ. Bɛɛ tɑm nɔrobu, i weeweenu koowo. Domi tɑm mu koo kpe resɛm biɑrun sɔ̃.
Domi twee wuurɑ nɑ nge tɑbu kowobu tɑ bɛsɛn tem wukiri. Yi dɑbi, yi mɑɑ dɑm mɔ. Yin donnu dɑm mɔwɑ nge gbee sinɑnsuginu.
Yi bɛsɛn resɛm gbɑɑnu kɑm koosiɑmɔ. Yi bɛsɛn figie dɑ̃nu dimɔ. Yi yen kokosu wĩɑmɔ. Mɑ yi yen kɑ̃ɑsi derimɔ kokosu sɑri.
I wuri koowo nge kurɔ kpɑo wi gɔminirɑ deemɑ.
Bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ kɑ kɛ̃nu de Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ ni nu sɑ̃ɑ ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ tɑm. Yen sɔ̃nɑ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔm kowo be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ sɑ̃ɑre bɑ gɔɔ sɔ̃.
Gbeɑ kpuro yɑ kɑm kuɑ. Mɑ yen tem mu sɑɑrɑ. Alikɑmɑ sɑri, resɛm kɑ gum mɑɑ sɑri.
Gbee wukobu bɑ sɔ̃ biti sɔɔ. Be bɑ rɑ resɛm yewe, weeweenɑ bɑ mɔ̀. Domi dĩɑ bimi sɑri. Dĩɑnu kpuro nu kɑm kuɑ.
Resɛm gbɑɑnu nu gberɑ. Figie yɑ dɛllɑ. Dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑnu kpuro nu geɑ yinɑ. Yɑ derɑ tɔmbu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ nuku dobu mɔ.
Bɛɛ Yinni Gusunɔn sɔm kowobu, yɑ̃ku kowobu, i sɑɑki sebuo i kɑ kpunɑ wɔ̃ku giriru nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Domi wee bɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ kɑ ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ tɑm kɛ̃nu nɛ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinnin sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
I tɔ̃ru gɑru wunɔ tè sɔɔ i ko i nɔɔ bɔke. I tɔmbu kpuro mɛnnɔ sere kɑ durɔ tɔkɔnɔ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinnin sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ, kpɑ i nùn kɑnɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔn tɔ̃ru tɑ turuku kuɑ. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ win tɔ̃ru. Te sɔɔrɑ wi, Dɑm kpurogii u koo kpuro kɑm koosiɑ. Annɑ ɑ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃suru wɑ te tɑ sisi mi.
Wee sɑ mɛɛrɑ bɑ kɑ bɛsɛn dĩɑnu doonɔ. Mɑ nuku dobu kpɑ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinnin sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Ye bɑ duurɑ, yɑ gberɑ tem kusɑnu sɔɔ. Dĩɑnu kpɑ birɑnu sɔɔ. Mɑ birɑ ni, nu wɔrukumɔ. Domi nu ǹ mɑɑ dĩɑnu mɔ.
I swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ nge mɛ yɛɛ yi wuri mɔ̀, mɑ yi bɔsu bɑɑmɑ. Domi yi ǹ yɑkɑsu wɑ kpɑrɑ yerɔ. Bɑɑ kɑ yɑ̃ɑnɔ nu nɔni sɔ̃ɔre.
Yinni Gusunɔ, wunɑ nɑ nɔɔgiru suemɔ. Domi wee, yɑkɑsu kɑ dɑ̃ɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ gberɔ.
Mɑ yɛɛ yi nɔɔgiru sue yi nun kɑnɑmɔ. Domi dɑɑnu gberɑ, yɑkɑsu mɑɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑkirɑ gbɑburɔ.
I kɔbɑ soowo Siɔniɔ. I de bu ye nɔ Yinni Gusunɔn guu dɛɛrɑru mi. Bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ kpuro, i diirio bɛrum sɔ̃. Domi Yinni Gusunɔn mɔrun tɔ̃rɑ wee. Wee tɑ mɑm turuku kuɑ.
Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ tĩriwɑ. Tɑ guru wiru kɑ bukɔ sɔɔwɑ. Mɑ twee wuurɑ wee yi dɑbi, yi mɑɑ dɑm mɔ. Yin wuu te, tɑ tĩriwɑ nge yɑm wɔ̃kurɑ guuru wukiri. Sɑ ǹ yen bweseru wɑɑre. Sɑ ǹ mɑɑ yen bweseru wɑsi.
Mi yi sɑrɑ kpuro, n dɑ kowɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ u doonɑ. Yi ku rɑ gɑ̃ɑnu deri. Yellu bɛsɛn tem mu geɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge gbɑɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Edɛni. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ yi mu kuɑ nge mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi.
Twee yi, yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge tɑbu mɑɑsɔbu be bɑ dumi yɑkiɑmɔ.
Yi yɔ̃ɔkumɔ yi guunu gɑsirimɔ. À n yen wɔkinu nuɑ ɑ rɑ n tɑmɑɑ nge tɑbu kɛkɛbɑrɑ, ǹ kun mɛ yɑkɑ si su dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑmɔn wɔkinu. Yi rɑ n weewɑ nge tɑbu durɔ be bɑ tɑbun sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ.
Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ rɑ n nɑndewɑ yì n tunumɑ. Kpɑ ben wuswɑɑ yu burisinɑ.
Yi rɑ tii yɔ̃suwɑ nge tɑbu durɔbu, yi n gbɑ̃rɑru gɑsirimɔ, yen bɑɑyere yɑ n yen swɑɑ swĩi. Yi ku rɑ gɑm gɛre.
Yi ku rɑ mɑɑ bɑɑsinɛ. Yen bɑɑyere yɑ rɑ n yen sĩɑ swĩiwɑ. Gɑ̃ɑ ni nu koo ye gɔngɛrɛ ko, yi rɑ nu wɔriwɑ sɑnnu. Nu ku rɑ mɑɑ ye yɔ̃rɑsie.
Yi rɑ wuu wukiriwɑ yi n gbɑ̃rɑru kɑ yɛnusu gɑsirimɔ, kpɑ yi n dumɔ fɛnɛntibɑn di nge gbɛnɔbu.
Mi yi duɑ, tem mu rɑ diiriwɑ, kpɑ n sɑ̃ɑre wɔllɑ koo wɔrumɑ, kpɑ suru kɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑm tĩrɑ, kpɑ kperin bɑllibu kpe.
Nge mɛyɑ Yinni Gusunɔ ù n gɑri geruɑ win tɑbu kowobun wuswɑɑɔ, bɑ rɑ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɛwɑ. Bɑ dɑbi, bɑ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ win tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ nɑnum mɔ. Wɑrɑ u koo yɔ̃rɑ u tu mɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔnwɔndugii. Nɛn kĩru tɑ kpɑ̃. Nɛn mɔru yɑ ku rɑ fuuku se. Nɑ rɑ mɑɑ tɔnu suuru kue kɔ̃sɑ ye nɑ rɑɑ kĩ n nùn kuɑ sɔɔ. Tɛ̃, i wurɑmɑ kɑ bɛɛn gɔ̃ru kpuro nɛn mi, i nɔɔ bɔke, kpɑ i wuri ko. Bɛɛn gɔ̃ruwɑ i ko i gɔsiɑ, n ǹ mɔ i yɑ̃nu gɛ̃ɛku tɔnɑ. I wurɑmɑ nɛ, Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinnin mi.
<range>
Sɔrɔkudo kon gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ, kpɑ n bɛɛ durom kuɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ i ko i kpĩ i kɑ mɑn ɑlikɑmɑ kɑ tɑm kɛ̃nu nɑɑwɑ.
I kɔbɑ soowo Siɔniɔ. I tɔmbu mɛnnɔ, kpɑ i nɔɔ bɔkurun tɔ̃ru yi.
I tɔmbu mɛnnɔ bu mɑn sɑ̃, guro gurobu kɑ bibu, kɑ bii wɛ̃ɛnɔ. Bɑɑ kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ kurɔ kpɑɑ dirɔ, bu yɑrio ben kurɔ kpɑɑ dirun di.
Kpɑ yɑ̃ku kowo be bɑ mɑn sɑ̃ɑmɔ bu du nɛn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kɑ swĩi, yɑ̃ku yeru kɑ kɔnnɔn bɑɑ sɔɔ, bu nɛ ben Yinni kɑnɑ bu nɛɛ, n ben wɔnwɔndu wɑɑwo, be, nɛn tɔmbu. N ku bu sekuru doke. N ku de tɔn tukobu bu bu yɛ̃ɛ bu nɛɛ, mɑnɑ nɛ, ben Yinni nɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nisinu mɔ win tem sɔ̃. U win tɔmbun wɔnwɔndu mɔ.
Mɑ u win tɔmbun kɑnɑru wisɑ, u nɛɛ, kon bɛɛ ɑlikɑmɑ kpɑɑ wɛ̃, kɑ resɛm, kɑ gum. I ko i deburu wɑ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ derimɔ bweseru gɑru tu bɛɛ yɛ̃ɛ.
Kon bɛɛ yibɛrɛ be bɑ nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di girɑ, kpɑ n de bu dɑ n tomɑ mi tem mu gbere mɑ gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi. Kon de ben swɑɑ gbiobu bu nim wɔ̃ku bɔruguu wɔri. Kpɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ biruɔ bu nim wɔ̃ku ge bɑ mɔ̀ Mɛditerɑnɛ wɔri. Ben gonu nu koo numiɑ sere bu kpɑnɑ bu wɛ̃siɑ. Geemɑ, Yinni Gusunɔ u gɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑnu kuɑ.
Tem, ɑ ku bɛrum ko, ɑ nuku dobu koowo, domi Yinni Gusunɔ u gɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑnu kuɑ.
Bɛɛ gbeeku yɛɛ, i ku nɑndɑ. Domi yɑkɑsu su koo wure su kpi temɔ, kpɑ dɑ̃nu nu mɑ. Figie kɑ resɛm yɑ koo binu mɑ siki siki.
Bɛɛ Siɔnigibu i nuku dobu koowo Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni sɔɔ. Domi u koo de gurɑ yu nɛ yen sɑɑ sɔɔ nge yellu. U koo de yu nɛ sɑɑ ye yɑ rɑ tore kpɑ u de yu kpe sɑɑ ye yɑ rɑ kpe.
Alikɑmɑn soo yerɑ kun mɑɑ gberɑmɔ. Olifin gum, kɑ resɛm tɑm kun mɑɑ biɑrɑmɔ wekenɔ.
Kon bɛɛ wɔ̃ɔ si kɑ dĩɑ nin kɔsire wɛ̃, ni nɛn tɑbu kowobu, kɔkɔnu, kɑ gbɑɑnu, kɑ twee yi di wɔ̃ɔ si su doonɑ sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, i ko i di i debu. I ǹ sekuru wɑsi. Kpɑ i nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, nɛ wi nɑ bɛɛ sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiginu kuɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, i ko i giɑ mɑ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑn suunu sɔɔ. Mɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinni. Nɛ bɑɑsi, Yinni goo mɑɑ sɑri. Bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, i ǹ mɑɑ sekuru wɑsi.





Yen biru kon nɛn Hunde doke tɔmbu kpuro sɔɔ. Bɛɛn bii tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu bɑ koo nɛn gɑri gere, kpɑ bɛɛn durɔ tɔkɔnu nu n dosusu mɔ̀, kpɑ bɛɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bu kɑ̃sinu wɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yen tɔ̃ɔ te, kon Yudɑbɑ kɑ ben wuu Yerusɑlɛmu wesiɑ nge yellu.
Bɑɑ kɑ yobɔ, kon bu nɛn Hunde wɛ̃wɑ tɔ̃ɔ te. Kpɑ n bwese tukunu kpuro mɛnnɑ n nu sure Yosɑfɑtin wɔwɑ sɔɔ. Miyɑ kon nu siri kɔ̃sɑ ye nu nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kuɑn sɔ̃. Domi nu bu yɑrinɑsiɑ tem kpuro sɔɔ. Mɑ nu ben tem bɔnu kuɑ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ, kon mɑɑmɑɑkibɑ ko. Kon de yɛm kɑ dɔ̃ɔ kɑ wii bɑkɑsu sɔ̃ɔsirɑ wɔllɔ kɑ temɔ. Nu nɛn tɔmbu bɔnu kuɑ kɑ tɛtɛ. Nu ben ɑluwɑɑsibɑ mwɛɛrɑ nu dɔrɑ nu kɑ wɑ nu kurɔ tɑnɔbu dwe. Mɑ nu wɔndiɑbɑ mwɛɛrɑ nu dɔrɑ nu kɑ tɑm nɔ.
Sɔ̃ɔ u koo yɑm tĩrɑ, kpɑ suru u swɛ̃rɑ nge yɛm, Yinni Gusunɔn tɔ̃ɔ nɑnumgii te, tu sere tunumɑ. Bɛɛ Tirigibu kɑ Sidonigibu kɑ sere be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Filisitibɑn temɔ, mbɑ i kĩ nɛn mi. I kĩ i mɑn mɔru kɔsiɑwɑ? Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, nɑ ǹ tɛɛmɔ n kɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ mɔru kɔsie.
Adɑmɑ yen tɔ̃ɔ te, wi u Yinni Gusunɔ sokɑ, u koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Gɑbu bɑ koo kisirɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑ ten di Siɔnin guurɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. Beyɑ be u sokɑ bɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ. Wee i nɛn sii geesu kɑ nɛn wurɑ kɑ nɛn ɑrumɑni gurɑ. Mɑ i dɑ i ye kpuro yi bɛɛn bũu sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ.
Mɑ i Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu mwɛɛrɑ i Gɛrɛkibɑ dɔre. Nge mɛyɑ i kɑ bu tondɑsiɑ ben tem di.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, kon kɑ bu wurɑmɑ mi bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Kon de kɔ̃sɑ ye i bu kuɑ mi, yu wɔri bɛɛn wiru wɔllɔ.
Kon bɛɛn bibu Yudɑbɑ dɔre. Kpɑ be mɑɑ, bu be Sɑbegibu dɔre, be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ n tomɑ. Yeniwɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ.
Yoɛli u nɛɛ, i bwese tukunu nɔɔsio bu tɑbun sɔɔru ko. Nu tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu seesio, kpɑ bu swɑɑ wɔri, tɑbu kowobu kpuro gesi.
Nu nin nɑɑ tebonu gɔsio tɑkobibɑ, kpɑ nu nin kɔmbɔnu gɔsiɑ yɑɑsi. Be bɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛrurobu, bu tii koowo tɑbu durɔbu.
I seewo fuuku i nɑ. Bɛɛ bwese ni i wɑ̃ɑ turuku, i mɛnnɑmɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ de wunɛn tɑbu kowobu bu nɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ bwesenu kpuro, i seewo i nɑ Yosɑfɑtin wɔwɑ yen mi. Domi miyɑ kon sinɑ n bwese ni nu wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuro siri.
Domi ben nuku kɔ̃surɑ bɑndɑ. I kɔmbɔnu suo i tɔn be gɛ̃ nge dĩɑ ni nu ye. I nɑ i bu munku nge resɛm ye bɑ doke gɑmɑ yerɔ, mɑ yen nim mu kotosu yibɑ.
Wee tɔn wɔru gɑ wee wɔwɑ yèn mi bɑ koo tɔmbu siri. Domi nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ turɑ tè sɔɔ kon nɛn mɔru sɔ̃ɔsi.
Sɔ̃ɔ kɑ suru kun mɑɑ bɑllimɔ. Mɑ kperi yi yɑm tĩrɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ kukirimɔ Siɔnin guurun di. Nɛn nɔɔ gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ Yerusɑlɛmun di. Wɔllu kɑ tem mu yĩirimɔ. Adɑmɑ nɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kɔ̃su. Nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben kuku yeru.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i ko i giɑ mɑ nɛ Gusunɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɛɛn Yinni, nɛ wi nɑ wɑ̃ɑ Siɔniɔ nɛn guu dɛɛrɑru mi. Yerusɑlɛmu kpuro yɑ koo kpɑm ko nɛgiɑ. Tɔn tukobu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ye wɔrimɔ.
Sɑɑ gɑɑ wee yè sɔɔ resɛm yɑ koo geɑ ko sere kɑ gungunu wɔllɔ. Kpɑ sɑbenu nu di mi. Kpɑ nu bom ko mu n kpɑ̃. Yudɑn tem dɑɑnu kpuro nu koo nim koku. Dɑru kokɑ gɑɑ koo yɑri Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerun di, kpɑ yen nim mu dɑ sere Sitimun wɔwɑɔ.
Egibiti yɑ koo kɑm ko, kpɑ Edɔmun tem mu ko bɑnsu. Domi bɑ Yudɑbɑ dɑm dɔre, mɑ bɑ tɑɑrɛ sɑrirugibu go.
Adɑmɑ kon be bɑ tɔmbun yɛm yɑri mi mɔru kɔsiɑ. Kpɑ Yudɑbɑ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben temɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Kpɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ n wɑ̃ɑ Siɔniɔ.
<range>
Amɔsu u sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro Tekoɑɔ. Wiyɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ gɑri kuɑ Isirelibɑn sɔ̃, n kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ yiru tem mu sere yĩirɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Osiɑsiwɑ u bɑndu dii Yudɑɔ, mɑ Yeroboɑmu, Yoɑsin bii u mɑɑ bɑndu dii Isireliɔ.
Amɔsu u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn nɔɔ gɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ Siɔnin guurɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Yɑkɑsu mɑɑ sɑri kpɑrɑ yenɔ, mɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑɑmɛli, ten wii kpiirɑ gberɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Dɑmɑsigibun torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ Gɑlɑdigibu tɑɑkɑ bɑ munkɑ.
Tɛ̃, kon de dɔ̃ɔ u nɑ u sinɑ boko Hɑsɑɛlin yɛnu wɔri, kpɑ u Bɛni Hɑdɑdin sinɑ kpɑɑru di mɑm mɑm.
Kon ben wuu Dɑmɑsin gbɑ̃rɑrun gɑmbobɑ kɔsuku, kpɑ n Bikɑti Afɛnin tɔmbu kpeerɑsiɑ. Kpɑ n Bɛti Edɛnin sunɔ go. Kpɑ n de bu Sirigibu yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ Kiriɔ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Filisitibɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ Isireli dɑbi dɑbinu yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ Edɔmubɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ.
Mɛyɑ kon de bu ben wuu Gɑsɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔku, kpɑ u yen dii geenu di.
Kon Asidɔdun tɔmbu kɑ Asikɑlonin sunɔ kpeerɑsiɑ. Kon Ekoronigibu wɔri. Kpɑ Filisiti be bɑ tie mi kpuro bu kɑm ko. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Fenisibɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ Isireli dɑbi dɑbinu yoru mwɛɛrɑ bɑ Edɔmubɑ nɔmu bɛriɑ. Bɑ ǹ ben ɑrukɑwɑni yibie ye bɑ rɑɑ kɑ bu bɔkuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, kon de bu ben wuu Tiri dɔ̃ɔ sɔku, kpɑ u yen dii geenu di.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Edɔmubɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ ben mɛro bisibu Isirelibɑ nɑɑ swĩi kɑ tɑkobi. Bɑ ǹ bu wɔnwɔndu kue. Ben mɔru kun mɑɑ sure. Mɑ bɑ kɑ bu wɛrɛru sɑ̃ɑ dim dim sɑɑ kpuro.
Yen sɔ̃, kon de bu ben wuu Temɑ dɔ̃ɔ sɔku kpɑ u Botisirɑn dii geenu di.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Amɔnibɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ gurigibun nukunu bɛsukɑ Gɑlɑdiɔ, sɑɑ ye bɑ Gɑlɑdigii ben tem mwɑɑmɔ begim mu kɑ yɑsiɑn sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, kon de bu ben wuu Rɑbɑ tɑbu wɔri bu ye dɔ̃ɔ sɔku, kpɑ u yen dii geenu di mɑm mɑm. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, tɑbun wurenu koo nɔɔrɑ nge woo bɔkɔ.
Kpɑ bu ben sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu sinɑmbu yoru mwɛɛri. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Mɔɑbubɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ Edɔmun sinɑ bokon kukunu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni nu kuɑ torom.
Yen sɔ̃, kon de bu Mɔɑbubɑn tem dɔ̃ɔ mɛni kpɑ u ben wuu Keriɔtun dii geenu di mɑm mɑm. Kpɑ Mɔɑbu be, bu kɑm ko tɑbu gberɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ tɑbu swĩɑ bɑ kɔbi soomɔ, bɑ kuuki mɔ̀.
Kon ben sinɑ boko kɑ win tɑbu sinɑmbu kpuro kpeerɑsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, Yudɑbɑn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi bɑ nɛn woodɑbɑ yinɑ. Bɑ ǹ ye mɛm nɔɔwɛ. Mɑ bɑ bũnun weesu swĩi, ni ben bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ rɑɑ swĩi. Mɑ nu derɑ bɑ gɛrɑ nɛn swɑɑn di.
Yen sɔ̃, kon de bu ben tem dɔ̃ɔ mɛni. Kpɑ u ben wuu Yerusɑlɛmun dii geenu di mɑm mɑm.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛn torɑnu nu kpɛ̃ɑ. Yen sɔ̃, nɑ ǹ nɛn himbɑ gɔsiɑmɔ. Domi i gemgibu dɔrɑ i kɑ bɛɛn dibu wɑ i mwɑ. Mɑ i kɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu bɑrɑnun gobi kɔsinɑmɔ.
I rɑ n kĩwɑ i wɔnwɔndobu tɑɑre kpɑ bɑ n wiru tuɑ sɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Kpɑ i n bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu dɑm dɔremɔ. Bii kɑ bɑɑ bɑ kɑ kurɔ turo mɛnnɑmɔ. Nge mɛyɑ i kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn yĩsi dɛɛrɑru sɑnkumɔ.
I rɑ n kpĩ kpĩ bɛɛn bũnun nuunɔ yɑ̃nu wɔllɔ ni i tɔrubɑ mwɑ, kpɑ i n tɑm nɔrumɔ mɛ i yokumɑ.
Kɑ mɛ, nɑ Amɔrebɑ kɑm koosiɑ mɑm mɑm bɛɛn sɔ̃, be, be bɑ gunu nge dɑ̃ɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ sɛduru. Mɑ bɑ dɑm mɔ nge dɑ̃ɑ dɑmgiɑ.
Mɛyɑ nɑ bɛɛ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin tem di. Mɑ nɑ bɛɛ kpɑrɑ gbɑburɔ wɔ̃ɔ weeru n kɑ bɛɛ Amɔre ben tem wɛ̃.
Nɑ sɔmɔbu seeyɑ bɛɛn bibu sɔɔ. Mɑ nɑ gɑbu gɔsɑ nɛn sɔ̃ bɛɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ mɑn tii wɛ̃ bɑ bɔ̃ruɑ bu ku tɑm nɔ. Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ geemɑ? Nge weesɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni bikiɑmɔ.
I derɑ be nɑ gɔsɑ mi, bɑ tɑm nɔrɑ. Mɑ i nɛn sɔmɔbu woodɑ wɛ̃ i nɛɛ, bu ku mɑɑ tɔmbu nɛn gɑri sɔ̃.
Wee tɛ̃, kon bɛɛ munku muku muku nge mɛ nɑɑ kɛkɛ ye yɑ dĩɑnu sɔɔwɑ yɑ rɑ tem kɔsuku.
Yen dɔmɑ te, wɑsi kɑsɑnugibɑ kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu dukɑ su. Dɑmgibɑ kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu ben dɑm dendi bu kɑ gɑ̃ɑnu ko. Mɛyɑ tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibɑ kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu ben wɑ̃ɑru wɔrɑ.
Tɛn towobɑ kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu kɑ tii yinɑ. Be bɑ mɑɑ nɑɑsu sɑ̃u, bɑ ǹ kisirɑmɔ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑsɔbɑ kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu we ben dumin dukin sɑɑbu.
Be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu be sɔɔ dɔmɑ te, bɑ koo ben tɑbu yɑ̃nu kɔ̃wɑ bu duki su nɔm dirɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
I swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ gerumɔ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kpuron sɔ̃, bɛɛ be nɑ yɑrɑmɑ Egibitin di.
Hɑnduniɑn bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ, bɛɛ tɔnɑwɑ nɑ gɔsɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ bɛɛn durum ye i kuɑ kpuron sɔ̃.
Tɔmbu yiru bɑ koo swɑɑ wɔri sɑnnu bɑ kun ginɑ nɔɔsinɛ?
Gbee sunɔ gɑ rɑ gbɑ̃re yɑkɑsɔ gɑ kun yɑɑ mwɛ ro? Gbee sunɔ buu gɑ rɑ kukiri gen kpin yerun di gɑ kun yɑɑ wɑ gɑ dimɔ?
Gunɔ gɑ koo tɑɑ mwɑɑrɑ temɔ bɑ kun ye bɛri? Tɑɑ yɑ koo se wɔllɔ gɑ̃ɑnu kun ye kɛsie?
Bɑ rɑ tɑbun kɔbɑ so wuuɔ wuugibu bɑ kun nɑnde? Kɛ̃siru gɑru tɑ rɑ koore wuuɔ n kun nɛn min di?
Aɑwo, nɑ ku rɑ gɑ̃ɑnu gɑnu ko nɑ kun yè nɛn sɔmɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Gbee sunɔ gɑ̀ n gbɑ̃rɑ, wɑrɑ ku rɑ nɑnde. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ̀ n gɑri geruɑ, nɛn sɔmɔ wɑrɑ kun yi kpɑrɑmɔ.
I Asidɔdu kɑ Egibitin tem sinɑ kpɑɑnugibu nɔɔgiru sueyo i nɛɛ, bu mɛnnɑmɑ Sɑmɑrin guunɔ, kpɑ bu wɑ dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ kɑ dɑm dɔrenɑɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ben suunu sɔɔ.
Bɑ ku rɑ kɑ̃ bu geɑ ko. Mɑ bɑ ɑrumɑni gurɑmɔ kɑ dɑm kɑ tɑki, bɑ tɑɑsimɔ ben sinɑ kpɑɑnɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de yibɛrɛbɑ bu nɑ bu tem mɛ tɑrusi, bu ben dɑm kpeerɑsiɑ. Kpɑ bu ben sinɑ kpɑɑnu kɔsuku. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee ye nɑ mɑɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, nge mɛ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro u rɑ win sɑbenun sukum wɔre gbee sunɔn nɔɔn di, nge mɛyɑ kon bɛɛ Isirelibɑ wɔrɑ bɛɛ be i nɑ i sɔ̃ Sɑmɑriɔ kpin yee burɑnu sɔɔ.
I swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ kpɑ i Yɑkɔbun bweseru kirɔ ko i bu sɔ̃ ye nɛ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni nɑ geruɑ.
Nɑ nɛɛ, sɑnɑm mɛ sɔɔ, kon Isirelibɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ ben durum sɔ̃. Kon Betɛlin yɑ̃ku turɑnu kɔsuku, kpɑ nin kɑ̃ɑnu nu bɔɔkirɑ nu wɔruku.
Kon bɛɛn diɑ mi i rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ yɑm susurun sɑɑ kɑ purɑn sɑɑ kɔsuku. Kpɑ n bɛɛn sinɑ kpɑɑnu kɑm koosiɑ ni, ni bɑ burɑru koosi kɑ suunu donnu, kɑ sere dii gee ni nu tie. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Bɛɛ Sɑmɑrin tɔn kurɔbu, bɛɛ be i dimɔ i bɔriɑmɔ nge Bɑsɑnin nɑɑ gbiibi yi yi wɑ̃ɑ Sɑmɑrin guurɔ, i wɔnwɔndobu dɑm dɔremɔ, i bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu tɑki dimɔ, mɑ i bɛɛn durɔbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ bu kɑ tɑm nɑ i nɔ. Tɛ̃, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bɔ̃rumɔ kɑ nɛn tiin yĩsi dɛɛrɑru nɑ mɔ̀, wee sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ bɑ koo bɛɛ kɑ bɛɛn bibun bweseru kɔkɔnu sɔre bu gɑwɑ nge swɛ̃ɛ.
Bɛɛn bɑɑwure u koo yɑri kururun di kpɑ bu bɛɛ kubɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i doo yɑ̃ku yee ten mi Betɛliɔ, kpɑ i n mɑn torɑrimɔ. I doo Giligɑliɔ, kpɑ i n mɑn torɑrimɔ nge mɛ̀n nɔɔ i ko kpĩ. I n bɛɛn yɑ̃kunu mɔ̀ bururu bɑɑtere, kpɑ i n kɑ bɛɛn kɛ̃nu nɑɑmɔ sɔ̃ɔ itɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ itɑ.
I bɛɛn siɑrɑbun yɑ̃kunu koowo kɑ pɛ̃ɛ ye bɑ seeyɑtiɑ doke. Kpɑ i tɔmbu sɔ̃ mɑ i kɛ̃nu kuɑ kɑ kĩru. Domi yerɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ i kĩru bo. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
N wee nɑ derɑ gɔ̃ɔrɑ duɑ bɛɛn wuu mɑrosu kpuro sɔɔ. Mɑ i dĩɑnu biɑ bɛɛn yɛnusu kpuro sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛn mi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ yinɑ gurɑ yu nɛ ye n tie suru itɑ bu kɑ dĩɑnu gɛ̃. Nɑ derɑ gurɑ yɑ nɑ wusu gɑsun mi. Mɑ nɑ ǹ wure yu nɛ gɑsun mi. Nɑ derɑ yɑ nɑ gbenu gɑnu sɔɔ. Mɑ nɑ ǹ wure yu nɛ gɑnun mi. Mɑ nu gberɑ.
Yerɑ bɛɛn wusu gɑsun tɔmbu bɑ dɑ wuu gɑgun mi bu kɑ nim wɑ bu nɔ. Adɑmɑ ben nim nɔru gɑ ǹ kpɑ. Kɑ mɛ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛn mi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Nɑ derɑ bɛɛn dĩɑnu kusenu kuɑ, mɑ twee yi nɑ yi bɛɛn gbeɑn dĩɑnu kɑ bɛɛn dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑnun wurusu kpuro di. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛ Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinnin mi.
Nɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ kɛ̃si kɛ̃si bɑrɑru sure nge mɛ nɑ kuɑ Egibitiɔ. Nɑ derɑ bɑ bɛɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ go tɑbu sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ ben dumi mwɛɛrɑ. Nɑ derɑ i bɛɛn tɔn be bɑ gun nuburu nuɑ bɛɛn sɑnsɑniɔ. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛn mi.
Nɑ bɛɛ surɑ nɑ kɔsukɑ nge Sodomu kɑ Gomɔrɑ ye nɑ kɑm koosiɑ. Mɑ i kuɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ ge bɑ wunɑ dɔ̃ɔn di. Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, i ǹ gɔsirɑmɛ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn mi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kon bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i n sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ i n kɑ nɛ Gusunɔ bɛɛn Yinnin siribu mɑrɑ.
Domi nɛnɑ nɑ guunu mɔmɑ, mɑ nɑ woo tɑkɑ kuɑ. Nɑ rɑ nɛn bwisikunu tɔnu giɑsie. Nɑ rɑ mɑɑ yɑm bururɑm gɔsie yɑm wɔ̃kuru, kpɑ nɑ n sĩimɔ guunu wɔllɔ. Nɛn yĩsirɑ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ gɔɔ swĩi yi nɑ mɔ̀ bɛɛn sɔ̃.
Bɛɛ be i wɔrumɛ temɔ nge wɔndiɑ be bɑ gu, i ǹ mɑɑ seemɔ. Goo sɑri wi u koo bɛɛ seeyɑ.
Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛn wuu ge gɑ tɑbu durɔbu nɔrɔbu (1.000) mɔ, bɑ̀ n tɑbu dɑ, tɔmbu wunɔbuwɑ (100) bɑ koo wurɑmɑ. Ge gɑ mɑɑ tɑbu durɔbu wunɔbu mɔ, tɔmbu wɔkurɑ bɑ koo tiɑ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ sɔ̃ɔmɔ. U nɛɛ; ì n kĩ i n wɑ̃ɑ, wiyɑ i ko kɑsu.
I ku mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑru dɑ Betɛliɔ kɑ Giligɑliɔ kɑ Beri Sebɑɔ. Domi u koo de bu Giligɑligibu yoru mwɛɛri. Kpɑ bu Betɛligibu kɑm koosiɑ.
Bɛɛ be i rɑ gem gɔsie weesu, kpɑ i kun mu gɑrisi gɑ̃ɑnu, i nɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔn mi, kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ u ku rɑɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ wɔri u mwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ. Kpɑ i goo biɑ Betɛliɔ wi u koo dɔ̃ɔ wi go.

Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u kperi bwese bwesekɑ kuɑ, mɑ u yen bɑɑyere yi yen ɑyerɔ. U rɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru gɔsie yɑm bururɑm. Kpɑ u de sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gu tĩrɑ, gu gɔsiɑ wɔ̃kuru. U rɑ nim wɔ̃kun nim mɛnnɛ, kpɑ u mu yɛ̃kɑnɑ tem kpuro sɔɔ.
Wiyɑ u rɑ dɑmgibun dɑm bue. Kpɑ u de bu ben wusun gbɑ̃rɑnu kɔsuku. Kɑ gem, win yĩsirɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, be bɑ bɛɛ sirimɔ dee dee, i rɑ n bu tusɑ, kpɑ i n kɑ wi u gem gerumɔ kɔ̃ruɑ.
I rɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu dɑm dɔre, i n ben gbeɑn dĩɑnu mwɛɛrimɔ kɑ dɑm. Yen sɔ̃, i ǹ sinɑmɔ bɛɛn diɑ sɔɔ ye i bɑnɑ kɑ kpee ni i dɑ̃kɑ. Mɛyɑ i ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛn resɛm ye i duurɑn bii duronun tɑm nɔrumɔ.
Domi u bɛɛn torɑnu yɛ̃ nu kpɑ̃, u mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ i durum kuɑ too. I gemgibu nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ. I nɔm birɑn kɛ̃nu mwɑɑmɔ. Mɑ i yinɑmɔ bu sɑ̃ɑrobu ben gem wɛ̃ siri yerɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛni, sɑnɑm kɔ̃sumɑ. Yen sɔ̃, wi u lɑɑkɑri mɔ, wiyɑ u ko n nɔɔ mɑɑri.
I de i n geɑ mɔ̀ n kun mɔ kɔ̃sɑ. Kpɑ i wɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ. Nge mɛyɑ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u ko n kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ nge mɛ i rɑ gere.
I kɔ̃sɑ tusio kpɑ i geɑ kĩɑ. I de gem mu siribu di siri yerɔ. Sɔrɔkudo Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u koo bɛɛ Isirelibɑn tɔn be bɑ tiɑrɑ wɔnwɔndu kuɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u geruɑ u nɛɛ, tɔmbɑ koo gɔɔ wuri ko yɑm kpuro, kpɑ bɑ n sumɔ swɛɛ sɔɔ, bɑ n mɔ̀, wee, wee! Bɑ koo gbɑɑ wukobu sokumɑ bu gɔɔ wooru sinɑ, kpɑ bu gɔɔ swĩigibu mɛnnɑmɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u koo bɛɛ wɔrimɑ, kɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ gberɔ kpuro bɑ koo gɔɔ swĩwɑ. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Bɔ̃rurobɑ bɛɛ be i Yinni Gusunɔn siribun tɔ̃ru mɑrɑ. Mbɑ i yĩiyɔ i wɑ tɔ̃ɔ te sɔɔ. I n yɛ̃ mɑ tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru, n ǹ mɔ yɑm bururɑm.
I ko i n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge tɔnu wi u gbee sunɔ dukɑ suurimɔ, mɑ u kɑ yɑɑ gɔbɑ gɑɑ yinnɑ. Ye u duɑ win dirɔ u gɑnɑ nɛnuɑ, mɑ wɑɑ yɑ nùn dɔmɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔn tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru n ǹ mɔ yɑm bururɑm. Tɑ tĩriwɑ niki niki, yɑm bururɑm sɑri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, u bɛɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ ni i rɑ nùn diiye tusɑ. U ǹ mɑm mɑɑ kĩ u bɛɛn mɛnnɔsun woo nɔ.
Ì n nùn yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru kuɑ kɑ mɑɑ kɛ̃nu, u ku rɑ nu mwɛ. Mɛyɑ u ku rɑ mɑɑ bɛɛn siɑrɑbun yɑ̃kunu mɛɛri ni i rɑ ko kɑ yɑɑ sɑbe ni nu gum mɔ.
I kɑ bɛɛn womusun wɔkinu doonɔ win bɔkun di. U ǹ mɑɑ kĩ u bɛɛn mɔrɔkunun wurenu nɔ.
Adɑmɑ i de gem mu n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ, mu n kokumɔ nge nim mɛ mu ku rɑ kpe.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i kɑ kuɑ wɔ̃ɔ weeru gbɑburu sɔɔ, i nùn yɑ̃kunu kɑ kɛ̃nu kuɑre nge mɛ?
Bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Sɑkutu wi i gɑrisi bɛɛn sunɔ kɑ sere kperɑ ye i sɑ̃ɑmɔ i mɔ̀ Kewɑni, i nin bwɑ̃ɑroku ni i tii kuɑ sɔɔre nge mɛ i sɔɔwɑ gisɔ? Bɛɛn tii i yɛ̃ mɑ i ǹ koore mɛ.
Yen sɔ̃, u koo de bu bɛɛ yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ sere Dɑmɑsin berɑ giɔ. Wi, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Bɔ̃rurobɑ bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Siɔniɔ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ, kɑ bɛɛ be i sɔ̃ Sɑmɑrin guurɔ kɑ toro sindu. Mɑ i tɑmɑɑ i sɑ̃ɑ bwese te tɑ kpɑ̃ɑru bon wirugibu. Mɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ somiru mɑrɑ bɛɛn min di.
I doo Kɑlinɛɔ i wɑ. Min di, kpɑ i dɑ Hɑmɑtiɔ wuu bɔkɔ gen mi. Kpɑ i sɑrɑ i dɑ Gɑtiɔ Filisitibɑn temɔ. Ben wuu si, su bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kɑ Yudɑbɑn wusu geɑ turɑ? Ben tem mɛ, mu bɛɛn tem kpɑ̃ɑru turɑ?
Wee i ǹ kĩ wɑhɑlɑn tɔ̃ru tu bɛɛ nɑɑwɑ. Mɑ i sere tii dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ gɑwemɔ. Mɑ yɑ bɑndu dii bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Mɑ i kpĩ sɑu kpin yee burɑnu sɔɔ, nì bɑ burɑru kuɑ kɑ suunu donnu. I tii yɑ̃ɑ kpɛmminu kɑ nɑɑ kpɛmi yi yi gum mɔ gɔsiɑmmɛ gɔ̃sun di i temmɔ.
I mɔrɔkunu soomɔ i womusu mɔ̀ bwisikunu sɑriru sɔɔ. Mɑ i tɑmɑɑ i nin soberu yɛ̃wɑ nge Dɑfidi.
I tɑm nɔrumɔ kɑ nɔri bɛkɛ. I tii gum turɑregim sɑwɑmɔ. Mɑ i ǹ nuki sɑnkire yèn sɔ̃ bɛɛn bweseru tɑ koo kɑm ko.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ koo gbi bu bɛɛ yoru mwɛɛri bu kɑ doonɑ kpɑ bɛɛn nuku dobun kuuki kɑ bɛɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ dim mu kpe.
Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u bɔ̃ruɑ kɑ win tiin wɑ̃ɑru u nɛɛ, u ǹ bɛɛ Isirelibɑn tii suɑbu kĩ. U mɑɑ bɛɛn sinɑ kpɑɑnu tusɑ. U koo de bu Sɑmɑri mwɑ kɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ye sɔɔ kpuro.
Tɔmbu wɔkuru bɑ̀ n tie yɛnu gɑgu sɔɔ, bɑ koo gbiwɑ.
Goo ù n win tɔnun goru suɑ yɛnun di u kɑ yɑrɑ u dɔɔ u dɔ̃ɔ mɛni, u koo wi u wɑ̃ɑ yɛnu sɔɔwɔ bikiɑ u nɛɛ, goo mɑɑ tie u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wunɛ? Kpɑ yɛ̃ro u nùn wisi u nɛɛ, goo sɑri. Kpɑ wini u nɛɛ, ɑ mɑrio. N ǹ weenɛ su Gusunɔn yĩsiru siɑ sɑɑ yeni sɔɔ kpɑ u sun sĩiremɑ.
Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u woodɑ yeni wɛ̃ u nɛɛ, u koo yɛnusu kpuro kɔsukuwɑ, bɑkɑsu kɑ piiminu.
Bɑ rɑ dumi yɑkie kpee sɑɑrɑ wɔllɔ? Bɑ rɑ kɑ nɛɛ wuku mi? Adɑmɑ wee bɛɛ i gem gɔsiɑ dɛ̃ɛ. Mɑ i geɑ gɔsiɑ gɑ̃ɑ sosurɑnu.
Bɛɛ i nuku dobu mɔ̀ kɑm sɔɔ, mɑ i gerumɔ i mɔ̀, bɛɛn tiin dɑmɑ i kɑ nɑsɑrɑ wɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u nɛɛ, u koo de bwese tukuru gɑru tu bɛɛ seesi. Kpɑ tu bɛɛ dɑm dɔre sɑɑ Hɑmɑtin duu yerun di sere n kɑ dɑ nim torɑɔ ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbɑburun berɑ giɑ mi gɑ̃ɑnu ku rɑ kpi.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ nɑ wɑ kɑ̃siru sɔɔ. Tweeyɑ u derɑ yi kɔwɑrɑ dɑbi dɑbinu sɑnɑm mɛ yɑkɑsu kpɑrɑm wee si sinɑ boko u rɑɑ bɔɔrɑ win yɑɑ sɑbenun sɔ̃.
Sɑnɑm mɛ yi tem min yɑkɑ si kpuro di, yerɑ nɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ suuru koowo. Amɔnɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru tɑ ko n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Domi tɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen di. U nɛɛ, yeni yɑ ǹ mɑɑ koorɑmɔ.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ derɑ nɑ wɑ kɑ̃siru gɑru sɔɔ. U nɛɛ, u koo tɔmbu sɛɛyɑsiɑ kɑ dɔ̃ɔ. Kpɑ u de dɔ̃ɔ wi, u nim mɛ mu wɑ̃ɑ tem sɔɔwɔ gberɑsiɑ kpɑ u Isirelibɑn tem kpuro di.
Mɑ nɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ ye yɔ̃rɑsio. Amɔnɑ Yɑkɔbun bweseru tɑ ko n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Domi tɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen di u nɛɛ, yenin tii yɑ ǹ mɑɑ koorɑmɔ.
Wee ye nɑ mɑɑ wɑ kɑ̃siru gɑru sɔɔ. Nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wɑ u yɔ̃ gɑnɑɔ mɑ u nifoo nɛni.
Mɑ u mɑn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ mi. Nɑ nùn wisɑ nɑ nɛɛ, nifoo. Mɑ u mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, nifoowɑ kon kɑ nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ yĩire nge gɑnɑ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ bu suuru kuɑmmɛ.
Kon ben sikɑdo Isɑkin bũu turɑnu kɔsuku, kpɑ n Isirelin sɑ̃ɑ yenu suriri, kpɑ n Yeroboɑmun bɑndu surɑ kɑ tɑkobi n tu kpeerɑsiɑ.
Yerɑ Amɑsiɑ Betɛlin yɑ̃ku kowo u Yeroboɑmu Isirelibɑn sinɑ boko gɔriɑ u nɛɛ, wee Amɔsu u nun seesimɔ Isirelibɑn suunu sɔɔ. Win gɑri yi u mɑɑ geruɑ mi, yi tɔmbu kpuro burisinɑ.
Domi u nɛɛ, wunɛ Yeroboɑmu, bɑ koo nun gowɑ tɑbu sɔɔ kɑ tɑkobi. Kpɑ bu Isirelibɑ yoru mwɛɛri ben tem di bu kɑ dɑ mi n tomɑ.
Yen biruwɑ Amɑsiɑ u nɑ Amɔsun mi, u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, Gusunɔn sɔmɔ wunɛ, ɑ doo Yudɑn tem giɑ, kpɑ ɑ n wunɛn gɑri yi mɔ̀ mi, ɑ kɑ wɑ ɑ n dimɔ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ ku mɑɑ Gusunɔn gɑri gere Betɛli mi, domi yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sinɑ boko kɑ Isirelibɑ kpuron sɑ̃ɑ yeru.
Mɑ Amɔsu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔn bɔ̃ɔ. Nɛ, yɑ̃ɑ kpɑrowɑ. Sikɑmɔrewɑ nɑ rɑ yewe.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn gɔsɑ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kpɑrɑmɔ. U mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, n doo n win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ win gɑri sɔ̃.
Tɛ̃, ɑ swɑɑ dɑkio ɑ Yinni Gusunɔn gɑri nɔ. Wunɛ Amɑsiɑ, wunɛ wi ɑ nɛɛ, n ku Isirelibɑ Gusunɔn gɑri sɔ̃.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. U nɛɛ, wunɛn kurɔ u koo sɑkɑrɑru ko wuu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu wunɛn bibu go tɑbu sɔɔ, kpɑ bu wunɛn gberu bɔnu ko, domi wunɛn tii kɑɑ gbi tem tukumɔ mi n tomɑ, mi bɑ koo kɑ Isirelibɑ dɑ bu yoru di.
Wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔsi kɑ̃si teni sɔɔ. Nɑ dɑ̃ɑ mɑrum wɑ bireru sɔɔ mɛ mu ye.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, mbɑ nɑ wɑɑmɔ mi. Nɑ nùn wisɑ nɑ nɛɛ, dɑ̃ɑ mɑrumɑ nɑ wɑ mɛ mu ye. Yerɑ u mɑɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ yɑ turɑ u kɑ win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ sɛɛyɑsiɑ. U ǹ mɑɑ bu suuru kuɑmmɛ.
U mɑɑ nɛɛ, yen tɔ̃ɔ te, sinɑ kpɑɑrun womusu koo gɔsiɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun womusu. Kpɑ tɔn dɑbinun gonu nu n tɛrie bɑɑmɑ. Kpɑ yɑm mu n mɑɑri sɔ̃ɔ sɔ̃ɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, i swɑɑ dɑkio bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑrobu dɑm dɔremɔ. Mɑ i bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbu kɑm koosiɑmɔ.
I mɔ̀, dommɑ suru kpɑon tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrɑ koo kpe. Kpɑ su wɑ su bɛsɛn ɑlikɑmɑ dɔrɑ. Dommɑ tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑrugirɑ koo kpe, kpɑ su wɑ su bɛsɛn birɑnu wukiɑ. Sɑ ko sɑkɑku kɑwɑ, kpɑ su yen gobi sosi. Sɑ ko kilo gɔsiɑ su kɑ tɔmbu gbɛni. Kpɑ su doo sĩinu dɔrɑ.
Sɑ ko wɔnwɔndobu dwe kɑ gobi, kpɑ su sɑ̃ɑrobu kɑ bɑrɑnun gobi kɔsinɑ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ bɔ̃ruɑ kɑ nɛn tiin yĩsiru nɑ nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ duɑrimɔ.
Bɛɛn tem mu koo yĩiri, kpɑ bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu i n gɔɔ wooru sɔ̃. Tem mɛ kpuro mu koo kuke kpɑ mu sure nge Egibitin dɑɑrun nim.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ kon de sɔ̃ɔ u du sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ gbɑ̃ɑrɑ kpɑ yɑm mu tĩrɑ.
Kon bɛɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnu gɔsiɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu, kpɑ bɛɛn womusu su n sɑ̃ɑ weeweenu. Kpɑ bɛɛn bɑɑwure u sɑɑkibɑ doke u n wii pɔɔru pote nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Kon de tɔmbu bɑ n nuki sɑnkire tem mɛ sɔɔ nge be bɑ ben bii teereru bie. Tɔ̃ɔ te, tɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑrugiru.
Wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, kon de gɔ̃ɔru tu du tem mɛ sɔɔ. N ǹ mɔ dĩɑnun gɔ̃ɔru, n ǹ mɑɑ mɔ nim nɔru. Adɑmɑ nɛn gɑrin gɔ̃ɔru kɑ yin nim nɔruwɑ i ko i n mɔ.
I ko i n yɑrinɛwɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑn di n kɑ dɑ sɔ̃ɔ duu yerɔ, sɑɑ mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di n kɑ dɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerɔ, i n bɔsu bɑɑmɑ, i n kɑsu i nɛn gɑri nɔ. Adɑmɑ i ǹ wɑsi i yi nɔ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɛɛn wɔndiɑ burɔbu kɑ bɛɛn ɑluwɑɑsibɑ bɑ koo gbi nim nɔrun sɑɑbu.
Be bɑ bɔ̃rumɔ kɑ Sɑmɑrigibun bũnun yĩsiru bɑ mɔ̀, kɑ bũu wi u wɑ̃ɑ Dɑnuɔn wɑ̃ɑru, ǹ kun mɛ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Beri Sebɑɔ, be kpurowɑ kon de bu wɔruku, kpɑ bu kpɑnɑ bu se.
Amɔsu, u Yinni Gusunɔ wɑ u yɔ̃ sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑ̃ku yerɔ. Mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, u sɑ̃ɑ yerun gberebɑ soowo sɑɑ ben wɔllun di kpɑ tem mu diiri, kpɑ bu wɔruku bu tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi kpuron winu kɔsuku. Kpɑ wi, Yinni Gusunɔ u de bu be bɑ tie go tɑbu sɔɔ kɑ tɑkobi. Bɑɑ ben goo kun kpɛ̃ u kisirɑ u doonɑ.
Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n kukuɑ gɔriɔ, win nɔmu gɑ koo bu yɑrɑmɑ. Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n yɔɔwɑ wɔllɔ, u koo bu sɑrɑsiɑmɑ.
Bɑ̀ n dɑ bɑ kukuɑ guu te bɑ mɔ̀ Kɑɑmɛlin wii kpiirɔ, u koo bu kɑsu, kpɑ u bu mwɑ. Bɑ̀ n numɑ nim wɔ̃kun sɔɔwɔ, u koo de wɑɑ bɑkɑ yu bu dwɛ̃ɛ migum.
Ben yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ̀ n mɑɑ bu yoru mwɛɛrɑ, u koo de yibɛrɛ be, bu bu go kɑ tɑkobi. U ko n bu nɔni girɑriwɑ, kpɑ u bu kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, n ǹ mɔ geɑ.
Mɑ Amɔsu u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u tem bɑbɑ, mɑ mu kɔsikirɑ. Mɑ mɛn tɔmbu kpuro bɑ gɔɔ wooru sɔ̃. Mɛ kpuro mu kukumɔ, mɑ mu suremɔ nge Egibitin dɑɑ bɑkɑ te bɑ mɔ̀ Nilun nim.
U win wɑ̃ɑ yeru bɑnɑ wɔllɔ, mɑ u derɑ wɔllɑ kuɑ tem girum kpɛɛru. U nim wɔ̃kun nim mɛnnɑ, mɑ u mu yɛ̃kɑ tem sɔɔ. Win yĩsirɑ Yinni Gusunɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i ǹ Etiopigibu kere nɛn nɔni sɔɔ. Geemɑ, nɑ bɛɛ yɑrɑ Egibitin tem di. Adɑmɑ nɑ mɑɑ Filisitibɑ yɑrɑ Kɑfitorin di. Mɑ nɑ mɑɑ Sirigibu yɑrɑ Kirin di.
Wee, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ Isirelibɑn bɑndu nɔni girɑri, domi tɑ torɑ. Kon tu kpeerɑsiɑwɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ n ǹ mɔ Isirelibɑ kpurowɑ kon kpeerɑsiɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Wee, kon nɛn woodɑbɑ wɛ̃, kpɑ n Isirelibɑ sĩire bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ dobi sĩire, bɑɑ yen bin teeru tɑ kun kɑ wɔrɑ.
Nɛn tɔn be bɑ durum mɔ̀, mɑ bɑ gerumɔ bɑ mɔ̀, nɑ ǹ bu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru suremɔ, bɑ koo be kpuro gowɑ tɑbu sɔɔ.
Tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon Dɑfidin bɑndu seeyɑ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge yɛnu ge gɑ bɑnsu kuɑ. Kon tu sɔmɛ, kpɑ tu se tu wurɑmɑ nge yellu.
Kpɑ bu wɑ bu Edɔmubɑn tem kɑ bwese tuku ni nu rɑɑ mɑn sɑ̃ɑmɔn tem mwɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ kon yeni ko.
Wee sɑɑ yɑ sisi yè sɔɔ bɑ̀ n gɑ̃, n ǹ tɛɛmɔ bu kɑ kpɑm duure. Bɑ̀ n resɛm duurɑ, n ǹ tɛɛmɔ bu kɑ ye gɑmɑ. Bɑɑ kɑ guunu wɔllɔ resɛm yɑ koo kpiwɑ yɑ n tɛrie bu kɑ tɑm ko.
Kon nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ yɑkiɑ yorun di. Kpɑ bu wure bu wuu si su rɑɑ bɑnsu kuɑ seeyɑ bu sinɑ mi. Bɑ koo resɛmbɑ duure, kpɑ bu yen tɑm nɔ. Bɑ koo dɑ̃ɑ gbɑɑnu ko, kpɑ bu yen mɑrum di.
Kon den bu girɑwɑ n sire dim dim nge dɑ̃ɑ, bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben temɔ mɛ nɑ bu wɛ̃ mi. Goo kun mɑɑ bu wukɑmɔ mɛ sɔɔn di. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Gɑri wee yi Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, Abudiɑsi u gere Edɔmubɑn sɔ̃. Yinni Gusunɔ u sɔmɔ gɔrɑ bwese tukunun suunu sɔɔ u nɛɛ, nu seewo nu Edɔmubɑ tɑbu wɔri.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Edɔmubɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ sɑɑ Abudiɑsin nɔɔn di u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Edɔmubɑ, kon bɛɛ ko bwese dɑm sɑrirugiru bwesenu kpuro sɔɔ. Tɔmbu kpuro bɑ koo bɛɛ gɛm.
Wee bɛɛn tii suɑbu bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ, mɑ i sɔ̃ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ mì goo kun kpɛ̃ u bɛɛ nɑɑ turi. Mɑ i tii sɔ̃ɔmɔ i mɔ̀, wɑrɑ u koo sun surɑ minin di.
Yen sɔ̃, i n yɛ̃ mɑ bɑɑ ì n dɑ sere mi gunɔ bɑkeru tɑ ten sokuru mɔ, ǹ kun mɛ, i duɑ kperiɔ i bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑ yenu kuɑ mi, kon bɛɛ sɑrɑsiɑmɑ. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Gbɛnɔbu bɑ̀ n nɑ bɑ bɛɛ wɔri subɑru sɔɔ wɔ̃kuru, bɑ koo bɛɛn yɑ̃nu gurɑwɑ. Bɑ̀ n bɛɛn resɛm gbeɑ wɔri, bɑ koo ye sɔriwɑ, kpɑ bu bɛɛ fiiko deriɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ Esɑun bibun bweseru, yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo bɛɛn ɑrumɑni gurɑ, bɑɑ kɑ bɛɛn dukiɑ ye yɑ beruɑ.
Be i rɑɑ kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ, bɑ koo bɛɛ tɔnu kɑndu kuɑ, kpɑ bu bɛɛ girɑ sere bɛɛn tem nɔɔ burɑ yerɔ. Be bɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn bɔrɔbɑ, bɑ koo bɛɛ dɑm dɔre. Kɑ be i rɑ rɑɑ di sɑnnu, bɑ koo bɛɛ yinɑ bɛriɑ. Adɑmɑ i ǹ ye tubumɔ.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛɛ, nɛn mɔrun tɔ̃ru sɔɔ, kon bwisigibu kpeerɑsiɑ Edɔmun tem sɔɔ, kpɑ n lɑɑkɑrigibu go.
Bɛɛ Temɑgibu, bɛɛn tɑbu kowobu bɑ koo burisinɑ kpɑ bu be kpuro go.
Bɛɛ Edɔmubɑ, wee i bɛɛn mɛro bisibu Yɑkɔbun bweseru mwɛɛrɑ i go. Yen sɔ̃, i ko i sekuru wɑ. I ko i kɑm kowɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Domi i wɑ̃ɑ mi sɑnɑm mɛ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ Isirelibɑ tɑbu kɑmiɑ mɑ bɑ duɑ ben wusɔ. Mɑ bɑ ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ bɑ tɛtɛ toosi. Bɛɛn tii i sɑ̃ɑ nge yibɛrɛ be.
Bɛɛ Edɔmubɑ, n ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i bɛɛn mɛro bisibu Yudɑbɑ mɛɛri kɑ nuku dobu sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔre. N ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i nuku dobu ko ǹ kun mɛ i bu wɔmɛ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ nuki sɑnkire.
Bɛɛ Edɔmubɑ, n ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i du nɛn tɔmbun wuuɔ sɑnɑm mɛ yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ gu kpeerɑsiɑ. N ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i gen bɑnsu mɛɛri kɑ nuku dobu. N ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i gen dukiɑ gurɑ i tii koosi.
N ǹ dɑɑ weenɛ i yɔ̃rɑ swɑɑ yinnɑ yerɔ i ben be bɑ duki mɔ̀ mwɛɛri i go, ǹ kun mɛ i bu mwɑ i yibɛrɛbɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te sɔɔ.
Domi sɑɑ yɑ turuku kuɑ yè sɔɔ Yinni Gusunɔ u koo bwesenu kpuro siri. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɑ koo bɛɛ kuɑ nge mɛ i gɑbu kuɑ. Kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ mi, yɑ koo wɔriwɑ bɛɛn wiru wɔllɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, i nɛn mɔru ye nɑ kɑ bɛɛ sɛɛyɑsiɑ nɔrɑ nɛn guu dɛɛrɑrun wɔllɔ. Mɛyɑ bwese ni nu tie, nu ǹ kpɛ̃ nu ye nɔ nu kpe. Nu ko n ye nɔrumɔwɑ sere yu kɑ nu go kpɑ nu kpeerɑ mɑm mɑm.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Siɔni koo mɑɑ ko nɛ Gusunɔn guu dɛɛrɑru. Be bɑ yɑrɑ tɑbun di Yɑkɔbun bweseru sɔɔ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ mi, kpɑ bu ben tem mwɑ be bɑ rɑɑ mu mwɑn nɔmɑn di.
Yɑkɔbun bibun bweseru kɑ Yosɛfun bibun bweserɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ. Bɑ koo Esɑun bweseru dɔ̃ɔ mɛniwɑ nge yɑkɑsu. Bɑ koo bu dɔ̃ɔ mɛniwɑ mɑm mɑm, bɑ ǹ goo derimɔ mi. Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ yeni geruɑ.
Yudɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ bɑ koo Edɔmubɑn tem mɛ mwɑ. Be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔwɑɔ, bɑ koo Filisitibɑn tem kɑ Sɑmɑrigim kɑ Efɑrɑimugim mwɑ, kpɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛbɑ bu mɑɑ Gɑlɑdin tem mwɑ.
Isirelibɑn tɑbu kowo be bɑ rɑɑ kpikiru suɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm geu giɑn di, bɑ koo Kɑnɑnibɑn tem mwɑ sere n kɑ dɑ Sɑrepɑtɑɔ. Yerusɑlɛmugii be bɑ mɑɑ kpikiru dɑ Sefɑrɑdiɔ, bɑ koo wuu si su wɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɛ̃sɑn nɔm dwɑru giɑ mwɑ.
Kɑ nɑsɑrɑwɑ bɑ koo Siɔnin guuru yɔ. Min diyɑ bɑ ko n Edɔmubɑ kpɑre. Kpɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u n bɑndu dii!
Sɔ̃ɔ teeru, Yinni Gusunɔ u Yonɑsi, Amitɑin bii sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
Yonɑsi, ɑ seewo ɑ dɑ Ninifu wuu mɑro bɔkɔ gen mi. Kpɑ ɑ nɔɔgiru suɑ ɑ bu gerusi. Domi ben nuku kɔ̃suru tɑ bɑndɑ sere tɑ mɑn girɑri.
Adɑmɑ Yonɑsi u seewɑ u dukɑ suɑ u Tɑɑsisin swɑɑ wɔri, u wɑ u kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ tondɑ. Mɑ u dɑ Yɑfoɔ u goo nimkuu duɑ. Mɑ u yen dɑɑbun gobi kɔsiɑ. Nge mɛyɑ u kɑ Tɑɑsisin swɑɑ wɔri wi kɑ tɔn be bɑ dɔɔ Tɑɑsisi mi sɑnnu u wɑ u kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ tondɑ.
Adɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ woo bɔkɔ gɑ seewɑ nim wɔ̃ku gen mi. Mɑ n sɑ̃ɑre goo ge, gɑ koo nim diirɑ.
Be bɑ goo ge tɛmɑmɔ, bɑ bɛrum soorɑ. Mɑ ben bɑɑwure u win bũu soku. Mɑ bɑ goo gen sɔmunu kɑwɑ bɑ sure nim wɔ̃kuɔ gen bunum mu kɑ kɑɑrɑ. Adɑmɑ Yonɑsi u dɑ u kpĩ u dò mɑm mɑm sere goo gen sɔɔwɔ.
Mɑ goo gen tɛmɔ tɔnwero u susi u Yonɑsi yɑmiɑ u nùn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ dò. A seewo ɑ wunɛn bũu soku. Sɔrɔkudo u koo sun yɑɑyɑ kpɑ sɑ kun kɑm kue.
Mɑ bɑ gerunɑ bɑ nɛɛ, i nɑ su tubu tubu ko kpɑ su kɑ giɑ wìn sɔ̃ kɔ̃sɑ yeni yɑ sun deemɑ. Yerɑ bɑ tubu tubu ye kuɑ. Mɑ yɑ Yonɑsi di.
Yerɑ bɑ nùn bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ sun sɔ̃ɔwɔ wi u sun kɔ̃sɑ yeni kpɑremɔ. Mɑn diyɑ ɑ wee. Amɔnɑ wunɛn yĩsiru. Bwese terɑ̀ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Sɔmbu teren sɔ̃nɑ ɑ wɑ̃ɑ mini.
Mɑ Yonɑsi u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Heberu. Yinni Gusunɔwɑ nɑ rɑ sɑ̃ wi u wɔllu kɑ tem kɑ nim wɔ̃ku tɑkɑ kuɑ.
Yerɑ tɔn be, bɑ nɑndɑ ye bɑ giɑ mɑ Yonɑsi u Yinni Gusunɔ dukɑ suurimɔwɑ domi win tii u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɛ. Mɑ bɑ nùn bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ kuɑ mɛ. Amɔnɑ sɑ ko nun kuɑ nim mɛ, mu kɑ kpunɑ. N deemɑ nim mɛ, mu seemɔ mu dɔɔwɑ.
<range>
Mɑ u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, i mɑn suo i kpɛ̃ɛ nim wɔ̃ku ge sɔɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ nim mɛ, mu koo mɑri. Domi nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ nɛn sɔ̃nɑ woo bɔkɔ geni gɑ seewɑ.
Kɑ mɛ, goo tɛmɔ be, bɑ seewɑ bɑ hɑniɑ mɔ̀ bu kɑ turi nim mɛn goorɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ kpɑnɑ. Domi nim mɛ, mu seewɑwɑ.
Yerɑ bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ sokɑ bɑ nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ ku sun kpeerɑsiɑ tɔnu winin wɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃. A ku sun wi u kun sun gɑ̃ɑnu kuen yɛm sɔbi. Domi ɑ rɑ kowɑ ye ɑ kĩ.
Yerɑ bɑ Yonɑsi suɑ bɑ kpɛ̃ɛ nim wɔ̃ku ge sɔɔ. Sɑɑ yerɑ gɑ kpunɑ sɛ̃ɛ.
Yerɑ tɔn be, bɑ Yinni Gusunɔ nɑsiɑ, bɑ nùn yɑ̃kuru kuɑ. Mɑ bɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ mɑ wiyɑ bɑ koo sɑ̃.

Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ swɑ̃ɑ bɑkɑ yɑ Yonɑsi mwɛ. Mɑ u kuɑ wɔ̃kuru itɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ itɑ swɑ̃ɑ yen nukurɔ.
Swɑ̃ɑ yen nukurun diyɑ Yonɑsi u Gusunɔ win Yinni kɑnɑ.
U nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ nuku sɑnkirɑru sɔɔ, nɑ nun nɔɔgiru sue, mɑ ɑ mɑn wisɑ. Sɑɑ gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerun di nɑ nun sokɑ. Mɑ ɑ nɛn nɔɔ nuɑ.
Wee ɑ mɑn kpɛ̃ɛ sere nim wɔ̃kun sɔɔwɔ. Mɑ nim mɑn mwɛ. Nim kurenu kpuro mɑn tɑɑre.
Nɑ rɑɑ tii sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɑ mɔ̀, wee ɑ mɑn girɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑn di, nɑ dɑ sere mi n tomɑ. Adɑmɑ wee tɛ̃, kon mɑɑ wunɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑru wɑ.
Nim mɑn mwɛ sere nɑ kĩ n gbi. Mu mɑn wukiri, mɑ yɑkɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ mɛn sɔɔwɔ su mɑn tɛ̃kusi sere wirɔ.
Nɑ numɑ nɑ dɑ sere guunun kpɛɛkpɛɛkuɔ, mɑ tem sɔɔwɔn gɑmbobɑ bɑ mɑn kɛnusi dim dim. Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ nɛn Yinni, ɑ mɑn yɑrɑ min di wɑsiru.
Sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ kom yɑɑ biɑ nɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔ yɑɑyɑ, mɑ ɑ nɛn kɑnɑru nuɑ wunɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑrun mi.
Be bɑ bũnu sɑ̃ɑmɔ, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wunɛn durom wɑsi.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, kon nun yɑ̃kuru kuɑ. Kon nun siɑrɑ, kpɑ n nɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibiɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ, wunɑ ɑ rɑ mɑn fɑɑbɑ ko. Sɑɑ yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u swɑ̃ɑ ye sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, yu doo yu Yonɑsi siɑ kɑsɑɔ. Mɑ swɑ̃ɑ ye, yɑ dɑ kɑsɑɔ yɑ Yonɑsi siɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kpɑm Yonɑsi sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ,
Yonɑsi, ɑ seewo ɑ dɑ Ninifu wuu mɑro gen mi. Kpɑ ɑ gɑri yi gere yi kon nun sɔ̃.
Mɑ Yonɑsi u seewɑ u dɑ Ninifuɔ nge mɛ Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ. N deemɑ Ninifu sɑ̃ɑwɑ wuu bɔkɔ gè sɔɔ bɑ koo sĩ sɔ̃ɔ itɑ bu sere gen gooru wɑ.
Ye Yonɑsi u turɑ mi, u sĩɑ tɔ̃ɔ giriru, u nɔɔgiru sue u gerumɔ u mɔ̀, sɔ̃ɔ weerun biru, Ninifu yɑ koo kpe.
Mɑ Ninifugibu bɑ Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛ kuɑ. Bɑ nɔɔ bɔkuru kpɑrɑ, bɑ sɑɑkibɑ sebuɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃ sɑɑ dɑmgibun di n kɑ dɑ bwɛ̃ɛbwɛ̃ɛbɔ.
Ye Ninifun sinɑ boko u gɑri yi nuɑ mɑ u seewɑ sɑɑ win sinɑ kitɑrun di u win yɑberu potɑ. Mɑ u sɑɑki sebuɑ, u tii torom wisi wirɔ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Mɑ u kpɑrɑ Ninifuɔ u nɛɛ, sinɑ boko kɑ win sinɑ ɑsɑkpɔbu bɑ woodɑ yɑrɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑɑ tɔnu sere kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenɔ, bu ku gɑ̃ɑnu di, bu ku mɑɑ nim nɔ.
Kpɑ tɔmbu kpuro kɑ yɑɑ sɑbenɔ, bu sɑɑkibɑ sebe nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. Kpɑ bu Gusunɔ nɔɔgiru sue kɑ dɑm bu nùn kɑnɑ, kpɑ bu ben kom kɔ̃sum deri kɑ ben dɑɑ bɔɔbɔyɑ ye bɑ rɑ rɑɑ ko.
Sɔrɔkudo Gusunɔ u koo gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ kpɑ win mɔru yu sure u kun mɑɑ sun kɑm koosie.
Ye Gusunɔ u wɑ mɑ Ninifugibu bɑ gɔ̃ru gɔsiɑ, bɑ ben dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ deri, yerɑ u win himbɑ gɔsiɑ. Mɑ u ǹ mɑɑ bu kɔ̃sɑ ye kue ye u rɑɑ gɔ̃ru doke u bu kuɑ.
Yerɑ Yonɑsin mɔru seewɑ gɑ̃ɑ ni Gusunɔ u Ninifugibu kuɑn sɔ̃.
Mɑ u Yinni Gusunɔ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, yenibɑn bɛrumɑ nɑ mɔ̀ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛn temɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ dukɑ yɑkurɑ fuuku nɑ dɔɔ Tɑɑsisiɔ. Nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɔnwɔndugii, ɑ mɑɑ suuru mɔ. Wunɛn kĩru tɑ kpɑ̃. A rɑ tɔnu kɔ̃sɑ wĩɑri ye ɑ rɑɑ gɔ̃ru doke ɑ nùn kuɑ.
Tɛ̃, ɑ de n gbi, domi n burɑm bo n gbi ye ko nɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, ɑ ǹ gem mɔ Yonɑsi, ɑ kɑ mɔru yenin bweseru ko.
Yerɑ Yonɑsi u yɑrimɑ Ninifu yen min di u dɑ u wɑ̃ɑ yen sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yeru giɑ, u kuru girɑ mi. Miyɑ u mɑrɑ u wɑ ye yɑ koo wuu ge deemɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u dɑ̃ɑ kiku gɑgu kpiisiɑ gɑ Yonɑsi gunum kere, gu kɑ nùn sɑɑru kuɑ, kpɑ win bwɛ̃rɑ yu kpunɑ. Yerɑ n Yonɑsi dore too too.
Adɑmɑ sisiru bururu, Gusunɔ u mɑɑ derɑ kɔkɔru gɑrɑ nɑ tɑ dɑ̃ɑ te di. Mɑ tɑ gberɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ sɔ̃ɔ yɑrɑ, u derɑ woo sum gɑ nɑ sɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ yɑri yerun di. Mɑ sɔ̃ɔ wi, u Yonɑsi so wirɔ sere u wɑsikirɑ. Mɑ u nɛɛ, n burɑm bo u gbi ye u ko n kɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yerɑ Gusunɔ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ǹ gem mɔ ɑ kɑ mɔru ko dɑ̃ɑ kiku gen sɔ̃. Mɑ Yonɑsi u nɛɛ, nɑ gem mɔ n kɑ mɔru ko too too sere n gɔɔ kɑnɑ.
Mɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ǹ sɔmburu gɑru kue dɑ̃ɑ ten sɔ̃. N ǹ wunɛ ɑ tu kpiisiɑ. Wee tɑ kpɛ̃ɑ wɔ̃ku teeru, mɑ tɑ gu wɔ̃ku kpɑɑru. Kɑ mɛ, wee ɑ tu wɔnwɔndu kuɑmmɛ.
Ninifu wuu bɔkɔ gen tɔmbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔmbu nɔrɔbun subɑ wunɑɑ teeru (120.000), bɑ ǹ mɑɑ geɑ kɑ kɔ̃sɑn wunɑnɔ yɛ̃. Yerɑ ɑ ǹ kĩ n be kɑ ben yɑɑ sɑbe dɑbinu wɔnwɔndu kuɑ?
Yudɑbɑn sinɑ boko Yotɑmu kɑ Akɑsi kɑ Esekiɑsi ben wɑɑti sɔɔrɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u Misee Mɔresɛtigii sɔ̃ɔwɑ ye yɑ koo Sɑmɑri kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu deemɑ.
Bɛɛ bwesenu kpuro, i swɑɑ dɑkio. Bɛɛ hɑnduniɑgibu, i swɑɑ tem kpĩiyɔ i nɔ. Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nɑ sɑɑ win wɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑrun di u bɛɛ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃.
Wee u yɑrim wee sɑɑ win wɑ̃ɑ yee ten min di, u sĩimɔ guunun wɔllɔ.
Ù n nu tɑɑrɑ, nu rɑ numwɑ. Kpɑ wɔwi yi n yɑndɑmɔ nge gum yɑrum ǹ kun mɛ nge nim mɛ mu sɑrɑm wee gungunun di.
Isirelibɑ Yɑkɔbun bibun torɑnun sɔ̃nɑ yeni kpuro yɑ koorɑ. Wɑrɑ u Isirelibɑ dɑm kɑ̃ bu kɑ Gusunɔ seesi. Ben wuu mɑro Sɑmɑriwɑ. Wɑrɑ u Yudɑbɑ suremɔ bũu sɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. Ben wuu mɑro Yerusɑlɛmuwɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, yenibɑrɑ yɑ koo de Sɑmɑri yu ko bɑnsu kpɑ bu resɛm duure mi. U koo yen gɑnin kpenu sure sere wɔwɑn sɔɔwɔ. Kpɑ bu yen kpɛɛkpɛɛku wɑ.
Bɑ koo yen bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kpuro kɔsuku. Kɛ̃ɛ ni bɑ rɑɑ wɑ, bɑ koo nu dɔ̃ɔ mɛni. U koo de bu yen bũnun sɑ̃ɑ yɑ̃nu kpuro gurɑ. Domi sɑkɑrɑ gobiyɑ bɑ kɑ nu dwɑ. Tɛ̃, tɔn tukobu bɑ koo nu gurɑ bu kɑ sɑ̃ɑru ko.
Nɛ Misee kon weeweenu ko n swĩ. Kon sĩ tereru, kɑ nɑɑ dirisu. Kon wuri ko nge gbeeku bɔ̃ɔ. Kpɑ n swĩ nge tɑɑtɑɑru.
Sɑmɑrin nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te yɑ wɑ sere tɑ Yudɑbɑ girɑri, tɑ ǹ kpeemɔ. Wee tɑ tunumɑ sere Yerusɑlɛmu nɛn tɔmbun wuun kɔnnɔwɔ.
I ku ye kpɑrɑ Gɑtiɔ. I ku mɑɑ swĩ Akoɔ. I bindio tuɑ sɔɔ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃ Bɛti Leɑfɑrɑɔ.
Wee bɛɛ Sɑfirigibu bɑ koo bɛɛ yoru mwɛɛri, kpɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ tereru kɑ sekuru sɔɔ. Sɑnɑnigibu bɑ ǹ kɑ̃kɔ bu yɑri ben wuun di. Bɛtisɑlegibun weeweenu derɑ bɑ ǹ wɑ̃ɑ yeru mɔ.
Mɑrɔtigibu bɑ diirimɔ ben ɑlɑfiɑn sɔ̃. Nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te, tɑ weewɑ Yinni Gusunɔn min di. Tɑ mɑɑ Yerusɑlɛmun gbɑ̃rɑ kɔnnɔ girɑri.
Bɛɛ Lɑkisigibu i bɛɛn kɛkɛ yi dumi gɑwe sɔɔru kowo. Domi i Isirelibɑn dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ sɑɑrimɔ. Mɑ i derɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu bɑ mɑn seesi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ i ko tɛ̃ kɑrɑnɑ kɑ Mɔresɛti Gɑtigibu. Akisibugibɑ kun mɑɑ Isirelibɑn sinɑmbu somiru wee.
Bɛɛ Mɑresɑgibu, Yinni Gusunɔ u koo kpɑm bɛɛ yibɛrɛ kpɑo nɔmu sɔndiɑ. Isirelibɑn sinɑ yiikogibu bɑ koo dɑ bu kuke kpee te bɑ mɔ̀ Adulɑmuɔ.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i bɛɛn seri kɔniɔ i wii kpɑrɑnu yi nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃. I swĩiyɔ bɛɛn bii be i kĩn sɔ̃. Wee bɑ koo bu mwɛɛri bu kɑ dɑ tem tukumɔ.
Bɔ̃rurobɑ be bɑ rɑ n kɔ̃sɑ bwisikumɔ wɔ̃kuru mi bɑ kpĩ. Bɑ̀ n seewɑ buru buru kpɑ bu ye ko yèn sɔ̃ bɑ yen dɑm mɔ.
Bɑ̀ n goon gberu binɛ kuɑ, kpɑ bu tu mwɑ. Bɑ̀ n goon diru binɛ kuɑ, kpɑ bu tu mwɑ. Bɑ rɑ yɛ̃ro kɑ win yɛnugibu dɑm dɔrewɑ kpɑ bu du bu ben dukiɑ kpuro gurɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wee nɑ kɔ̃sɑn sɔɔru mɔ̀ tɔn ben sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu ye dukɑ suuri. Mɛyɑ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ bu sĩ bɑ n wĩiru yɔ̃rɑsie dɑm dɑm. Domi tɔ̃ɔ te tɑ wee mi, tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̃surɑ.
Yen tɔ̃ɔ te, bɑ koo gɔɔ wurɑ yeni ko bu nɛɛ, wee! Bɑ bu gurɑ kpuro mɑm mɑm. Ben tɔmbu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tem mɔ. Bɑ bu girɑ ben gbeɑn di. Bɑ ye bɔnu kuɑ ben tii tiinɛ sɔɔ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ bɑ bu gurɑ nge mɛ.
Adɑmɑ sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ ben goo kun mɑɑ tem wɑsi Yinni Gusunɔn tɔmbu bɑ̀ n tem bɔnu mɔ̀.
Ben gɑbɑ bɑ seewɑ bɑ Misee sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ ku mɑɑ gɑri suni ɑ n mɔ̀, kɔ̃sɑ ye, yɑ weewɑ kɑm kɑm.
Bɑ Isirelibɑn bweseru bɔ̃rusiwɑ? Yinni Gusunɔ u suuru kpɑnɑwɑ? Nge mɛyɑ u rɑ rɑɑ sun kue? Adɑmɑ Misee bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, gɑri doriyɑ nɑ gerumɔ be bɑ kom gem mɔ̀n sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛyɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u sɔ̃ɔmɔ u mɔ̀, i kuɑ win tɔmbun yibɛrɛbɑ. I tɔmbu sɛ̃re be bɑ wee tɑbu gberun di i ben yɑ̃nu potirɑ.
I ben kurɔbu girɑ sɑɑ yɛnu si bɑ kĩn min di, mɑ i derɑ ben bibɑ kun mɑɑ girimɑ wɑsi sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ yè nɑ rɑɑ bu wɛ̃.
I seewo i doonɑ, i ǹ mɑɑ bɔri yɛndu wɑsi tem mɛ sɔɔ. Wɑhɑlɑ bɑkɑ yɑ bɛɛ mɑrɑ bɛɛn mɛm nɔɔbu sɑrirun sɔ̃.
Domi Gusunɔn sɔmɔ benin bweserɑ i rɑ kɑ̃ be bɑ rɑ bɛɛ weesu kue bu nɛɛ, i ko i tɑm wɑ i nɔ, yen tɑm bɔɔbɔm mɑm.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, Yɑkɔbun bweseru, kon bɛɛ be i tie kpuro mɛnnɑ. Kon bɛɛ mɛnnɑ nge yɑ̃ɑnu gɔ̃ɔ teu sɔɔ. Kpɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ sɑnnu nge yɑ̃ɑnu kpɑrɑ yerɔ. Bɛɛn tem mu koo tɔmbu yibu.
Nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ bɛɛn sinɑ boko, nɛnɑ nɑ bɛɛ kpɑre. Kon nɑ n bɛɛ swɑɑ gbiiye. Nɛnɑ kon bɛɛ swɑɑ kɛniɑ i kɑ yɑkiɑrɑ. I ko i swɑɑ gĩɑ kpɑ i yɑri min di.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ Yɑkɔbun bweserun wirugibɑ nɑ kɑ yɑ̃. N ǹ bɛɛyɑ n weenɛ i n woodɑbɑ yɛ̃?
Adɑmɑ wee i ǹ geɑ kĩ, kɔ̃sɑ i kĩ. I rɑ tɔmbu ben gɑ̃ɑnu kpuro mwɑɑriwɑ. Kpɑ i bu yɔ̃su tereru.
I rɑ bu diwɑ mɑm mɑm nge yɑɑ ye bɑ kokɑ bɑ kukunu kɔsukɑ, mɑ bɑ ye bɔtirɑ bɑ doke wekerɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ ì n Yinni Gusunɔ kɑnɑ u bɛɛ somi, u ǹ bɛɛ wisimɔ. U koo bɛɛ biru kisiwɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye i kuɑ min sɔ̃.
Misee u nɛɛ, wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ u gerumɔ sɔmɔ be bɑ win tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔn sɔ̃. U nɛɛ, bɑ̀ n bu gɑ̃ɑnu nɔɔ dokeɑ, bɑ rɑ nɛɛwɑ, bɔri yɛndɑ wee. Bɑ̀ kun mɑɑ bu gɑ̃ɑnu wɛ̃, kpɑ bu nɛɛ, tɑbu sisi.
Yen sɔ̃, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑm wɑsi. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ win gɑri mɔ̀. Yɑm wɔ̃kurɑ koo kɑ bu sikerenɑ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu wɑsi.
Sɔmɔ be, bɑ koo ben wuswɑɑ wukiriwɑ sekurun sɔ̃. Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u ǹ bu wisimɔ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ Misee, kon nɑ n dɑm yibɑwɑ. Domi Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn win Hunde wɛ̃. Nɑ gem kɑ wɔrugɔru sebuɑ. Mɑ nɑ Isirelibɑ, be Yɑkɔbun bweseru ben mɛm nɔɔbu sɑriru sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ Yɑkɔbun bweserun wirugibu, i swɑɑ dɑkio i nɔ. I ku rɑ gem kɑ̃. I rɑ mu gɔsiewɑ kɔ̃sɑ.
Wee i tɔmbu goomɔ, i ben dukiɑ suɑmɔ i kɑ Yerusɑlɛmu bɑnimɔ.
Mɑ i nɔm birɑn kɛ̃nu mwɑɑmɔ i sere siri. Yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ rɑ ginɑ tɔmbu gobi mwɑɑriwɑ bu sere woodɑ sɔ̃ɔsi, kpɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bu gobi mwɑ bu sere win gɑri gere. Kpɑ bɑ n sere mɔ̀ bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn tɔmbu. Gɑ̃ɑnu kun bu deemɑmɔ yèn sɔ̃ u kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ.
Tɛ̃, bɛɛn sɔ̃, bɑ koo Siɔni kɛrɑ nge gbee te bɑ wukɑ. Kpɑ Yerusɑlɛmu yu ko bɑnsu. Kpɑ guu te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ tu kikisu kpi.
Sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ guu tèn mi Yinni Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɑ rɑɑ gire, tɑ koo guu ni nu tie bɛɛrɛ kerɑ. Kpɑ bwese dɑbinu nu nɑ mi,
nu nɛɛ, i nɑ su dɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ Yinni Gusunɔn guurɔ mi Isirelibɑ bɑ rɑ nùn sɑ̃, kpɑ u sun win swɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi su sĩ yi sɔɔ. Min diyɑ u koo win woodɑ yɑrɑ kpɑ u gɑri gerumɑ.
U koo bwese dɑbinu siri, ni nu dɑm mɔ nu nɑ tontonden di. Kpɑ bwese ni, nu nin tɑkobibɑ bɔɔri nu kɑ tebonu seku. Mɛyɑ nu koo nin yɑɑsi bɔɔri nu wobɑ so. Bweseru gɑrɑ kun gɑru seesimɔ. Bɑ ǹ mɑɑ tɑbun gɑri mɔ̀ ben suunu sɔɔ.
Bɑɑwure u ko n wɑ̃ɑ win gberu kpɑɑnɛɔ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Goo kun mɑɑ nùn nɑndɑsiɑmɔ. Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ u yeni geruɑ.
Bweseru bɑɑtere tɑ rɑ kɑ̃wɑ tu ten bũu mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Adɑmɑ bɛsɛ, Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinniwɑ sɑ ko mɛm nɔɔwɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon be bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ mɛnnɑ, kpɑ n be bɑ kpikiru suɑ sokusiɑmɑ, be, be nɑ rɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ mi.
Kon be bɑ mɛɛrɑ kuɑ mi mɛnnɑ. Kpɑ be, bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nɛn tɔmbun sukum mɛ mu tie. Kpɑ n be, be bɑ rɑɑ kpikiru suɑ mi ko bwese dɑmgiru. Kpɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ben sunɔ Siɔniɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Wunɛ Yerusɑlɛmun guuru, wunɛ wi ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge wuu kɔ̃sobun diru, ɑ tɔmbu kɔ̃su, kɑɑ mɑɑ wunɛn bɛɛrɛ wɑ nge yellu. Domi Yerusɑlɛmu yɑ koo kpɑm ko Isirelibɑn wuu mɑro.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i kuuki mɔ̀ bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i tii tɛ̃birimɔ nge tɔn kurɔ wi kĩ u mɑ. Mɑnɑ bɛɛn sunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ. Mɑnɑ bɛɛn bwisi kɛ̃ɔbu bɑ dɑ.
Bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i wuri koowo nge tɔn kurɔ wi u yiire u kĩ u mɑ. Domi tɛ̃, i ko i yɑri Yerusɑlɛmun di. Kpɑ i dɑ i n wɑ̃ɑ yɑkɑsɔ. Bɑ koo kɑ bɛɛ dɑ sere Bɑbiloniɔ. Adɑmɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u koo rɑ bɛɛ yɑkiɑmɑ min di. Kpɑ u bɛɛ wɔrɑ bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑn nɔmɑn di.
Tɛ̃, bwese dɑbinu nu mɛnnɑmɔ nu kɑ bɛɛ seesi. Nu mɔ̀, su de ben wuu Yerusɑlɛmu ye, yu bɛɛrɛ biɑ, yu ko bɑnsu. Kpɑ sɑ n su mɛɛrɑ.
Adɑmɑ tɔn be, bɑ ǹ yɛ̃ himbɑ ye Yinni Gusunɔ u yi win tɔmbun sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ win bwisikunu yɛ̃. U kĩ u bu mɛnnɑ nge ɑlikɑmɑ ye bɑ subɑ mi bɑ rɑ ye so.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i seewo i bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ so nge ɑlikɑmɑ. Kon de i n dɑm mɔ nge kɛtɛn kɔbɑ ye yɑ dɑm mɔ nge sisu. Mɑ yen nɑɑ konnu nu dɑm mɔ nge sii gɑndu. I ko i bwese dɑbinu munkuwɑ. Kpɑ i ben ɑrumɑni geɑ mwɑ i nɛ Gusunɔ tem kpuron Yinni yiiyɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ Yerusɑlɛmugibu, i bɛɛn tɑbu kowobu mɛnnɑmɑ. Wee bɑ bɛɛ tɑrusi. Mɑ bɑ bɛɛn sinɑ boko soomɔ bɑɑnɔ kɑ bokunu. Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, wunɛ Bɛtelehɛmu, Efɑrɑtɑgibun wuu, wunɑ ɑ piiburu bo Yudɑn wusu sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ wunɛn min diyɑ kpɑro koo yɑri wi u koo nɛn tɔmbu Isirelibɑ kpɑrɑ. U wɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑɑ yee yellun di.
Adɑmɑ ko nɑ n ginɑ nɛn tɔn be deriwɑ ben yibɛrɛbɑn nɔmɑ sɔɔ sere kurɔ wì u koo kpɑro wi mɑ, u kɑ mɑ. Be bɑ kpikiru dɑ, bɑ koo gɔsirɑmɑ bu Isireli be bɑ tie deemɑ.
Kpɑ kpɑro wi nɑ bɛɛ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ mi, u bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu mɛnnɑ u kpɑrɑ mɑm mɑm kɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm kɑ nɛn yiiko. Win tɔmbu bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ. Kpɑ u yĩsiru yɑri hɑnduniɑn goonu nnɛ ye sɔɔ.
Wiyɑ u koo kɑ bɔri yɛndu nɑ. Asirigibu bɑ̀ n nɑ, bɑ bɛsɛn tem wɔri bɑ duɑ sere bɛsɛn sinɑ kpɑɑrɔ, sɑ ko bɛsɛn kpɑro be bɑ dɑm bo seeyɑ bu bu wɔri.
Ben tɑbu yɑ̃nun sɔ̃, bɑ koo Asirigibu kɑ Nimurodugii be tɑɑre, kpɑ bu sun wɔrɑ Asirigibu bɑ̀ n bɛsɛn tem wɔrimɑ.
Isireli be bɑ tiɑrɑ bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ tɔn dɑbinun suunu sɔɔ nge kɑko ɑrufɑɑnigiru te Yinni Gusunɔ u derɑ tɑ wɔrumɑ, ǹ kun mɛ nge gurɑ ye yɑ nɛmɔ tɛɛru, yɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu yĩiyɔ tɔnun min di.
Isireli be bɑ tiɑrɑ bɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ tɔmbun suunu sɔɔ, kpɑ bɑ n dɑm mɔ nge gbee sunɔ ge gɑ wɑ̃ɑ gbeeku yɛɛn suunu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ yɑ̃ɑ gɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ. Mi gɑ duɑ kpuro, gɑ rɑ yɑɑ kɑsukuwɑ gu mwɛ. Goo kun mɑɑ kpɛ̃ u gu mwɑɑri.
Isirelibɑ, i seewo i bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ wɔri. Kpɑ i bu go mɑm mɑm.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ kon bɛɛn dumi kɑ bɛɛn tɑbu kɛkɛbɑ kpeerɑsiɑ.
Kpɑ n bɛɛn wusu kɑm koosiɑ. Kpɑ n bɛɛn gbɑ̃rɑnu suriri.
Kon bɛɛn dobo dobogibu go. I ǹ mɑɑ ben dobo dobo wɑsi bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Kon bwɑ̃ɑrokunu kɑ kpee ni i girɑ kɔsuku. I ǹ mɑɑ nu sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Kon bũu wi bɑ mɔ̀ Asitɑɑten sɑ̃ɑ yerun dɑ̃nu wukiri. Kpɑ n bɛɛn wusu kɔsuku.
Nɛn mɔru koo se, kpɑ n nɛn dɑm sɔ̃ɔsi bwese ni nu ǹ mɑn mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛn mi.

I swɑɑ dɑkio ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ. Nɑ nɛɛ, Isirelibɑ, i seewo i kɑ tii yinɑ guunu kɑ gungunun wuswɑɑɔ.
Bɛɛ guunu, i swɑɑ dɑkio. Bɛɛ tem kpɛɛkpɛɛku dɑmginu, nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ nɛn tɔmbu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Nɑ kĩ n bu siribu soku.
Bɛɛ Isirelibɑ, bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, kɔ̃sɑ mbɑ nɑ bɛɛ kuɑ. Mɑ sɔɔrɑ nɑ derɑ i wɑsirɑ. I mɑn wisio.
I mɑn tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ yèn sɔ̃ nɑ bɛɛ Isirelibɑ yɑrɑ sɑɑ Egibitin di? Ǹ kun mɛ yèn sɔ̃ nɑ bɛɛ yɑrɑ sɑɑ yorun di? Ǹ kun mɛ yèn sɔ̃ nɑ bɛɛ kpɑro beni gɔriɑmɑ, Mɔwisi kɑ Aroni kɑ Mɑriɑmu?
Bɛɛ nɛn tɔmbu, i yɑɑyo kɔ̃sɑ ye Bɑlɑki Mɔɑbun sinɑ boko u bwisikɑ u bɛɛ kuɑ. I mɑɑ yɑɑyo ye Bɑlɑmu Beorin bii u nùn wisɑ. Nɑ bɛɛ yɔ̃siri bɛɛn sɑnum sɔɔ sɑɑ Sitimun di sere Giligɑliɔ. Mɑ i nɛn durom wɑ mɛ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ bɛɛ kuɑ.
Kɛ̃ɛ terɑ̀ kon kɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wi, wi u kpuro kere dɑɑwɑ nɑ̀ n dɔɔ win sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Kɛ̃ɛ terɑ̀ ko nɑ n nɛni n kɑ nùn yiirɑ. Nɑɑ wɔ̃ɔ tiɑgiɑ kon kɑ nùn yɑ̃ku dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑrugiru kuɑ?
Yinni Gusunɔ u yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ dɑbi dɑbinun bukɑtɑ mɔ? Gum kotosun bukɑtɑwɑ u mɔ? Nɛn bii gbiikoowɑ kon nùn wɛ̃ u sere mɑn nɛn torɑnu suuru kuɑ?
Aɑwo, Yinni Gusunɔ u tɔmbu geɑ sɔ̃ɔsi ye u rɑ kɑ̃. Ye u bu kɑnɑmɔ bu ko, yerɑ bu ben berusebu wɛ̃ ye n sɑ̃ɑ begiɑ. Kpɑ bu bu kĩru sɔ̃ɔsi. Kpɑ bu wi, Gusunɔ ben Yinni swĩi kɑ tii kɑwɑbu.
Yinni Gusunɔ u kɑ Yerusɑlɛmugibu yɑ̃. Wi u bwisi mɔ, u koo nùn nɑsiɑ. Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, i de nɛn siribu bu bɛɛ yeeri.
Kon wurɑ tɔn kɔ̃so u dukiɑ gure win dirɔ kɑ gbɛnɑ? Kpɑ u n sɑkɑku mɔ ge nɑ ǹ kĩ?
I tɑmɑɑ wi u kilo weesugiɑ mɔ u dɛɛre?
Wee bɛɛn gobigibu bɑ tɔmbu dɑm dɔremɔ, bɑ rɑ n weesu mɔ̀. Kpɑ bɑ n gɑbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ kɑ ben gɑri.
Tɛ̃, nɑ sɔɔru kpɑ n kɑ bɛɛ sɛ̃suku bɛɛn durum sɔ̃, kpɑ i kɑm ko.
I ko i di, ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ debumɔ. I ko i nɔɔgiru suɑ gɔ̃ɔrun sɔ̃. Mɛyɑ n ǹ koorɔ i gɑ̃ɑnu bere. Ì n mɑɑ gɑ̃ɑnu beruɑ, tɑbɑ kon kɑ ye kɑm koosiɑ.
I ko i duure, ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ gɛ̃ɛmɔ. I ko i olifi gɑmɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ wɑsi i yen gum sɑwɑ. I ko i resɛm tɑm wĩɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i ǹ wɑsi i mu nɔ.
Domi i sinɑ boko Omirin dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ sɑɑrimɔ kɑ sere mɑɑ Akɑbugiɑ. I ben dɑɑ sɑɑrimɔwɑ mɑm mɑm. Yen sɔ̃nɑ kon de bɛɛn wuu gu ko bɑnsu. Kpɑ n de bu bɛɛ yɛ̃ɛ. I ko i sekuru wɑ bɛɛ kpuro nge mɛ nɛn tɔmbu bɑ rɑ wɑ.
Misee u nɛɛ, wee nɑ wɔnwɔndu soore nge wi u dɑ̃ɑ binu kunɔnu mɔ̀. Mɑ u ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu wɑ u di. U ǹ mɑɑ resɛm yebɑ wɑ ye win gɔ̃ru gɑ kĩ u di.
Domi tem mɛ sɔɔ, goo sɑri wi u Gusunɔ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ. Goo kun mɔ̀ dee dee. Be kpuro bɑ bwisikumɔwɑ bu tɔmbu go. Mɑ bɑ sɑ̃kiriɑnɑmmɛ.
Bɑ kɔ̃sɑn kobun yɛ̃ru mɔ. Mɑ sinɑmbu kɑ siri kowobu bɑ tɔmbu nɔm birɑm kɛ̃nu mwɑɑrimɔ. Ben dɑmgibu bɑ ben binɛ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ. Mɑ be kpuro bɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ ko ye bɑ kĩ.
Ben wi u sɑnɔ bo, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge sɑ̃kɑ. Ben wi u dɛɛre, u ɑwĩi kɔ̃si kere. Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, tɔ̃ɔ te Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bɑ bu nɔɔsiɑ tè sɔɔ bɑ koo bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ tɑ tunumɑ. Wee bɑ burisinɛ kɔ nuku sɑnkirɑnun sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, ɑ ku wunɛn berusebu nɑɑnɛ ko. A de ɑ wunɛn yɑrɑ nɛnɛ wunɛn tiin kurɔn wuswɑɑɔ.
Domi bii u rɑ win tundo wɔmɛ, kpɑ bii wɔndiɑ u win mɛro seesi, kpɑ bigii kurɔ u win dwɑɑ mɛro seesi. Bɑɑwure u rɑ n win yibɛrɛ mɔwɑ win tiin yɛnu sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ ko nɑ n mɛɛrɑ. Wiyɑ ko nɑ n nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Domi u rɑ mɑn fɑɑbɑ ko. Wiyɑ u koo mɑn wisi.
Bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn yibɛrɛbɑ, i ku yɛ̃ɛ ye yɑ sun deemɑn sɔ̃. Bɑɑ sɑ̀ n wɔrumɑ, sɑ ko se. Sɑ̀ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔwɑ u ko n sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn yɑm bururɑm.
Sɑ ko Yinni Gusunɔn mɔru sɔbe, domi sɑ nùn torɑ. Adɑmɑ sɑɑ gɑɑ sisi yè sɔɔ u koo kɑ sun yinɑ, kpɑ u sun gem wɛ̃. U koo kɑ sun nɑ yɑm bururɑm sɔɔ kpɑ u sun durom kuɑ.
Bɛsɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ koo ye wɑ. Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ koo sekuru wɑ, be, be bɑ rɑ rɑɑ bikie bu nɛɛ, mɑnɑ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni u wɑ̃ɑ. Bɑ koo bu tɑɑku nge pɔtɔkɔ, kpɑ su bu yɛ̃ɛ.
Tɔ̃ru gɑrɑ sisi tè sɔɔ bɑ koo Yerusɑlɛmun gɑni seeyɑ, kpɑ bu bɛsɛn tem nɔɔ burɑ yeru yɑsiɑsiɑ tu tondɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, bɛsɛgii be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Asiriɔ kɑ Egibitiɔ kɑ dɑɑ ni bɑ mɔ̀ Nilu kɑ Efɑrɑtin goorɔ, kɑ sere mɑɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nim wɔ̃kun goorɔ kɑ guunɔ, bɑ koo wurɑmɑ bɛsɛn temɔ.
Kpɑ tem mɛ mu tie duniɑ sɔɔ mu ko bɑnsu, tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ min kom kɔ̃sum sɔ̃.
Yinni Gusunɔ, ɑ wunɛn tɔn be ɑ gɔsɑ kpɑro kɑ wunɛn kpɑrɑ dɛkɑ. Be wee bɑ wɑ̃ɑ be tɔnɑ dɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔwɔ mi tem gem wɑ̃ɑ. A bu kpɑro Bɑsɑni kɑ Gɑlɑdin kpɑrɑ yenɔ nge yellu.
A sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkigiɑ koowo nge mɛ ɑ kuɑ sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ sun yɑrɑmɑ sɑɑ Egibitin di.
Bwesenu nu koo mɑɑmɑɑki ye wɑ. Kpɑ nu sekuru wɑ bɑɑ mɛ nu dɑm mɔ. Nu koo nɔɔ nɔmɑ wukiri, nu yɔ̃rɑ nu kun gɑri geruɑ, kpɑ nu kun gɑ̃ɑnu nuɑ.
Kpɑ nu tuɑ di nge wɑɑ, ǹ kun mɛ nge yɛɛ yi yi kɑbirimɔ. Nu koo yɑri sɑɑ nin kuku yerun di kɑ bɛrum, nu nɑ wunɛ Yinni Gusunɔn mi, nu n diirimɔ, kpɑ nu n nun nɑsie wunɛn dɑm sɔ̃.
Wɑrɑ u kɑ nun weenɛ. Wee, ɑ rɑ kɑ bɛsɛ wunɛn tɔmbun bweserun sukum mɛ mu tie tɛmɑnɛ bɛsɛ be sɑ sɑ̃ɑ wunɛn ɑrumɑni kpɑ ɑ sun bɛsɛn torɑnu suuru kuɑ. Wunɛn mɔru ku rɑ tɛ. Domi kĩrɑ ɑ rɑ sun sɔ̃ɔsi.
Kɑɑ mɑɑ bɛsɛn wɔnwɔndu wɑ. Kpɑ ɑ ku bɛsɛn torɑnu gɑrisi. Kpɑ ɑ bɛsɛn durum wunɑ ɑ kɔ̃ yu dɑ sere nim wɔ̃kun temɔ.
Kɑɑ bɛsɛ be sɑ sɑ̃ɑ Aburɑhɑmu kɑ Yɑkɔbun sikɑdominu kĩru kɑ bɔrɔkiniru sɔ̃ɔsi nge mɛ ɑ bɛsɛn sikɑdobɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ sɑɑ yellun di.
Gɑri wee yi Yinni Gusunɔ u geruɑ wuu ge bɑ mɔ̀ Ninifun sɔ̃. Nɑhumu Ɛlikosigiiwɑ Gusunɔ u derɑ u yi wɑ kɑ̃siru sɔɔ mɑ u yoruɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nisinugii. U rɑ mɔru kɔsie. Win mɔru yɑ kpɑ̃. U rɑ win yibɛrɛbɑ mɔru kɔsie. U ku rɑ bu suuru kue.
U ku rɑ toro deri u kun nùn sɛɛyɑsie. Adɑmɑ u ku rɑ mɔru se fuuku. Win dɑm mu kpɑ̃. Ù n sĩimɔ, woo gunɑ yɑ rɑ n seewɑwɑ, kpɑ guru winu nu n sɑ̃ɑ nge win nɑɑsun tuɑ.
Ù n nim wɔ̃ku gbɑ̃re, gɑ rɑ gberewɑ. U rɑ dɑɑnu kpuron nim gberɑsiewɑ, kpɑ yɑkɑ si su wɑ̃ɑ Bɑsɑniɔ kɑ Kɑɑmɛlin gɑ̃ɑnɔ su gberɑ, kpɑ dɑ̃ɑ wɛ̃ɛ si su wɑ̃ɑ Libɑniɔ su dɛllɑ.
U derɑ guunu bɑ̃ɑrimɔ. Mɑ gungunu diirimɔ. Mɑ tem kɑ mɛn tɔmbu bɑ yiiyɑrɑmɔ win wuswɑɑɔ.
Wɑrɑ u koo kpĩ u yɔ̃rɑ u win mɔru mɑ. Wɑrɑ u koo kɑ win mɔru gɑbirinɑ. Win mɔru yɑ rɑ pusiwɑ nge dɔ̃ɔ. Wee yɑ kpenu bɛsukumɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn geo. U sɑ̃ɑwɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɑhɑlɑ sɔɔn kuku yeru. Be bɑ nùn nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ, berɑ u rɑ nɔɔri.
U koo Ninifu kpeerɑsiɑ mɑm mɑm kɑ nim bɑkɑm, kpɑ u win yibɛrɛbɑ nɑɑ girɑ sere gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɔ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ.
Mbɑ i Yinni Gusunɔ bwisikusimɔ. Wiyɑ u rɑ kɑm koosie mɑm mɑm. Bɑ ku rɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ nɔn yiruse.
Yibɛrɛ be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge sɑ̃ki kɔkɔnu, bɑ rɑ tɑm nɔ sere mu bu go. Kɑ mɛ, bɑ koo dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑwɑ mɑm mɑm nge yɑkɑ gbebusu.
Ninifu, wunɛn min diyɑ goo u yɑrɑ wi u Gusunɔ kɔ̃sɑ bwisikusimɔ, mɑ u kĩ u nùn seesi.
Yinni Gusunɔ u Yudɑbɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɑɑ bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ̀ n dɑbi ɑmɔ, mɑ bɑ dɑm mɔ ɑmɔ, kɑ mɛ, kon bu gowɑ mɑm mɑm. Nɑ bɛɛ sekuru doke. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ wuremɔ n bɛɛ kuɑ nge mɛ.
Kon ben yoo te bɑ bɛɛ diisiɑmɔ kpeerɑsiɑ. Kon ten yɔni kɑsuku.
Bɛɛ Ninifugibu, wee ye nɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ nɑ geruɑ bɛɛn sɔ̃. Nɑ nɛɛ, i ǹ bweseru wɑsi te tɑ koo bɛɛn yĩsiru sɔbe. Kon bɛɛn bwɑ̃ɑroku dɑ̃ɑginu kɑ sisuginu kpuro wunɑ bɛɛn bũu dirun di, kpɑ n bɛɛn sikɑ sɔɔru ko. Domi i ǹ sɑ̃ɑ gɑ̃ɑnu.

Bɛɛ Yudɑbɑ, wee goo u nɑ guunu wɔllɔ u bɔri yɛndun lɑbɑɑri geɑ kpɑrɑmɔ. Yen sɔ̃, i bɛɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ ni i rɑ rɑɑ di Yinni Gusunɔn sɔ̃ dio. I bɛɛn nɔɔ mwɛɛnu yibio. Domi tɔn kɔ̃so wi, u ǹ mɑɑ wee bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Nɑ nùn kpeerɑsiɑwɑ mɑm mɑm.
Bɛɛ Ninifugibu, kɑm koosio u bɛɛ wɔrim wee. Yen sɔ̃, i bɛɛn gbɑ̃rɑru mɑruo, kpɑ i bɛɛn swɛɛ kɔ̃su. I sɔɔru koowo, kpɑ i wɔrugɔru sɔ̃ɔsi kɑ bɛɛn dɑm kpuro.
Wee Yinni Gusunɔ u Yɑkɔbun bweseru, Isirelibɑ ben bɛɛrɛ wesiɑmɔ, be, be yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ wɔri bɑ ben yɑ̃nu gurɑ nge mɛ bɑ rɑ resɛm kɑ̃ɑsi yɑkiri.
Ninifun yibɛrɛbɑn tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibun tɛrɛnu nu sɔ̃ri. Mɑ bɑ yɑ̃ɑ wunɔmginu doke. Tɑbun tɔ̃ru tɑ̀ n turɑ, ben tɑbu kɛkɛ be dumi gɑwe yi rɑ kurɑmɛwɑ yi n bɑllimɔ nge dɔ̃ɔ buri, kpɑ bɑ n yɑɑsi fĩɑmɔ.
Bɑ tɑbu kɛkɛbɑ yɑkiɑmɔ swɛɛ sɔɔ nge wiirobu. Bɑ dɑɑmɔ bɑtumɑ kpuro sɔɔ kɑ dɑm. À n bu wɑ, ɑ rɑ n tɑmɑɑ dɔ̃ɔ yɑriyɑ. Kpɑ bɑ n duki mɔ̀ nge guru mɑɑkinu.
Ninifun sinɑ boko u win tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu yɑɑyɑ u sokumɔ. Adɑmɑ be wee, bɑ sĩimɔ bɑ bɑ̃ɑrimɔ. Ben yibɛrɛbɑ bɑ sɛnde bɑ kɑ dɔɔ wuun gbɑ̃rɑru giɑ. Mɑ bɑ tii kuku yenu kuɑ.
Subɑru sɔɔ, bɑ dɑɑnun swɛɛ kɛniɑ, mɑ sinɑ kpɑɑrɑ wɔrukɑ.
Bɑ Ninifu ye mwɑ bɑ yen yɑ̃nu gurɑ bɑ kɑ doonɑ. Yen tɔn kurɔbu bɑ sumɔ nge kpɑrukonu, mɑ bɑ toronu soomɔ.
Ninifu ye, yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge nim bwee bɑkɑru tèn nim mu gɛ̃ɛrɑ mu doonɑ. Mɑ nɔɔgirɑ nɔɔrɑmɔ tɑ mɔ̀, i yɔ̃ro, i yɔ̃ro. Adɑmɑ goo kun yɔ̃re.
I sii geesu kɑ wurɑ guro. Ben dukiɑ yɑ ǹ nɔru mɔ. Dukiɑ bwese bwesekɑwɑ bɑ mɔ.
Bɑ gurɑmɔ, bɑ goomɔ, bɑ sɑnkumɔ. Tɔmbu kpuron gɔmɑ dwiiyɑ. Ben dũunu soonɑmɔ, mɑ ben dɑm doonɑ. Be kpuron wuswɑɑ burisinɛ.
Mɑnɑ Ninifu ye, yɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɛ̃, ye, ye yɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge gbee sinɑnsun wɑ̃ɑ yeru, mi gbee sunɔ dwɑɑ kɑ ninu kɑ binu nu rɑ n bɔsu, goo ku rɑ mɑɑ nu nɑre,
kpɑ dwɑɑ ye, yu yen kurɔbu kɑ yen binu yɑɑ goowɑ, kpɑ yu wɑ̃ɑ yee te yɑɑ yibiɑ. Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni u nɛɛ, nɛ wee. Nɛnɑ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ yen yibɛrɛ. Kon de yen tɑbu kɛkɛbɑ bu dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ. Kon de bu yen bibu go tɑbu sɔɔ. Kon de yu ku mɑɑ tɔmbun yɑ̃nu gurɑ. Goo kun mɑɑ yen sɔmɔbun nɔɔ nɔɔmɔ.
Ninifugibɑ kuɑ bɔ̃rurobu. Domi bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn gowobu. Bɑ weesu yibɑ. Mɑ bɑ kuurɑmɔ kɑ gbɑnɑ. Bɑ rɑ n tɔmbun yɑ̃nu gurɑmɔwɑ.
Wee sɛnɑn dɑmusu nɔɔrɑmɔ wuu ge sɔɔ. Wee tɑbu kɛkɛbɑn uruun wɔkinu nɔɔrɑmɔ, mɑ dumi yi yi gɑwe yi yɔ̃ɔkumɔ.
Mɑɑsɔbu bɑ wee, bɑ tɑkobibɑ kɑ yɑɑsi nɛni yi bɑllimɔ. Wee bɑ tɔmbu mɛɛrɑ kuɑ, mɑ gonu tɛrie bɑɑmɑ, nu ǹ gɑrirɔ. Mɑ bɑ nu wɔrikimɔ.
Ninifu yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge kurɔ sɑkɑrɑ kowo kpoko. Yɑ bwese dɑbinu yoru diisiɑ yen burɑm kɑ yen sɔrorun sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ Gusunɔ, wɔllu kɑ tem Yinni, kon ye wɔrimɑ. Kon yen yɑberu gbɑbiɑ n kɑ yen wuswɑɑ wukiri, kpɑ n yen tereru bwesenu sɔ̃ɔsi, kpɑ yu sekuru wɑ.
Kon ye kubɑnu sure, kpɑ tɔmbu bu ye kɑ.
Sɑɑ yerɑ wi u ye wɑ u koo dukɑ su, kpɑ u nɛɛ, Ninifu yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu. Wɑrɑ u koo ye wɔnwɔndu kuɑ. Mɑnɑ kon bu wɑ be bɑ koo ye nukuru yɛmiɑsiɑ.
Tebɛsi yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Nilun nim swɛɛ yi bɑ gbɑn bɔkuɔ. Nim mu kɑ ye sikerenɛ. Mɑ mu sɑ̃ɑ yen gbɑ̃rɑru. Ninifu, ɑ tɑmɑɑ ɑ Tebɛsi ye sɑnɔ kere?
Etiopigibu kɑ Egibitigibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ yen dɑm. Putigibu kɑ Libigibu bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yen somiɔbu.
Kɑ mɛ kpuro, yen tii yɑ yoru dɑ. Bɑ ye mwɑ mɑ bɑ yen bibu go swɛɛ kpuro sɔɔ. Bɑ yen wirugibu tɛtɛ toosi, mɑ bɑ yen dɑmgibu mwɛɛrɑ bɑ yɔni doke.
Wunɛ Ninifu, kɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔrɑwɑ, kpɑ ɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nge wi u tɑm goore, kpɑ ɑ kuku yeru kɑsu yibɛrɛbɑn sɔ̃ ɑ kuke.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, wunɛn gbɑ̃rɑnu kpuro nu ko n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge dɑ̃ɑ nìn mɑrum mu ye. Bɑ̀ n mu sirɑ kpɑ mu wɔri wi u koo mu din nɔɔwɔ.
Wee wunɛn tɔmbu bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nge tɔn kurɔbu wunɛn suunu sɔɔ. Wunɛn tem wusun kɔnnɔsu su kɛniɑrɑ mɑm mɑm yibɛrɛbɑn wuswɑɑɔ. Mɑ dɔ̃ɔ u sin kɔkɔrɔbɑ di.
Bɛɛ Ninifugibu, i nim tɑkirio i yi. Domi bɑ koo bɛɛn wuu tɑrusi. I bɛɛn gbɑ̃rɑrun dɑm sosio. I birikibɑ muro kpɑ i sɔndu tɑɑku i kɑ tu bɑni.
Bɑɑ ì n yebɑ kpuro kuɑ, kɑ mɛ, dɔ̃ɔ u koo nɑ u bɛɛ di, ǹ kun mɛ bu bɛɛ go kɑ tɑkobi. Bɑ koo bɛɛ kpeerɑsiɑwɑ nge mɛ twee yi rɑ dɑ̃ɑ wurusu di. Wee, i dɑbiɑ nge twee.
Bɛɛn tenkubɑ bɑ kperi dɑbiru kere. Adɑmɑ be kpuro bɑ doonɑ nge twee yi yi yɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Bɛɛn kɔ̃sobu bɑ dɑbi nge gbɑbu swɛ̃ɛ. Bɛɛn sɔm kowobu bɑ dɑbi nge twee yi yi sinɑ dɑ̃ɑ kikisɔ bururu. Adɑmɑ ye sɔ̃ɔ u yɑrɑ mɑ yi yɔ̃ɔwɑ yi doonɑ, bɑ ǹ tubɑ mi yi dɑ.
Wunɛ Asirin sinɑ boko, wee wunɛn kpɑrobu bɑ dom yĩbirimɔ. Wunɛn tɑbu durɔ dɑmgibu bɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑsi. Mɑ wunɛn tɔmbu bɑ yɑrinɛ yɑm kpuro guunu wɔllɔ, goo sɑri wi u koo bu kpɑɑsinɑ.
Goo kun wunɛn mɛɛrɑ ye nɔɔrimɔ. Yɑ koo nun gowɑ. Wi u nuɑ ye yɑ nun deemɑ, u koo tɑkɑ kowɑ nuku dobun sɔ̃. Domi goo sɑri wi ɑ ǹ nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Gɑri wee yi Yinni Gusunɔ u win sɔmɔ Hɑbɑkuku sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔ, sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ ko nɑ n nun somiru kɑnɑmɔ. Sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ kɑɑ n mɑn mɑɑri. Sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ kɑɑ de nɑ n nun sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ tɔmbɑ dɑm dɔrenɑmɔ. Nge sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ kɑɑ nɑ ɑ sun wɔrɑ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ derɑ nɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɛɛrɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ kɑɑ n tɔmbu mɛɛrɑ bɑ n gem birɑnɑmɔ. Wee, tɔmbɑ dɑm dɔrenɑmɔ bɑ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ bɑɑmɑ kpuro. Sɑnnɔsu yibɑ, mɑ tɔmbɑ siribu sokunɑmɔ bɑɑmɑ kpuro.
Goo sɑri wi u woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ. Bɑ ku rɑ tɔmbu ben gem wɛ̃ nge mɛ n weenɛ. Tɔn kɔ̃sowɑ u rɑ gemgii siribu di.
Yinni Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, i bwesenu mɛɛrio i kɑ sikerenɑ. I de biti yu bɛɛ mwɑ. Domi kon gɑ̃ɑnu ko bɛɛn nɔni biru ni i ǹ nɑɑnɛ mɔ̀, bɑɑ goo ù n bɛɛ nu tusiɑ.
Wee, kon Bɑbilonigibu seeyɑmɑ. Tɔn be, bɑ nuki sum. Bɑ tem kpuro bukiɑnɑmɔ bu wɑ bu kɑ bwesenu gɑnun wɑ̃ɑ yenu mwɛɛri.
Bɑ nɑnum mɔ ben dɑm sɑɑbu. Berɑ bɑ rɑ gɔsi ye bɑ kĩ.
Ben dumi yi sɑnnɛkunu ǹ kun mɛ gbeeku bɔ̃nu dukɑ kere. Sɑɑ tontonden diyɑ yi rɑ yɔ̃, kpɑ yi yibɛrɛ wɔri nge kɑsɑ ye yɑ goo buu wɑ.
Be kpurowɑ bɑ wee bu kɑ tɔmbun yɑ̃nu gurɑ. Bɑ nɔni girɑriwɑ mi bɑ dɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ yobu mwɛɛrimɔ bɑ mɛnnɑmɔ nge yɑni sɛɛri.
Bɑ sinɑmbu gɛmɑ. Bɑ tem yɛ̃robu yɛ̃ɛmɔ. Bɑ ǹ wusun gbɑ̃rɑnu gɑrɑ. Domi bɑ rɑ tem turenu kowɑ bu kɑ gbɑ̃rɑ ni yɔ kpɑ bu wuu si mwɑ.
Yen biru kpɑ bu yɑri min di nge woo gunɑ, kpɑ bu mɑɑ dɑ bu gɑm wɔri bu kɔ̃sɑ ko. Ben dɑmɑ bɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ, mu sɑ̃ɑ nge ben bũu.
Sɑɑ yellun di, wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ. Wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn Yinni. A dɛɛre. Yen sɔ̃, sɑ ǹ gbimɔ. Yinni, wunɑ ɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛn kpee bɑɑ mi nɑ rɑ kuke. Wunɑ ɑ Bɑbilonigibu gɔsɑ, mɑ ɑ bu dɑm kɑ̃ kpɑ bu kɑ sun sɛɛyɑsiɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ ɑ yɔ̃rɑ ɑ n kɔ̃sɑ mɛɛrɑ, domi ɑ dɛɛre too. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɛɛrɑ ye tɔn kɔ̃sobɑ mɔ̀, mɑ ɑ ǹ gɑ̃ɑnu gerumɔ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɑɑri tɔn kɔ̃sobu bɑ gemgibu goomɔ.
Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ tɔmbu kuɑmmɛ nge swɛ̃ɛ, ǹ kun mɛ nge kɔkɔ ni nu ǹ kpɑro mɔ.
Bɑbilonigibu bɑ tɔmbu mwɛɛrimɔ nge swɛ̃ɛ yi bɑ mwɑ kɑ kɔkɔnu ǹ kun mɛ kɑ yɑ̃ɑkoronu, kpɑ bu bu gurɑ bu kɑ doonɑ kɑ nuku dobu.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ rɑ ben yɑ̃ɑkoronu yɑ̃kunu kue, kpɑ bu nu turɑre dɔ̃ɔ dokeɑ. Domi nin sɑɑbuwɑ bɑ koo kɑ kpĩ bu dĩɑ geenu wɑ ni nu do bu di.
Dommɑ bɑ koo den ben tɑkobibɑ wesiɑ ben kɑrɑnɔ. Bɑ ko n bwesenu sɑkirimɔwɑ wɔnwɔndu sɑriru sɔɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ?
Adɑmɑ nɛ, Hɑbɑkuku nɑ yɔ̃wɑ gbɑ̃rɑru wɔllɔ nɛn kɔ̃su yerɔ nge wi u yɔɔru bwɛ̃ɛ, kpɑ n kɑ nɔ ye Gusunɔ u koo mɑn sɔ̃, kɑ nge mɛ u koo mɑn wisi nɛn weeweenun sɔ̃.
Yerɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u mɑn wisɑ u nɛɛ, n gɑri yi yoruo yi u mɑn sɔ̃ɔmɔ. N yi yoruo kpɑsɑsɑ kpee bɛsi sɔɔ.
Yin tɔ̃rɑ kun ginɑ turɑ yi kɑ koorɑ. Adɑmɑ yi koo koorɑ yin sɑɑ yɑ̀ n turɑ. Bɑɑ yì n tɛɛmɔ, nɑ n gesi yi mɑrɑ. Domi yi koo koorɑwɑ kɑm kɑm.
N yoruo mɑ wi u tii sue u ǹ wɑ̃ɑ swɑɑ geɑ sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ wi u kuɑ gemgii nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ, u ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ.
Wi u tii sue, u ku rɑ sinɛ sɛ̃ɛ. U rɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ nge tɑm nɔro, kpɑ u n nɔɔ wukie nge gɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yeru. U ku rɑ debu nge gɔɔ. U rɑ n tii bwesenu gɑwemɔwɑ u kɑ ko nin yinni.
Adɑmɑ bwese ni u mwɛɛrɑ mi, nu koo nùn seesi nu nùn gɑri sɔ̃ kɑ wɔmɑ kɑ mɔnnu, nu nɛɛ, u kuɑwɑ bɔ̃ruro wi, wi u dukiɑ mɛnnɑmɔ ye yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ wigiɑ, mɑ u gɑbun yɑ̃nu gurɑmɔ u tɔrubɑ yiimɔ. Sere sɑɑ yerɑ̀ u ko n mɔ̀ nge mɛ.
Bèn dibu u nɛni, bɑ koo nùn seesi subɑru sɔɔ, kpɑ bu gurɑ ye u mɔ.
Nge mɛ u tɔn dɑbinu wɔri u nin yɑ̃nu gurɑ, nge mɛyɑ be bɑ tie, bɑ koo mɑɑ nùn wɔri bu win yɑ̃nu gurɑ yèn sɔ̃ u tɔmbun yɛm yɑri, mɑ u tem kɑ mɛn wusu kɑ mɛn tɔmbu dɑm dɔre.
Bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u dukiɑ gurɑmɔ ye yɑ ǹ dɛɛre win berusebun mi, kpɑ u wɑ u n wɑ̃ɑ ɑye bɛɛrɛgiru sɔɔ, mi u ǹ mɑɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑsi.
Adɑmɑ win yɛnun sekurɑ u sɔɔru kuɑ mi, ye u kɑ bwese dɑbinu go. Win tiin wɑ̃ɑrɑ u kɑri bɔrie.
Domi bɑɑ kɑ gɑniɔ, yi koo wuri ko yi nùn tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ kpɛɛrun yɑri yi wuri wurɑ.
Bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u win wuun kpɛɛkpɛɛku swĩimɔ yɛm wɔllɔ, mɑ u tɔmbu dɑm dɔremɔ.
Ye tɔmbɑ mɔ̀ kpuro, yɑ koo dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ. Bɑ tii nɔwiɑ mɔ̀wɑ kɑm sɔɔ. Gusunɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinniwɑ u koo ye kpuro kɑm koosiɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔ, Yinni Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ru tɑ ko n yibɑwɑ tem sɔɔ nge mɛ nim wɔ̃ku gɑ rɑ n nim yibɑ.
Bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u win beruse tɑm bɔɔbɔm wɛ̃ɛmɔ mu kɑ nùn go nge dɛ̃ɛ, u n yɔ̃ tereru, kpɑ u nùn sekuru doke u n mɛɛrɑ.
Yɛ̃ro u tii sekuru dokemɔwɑ mi, n ǹ mɔ bɛɛrɛ. Win tii u mu nɔruo kpɑ u tereru yɔ̃rɑ. Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nùn tilɑsi ko u kɑ win mɔrun nɔrɑ nɔ kpuro, kpɑ win bɛɛrɛ ye u rɑɑ mɔ yu gɔsiɑ sekuru.
Dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye u kuɑ Libɑniɔ, yɑ koo wɔri win wiru wɔllɔ. U yɛɛ go. Adɑmɑ yɛɛ yi, yi koo nùn nɑndɑsiɑ. Yeni kpuro yɑ koo nùn deemɑ yɛm mɛ u yɑrin sɔ̃, kɑ dɑm mɛ u tem mɛ kɑ mɛn wusu kɑ mɛn tɔmbu dɔren sɔ̃.
Arufɑɑni yerɑ̀ bwɑ̃ɑrokunu nu mɔ tɔnu u kɑ sinɑ u nu seku. Nu sɑ̃ɑwɑ ni bɑ sekɑ kɑ sisu, mɑ nu derɑ u weesu nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ tɔnu u koo win nɑɑnɛ doke bwɑ̃ɑroku ni u sekɑ sɔɔ, ni, ni nu ǹ kpɛ̃ nu gɑri gere.
Bɔ̃rurowɑ wi u dɑ̃ɑ kuku sɔ̃ɔmɔ u mɔ̀, gu seewo, mɑ u kperu sɔ̃ɔmɔ u mɔ̀, tu dom yɑndo. Yen gɑɑ yɑ koo kpĩ yu nùn bwisi kɛ̃? Geemɑ, u nu wurɑ kɑ sii geesu pote. Adɑmɑ nu ǹ hunde mɔ, nu n sere wɑ̃ɑru mɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ win sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑrɔ. Tɔmbu kpuro bu nɔɔ mɑrio win wuswɑɑɔ.
Wee kɑnɑ te Gusunɔn sɔmɔ Hɑbɑkuku u kuɑ kɑ weeweenu.
U nɛɛ, Yinni Gusunɔ, nɑ nuɑ ye ɑ geruɑ. Mɑ nɑ nɑndɑ. A de yu koorɑ wɔ̃ɔ sini sɔɔ. A de tɔmbu bu ye wɑ bɛsɛn wɑɑti yeni sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ wunɛn mɔru ye sɔɔ, ɑ yɑɑyo ɑ sun wɔnwɔndu kuɑ.
Gusunɔ, ɑ nɑ sɑɑ Edɔmun di. Wunɛ, Dɛɛro, ɑ nɑ Pɑrɑnin guurun di. Wunɛn yiiko yɑ wɔllu yɑm bururɑsie. Mɑ tem kpuro mu nun siɑrɑmɔ.
A nɑ, mɑ yɑm mu bururɑ. Sɔ̃ɔ yɑ̃nɑ yɑrɑ wunɛn nɔmɑn di, mi wunɛn dɑm mu wɑ̃ɑ.
